name: MHB 1:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. MEENYA ngyiramá apem matow ndwom
Meyi mo Pomfò ayɛw,
Makamfo me Hen N'enyimnyam,
N'adom no konyimdzi.

name: MHB 1:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Mo Wùra dɔyɛfo, me Nyankopon,
Boa m' ma mombɔ dawur,
Memfa Wo dzin n'enyidzi no
Mentahye mbea nyina.

name: MHB 1:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Jesus! dzin a otu hen suro,
Ͻma ’werɛhow b՝ᴐ adze;
Ͻyɛ sanku wo abᴐn asom’,
Ͻyε nkwa nye asomdwee.

name: MHB 1:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔkasa, na wotsie Ne ndze a,
Ewufo nya nkwa bio,
Akoma wѐrɛhonyi dzi dɛw,
Hianyi bùrobùro gye dzi.

name: MHB 1:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Odwuruw bᴐn no tum koraa,
Otu daduanyi duam';
No bᴐgyaa tum san fifo ho,
Odzii nyim maa mo so.

name: MHB 1:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hom bᴐn nyina da Jesus do;
Wokum Nyame Eguambaa,
Wɔdze Ne kra so bɔɔ afɔr
Maa obiara ne kra.

name: MHB 10:1
title: Martin Rinkart, 1586-1649
verse:
. HƐN akoma, nsa nye ndze
Yɛdze da nyame ase;
Ɔayɛ anwanwadze,
Wiadze dzi ho ehurusi;
Ofi hɛn na ne yamu,
Ɔdze dɔ akyɛ dze
Ehyira hɛen kwan nyina m',
Na ɔda ho yɛ hɛndze.

name: MHB 10:2
title: Martin Rinkart, 1586-1649
verse:
. Ɔkyɛso Nyankopɔn
Ɔnka hɛn ho daa nyina,
Ɔmfa ahotɔ krɔnn,
Ɔndom hɛn akoma daa,
Ɔnkora hɛn N'adom mu,
Ongya hɛn nkɔntɔnkye m',
Na ɔmpa hɛn mbusu,
Sesei na ndaamba so.

name: MHB 10:3
title: Martin Rinkart, 1586-1649
verse:
. Ayεyi nye ndaase
Ɔnkã Nyame sor Egya,
Nye Ne Ba Kortonoo,
Nye Nyame Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn:
Ɔkorsa Nyankopɔn
Sor nye asaase sɔr No;
Mbrɛ ahyɛse ɔtse n'.	
Ɔtse dɛm afebɔɔ.    Amen.

name: MHB 100:1
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: MHB 100:2
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: MHB 100:3
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: MHB 100:4
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807
verse:
. Nkyɛ hɛn akoma aagow!
Ewuradze, kyerɛ hɛn, yɛndɔ;
Hɛndze, ao, hɛn werɛ fir ntsɛ! 
Nyɛnko bi a yɛwɔ n' sor hɔ a!
Sɛ wɔdze hɛn 'kra ba fie a,
Yɛbɔdɔ Wo dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ.

name: MHB 1000:
title: Mrs. James.
verse:
M'adze nyinaa gu pata no do,
      Morotweɔn ogya n' ma ɔaaba,
      Morotweɔn, morotweɔn, morotweɔn,
      Morotweɔn ogya n' mà ɔaaba.

name: MHB 1000:1
title: Mrs. James.
verse:
. Mo, sunsum, kra, nye honam,
Jesus, medze ma Wo,
Afɔrbɔdzѐ a no ho tsew krɔnn,
Ɔnyɛ Wodze daa nyinaa.

name: MHB 1000:2
title: Mrs. James.
verse:
. Jesus, Agyenkwa tumfo,
Motwer Wo dzin kɛse n';
M'enyiwa da Wo nkwangye n' kwan
W'anohoba n' meregye.

name: MHB 1000:3
title: Mrs. James.
verse:
. Ao, ma ogya n' nsian sesei,
Ɔmbra mo sunsum do,
Ɔmbra mbɛhyew m' afɔrbɔdze,
Ɔmma mo ho ntsew krɔnn.

name: MHB 1000:4
title: Mrs. James.
verse:
. Jesus pa, meyɛ Wodze,
Eguar m' Wo bɔgyaa n' mu
Fa Wo Sunsum bɛgyɛ me nsew,
Ma menyɛ Nyame dze.

name: MHB 1001:
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.
verse:
Wontsim aban n', na mereba,
      Jesus rinyam nsa;
      Wɔnto ano nse n' sor hɔ dɛ,
      W'adaworom yetsim n'.

name: MHB 1001:1
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.
verse:
. Ao o, m'afɛ! hom nhwɛ frankaa
Rinyam wɔ sor hɔ!
Afei nkyidɔm riyi hɔnho,
Konyim abɛm hɛn.

name: MHB 1001:2
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.
verse:
. Hwɛ dɔmtutuw a wɔreba,
Abɔnsam dzi kan:
Akatakyi rohwe ase,
Mbanyinndam pέ etu!

name: MHB 1001:3
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.
verse:
. Hwɛ, konyim frankaa no rinyam!
Tsie, abɛn rehɛn,
Yɛdze hɛn Hen dzin bedzi nyim
Wɔ adɔm nyina do.

name: MHB 1001:4
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.
verse:
. Ɔko asaasaa do akyer
Na boafo bɛn hɛn:
Hɛn Sahen kɛse no reba,
Kofo, hyέ akoma.

name: MHB 1002:
title: Eliza A. Walker.
verse:
Twer No, twer No,
     Sɛ sum n' yɛ hu dɛn ara a;
     Twer No, twer No,
     Na adzekyee no abɛn.

name: MHB 1002:1
title: Eliza A. Walker.
verse:
. Gyedzinyi, twer No, twer No,
Sɛ ko n' kyer do dɛn arà a;
Ɔyɛ dέn arà a ibedzi nyim,
Wo Nyame b]ko ama w'.

name: MHB 1002:2
title: Eliza A. Walker.
verse:
. Twer No, na mbusu n' rebɛn,
Ngyigye dzendzen rebɛn;
Obokutow wo arta
Ɔbra n'awor huhu n'.

name: MHB 1002:3
title: Eliza A. Walker.
verse:
. Ewuradze botum agye hɛn,
Ɔyɛ Nyɛnko arà ampa;
Gyedzinyi, twer No, twer No,
Twer N' ara ewiei.

name: MHB 1003:1
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.
verse:
. Werɛhonyi, 'wɔ hen arà a,
Mbeamùdua n' ho wɔ kwan!
Kã dza ɔhow wo werɛ,
Mbeamùdua n' ho wɔ kwan!
Kã ma w' Agyenkwa no ntse,
Gyaa suro nyinaa mu mà ɔnkɔ,
Kasà ara na ɔbɛtse;
Mbeamudua n' ho wɔ kwan!

name: MHB 1003:2
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 1003:3
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.
verse:
. Bɔnyɛnyi a enndwen, ndɛ bra,
Mbeamùdua n' ho wɔ kwan!
Tsie! Sunsum n' nyѐ Asɔrmba se,
Mbeamùdua n' ho wɔ kwan!
Hwɛ nkwa nsubùra woebue n' hɔ,
Woebue ama me nye wo,
Ebirɛmpɔn nyѐ akɔhweaban
Mbeamùdua n' ho wɔ kwan!

name: MHB 1003:4
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.
verse:
. Asɛmpa ny' 'i! Kwan wɔ hɔ
Ma nyimpa nyina!
Dɔ ayɛ mpata-dwuma n',
Mbeamudua n' ho wɔ kwan!
Adom esutsen repem,
Nyimpa nyinaa wɔ ho kwan;
O nkyέ adasa nyinà eehu dɛ
Mbeamùdua n' ho wɔ kwan!

name: MHB 1004:
title: E.M. Hall.
verse:
Jesus tuaa ne nyina,
     Ne nyina fir Noara;
     Bɔn egu mo ho fi dɛnn,
     Ɔahor ma ayɛ fitaa.

name: MHB 1004:1
title: E.M. Hall.
verse:
. Metse dɛ Gyefo n' se,
W' ahoɔdzen suar ampa;
Na dwen do weɔn na sɔr,
Fa Me yɛ w'adze nyina.

name: MHB 1004:2
title: E.M. Hall.
verse:
. Ewùradze, menyà ehu
Dɛ Wo nkotsee Wo tum
Na otu kwata bɔr,
Na ɔnam 'koma bo.

name: MHB 1004:3
title: E.M. Hall.
verse:
. 'Midze, minnyi yie bi a
Medze bɛgye W'adom;
M'bɔhor me ntar fitaa
Wɔ Eguambaa bɔgyaa mu.

name: MHB 1004:4
title: E.M. Hall.
verse:
. Da bi a me kra bɔsoɛr
Mo wumpa dὸ afow sor,
Jesus tuaa ne nyina!
Begyigye wim' hɔ nyina.

name: MHB 1004:5
title: E.M. Hall.
verse:
. Na minya mudu sor
Ahengua n' enyim hɔ a,
Medze m'asadze nyina
Bogu N'anànadze hɔ.

name: MHB 1005:1
title: D.W.C Huntingon.
verse:
. Ao, dwen ofi a ɔwɔ hɔ ho,
Osi baka fɛɛfɛw n' ho hɔ,
Mbrέ apapafo a wonnkowu pɛn
Woewuna hɔn ntar efufuw . . . .
     
Ɔwɔ hɔ!. . . . Ɔwɔ hɔ! . . .

name: MHB 1005:2
title: D.W.C Huntingon.
verse:
. Ao, dwen w'afέ a wɔwɔ hɔ ho,
Hɔn a woedzi kan ewie akwantu n',
Dwen ndwom a wɔrotow n' hɔ no ho,
Wɔ Nyamѐ ahemfi no mu hɔ . . .

name: MHB 1005:3
title: D.W.C Huntingon.
verse:
. M'Agyenkwa no so ɔwɔ hɔ,
Hɔ na m'asɛfo akɔhom,
Da bi mo so m'befi yaw nsa
Makɔ ahomka man no mu . . .

name: MHB 1005:4
title: D.W.C Huntingon.
verse:
. Aka kùmaa ma meedu fie hɔ,
M'enyi tua m'akwantu n'ewiei,
M'adɔfo dodὸwara wɔ hɔ a
Hɔn enyiwa tua mo so kwan. . . .

name: MHB 1006:
title: S.F. Bennett.
verse:
Da bi da . . . dɛɛdɛw n' mu
      Yebehyia wɔ mpoano fɛɛfɛw n' do.
      Da bi da . . . dɛɛdɛw n' mu,
      Yebehyia wɔ mpoano fɛɛfɛw n' do.

name: MHB 1006:1
title: S.F. Bennett.
verse:
. Man bi wɔ hɔ a ɔhyerɛn sen wi mpo,
Na yɛdze gyedzi hu n' wɔ ekyir;
Na Egya n' rotweɔn wɔ kwan no do,
Oesiesie kobew ama hɛn hɔ.

name: MHB 1006:2
title: S.F. Bennett.
verse:
. Yɛbɔtow wɔ mpoano fɛɛfɛw n' do
Esiarfo hɔn ndwom a ɔyɛ dɛw n';
Hɛn sunsum nnkedzi yaw ara pɛn,
Apempen nnkɔfὸra hɛn ahomgye.

name: MHB 1006:3
title: S.F. Bennett.
verse:
. Hɛn Egya dɔyɛfὸ a ɔwɔ sor hɔ,
Yɛdze hɛn ayɛyi bɛkɛma N'
Wɔ no dɔ ayamùyie no ne ntsi,
Wɔ nhyirà a ɔdze adom hɛn ha.

name: MHB 1007:
title: Unknown
verse:
Sɛ yɛsoa. . . mbeamudua n' a. . .
      Nna ahenkyɛw n'. . . so yɛbɔsoa,. . .
      Na yɛnye . . . ahoɔfɛfo astena, . . .
      Wɔ ahomka no mu da nyina.

name: MHB 1007:1
title: Unknown
verse:
. Ɔman bi wɔ hɔ, no mu hyerɛn,
No wim' tsew wann daa nyina
Hɔ sum nn-gye dabiara pɛn:
Agyenkwa hyerɛn hɔ daa.

name: MHB 1007:2
title: Unknown
verse:
. Beebi wɔ hɔ, asomdwee bea
Ɔbra po yi n' ekyir,
Hɔ ehum nn-kotu hɛn da:
Sie w'adze nyina wɔ hɔ.

name: MHB 1007:3
title: Unknown
verse:
. Ofi bi wɔ hɔ, enyimnyam fi,
Sor ahemfi papa;
Na hɔn a yɛdɔ hɔn wɔ ha 'i
Bɛyɛ etuu wɔ hɔ.

name: MHB 1007:4
title: Unknown
verse:
. Hɛn kɔn dɔ dɛ yegya bea yi a
Orutwam' hwew hwew yi;
Na yɛkɔfὸra dɔmtutuw n' a
Hɔn dɛw ɔmmbɔ adze da n'.

name: MHB 1008:
title: Rev. R. Lowry, 1826-99.

name: MHB 1008:1
title: Rev. R. Lowry, 1826-99.
verse:
. Ana yebehyia baka n' ho,
Mbrɛ ahohyѐrɛnfo edua n',
Dza no nsu gyenen-gyenen pem
Daa wɔ Nyame N'egua nkyɛn n'?

name: MHB 1008:2
title: Rev. R. Lowry, 1826-99.
verse:
. Baka fɛɛfɛw n' nkɔnkɔnoa hɔ,
Yeboguar ne mpetsema n',
Yɛpasar na yeeyi ayɛw,
Ahomka da fɛɛfɛw n' nyina,

name: MHB 1008:3
title: Rev. R. Lowry, 1826-99.
verse:
. Yerubodu baka fɛɛfɛw n' ho a,
Yɛbɔto adzesoa nyina fam';
Adom bɛgye hɛn kra efim',
Na ɔama ntar nye ahenkyɛw.

name: MHB 1008:4
title: Rev. R. Lowry, 1826-99.
verse:
. Baka fɛɛfɛw no hyerɛn a,
Hɛn Agyenkwa N'enyim no a,
Esiarfo a wonnwu da no
Wotu nkwagye ndwom wɔtow.

name: MHB 1008:5
title: Rev. R. Lowry, 1826-99.
verse:
. 'Ka kùmaa ma yeedu baka n' ho,
Ma yeewie hɛn akwantu,
Ma yaakɛtse asomdwee ndwom a,
Onunu akoma nyina.

name: MHB 1009:
title: G.F. ROOT, 1820-95.
verse:
N-hyiamu no bɛyɛ enigye
Ber-a hɛn akomam' astsew wɔ bɔn ho
Na yɛnye Ɔwὸ Agyenkwa atsena
Hɛn fi a onnyi ewiei n'mu.

name: MHB 1009:1
title: G.F. ROOT, 1820-95.
verse:
. Bra Agyenkwa hɔ, mma nnyɛ ekyim:
Ɔakyѐrɛ hɛn finimfin ha n-dɛ,
Reka No mberɛwm'dɛ, Bra.

name: MHB 1009:2
title: G.F. ROOT, 1820-95.
verse:
. Tsie, ɔse dɛ: Wɔmma mbofra kwan!
Wɔmma akoma nyina ndzi ehurusi;
Ma yɛmfa No nyɛ hɛn afamudze:
Mma nnyɛ ekyim, na bra.

name: MHB 1009:3
title: G.F. ROOT, 1820-95.

name: MHB 101:1
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
. ABRƐFO ahomgye,
'Werɛhofo dɛw,
Ehufo enyidar,
Ɔhɔho ne fie,
Daa ahoɔdzen,
Mbusu m' guandɔbea,
'Gyenkwa, Nyɛnko.

name: MHB 101:2
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
. Sundzi a ɔdɔ dze
Ne tsir to do,
Hɔn a woruwu asomdwee,
Ewufo nkwa,
'Hobrɛadzefo kwan,
Ewiei akatua,
'Hotsewfo ahom,
'Gyenkwa, Nyɛnko.

name: MHB 101:3
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
. Sɛ me nan fintsiw a, 
M'bosu afrɛ W';
Abrɛfo ahenkyɛw,
Ɔsor mbeamudua,
Sɛ me nan fom a,
Bɔ mo ho ban,
Nokwafo, dɔfo,
'Gyenkwa, Nyɛnko.

name: MHB 101:4
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
. M'bɔbɔ W' dzin akyerɛ,
M'bɛma Wo do,
M'behyira W' mahyɛ W' 'nyam,
M'beyi W' ayɛw;
Mo ndwuma nyina,
Wiadze a onnyi ewiei,
 Meyɛ Wodze daa,
'Gyenkwa, Nyɛnko.

name: MHB 1010:
title: Unknown

name: MHB 1010:1
title: Unknown
verse:
. ANÀ ɔwo rennyɛ hwee? Naasὸ edwuma wɔ hɔ,
Mo Wùra No turo mu, wo ho edwuma wɔ hɔ.
Yɛ abofra nokwafo gyina w’aweɔmber do;
Mbrɛ wo Wùra frɛ w’ biara tsen wo nsa suo mu bi.

name: MHB 1010:2
title: Unknown

name: MHB 1011:1
title: Unknown
verse:
. NA wɔwoo m’ ma meewu,
Maato honam yi famù ?
Ana me kra wɔ dɛ otu,
Kɔ wiadze fofor bi m?
Man a sum agye do,
Nyimpa n’adwen hwira mu,
Asamankyir hɔ nwinwin na
Mbrɛ adze nyina wѐrɛ fir n’.

name: MHB 1011:2
title: Unknown
verse:
. Minya fi asaase kɔ a,
M’ewie bowie me dɛn ?
Siar anaa mbusù a onnyi ewiei
Ɔbɛyɛ me kyɛpɛn;
Abɛn ne ndze n’ nyan mѐ a,
M’befi me nda mù masoɛr, ’
Mehu Enyimnyam Tsɛmbuafo n’
Nye wimù a ɔredzɛw n’.

name: MHB 1011:3
title: Unknown
verse:
. M’befi me nda mu dɛn ?
Konyim anaa yaw mù a ?
M’behyia atsɛn hun anaà atsɛn pa ?
N-dom anaa nhyirà a ?
Ana engyirfo bɛfa,
Hɔn nuà akɔ asɛndzii ?
Ana mbɔnsam bɔwɔ m' kra ntaa,
Akɔ ma woeebu n' fɔ ?

name: MHB 1011:4
title: Unknown
verse:
. Dza munnhu m’ yi woana
Bomm esi no pi ?
Dɛ m’bɔfora hɔn a wɔapaa hɔn n’
Anaa m’bɔforà esiarfo n’ ?
Woeyi m’ Nyame nkyɛn a,
Menye m’ Gyefo bɛsténa ?
Nyame bɛhyɛ dɛ monkɔ heaven
Anaa menkɛda hɛll?

name: MHB 1011:5
title: Unknown
verse:
. Ao! Ɔwὸ a emmpɛ dɛ,
Bɔnyɛnyi biara wu !
Woara wui ma aagye me kra
Wɔ mbusù a onnyi ewiei mu !
Kyѐrɛ m’ mbrɛ menyɛ mimfi
W'ebufuwhyew no nsa,
Ama sɛ bɛtséna W'egua n' dὸ a,
Medze dɛw meepue hɔ.

name: MHB 1011:6
title: Unknown

name: MHB 1012:
title: Rev. Isaac Anaman.
verse:
Mframa nye asorɛkye
Betsie Me ndze: Dzinn, yɛ komm !
Sɛ po a oetutu ne tsir egu do o,
Mbɔnsam o, nyimpa o,
Anaadɛ ebɛnadze ara o,
Nsu biara nnkotum amen hɛn yi,
Epo nye asaase nye wimù hɔn Wùra da mu,
Hɔn a wɔdze dɛw betsie Ne ndze;
Dzinn, yɛ komm!
Dzinn, yɛ komm!
Hɔn a wɔdze dɛw betsie Ne ndze:
Dzinn, Dzinn, yɛ komm!.

name: MHB 1012:1
title: Rev. Isaac Anaman.
verse:
. HƐN Wùra kɛse rutu,
Asorɛkye rubu akɛse;
Wimu enyi ebir kebikebi,
Yennyi boafo anaa sumabcw.
Anà ɔnnyɛ wo asɛm dɛ yeruwu yi ?
Eyɛ dɛn tum da dɛm ?
Naaso aber nyina iriyi hɛn hu dɛ
Annyɛ a yɛbɔkɔ nsuadze.

name: MHB 1012:2
title: Rev. Isaac Anaman.
verse:
. Mo Wura, medze awerɛhow sunsum
Abɔ me tsir adze ndɛ,
Awerɛhow ahyɛ m’akoma n’ase:
Ao, meserɛ Wo, nyan na gye m' nkwa !
Mframa nye atseetsee na nsupram yi
Rohom me kra a ɔrodɔ no do,
Na m’ Ewuradze dɔfo, muruwu, muruwu;
Ao, meserɛ Wo yɛ ntsɛm na suo so me nsamu !

name: MHB 1013:1
title: Rev. Isaac Anaman.
verse:
. ANA rigya Jesus hɔ akɔ anafua yi,
Wo nko ara ako yaw na sum mu ?
Ana bɔpow Ne fafir nye No nkwa a ɔdze rema wo yi ?
’Yi nye asomdwee a ennhu bi pɛn ?
Ana rigya No hɔ akɔ, ana rigya no hɔ akɔ ?
Ana rigya Jesus hɔ akɔ anafua yi ?

name: MHB 1013:2
title: Rev. Isaac Anaman.
verse:
. Ana rigya Jesus a ɔyɛ wo nyɛnko no hɔ akɔ,
Nyɛnko a ɔkye yɛ nokwar daa ?
Ɔbɛkyekye wo werɛ, ɔakyerɛ wo kwan,
ɔakõ agye wo,
Ɔbɛyɛ ne nyina kwa ama wo.

name: MHB 1013:3
title: Rev. Isaac Anaman.
verse:
. Jesus dze ɔdɔ a wonnsusu no ho amandzɛ wui,
Da hi ɔbɔɔ werdam maa abɔn;
Ao! Hwɛ No bɔgyaa wɔ esutsen nwanwa no mu,
Ɔbahohor efifidze nyina.

name: MHB 1014:
title: Rev. Isaac Anaman.
verse:
Fa hɔn bra, fa hɔn bra,
   Fa hɔn fi bɔn nhaban no m’ bra,
   Fa hɔn bra, fa hɔn bra,
   Fa hɔn a wɔatɔ gon n’ bra Jesus.

name: MHB 1014:1
title: Rev. Isaac Anaman.
verse:
. TSIE Guanhwɛfo n’ Ne ndze nà ɔda m’
Wɔ sar do noho kɔnkɔn no m’,
Ɔrefrɛ No nguàn a wɔatɔ gon,
Efi nguambuw mu kɔ ekyirkyir.

name: MHB 1014:2
title: Rev. Isaac Anaman.
verse:
. Woana bakaboa Guanhwefo yi.
Na aahwehwe nguan a waata gon?
Woana dze han beba buw no m’
Mbre wobefi awaw no mu ‘?

name: MHB 1014:3
title: Rev. Isaac Anaman.
verse:
. Tsie! Worusũ sar do noho,
Nkokwaa atsentsen etsifi;
Tsie ! Hɛn Wùra nà ɔrekã kyerɛ w’ dɛ
Kɔhwehwɛ Mo nguan fa hɔn bra.

name: MHB 1015:
title: Rev. Isaac Anaman.
verse:
Hyɛnhyɛn dɛ adzekyee nworaba
     Wɔfemfam N’ahenman m’;
     Wɔbɛhyerɛn hɔn ahoɔfɛw n ’ mu
     Ne kyɛw ho nworaba.

name: MHB 1015:1
title: Rev. Isaac Anaman.
verse:
. DÀ a ɔbɛba, dà a ɔbɛba
Abɛkan N’edwindze,
N’edwindze a wɔsom bo nyina;
Nedze a ɔdɔ hɔn.

name: MHB 1015:2
title: Rev. Isaac Anaman.
verse:
. Ɔbɔboa, ɔbɔboa
Hɔn anὸ akɔ N’ahenman m’;
Hɔn a hɔn ho tsew, hɔn a wɔhyѐrɛn.
Nedze a ɔdɔ hɔn.

name: MHB 1015:3
title: Rev. Isaac Anaman.
verse:
. Mbofraba, mbofrabà a,
Wɔdɔ hɔn Pomfo no,
Hɔn nye N’ewindze a wɔsom bo n’,
Nedze a ɔdɔ hɔn.

name: MHB 1016:1
title: Thomas Rawson Taylor, 1807-85.

name: MHB 1016:2
title: Thomas Rawson Taylor, 1807-85.

name: MHB 1016:3
title: Thomas Rawson Taylor, 1807-85.
verse:
. M'Agyenkwa Ne nkyɛn hɔ-
Sor nye me fie-
Ɔbɛhyɛ m' enyimnyam,
Sor nye me fie;
Eyiefo nye esiarfὸ a
Modɔ hɔn nyina wɔ hɔ;
Hɔ na mo so m'bɔhom,
Sor nye me fie.

name: MHB 1016:4
title: Thomas Rawson Taylor, 1807-85.

name: MHB 1017:1
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Wiadze ruwu; daa nyinara
Mpempem mpempem na wɔsen kɔ!
Christianfo, hom m-per ngye hɔn;
Hom nka Jesus nkyѐrɛ hɔn ntsɛntsɛm.

name: MHB 1017:2
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Ahodze, ahoɔdzen, nyimdzee,
Nyew, hom n-kwa mpo hom mfa mma;
Hom Gyefo ayɛ bi ama hom!
Na 'bɛn na hom nnkɛyɛ ama N'?

name: MHB 1017:3
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Nyame No Sunsum, fi edzi,
Keka po mu, nunu kwaa mu.
Mbew nyina do, mbea nyinara,
Prapra Nyame Ne mba boà ano.

name: MHB 1018:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. AWERƐKYEKYER Nyankopɔn,
Gye nyim no yɛ Wodze;
Woara Wodze na yɛdze ma W'
Wɔ daa ayɛyi mu.

name: MHB 1018:10
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nna hom ma yɛnhom do nkodu
Edà a yebodu fie;
O bra, yɛ ntsɛm fi sor sian bra
Jesus, Pomfo Kɛse!

name: MHB 1018:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛnam Woara Wo mu yɛbae,
Hɛn akoma yɛ kor;
O Jesus, yehyiaa Wo dzin mu,
Yɛpaam' so Wo dzin mu.

name: MHB 1018:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛpaam' honamm', nnyɛ sunsum mu,
Na hɛn adwen si kor;
Hɛn nyina yɛfam Jesus hὸ a,
Hɛn nsa bɛda nsam' daa.

name: MHB 1018:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn sunsum nyinaa yέ adze kor,
Wɔpaa hɛnm' à ɔnnkɛyɛ;
Nkokwaa bɔsoɛr, epo bɛpram,
Worunntum mmpaa hɛn mu.

name: MHB 1018:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn nkwa wɔ Christ hɔ wɔ Nyamem';
Hɛn Nkwa befir edze ntsɛm,
Na oeyi N' enyimnyam akyѐrɛ
Wɔ Ne mfɛwbam' wɔ ha.

name: MHB 1018:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn sunsum wɔ No tum n-sam',
Ɔdze hɛn besie daa;
Na menye wo yɛnye N' begyina
zion koko no do.

name: MHB 1018:7
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn enyi bohu No wɔ hɔ,
Yɛbɛhyѐrɛn dɛ ꓛno:
Ahotsewfo nye abɔfo hyia a,
O 'bɛn enyimnyam nye 'i!

name: MHB 1018:8
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O, n-hyiamu no bɛyɛ dɛw!
Yɛbɛhyɛ ntar fitaa,
Yebenyinam menankɔnson
Na yɛasoa ahenkyɛw.

name: MHB 1018:9
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nna hom mbɔ mbɔdzen ma yɛnko,
Yɛnko ntsew mu nkɔ sor;
Hɛn adwen ngyinà ewiei no do,
Hɛn enyi ntsim botae n'.

name: MHB 1019:
title: Dr. Hawker.

name: MHB 102:1
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. BƐKYEBO Dɔ a daa ayɛ ma,
Daa nyina ɔpem kwa,
Wɔkyɛ ma obiara nya bi,
Ɔwɔ hɔ daa, ɔnnsa.

name: MHB 102:2
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Hɛn anofamfa bɔ Dzin no,
Dzin no sen edzin nyina;
Ɔdɔ nko na onyim mbrɛ ofi,
Na ɔtse ɔdɔ ase.

name: MHB 102:3
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Bi a yɛnnkɔfow akɔ sor,
'Wuradze Christ aba famu;
Yɛhwehwɛ No wɔ bun mu kwa,
Bun biara nnkɛmen No.

name: MHB 102:4
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Asomdwee mu enyigye anaa
Bɔn mu awerɛhow,
Odzi N'ankasa ho dase,
Ne dasee wɔ No mu.

name: MHB 102:5
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Dɛw mu o, nwen mu o, aber biara 
Ɔyɛ Ɔboafo kɛse;
Gyedzi da ho wɔ N' Olivet, 
Ɔdɔ wɔ N' Galilee.

name: MHB 102:6
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. N'atar a wɔammpam mu ayarsa n',
Ɔbɛn hɛn yaw mpa mpo;
Yɛper na yɛdze hɛn nsa ka N',
Na yenya ayarsa.

name: MHB 102:7
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Yedua No do dze hɛn mpaabɔ, 
Mbofra mpaabɔ mpo koraa;
Dza ewufo ka no berɛww mpo,
Ne dzin ahyɛ mu ma.

name: MHB 102:8
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Hɛn nyina hɛn Ewuradze na hɛn Wura,
Mbrɛ hɛn dzin tse biara,
Yedzi W'ekyir, yɛtse Wo frɛ,
Yɛdze W' sɔ hɛn bra hwɛ.

name: MHB 1020:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 1020:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Jesus, Wo dzin kɛse no mu
Na mirikedzi owu do nym;
Migya dɛtse durdur yi hɔ
Na abɔfo soa m' atsaban do a,
Me kra botwà owu-mprɛnu mpὸ a,
Na oedzi hen daa daa wɔ wim'.

name: MHB 1020:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Enyi nnhunii, aso nn-tsee
Dza Christ ahyehyέ ama Ne mba a
Wɔnam Gyefo n' tum mu dzi nyim;
Wɔkɔ emudzi n'etsiwa mu
Wɔdze hɔn nan tsia owu do,
Wowu ahomkam' hyia hɔn Wùra.

name: MHB 1020:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ana 'pɛ dɛ ehwehwɛ hu
Dzin fofor a wɔdze bɛma wo?
Dzi aper wɔ wo tamfo do nyim wɔ wum';
Ɔno 'reper hwehwɛ no gyan:
Konyim nko na otum kyerɛ.

name: MHB 1021:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. YESÙ mfɛfὸ a wɔkɔ yɛ dɛn?
Yesùro owu dɛm dɛn?
Ana nnyɛ Jesus Ne dzѐ à ɔdze
Frɛ hɔn kɔ Ne nkyɛn bi a?

name: MHB 1021:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ohyira No nkὸrɔfo nyina hɔn nda
Ɔdwedwe adaa nyina:
Henfa na mfɛwba no bɔhom?
Hɔn Tsir no Ne nkyɛn a?

name: MHB 1021:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Hɔ na ofi soɛree foow sor,
Na ɔkyerɛɛ hɛn kwan:
Ɔsoɛrda kɛse n' hɛn honam
Botù akɔ Ewùradze nkyɛn.

name: MHB 1021:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 1022:1
title: Bishop Heber, 1783-1826; and Archbishop Whateley.
verse:
. Enye me ntsѐna! onwim ano rotɔ;
Sum regye, Ewuradze, nye me ntsena!
Aboafo pa, na akyekyewѐrɛfo sã a,
Onnyibi-ne-bi-à-ɔba, enye m' ntsѐna!

name: MHB 1022:2
title: Bishop Heber, 1783-1826; and Archbishop Whateley.

name: MHB 1022:3
title: Bishop Heber, 1783-1826; and Archbishop Whateley.
verse:
. Mihia Wo me nkyɛn aber nyinara,
W' adom n-ko na ɔka siamfo hyɛ;
Gyafo nye Taafo wɔ hen ka Wo ho?
Isum o, ekan o, enye me ntsѐna.

name: MHB 1022:4
title: Bishop Heber, 1783-1826; and Archbishop Whateley.
verse:
. Sɛ menye Wo nam a, munnsuro hwee;
Ɔyaw nnyɛ durdur, na nyinsu nnyɛ wen:
Owu, wo bɔr na wo konyim wɔ hen?
Mo konyim wɔ do daa, sɛ 'Wo nye m' tsѐ a.

name: MHB 1022:5
title: Bishop Heber, 1783-1826; and Archbishop Whateley.

name: MHB 1023:1
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.

name: MHB 1023:2
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.
verse:
. Edziban a ofi sor tɔ
Ma yɛdze nyɛn hɛn kra:
Nwomà a yɛkenkan a yehu
Mbrɛ ɔsor man mu tse;

name: MHB 1023:3
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.
verse:
. Ɔyɛ gyafadum anago,
Munumkum adzekyee;
Ɔbra po tu ne tsir gu do a,
Hɛn sekyɛ nye tabon.

name: MHB 1023:4
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.
verse:
. Onyame Twerammpon N' Asɛm,
N' enyimmyam Ba N' Ahyɛmù,
Yeennya wo a yenntum bra yi bɔ,
Yenntum nnya Nyame man.

name: MHB 1023:5
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.
verse:
. Ewùradze, dom hɛn ma yensũa
W' Asɛm mu nyansa n' yie,
Na yɛmfa mbofra 'koma ngye
Ne nkyѐrɛkyѐrɛ krɔnkrɔn no.

name: MHB 1024:1
title: Walter Hawkins.
verse:
. Bra ntsɛm, O hɛn Wùra, pa Jesus,
Ansaana adze akye,
Yenyan a ma yenhu W' enyim
Anapa yέ Ewia ma hɛn.

name: MHB 1024:2
title: Walter Hawkins.
verse:
. Bɛn hɛn O hɛn Wùra pa Jesus,
Na yeennsuro ara da;
Ewiaber mu hyew kã hɛn a,
Yɛsѐrɛ Wo dɛ yɛ hɛn Nwin.

name: MHB 1024:3
title: Walter Hawkins.
verse:
. Ka hɛn nkyɛn, Wùra pa Jesus,
Ber a ewia akɔtɔ;
Ewimbir a yɛaberɛ no,
Woara yɛ hɛn Ahomgye.

name: MHB 1025:1
title: Thomas Osmand Summers, 1812-82.
verse:
. ADZEKYEE kan
Ama menyan,
Na mefi me nda mu;
M' Egya, minyim
Dɛ Wo dɔ nko
Na ɔkὸra W' abofra.

name: MHB 1025:2
title: Thomas Osmand Summers, 1812-82.
verse:
. N-dɛ da yi,
Meserɛ Wo,
Gya me, yɛ mo Hwɛfo;
Yi mo bɔn kɔ,
Jesus siarfo,
Na ma mentsѐna Wo nkyɛn.

name: MHB 1025:3
title: Thomas Osmand Summers, 1812-82.
verse:
. O Sunsum a
Ema adom,
Bɛtsѐna m' akoma mu;
Ma memfata,
Na da bi so
Maabà ebohu W' enyim.

name: MHB 1026:1
title: George R. Elliott.
verse:
. Ewùradze, yɛrefrɛ Wo;
Nye hɛn ntsѐna, hɛn Hɔho pa,
Ber a ewia rokɔtɔ
Ma adzesaa so reba.

name: MHB 1026:2
title: George R. Elliott.
verse:
. Hɔn a hɔn werɛ ahow,
Nye hɔn ntsѐna, hɔn Hɔho pa;
Fa W'asomdwee na Wo dɛw
Hyɛ hɔn akoma mu ma.

name: MHB 1026:3
title: George R. Elliott.
verse:
. Boa akomà a oepira
Nà obiarà a ɔretseetsee n';
Tsѐna hɔn mu dɛ Hɔho pa,
Fa W'adom bɛhyɛ hɔn dzen.

name: MHB 1026:4
title: George R. Elliott.
verse:
. Fa Wo nkwagye tum bɔsoɛ
Na hyira ɔkra biara;
Ewimbir yim' bra bɛyɛ
Ndzebɔnyɛfo Hɔho pa.

name: MHB 1027:1
title: Alfred H. Vine, 1845-1917.
verse:
. ADZЀ akye O!
Da fofor yi
Dze enyigye frɛ me dɛ
Monsoɛr m-fi me mpa do.

name: MHB 1027:2
title: Alfred H. Vine, 1845-1917.
verse:
. Adzekyee
Pa a ɔtse dɛm
Nn-kyee wɔ wiadze ha pɛn 
Da fɛɛfɛw yi yɛ sὸronko.

name: MHB 1027:3
title: Alfred H. Vine, 1845-1917.
verse:
. Adzekyee
Pii bɛba bio;
Na wim' a ɔatsew kann yi
Ɔnnkɛyɛ dɛmara bio.

name: MHB 1027:4
title: Alfred H. Vine, 1845-1917.
verse:
. Sor Egya,
M' asɔr nye dɛ
Ma menyɛ dza Ɔwo 'pɛ
Ndɛ da yi nye mber nyina.

name: MHB 1028:1
title: Unknown
verse:
. Mepɛ mesũa Jesus:
Ɔyέ ayamuyie;
Obowui agye m' nkwa,
Wɔbɔɔ N' mbeamuduam'.

name: MHB 1028:2
title: Unknown
verse:
. Sɛ mokɔ Jesus hɔ a,
Obetsie m' asɔr,
Ɔbɛma mo hὸ atsew,
Ɔdze m' bɔn bɛkyɛ m'.

name: MHB 1028:3
title: Unknown
verse:
. Mobɔdwen Jesus ho:
Ɔyɛ dɔ dodow
Ɔtse N' ahenguam hɔ,
Ɔhwɛ m' ase ha.

name: MHB 1028:4
title: Unknown
verse:
. Sɛ mo werɛ twer Jesus,
Sɛ meyɛ Ne pέ a,
Nna m' ahom bɛka m' ho,
Biribiara nnkɛyɛ m'.

name: MHB 1028:5
title: Unknown
verse:
. Yamùyiefo pa Jesus!
Nkyɛ oeesuo me nsam',
Na ewiei n' ɔaagye m' ato
Ɔman papa n' mu.

name: MHB 1029:
title: Unknown
verse:
Sɛ meba Jesus hɔ a,
       Ahomka bɛka m';
       Oegum' arà refrɛ
       Mbofra tse dɛ emi.

name: MHB 1029:1
title: Unknown
verse:
. Sɛ meba Jesus hɔ a,
Mo hom bɔtɔ mo ho;
Sɛ mo werɛ how a
Ɔbɛkyekye m' werɛ.

name: MHB 1029:2
title: Unknown
verse:
. Sɛ meba Jesus hɔ a,
Obetsie m' asɔr,
Ɔbɔdɔ m' ampaara,
Owui maa mo bɔn.

name: MHB 1029:3
title: Unknown
verse:
. Sɛ meba Jesus hɔ a,
Obosuo me nsam',
Obogum' ara egya me
Akɔ man papam'.

name: MHB 1029:4
title: Unknown
verse:
. Hɔ menye mbofra pa
Bɛhyɛ ntar fitaa;
Mubohu m' Agyenkwà ampa
Wɔ sor man n' mu daa.

name: MHB 103:1
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. HƐN nyina hɛn Ewuradze na hɛn Wura,
Mbrɛ hɛn dzin tse biara,
Yedzi W'ekyir, yɛtse Wo frɛ
Yɛdze W' sɔ hɛn bra hwɛ.

name: MHB 103:2
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Ibun hɛn atsɛn, Wo krɔnkrɔnyɛ
Bu hɛn akɔndɔ nyina fɔ;
Yinom yɛ ebufuw ma 
Wo dɔ a Ɔtwe hɛn bɛn Wo no.

name: MHB 103:3
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Hɛn nsusui nyina da W'enyim;
Da W'enyim adagyaw,
Bɔn a yɛdze esuma nyina
Wo kan no hyerɛn do.

name: MHB 103:4
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Yɛyɛ mberɛw, yɛyɛ efurafo mpo a, 
Otwar dɛ egye hɛn som;
Yɛdze hɛn akyɛdze ahorow brɛ W',
Ɔwo nnkɔpow biara.

name: MHB 103:5
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Yekwetsir Wo a yɛhwer adze nyina,
Ndwuma nyina yɛ gyan;
Wo mbeamudua no sunsum mpo 
Ɔhyerɛn sen ewia.

name: MHB 103:6
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Hɛn Nyɛnko, Nua na hɛn Ewuradze, 
Yensi dɛn yɛnsom Wo?
Nnyɛ dzin, nnyɛ som ho nhyehyɛɛ bi 
Dɛ W'ekyir a yedzi nko.

name: MHB 103:7
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Yɛnntse asɛm yie, yemmbu adze yie,
Yɛbɔ mpaa bi na bi;
Ɔwo nye Kan n', Nokwar n' na Kwan, 
Dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse biara.

name: MHB 1030:1
title: R.A.Ferguson.
verse:
. Hwɛ, bɔw mpѐtsema hyɛnhyɛnn
Sosɔ nhaban do;
Ber, a wɔrehyѐrɛn, wɔkyѐrɛ
Dɛ, Nyame ye daa.

name: MHB 1030:2
title: R.A.Ferguson.
verse:
. Hwɛ 'napa wi nsѐrɛmɛn,
Ɔsesa kwaa mu,
Dzinn, naaso wɔrekã
'Dɛ, Nyame ye daa.

name: MHB 1030:3
title: R.A.Ferguson.
verse:
. Tsie koko n' woraba,
No nko da hɔ no,
Eminim à ɔrobɔ n' kã
Dɛ, Nyame ye daa.

name: MHB 1030:4
title: R.A.Ferguson.
verse:
. Dua no sor nhaban mu,
Mbrɛ suro bi nnyi n',
Nnoma rotow ndwom kyѐrɛ
Dɛ, Nyame ye daa.

name: MHB 1030:5
title: R.A.Ferguson.
verse:
. M' akoma, ndaase ndwom n',
Fa w' afamùdze bra,
Ndzɛmba nyina bɔm' kã
Dɛ, Nyame ye daa.

name: MHB 1031:
title: Unknown
verse:
Wɔntow ndwom, wɔntow ndwom,
     Dɛw na enyigye ndwom no,
     Wɔntow ndwom, wɔntow ndwom,
     Ahomka afe ndwom no.

name: MHB 1031:1
title: Unknown
verse:
. Wɔntow ehurusi ndwom no,
Hom ndwom a ɔyɛ dɛw no;
Hom werɛ mfir hom yaw nyina,
Na hom nhue hom ayɛyi
Mma nyia oegya hom aba ha
Nye mfɛfo ebehyia mu,
Hɔn a wɔakyerɛkyerɛ hɛn
Mbrɛ wodua kɔ Jesus hɔ.

name: MHB 1031:2
title: Unknown
verse:
. Binom dze ndwom nye mfrankaa baa
M-feda hɛn nhyiamu n' mù a,
Wɔrotow Hosanna ndɛ wɔ
Ɔsor mbrɛ abɔfo wɔ n';
Hɔ, Jesus N' enyimnyam mu hɔ,
Na wɔwɔ riyi N' ayɛw,
Nyame dɔ nsɛm dadaada n',
Ɔnye dza wɔtow no hɔ.

name: MHB 1031:3
title: Unknown
verse:
. Ao, hɛn Egya, yɛda W' ase,
Wɔ afe yi na ne nhyira;
Ao, nkyɛ hɛn a yeehyia ha nyina,
Hɛn akoma aada W' ase,
Ao, Agyenkwa, yɛda W' ase,
'Dze Wo bɔgyaa apon hɛn:

name: MHB 1032:1
title: Unknown

name: MHB 1032:2
title: Unknown

name: MHB 1032:3
title: Unknown
verse:
. Wonyi Eguambaa n'ayɛw,
Mbusupadze Eguambaa n';
Werdam wɔ No bɔgyaam'-
Wɔnkã wɔ aman nyina do.
Afahodzi afe n' aba!
Hom a wɔapon hom, hom nsan mbra.

name: MHB 1032:4
title: Unknown
verse:
. Hom, bɔn nye hɛll n-kὸwaa,
Hom mfa homho hom ndzi,
Hom nnya nkwa ntsena Christ mu,
Hom nyi Jesus ayɛw;
Afahodzi afe n' aba!
Hom a wɔapon hom, hom nsan mbra.

name: MHB 1032:5
title: Unknown
verse:
. Hom a wɔatɔn hom sor
Egyapadze koraa,
Christ dɔ hὸ akyɛdze ny' yi,
Hom ngye hom adze kwa bio:
Afahodzi afe n' aba!
Hom a wɔapon hom, hom nsan mbra,

name: MHB 1032:6
title: Unknown
verse:
. Hom ntsie nsɛmpa n' abɛn n'
Ɔsor adom nsɛmpa n'
Na hom nnya nkwa mfir ha
Nkefir hom Agyenkwa enyim.
Afahodze afe n' aba!
Hom a wɔapon hom, hom nsan mbra.

name: MHB 1033:1
title: Unknown
verse:
. Ɔkra bɔnyarfo Gyefo,
Ma m' gyedzi ma ɔmbɔ m'esu!
Wie W'adom edwùma kɛse n'
Twa no tsia wɔ tseneem'.

name: MHB 1033:2
title: Unknown
verse:
. Kasa bio dɛ, Wo ho mfiri!
Yi mo mu bɔn fi hɔ,
Yi fintsidua nyina fi hɔ
Fa dɔ mu tutu no hɔ.

name: MHB 1033:3
title: Unknown
verse:
. Monnkɔhewhwέ adzѐ a osuar,
Mommkɔhwehwέ adzѐ a ɔsõ,
Kyɛn dɛ wodze Christ bɛma m'
Christ n-ko, sor o, ase o.

name: MHB 1033:4
title: Unknown
verse:
. Kɛtsѐankyɛ maapem adze!
Nkyɛ mbrɛ metse nyina aayew!
Ma menyew adze nyinaa,
Ma mo Wura nyɛ m'adze nyina.

name: MHB 1034:1
title: Unknown
verse: . Bra Jesus hɔ sesei.

name: MHB 1034:2
title: Unknown
verse: . Ɔbɛgye w' nkwa sesei.

name: MHB 1034:3
title: Unknown
verse: . Woana gye dzi sesei?

name: MHB 1034:4
title: Unknown
verse: . 'Mi megye dzi sesei.

name: MHB 1034:5
title: Unknown
verse: . Abɔdzin nka Nyame.

name: MHB 1035:1
title: Unknown
verse:
. MBRƐ mudua dɔ Jesus,
Osiandɛ odzii kan dɔɔ m'.

name: MHB 1035:2
title: Unknown
verse:
. Mo werɛ nnkefir N' da,
Ɔno owui maa me.

name: MHB 1035:3
title: Unknown
verse:
. Metse mema Jesus:
Ɔdze No nkwa maa me.

name: MHB 1035:4
title: Unknown
verse:
. Jesus siarfo, kὸra me:
Motwer Wo dzin nkotoo.

name: MHB 1035:5
title: Unknown
verse:
. Ao, Jesus, m' bɔdɔ Wo:
M' bɔdɔ W' akɔ owum'.

name: MHB 1035:6
title: Unknown
verse:
. Enyimnyam nka Jesus,
Wɔ dɔ a ɔdze adɔ m'.

name: MHB 1036:1
title: Unknown
verse:
. Ao, bra ma yendzi dɛw,
Sɛ nkan n' meyɛ hianyi a,
Afei menya Nyame ho dɔ,
Ɔdɔ a ɔkyɛn sika.

name: MHB 1036:2
title: Unknown
verse:
. Ao bra ma yendzi dɛw,
Sɛ nkan n' motɔɔ bahaw a,
Afei menya Otumfo a
N'abaw weɔn me dabaa.

name: MHB 1036:3
title: Unknown
verse:
. Ao, bra ma yendzi dɛw,
Sɛ nkan n' mobɔɔ ekὸ a,
Nyame dze No dɔ atwe me
Dɛ mensan m'Egya fie.

name: MHB 1036:4
title: Unknown
verse:
. Ao, bra ma yendzi dɛw,
N-kyɛ me kra reyew;
M'Agyenkwa Jesus abɔtwe m'
Wɔ bɔn na abɔnsam nsa.

name: MHB 1036:5
title: Unknown
verse:
. Ao, bra ma yendzi dɛw,
Afei menya Nyɛnkὸ a
No dɔ kyɛn onua mpo no dɔ,

name: MHB 1036:6
title: Unknown
verse:
. Ao, bra ma yendzi dɛw,
Ao, 'wo a edɔ Jesus,
Nyame N'abɔdze nyinara,
Wonsuo m' yenyi N' ayɛw.

name: MHB 1037:1
title: Unknown
verse:
. JESUS siarfo! Jesus siarfo!
'Wὸ a ѐdze Woho maa me ntsi,
Mma nngyaa m' mma minnkyin wɔ bɔn mu;
Ma membra mbɔhom Wo mu.

name: MHB 1037:2
title: Unknown
verse:
. Abrɛfo nyina enyidar
Bɛyɛ mo so m' enyidar;
Jesus siarfo! Jesus siarfo!
Ma membra mbɔhom Wo mu.

name: MHB 1037:3
title: Unknown
verse:
. Twe m' ekyir fi bɔn nyina ho,
Gye m' mara mo suban nsam';
Jesus siarfo! Jesus siarfo!
Ma membra mbɔhom Wo mu.

name: MHB 1037:4
title: Unknown
verse:
. Enyingye pa, ahotɔ krɔnn,
Na Wo som dze bɛma me!
Jesus siarfo! Jesus siarfo!
Ma membra mbɔhom Wo mu.

name: MHB 1038:1
title: Unknown
verse:
. ESUOM, mbrɛ Olive Koko do,
N-wὸraba nyina edundum’;
Esuom nna Agyenkwa No nko
Ɔrosɔr wɔ turo mu hɔ.

name: MHB 1038:2
title: Unknown
verse:
. Esuom nna Agyenkwa No nko
Wɔ beebi nye hu ridzii aper;
No dɔ suanyi no mpὸ ennhu
No Wùra Ne yaw na Ne nyinsùwa.

name: MHB 1038:3
title: Unknown
verse:
. Esuom nnà obinom hɔn bɔn ntsi,
Yaw Nyimpa orusũ bɔgya;
Naaso Nyià ɔkosɔw hɔ yaw m’ n’
N’ Egya Nyankopɔn no ɔmmpa N’.

name: MHB 1038:4
title: Unknown
verse:
. Esuom nna wɔrotow ndwom bi a,
Abɔfo nko na wonyim tow,
Nyimpa biara mpo nntse ndwom a
Ɔdwedwe Agyenkwa Ne yaw n’.

name: MHB 1039:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. AMPA, Nyankopɔn N’adom ara kwa,
Na ndɛ ɔama yɛtsѐ ase,
Sέ ɔbra n’akotorka yɛ dzen dέn ara,
Ɔagye hɛn ne nyina fir mu summ.
Dwuma pa biarà a yeedzi,
Ofir Nyame No mboa,
Ntsi yɛbɔtow Ebenezer na yɛakyѐrέ ase
Dɛ mbrε Nyame aboa hɛn ebodu nye ‘I,
         
          Ebenezer, mbrɛ Nyame aboa hɛn ebodu nye ‘I,
          Ebenezer, nyew, Nyame N’adὸm ara kwa.

name: MHB 1039:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Nyame bɛhyɛ hɛn dzen,
No dɔ bɔboa hɛn nyina,
Asomdwee na ntseasee
Bɛhyɛ hɛn som yi mã.
Yɛbɔbɔ m’ yɛayɛ kor,
Yɛasom Nyame dɛ mbrέ ɔsɛ,
Ama sɛ yewu kɔ a,
Yɛnye Christ aasoa N’ahenkyɛw.

name: MHB 104:123
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.
verse:
. Pomfo kɛse, Nyame Eguambaa, 
Yɛdɔ Wo ho n-sɛm;
Ndwom biara nnyi hɔ a ɔyɛ dɛw
Dɛ Wo dzin nwanwa no.
 
. Ber a yɛwɔ wiadze mu yi, 
Jesus nye hɛn nkɔmbɔ:
Na ndzɛmba nyina so sɛɛ a
Jesus bɛyɛ hɛ ndwom.
 
. Da a yɛbɔfora esiarfo 
Wɔ sor man mu noho n'
Yɛbɛkam' yɛatow ndwom dɛɛdɛw,
Na Christ bɛyɛ hɛn ndwom.

name: MHB 1040:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. 'Rotweɔn ayɛ dɛn, mo dɔfo?
Tsie w' Agyenkwa bɔn Adamfo
Rowasa bɔkɔɔ tu Wo fo
Dɛ, 'Mo nua, rotweɔn ayɛ dɛn?

name: MHB 1040:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Aso nkobu ne pɛ no hwee
Nyia No bɔgyaa kyii maa wo yi?
Ekyim dzi mbusu, soɛr si n' pi
Ao, mo nua, rotweɔn ayɛ dɛn?

name: MHB 1040:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Soɛr, bɛkamfo Ne dzin nwanwa n'
Jesus Ɔdomankoma Ba n'
Ka No do daa, onnkowie gyan;
Bra, mo nua, rotweɔn ayɛ dɛn?

name: MHB 1040:4
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: MHB 1040:5
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Jesus Gyefo bɔ wo awoo!
Dɛ No dɔ no mma nnyi n' emuo;
Nkwa Wura na ɔresen n' o,
Mo dɔfo, rotweɔn ayɛ dɛn?

name: MHB 1041:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: MHB 1041:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Asomdwee Hen!
Ɔbɔn no dɔm abɛn!
Naaso yɛwɔ Wo nsam' a hwee nnyɛ hɛn.

name: MHB 1041:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Asomdwee Hen!
Yehia Wo daa nyina,
Dɛ nkwa na owu mu nye hɛn ntsena.

name: MHB 1041:4
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Asomdwee Hen!
Sesei ɔnye ndaamba,
W'adaworom, yɛnyɛ Wo nhyira mba.
       Amen.

name: MHB 1042:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. DZEBƆNYƐNYI kɔbesae a mahaw,
Ɔdomankoma, mma nnto me seraha.
Ɔbra n'ehum rutu, kwanm' ayɛ kɔnn,
Ɔkra no Kwangyafo, gya m' kodu sɔnn.

name: MHB 1042:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Gya m' kodu fie, me kra no korabew,
Mbrɛ ankonam bɔbɔfo biara nnyew.
Me bra n'ewiei to m' a, Onyankopɔn,
Samanadze Kanea, gya m' kodu sɔnn.

name: MHB 1042:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: MHB 1042:4
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Sum mu etumfo pii risi me mpa,
Woetwa ayer m'; minnya beebi memfa;
Naaso ber a medan Wo Nyame dɔ n',
M'adɔntsenhen tumfo! gya m' kodu sɔnn.

name: MHB 1042:5
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: MHB 1042:6
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: MHB 1043:
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
Wonhur ndwom no, wɔmbɔm' kɛse,
      Ahosɛpɛw afe n' aba,
      Nyame Egya fata ndaase
      Yɛbɔtonton No daa daa daa.

name: MHB 1043:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Ahosɛpɛw da ato hɛn,
Nyame N' adom no dɔɔ sõ daa;
Ɔama siar ayɛ hɛn kyɛpɛn,
Yɛbɔtonton No daa daa daa.

name: MHB 1043:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Hɛn Wura Christ a nnsakyer da,
Twitwa gye hɛn Kwesida Skuul,
Kyerɛkyerɛ Wo mbofraba,
Wo a eyɛ Kwangyafo Kor.

name: MHB 1043:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Hɛn sũa, agor, dwuma nyinam',
Jesus, mbofra Damfo, bɛn hɛn;
'Wo nye hɛn Kwan, Nokwar, na Nkwa n'
Adze nyinam' kora hɛn Wo nkyɛn.

name: MHB 1044:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Nyame, ndɔbaa Wura,
Yɛbɔtonton Wo;
Dza yɛwɔ nyinara
W' ehumbɔbɔr nko.

name: MHB 1044:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Nyame, ndɔbaa Wura,
W' ayamuyie dɔɔ so:
Dza 'dze ma nyinara,

name: MHB 1044:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: MHB 1044:4
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Enyimnyam nkã Nyame,
Na Christ Agyenkwa,
Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn wonyi
Ne dzin ayɛw daa.

name: MHB 1045:
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
Enyimnyam, ndaase, na ntonton sɛ
     Ɔkyɛso Nyame, Ɔbaatan pa;
     Nkɔkowaba ntow ndwom nhyira No dɛ:
    Ɔkyɛso Nyame N' ayamuyie mmpa.

name: MHB 1045:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. MBЀRANTSƐ na mbabaawa, nkɔdaa na mberwa,
Hom mfa ehurusi ndwom nkamfo
Ɔkyɛso Nyame nno; N' adom nwanwa
Wɔ amanaman nyinara mu.

name: MHB 1045:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Yensi dɛn ara nda Nyame ase?
Yensi dɛn nkã No dɔ ho asɛm?
Yɛbɔtow N' ayamùyie ho ndwom kɛse,
Yɛbɔtoa N' adɔyɛ ho atsɛn.

name: MHB 1045:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: MHB 1045:4
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Ao, hwɛ hamu nkyɛkyɛr ɔnye ndupɔn,
Dza wɔnnto nsa, so wɔnnto anan,
Ɔkyɛso Nyame nsamu bue ma hɔn
Ma wonya hɔn daadaa edziban.

name: MHB 1045:5
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Ɔkyɛso Nyame, hɛn Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn
Mfir Ne siar ewia no nhyɛ hɛn dzen,
Ntɔ Ne nhyira nsu no nyɛ hɛn prɔmprɔm,
Ma akra nyina nkamfo Ne dzin.

name: MHB 1045:6
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Ɔkyɛso Nyame ndom hɛn sor ndɔbaa,-
Sunsum N' aba nyinara,- mbordo.
Na sɛ bɛkyebo buber no nya bà a,
Yɛdze dɛw yeebu daa nkwa mbɔho.

name: MHB 1046:
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
Ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ
    Ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ,
    Ɔsormba mma do,
    Asempa ngye do;
    Mpanyin na mbofra
    Mbasia na mbarima,
    Hom mbɔ se nka dɛ,
    Ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.

name: MHB 1046:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Amansuon, hom mbra,
Na ndɔbaa Wura
N' adom nwanwa no
Sɛ ndaase mbordo.
Hom mfa akasamù
Ne ndze mbɔ hom nsam',
Na hom mbɔ se dɛ,
Ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.

name: MHB 1046:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Ewia wɔ hɔ yi,
Nyankom nngyaa tɔ yi,
Buber nnkɔbɔ hɛn,
Yebenya kyɛpɛn,
Hɛn anomu nnkofuw,
Hɛn atam nnkosuw,
Ma daa yaakã dɛ,
Ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.

name: MHB 1046:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Sɛ ɔbra bisiw
Ma enyi do siw,
Sɛ ɔpaa hɛn do,
Ɔkyer do, bam do,
Sɛ yɛkà a ɔmmba,
Sɛ yɛyέ a ɔnnyέ a,
Hɛn ndwom daa nye dɛ,
Ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.

name: MHB 1046:4
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Hwɛ wo mbɔrkutu
N' ase onnkotu,
Wo ngo pɔr kakra
Nnkɛsa dabiara.
Tow petse Nyame,
Ɔbɛma amee,
Ma daa aakã dɛ,
Ɔnnso Nyame yɛ.

name: MHB 1047:
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
Hom ntaa dzinn, ehum kɛse etu,
Fie gya edum, poma dzendzen ebu;
Hom nyɛ komm, ɔsagyefo atɔr,
Abefo reka mmɔm, hɔn enyiwa abɔ;
Na daakye Enyimnyam Hen Ne nkyɛn,
Christ mu ewufo benya hɔn kyɛpɛn,
Bɛkyebɔ Nkwa, Kan ɔnye Ɔdɔ
Bɛma wɔahyerɛn dɛ anapawi afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 1048:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. YƐBƆ Wὸ ewuo, Domfo Nyame Ɔkorsa,
Nana Adam na Evѐ hɔn hyiafo kor!
Fa Wo Nyame suro, ɔdɔ, nye nyansa
Behyira Okumfor na Ayefor.

name: MHB 1048:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Ehumbɔbɔr, kyɛw nyѐ yi, dom hɔn awarsɔ,
Wɔ bra n'atseetsee gyatanaa mpo mu;
Ndafua nyinara mu ɔsor enyisɔ
Nyɛ hɔn kyɛpɛn ber a hɔn nkwa wɔw do

name: MHB 1048:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Sɛ yaw to hɔn, wɔka n' fabi a ɔmmbà a,
Ɔbra n'ehum Taafo, pa hɔn esian;
Weɔn hɔn, na ma wɔmfa enyi ntsim Wo do,
Mbɛgye akatua pà a ofi nkodzen

name: MHB 1048:4
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Osian Christ n-tsi, fà abotar mu dom hɔn,
Ɔnye asomdwee a ɔtra n-hum'.
Nyame Egya, Ɔba nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn,
Gya hɔn kwan pa kodu bɛkyebo nom'.

name: MHB 1049:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Wɔnkɔbɔ dawur wɔ mbea nyinara dɛ,
Asomdwee Hen n' oridzi Ne hen:
N'adzesoa yɛ har, na No som so yɛ dɛw;
Wonyi No ayɛw, ahemfo hɔn Ɔhen.
      
      Jesus akofo atamfo n' gyina a,
      Wɔnper ndzi nyim, ɔkogu yɛ mbusu;
      Christ N'ahenman ntsi yɛsɔw ɔfona a,
      No som yɛ dɛw, na owu yɛ mfaso.

name: MHB 1049:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Jesus Ɔkatakyi no dɔm adehye,
Wɔnsoɛr ngyina ma adasa nnya nkwa;
Wɔnhwɛ mbrɛ Christ Ne dzin edua atahye,
Wɔ mbea nyina dɛ wiadze Agyenkwa.

name: MHB 1049:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Nokwar frankaa na orinyam wim' noho n',
Ɔda na tsenenee aba wiadze;
Hɛn Wura apa hɛn sum mu amandzehu,
Jesus apon hɛn ama fahodzi.

name: MHB 105:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 105:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Naaso edwuma n' sa a,
Na mama ahyɛ ase bio:
Emi W'adom dzifo,
Morohwehwɛ W'enyim;
Sɛ mosɔ hwɛ wɔ ha a,
Na muwu a, m'bohu Wo.

name: MHB 1050:
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
Nyame, ma Ghana Mbew ngyina,
      Nhyira nka no mu mba nyina.

name: MHB 1050:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Amansuon Twerammpon,
Yesu bɔ Wo ewuo,
Dɛ tsie Wo mba abɔn,
Hwɛ hɛn do dwudwoodwo.

name: MHB 1050:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Ao, dom hɛn President
Ɔsor tum na nyansa,
Ama n' aber yi do
Nsiesie aakã hɛn nsa.

name: MHB 1050:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Nyame, apam Wura,
Pam hɛn man mu apamfo;
Ma Woho do, kora
Wo mba anokwafo.

name: MHB 1050:4
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Edwumayɛfo pà a
Wɔdwen na wɔhwɛ kan,
Ewuradze, ma daa
Wɔnsoɛr wɔnhwɛ hɛn man.

name: MHB 1050:5
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Dom hɛn daa W' asomdwee,
Ɔdomankoma Hen;
Yɛsѐrɛ Wo amandwee
Dze ma hɛn mbasantsen.

name: MHB 1051:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. WƆMFÀ Asɛmpa n' nkɔ ekyirѐkyir,
Mbrɛ wɔnntsee Jesus Ne nka.
Wɔmpaam' dɛ No mu wɔ fafir,
Asomdwee, isiar na nkwa.
Wɔnka N' yie ma bahatɔfo
Wɔmfa dɛw nkamfo Ne dzin.
Na mber nyinara wɔmpaa mu
Nka dɛ, Jesus bedzi Hen.

name: MHB 1051:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Wɔmfà enyigye nsi Asɛm n' do,
Wɔnka n' bɔkɔɔ ara dɛ:
Nyame Ba Jesus ebowu
Na wiadze enya nkwa ndɛ!
Obiara a ɔgye No dzi no
Obenya sor ahendzi n';
Na amanaman ntonton No
Nse dɛ, Jesus bedzi Hen.

name: MHB 1051:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: MHB 1052:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: MHB 1052:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Yɛtotɔ sѐrɛ Wo amandwee
Ɔnye Wo ho nyimdzee daa so;
Ma yie nyina mu yɛnnkɛyɛ hwee
Atwe hɛn man yi do mbusu.
Ber a ndzepà abɛn n',
Ɔdɔ Nyame, bɛn hɛn,
Egya, hu hɛn mbɔbɔr;
Yehia gyedzi no dɔr.
Adom Wura, tsie hɛn asɔr.

name: MHB 1052:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Aman Wura, Tsetse Tumfo,
'Wo nye hɛn Enyindado Sekyɛ!
Egyanom mpanyin hɔn Boafo
Dza yɛafom do nyina fakyɛ.
Dzi Wo tum daa wɔ ha,
Mma nnto hɛn seraha.
Dom hɛn mbanyinndam
Wɔ krɔnkrɔnyɛ nyinam'.
Na dzi hen wɔ hɛn akomam'.

name: MHB 1052:4
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Asomdwee Hen, bɔ ndze yie ma
Amankofo ngu ndadze fam'!
Fa koryɛ na ɔdɔ homa
Twe wiadze nyina bra W' afam'.
Nyame, mber nyɛ ntsɛm mbra
Ma wiadzem' amambra
N-yɛ Wo nko Wodze,
N' amambu na tumdzi,
M-fata Wo sor ahendzi.

name: MHB 1052:5
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Asomdwee da a aman dze dɔ
Bɔbɔ dɔ mu n' ka ho mbra ntsɛm;
Ma nsisi nkɔ; ma enuadɔ
Nyɛ wiadze nyina hɔn asɛm.
Nkambaa bɛdan sɔsɔw,
Ako-mfowa bɛdan nsɔw,
Wiadze bɛdan Heaven,
Da a Jesus Christ Sahen
Bedzi wiadze hen mbersatsen

name: MHB 1053:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. NYAME Egya Tumfo,
Tsetse mpanyin Boafo
Na Guandɔbea!
Kyea W' enyi hwɛ hɛn m an,
Ao, yɛ n' dɛ W' ahenman,
Yie nyinara fa ma n';
Hɛn awobeà a!

name: MHB 1053:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Abɔ hɛn man ne tsir
Sika pa abɔtsir
Enyimnyam mu;
Na mbrɛ Woara esi
Ehyira hɛn asaase,
Aman nntum nntse ase;
Ntonton nkã Wo.

name: MHB 1053:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Egyapadze bɛn nye
Hɛn siar awobea yi!
Ahomka man!
No mu ndzepà a wɔnntɔ,
N' amandzwee, n' ahotɔ,
Ofir, Nyame, Wo dɔ
Dadaada no.

name: MHB 1053:4
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Egyanom fὸna piigyan n'
Aso ɔbɛyɛ gyan?
Dabiarada!
Hɛn man ne yieyɛ ntsi
Atseetsee mpo Wɔanntse;
Wɔpɛ hɛn yie; dɛm ntsi
Yɛkaa hɔn daa.

name: MHB 1053:5
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Nyame, nsiesie Pɛfo
Na asomdwee Mafo,
Yɛ hɛn Fapem.
Sɛɛ mansotwe akɔndɔ;
Ma nsisi nyina nkɔ;
Fa koryɛ, amandɔ
Dom hɛn daapem.

name: MHB 1053:6
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Hɛn nkwa, Nyame ꓛba,
Ma yɛnyɛ nhyira mba,
Adehye man;
Sunsum a ennsakyer
Hɛn Awerɛkyekyer,
Wo nsa ndzi hɛn ekyir;
Kora hɛn man!

name: MHB 1054:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. ƆDƆFO, yɛma w' Nantseyie!
Nyame nkora wo nkodu fie,
Ongya w' nkɔ w' akwantu n' ewiei
Sɔkyee na komm.

name: MHB 1054:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Nyame N' enyimpa nkã wo do,
Ɔmboa w' akwan nyinara mu,
Ɔnweɔn wo yie ara nkodu
Da a yebehyiam'.

name: MHB 1054:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Kaansa hɛn honam ridzi mpaa
Ma yennkohu w' enyim mpo a,
Yebehyiam' wɔ Nyame mu daa
Dɛ yɛnnkɛpaam'.

name: MHB 1054:4
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Nyame Ne kan ntsew w' akwan mu,
Ɔmma ne nhyira mbra wo do,
Ɔmfa N' ahoɔdzen mma w' mbordo,
Sesei na daa.

name: MHB 1055:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. EWÙRADZE, Nyame Otumfo,
Tsie Wo mba hɛn ayɛyi,
ꓛwὸ a eyɛ mbɔbɔrhufo,
Yɛ aso ma hɛn mpaayi;
Adom Hen, tsie hɛn asɔr,
Egya, hu Wo mba mbɔbɔr.

name: MHB 1055:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. 'Wo a aweɔn hɛn enyimkan,
Weɔn hɛn anago yim' so.
Ma W' abɔfo mbɔ hɛn ho ban,
Wɔmpa hɛn sum mu mbusu;
Gye hɛn awerɛfir wum',
Sie hɛn honam nye sunsum.

name: MHB 1055:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: MHB 1056:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Mbo na kõ, sordaanyi pa;
Gyedzi kõ no ewie kõ!
Sor ahenkyɛw a ɔmmpa
Nna Egya dze bɛma wo.

name: MHB 1056:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Hwɛ, edzikamfo dze dɛw,
Rihyia wo konyimdzi mu;
Hwɛ, wɔhyehyɛ ntar fɛɛfɛw,
Ruhuahua wo dɔ man n' mu.

name: MHB 1056:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Christ N' adaworom edzi
Tamfo owu do konyim;
Daadaa som mu eyiedzi
Nyɛ wodze Nyame N' enyim.

name: MHB 1056:4
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Nyame Egya, hɛn Dɔfo,
Jesus Christ hɛn Agyenkwa,
Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn hɛn Boafo,
Baasakor sɛ ndaase daa.

name: MHB 1057:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. ABƆDZE nyinara wɔmfa ndaase ndwom
Mbra ndɔbaa Wura, Twerammpon enyim;
Duaber nye buber ɔhyew nye awɔw
Ne nyinara fir Nyankopɔn Wo dɔ.

name: MHB 1057:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Dza yɛwɔ biara- sika nye dwɛɛtɛɛ,
Nyimpadua nye kra, -Nyankopɔn dze kyɛe,
Ntsi yɛdze ma N' bio dɛ afɔrbɔdzѐ a
ꓛsɔ n' enyi nwionn na ɔgye nhyira.

name: MHB 1057:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Hambὸwa nye tumbowa, nkakrabà, akɛse,
Hwɛ mbrɛ wɔrekyea dze reda ase!
Dasanyi nkotoo na mayɛ tsiafo;
Me kra, fà ahotɔ bɛkamfo Dɔfo.

name: MHB 1057:4
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Yɛdze hɛn adwen, akoma nye nkwa
Ma Jesus hɛn Hen na hɛn Agyenkwa;
Sunsum Siarfo no wɔmfa nhyira ma N',
Wonhua, wɔnkamfo, wɔnhyɛ N' enyimnyam.

name: MHB 1058:
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
Da yie, da yie, Nyame mfa w' nsie,
          Adzesaa ahyɛ sum, da yie!

name: MHB 1058:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Da yie, dɔfo fonafo,
W' edwuma abɔ adze;
Ahomgye pa, siar mbordo
Na dɛw mapa nyɛ wodze.

name: MHB 1058:2
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Nyinsu bɔnsam' kwantunyi
Hom fi yaw na suro nsa,
Hom mbrɛ sũ na mbusu nnyi,
W' akwantu ber no asa.

name: MHB 1058:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Twer Jesu N' abaw mu komm,
Nyame dɔ nkata wo do;
Sun W' Agyenkwa No bom' sɔnn,
Mbrɛ bɔn biara nnkɛhaw wo.
         Da yie, da yie, Nyame mfa w' nsie,
         Yebehyiam' afebɔɔ, da yie!

name: MHB 1058:4
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.
verse:
. Kwantunyi bѐrɛfo dɔfo,
W' akwantu abɔ adze;
Atsew esian nyina mu,
Efi awѐrɛhow wiadze.
         Da yie, da yie, Nyame mfa w' nsie,
         Dzi fie kan kɔtweɔn hɛn, da yie!

name: MHB 1059:1
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.
verse:
. YƐBA W'ahengua enyim
Bobu ntwɛr totɔ sѐrɛ Wo a,
Wo dɔ ntsi yέ aso ma hɛn;
Jesus krɔnkrɔn, tsie hɛn.

name: MHB 1059:2
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.
verse:
. 'Wo a egye ndzebɔnyɛfo,
Na hor hɔn ho fi nyina,
Fa Wo bɔgyaa san hɛn ho:
Jesus krɔnkrɔn, tsie hɛn.

name: MHB 1059:3
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.
verse:
. Ma yɛnhyɛ hɛn honam do,
Ma yendzi wiadze do nyim,
Kã abɔnsam gu ma hɛn:
Jesus krɔnkrɔn, tsie hɛn.

name: MHB 1059:4
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.
verse:
. Sɛ awѐrɛhow hyɛ hɛn do,
Sɛ yarba tsew tɔ hɛn do,
Sɛ owu dze hɛn rokɔ a:
Jesus krɔnkrɔn, tsie hɛn.

name: MHB 1059:5
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.
verse:
. Dom hɛn gyedzi nye ɔbra pa,
Ma hɛn dɔ nye abotar,
Gya hɛn bѐrɛbѐrɛ kodu fie:
Jesus krɔnkrɔn, tsie hɛn. 
            Amen.

name: MHB 106:1
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.
verse:
. JESU, Wo ho adwen mpo yɛ dɛw,
Dzin yi ma m'akoma nyina enyi gye;
Naaso sɛ yɛtse Wo nka a,
Ɔyɛ hɛn dɛw sen ewo mpo.

name: MHB 106:2
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.
verse:
. Asɛm yi yɛ dɛw sen ndwom nyina, 
Dzin bi nnyi a nhyira wɔ m' sen no, 
Adwen bi mma hɛn ahotɔ dɛ 
Sorsornyi Jesus Nyame Ba n'.

name: MHB 106:3
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.
verse:
. Jesus mu na merepɛ ahomgye, 
Ber a ogyina m'akoma abow ekyir;
Wiadze ma motow N' abow mu a, 
Mo kɔn dɔ Jesus ma ɔbor do.

name: MHB 106:4
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.
verse:
. Anapa bɔw m' menye Mary
 Kɔhwehwɛ Jesus nda no do;
Mohwehwɛ No ɔdɔ mu a
Medze m'akoma, nnyɛ m'enyi.

name: MHB 106:5
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.
verse:
. Jesus kɔ Nyame Egya Ne nkyɛn, 
Ɔtse sor ahengua no do;
M'akoma so efi mo mu
Dɛ ɔbɛyɛ a ɔnye N' bɛtsena.},

name: MHB 106:6
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.
verse:
. Yedzi Jesus ekyir sesei,
Yɛbɔ mpaa tow ayɛyi ndwom yi
Dɛ ekyir no obehyira hɛn,
Nye No enya sor ahengua n'

name: MHB 1060:1
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.
verse:
. Ɔkorsa Nyame, yɛsor Wo,
Ndzɛmba nyinara do Tumfo;
Enyiasombea, nyansabuakwa,
W' akwan nyinara yɛ nwanwa.

name: MHB 1060:2
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.
verse:
. Yɛnam nokwar gyedzi do pen
Ɔkorsa Krɔnkrɔn n' dɛ Hen;
Yɛkotow sɔr Wo Nyame-su
Wɔ W' ahendzi ahoɔdzen n' mu.

name: MHB 1060:3
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.
verse:
. Egya no hyɛ Ɔba N' No mu
Regye hɛn nkwa ma yeedzi mu;
Sunsum no dze Ɔba N' N' adom
Tsew hɛn ho ma Nyame No som.

name: MHB 1060:4
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.
verse:
. Krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, mprɛnsa,
Wo ho adwen tra hɛn nyansaa;
Ndzebɔnyɛfo twa hwe W' enyim
Yɛserɛ fakyɛ, adom, konyim. 
      Amen.

name: MHB 1061:1
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.
verse:
. Mo Wùra Jesus, W'ahoɔfɛw n'
Na mo kɔn dɔ dɛ m'bohu;
Wo suban, W'adwen fɛɛfɛw n'
Mepɛ mahwɛ mpu-na-mpu.
Hue W'adom gu me kra do,
Mo mu bɔn nyina popo.

name: MHB 1061:2
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.
verse:
. Obiara nnkenyà ahotɔ,
Gyedɛ Woara tsena no mu.
Tsew m'adwen ho, ma me dɔ,
Ma m' Nyame dɔ a odzi mu.
Ao, Gyefo dɔfo, yɛ ntsɛm,
Yɛ ntsɛm fa Woho bɛkyɛ m'.

name: MHB 1061:3
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.
verse:
. Ao, bra bɛtsѐna m'akomam',
Ma mombɔ Nyame mu bra;
Enye me ntwa bra nyinam'
Mma nngyaa m' hɔ aber biara.
Ma mindzi nokwar munwie,
Na fa me kɔ m'Egya fie. 
     Amen.

name: MHB 1062:1
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.
verse:
. Ko do kɔ kan ahentum mu!
N-tar saw abowa no do;
Tsena do, na eyɛ Ɔhen mu,
David ne Ba, wiadze Gyefo.

name: MHB 1062:2
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.
verse:
. Ko do kɔ kan ahentum mu!
Ɔwo na Sion rotweɔn Wo;
Wɔdze n-tar nye mberɛnkɔnson
Egu Wo kwan mu dɛ fa do.

name: MHB 1062:3
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.
verse:
. Ko do kɔ kan ahentum mu!
Ɔkatakyi, hell ne sɛɛfo;
'Wo na ibue sor ahenman
To hɔ petee ma Wo nkorɔfo.

name: MHB 1062:4
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.
verse:
. Ko do kɔ kan ahentum mu?
Dɔmtutuw fi sor rohwɛ Wo,
Dɛ 'rokɔbɔ afɔr huhu
Ana akɔko W' ahengua do.

name: MHB 1062:5
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.
verse:
. Ko do kɔ kan ahentum mu!
Wiadze nyina hɛn Enyidar!
Dzi nyim, brɛ hɛn 'komatɔmu,
Ndzeyɛtsenenee, ɔdɔ, nye siar.

name: MHB 1063:1
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. DUYƐFO Nwanwanyi, m'adom!
'Wo etsie W'akὸwaa mo sufrɛ;
Hyɛ m' dzen ma daa menkã n' mo somm'
Dɛ, ampa, ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.

name: MHB 1063:2
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Mudur owu n'abowano,
Mesaree na meyɛɛ fὸnafὸna
Na 'gyeem'; ntsi mà ɔnyɛ mo ndwom so
Dɛ, ampa, ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.

name: MHB 1063:3
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Agye mo nkwà efi tamfo nsam'
Na 'so ayɛ m' dehyedehye;
Asɔr Wura, ma menka n' mpaabɔm'
Dɛ, ampa, ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.

name: MHB 1063:4
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. 'Dze m' esi kokὸ a ɔkrɔn do,
N-dzepa nnà ama mahyehyɛ,
Si me gyedzi pi wɔ 'yi mu,
Dɛ, ampa, ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.

name: MHB 1063:5
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Sunsum mù esubɔ so mihia,
Ewuradze, mihia n' n-dɛ;
Ma m'enyidar nyɛ aber nyina
Dɛ, ampa, ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.

name: MHB 1063:6
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Mo werε nnkefir Wὸ ara da,
Egya woana na ɔnye W’ sε.
Agyetan-gye-ba, m’bεkã daa
Dε, ampa ɔnnsõ Nyame yε.

name: MHB 1064:1
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Kyerɛ m' kwan, Nyame Tumfo,
Ma mundu botae n' ho;
Mutu me nan a ɔnnyɛ,
Na Wo nna wɔdze Wo yɛ
Bɔ m'akɔndɔ mbeamuduam'
Na gye me pɛ fi me nsam'.

name: MHB 1064:2
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Kyerɛ m'kwan, 'Hoɔdzen Farbaa,
'Nnyim' a meyɛ a, ɔnnyɛ da
Mbrɛ metse na dza mowɔ
Nnkotum dze m'aba Wo hɔ.
'Wo nye Sahen, mo Wura
'Mi, meyɛ akowaa koraa.

name: MHB 1064:3
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Kyerɛ m' kwan, m' Egya Papa,
Na Wo som yɛ dɛw ampa.
Sɛ mennya Wo, mennhu Wo,
Mennhyia Wo, Nyame Dɔfo,
Ao, nkyɛ matɔ dɔnsuar koraa
Emi a me gyedzi suar.

name: MHB 1064:4
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Kyerɛ m' kwan, Wiadze Kandzea,
Ma muntum ntutu ntaataa
Dɛ morobɔhom Wo nkyɛn;
Mirigya W' hɔ mayɛ dɛn?
Sor o, ase o, 'bi nnka W' ho
'N-tsi migyaa moho ma W'.

name: MHB 1065:1
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Menka dɛn wѐrɛhonyi?
Owu edzi m' emim,
Hwɛ, ɔayɛ m' kyirpaanyi
Na ɔama awɔw dze m'
    'Patasu Christ e! suo mo mu
     Na gye m' dɔfo n' kra dwudwoodwo.

name: MHB 1065:2
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Menkã dɛn hɛll gyantsia?
Munnhu mo dɔfo n' bio
Henfa na ɔkɔ ara?
Saana ne mber asõ.

name: MHB 1065:3
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Menkã dɛn ankonam?
Saana nyimpa nnsɛ hwee-
ɔnye hɛn edzi mpaam'
N' akwantu abɔ adze.

name: MHB 1065:4
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Menkã dɛn enuanom?
Nyamesuronyi kɔ-
Tsema, ɔdwe, adom
Na dɔ, onyaa n' mbordo.

name: MHB 1065:5
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Menka dɛn? mennka hwee,
Nyame ayɛ dza oye;
ɔbɛkyerɛ m' yi ase
Ndaamba wɔ N' ahemfie.

name: MHB 1065:6
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Dɛm ntsi, da yie, dɔfo,
Christ ngya w' kosɛkosɛ;
Mirinndzi mbɔɔ ara bio,
Yebehyiam' sor, da yie,
     Na sɛ yehyiam' a, mo dɔfo,
     ɔno yɛnnkɛpaam' are bio.

name: MHB 1066:
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: MHB 1067:
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
MENYA matse  ase dɛ adze nyina kwa,
Adze nyina kwa, adze nyina kwa!
M’ bɔkɔ dɛ mbrɛ misii mebaa no ara,
Adzѐ a ohia m’ nye me kra.
ꓛkra, frɛ Jesus, ɔkra frɛ Jesus;
Twer N’na fa N’yɛ w’adze nyina,
M’bɔkɔ dɛ mbrɛ misii mebaa no ara.
Adzѐ a ohia m’ nye me kra.

name: MHB 1068:1
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. NKƆMBƆ a ridzi ’i, ase nye dεn ?
Anà ehyia ɔkõ ?
Kaa Hezekiah, kõ n’ nnyε w’dze
Ntsi gyaa sũ.

name: MHB 1068:10
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Ao o! Wontsie anwanwasεm.
Christ nyim ne nyinà o;
Iyi dɔɔ m’sõ ntsi megyaa sù o,
Megyaa nwionn.

name: MHB 1068:2
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Nyinsùwà a rikyi ’i ase nye dεn ?
Ana obi ewu ?
’Nnyim dε Nyame afa N’adze ?
’Nua, gyaa sũ.

name: MHB 1068:3
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Due nà amandzehu, onua, due!
Dε w’adzesoa sõ ?
Adasa mboa nnyε, hwε Nyame,
Na gyaa sũ.

name: MHB 1068:4
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Owu noara nnyε yaw, ampa;
Na wukyerεfὸ epoo!
Sε ’bi nnkɔ, ’bi mmbà a, Christ wɔ hɔ,
Ntsi gyaa sũ.

name: MHB 1068:5
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Hɔn a woetwa Jordan no, woewie,
Isreal woewie o’;
Atamfὸ afεr, Nyame dzi Hen,
Ntsi gyaa sũ.

name: MHB 1068:6
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Owu n’atwer ɔbaako mmfow,
N’adar nndɔw ɔbaako,
Mma yi ho adwendwen nntum wo,
Na gyaa sũ.

name: MHB 1068:7
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Ana wo bɔn ntsi na rusũ ’i?
Hwε mbeamùdua no do;
Christ ewu, nu w’ho na gye N’dzi,
Na gyaa sũ.

name: MHB 1068:8
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Woana na N’ahoɔfεw sen wi ’i ?
Christ a, na twer No;
Ɔno nye Wunyan na Nkwa n’, fa N’
Na gyaa sũ.

name: MHB 1068:9
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Yεnye dɔfo n’ ridzi nkra ndε
Dε yebohu n’ bio;
Kwan war a, owie abὸwano,
Ntsi gyaa sũ.

name: MHB 1069:1
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: MHB 1069:2
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
.  M’ewiei bowie me dɛn ?
Asɛm yi, me tsibowa
Haw me ho dɔnhwer nyina,
Siar anaa mbusu a ?
Muhu dɛ nsɛm yi nyina
Gyina adze kor do;
Me pέ a, dza mepɛ n’ m’benya,
Sɛ siar o, mbusu o.

name: MHB 1069:3
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. M‘ewiei bowie me dɛn ?
Hɔn a wɔtwer Agyenkwa.
Yɛ ndzeyɛtsenenee no,
Wɔ dɛw enyidar daa,
Sɛ Christ wui maa abɔn a
Na m’so mowɔ fakyɛ;
Dɛm ntsi, mubonu moho,
Ma daakye meewie yie.

name: MHB 107:1
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.
verse:
. O JESUS Ɔhen nwanwanyi!
Konyimdzifo a agye dzin;
Yenntum nnka mbrɛ isi yɛ dɛw,
Dɛw nyina wɔ Wo mu.

name: MHB 107:2
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.
verse:
. Sɛ ehɛn akoma mu a,
Na nokwar hyɛ ase hyerɛn,
Wiadze egyangyandze fi hɔ
Na okenyan Nyame dɔ.

name: MHB 107:3
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.
verse:
. O Jesus, wiadze yi mu kan!
Ɔwo, gya a onndum farbaa,
Esen dɛw a yenyim nyinara
Na dza yɛhwehwɛ nyina.

name: MHB 107:4
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.
verse:
. Jesus, ma obiara mbɔ Wo dzin,
Ntonton W'anwanwa dɔ, 
Na wɔhwehwɛ Wo a, kenyan hɔn 
Ma wɔnhwehwɛ W' mbordo.

name: MHB 107:5
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.
verse:
. Hɛn tɛkyerɛma behyira Wo daa, 
Ma yɛndɔ Wo nkotoo,
Na daa hɛn abrabɔ mu so
Yɛnda Wo su edzi.

name: MHB 107:6
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.
verse:
. Enye hɛn ntsena na ma Wo kan
Nhyerɛn akoma biara m';
Yi hɛn anago sum n' fi hɔ,
Na ma hɛn enyigye.

name: MHB 107:7
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.
verse:
. Jesus, hɛn dɔ na enyigye, 
Egya Ne Ba krɔnkrɔn,
Tum, ayɛyi, 'nyimnyam wɔ Wo,
Mbersantsen, mfesantsen.    Amen.

name: MHB 1070:1
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. ƆKOFO, due nà amandzehu !
Dɔm bɛn na ehyia yi ?
Mma nye tamfo n’ nndzi enyimhu;
Keyi dɔm ndɛ da yi.

name: MHB 1070:2
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Wɔdze nkodzen hu dɔm barimba,
Dɛm ntsi mma nn-suro;
Sέ abɔnsam yi w’ hu dɛn arà a,
Mma nndan w’ekyir, hom do.

name: MHB 1070:3
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Konyim wodzi n’ mbrέ ogyà aber do;
Dɛm ntsi ɔwo taa pintsinn,
Wusiw enyi ebir mpὸ a, kõ,
Ɔnyε n’ na wimù atsew.

name: MHB 1070:4
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Mo dɔm-kunyim Jesus, soɛr ɛ !
Na ma W’ahomber do;
Ama W’akomfowa n'dὸ a nkyε
Dɔm n’ ehim dɛ n-su.

name: MHB 1070:5
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Ɔkõ akyer do, Sabarimba.
Yenntum nndzi abanyinsɛm,
Dɛm n-tsi, Boafo, yɛ ntsɛm bra,
Ma yɛntse W’anosɛm.

name: MHB 1070:6
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Barimba cdzi akõ atɔr,
Naaso Jesus bɛn no;
Mbrɛ nhyiren fɛɛfɛw n' yi huam no
Nà ɔbɔhom afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 1071:1
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. BƆNYƐNYI Adamfo, musũ frɛ W’,
Fa W’ bɔgya dehye n’ san mo ho,
Ma Wow u no nyɛ me mfaso;
Hu ‘wѐrɛhonyi mbɔbɔr.

name: MHB 1071:2
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: MHB 1071:3
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Mowɔ hen kɔ, Adam nana?
Munduѐ, emi a mo kɔbew asa !
Muwù a, meda W’abaw m’ara;
Hu ‘wѐrɛhonyi mbɔbɔr.

name: MHB 1071:4
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Obi-a-ɔbɛba nye woana ?
Obi-a-ɔbɛba nye Nyamѐ a
Motɔ ntentan a, motwer No n’;
Hu ‘wѐrɛhonyi mbɔbɔr.

name: MHB 1071:5
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Bra ntsɛm, ‘Wὸ a nyim m’asɛm, me hia,
Me dadwen, me yaw, me nyinsùwa,
Murùgù ahomtsia yi, gye me kra,
Hu ‘wѐrɛhonyi mbɔbɔr.

name: MHB 1072:1
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. NYEW, bɛkyeman bi wɔ hɔ,
Hɔ na m’ Agyenkwa so wɔ;
Sɛ minya fi ha kɔ a,
Siar kuw n’ bɛma m’ akɔaba.

name: MHB 1072:2
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Duyɛfo Panyin n’kyɛn hɔ,
Adom na dɛw ara nko;
Hɔ nà ahomgye pa wɔ ma
Hɔn a woenyà esubɔ n’ nyina.

name: MHB 1072:3
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Hɔ na ɔyardɔm sa, na
Yarsafo so hom koraa,
Ayarfὸ o, atwentwemfὸ o,
Hɔn nyina nnhu fona bio.

name: MHB 1072:4
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Mo Pomfo tse ase yi,
Ampa, mo wer bɛsɛɛ dze;
Naaso m’enyi bohu No,
Nyew, m’bɔhwɛ n’ ama moho.

name: MHB 1072:5
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Mopow m’egyapadze nyina,
Obiarà a ɔpɛ, ɔmfa;
Tsenabea nye m’ dabew so,
Siandɛ, sor dze n’ dɔɔ mo sõ.

name: MHB 1072:6
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Dɛm ntsi, migyaa mo nkwa m’ ma W’ ,
Ɔwὸ à eyɛ m’ kyɛpɛm mbordo;
Ewiei n’ fa m’na m’asadze-
Akra mpem nyina yɛ Wodze.

name: MHB 1073:1
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. NYAME nye mo Boafo,
Minnkehia ara da;
Motweer No no m’enyi annto,
Ɔyɛ m’ Agyenkwa pa.

name: MHB 1073:2
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Nyame nye mo Boafo,
Oewu ama emi,
Ama metse asѐ o, muwù o,
Maahom, mo so dɛm yi.

name: MHB 1073:3
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Nyame nye mo Boafo,
Wɔ adze nyina mu;
Ma menyɛ dɛ Lazarus mpo,
Christ bɛyɛ m’ daa Gyefo.

name: MHB 1073:4
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Nyame nye mo Boafo,
Mobɔkõ akɔ m'enyim,
Minnkegyaa m’akomfowa mu,
Gyedɛ midzi konyim.

name: MHB 1073:5
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Nyame nye mo Boafo,
Mo nkwa hia me yɛ bɛn ?
Sɛ me mber yɛ tsia o, war o,
Sor bɛyɛ me kyɛpɛn.

name: MHB 1074:1
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. EWURADZE ma N’adɔfo nda,
Fi atseetsee na nkrumsi mu,
Fi abɛbrɛsɛ wiadze mu,
Ewuradze ma N’adɔfo nda.

name: MHB 1074:2
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Hwɛ, owu yɛ nda ma fonafo,
No mù asomdwee, no mù ahomgye,
Ma ɔkra nya daa enyigye;
Hwɛ, owu yɛ nda ma fonafo.

name: MHB 1074:3
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: MHB 1074:4
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: MHB 1074:5
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Sãa owu yɛ mfaso, mo dɔfo;
Alleluia, Alleluia,
Alleluia nkã Ɔkorsa,
Sãa owu yɛ mfaso, mo dɔfo.

name: MHB 1075:1
title: Rev. Charles D. Kittoe.
verse:
. AMANAMAN robɔ mbubuw,
Rekã mmɔn yi, asѐ ɛ ?
Dɔmkunyin atɔr, dupɔn ebu,
Ma enyidar nyina asa.

name: MHB 1075:2
title: Rev. Charles D. Kittoe.
verse:
. Dodowara hɔn sagyefὸ ewu;
Ma woayε kyirpaafo,
Asɔr basapɔn kor etu
Rokɔdɔm esiarfo.

name: MHB 1075:3
title: Rev. Charles D. Kittoe.
verse:
. Ɔdὸmankὸma wu, sor kwankyérɛnyi.
Ɔayɛ hɛn n-gyanka; .
Ɔdze n’adar twa dasanyi,
Ber a n’enyi nnda kὸraa.

name: MHB 1075:4
title: Rev. Charles D. Kittoe.
verse:
. Ampa, nyimpa tsia pirimpirim kwa,
N-yew, ɔyɛ mbɔbɔr;
Ɔtse dɛ wi a oepue fɛɛfέw a,
Ɔnnkyɛr na ɔakɔtɔ.

name: MHB 1075:5
title: Rev. Charles D. Kittoe.
verse:
. Ao! Saana mbrɛ wiadze tse nye ’i ?
Nna minnyim, mo dofo,
Wiadze mbusù a, fonà ara mã,
Nyame, gye Wo nkὸrɔfo.

name: MHB 1075:6
title: Rev. Charles D. Kittoe.
verse:
. Nyame, W’akwan yɛnntsé ase yie,
Ntsi na yerutwà ewuo;
Egya pa, yi W’ho kyérɛ hɛn yie,
Na yennkosù ara bio.

name: MHB 1075:7
title: Rev. Charles D. Kittoe.
verse:
. Nyame ayɛ adzѐ a oye,
Wɔmma no ndamirifa!
Afei da yie, dɔfo, da yie,
Nyame nkὸra w’ afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 1076:1
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
.WIADZE mbusù a ! Enntsѐ ase?
Sesei serew abɔ adze,
Ma worutwà ewuo, atse ?
Nyame, fa hɛn sie.

name: MHB 1076:2
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Wiadze mbusù a ! Mennhu ntsɛm;
Ao! Haban momon fɛɛfɛw n’
Si dɛn twintwam ntsɛntsɛm dɛm ?
Nyame, hwɛ Wo mba.

name: MHB 1076:3
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Wiadze mbusù a ! Memfa hѐn o ?
M’enyim Po Memen da hɔ;
M’ekyir Pharaoh kã mo do !
Nyame, wowaw hɛn.

name: MHB 1076:4
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Wiadze mbusù a ! ꓛnnyɛ hwee
Dɛ wobinom nntse W’ ase,
Na wɔnye W’enyà aperdzi.
Nyame, bra hɛn mboa.

name: MHB 1076:5
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Wiadze mbusù a ! Eto bàm o.
Sɛ anntobam o, hyepo !
Ana da ho sũ, dɔfo ?
Nyame, kyѐre Wo tum.

name: MHB 1076:6
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: MHB 1077:1
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. MENYE, W' narn a munnsuro,
Biribiara so nnyɛ m’ hu,
Siandɛ, W’adom dɔɔ mo sõ.

name: MHB 1077:2
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Ɔbra kyeer do paa do no,
’Wo na medze W’dzii akõ,
N-tsi amma mennsũ mennwu.

name: MHB 1077:3
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Ɔbra taan m'enyi akyɛr,
’Wu so guaan mo ho akyɛr,
Na Wo Christ yɛ me sekyɛ.

name: MHB 1077:4
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Christ ekyɛn m’ adze nyina,
Osiandɛ eyɛ dzi-annsa,
Emma egyanka mmfe na.

name: MHB 1077:5
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.
verse:
. Mo nkwa war a, medan Wo,
Ɔyɛ tsià a, mowɔ hen kɔ ? 
’Danmbrɛ mo hὸ aha mfaso.

name: MHB 1077:6
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: MHB 108:1
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-1153.
verse:
. Jesu, Wo ho adwen nko mpo 
Dze dɛw hyɛ mo mu ma;
Na meba m' bohu W' enyim dze a,
Edɛw no bɔbor do.

name: MHB 108:2
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-1153.
verse:
. O adasa hɛn Agyenkwa, 
Dzin biara nnto Wodze a
Yɛdze enyigye bɔtow ho ndwom,
Na yɛadwen ho dɔ mu.

name: MHB 108:3
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-1153.
verse:
. O 'koma bobɔe n' Enyidar, 
Abrɛfo Enyigye,
Iye ma asehwefo na
Hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ Wo.

name: MHB 108:45
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-1153.
verse:
. Na hɔn a wohu Wo nka dɛn? 
Wonnhu dza wɔnka mpo:
Hɔn a wɔtse Wo dɔ nko ara
Na wonyim ne dɛw no.
 
. Jesu, yɛ hɛn enyigye ndɛ, 
Hɛn ndaamba akatua;
Jesu, yɛ hɛn Enyimnyam ndɛ
Na mfesantsen nyina.    Amen.

name: MHB 109:1
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-1153.
verse:
. Jesu, 'koma dɔyɛfo hɔn Dɛw, 
Adasa Kan, nkwa Nsunyiwa,
Wiadze mu ndzepa nntum mmee hɛn,
Yɛdze kɔm yɛdan ba Wo hɔ.

name: MHB 109:2
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-1153.

name: MHB 109:345
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-1153.
verse:
. Yɛsɔ Wo hwɛ, n-kwa Edziban, 
Na hɛn kɔn dɔ yeedzi bi daa;
Yɛnom Wo, n-kwa Esutsen,
Na hɛn kra pɛ ma wɔaahyɛ n' ma.
 
. Hɛn sunsum haahaa hwehwɛ Wo, 
Mbrɛ ɔbra dze hɛn si biara,
Eyaa W' ano hɛn enyi gye,
Yesuo Wom' a siar aka hɛn.
 
. O Jesus, nye hɛn ntsena daa, 
Ma hɛn mber pa na asomdwee;
Yi bɔn no sum nyina wɔ hɔ,
Ma Wo kan no nhyerɛn wiadze.    Amen.

name: MHB 11:1
title: George Rawson, 1807-89
verse:
. YƐDZE enyigye sɔr, dzi dɛw, yɛtow ndwom,
Yɛdze hɛn siar akoma na hɛn ndze aba,
Ndaase asɛm dadaw no bodu Wo tsenabea,
Ɔwo a eyɛ enyimnyam Hɛn, Nyame yamuyiefo.

name: MHB 11:2
title: George Rawson, 1807-89
verse:
. Dza ɔfata W' yɛdze ma W', enyidzi mapa,
Yɛnye W'abɔdze nyina, sor, asaase na po,
Bɔ m' dze W'ayɛyi ma W' wɔ wiadze mbea nyina,
Yɛdze ɔnosɛɛ tonton, huhor Wo daa nyina.

name: MHB 11:3
title: George Rawson, 1807-89
verse:
. Wo Sunsum woo hɛn fofor, Wo Ba n' gyee hɛn,
Wo mba dzi Wo nyi wɔ dza ayɛ nyina ntsi,
Egya, Wo mba resan aba dɔ na kan m'.
Yɛreper atonton Wo dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ.

name: MHB 11:4
title: George Rawson, 1807-89
verse:
. Yɛka abɔfo ho na yɛtow Wo ndwom,
Alleluia! Amà asaase aagye do,
Amen! Enyimnyam nka Wo sor nye ase,
Domankoma dɔ a ɔpon hɛn, konyimdzifo!

name: MHB 110:1234
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Jesu, me kra no Dɔfo, 
Ma munguan mbɛhyɛ Wo bom',
Ber a esu no repem yi,
Ber a ehum no rutu yi,
Me Gyefo, fa me hunta,
Ma ehum no mbɔ mbɛsen;
Gya me kodu berano,
Ao, ewiei no gye me kra.
 
. Minnyi sumabew biara, 
Me kra twer Wo nkotonoo;
Mma nndan mo nkotonoo nngya,
Suo mo mu, kyekye mo werɛ:
Mo werɛ gyina Wo do,
Mo mboa nyina fir wo hɔ;
Fa W' atsaban kɛse no
Kata m' etsikwa yi do.
 
. Christ, morohwehwɛ Wo nko, 
Minya W' a menya adze nyina,
Ma mo do si, hyɛ me dzen,
Yɛ m' edur na gye me nkwa:
'Wo na eyɛ tseneneenyi,
'Midze, meyɛ brakyewnyi;
Bɔn na ahyɛ emi ma,
Adom ahyɛ wo so ma.
 
. Adom pii wɔ Wo nsam' a 
Ɔkata mo bɔn nyina do;
Ma nkwa nsu no ɔmpem mbra,
San mo ho na fa me sie:
N-kwa Nsunyiwa nye Woara,
Ma membɛsaw bi monnom,
Bra bɛtaa mo 'koma mu,
Taa mu kɔ mfesantsen nyina.  Amen.

name: MHB 111:1
title: Ray Palmer, 1808-87.
verse:
. JESUS, dɛm enyiwa yi nnhun
Wo frɔdɔɔ hyɛnhyɛnn no;
Adwen m' twamutam ayɛ sum ma
Munnhu Wo siar enyim n'.

name: MHB 111:2
title: Ray Palmer, 1808-87.
verse:
. Munntum nnhu Wo, munntum 
        nntse W' nka,
Naaso 'nye m' wɔ hɔ daa;
Asaase nnyi bea papa bi a
Menye Wo bedzi ehyia.

name: MHB 111:3
title: Ray Palmer, 1808-87.
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ moso daa a m'enyi nnda,
Ber a 'nyikom aka m' no,
Wo suban hyɛ m'adwen ma araa
Ma me kra nya ahotɔ.

name: MHB 111:4
title: Ray Palmer, 1808-87.
verse:
. Kaansa munnhu Wo ma dɛm ntsi 
Meyɛ aweɔn gyedzi mu a,
Modɔ Wo, m'Ewuradze, m'bɔdɔ W';
Munnhu W', na minyim Wo.

name: MHB 111:5
title: Ray Palmer, 1808-87.
verse:
. Sɛ owu mua adasa enyiwa 'i
Ma m'akoma hianyi da a, 
Twamutam no bɛtsew ma meehu
W'enyimnyam dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse.

name: MHB 112:1
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 112:2
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Ne mbeamudua n' tu ekyingye,
Misie ekyingye na suro,
Nye mbusu ho adwen a etsintsim
Nyina wɔ No wumaa n' mu.

name: MHB 112:3
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 112:4
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Yie nko na ɔwɔ No mu,
Bɔn nko na ɔwɔ mo mu;
Mo bɔn n' mbom twe Ne yie no pue,
Na ɔda ho dɔ me.

name: MHB 112:5
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Ɔno na ɔgye me nkwa,
Na ɔdze mo bɔn kyɛ m' koraa;
Mo dɔ N', osiandɛ ɔdɔ me,
Ɔtse ase 'i, metse ase.

name: MHB 112:6
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 113:1
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. SƐ anapa wi hyerɛn a, 
M'akoma nyan ka dɛ, 
Ayɛyi nka Jesus! 
Dwumadzi na mpaabɔ m',
Mokɔ Christ Jesus hɔ; 
Ayɛyi nka Jesus!

name: MHB 113:2
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. 'Werɛhow hyɛ m' adwen do a?
Minya akomatɔm ' ha
Ayɛyi nka Jesus!
Adwemfi hyɛ mo do a,
Medze 'yi tsew moho 
Ayɛyi nka Jesus!

name: MHB 113:3
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.

name: MHB 113:4
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. Abɔfo tow ndwom sor
Ma Nyame, Asɛm no;
Ayɛyi nka Jesus! 
Nyimpa so mma ndze do
Wɔ ndaase nkwom mu dɛ 
Ayɛyi nka Jesus!

name: MHB 113:5
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. Asaase mba nyina nka
Wɔ enyigye ndwom m' dɛ,
Ayɛyi nka Jesus! 
Mframa na po na wi
Mfi bun mu nkɔ sor dɛ, 
Ayɛyi nka Jesus!

name: MHB 113:6
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. Ber a mowɔ nkwa mu yi,
Me Nyame ndwom nyɛ dɛ, 
Ayɛyi nka Jesus! 
Hɛn ndwom dabaa nyina mfir
Tsetse ɔdomakoma dɛ,
Ayɛyi nka Jesus!

name: MHB 114:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. SOR nye asaase nyɛ kor,
Nyimpa na abɔfo mbɔ m',
Ma yenyi adasa
Agyenkwa n' ayɛw daa,
Na yɛntonton afɔr 'Guambaa n',
Na yenhyira Jesu Ne dzin.

name: MHB 114:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 114:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 114:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 114:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Bɔn tse dɛ abowa ka
M'akoma wufo n' a,
Ɔnom yarsa nsu n' bi,
Na onya yarsa hɔ ara;
Hwɛ m'Ewuradze wɔ dua no do!
Metse, mehu - owui maa me.

name: MHB 114:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ao, ɔdɔ nwanwa bɛn!
Ao nkwagye adom bɛn!
Mbrɛ 'dua baa ntsɛmara
Bɛmaa asehwefo do a!
M'bɛyɛ dɛn m'bɛma woeehu dza 
Ayɛ ama adsa nyina?

name: MHB 114:7
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Meenya totorobɛnto
Dze afrɛ wiadze nyina!
Maama hɔn akoma dɛw,
Nyia owui maa hɔn N' mu!
Wɔbɔɔ Ewuradze mbeamudua m' maa hɔn,
M'Agyenkwa wui maa hɔn nyina.

name: MHB 115:1
title: Benjamin Rhodes, 1743-1815.

name: MHB 115:2
title: Benjamin Rhodes, 1743-1815.
verse:
. Ɔfaa akowaa subea,
Na ɔsoaa hɔn mbusu
Wɔ No honam mu kɔr Calvary; 
Ogyinaa dɛ fɔdzifo,
Na okyii No bɔgyaa krɔnn
Dze maa mbratonyi fahodzi.

name: MHB 115:3
title: Benjamin Rhodes, 1743-1815.
verse:
.  Katakyi no soɛɛr ntsɛm 
Atamfo n' do konyim m'
Na ɔtwee hɔn nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu:
Ɔbɔɔ hɔn ahenman,
Ɔhyɛɛ hɔn, twee hɔn baa
N'ahendzi ase, Messiah ase.

name: MHB 115:4
title: Benjamin Rhodes, 1743-1815.
verse:
. Jesus dze mbɔbɔrhu
Dzi No nkorɔfo nyina do
Wɔ nyansa m', ndzeytsenenee, dɔ m',
Nyia ɔba Messiah hɔ
Benya ɔgye mapa,
Na ɔagye No nkwagye n' ato m'.

name: MHB 115:5
title: Benjamin Rhodes, 1743-1815.
verse:
. Agyenkwa, Asomdwee Hen! 
W'ahenman no bɛtserɛw,
Kɛpem dɛ yehu W'enyimnyam:
Ndzeyɛtsenenee bɔdɔr
Dɛ krɔnkrɔnyɛ ahyɛ wiadze ma

name: MHB 116:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. YƐTOW Hen a oribedzi adze n' ho ndwom,
Nyimnyam nka Jesus, 'Guambaa a wokum No; 
N'ahendzi dze nkwagye ɔnye siar nam;
Aman nya enyigye, ber a Jesus dzi Hen.
Bra yɛtow hɛn Hen N'ayɛyi,
Jesus, hɛn Hen: Jesus hɛn Hen:
Hɛn a yɛyɛ Nedze n', hɛn ndwom nye dɛ:
'Nyimnyam nka Jesus, nka Jesus, hɛn Hen.

name: MHB 116:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyimpa nyina bɛtsena Ne kan nwanwa n' mu,
No dɔ bɛka amanaman abɔ m'; 
Nokwar na pɛrpɛr bɛpem efi No mu,
Bɔn ase botu, ber a Jesus dzi Hen.

name: MHB 116:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ne nyina bowie yie, N'asomdwee ahendzi m',
Fahodzi benyin na nyansa etu mpon;
Tamfo bɛyɛ dɔfo, No konyim ntsi,
Nkrantsee dan ofowa, ber a Jesus dzi Hen.

name: MHB 116:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 116:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yesɔr ma Christ N'ahendzi ne mbae no,
Egya, ma adzekyee no nyɛ ntsɛm mbra; 
Ma W'abɔdze fofor n' ntow hɛn ndwom yi,
'Bɔnsam dzi 'kogu na Jesus dzi Hen.

name: MHB 117:123
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Tsie! abɔfo ruhua dɛ 
Wɔawo hɛn Hen nyimnyamfo n',
Asaase wɔ asomdwee,
Nyame na abɔn abɔm'.
Aman nyina, hom mfa dɛw
Nye sor abɔfo ntseatseam'
Hom nye hɔn mbɔm mpaa mu dɛ,
Wɔawo Christ wɔ Bethlehem.
Tsie! abɔfo ruhua dɛ 
Wɔawo hɛn Hen nyimnyamfo n',
 
. Christ a sorsor tonton No, 
Ɔdomankoma Ewuradze n',
Hwɛ N', ɔkyɛree mpo a ɔaba.
Ɔbaabun wotoam' ɔba!
Hwɛ, Nyame hyɛ nyimpadua!
Nyame a wɔayɛ N' onyimpa!
Ɔpɛ dɛ ɔnye nyimpa tsena,
Jesus, hɛn Immanuel.
 
. Mbo, sor Asomdwee Henba! 
Mbo, Ndzeyɛts' enenee Ewia!
'Dze kan na nkwa brɛ wiadze,
Yarsa wɔ N' atsaban mu.
Ɔdze N' enyimnyam too nkyɛn,
Bae ma nyimpa eennwu bio,
Ma ɔaama asaasemba do,
Ma ɔaama hɔn awo-enu.

name: MHB 118:123
title: Anonymous, 17th or 18th cent.
verse:
. Agyedzifo, hom mbra 
Dɛw na konyimdzi mu,
Hom mbra, O hom nyina mbra Bethlehem;
Hom mbra mbɔhwɛ dɛ
Wɔawo abɔfo Hen:
O hom mbra mma yɛntonton Ewuradze Christ.
 
. Nyame mu Nyame, 
Kan a ofir Kan mu,
Hwɛ! oennkyir ɔbaabun n' awotoa;
Nyame ara ampa,
Wɔwoo N', na wɔannyɛ No;
O hom mbra mma yɛntonton Ewuradze Christ.
 
. Abɔfo, hom ntow 
Ndwom ehurusi mu,
Sor ahemfiemba nyina ntow ndwom
Dɛ, Enyimnyam nyina
Nka Nyame wɔ sorsor:
O hom mbra mma yɛntonton Ewuradze Christ.

name: MHB 118:4
title: Anonymous, 17th or 18th cent.
verse:
. Enyimnyam nka Wo, 
Yeyi Wo dzin ayɛw,
Jesus, Ɔwo a wɔawo W' n-dɛ da yi,
Ɔdomankoma Egya
N' asɛm ayɛ honam
O hom mbra mma yɛntonton Ewuradze Christ.

name: MHB 119:1
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. ABƆFO a hom fi 'nyimnyam mu,
Hom ntu mfa asaase do;
Hom a hom toow abɔdze awoo,
Hom ntow Messiah N'awoo ndwom,
Hom mbra mbɔsom,
Mbɔsom Christ, Ɔhen a wɔawo N'.

name: MHB 119:2
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Nguanhwɛfo a hom tsena sar do
Roweɔn hom nguankuw anago,
Afei Nyame nye nyimpa tse,
'Kɔkoaba Ne kan hyerɛn;
Hom mbra mbɔsom,
Mbɔsom Christ, Ɔhen a wɔawo N'.

name: MHB 119:3
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 119:4
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Afɔrmbukyia enyim ahotsewfo, 
Hom dze enyidr suro weɔn; 
Ewuradze besian efir sor
Epue N'asɔrdan m' awora!
Hom mbra mbɔsom,
Mbɔsom Christ, Ɔhen a wɔawo N'.

name: MHB 12:1
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847
verse:
. Me kra, yi ɔsor hen ayɛw, 
Fa w' ayɛdze bra N' enyim;
Ɔapon wo, dze wo bɔn akyɛ w',
Woana mbɔ nyi No ayɛw?
Yi No ayɛw!
Yi bɛkyebo Hen ayɛw.

name: MHB 12:234
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847
verse:
. Yi N' ayɛw, Nadom na enyimpa 
Hwɛɛ egyanom ahohiam';
Yi No ayɛw, ɔnnsakyer da,
Ɔka enyim nyaa, ohyira ntsɛm:
Yi No ayɛw!
Nyimnyamfo wɔ nokwardzim'.
 
. Ɔhwɛ hɛn, dze fir hɛn dɛ egya; 
Onyim hɛn mberɛwyɛ dodow;
Ɔma hɛn do dɔ mu ara,
Ɔgye hɛn atamfo nyina nsam',
Yi No ayɛw!
Dɛ mbrɛ N' adom pem mber nyina.
 
. Sor abɔfo hom nhuhor No; 
Hom hu N' enyim na enyim;
Ewia, bosoom, hom nkotow, No,
Mber na mbea nyinam' abɔdze,
Hom nyi N' ayɛw!
Hom nye hɛn nyi Nyame ayɛw.    Amen.

name: MHB 120:1
title: John Byrom, 1691-1763.

name: MHB 120:2
title: John Byrom, 1691-1763.
verse:
. N-guanhwɛfo a wɔroweɔn hɔn nguan no 
Tsee bɔfo huafo ne ndze dɛ ɔse:
Hwɛ, medze Agyenkwa N' awoo ho nsɛm
Bɔ hom na wiadze nyina amandzɛɛ;
N-dɛ Nyame apon N' anohoba,
Wɔawo Ewuradze Christ, hɛn Agyenkwa.

name: MHB 120:34
title: John Byrom, 1691-1763.
verse:
. Owiee kasaa n', nna sor adwontofo 
Dze enyigye toow ndwom fofor koraa,
Wɔkamfoo Nyame dɔ a ɔropon hɛn,
Na Alleluia gyigyee wim' nyina;
Hɔn ndwom nye dɛ, Enyimnyam nka Nyame,
Asomdwee na enyisɔ mbra nyimpam'.
 
. Hɔ ara na nguanhwɛfo n', kɔr Bethlehem 
Kɔhwɛɛ dza Nyame ayɛ ama adasa:
Wɔdze enyigye saan kɔhwɛɛ hɔn nguan,
Dɛ wɔda ho riyi Nyame ayɛw,
Yinom nye asomafo a wodzii kan
Wɔbɔɔ Abofra no ho nsɛm dawur.

name: MHB 120:5
title: John Byrom, 1691-1763.
verse:
. N-kyɛ  yaakaa Nyame N' anwanwa dɔ a 
Ogyaa N' ma ɔregye adasa nkwa;
Abofra a ɔama yeenya hɛn siar yi,
Yɛnhwɛ N' mbowadan mu nkɔ mbeamudua n' do:
Ɔmboa hɛn ma yentsia N' anamɔn mu
Nkodu adasa hɛn sor sibea hɔ.

name: MHB 120:6
title: John Byrom, 1691-1763.

name: MHB 121:1
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;
verse:
. M'AKOMA dzi ehurusi enago 'i
Ber a ekyirkyir metse
Abɔfo ndze dɛɛdɛw n';
'Dwontofo n' tow dɛ, Wɔawo Christ!
Na enyigye ndwom dɛɛdɛw n'
Gyegye wimu nyina.

name: MHB 121:2
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;
verse:
. Tsie! Dzidzidaka n' mu ndze bi
Reserɛ bɔkɔɔ se dɛ:
Hom nguan mfi mbusu ho,
Nuanom, hom mbra, hom efi haw mu, 
Wɔagye hom; dza hom hia
Nyina mebɛma hom.

name: MHB 121:3
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;
verse:
. Afei hom mma yɛnyɛ no ntsɛm, 
'Kɛse na nkuma nyina,
Nkotow suro nwanwa m'.
Yɛndɔ Nyia dɔ ahyɛ No ma n',
Nhua Woraba a ɔdze
Enyidar rehyerɛn no.

name: MHB 121:4
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;
verse:
. O Ewuradze , m'betsie, adɔ W', 
Nye W' atsena, na sɛ 
Muwu mpo a, maannhera,
Na mbom menye W' atsena afebɔɔ
Wɔ sorsor wɔ dɛw a
Ɔnnkɛsakyer da n' mu.

name: MHB 122:12345
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: MHB 123:1
title: Joseph Mohr, 1792-1848;
verse:
. 'NAGO sɔnn, anago krɔnn!
Wiadze ada, esuma,
Mary na Joseph wɔ mbowa dan mu 
Roweɔn Dɔba fɛɛfɛw no a 
Ɔada sor ahomgye mu n'.

name: MHB 123:2
title: Joseph Mohr, 1792-1848;
verse:
. 'Nago sɔnn, anago krɔnn!
Nguanhwɛfo hun kan no,
Tsee abɔfo ndwom no ne ngyegyee,
Wɔ anoano nye ekyirekyir,
Christ hɛn Pomfo n' wɔ ha.

name: MHB 123:3
title: Joseph Mohr, 1792-1848;
verse:
. 'Nago sɔnn, anago krɔnn!
Nyame Ba a ehyerɛn, 
Ɔdɔ reserew W'enyimdua mu!
Ma adom ber no mbra mbɔto hɛn, 
Agyenkwa a wɔawo W' ntsi!

name: MHB 124:1
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. Hwɛ, wɔawo Nyame Eguambaa a 
Wɔdze N' bɔɔ anohoba n',
Oesian aba asaase
Rebɛkyerɛ hɛn ɔsor kwan.

name: MHB 124:23456
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
Ao, hɛn siar da, aba yie! 
      Hwɛ hɛn nkwahosan aba! 
      Tow ndwom twa Jerusalem: 
      Wɔawo Christ wɔ Bethlehem! 
 
. Hwɛ, nyia ɔtse ahengua do 
Wɔ sorsor abɔfo ntam'
Nyia ɔyɛɛ wim' nworaba n',
Da mbowa dzidzidaka mu.
 
. Hom n-guanhwɛfo krɔnkrɔn, 
Hom dze asɛmpa bɛn nam?
Wɔyɛ n' dɛn na hom egya
Hom nguan wɔ haban mu yi?
 
. Esuom a yɛroweɔn no, 
Hwɛ, yehun kan nwanwa bi:
Abɔfo dze adwontow
Kaa dɛ wɔawo Agyenkwa n'.
 
. O Akɔkowaba krɔnkrɔn, 
Wo dɔ yɛ nwanwa dodow!
Dɔ a ogyaa W' ma ifii sor
Baa wiadze a ɔtse dɛm yim'.
 
. O Nyame Ba, Kyerɛkyerɛ hɛn 
Wo suban a ɔdwe  no,
Ma yensua Wo mbrɛhoadze,
Na yɛnyɛ dɛ mbrɛ Ɔwo tse.

name: MHB 125:1
title: Phillips Brooks, 1835-93.
verse:
. O Bethlehem kurow kakraba,
