Hwɛ mbrɛ esi ada dzinn!
Bea a ada hatsee n'etsifi
N-woraba rikyin komm:
W'abɔntsen no do anago n'
Bɛkyebo kan n' hyerɛn;
Mber nyina enyidar na suro 
Dzi ehia wɔ Wo mu.

name: MHB 125:2
title: Phillips Brooks, 1835-93.
verse:
. Anapa mworaba, hom mbɔ mu
M-bɔ awoo krɔnn n' dawur,
Na hom ntow ndwom mma Nyame Hen n',
Asomdwee nka asaase;
Na Mary awo ɔba Christ;
Nna abɔfo aboa ano wimu,
Roweɔn ɔdɔ nwanwa Ba no,
Ber a adasa so ada n'.

name: MHB 125:3
title: Phillips Brooks, 1835-93.
verse:
. Akyɛdze nwanwa no wɔdze
Maa wiadze dzinn na komm!
Dɛm na Nyakoɔn kyɛ nyimpa
Siar akyɛdze fi sor.
Asowa bi nnkɛtse Ne mbae,
Mbom bɔn wiadze yi mu,
Abrɛfo a wɔgye No n' na
Christ dɔyɛfo n' to hɔn.

name: MHB 125:4
title: Phillips Brooks, 1835-93.

name: MHB 126:1
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546.
verse:
. M'AKOMA, hwɛ, ma w'enyi do:
Woana da edzidzidaka n' m' hɔ?
Woana nye Akɔkowa fɛɛfɛw yi?
Akɔkowa Christ siarfo n' nye No.

name: MHB 126:2
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546.
verse:
. Ewuradze a ebɔɔ adze nyina,
Mbrɛ esi ayɛ Wo ho keteseaba,
Dɛ ebɛyɛ W' dabew wɔ bea a
Nsoaso na anantwi dzidzi.

name: MHB 126:3
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546.
verse:
. Sɛ wiadze ne fɛw yɛ mbordo,
Na sika na abopa anyɛ n' ma a,
Nkyɛ iyi mpo mmfata koraa dɛ 
Ɔwo Ewuradze bɛda hɔ.

name: MHB 126:4
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546.
verse:
. Ao, Jesus Akɔkowa krɔnkrɔn!
Bra bɛhyehyɛ Wo mpa a ho tsew n'
Wɔ m'akoma bɔbɔfo m' ma
Ɔaayɛ mpiatun dzinn ama Wo.

name: MHB 126:5
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546.
verse:
. M'akoma keka n' ho dɛw mu daa,
Na m'ano nnkɛyɛ komm bio da;
Medze dɛw m'bɔtow Wo ndwom daa,
Tsetse abagyegye ndwom dɛɛdɛw n'.

name: MHB 126:6
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546.
verse:
. Enyimnyam nka Nyame wɔ sor,
Ɔno a ɔdze Ne Ba ama nyimpa,
Ber a abɔfo dze dɛw ma hɛn
Afenhyia pa wɔ asaase do.

name: MHB 127:1
title: George Stringer Rowe, 1830-1913.
verse:
. NYIMPA Ba no dze Ne tsir too
Mbowa edzidzidaka n’ mu;
Ͻdaa wiadze ha Ne nda kan
Nguanhwɛfo no dze enyigye tsiee
‘Bͻfo krͻnkrͻn n’amandzɛɛ;
Hͻn a wͻwͻ nguambuw mu hͻ n’
Dze enyigye soom hͻn Wura.

name: MHB 127:2
title: George Stringer Rowe, 1830-1913.
verse:
. Hͻn a wͻtsee Ne famu ha mbae
Nka n’ nyina nyaa enyigye;
Na hͻn so a wohuaa Ne mbae no,
Kamfo No dͻ n’, nyaa dɛw pii.
Agyenkwa Siarfo, Christ krͻnkrͻn,
Edaa mbowa edzidzibea;
Innkotum abrɛ Woho adze
Abɛtsena m’akoma m’?

name: MHB 127:3
title: George Stringer Rowe, 1830-1913.
verse:
. Ndzebͻn edzi W’enyim kan kͻ;
Akoma a wͻtoo mu pon n’,
Ana bɛhɛn mu mbͻbͻr mu,
Nyimpa Ba,dze Wo tsir ato?
Afei hɛn mu, Jesus krͻnkrͻn,
Yɛ Borͻnya wͻ m’akomam’;
Ma mo mbowa edzidzibea ndan
Heaven a Ͻwo wͻ hͻ no.

name: MHB 127:4
title: George Stringer Rowe, 1830-1913.
verse:
. Ma hͻn a wͻanntse W’awoo ho
Nsɛmpa no nyinara no,
Wͻwͻmber dadaw m’ , nnyɛ Borͻnya m’,
Wͻmfa W’asomdwee mbrɛ hͻn,
Fa enyigye asɛmpa n’ brɛ hͻn,
Ma wͻntse Borͻnya ndwom no wͻ hͻ:
Yi Nyame ayɛw, Christ aba!

name: MHB 128:12
title: George Stringer Rowe, 1830-1913.
verse:
. DƐ mbrɛ nkɔnhyɛfo kae no, ɔbaabun bi 
Awo Akɔkowaba; dɛm na osii,
Dɛ ɔmbɔpon hɛn owu, hɛll na bɔn a 
Adam ne mbrato dze furaa hɛn no mu.
       Dɛm ntsi hom enyi ngye, ntow awerɛhow ngu;
       Wɔwoo hɛn Agyenkwa Jesus Christ ber yi.
  
. Na Jewfo kurow bi a wɔfrɛ n' Bethlehem,
Hɔ na Joseph na Mary nyina kɔsoɛe,
Ama wɔaakan hɔn na binom wɔ ɔtow ntsi,
Osiandɛ dɛm na Caesar hyɛɛ dɛ wɔnyɛ.

name: MHB 128:3
title: George Stringer Rowe, 1830-1913.
verse:
. Na wokodur kurow fɛɛfɛw no mu no,
Nna nyimpadodow ahyɛ hɔ nyina ma,
Ma Joseph nye Mary a wɔyɛ ehiafo n'
Ennya kwan biara wɔ ahɔhodan no mu.

name: MHB 128:4
title: George Stringer Rowe, 1830-1913.
verse:
. Na okehiaa dɛ wɔkɔsoɛ edzdzidaka m'
Beebi a daa wɔdze anantwu na nguan gui:
Na wɔammfɛr dɛm famu famu tsenabea hɔ koraa,
Na n'adzkyee n' ara na wɔwoo Agyenkwa.

name: MHB 128:5
title: George Stringer Rowe, 1830-1913.
verse:
. Adasa nyina ahenfo Hen n' aba wiadze
Ndwera kakraba na wonyaa kyekyeer N' ho;
Na Mary kyekyeer ne Ba no ho wiei no,
Ɔdze No too nantwi edzidzidaka mu.

name: MHB 128:6
title: George Stringer Rowe, 1830-1913.
verse:
. Na Nyame somaa ɔbɔfo fii sorsor
Kɔr nguanhwɛfo ehiafo bi nkyɛn, wɔ sar do,
Kɛsee hɔn dɛ mma wonndzi awerɛhow bio,
'Siandɛ wɔawo hɛn Agyenkwa ndɛ da yi.

name: MHB 128:7
title: George Stringer Rowe, 1830-1913.
verse:
. Amon mu hɔ ara na nguanhwɛfo no hun
Abɔfo dɔm kɛse dɛ wɔwɔ wimu;
Wɔdze dɛw kɛse kasae, toow ndwom dɛɛdɛw 
Dɛ enyimnyam nka Nyame hɛn sor Hen no.

name: MHB 129:12
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715.
verse:
. Anago bi na nguanhwɛfo 
Tsena fam' roweɔn hɔn nguan,
Ewuradze bɔfo fi sor bae,
Na kan hyerɛɛn hɔ nyina.
 
. Ihu kɛse kaa hɔn n-tsi 
Ɔsee dɛ, Mma hom nnsuro:
Mebrɛ hom na adasa nyina
Asɛmpa a ɔyɛ dɛw.

name: MHB 129:3456
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715.
verse:
. Wɔawo Agyenkwa ama hom 
Wɔ David ahenkurowm',
Wɔawo Ewuradze Christ n-dɛ;
Yi na hom dze bohu N':
 
. Hom bohu dɛ Akɔkowaba n' 
Da mbowa dzidzidakam',
Hom bohu No nantwibuw mu,
Dɛ tam kyekye No ho.
 
. Nyame bɔfo n' wiee dɛm ka ara, 
Na sor dɔm pii bae a
Wɔdze ndwom yii Nyame ayɛw
Enyigye mu see dɛ:
 
. Enyimnyam nka Nyame wɔ sor, 
Asomdwee nka 'saase;
Nyame enyisɔ nhyɛ ase
Wɔ adasa mu ndɛ.   Amen.

name: MHB 13:12
title: Anonymous: Foundling Hospital Collection. 1796.

name: MHB 13:34
title: Anonymous: Foundling Hospital Collection. 1796.

name: MHB 130:1
title: Edmund Hamilton Sears, 1810-76.
verse:
. ƆBAA danafua kɔnnkɔnn bi
Abɔfo a woesian famu
Robɔ hɔn sika nsanku toow
Tsetse ndwom dɛɛdɛw n' dɛ 
'Somdwee na pɛpa nka adasa,
Omfi sor Hen hɔ mbra!
Na wiadze ntaa dzinn ara ntsie
Abɔfɔ hɔn ndwom no.

name: MHB 130:2
title: Edmund Hamilton Sears, 1810-76.
verse:
. Wɔkɔr do ara fi sor sianee,
Wɔdze asomdwee sianee,
Na wɔtsee hɔn sorsor ndwom no
Wɔ fona wiadze yi m',
N'awerɛhow paprata no mu;
Wotuu faa kyinkyinii,
Wɔtoow ndwom n' ma wɔtsee no wɔ
Babel nkwaado nyina.

name: MHB 130:3
title: Edmund Hamilton Sears, 1810-76.

name: MHB 130:4
title: Edmund Hamilton Sears, 1810-76.
verse:
. Hom a abrabɔ ahyɛ hom do
Ma ntsi hom kɔn ebu,
Hom a hom berɛ wɔ kwan do
Ma hom nntum nnantsew yie,
Hom nhwɛ! Engyigye na mber pa
Dze ntsaban reba ntsɛm:
O hom nhom wɔ ɔfona kwan n' nkyɛn 
Ntsie abɔfo ndwom yi.

name: MHB 130:5
title: Edmund Hamilton Sears, 1810-76.
verse:
. Hom nhwɛ! Nda n' reba ntsɛntsɛm a
Nkɔnyɛfo aka n' dada;
Ɔdze mber pa a akyɛr no 
Bɛba ber pa no mu.
Asomdwee bɛba wiadze nyina,
Tsetse ahoɔfɛw n' epue;
Na wiadze nyina agye ndwom a
Abɔfo rotow no.

name: MHB 131:1
title: Anonymous
verse:
. BORƆNYA a odzi kan a ɔbɔfo no kae n',
Ɔkaa kyerɛɛ nguanhwɛfo bi a wɔwɔ sar do,
Nna wɔwɔ sar n' do rohwɛ hɔn nguan
Ɔpɛber 'nafua bi a nna awɔw aba.
    Borɔnya afe pa! Borɔnya afe pa!
    Wɔawo Israelmba hɔn Hen.

name: MHB 131:2
title: Anonymous
verse:
. Wɔhwɛɛ sor na wohun woraba a
Ɔrehyerɛn boka ekyirekyire,
Na ɔrema asaase kan kɛse,
Na ɔyɛɛ dɛm adzekyee na adzesaa.

name: MHB 131:3
title: Anonymous
verse:
. Na enyansafo baasa bi nam
Woraba n' ne kan mu fi ekyirkyir bae;
Wɔbaa dɛ wɔrobɔhwɛ Ɔhen n'
Na woeetsin woraba n' do ekyinkyin.

name: MHB 131:4
title: Anonymous
verse:
. Woraba yi kɔr kwaamu-anee
Siankaa Bethlehem do kakra;
Na ekyir no ogyinaa koraa
Wɔ beebi a Jesus da no.

name: MHB 131:5
title: Anonymous
verse:
. Enyansafo baasa n' hɛɛn mu 
Buu nkotodwe enyidzi mu ara;
Na N'enyim hɔ ara yɛɛ N' ayɛ: 
Sika, krɔbɔɔ na akyenkyendur.

name: MHB 131:6
title: Anonymous
verse:
. Dɛm a wɔmma yɛmfa adwen kor
Ntow ayɛyi mma hɛn sor Hen no,
Ɔno na ɔmaa sor na asaase bae
Na ɔdze N' bɔgyaa tɔ adasa.

name: MHB 132:1
title: William Chatterton Dix, 1837-98.
verse:
. DƐ mbrɛ tsetsemba no nam
Enyigye mu hwɛɛ woraba n'
Na wɔdze dɛw huaa ne kan a
Ɔhyerɛɛnee kyerɛɛ kwan n',
Ewuradze, dɛm na hɛn so
Wɔnkyerɛn hɛn kwan mbra Wo hɔ.

name: MHB 132:2
title: William Chatterton Dix, 1837-98.
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze dɛw tuu anan
Baa Agyenkwa Wo mpa ho ara
Bobuu ntwɛr wɔ Ɔwo a sor na
Asaase sɔr Wo W'enyim n',
Dɛmara na ma hɛn so
Nhwehwɛ mbɔbɔrhu egua n'.

name: MHB 132:3
title: William Chatterton Dix, 1837-98.
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ wɔkyɛɛ W' dza ho hia
Wo wɔ ehiafo mpa no ho n',
Dɛmara pɛr na hɛn so
Mfa dwɛw krɔnn a bɔn nnyi mu
Mfua hɛn aboɔdzendze mu,
Mbrɛ Wo Christ hɛn sorsor Hen.

name: MHB 132:4
title: William Chatterton Dix, 1837-98.
verse:
. Jesus krɔnkrɔn, fa hɛn si
Kwan tseabaa no mu daa daa, 
Na sɛ wiadze bɔ adze a,
Fa hɛn akra a woefi nsa n'
Kɔ bea a wonnhia wimu kwankyerɛ,
Bea a fua nnhyɛ W'enyimnyam do.

name: MHB 132:5
title: William Chatterton Dix, 1837-98.

name: MHB 133:1
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. ENYANSAFO bi fii
Hɔn nyimdzee mu twae
Fii boka mbepɔw do 
Kɔr 'bɔbɔfo fie.
Nyamesom pa gyaa hɔn
Ntsɛm fii ekyirkyir,
Towee kɔr kan daa daa,
Tsiin woraba bi do.

name: MHB 133:2
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. Hɔ na hɔn Wura na
Gyefo brɛfo n' da,
Kan nwanwa a odzii hɔn kan
Wɔ hɔn akwantu mu n'
Bɔkɔ do ahyerɛn
Ekyirkyir aman do;
Ber a woraba no dze hɔn 
Resan akɔ hɔn nkyir.

name: MHB 133:3
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. Ɔwo a da bi edaa
Mbowa edzidzidaka m',
Na sesei idzi hen
Nyimnyam m' aman do,
Boaboa wiadzefo a
Wɔwɔ ekyir n' ano,
Hɔn a wonnhun woraba n'
Kwankyerɛ kan no.

name: MHB 133:4
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. Boaboa tokyemfo ano;
Dɔnsuartɔfo no,
Tow Wo kan n' gu hɔn do,
Gya hɔn abamba;
Hɔn a wonnhun Wo no,
Hɔn a wɔato gon n',
Fa Wo woraba ne hyerɛn 
Gya hɔn abamba.

name: MHB 133:5
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. Gya hɔn fa sum kebii m',
Ber a obi nnkɔ mmba n',
Hyerɛn dzi hɔn enyim kan
Wɔ Wo dɔ kan n' mu;
Jewfo na Amamforafo,
Akobɔfo nyina,
Mbofra na mpanyin so,
Fa woraba n' gya hɔn.

name: MHB 134:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. 'NYIMNYAM nka Nyame wɔ sor, 
Na asomdwee nsian asaase;
Nyankopɔn, dwir, konton wimu,
Na ɔkyerɛ dɛ ɔyɛ nyɛnko:
Nyame a yennhu No n'aba:
Nyame osiarfo, MARA
Aba nyinsu bɔnsa yi m'
Na Ne dzin nye Jesus.

name: MHB 134:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Abɔfo nyina tontoon
Hɔn Bɔfo na hɔn Hen;
Wɔdze hɔn Wura brɛfo n'
Ho nsɛm brɛɛ adasa.
Ɔtoo N'ahendzi no pan,
N'enyimnyam nwanwa n' hyerɛn, 
Nkwa farbaa no hyɛ ase;
Wɔawo Nyame ankasa!

name: MHB 134:31
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hwɛ Nyame Ba bɛkyebo n',
Nyimpa Ba bɛkyebo n';
Nyia sor enntum annkora No n'
Aba honandua mu.
Ɔsor mba, hom mbɔ mbubuw;
Hom nhw sor na ase Wura a
Afei wɔyɛɛ No honam n'
Da mbowa edzidzibea.

name: MHB 134:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn nyimpa mba, yendzi dɛw, 
Mbɔ asomdwee Hen n' dawur,
Yɛnye sor dɔm mma ndze do
Mfa Immanuel dzin ntsea m':
Hɛn anan, hɛn akoma kotow N',
Jesus hɛn honam mu nyi n'
Yɛ hɛn Nua sesei ampa,
Na Nyame yɛ hɛndze.

name: MHB 135:12
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔsor dɔ no ɔkrɔn dodow, 
Nyame Baatan N' ayamuhyehye;
Ɔdze Agyenkwa fi sor bae,
Ɔmaa da pa n' hyerɛɛn hɛn do,
Na tsenenee ewia no puei,
Bɛtseew hɛn sum wiadze enyi.
 
. Nyame daa edzi wɔ Christ mu, 
Dze Ne kan abɛpam hɛn sum,
Etu hɛn bɔn na enyifura,
Dze hɛn nan esi kwan pa mu;
Na hɛn akra a woenya fakyɛ,
Akɔ daa ahomgye man no '.

name: MHB 135:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 135:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 136:1
title: Laurence Housman, 1865-
verse:
. EWIA na bosoom Yɛfo no,
Hɛn asaase yi Yɛfo n',
Hwɛ! Akyɛdze pa a ɔammba ntsɛm, 
Ɔaba ma wɔawo No.

name: MHB 136:2
title: Laurence Housman, 1865-
verse:
. Ber a Nyame maa yɛdɔree no,
Wiadze nyaa siar kɛse;
Christ dze tsenenee na asomdwee
Bɛsaa akoma yarba.

name: MHB 136:3
title: Laurence Housman, 1865-
verse:
. Ɔsor nworaba nyinara
Hyerɛɛn dze gyaa No kwan;
Naaso adasa nko na wɔmaa
Wohum Ne nyimpa su.

name: MHB 136:4
title: Laurence Housman, 1865-
verse:
. Adaasa poow Ne nyimpa su,
Naaso owui hɛn bɔn ntsi;
No dɔ a wɔnam gyedzi do hu n'
Da ho gye wiadze nkwa.

name: MHB 136:5
title: Laurence Housman, 1865-
verse:
. O ɔdɔ mapa a yenntum nnhu,
Kan a ɔtra ntseasee,
Sian bra wiadze anago yi,
Bɛsa akoma yarba.

name: MHB 137:1
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.

name: MHB 137:2
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.

name: MHB 137:3
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.
verse:
. Nna abɔfo ahorow
Pii etwa ehyia;
Cherubfo, Seraphfo
Wokyiin wɔ wimu;
Naaso Ne na nkotoo wɔ
Ne mbaabun ber m'
Dze ɔdwe mfewano sɔɔr
No Dɔba no.

name: MHB 137:4
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.
verse:
. Ebɛn na m'bɛma Wo
Emi hianyi yi?
Sɛ meyɛ guanhwɛfo a,
Nkyɛ m'bɛma 'guambaa;
Sɛ meyɛ nyansafo dze a,
Nkyɛ m'bɛyɛ m'dze;
Ebɛn mpo na m'bɛma?
M'akoma nko.

name: MHB 138:1
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.
verse:
. ƆDƆ siaan Borɔnya ber,
Sunsum dɔ a ɔyɛ fɛw;
Wɔwoo ɔdɔ wɔ Borɔnya,
Woraba na abɔfo kyerɛɛ dɛm.

name: MHB 138:2
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.

name: MHB 138:3
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.
verse:
. Dɔ bɛyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze,
Dɔ nyɛ wodze, nyɛ medze; 
Dɔ nka Nyame na adasa, 
Dɔ a ɔserɛ, kyɛ adze, hyɛ nsew.

name: MHB 139:1
title: John Morison, 1750-98.
verse:
. NYIMPA a wɔhyɛɛ sum mu kyɛree n'
Ehu enyimnyam kan no;
Hɔn a wɔtsenaa owu sum mu
Wɔ adzekyee kan mu.

name: MHB 139:2
title: John Morison, 1750-98.
verse:
. Aman no boaboa hɔn ano,
Ba bohua W', sor Ewia;
Sɛ wɔba a, wɔdze enyigye dɛ 
Hɔn a wobu ndɔbaa.

name: MHB 139:3
title: John Morison, 1750-98.
verse:
. Wɔawo Enyidar Ba ama hɛn 
Wɔama hɛn Babanyin;
Ebusua nyina betsie No,
Sor dɔm nyina betsie N'.

name: MHB 139:4
title: John Morison, 1750-98.
verse:
. Wɔbɛfrɛ No asomdwee Hen,
Na wɔbɔsɔr No daa;
Ɔnwanwanyi, Ɔfotufo,
Ewuradze Tumfo pa.

name: MHB 139:5
title: John Morison, 1750-98.
verse:
. No tum bɔkɔ do atserɛw,
N'ahendzi nnkɔbɔ adze;
Pɛrpɛr botwa No sor egua n'  ho
Ma asomdwee eebu do ha.

name: MHB 14:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. HOM nyi sor Hen no ayɛw,
Ɔkora N'aban wɔ ase;
Yi ɔdɔ Nyame n'ayɛw,
Da N'akeseyɛ edzi;
Yi N'ayɛw, Ne ndzeyɛɛ ho,
Kamfo No tum kɛse no:
Ndzepa nyina fir No ho,
Sor na asaase ntonton N'.

name: MHB 14:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hom mfa nsanku na ndwom pa 
Nkamfo daa daa Nyame n',
Akasaa na akyem ndze mbɔ m;
Nhur Ne dzin kɛse mo:
Nyia ɔwɔ ndze biara ntonton N';
Ɔsor edwindze nyina,
Hom mfa asokwadze nyina mbra,
Mbɔtow N'akoma m'ndwom.

name: MHB 14:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wɔmma abɔdze nyina ntow ndwom,
Mma Nyia wɔtse No mu n',
Wɔnhyɛ hɔn Bɔfo enyimnyam,
Wongu N'enyim ebiritsi:
Hom ntsew Ne dzin ho wɔ ase,
Dɛ mbrɛ wɔyɛ no wɔ sor;
Wɔmma abɔdze nyina ntonton 
Ewuradze aber nyina.   Amen.

name: MHB 140:1
title: Charles Coffin, 1676-1749;

name: MHB 140:2
title: Charles Coffin, 1676-1749;
verse:
. Tsie! Sor abɔfo ndze 
Gyegye anafua esuom; 
Ɔsor dɔm tsea mu dɛ, 
Nyame aba asaase do.

name: MHB 140:3
title: Charles Coffin, 1676-1749;
verse:
. Ka nguanhwɛfo no hɔ 
Kɔhwɛ adom esumasɛm;
Dza enyi hu nyina nye
Ɔba a ɔda nguambuw m'.

name: MHB 140:4
title: Charles Coffin, 1676-1749;
verse:
. Nnyɛ Oyi nye Ɔdomakoma Ba a
Ɔtse sor ahengua n' do,
Nyia wonnyaa mmbɔɔ wiadze n'
Ɔnye Egya no wɔ hɔ n'?

name: MHB 140:5
title: Charles Coffin, 1676-1749;
verse:
. Gyedzi Wura, mununkum a 
Odura N'enyimnyam ho n'
Hua Ewuradze Nyame,
Nyia abɔdze nyina kotow N'.

name: MHB 140:6
title: Charles Coffin, 1676-1749;
verse:
. Gyedzi hu ahengua n', 
Bea a abɔfo wɔ afebɔɔ;
Abɔfo ho popo,
Wɔdze ahopopo sɔr N'.

name: MHB 140:7
title: Charles Coffin, 1676-1749;
verse:
. Akɔkowa, Wo kommyɛ n' 
Kyerɛ hɛn dɛ yɛmpow
Dza honam pɛ biara,
Yennkyir akɔndɔbɔn.

name: MHB 140:8
title: Charles Coffin, 1676-1749;
verse:
. Fa dɔ krɔnkrɔn mee hɛn,
Yi hɛn ahantan kɔ;
Hɛn akoma brɛfo biara m',
Na tsena mu afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 141:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. WƆAWO adehyeba ama hɛn, 
Wɔdze anohoba Dzifo am;
Nyia wonnhu N' boka asaase do,
Nyimpa Ba n', Ɔsor Nyame no.

name: MHB 141:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wɔawo Agyenkwa, dɔ kɛse mu,
Ɔaba rebɛma famufo do;
Ɔaba dɛ ɔdze N'adom kɛse n'
Robɔpɔn No nkorɔfo nyina.

name: MHB 141:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Christ no a wɔhyɛɛ No ho nkɔm no,
Sunsum No tum no hyɛɛ No ma
Ma ɔyɛɛ Nkɔnhyɛnyi, Sɔfo, Hen,
Nye ɔsor wiadze nyina Wura.

name: MHB 141:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Dɔm Ewuradze, sorsor Nyame,
Igyaa W'ahengua baa wiadze;
Yɛdze dɛw ma Wo akɔaba
Gyedzi mu to hɛn akoma mu.

name: MHB 142:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. MA asaase na sor mbɔ m'
'Bɔfo na nyimpa mpen,
Wɔntow ayɛyi ndwom
Mma Nyame a ɔbɛbrae; 
Hɛn Nyame adan Noho nyimpa,
Yennkotum atse iyi ase.

name: MHB 142:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ogyaa N'enyimnyam hɔ,
Ɔhyɛɛ hɛn honam bi, 
Ɔda hɔ no, nyimpa
Ennhu N' dɛ Nyame Ba a;
Ɔbɛyɛɛ akɔkowa wɔ ha,
Na wɔtoo No dzin Immanuel.

name: MHB 142:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 142:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 142:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yeenya edzi mu dɔ mu,
N'adom atsew hɛn ho n',
Yebefi ase ha
Na yeehu N'enyim hyerɛn n';
Ber n' na ɔbɛkyerɛ No dɔ kɛse n',
Na nyimpa na Nyame bɔbɔ m'.

name: MHB 143:1
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. CHRISTIANFO pa, hom mfa
Akoma, kra, ndze ndzi dwɛ! 
Hom ntsie dza yɛreka yi;
Nsɛm! Nsɛm!
Wɔawo Jesus Christ ndɛ da 'i,
Nantwi na asoaso kotow N'
Na ɔda mbowa edzidzidaka m';
Wɔawo Christ ndɛ da 'i.

name: MHB 143:2
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. Christianfo pa, hom mfa
Akoma, kra, ndze ndzi dɛw!
Nkyii hom ntsie dɛw a ɔmmbɔ adze;
Dɛw! Dɛw!
Dɛm ntsi na wɔwoo Jesus,
Oebue sor abobow no,
Na woehyira nyimpa afebɔɔ
Wɔwoo N' wɔ yi ntsi.

name: MHB 143:3
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. Christianfo pa, hom mfa
Akoma, kra, ndze ndzi dɛw!
Onnhia dɛ hom suro wumaa:
'Somdwee!
Wɔwoo Christ dɛ ɔmbɛgye nkwa;
Ɔfrɛ wo, ɔfrɛ hom nyina,
Hom mbɛtsena Ne nkyɛn afebɔɔ;
Christ baa bɛgyee nkwa.

name: MHB 144:1
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.
verse:
. MO ndwom nye dɔ a wonnyim a 
M'Agyenkwa dze dɔ me;
Ɔdɔ hɔn a wɔnndɔ N',
Ama hɔn so eenya dɔ.
Woana nye me
Na emi ntsi
Mo wura bɛyɛɛ
Nyimpa na owui?

name: MHB 144:2
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.
verse:
. Ofi N siar 'hengua
Do dze No nkwagye bae;
Na adasa ennhu
Christ a yɛahwɛ No kwan n';
O me nyɛnko pa!
Me nyɛnko pa,
Ohiaa me no,
Ɔfɛɛm m' No nkwa.

name: MHB 144:3
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.
verse:
. Sɛ odu mber bi a,
Wɔdze berɛw sɛw No kwan m';
Wɔtow ayɛyi ndwom,
Hosanna ma hɔn Hen.
Afei wɔdɛ;
Bɔ No mbeamudua m'!
Wɔtseatseaa mu
Dɛ wonku No.

name: MHB 144:4
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.
verse:
. Ebɛn na mo Wura ayɛ? 
'Bɛn ntsi na wɔtan No?
Ɔmaa mbubua nantsewee,
Enyifurafo hun adze,
Wopiraa No!
Wentwiwentwi
Sii hɔnara ntamu
Wɔsoɛree tsiaa N'.

name: MHB 144:5
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.
verse:
. Wɔsoɛr, na wɔka dɛ 
Wɔmfa mo Wura nkɔ;
Wɔgye owudzinyi nkwa
Na woku nkwa Hen no!
Ɔdze enyigye
Hun amandze,
Ma N'atamfo
Eenya ahotɔ.

name: MHB 144:6
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.
verse:
. Mo Wura ennya ofie
Wɔ asaase do anntsena m';
Owu m' oennya wumaa,
Gyedɛ dza ɔhɔho mae.
'Bɛn na menka?
Sor nye Ne fie;
Naaso medze
Nye bea a ɔdae no.

name: MHB 144:7
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.
verse:
. Ma mentsena ha ntow ndwom,
Asɛm biara nnhia dɛm;
Ɔhen, dɔ na yaw bi
Nnyi hɔ a ɔtse dɛ Wodze n'.
Me Nyɛnko nye N',
Medze enyigye
Beyi N' ayɛw
Mo nkwa nda nyina.

name: MHB 145:1
title: Edward Denny, 1796-1889.
verse:
. OWURA, ahoɔfɛw bɛn na annhyerɛn
Wɔ W'anan ho wɔ ha?
Ɔdɔ na yaw bɛn na Wo nkwa
Na wu mu annda edzi?

name: MHB 145:2
title: Edward Denny, 1796-1889.
verse:
. Awerɛhow adzesoa durdur, 
Daa W'akoma do daa,
Naaso ehwinhwin biara emmfi
W'anomu emmpue ara da.

name: MHB 145:3
title: Edward Denny, 1796-1889.
verse:
. W'atamfo bɛtan W', ayaw Wo,
W'anyɛnkofo apow Wo:
Ennkɛberɛ dɛ edze bɛkyɛ hɔn,
Na akɔ do adɔ hɔn.

name: MHB 145:4
title: Edward Denny, 1796-1889.
verse:
. Ma hɛn akoma yɛndɔ dɛ Ɔwo, 
Na Ewuradze, yendzi yaw 
Kɛse mma binom bɔn ma ɔnsen
Dza wɔyɛ dze tsia hɛn n'.

name: MHB 145:5
title: Edward Denny, 1796-1889.
verse:
. Hɛn a yɛyɛ Wo nuanom yi, 
Ma yɛnhwɛ adze dɛ Ɔwo,
Yenhu ahobrɛadze na adom a 
Ofi hɛn nye W' koryɛ m'.

name: MHB 146:1
title: Ann Gilbert, 1782-1866.
verse:
. JESUS a ɔtse sor noho 
Bae bɛyɛɛ nyimpa na owui;
Nwoma Krɔnkrɔn no mu yehu 
Mbrɛ osii na ɔyɛɛ papa.

name: MHB 146:2
title: Ann Gilbert, 1782-1866.
verse:
. Okyiin mbeambea, ɔyɛɛ ayamuyie, 
Ɔmaa enyifurafo hun adze
Ayarfo na ebubuafo,
Ohun hɔn mbɔbɔr saa hɔn yar.

name: MHB 146:3
title: Ann Gilbert, 1782-1866.
verse:
. Ɔkaa nsɛmpa no so kyerɛɛ hɔn,
Dza Nyankopɔn pɛ dɛ wɔyɛ;
Ɔkyerɛɛ ɔdwe maa obiara,
Ma nkyɛ obetsie mbofra mpo.

name: MHB 146:4
title: Ann Gilbert, 1782-1866.
verse:
. Naaso ohun owu yaayaw bi!
Wɔsɛɛn No wɔ mbeamudua do;
N-sa pa a ɔdze yɛɛ papa n',
Wɔdze mprɛgow bɔɔ m' wɔ dua do.

name: MHB 146:5
title: Ann Gilbert, 1782-1866.

name: MHB 147:1
title: Stopford Augustus Brooke, 1832-1916.
verse:
. ƆDƆ Wura wɔ ha no,
'Nyigye akoma soom No bo, 
Odzii yaw daa dze;
Hɛn ntsi ɔyɛɛ ankonam,
Naaso ɔdze too nkyɛn maa
Aberɛfo enyigye.

name: MHB 147:2
title: Stopford Augustus Brooke, 1832-1916.

name: MHB 147:3
title: Stopford Augustus Brooke, 1832-1916.

name: MHB 147:4
title: Stopford Augustus Brooke, 1832-1916.
verse:
. Owura, fa Wo pɛ ma hɛn,
Ma yɛmfa Egya N' nkwa nkenyan 
Abɔnfo nyina;
Gye hɛn fi wiadze haw a 
Ɔhyɛ hɛn akoma do kɔ 
Berɛ na aperdzi m'.

name: MHB 147:5
title: Stopford Augustus Brooke, 1832-1916.
verse:
. Ewuradze ma yensie
Wo tum wɔ awerɛhow mu,
Wo dɔ wɔ haw mu;
Yennya nyansa, botooyɛ m',
Na yemfi awerɛhow mu 
Nsoɛr nkɔ Nyame hɔ.

name: MHB 148:1
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.
verse:
. YEENNHU Wo  aber a ebaa
Bɔn na wu wiadze yi mu no,
Yeennhu Wo wɔ Wo fie no mu
Wɔ Nazareth ekùraase ho;
Naaso, Nyame Ba, yɛgye dzi
Dɛ enantseew n’abɔntsen do.

name: MHB 148:2
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.
verse:
. Yeennhu Wo ber a nyimpa bɔn
Maa Wo do sɛɛn hɔ wɔ sor no;
Yɛanntse ahobrɛadze ndze nò a
Edze sèrεe: Egya fa kyε hɔn.
Naaso yεgye dzà ɔmaà asaase
Wosowee na sum dwirii no dzi.

name: MHB 148:3
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.
verse:
. Yeenngyina ndà a atɔ pan no ho,
Beà a Wo fun krɔnkrɔn no dae no,
Yɛanntsénà abansor no mu hɔ bi,
Yeennhu Wo petee mu hɔ so;
Mbom yεgyé abɔfo n’ nsεm n’ dzi dε:
Hom hwehwε ’nyikamfò ewufo m’?

name: MHB 148:4
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: MHB 148:5
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.
verse:
. Na afei idzi hen wɔ sor,
Na ’fi ho hyira Wo nkòrɔfo,
Na kan biara mmfi hɔ nnsian mmba
Mmbεhyerεn wɔ hεn sar yi do;
Naaso yεgye W’anosεm dzi,
Yεtwer hεn Pomfo Ewùradze.

name: MHB 149:1
title: Jean Ingelow, 1820-97.
verse:
. ANA edɔɔ nyimpa a wɔanndɔ Wo no?
Ana 'dze nyimpa enyim fowee kɔr sor? 
Edze nyimpa ndze serɛɛ wɔ po no ho?
Eyɛ n' busuanyi ndɛ.

name: MHB 149:2
title: Jean Ingelow, 1820-97.
verse:
. O Nyame, hɛn Nua a yɛanndɔ Wo yie!
O Nyimpa, W'enyim baa nyam owu ekyir!
Ɔwo a enantseew nkɔntɔnkye kwan do,
Iguu ahom dɛ nyimpa!

name: MHB 149:3
title: Jean Ingelow, 1820-97.
verse:
. Hwɛ ɔsɛ a yɛnye Wo sɛ no ho,
Hwɛ su kor a ɔma yɛnye W' bɔ ebusua,
Hwɛ sor a bɔn nnyi hɔ a Ɔwo hyerɛn hɔ ho
Na twe hɛn abɔnfo kɔ m'.

name: MHB 149:4
title: Jean Ingelow, 1820-97.
verse:
. Hwɛ Wo kommyɛ wɔ asɛndzii hɔ no,
Hwɛ dua do wu a inyim dada no ho,
Hwɛ sum, bɔwen na bɔwema no ho,
Meserɛ Wo, bɔhwɛ me.

name: MHB 149:5
title: Jean Ingelow, 1820-97.
verse:
. Bra, na annyɛ a akoma nwinwin no
Bowu ansaana no Hɔhoe n' aba m';
Annyɛ a enyi a oennhu Wo wiadze no
Runnhu Wo sor ahendzi.

name: MHB 15:1
title: Max Landsberg, 1845-1928; and Newton Mann, 1836-1926.
verse:
. NHYIRA nka tsease Nyame!
N-hyira nka Ne dzin,
Ɔwɔ hɔ na ɔda ho wɔ hɔ,
Ɔtse dɛm daa!
Daapem Nyame kor no
Afei oeyi Noho:
Ɔwo nye Ahyɛse na Ewiei,
Onnyiewiei nye W'.

name: MHB 15:2
title: Max Landsberg, 1845-1928; and Newton Mann, 1836-1926.
verse:
. Onnyi bɔbea naaso
Abɔdze nyim N'adɔe;
Krɔnkrɔnnyɛ mu a, wiadze nnkotum
Akyerɛ Nedze n'.
Ɔyɛ adze nyina Wura!
Abɔdze yi N'ayɛw,
Beebiara ɔsor nye ase
Ye N'apɛdze.

name: MHB 15:3
title: Max Landsberg, 1845-1928; and Newton Mann, 1836-1926.
verse:
. No Sunsum no pem kwa
Kɔ beebiara a ɔpɛ:
Oduaa nkɔnhyɛfo do kasae,
'Da ho kasa.
Ne mbra nsem no etsim,
Na ɔrennsesa da,
Wɔakyerɛw no nyimpa akoma do,
Po, asaase do.

name: MHB 15:4
title: Max Landsberg, 1845-1928; and Newton Mann, 1836-1926.
verse:
. Ɔdze onnyiewiei nkwa ahyɛ
Ɔkra biara mu ma;
No dɔ bɛyɛ hɛn ahoɔdzen,
Daa nyinara.
N-tonton nka Nyame!
N-tonton nka Ne dzin,
Ɔwɔ hɔ na oda ho wɔ hɔ,
Ɔtse dem daa.     Amen.

name: MHB 150:1
title: Emily Elizabeth Steele Elliott, 1836-97.
verse:
. Igyaa W' ahengua 
Na W' ahenkyɛw so,
Ber a 'baa wiadze wɔ me ntsi n';
Na woennya kwan wɔ
Bethlehem fie hɔ,
Amma Wo wiadze ha ne mbae:
Ao, bra m' akomam', Ewuradze,
Ɔkwan wɔ m' akomam' ma Wo.

name: MHB 150:2345
title: Emily Elizabeth Steele Elliott, 1836-97.
verse:
. Sor nyina gyigyee 
Ber a abɔfo toow ndwom
Bɔɔ W' adehye dzin no dawur n';
Na mbrɛadzem' ara
Na, Ɔsor Wura,
Ebaa asaase do ha:
Ao, bra m' akomam', Ewuradze,
Ɔkwan wɔ m' akomam' ma Wo.
 
. N-sɔ wɔ etu, 
Na nnoma berɛbuw,
Wɔ nkyindur no nwin ase;
Na Wo mpa nye dɛtse,
O Nyankopɔn Ba,
Dɛtse, wɔ Galilee sar do;
Ao, bra m' akomam', Ewuradze,
Ɔkwan wɔ m' akomam' ma Wo.
 
. Ao, Ewuradze, 
'Dze nkasɛm no bae,
Dza nkyɛ ɔbɛma fahodzi;
Na wɔdze atwetwesi
Na nsoɛ katraka
Wosunsum Wo kɔr Calvary:
Ao, bra m' akomam', Ewuradze,
Ɔkwan wɔ m' akomam' ma Wo.
 
. Sor bɔwosow bio 
Na abɔfo atow ndwom,
Ber a 'bɛba konyimdzi mu n';
Ma Wo ndze mfrɛ me fie
Dɛ, Kwan da ho wɔ hɔ,
Kwan da ho wɔ me nkyɛn ma Wo!
Na, mo Wura, m' akoma bedzi dɛw
Ber a 'bɛba na ebɛfrɛ me n'.

name: MHB 151:1
title: Benjamin Russell Hanby, 1833-67.
verse:
. Woana na n-guanhwɛfo 
Kotow No mbowadan mu hɔ n'?

name: MHB 151:23
title: Benjamin Russell Hanby, 1833-67.
verse:
Ewuradze a! O anwanwasɛm! 
         Ewuradze a, Enyimnyam Hen n' a. 
         Yetwa hwe N' ananadze; 
         O wɔnhyɛ No abɔso Hen. 
 
. Woana na oridzi edwin 
Wɔ dan kakraba mu hɔ n'?
 
. Woana na ɔrekyen kɔm, 
Ɔreper wɔ sar do hɔ n'?

name: MHB 151:4
title: Benjamin Russell Hanby, 1833-67.
verse:
.	Woana na orusu wɔ 
Lazarus ne nda do hɔ n'?

name: MHB 151:5
title: Benjamin Russell Hanby, 1833-67.
verse:
. Woana na ɔrobɔ mpaa 
Esuom wɔ Gethsamane n'?

name: MHB 151:6
title: Benjamin Russell Hanby, 1833-67.
verse:
. Woana na ɔserɛ nhyira 
Ma abɔn wɔ Calvary do n'?

name: MHB 151:7
title: Benjamin Russell Hanby, 1833-67.
verse:
. Woana na oefi ewufom' 
Roboa hɛn, regye hɛn nkwa n'?

name: MHB 151:8
title: Benjamin Russell Hanby, 1833-67.
verse:
. Woana na No nko dzi Hen 
Sor na asaase nyina do n'?

name: MHB 152:12345
title: Etta Campbell, c. 1863.
verse:
. Na nyimpa a wɔayɛ petsee yi, 
Wɔnam ɔhyew do yi, ase ɛ?
Ebɛn nye adzekyee ehyia yi?
Wentwiwenti 'i ase nye dɛn?
Okuw n' sii ndze adze buaa dɛ,
Narazeth Jesus na ɔresen n'.
 
. Jesus nye woana? Ɔyɛ dɛn 
Na ɔbɔ kurow ebutuw dɛm?
Ɔkwantsennyi a ɔresen,
Ɔdze bɛn twe nyimpa pii yi?
Awɔse ndze no buaa bio dɛ,
Narazeth Jesus na ɔresen n'.
 
. Jesus! 'No na ɔbaa wiadze 
Boduaa mbusu kwan yi mu bi n';
Wɔdze ayarfo nyina brɛɛ No,
Etsitsifo ɔnye mpakye:
'Nyifurafo dze dɛw tsiee ntseamu n':
Narazeth Jesus na ɔresen n'.
 
. Ɔreba bio, fi ha kɔ ha, 
Yɛtse N' anamɔn wɔ mbeambea,
Oegyina hɛn abobowano,
Ɔahɛn dɛ ɔrobɔsoɛ hɔ;
Ana hɛn so yɛnnkɛpaam' dɛ,
Narazeth Jesus na ɔresen n'.
 
. Ao o! akobɔfo, hom mbra; 
Fakyɛ nye ahomgye wɔ ha;
Hom a hom efi Egya fie,
Hom nsan mbra bio mbɛgye N' adom;
Amandzehufo dɔbea nye 'i-
Narazeth Jesus na ɔresen n'.

name: MHB 153:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. JESUS, Wo nka a atahye no, 
Me kra enyi gye dɛ ɔtse;
Wo dzin a ɔma ahoɔdzen no,
Ɔyɛ dɛw wɔ abɔn asomu.

name: MHB 153:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 153:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ana ennda ho nnyɛ Agyenkwa
Wɔ beebiara na mber nyina? 
Wo werɛ efir W'adom akyɛdze n',
Anaa ayew Wo dzin pa no?

name: MHB 153:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Megye Wo dzin a ɔnnsesa n' dzi,
Eyɛ yarsafo a Wo yamu ye;
Itum dɛ egye hɛn akra nkwa,
Epɛ dɛ eyɛ hɔn fofor.

name: MHB 153:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ana egye nyimpadua nkwa
Na ennhwɛ ɔkra a ɔyar?
Ɔkra yarfo a edɔ n' kɛse n'
Na ebɛma oeenya ahoɔdzen.

name: MHB 153:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Jesus, medze me yarba
Na mo bɔn nyinara brɛ Wo,
Hyɛ ase sa m' yar wɔ fakyɛ mu,
Na mindzi mu krɔnkrɔnyɛ mu.

name: MHB 154:1
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Metsee dɛ Jesus ne ndze se: 
Bra Mo hɔ na bɔhom;
Ɔwo a aberɛ fa wo tsir,
Bɔto Mara Mo bom'!
Mokɔree dɛ mbrɛ metse ara,
Maberɛ, Mo werɛ ahow;
Minyaa ahomgye wɔ No mu,
Na ɔmaa m' enyigye.

name: MHB 154:2
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Metsee dɛ Jesus ne ndze se: 
Ɔwo a sukɔm dze wo,
Hwɛ, mema n-kwa nsu no kwa,
Bɔ wo mu adze nom bi!
Mebaa Jesus hɔ mobɔnoom
N-kwa esutsen n' bi;
Mo nsukɔm gyaae, me kra nyaa nkwa,
Na afei metse No mu.

name: MHB 154:3
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Metsee dɛ Jesus ne ndze se: 
Emi nye wiadze Kan:
Hwɛ Me na adze bɛkye wo,
Wo kwan mu bɛyɛ kann!
Mohwɛɛ Jesus na minyaa N' ma
Ɔyɛɛ ewia maa me!
N-kwa Kan yim' na m' bɛnantsew
M' akwantu nda nyina.

name: MHB 155:1
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. IMMANUEL, sa hɛn yar, tsie hɛn,
Fa Wo nsa no ka hɛn;
Akra epirafo yɛba Wo hɔ,
Agyenkwa, yɛtse dɛm.

name: MHB 155:2
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Yɛpaa m' ka dɛ hɛn gyedzi suar,
Yɛnngye W' asɛm nndzi yie;
Na ebɔhwɛ yi ho anaa?
Ɔmpar Wo, Ewuradze.

name: MHB 155:34
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Kaa nyia da bi ɔdze nyinsu,
Na ahopopo serɛe,
Ɔtseaa m', Ewuradze, megye dzi;
O boa m' ma mengye ndzi.
		
. Ɔbaa no dze ne nsa kaa Wo,
Na ɔtwee ayarsa tum n';
Esee n' dɛ; Fa asomdwee kɔ, 
Wo gyedzi agye w' nkwa.

name: MHB 155:5
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Yɛdze enyidar na suro ba,
Bɛka Wo do dɛ ɔno;
Yeserɛ W', mma yɛmmfa hɛn yaw
Na hɛn yar nnsan nnkɔ fie. 	Amen.

name: MHB 156:12345
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔwo a wɔpemee betsiee Wo, 
Wotsiee Wo nsɛm, wɔtsee Wo tum;
Ma abɔn kwan ma yɛmbɛn Wo,
Na gye hɛn adom mu ara.
 
. Ɔwoara na aka dɛ, 
Primprimfo nnhia oduyɛfo;
Emi meyar, mihia Wo mboa,
Mihia Wo tum a ɔgye nkwa n'.
 
. Wo tum, nokwar na nyamedɔ, 
Tsim hɔ mbersantsen mfesantsen;
W' asɛm, W' adom asɛm kor mpo,
Otu yarba dzendzen biara.
 
. Kaansa makyɛr esu yi bo, 
Ma mo sunsum nntum nnka noho a,
W' ano kasa bɛma masoɛr,
Ɔbɔbɔ  m' esu ntsɛmara.
 
. Ma dɔnhwer yi nyɛ ɔgyeber; 
Ao bra, me kra no Duyɛfo!
Da W' ahosan tum no edzi,
Ma munhu Wo nkwagye n' sesei.     Amen.

name: MHB 157:1234
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.
verse:
. Jesus frɛ hɛn! Sɛ hɛn bra po 
Wor mpo a, yɛtse Ne ndze,
Ne ndze dɛɛdɛw n' gyigye daa daa,
Ɔse: Christian, ka Mo do.
 
. Tsetseber do asomafo n' 
Tsee wɔ Galilee po do n',
Wogyaa ebusua, fie nye edwuma,
Kɛkaa' No a wɔdɔ No n' do.
 
. Jesus frɛ hɛn mma yɛnnsom 
Wiadze mu ndzɛmba huhuw;
Ɔhwɛ ndzɛmba a wɔsom hɛn bo a,
Ɔse: Christian, dɔ M' kyɛn hɔn.
 
. Enyigye nye awerɛhow mu, 
Dwumadzim' nye ahomgyem',
Ɔda ho frɛ hɛn dɛ yɛndɔ N'
Ma ɔkyɛn adze nyina.

name: MHB 157:5
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.
verse:
. Jesus frɛ hɛn! O Agyenkwa, 
Yɛserɛ W', ma yɛntse Wo frɛ n',
Hɛn 'koma nyɛ setsie mma Wo,
Yɛndɔ W' nkyɛn adze nyina.

name: MHB 158:1
title: Francis Turner Palgrave, 1824-97.
verse:
. ESE, onyimpa ba,
Fa w' mbeamudua dzi M'ekyir, 
'Nafua yɛ sum, anan mu agow, 
'So yebedzi W'ekyir.

name: MHB 158:2
title: Francis Turner Palgrave, 1824-97.
verse:
. Ewuradze pa, yɛserɛ
Dɛ ma yenhu W'enyim,
Yehu W'enyim ber tsiabaa mpo a;
Na yebedzi W'ekyir.

name: MHB 158:3
title: Francis Turner Palgrave, 1824-97.

name: MHB 158:4
title: Francis Turner Palgrave, 1824-97.

name: MHB 158:5
title: Francis Turner Palgrave, 1824-97.
verse:
. Gyedzi mbeamudua durdur 
Wɔ dza yenntum nnhu n' mu; 
Yi Woho kyerɛ dɛ mbrɛ eyɛɛ n', 
Boa ma yendzi W'ekyir.

name: MHB 158:6
title: Francis Turner Palgrave, 1824-97.
verse:
. Sɛ ammba dɛ nyimpa, 
Dɛ ebaa ber bi no a, 
Bra bɛtsena akoma a ɔper 
Dɛ obedzi W'ekyir.

name: MHB 158:7
title: Francis Turner Palgrave, 1824-97.
verse:
. Fa hɛn akoma nyina
Na bɛn hɛn mber nyina,
Bra bɛtsena Wo nkrɔfo mu; 
Kɔ, yebedzi W'ekyir.

name: MHB 159:1
title: Narayan Vaman Tilak, 1862-1919;
verse:
. OBI a ɔmmfata koraa 
Dɛ ɔyɛ Wo suanyi n',
Edze Wo dɔ afa n'nyɛnko; 
Ao, ayamuyie nwanwa!

name: MHB 159:2
title: Narayan Vaman Tilak, 1862-1919;
verse:
. Adom Wura, meyɛ mberɛw,
Na memmfata koraa;
Wo nan adze huntuma no
Mpo ye sen me koraa.

name: MHB 159:3
title: Narayan Vaman Tilak, 1862-1919;

name: MHB 159:4
title: Narayan Vaman Tilak, 1862-1919;
verse:
. Ana oemmbu No sor ahengua
Dɛ adze tootooba,
Dɛ obegya hɔ wɔ 'dasanyi a 
Mennsɛ hwee koraa yi ntsi?

name: MHB 159:5
title: Narayan Vaman Tilak, 1862-1919;
verse:
. Wɔdze mprɛgow bobɔɔ N' honam m', 
Ana oennhu amandze?
Dzin bɛn na ɔsɛ abotar
Na ɔbra krɔnkrɔn yi?

name: MHB 159:6
title: Narayan Vaman Tilak, 1862-1919;
verse:
. Ɔdɔ ankasa bɛyɛɛ nyimpa, 
Mo ho dɔ ntsi na ɔbae;
Munntum mma m'enyi do monnhwɛ
N'enyim, 'nyimguase ntsi.

name: MHB 159:7
title: Narayan Vaman Tilak, 1862-1919;
verse:
. Sɛ adze pa bi wɔ mo mu a,
Ofi Woara Wo nkyɛn,
Ntsi Ewuradze, fa me sie
Ma menyɛ Wodze koraa.

name: MHB 16:1
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74
verse:
. MA ndwom do: na asaase ntonton,
Wɔ ebusua na kasa m',
M-fa N'ayɛyi nsan mma No,
Ma ndwom a ɔfata no do.
Amanaman, hom nhyira Ne dzin;
Hom mma No nokwar nda edzi:
Na adzekyee biara hom nka
No nkwagye no ho asem.

name: MHB 16:2
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74
verse:
. Hom nka no wɔ wi yi ase,
Wɔ ebusua na kasa m',
Hom nka mfi anapa ma nwin ndwe
Wɔ ndwom a ɔmmbɔ adze da m':
Hom nka dɛ hɛn Nyame dzi hen,
Ɔno na obɔɔ wiadze ntsem,
Ɔda ho ara hwɛ wiadze do
Kesi da a ɔsɛɛ bɛba.

name: MHB 16:3
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74
verse:
. Ka kyerɛ hɔn dɛ da no reba a 
Wobobu wiadze atsɛn:
Ɔsor enyimnyam bɛhyerɛn,
'Saase, po bɛyɛ ahomka.
N-yew, epo a ɔrowor no
Bɛba ne ndze mpempem do,
Na epo asorɛkye nyina
Beyi Nyankopɔn ayɛw.

name: MHB 16:4
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74
verse:
. Asaase do mfuw na nhyiren,
Bofura hɔn atam pa,
Na kwaamu ndua nyinara na
N-haban bɛyɛ kusuww:
Sɛ wiadze Otsɛmbuafo no
Bobu atsentsenenee no a,
N-sisi na bɔn bɔbɔ adze,
Afei nokwar bedzi hen.  Amen.

name: MHB 160:1
title: George Washington Doane, 1799-1859.
verse:
. ƆWO nye Kwan n'; yeguan fi bɔn 
Na wu ho ba Wo nkyɛn; 
Na nyia ɔhwehwɛ Egya no, 
Ɔsɛ dɛ ɔfa Wo do.

name: MHB 160:2
title: George Washington Doane, 1799-1859.
verse:
. Ɔwo nye Nokwar: W'asɛm nko 
Na ɔkyerɛ nyansa mapa;
Ɔwo nko na ekyerɛ adwen
Na etsew akoma m'.

name: MHB 160:3
title: George Washington Doane, 1799-1859.
verse:
. Ɔwo nye Nkwa: nda a woebue do n'
Ka Wo konyim tum no;
Hɔn a wɔdze hɔn werɛ hyɛ Wo mu n', 
'Wu na hɛll nnkɛhaw hɔn.

name: MHB 160:4
title: George Washington Doane, 1799-1859.
verse:
. Ɔwo nye Kwan, Nokwar na Nkwa n';
Boa hɛn ma yenhu Kwan n', 
Yensie Nokwar no, na yeenya
Nkwa a ne dɛw pem daa no.     Amen.

name: MHB 161:12
title: Katherine Hankey, 1834-1911.
verse:
. Ka 'sɛm dadaw no kyerɛ me, 
Sunsum ndzɛmbam' asɛm,
Dza ɔfa Christ N' enyimnyam ho
Dza ɔfa No dɔ so ho.
Ka 'sɛm no pefee kyerɛ m' dɛ
Ereka kyerɛ abofra;
Na meyɛ mberɛw na mafona,
Minnyi ahom, mo ho fi.
Ka 'sɛm dadaw no kyerɛ me, 
Jesus no dɔ ho asɛm. 
 
. Tɔ w' bo ka 'sɛm no kyerɛ me, 
Na meetum medze esie-
Nyame No werdam kɛse a
Ɔdze yɛ bɔn edur.
Si do mber pii ka kyerɛ m'
Na meyar awerɛfir;
Ahanamakye bɔsu
Ewia fir a ɔpa.

name: MHB 161:3
title: Katherine Hankey, 1834-1911.
verse:
. Ka 'sɛm no bɔkɔɔ kyerɛ me, 
Nwinwin mu dɛ ehiasɛm,
Kaa dɛ meyɛ bɔnyɛnyi a
Jesus bɛpeer mo nkwa,
Ka 'sɛm no mber nyinara,
Sɛ epɛ ampaara
Dɛ ema m' akomatɔm'
Wɔ ahokyer ber biaram'.

name: MHB 161:4
title: Katherine Hankey, 1834-1911.
verse:
. Ka ' sɛm kor n' ara kyerɛ me, 
Aber a isuro dɛ
Wiadze enyimnyam huhuw n'
Ridzi m' adwen dodow.
Nyew, na ɔsor n' enyimnyam
No so regye mo do a,
Ka 'sɛm dadaw no kyerɛ m' dɛ,
Christ Jesus bɔ w' esu!
Ka 'sɛm dadaw no kyerɛ me, 
Jesus no dɔ ho asɛm.

name: MHB 162:1
title: Francis Quarles, 1592-1644.

name: MHB 162:2
title: Francis Quarles, 1592-1644.

name: MHB 162:3
title: Francis Quarles, 1592-1644.

name: MHB 162:4
title: Francis Quarles, 1592-1644.

name: MHB 163:1
title: John Hunter, 1848-1917.
verse:
. MO Wura, Ɔwo a Wo bra m' muhu
Dza ɔwɔ dɛ meyɛ 'so munntum;
Ma Wo kan krɔnn no nhyerɛn daa,
Nhyɛ me bra fɛr, nkyerɛ me kwan.

name: MHB 163:2
title: John Hunter, 1848-1917.
verse:
. Me mberɛwyɛ ntsi mo nsusui
Na me ndzeyɛɛ nntum mmbɔ mu nnsaa;
Ɔwo a W'adwen na W' nyɛe yɛ kor,
Boa me ma menyɛ dza munntum.

name: MHB 164:1
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.
verse:
. HWƐ! Abɔdomaba
Da mbowa edzidzidaka m';
Na ɔpɛ mframa nwinwin,
Ɔbɔ fa ne tsir ho.
Na woana nye Nyia ɔda hɔ n'?
Ɔno nye Nyia ɔbɔɔ wiadze 'i.

name: MHB 164:2
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.
verse:
. O tsebea bɛn nye no,
Na yehu Nyame ba 'i? 
'Bɛn ntsi na Nyame so
Bɔsoɛ fie tantan yi m'?
Ama yeeguan efi ahantan ho,
Na yeedzi N'ahobrɛadze ekyir.

name: MHB 164:3
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.
verse:
. Mbrɛ Joseph yɛ n'edwuma n',
Hwɛ! Jesus so wɔ hɔ;
Nsa a ɔyɛɛ adze nyina
Dzi wiadze edwin daa, 
Ma abrɛfo aahom wɔ no mu, 
Na anokwafo benya nhyira.

name: MHB 164:4
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.
verse:
. Hwɛ Abofra n' dɛ ɔdze adom
Tse abemfo n' finimfin!
'Bɛn ntsi na ɔtse hɔn mu,
Ber a ɔkrɔn sen hɔn?
Ama Christian mbofra dze obu
Esua wɔ Jesus n'ananadze.

name: MHB 164:5
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 165:12
title: George Hunt Smyttan, 1822-70.
verse:
. Idzii mbuada adaduanan 
Adzekyee nye adzesaa,
Adaduanan wɔ sar no do
Wɔsɔɔ Wo hwɛe na annyɛ bɔn.
 
. Ewia sii Wo do adzekyee, 
Bɔw tɔɔ Wo do anago,
Mbowa abɔyafo paar wo ho,
Edaa fam', isum ɔbo.

name: MHB 165:345
title: George Hunt Smyttan, 1822-70.
verse:
. Ma yɛnsɔw Wo bene no bi, 
Yɛmpow wiadze edzifodze;
Na yɛnye Wo nweɔn mpaabɔm',
Nye Wo nsɔw yaw ahoɔdzenm'.
 
. Sɛ abɔnsam dze ebufuw 
Toa honam anaa sunsum,
'Wo a edzi no do nyim pɛn,
Dom hɛn mma yaannhwe ase.
 
. Nna yebenya W' asomdwee; 
Dɛw krɔnkrɔn bɛyɛ hɛndze;
Dɛ mbrɛ abɔfo soom Wo n',
Wɔbɛhyerɛn hɛn so hɛn ho.

name: MHB 166:1
title: Stopford Augustus Brooke, 1832-1916.
verse:
. OSII wɔ ɔhyew-ber bi mu,
Ber a Jesus nenaam Galilee;
Abaatan fi nkuraase nkuraase
Dze hɔn mbofra brɛɛ No.

name: MHB 166:2
title: Stopford Augustus Brooke, 1832-1916.
verse:
. Ɔgyee hɔn too N'abaw mu sɔnn,
Dze Ne nsa totoo hɔn tsir do;
Ɔkaa berɛww dɛ, Hom mma mbofra n'
Kwan ma wɔmbra me nkyɛn.

name: MHB 166:3
title: Stopford Augustus Brooke, 1832-1916.
verse:
. Mma hom nnsiw hɔn kwan; gyedɛ hom
Nya mbofra akoma wɔ hom mu
Ana hom aba M'ahenman m',
Ɔno hom runntum nnhɛn m'.

name: MHB 166:4
title: Stopford Augustus Brooke, 1832-1916.
verse:
. Mo Wura, mepɛ dɛ mokɔ hɔ; 
O mindzi W'ekyir nye Wo nkyɛ 
W'ahobrɛadze, botoo akoma n',
Mompow wiadze ndzɛmba.

name: MHB 166:5
title: Stopford Augustus Brooke, 1832-1916.
verse:
. Wo dɔ, gyedzi, adwenmutsewee,
'Dwuma pa, kasafua a ho tsew,
Enyigye a pɛsɛankonya nnyi m',
Ewuradze pa, yɛ m' dɛm.

name: MHB 166:6
title: Stopford Augustus Brooke, 1832-1916.
verse:
. Enyigye adwen na akwan pa nyina m',
Ma me ɔdɔ ayamuyie daa;
Menam setsie m' nya fahodzi,
M'akoma nyɛ W'ahenman.

name: MHB 166:7
title: Stopford Augustus Brooke, 1832-1916.
verse:
. O memfa enyigye ntsena ase,
Nkyir wiadze dɛw, na mubohu
Nyame N'ahoɔfɛw wɔ beebi a 
No dɔ ye wɔ nyimpa m'.

name: MHB 166:8
title: Stopford Augustus Brooke, 1832-1916.
verse:
. Egya, ma m' dɛm mbofra akoma 'I, 
Ama meetum aba Christ hɔ; 
Ma maatse Ne nsa nka wɔ m' do,
Wɔ nhyira, dɔ na ayarsa m',    Amen.

name: MHB 167:1
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. EHUM dzendzen tuu po no do,
W'esuafo dze suro weɔnee,
Naaso Ɔwodze, ada koraa;
Komm na dzinn.

name: MHB 167:2
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. Wɔtseaa m; Jesus, gye hɛn, yɛrehera!
O gye hɛn haw yi mu!
W'asɛm no boor ehum no do;
Ɔtaa dzinn.

name: MHB 167:3
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. M-frama dzendzen no gyaae bɔ,
Po taa dzinn dɛ abofra a ɔada;
Asorɛkye dzendzen no gyaa bu,
Wɔ Wo pɛ m'.

name: MHB 167:4
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. Ntsi sɛ ɔbra ehum rutu hɛn
Na asorɛkye twe hɛn fi mpoano a, 
Mbrɛ yɛnnkɛmem n', ɔyɛ a ka dɛ 
Komm na dzinn.

name: MHB 168:1
title: Arthur Penrhyn Stanley, 1815-81.
verse:
. EWURADZE, oye dɛ yɛnye W'
Tsena sor ha bepɔw yi do,
Wɔ mframa pa dɛɛdɛw yi mu,
Ɔtra akoma a wɔtseetsee hɔn;
Ekyingye, berɛ na hɔn yaw yi m', 
Wɔtwer hɔn ara hɔn ekyingye;
Kwa ara na efrɛ Wo nkowaa
Dɛ womfi hɔn yaw wenwen n' mu.

name: MHB 168:2
title: Arthur Penrhyn Stanley, 1815-81.
verse:
. Ewuradze, oye dɛ yɛnye W'
Na W' nokwafo baasa n' tsena
Ha na asomfo nya ahoɔdzen,
Dze ko tsia nsɔhwɛ no mbusu;
Ha na Nyankopɔn Ba no sua
Nyansa a mu dɔ na asɛm a ɔdzɛw;
Ha na yɛnye Nyia N'asɛm yɛ 
Dɔ n' yetu wɔ nkɔr ntsaban do.

name: MHB 168:3
title: Arthur Penrhyn Stanley, 1815-81.
verse:
. Ewuradze, oye dɛ yɛnye W'
Bɔ mu kyekyer yɛ kor ara;
Kɔ do hwɛ Wo ntar hyɛnhyɛn a
Ɔhoa sen Hermon do fufuw n';
Nyimpadua no n 'akwaa n' so dze,
Sunsum kan kyerɛn kesi dɛ 
Hɛn so yebenyin wɔ adom mu,
Ehu enyim a asakyer no.

name: MHB 168:4
title: Arthur Penrhyn Stanley, 1815-81.
verse:
. Ewuradze, oye dɛ yɛnye W'
Tsena bepɔw krɔnkrɔn yi do;
Yɛhyɛ sum kebii bi mu o,
Yɛhyɛ kan hyɛnhyɛn bi mu o,
Yɛkotow ɔsor ndze krɔnn a
Ɔma akra a wɔabɔm dzi dɛw,
Kaansa ɔdɔ tu na gyedzi sa a:
Me Ba nye yi; Hom nyina ntsie No.

name: MHB 169:1
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;
verse:
. M’AGYENKWA, Wo dͻ a ewͻ ma m’,
Akyerɛ wͻ   enyimguase m’,hia m’,
Yaw m’,
Ama m’ wͻ mbeamudua no do;
Ikyii Wo bͻgyaa a ‘fͻdzi nnyi m’ n’,
Ma W’epirakur nka m’akoma a
Hwee nnkotum asesa no da.

name: MHB 169:2
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;
verse:
. M’ Akoma yɛ dzen sen ͻbo,
Bͻn nkekaa dzendzen asɛɛ mu;
Na Ͻwo yɛ Agyenkwa tumfo,
Na Wo bͻgyaa krͻnn no mmpem kwa;
Ao! Gown a nan dɛm ͻbo yi na
Wo bͻgyaa nhohor dɛm ͻbo yin a
Wo bͻgyaa nhohor dɛmnkekaa n’.

name: MHB 169:3
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 169:4
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;
verse:
. Ma Wo dͻ nkͻ do nhyrɛn mo kwan m’
Ndzɛmba nwanwa a Wo dɛ ayɛ n’!
Kͻ do kyerɛ m’ kwan amma maannyew;
Kyerɛ m’ dza menka, Kenyan m’adwen,
Na sɛ mohwe ase a, ma mentse
Wo ndze, munhu dɛ ͻdͻ  abɛn.

name: MHB 169:5
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 17:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. ƆSƐ na ɔfata adwontow, 
Ber na bea biara mu,
Enyimnyam nka hɛn sor Hen,
Nokwar na adom Nyame:
Hɛn nyina dze ndze dɛɛdɛw
Bɔ m' wɔ ndaase kor mu dɛ;
Krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, Ewuradze,
Ayɛyi nka Wo daa.

name: MHB 17:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hom adzekyee m-bakan,
Hom mfa hom ndze dɛɛdɛw
Nyi No ayɛw mber nyina,
Na mma ɔmmbɔ adze da;
Abɔfo na akɛse nyina,
Hom nyi Ɔkorsa ayɛw,
Hom ntow ndwom na hom ntwa nhwe
N'ahengua no enyim.

name: MHB 17:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yenye sor adwontofo a 
Woyi W'ayɛw wɔ sor,
N-kɔr atsabandofo,
Gyedzi na dɔ ntsaban:
Wɔtow Wo ndwom 'nyimnyam mu,
Ma Eguambaa a wokum Wo;
Sɛ hɛn n-dze kɔ famu a
Dza yegyina do yɛ kor.

name: MHB 17:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 170:1
title: Theodore Monod, 1836-1921.
verse:
. ENYITO na awerɛhosɛm nye 'i,
Dɛ mber bi a etwa mu no,
Mopoow m'Agyenkwa Ne frɛ a
Ɔdze mbɔbɔrhu frɛɛ me no;
Mubuaa dɛ, medze moho!

name: MHB 170:2
title: Theodore Monod, 1836-1921.
verse:
. Naaso ohun me, muhun N' dɛ 
'Rikyi bɔgyaa mbeamudua n' do,
Ɔbɔɔ mpaa; Egya, fa kyɛ hɔn!
M'akoma gyee do kakraabi;
Medze moho kakra maa N'.

name: MHB 170:3
title: Theodore Monod, 1836-1921.
verse:
. Daa nyina No mbɔbɔrhu no
Kɔr do maa me ayarsa,
Dze abotar brɛɛ me adze;
Na afei mekaa no berɛww dɛ
Medze me fa kɛse ma W'.

name: MHB 170:4
title: Theodore Monod, 1836-1921.
verse:
. Egya, Wo dɔ a ɔkrɔn sen sor,
No mu dɔ kyɛn po no bun n',
Afei edzi m'akoma do nyim;
Afei tsie mo ntotɔserɛ,
Medze moho nyina ma W'.  Amen.

name: MHB 171:1
title: Mary Jane Walker, 1816-78.
verse:
. Jesus, motwer Wo, medze me kra twer Wo, 
Fɔdzifo a mayew, 'Wo na 'botum agye m',
Obi nnyi sor anaa ase a ɔnye W' sɛ;
Ɔwo wui maa abɔn, Ɔwo wui maa me.

name: MHB 171:2
title: Mary Jane Walker, 1816-78.
verse:
Motwer Wo dɔ no na mohwehwɛ W' enyim; 
    W' adom nwanwa no ntsi na muhuhor Wo. 
    Jesus, motwer Wo, medze me kra twer Wo, 
    Fɔdzifo a mayew, 'Wo na 'botum agye me. 
 
. Jesus, m' bɔtwer Wo, m' bɔtwer Wo Kyerɛwsɛm; 
Osiandɛ matse Wo mbɔbɔrhu ndze no.
Wo Sunsum kyerɛkyerɛ m' a, ɔyɛ m' dɛw dodow,
Ma mentsena W' anan ho ara mintsie.

name: MHB 171:3
title: Mary Jane Walker, 1816-78.
verse:
. Jesus, m' bɔtwer Wo, mobɔdwen W' akwan do, 
Ewɔ wiadze n' eyɛɛ dɔ nye mbɔbɔrhu,
Ndzebɔnyɛfo fɔɔr Wo, 'kwatafo hwehwɛɛ W',
Hɔn mu biara ho annyɛ Agyenkwa nkɔw.

name: MHB 171:4
title: Mary Jane Walker, 1816-78.
verse:
. Jesus, ' bɔtwer Wo, mennkɛgye Wo kyim da, 
Obiara a ɔba Wo nkyɛn no emmpam no.
W' anohoba si pi, Wo bɔgyaa som bo;
'Wo nye me kra no nkwagye, me nyankopɔn.

name: MHB 172:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. NYIA mununkum esuma No 
Na abɔfo hu N' wusuww,
Ana wobohu dza wonnhu?
Na mehu Nyankopɔn?

name: MHB 172:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Obegyaa N'ahengua wɔ sor
Na ɔdze Noho ama m'?
Bua m', Ɔwo dɔ na yaw Nyimpa,
Kasa kyerɛ m'akoma.

name: MHB 172:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔdɔ krɔnn mu ara kyerɛ Wo 
Nhyehyɛɛ nwanwa no mu;
Ebɛn ntsi na ikyii Wo bɔgyaa,
Ɔwo Nyimpa Ba a aberɛ.

name: MHB 172:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ana ammba hɛn honandua mu
Ammbɛtsena na ennwu ha? 
Ama meehu Wo dɛ abɛn, 
Na meehu mo Pomfo.

name: MHB 172:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Afei bra na beyi adom
No bun, no krɔn kyerɛ m';
Wo pirakur a ɔsɛɛ W'enyim,
Eso otu m'awerɛhow n'.

name: MHB 172:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. M'bohu 'Guambaa Noara Ne kan m', 
'No a abɔfo hu N' wusuww n',
Na medze dɛw kɛse ahwɛ N'
Onnyiewiei nda nyina m'.

name: MHB 173:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 173:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔdɔfo pa, hɛn Mpataguan,
Enam W'ahoguan yaawaw n' do,
Bɔgya a ikyii na Wo yaw pii n',
Wo mbeamudua do owu yaayaw no,
Wo wu na nkwa a ɔsom bo ntsi,
Meserɛ, fa mo bɔn nyina kɔ.

name: MHB 173:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma memfew Wo nan ho bɔgya
Na memfa me nyinsu nhohor;
Wo dɔ asɛm n' si do ka bio,
Ma abɔn nyina aso ntse,
Ma obiara ntse ndze a okenyan,
Ama meenya ehumbɔbɔr.

name: MHB 173:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma wo dɔ nhyɛ m'akoma do,
Wo dɔ a wɔdze ma abɔnfo kwa;
Ma akra a wɔahwe ase nyina
Eehu adom a ɔgyee me no,
Na adasa nyina nye me eehu
W'adehye dɔ a onnyi ewiei no.

name: MHB 174:1
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. MIHYIAA Guanhwɛfo pa n',
Sesei ɔwɔ sar do,
Nna ɔso Ne ba a ɔayew
No rokɔ fie bio.
Ɔyɛɛ me nwanwa dɛ
Ɔsoaa no bɔkɔɔ;
Na ɔpaa mo ho no,
Mubuu ntwɛr sɔɔr No.

name: MHB 174:2
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. Ao, Oguanhwɛfo pa!
W'epirakur mu dɔ,
Mpataku n' piraa Wo,
Eregye Wo guan n';
Hwɛ mbrɛ bɔgya ayɛ
W'atar no mu kɔɔ!
Na Wo mfem akam yi
So ase nye dɛn?

name: MHB 174:3
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. Ao, hwɛ mbrɛ nsoɛ n' esi
Abebar Wo nhwi,
Na afei awowɔ Wo,
W'enyimdua fɛɛfɛw n'!
Hwɛ mbrɛ egye ahom a
Ɔnnyɛ yie koraa;
Na hwɛ, owu sunsum
Agyegye W'enyim.

name: MHB 174:4
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. Ao, Oguanhwɛfo pa!
Ɔyɛ emi ntsi na
Yaw kɛse a ɔtse dɛm
Aba Wo do yi.
Dɛm a na ma memper
Wɔ Wo dɔ no ntsi,
Mma minnyi W' awerɛhow
Dabiara da bio!

name: MHB 175:1
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.
verse:
. Mma nnsu mma Nyia ɔso mbeamudua 
Dze rokɔ Calvary no;
Ɔnnserɛ dasanyi ne nyinsu,
Ɔapen dɛ obowu.

name: MHB 175:2
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.
verse:
. Yaw huhu bi a atow N' enyim, 
Oegura ne nyimpadua n',
Mmfir amenhyɛ anaa 'nyimguase:
Onnsuro mbeamudua n'.

name: MHB 175:34
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.
verse:
. Yaw wenwen a ɔbor do yi, 
Ahoguan a ɔnnka,
Dza Wo dɔ nnya mu ahotɔ yi,
Wo nko so ne nyina.
 
. Ohu akra a hɔn ntsi oruwu 
Dɛ wɔtar hɔn bɔn ho,
Hɔn a ɔsor-man dzi wɔ hɔn
Wɔmmpɛ dɛ wɔhɛn mu.

name: MHB 175:5
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.
verse:
. Ao, ma menye Wo ndzi Wo yaw, 
Munsu dɛ emi mo bɔn
Bepira Wo dɔ akoma,
Dze yaw bɛhyɛ Wo do.   Amen.

name: MHB 176:12
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.
verse:
. Yaw Nyimpa! Wɔnhwɛ dzin bi a 
Wɔdze frɛɛ Nyame Ne Ba a
Ɔbɛgyee adasa nkwa
Alleluia! Ɔgyefo bɛn a!
 
. Wɔhyɛɛ N' fɛr, woyii N' ehi, 
Wɔdze m' afɔdzi soaa No;
No bɔgyaa sii m' fakyɛ pi:
Alleluia! Ɔgyefo bɛn a!

name: MHB 176:345
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.
verse:
. Yedzi fɔ, hɛn ho yɛ nkɔw 
Na Ɔno nye mpata-guan:
Bo adwe koraa!- aso ampa?
Alleluia! Ɔgyefo bɛn a!
 
. Ɔsɛn wimu na owui, 
Ɔkaam' dɛ, Afei mewie!
N-dɛ wɔakrɔn No wɔ sor
Alleluia! Ɔgyefo bɛn a!
 
. Na hɛn Enyimnyam Hen n' ɔba 
Ɔbɛfa No nkorɔfo kɔ a,
Ber n' yɛbɔtow ndwom yi bio:
Alleluia! Ɔgyefo bɛn a!

name: MHB 177:12
title: Johann Heerman, 1585-1647;
verse:
. Aa! Jesu krɔnkrɔn, ebɛn na ayɛ, 
Na nyimpa dze enyitan bu Wo fɔ yi?
Atamfo si W' atwetwe, wodze apa W',
Ao, mandzehunyi.
 
. Woana dzi so? Woana dze yi baa Wo do? 
Ao, Jesu, mo bɔn na ɔabɔ W' mbusu yi;
Mara a, Wura Jesu, emi na mepaa W':
'Mi mobɔɔ W' mbeamuduam':

name: MHB 177:3
title: Johann Heerman, 1585-1647;

name: MHB 177:45
title: Johann Heerman, 1585-1647;
verse:
. 'Mi ntsi, Jesu pa, na ebɛyɛɛ nyimpa, 
Wo wuyaw wenwen, na wo nkwa afɔrbɔ;
Wo wum' ahoguan, W' amandzehu yawyaw,
'Mi mo nkwagye ntsi a.
 
. Dɛm ntsi, Jesu pa, dɛ murunntum kaw tua 'i, 
Muhuhor Wo, mobɔsɔr ama Wo daa,
Hwɛ W' ayamuhyehye na Wo dɔ a ɔnnsakyer,
Nnyɛ dɛ mefata.

name: MHB 178:1
title: John Reynell Wreford,1800-81.
verse:
. DƆ a mowɔ ma Christ mu gow a, 
Mohwehwɛ gyedzi mapa;
Na adwen m' mokɔ turo n' mu,
Gethsemane Turo no mu.

name: MHB 178:2
title: John Reynell Wreford,1800-81.
verse:
. Hɔ menatsew no nwin mu,
Ber a ewia akɔtɔ;
Hwɛ 'Baako a ohu amandze n',
No nko rusu, rubɔ mpaa.

name: MHB 178:3
title: John Reynell Wreford,1800-81.
verse:
. Dɔ a mowɔ ma nyimpa m' gow a,
Mohwehwɛ gyedzi a ɔyɛ dzen a, 
Mokɔ Calvary koko ko,
Bea a suro na awerɛhow wɔ.

name: MHB 178:4
title: John Reynell Wreford,1800-81.
verse:
. Hwɛ yaw ɔtsee wɔ hɔ a!
Ohun amandze wɔ dua n' do;
N'ahoguan na ne gyedzi,
'Dɔ edzi konyim wɔ wu m'.

name: MHB 178:5
title: John Reynell Wreford,1800-81.
verse:
. Medan ba abrabɔ ho bio,
Muhu yaw no bo a ɔsom,
Muhu tum biara a ɔwɔ a,
Medze moho bɔ afɔr.

name: MHB 178:6
title: John Reynell Wreford,1800-81.
verse:
. Na medze gyedzi a otsim
Nye dɔ ma ayɛyi ndwom do,
Ma Christ a oedzi owu do,
Ma Christ a wɔakrɔn N' wɔ sor.

name: MHB 179:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. HƐN abɔnfo a yɛyɛ mbɔbɔr
Daa sum na ibun mu,
Bea a enyidado bi nnyi,
Na adzekyee nndu hɔ.

name: MHB 179:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Asomdwee Hen n'dze ayamuhyehye,
Ohun hɛn kɛse n';
O anwanwa dɔ bi a onyae a! 
Ɔyɛɛ ntsɛm bɛgyee hɛn.

name: MHB 179:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Osiaan fii sor ahengua n' do
Dze enyigye yɛɛ ntsɛm bae,
Dze nyimpadua hɛɛn wumaa mu,
Na ɔtsenaa ewufo mu.

name: MHB 179:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ɔdɔ yi ntsi ma obotan 
Na akoko ngyaa kommyɛ, 
Na nyimpa tɛkyerɛma nyina
Nyi Agyenkwa n' ayɛw.

name: MHB 179:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Abɔfo, hom nye bɛn ndzi dɛw,
Hom mbɔ sika sanku;
Na hom pegya hom ndwom wɔ sor a,
Mma wonntum nnkyerɛ da.

name: MHB 18:1
title: John Milton, 1608-74
verse:
. HOM mma yɛmfa enyigye adwen
Nye Ewuradze ayew, na oye:

name: MHB 18:2
title: John Milton, 1608-74
verse:
. N'ehumbɔbɔr tsim hɔ daa,
Osi pi yɛ nokwar daa.

name: MHB 18:3
title: John Milton, 1608-74
verse:
. Yɛmfa Ne dzin no ntahye,
Ɔyɛ enyame mu

name: MHB 18:4
title: John Milton, 1608-74
verse:
. Ɔno na ɔhyɛɛ ma kan
Baa wiadze a wɔayɛ n' fofor n'.

name: MHB 18:5
title: John Milton, 1608-74
verse:
. Ɔnyɛn atseasefo nyina,
Ɔma hɔn dza wohia nyina:

name: MHB 18:6
title: John Milton, 1608-74
verse:
. Ohyira hɔn a ɔapaw hɔn
Wɔ sar a etwie no do:

name: MHB 18:7
title: John Milton, 1608-74
verse:
. Afei yɛmfa enyigye adwen
Nyi Ewuradze ayɛw, na oye:

name: MHB 180:1
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.
verse:
. Kokwaa bi wɔ ekyirkyir noho, 
Kurow bi ban ekyir,
Hɔ na wɔsɛɛn Ewuradze a
Owui dze gyee hɛn nkwa n'.

name: MHB 180:2
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.
verse:
. Yennkotum yeehu, yɛakyerɛ yaw 
A ɔsɔwee no dur;
Na yɛgye dzi dɛ hɛn ntsi na
Ɔsɛɛn hɔ na owui.

name: MHB 180:3
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.
verse:
. Owui ma yeenya bɔnfakyɛ, 
Owui ma yaayɛ yie,
N' adehye bɔgya n' aagye hɛn,
Ewiei n' yaakɔ sor manm'.

name: MHB 180:4
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.
verse:
. Obi nnyihɔ a oye dɛ Ɔno 
Na oeetua  bɔn ho kaw n';
No nko na otum bue sor abow n'
Na ɔdze hɛn kɔ mu.

name: MHB 180:5
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.
verse:
. O, ɔdɔ bɛn na ɔadɔ hɛn 
Otwar dɛ yɛdɔ N' bi,
Yɛtwer No bɔgyaa a ɔapon hɛn n',
Yɛper yɛ no ndwuma.

name: MHB 181:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyame Eguambaa, yɛrekaa, 
Wo dɔ a woepira no n',
Fi sor noho gye hɛn do,
Na bohu hɛn mbɔbɔr:
Kaa hɛn a yɛdwen Wo ho;
Na gye kra biara a ɔreper;
O, yɛserɛ W', kaa Calvary,
Na ma yɛnkɔ asomdweem'!

name: MHB 181:23
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 182:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Moto m' enyi hwɛ anwanwa dua a 
Enyimnyam Hen no tɔɔr do n' a,
M' adze pa biara mummbu n' hwee,
M' ahopɔw nyina yɛ m' nkɔnkɔw.

name: MHB 182:23
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Mo Wura, ɔmpar me dɛ m' botuw, 
Gyedɛ m' Agyenkwa No wu  mu:
Egyangyandze a modɔ kɛse n',
Mobɔ n' afɔr ma No bɔgyaa.
 
. Hwɛ mbrɛ yaw na ɔdɔ rosɔn 
Ne tsir, Ne nsa, nye N' anan ho:
Dɛm dɔ na yaw yi mmbɔɔ mu pɛn,
Na nsoɛ kyɛw yi bi nnsoaa bi da.

name: MHB 182:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Wiadze nyina yɛ medze mpo a, 
N-kyɛ ɔyɛ akyɛdze a osuar koraa;
Dɔ nwanwa yi, Nyame dɔ yi,
Gye me kra, mo nkwa, m' adze nyina.

name: MHB 183:1
title: John Bowring, 1792-1872.
verse:
. CHRIST Mbeamudua no mu na mutuw;
Obunkam dza asɛɛ nyina do,
N-kwagyesɛm ne kan nyina
Gyina ne tsir fɛɛfɛw no do.

name: MHB 183:2
title: John Bowring, 1792-1872.
verse:
. Sɛ abrabɔ mu yaw to me,
Enyidar sa na suro ba a,
Mbeamudua no remmpa me da;
Ɔdze asomdwee na dɛw hyerɛn.

name: MHB 183:3
title: John Bowring, 1792-1872.
verse:
. Sɛ enyigye ewia dze kan
Nye dɔ hyerɛn wɔ mo kwan do a,
Mbeamudua no hyerɛn ka ho
Na ɔma da n' kan yɛ kɛse.

name: MHB 183:4
title: John Bowring, 1792-1872.
verse:
. Ɔsɛɛ, nhyira, yaw na enyigye,
Wɔtsew ho wɔ mbeanudua n' mu;
Hɔ asomdwee no, wonnsusu,
Enyigye a ɔwɔ dɔ daa a.

name: MHB 183:5
title: John Bowring, 1792-1872.
verse:
. CHRIST Mbeamudua no mu na mutuw;
Obunkam dza asɛɛ nyina do,
N-kwagyesɛm ne kan nyina
Gyina ne tsir fɛɛfɛw no do.

name: MHB 184:1
title: Venantius Fortunatus, c. 530-609;
verse:
. AHEN frankaa no dzi enyim 
Mbeamudua n' hyerɛn kwan nwanwa do;
Mbrɛ Nyia ɔyɛɛ hɛn n' bɛyɛɛ honam,
Ɔsoaa hɛn afɔdzi, tuaa hɛn kaw.

name: MHB 184:2
title: Venantius Fortunatus, c. 530-609;
verse:
. Bea a hɛn ntsi wɔwɔɔ no nkaamaa n'
Na nkwa esutsen fi ne mfem' pem; 
Bɔgya na nsu a edzi afora
No mu na wɔahohor hɛn ho.

name: MHB 184:3
title: Venantius Fortunatus, c. 530-609;
verse:
. Dza David kae nyina baa mu
Wɔ tsetse nkɔnhyɛ ndwom no mu;
Nyankopɔn kaa wɔ amanaman m'
Dɛ ofi dua n'do edzi konyim

name: MHB 184:4
title: Venantius Fortunatus, c. 530-609;
verse:
. O ahoɔfɛw dua, o kan dua!
O dua a wɔahyɛ ndwom no ahentar!
Dua soronko konyimdzifo a 
Honam krɔnkrɔn n' bɔhoom wo bom'.

name: MHB 184:5
title: Venantius Fortunatus, c. 530-609;
verse:
. W'abasa a atserɛw mu n' do
Na wiadze nkwagye durdur sɛn,
Na woetua adasa tsir kaw,
Na wɔasɛɛ ne sɛɛfo no so.

name: MHB 184:6
title: Venantius Fortunatus, c. 530-609;
verse:
. Wɔmfa enyidzi a ɔfata nyina
Mma Ɔdomankoma Ɔkorsa;
Hɔn a enam Wo mbeamudua n' do
Agye hɔn n', kora, dzi hɔn do daa.

name: MHB 185:1
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. ƆBAATAN werɛhonyi dze su
Gyinaa mbeamudua no ase,
Mbrɛ Ewuradze a oruwu n' sɛn;
Nna ne kra enyigye asa,
Ahoguan ama no werɛ ahow,
Ɔtse afowa a ehwira N' mu n' nka.

name: MHB 185:2
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. Ao, ɔbaataan siarfo! Afei
Mbrɛ yaw na awerɛhow ato no a!
Ne Ba a ɔwoo n' kor no ntsi:
Ɔhwɛ n'enyimnyam Ba no a
Ɔsɛn mbeamudua do no a,
Na yaw kɛse aka no.

name: MHB 185:3
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. Ohun Ba a woebu N'enyimtsia,
Wɔaka N' mpire, asoa N' nsoɛkyɛw,
Wɔ No nkorɔfo hɔn ntsi.
Ɔhwɛɛ N' kɛpeem dɛ wobuu N' fɔ!
No wu mu obiara paa No,
Na ogyaa No sunsum mu.

name: MHB 185:4
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. Jesus, ma n'etuhoakyɛ no 
Nkenyan me ma menyɛ dɛm bi;
Dɔba, Pomfo yamuyiefo,
Nkyɛ m'akoma eenya hyewbɔ fofor,
Na ɔdɔ mapa aahyɛ mu ma,
Ama meenya Wo nkyɛn kwan.

name: MHB 186:123
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Onyame dɔ! 'bɛn na ayɛ 'i? 
Bɛkyebo Nyame ewu ama m'!
Egya No domankoma Ba N'
Soaa mo bɔn nyina wɔ dua n' do;
Bɛkyebo Nyame ewu ama m'!
Mo Wura, mo Dɔ, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam'.
 
. Akwantsemfo nyina hom nhwɛ 
N-kwa na Asomdwee Hen ruwu!
Abɔn hom Bɔfo na oruwu 'il!
Aso yaw bi nye Nedze 'i sɛ?
Hom nye m' mbɔsɔ No bɔgyaa nhwɛ:
Mo Wura, mo Dɔ, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam'.
 
. Woeku No ama wo nye me, 
Ma yɛnye Nyame abɔ mu:
Hom ngye Nsɛmpa n' ara ndzi dɛ,
Jesus bɔgyaa pon hɛn nyina,
Fakyɛ pem Ne mfem' ma obiara;
Mo Wura, mo Dɔ, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam'.

name: MHB 186:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wɔmma yɛnko dua n' n' ase ha, 
Yɛmfa dɛw ndɔw yarsa nsu n' bi,
Yembu adze nyina ahwerdze,
Yengyaa hɛn akomam' mma No;
Mma yɛnndwen hwee, yɛnnka  hwee, dɛ
Mo Wura, mo Dɔ, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam'.

name: MHB 187:12
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Hom mbra ma yɛnka mmɔm kakra; 
Hom mbra Agyenkwa Ne nkyɛn ha;
Hom mbra ma yɛmbɔm', yɛnka mmɔm:
Hɛn Wura Jesus, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam.
 
. Worisi No atwetwe yi, 
Ana yennkosu ama No?
Ao! hwɛ mbrɛ ɔayɛ komm sɛn hɔ:
Hɛn Wura Jesus, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam.

name: MHB 187:3
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Wɔbɔɔ Ne nsa nye N' anan mu 
Ne men mu wewee, nsukɔm twaar No!
Mbusu dze sum hyɛɛenyi do:
Hɛn Wura Jesus, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam.

name: MHB 187:4567
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Ɔkaa ɔdɔ nsɛm mpɛn esuon; 
Ndɔnhwer ebiasa na ɔtaa dzinn
Serɛɛ mbɔbɔrhu maa adasa:
Hɛn Wura Jesus, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam.
 
. Ma yengyina mbeamudua n' ase, 
Na bɔgya a ofi Ne mfem' no,
Ɔbɔhor hɛn ho bɔn nyina:
Hɛn Wura Jesus, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam.
 
. Koma bobɔe na nyinsuwa, 
Wɔmmfa nnkam hɔn a wobisa;
Dɔ ahyɛse nye 'koma bobɔe:
Mo Wura Jesus, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam.
 
. Onyame dɔ! nyimpa no bɔn! 
Munnsu 'i asɔ hom tum ahwɛ;
Na Nyame dɔ edzi konyim:
Hɛn Wura Jesus, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam.

name: MHB 188:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 188:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 188:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔsɔree dua n' do,
Dze maa emi na ɔwo; 
Woetsie mpaabɔ n', ɔbɔnfo afa n' ho edzi, 
Ɔbɔnfo n' nye emi,
Na motwer Jesus,
Bɛgye fakyɛ a Nyame nnkotum dze akam.

name: MHB 188:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 189:1
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 189:2
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Eyɛɛ komm ndɔnhwer ebiasa n',
'Nye sum mu etumfo dzii aper;
Nyimpa bɔn daa Wo nko do,
Sum etwa Wo ho nyina ehyia,
Kodu dɛ aber n' bodu
Na Nyame Eguambaa ewu.

name: MHB 189:3
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Tsie Ne nkekam' dzendzen no a
Odua munumkum mu kɔ sor!
Ɔwo a 'yɛ Egya n' Ba kortoo n',
Ɔwo a Noara asera Wo ngo,
Ɔwo na ibisa No dɛ:
Ebɛn ntsi na apa me?

name: MHB 189:4
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Ewuradze, sɛ yaw nye suro
Dze sum kata me kra do a,
Ɔwo a edzi emia dɛm pɛɛn,
Ma Wodze annka ekyir n',
Da Wo su wenwen n' mu kyerɛ m',
Na meehu dɛ ebɛn m' sum m'.

name: MHB 19:
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
Enyimnyam nka Egya, nye Ba, 
      Nye Sunsum, Ebiasa Kor.   Amen.

name: MHB 19:
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
N' ehumbɔbor tsim hɔ daa, 
      Osi pi yɛ nokwar daa.

name: MHB 19:1
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
. Wonyi Nyame Hen ayɛw! 
Wɔmfa ayɛyindwom mbrɛ N';

name: MHB 19:2
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
. Wonyi N' ayɛw: ɔayὲ ewia, 
Dὲ ɔkɔ aprɔw daa daa nyina:

name: MHB 19:3
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
. Na eso ɔayɛ bosoom, 
Ma odu anafua a ɔhyerɛn:

name: MHB 19:4
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
. Wonhyira N' dὲ ɔtɔ nyankom, 
Ma ɔma edziban fifir:

name: MHB 19:56
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
. Na ɔma asaase pa so 
Oyi no ndɔbaa ma hɛn:
 
. Ɔama buber so aba, 
Ɔahyɛ hɛn asan mama:

name: MHB 19:7
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
. Ɔama edziban a ɔsen dɛm, 
Daa daa dɛw ho ahobadze:

name: MHB 19:8
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
. Enyimnyam nka, Hen dɔyɛfo 
Abɔdze nyina ntow enyimnyam,

name: MHB 190:1
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
. O ƆDƆ bra mapa!
Dza ntsi ogyaa N'ahengua
Wɔ sor bɛyɛɛ maa hɛn wɔ ha n',
Ne nyina abɔ adze.

name: MHB 190:2
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
. Dza Egya n' pɛ nyina, 
Edwuma n' biara annka, 
Ne berɛ na yaw, ɔyɛɛ n' nkorkor;
Kyerɛwsɛm no ahyɛ ma.

name: MHB 190:3
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
. Hɛn yaw biara nnyi hɔ a
No so ɔammfa mu bi;
Nyimpa yaw na adwen nyina
Ehwira N'akoma mu.

name: MHB 190:4
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
. Ne tsir do nsoɛ kyɛw no, 
Na Ne kra a bɔn nnyi mu;
Ɔsoaa hɛn bɔn na afɔdzi nyina,
Na ɔama yeedzi mu.

name: MHB 190:5
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
. Owuu ɔdɔ mapa m';
Owui, owuu maa me!
Afɔr a ɔpata bɔn nyina,
Metetar Wo gyedzi m'.

name: MHB 190:6
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
. Ohiaber biara mu,
Atsɛmbugua n' enyim,
Nyame Eguambaa, Wo ndwuma no 
Na hwɛ ho gye me nkwa.

name: MHB 190:7
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
. Mo Wura, yɛ mo mu edwuma,
Dɛ mbrɛ ayɛ ama m', 
Na ma mo dɔ nyɛ mbuae mma adom a 
Wo dɔ dze aba no.

name: MHB 191:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. NYAME a W'adom nnyi nhwɛdo,
Adasamba Gyefo,
Daa daa ayɛyi ho asɛm, 
Yehu W'amandzehu m';
Yɛda ho tow W' ndwom dɛɛdɛw, 
Yɛda ho yɛwɔ dɛw mu,
Yɛtow Abɔn Adamfo ndwom,
No dɔ yɛ fofor daa.

name: MHB 191:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yehu daa anwanwadze
Fi nwanwa dua no do,
Yehun dɛ wɔbɔɔ N' mbeamudua m',
Bea a yehu hɛn Bɔfo;
Owura Jesus, ayɛ dɛn?
Yɛbɔ Wo wu ho dawur,
Yegyina hwɛ, kotow, gye to m'.
'Dɔ bi nntse dɛ Wodze.

name: MHB 191:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 192:1
title: Henry Hart Milman, 1791-1868.
verse:
. Ko do  kɔ kan ahentum mu! 
N-tar saw abowa no do;
Tsena do, na eyɛ Ɔhen mu,
David ne Ba, wiadze Gyefo.

name: MHB 192:2
title: Henry Hart Milman, 1791-1868.
verse:
. Ko do  kɔ kan ahentum mu! 
Ɔwo na Sion rotweɔn Wo;
Wɔdze n-tar nye mberɛnkɔnson
Egu Wo kwan mu dɛ fa do.

name: MHB 192:3
title: Henry Hart Milman, 1791-1868.
verse:
. Ko do  kɔ kan ahentum mu! 
Ɔkatakyi, hell ne sɛɛfo;
'Wo na ibue sor ahenman
To hɔ petee ma Wo nkorɔfo.

name: MHB 192:4
title: Henry Hart Milman, 1791-1868.
verse:
. Ko do  kɔ kan ahentum mu? 
Dɔmtutuw fi sor rohwɛ Wo,
Dɛ 'rokɔbɔ afɔr huhu
Ana akɔko W' ahengua do.

name: MHB 192:5
title: Henry Hart Milman, 1791-1868.
verse:
. Ko do  kɔ kan ahentum mu! 
Wiadze nyina hɛn Enyidar!
Dzi nyim, brɛ hɛn 'komatɔmu,
Ndzeyɛtsenenee, ɔdɔ, nye siar.

name: MHB 193:12
title: Samuel Wesley, 1662-1735.
verse:
. Hwɛ adasa hɔn Agyenkwa 
Wɔ enyimguase dua n' ho!
Dɔ a ɔkaa N' ma okyii bɔgya
Wui maa wo n' so so pa!
 
. Tsie, ɔrepen! abɔdze rihim, 
Asaase rowosow;
Asɔrdan mu ntwamutam atsew,
Abotan repaapaa.

name: MHB 193:3
title: Samuel Wesley, 1662-1735.
verse:
. Oewie! wer a ho hia n' ɔatɔ; 
Ɔrekam', Gye Mo sunsum!
Hwɛ mbrɛ ɔabɔ Ne tsir adze,
Ɔabɔ n' adze ewu!

name: MHB 193:4
title: Samuel Wesley, 1662-1735.
verse:
. Na obobu wu apon mu ntsɛm, 
Na ɔahyerɛn enyimnyamm';
Nyame Eguambaa, yaw bɛn a,
Dɔ bɛn nye Wodze sɛ?

name: MHB 194:1
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 194:2
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 194:3
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Fow Calvary awerɛhow koko n';
Kɔkotow N'ananadze,
Hwɛ anwanwadze a osii,
Nyame abɔ afɔr ewie,
Tsie! Ɔreka m' dɛ oewie!
Sua Jesus hu mbrɛ wowu.

name: MHB 194:4
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 195:1
title: Isaac Watts,1674-1748; alt. by Martin Madan, 1726-90.
verse:
. OEWU! Abɔn Adamfo ewu!
Hwɛ! Salem mbabaa rusu No! 
Isum akata sor enyi,
Asaase wosow awerɛfir m;
Ahotsewfo, hom mbosu No,
Ohun amandze soaa hom adzesoa
Ɔtseaa m' na okyii nyinsuwa maa hom,
Ohuee No bɔgyaa gui maa hom.

name: MHB 195:2
title: Isaac Watts,1674-1748; alt. by Martin Madan, 1726-90.
verse:
. Ɔdɔ na yaw a onnyi kabea,
Enyimnyam Wura wu ma adasa!
Naaso hwɛ dɛw kɛse a menya!
Jesus a owui n' enyan bio!
Nyankopɔn asoɛr efi nda m';
Nda enntum annkora No do!
Abɔfo mpempem hyia No kwan,
Wɔyɛ no akɔaba kɔ sor.

name: MHB 195:3
title: Isaac Watts,1674-1748; alt. by Martin Madan, 1726-90.
verse:
. Ahotsewfo, hom ngyaa su na
Hom nka dɛ Gyefo no dzi hen;
Hom ntow ndwom d ɛ ɔasɛɛ hɛll dɔm n',
Ɔdze owu too mpokyerɛ mu.
Hom nka dɛ: Ɔhen, tsena ase daa!
Wɔwoo Wo Gyefo hoɔdzenfo!
Ɔsɛɛfo, wo tum no wɔ hen?
Ntuw wumaa, wo konyim n' wɔ hen?

name: MHB 196:1
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1769-1854.
verse:
. Yɛtow ayɛyindwom kamfo 
Jesus a owuu mbeamudua do n':
N-dzebɔnyɛfo enyidar;
Ne ntsi yemmbu wiadze yi hwee.

name: MHB 196:2
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1769-1854.
verse:
. Ne mbeamudua no kyerɛ petee 
Ma yehu dɛ Nyame nye dɔ:
Ɔsoa hɛn bɔn wɔ dua no do;
Ɔdze Nyame adom brɛ hɛn.

name: MHB 196:3
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1769-1854.

name: MHB 196:45
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1769-1854.
verse:
. Ɔma ohufo mbanyinndam; 
Ɔhyɛ okotoo dzen ma ɔko;
Ɔma kan hyerɛn hɛn wumpa do,
Mma yennsuro samanadze.
 
. O Jesus, Wo mbeamudua no yɛ 
Ɔbra ne dɛw, mbusu n' edur
N-dzebɔnyɛfo guandɔbea:
Abɔfo kamfo Wo dɔ daa.

name: MHB 197:1
title: Elizabeth Cecilia Clephane, 1830-69.
verse:
. JESUS mbeamudua n' ase
Na mepɛ dɛ migyina;
Ɔbotan kɛse bi nwin mu, 
Asaase a etwee do;
Ofi bi a ɔwɔ sar bi do,
Ɔkwan m' ahomgyebea,
Ewia ketee ne hyew ano,
Na da no n'adzesoa.

name: MHB 197:2
title: Elizabeth Cecilia Clephane, 1830-69.
verse:
. Jesus mbeamudua no do
M'enyi botum ehu
Nyimpa kor a oruwu no,
Ohun amandze maa me,
Mifi m'akoma m' kyi nyinsu,
Ka anwanwansɛm ebien;
Anwanwa dɔ ɔgyee me;
Na fata a memmfata.

name: MHB 197:3
title: Elizabeth Cecilia Clephane, 1830-69.
verse:
. O mbeamudua, wo nwin ase
Bɛyɛ me tsenabea!
Mimmbisa ewia ne kan biara
Dɛ N'enyim kan no nko,
Mo bo dwe dɛ migyaa wiadze,
Minnya adze, mohwer adze,
M'enyimguase ara nye mo bɔn,
M'enyimnyam nye mbeamudua n'.

name: MHB 198:1
title: Elizabeth Rundle Charles, 1828-96.
verse:
. YƐRONNKƆ nngya Wo mbeamudua,
Yerimmfi W'ananadze;
Wiadze mu ndzepa nnsɛ hwee,
Ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ wen ha yɛ dɛw.

name: MHB 198:2
title: Elizabeth Rundle Charles, 1828-96.
verse:
. Yɛhwɛ ha a, yehu hɛn bɔn, 
Yɛrohwɛ yeesua Wo dɔ;
Bɔn a ɔmaa wɔbɔɔ W' mbeamudua m',
Dɔ a ɔsoaa mbeamudua n' maa hɛn.

name: MHB 198:3
title: Elizabeth Rundle Charles, 1828-96.
verse:
. Ha, yesua ɔsom na ɔma, dzi
Dɛw dɛ yɛapa hɛnho ekyir;
Yenya ɔdɔ tsena ase ha,
Ha yenya gyedzi dze wu.

name: MHB 198:4
title: Elizabeth Rundle Charles, 1828-96.
verse:
. Fahodzi ho nsɛnkyerɛdze
Na hɛn som wɔ ha ka bɔ m';
Wo mbeamudua n' gyaa adaduafo.
Yɛyɛ mbeamudua n' ho akofo.

name: MHB 198:5
title: Elizabeth Rundle Charles, 1828-96.
verse:
. Yɛkɔ enyim dɛ yebotum,
'Yi na hɛn akoma hwehwɛ;
Bea a hɛn enyidado hyɛɛ ase,
Hɔ na yenya dza yɛpɛ.

name: MHB 198:6
title: Elizabeth Rundle Charles, 1828-96.
verse:
. Na yɛaka Kan Dɔm no ho,
Wo mu wɔagye hɛn koraa;
Wo mbeamudua n' tsew hɛn ho,
Dze hɛn ahenkyew gu W'enyim.

name: MHB 199:
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.
verse:
Mbeamudua n' mu, mbeamudua n' mu, 
       Na menhyehyɛ moho, 
       Nkɛpem dɛ me kra bɔhom 
       Wɔ esutsen n' ekyir hɔ.

name: MHB 199:1
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.
verse:
. Jesus, fa m' sie mbeamudua n' ho, 
Hɔ na nsu a ɔyɛ edur n'
Fi Calvary koko no do
Pem kwa ma obiara.

name: MHB 199:2
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.
verse:
. Mbeamudua n' ho na dɔ na adom 
Too me kra bɔbɔfo;
Adzekyee Nworaba hyɛnhyɛnn n'
Ne nserɛmɛn hyerɛɛn mo do.

name: MHB 199:3
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.
verse:
. Dza osii mbeamudua no ho n', 
Nyame Eguambaa, yi kyerɛ m';
Ao, boa me ma mennantsew
No nwin ase daa daa.

name: MHB 199:4
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.
verse:
. M' bɔweɔn matweɔn mbeamudua n' ho, 
Mahwɛ kan ekodu
Sika man no n' esuegya
Wɔ esutsen n' ekyir hɔ.

name: MHB 2:1
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.
verse:
. NYIMPA a hom wᴐ wiadze nyina,
Hom mfa enyigye ndze ntow ndwom:
Hom mfa nyi Nyankopᴐn ayεw;
Hom mbra N'enyim hom mbedzi dεw.

name: MHB 2:2
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: MHB 2:3
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: MHB 2:4
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: MHB 20:1
title: George Wither, 1588-1667
verse:
. AHOTSEWFO, hom mbra,
Hom nyi Otumfo n'ayɛw;
Hom mma yɛnyɛ adwen kor,
Akoma, ndze na akyen:
Abɔdze biara ntow bi,
Obiara nnka n'ano nnto m'.
Wɔmma ndzɛmba a wonnyi nkwa 
So mfa kommyɛ ntow ayɛyi.

name: MHB 20:2
title: George Wither, 1588-1667
verse:
. Adasamba so hom mbra,
Hom mbra ma yɛntow ndwom pa;
Na beebi a nyimpa ehyia n',
Hom ndzi adwontow enyim.
Hom mma Nyame ayɛyi 
Ndwom a ɔmmbɔ adze da do:
Ama hɛn ayɛyi ndwom
Aayɛ bɛkyebo dɛ Ɔno.

name: MHB 20:3
title: George Wither, 1588-1667
verse:
. Dɛm ntsi ofi sor dze nhyira
Bogu asaase nyina do;
Na wiadze tɛtɛr a yehu
Yɛ adwontofo asɔrdan kor;
Yɛbɛma hɛn ayɛyi ndwom
No atra mber na mbea nyina,
 Na afow edu sorsor
Otumfo kɛse n'asomu.

name: MHB 200:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. JESUS m' enyidar,
Wɔdze Wo maa me,
Dede na wɔdze dzii W'ekyir 
   kɔr Calvary do,
Bɔgya a ekyi no,
Ma ondzi mma me,
Ɔmpaa m' nka dɛ ewu ama Wo 'wudzifo no.

name: MHB 200:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Afei fi sor bra,
Yi m'akomadzen,
Fa Wo dɔ kɛse no bedzi 
M'akoma do;
Wo dɔ wɔ dua n' do n',
Da n' edzi kyerɛ me,
Na bɔn akowaa m'benya me fahodzi ber no.

name: MHB 200:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ahantan yɛ adze a
Wo mbeamudua no mmpɛ;
Na ɔnam bura a ofi Wo mfem' no mu,
Ma Wo nkwa bɔgya n'
Nyi m'adzesoa nyina,
Na ɔntsew me tsibowa ho, mfa m' 
   mbrɛ Nyankopɔn.

name: MHB 200:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Afei ma munhu
N'ayamuyie wɔ ase,
Ma ɔnhor mo ho na m'bɔhoa dɛ 
   esukwankyɛba,
Ma ɔntsew m'akoma m'
Na ɔnsesa me,
Owura, yɛ m' dɛ mbrɛ etse, wɔ wiadze yi mu.

name: MHB 200:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ber biara medze
Me mberɛwyɛ suma,
Na ma bɔgya no nyɛ mo ho edwuma dabaa;
Me Dzimafo, fa m'
Kyerɛ sor Egya n',
Na ewiei no twe me bɛn W'ahengua no ho.

name: MHB 201:1
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Bura bi wɔ hɔ bɔgya ma, 
Wɔtwee n' Immanuel mfem',
Na ndzebɔnyɛfo bɔtɔm' a,
Wɔyew hɔn ho fi nyina.

name: MHB 201:2
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Owifo no ɔdze dɛw hun 
Bura n' wɔ n' aber do;
Hɔ na kaansa mo ho yɛ nkɔw a,
M' bɔhor mo ho bɔn nyina.

name: MHB 201:34
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Nyame Eguambaa, Wo bɔgyaa 
No tum ɔnnkɛpa da,
Gyedɛ W' asɔrmba nyina enya nkwa,
Mma wɔnnkɛyɛ bɔn bio.
 
. Ofitsi dɛ me gyedzi hun 
Esu a ofi Wo mfem',
Onyame dɔ ayɛ mo ndwom,
Na ɔbɛyɛ edu wum'.

name: MHB 201:5
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Na owu ma me gyirama 
Yɛ komm da dɛtsem' a,
Me kra bɔtow ndwom dɛɛdɛw bi
Akamfo Wo wɔ sor.

name: MHB 202:1
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.
verse:
. O tsir Krɔnkrɔn, wopiraa Wo, 
Yaw mbordo hyɛɛ Wo do,
Wɔdze nsoɛ yɛɛ W' ahenkyɛw
Dze sii Wo atwetwe!
Mbrɛ W' enyim esi atow,
Ɔnam ahoguan ntsi;
Enyim a nkyɛ ɔkyɛn wi,
Hwɛ mbrɛ oesi enyam.

name: MHB 202:2
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.
verse:
. Enyimnyam nye nkwa Wura, 
Dɛw krɔnkrɔn bi a nkyɛ ewɔ a!
Mekenkan nsɛm nwanwa yi a
Dɛw ka m' dɛ 'yɛ medze.
W' awerɛhow n', W' ayamuhyehye n',
Abɔn nya mu mfaso;
Emi mbom na motoo mbra,
Ɔwo na inyaa wuyaw.

name: MHB 202:34
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.

name: MHB 203:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. BƆNYƐNYI bɛyɛ dɛn 
Ehu adasa Agyenkwa? 
Innkotum etsie me mpaabɔ? 
Eremmfa W'adom nndom me?
W'ehumbɔbɔr no wɔ hen?
Jesus dzin tum no wɔ hen?

name: MHB 203:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 203:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 203:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. 'Bɛn na ayɛ ama me? 
O dwen Calvary ho!
Nyimpa apen a isii n',
Muguan toa Wo wu kɛse n',
Tsie me kra wufo no su,
Yi, o yi mo bɔn fi hɔ!    Amen.

name: MHB 204:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. EWURADZE Christ asoɛr ndɛ: 
Alleluia!
Nyimpa nye abɔfo ka:
Alleluia!
Hom mma dɛw na ehurusi do:
Alleluia!
Ɔsor ntow, wiadze ngye do:
Alleluia!

name: MHB 204:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 204:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn enyimnyam Hen tse ase;
Owu, wo hwirom wɔ hen? 
Prɛko na owui gyee hɛn: 
Owu, wo konyim wɔ hen?

name: MHB 204:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 204:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn enyimnyam Hen siarfo!
N-kwa a onnyi ewiei nye dɛ
Yehu Wo, yɛtse Wo tum,
Na yɛkamfo, yɛdɔ Wo.

name: MHB 205:1234
title: Anonymous: Lyra Davidica. 1708;
verse:
. Jesus Christ asoɛr n-dɛ, 
	Hallelujah! 
Hɛn konyim dapɔn krɔnkrɔn, 
	Hallelujah!
Ogyaam wɔ Mbeamudua no do, 
	Hallelujah!
Dze poom hɛn a yɛayew no, 
	Hallelujah!
 
. Wɔmma yɛmfa ayɛyindwom,
Ntonton Christ, hɛn sor Hen a, 
Ɔsɔɔw Mbeamudua nye wumaa, 
Dze poon abɔn gyee hɔn nkwa n'. 
 
. Na amandze a ohunii n', 
Ɔdze nkwagye abrɛ hɛn; 
Afei odzi hen wɔ sor, 
Mbrɛ abɔfo tow ndwom daa. 
 
. Yɛntow ndwom mma hɛn Nyame, 
Nkamfo No dɔ afebɔɔ, 
Ɔsormba, hom nyi N' ayɛw, 
Egya, Ba, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn.

name: MHB 206:123
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
. Christ asoɛr o! Hallelujah! 
Hɛn konyim adamfo asoɛr.
Wonyi N' ayɛw! Hallelujah!
Christ asoɛr ewufo mu.
Hɛn 'koma dze ndaase tonton N',
Dɛ Ne kan ahyerɛn bio;
Yɛdze dɛw bu ntwɛr wɔ N' enyim,
Yɛsoɛr fi yaw na nyinsuam.
 
   Christ asoɛr o! Hallelujah! 
   Hɛn konyim adamfo asoɛr. 
   Wonyi N' ayɛw! Hallelujah! 
   Christ asoɛr ewufo mu. 
 
. Christ asoɛr! No wiadze abrabɔm' 
Awerɛhow nyina abɔ adze,
Ɔnam enyigye mbotsen mu
Asan aba nkwa mu bio;
Owu na hɛll akotow No;
Ɔasoɛr, oedzi konyim ndɛ
Abɔfo dzi N' ekyir roweɔn N'
'Nyimnyam abɔ N' abɔtsir.
 
. Christ asoɛr! ofitsi ndɛ dze 
Owu na hɛll remmen hɛn,
Yɛyɛ Christ dze, Wɔ No mu na
Yeedzi adze nyina do nyim;
Ekyingye na mbɔbɔryɛ nyina
Na suro abɔ adze;
Ndɛ da yi nye No wusoɛr da,
Hom mma yɛnsoɛr yɛnhyɛ fa.

name: MHB 207:1
title: Michael Weisse

name: MHB 207:2
title: Michael Weisse
verse:
. Nyia ɔdze No nkwa maa hɛn n', 
Ɔno a hɛn ntsi ɔsɔɔw ko n'
Ɔyɛ hɛn Mpataguan ndɛ;
Hɛn so dɛw tow ndwom dɛ:
                          Hallelujah!

name: MHB 207:3
title: Michael Weisse
verse:
. Nyia ɔsɔɔw obene nyina 
No werɛ hoow wɔ mbeamudua n' do n',
Ɔtse enyimnyam' wɔ sor ndɛ,
Odzi ma hɛn, tsie hɛn su.
                          Hallelujah!

name: MHB 207:4
title: Michael Weisse
verse:
. Ɔno a wɔnnto No kwan dzin, 
Ɔno a osianee kɔr hɛll,
Nyia katakyi too n' mpokyrɛ n'
Ndɛ wɔasoa N' 'henkyɛw wɔ sor.
                          Hallelujah!

name: MHB 207:5
title: Michael Weisse
verse:
. Ɔno a ɔdaa nda n' mu n' 
Wɔakrɔn No dɛ ɔngye nkwa;
Ndɛ wohua N' Christianman mu
Dɛ Eguambaa N' yɛ ahemfo Hen.
                          Hallelujah!

name: MHB 207:6
title: Michael Weisse
verse:
. Ndɛ ɔse yɛmbɔ n' dawur 
Mbrɛ abɔn besi enya nkwa,
Mbrɛ nnuhofo enya fakyɛ
Mbrɛ hɛn so bɛyɛ ahɛn sor,
                          Hallelujah!

name: MHB 207:7
title: Michael Weisse
verse:
. Hɛn Mpataguan N' nye W' ampa 
Christ, nyɛn Wo nkorɔfo ndɛ;
Yi hɛn bɔn na hɛn mfom kɔ,
Ma hɛn nyina atow ndwom dɛ:
                          Hallelujah!

name: MHB 208:1
title: John of Damascus, 8th cent.;
verse:
. OWUSOƐR da no nye yi, 
Wiadze nka wɔ mbea nyina;
Ahosɛpɛw Apaho,
Nyankopɔn Apaho n';
Yefi wu mu kɔ nkwa mu,
Yefi asaase kɔ Sor,
Hɛn Christ dze konyimdzi ndwom,
Na ɔdze hɛn aba.

name: MHB 208:2
title: John of Damascus, 8th cent.;
verse:
. Hɛn akoma mu ntsew bɔn ho,
Ama yeehu adze yie;
Ewuradze a ɔwɔ daa kan m';
Ɔwɔ owusoɛr kan m',
Na yetsie Ne ndze no yie a,
Yetse n' pefee, bɔkɔɔ,
Nedze nyina bɔ ose a wɔtse, 
Wɔtow konyimdzi ndwom.

name: MHB 208:3
title: John of Damascus, 8th cent.;
verse:
. Afei ma ɔsor enyi ngye,
Ma asaase ndwom nhyɛ ase;
Wiadze tɛtɛr ndzi konyim,
Na dza ɔwɔ mu nyina;
Dza wohu na dza wonnhu
Ntow enyigye ndwom pa:
Na Christ Ewuradze asoɛr,
Hɛn dɛw a onnyi ewiei.

name: MHB 209:1
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.
verse:
. N-KWA kan ntsaban do,
Anapa tutuutu,
Na ɔbɔfo no bae
Bepireew ɔbo n' fii hɔ.
    Hom nyɛ kor mma hom ndze do yie,
    Ntonton Nyia ɔasoɛr efi owu m' no.

name: MHB 209:2
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.
verse:
. Aweɔmfo a wɔbɛn No n'
Hun kan n', tsee ndze nwanwa n',
Suro m' wotwaa hwee famu birim!!
Woguu famu dɛ ewufo.

name: MHB 209:3
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.
verse:
. Na Ɔnodze ɔsoɛɛr bum
Fii ewufo nda mu a 
Enyiwa ennhu No,
Sor na asaase Wura.

name: MHB 209:4
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.
verse:
. Ne kan ho mbofraba,
Hom nsoɛr, hom nye No nsoɛr;
Hwɛ mbrɛ woraba no 
Rehyerɛn wɔ wimu hɔ!

name: MHB 209:5
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.
verse:
. Oegyaa ndzɛmba adadaw
Nyinara wɔ nda n' mu;
Wosie ɔwo na Ɔno a,
'Nye no ntsena nkwa mu.

name: MHB 209:6
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.
verse:
. O Ewuradze krɔnkrɔn,
Yɛtow Wo ndwom ndɛ da 'i, 
Yɛdze hɛn akoma nyina 
Ma Wo, eyɛ hɛndze.

name: MHB 21:1
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99
verse:
. KAMFO Abraham Nyame,
Nyia odzi hen wɔ sor,
Nyia ofi tsetse tse ase,
Ɔdɔ Nyame.
Nyame Kɛse MARA! 
Sor na asaase gye to m';
Mokotow hyira dzin krɔnkrɔn n'
Wɔ afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 21:10
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99
verse:
. Nyame a odzi hen sor,
Bɔfo mpanyimfo tow;
Wɔtsea m'Krɔnkrɔn, Krɔnkrɔn, Krɔnkrɔn,
Ɔhen Tumfo!
Mbrɛ ɔtse n' ɔnnsesa,
Na ɔbɛyɛ dɛm daa:
Jehovah, Egya, Kɛse MARA,
Yɛkotow Wo.

name: MHB 21:11
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99
verse:
. Agyenkwa n'enyim hɔ,
Hɔn a wɔapon hɔn kotow;
N'adom kɛse tɔ hɔn bobor,
Daa daa nyina:
Ɔkyerɛ No dɔ akam,
Wokua ogya no mu,
Wɔpaa m'ka wo wiadze nyina,
Eguaambaa no.

name: MHB 21:12
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99
verse:
. Konyimdzi dɔm nyina
Da ɔsor Nyame ase,
Hua Egya, Ba nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn!
Wɔtsea mu daa.
Hua Abraham Nyankopɔn!
Meka ɔsorfo ho;
Ahoɔdzen na tum nyina yɛ W'dze,
Ntonton a ɔmmbɔ adze.     Amen.

name: MHB 21:2
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99
verse:
. Kamfo Abraham Nyame,
Ɔno a ɔhyɛ mbra,
Mosoer fi famu hwehwɛ enyigye
Wɔ Ne nyimfa.
Mopow wiadze nyina:
Ne nyansaa, dzin na tum,
Na medze No ye me kyɛfa,
Me kyɛm, m'aban.

name: MHB 21:3
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99
verse:
. Kamfo Abraham Nyame,
Nyia N'adom no dɔɔ so;
Obegya m'menyigye nda mu,
M'akwan nyina m',
Ɔfrɛ sunsuma N'afɛ,
Frɛ Noho me Nyame;
Na ɔnam Jesus bɔgyaa do
bɛgye me nkwan.

name: MHB 21:4
