title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99
verse:
. Ɔaka Noho ntam bi,
Migyina Ne ntam no do:
Wɔbɔsoa m' ɔkɔr ntsaban do,
Afow akɔ sor;
Hɔ na m'bohu N'enyim,
Mibedzi No tum nyi,
Na matow N'adom nwanwa ho
Ndwom afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 21:5
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99
verse:
. Sɛ bɔbea ahoɔdzen sa,
Na asaase wɔ hɔ a,
Canaan nkowaa do m'enyi kyerɛ
Wɔ N'asɛm ntsi.
Menam n-su bun mu,
M'enyi tsim Jesus do;
Na menam sar huuhu no do a,
Mokɔ mo kwan.

name: MHB 21:6
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99
verse:
. Muhu asaase pa a
Nhyira pii wɔ do no;
Asaase a fahodzi na daa
'Homgye wɔ do:
Numfunsu, wo, pem do,
Ngo na nsa ebu do,
Na nkwa ndua nyin prɔmm wɔ do daa,
Mbɔbɔrhu mu.

name: MHB 21:7
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99
verse:
. Ewuradze Hen tse hɔ,
Ewuradze hɛn Tsenenee,
Oedzi wiadze na bɔn do nyim,
Asomdwee Hen;
Zion bepɔw no do,
N'ahendzi tsim hɔ daa,
Ɔnye N'ahotsewfo hyerɛn kan m',
Odzi hen daa.

name: MHB 21:8
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99
verse:
. Ɔhwɛ Nedze do yie,
Ɔkora hɔn ntar pa fitaa dɛ
N'ayefor pa:
Ɔdze nsu a woehyira do,
Ɔdze ndua a ɔyɛ fɛw,
Ɔdze Paradisè nduadzewa,
Nyina ma hɔn.

name: MHB 21:9
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99
verse:
. Korsa kɛse n'enyim
Wogyina ruhuhor No,
Na woka anwanwadze a oaye,
Hɔn asaase do:
Ɔsormba no tsie bi,
Wɔma Ne dzin tahye;
Na wɔtow ndwom a ɔmmbɔ adze da,
Dzin nwanwa no.

name: MHB 210:1
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546
verse:
. 'WU ahoma kyekyeer Jesus ho
Wɔ hɛn nyinara bɔn ntsi;
Afei ogyina Nyame nyimfa,
Ofi sor dze nkwa brɛ hɛn,
Ntsi ma hɛn enyi ngye yie;
Yɛmfa ndaase ntow Nyame ndwom,
Alleluia ndwom dzendzen!
	Alleluia

name: MHB 210:2
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546

name: MHB 210:3
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546

name: MHB 210:4
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546
verse:
. 'Wusoɛr da 'i hom mma yɛnhyɛ fa 
Wɔ nokwar sor Edziban n' ho;
Adom asɛm no ahohor
Etsiɔdzen mbɔrkaw dadaw n',
Christ nko bɛnyɛn hɛn akra,
Ɔyɛ hɛn edziban nye nsa;
No nko do na gyedzi gyina
	Alleluia!

name: MHB 211:1
title: Robert Lowry, 1826-99.
verse:
. ƆDAA nda no mu komm,
Jesus, m'Agyenkwa,
Rotweɔn adzekyee no,
Jesus, mo Wura.

name: MHB 211:2
title: Robert Lowry, 1826-99.
verse:
. Ɔasoɛr efi nda no mu,
Oedzi N'atamfo nyina do nyim;
Ɔsoɛɛr dɛ konyimdzifo fii samanadze,
Na ɔtse ase daa nye N'ahotsewfo dzi hen:
Christ asɔɛr! Hallelujah! Christ asoɛr!

name: MHB 211:3
title: Robert Lowry, 1826-99.
verse:
. Wɔweɔɔn Ne nda no gyan,
Jesus, m'Agyenkwa,
Wɔtoow Ne nda no kwa,
Jesus, mo Wura.

name: MHB 211:4
title: Robert Lowry, 1826-99.
verse:
. Owu enntum annkora N',
Jesus, m'Agyenkwa,
Obubuu adaban mu, 
Jesus, mo Wura.

name: MHB 212:1
title: Venantius Fortunatus, c. 530-609;
verse:
. ENYIGYE da, akɔaba! Mfesantsen nyina nka;
Wɔaka owu ahyɛ, yeenya ahenman n' ndɛ!
Ewufo tse ase, Nyame tse hɔ daa!
Abɔdze hɔn Bɔfo pa a hɔn nyina sɔr No
   Enyigye da, akɔaba! Mfesantsen nyina nka.

name: MHB 212:2
title: Venantius Fortunatus, c. 530-609;
verse:
. Asaase a oenya efuw fofor no ka dɛ, 
No Wura No soɛr n' dze akyɛdze pa nyina ba; 
N-kyɛkyɛr do nhyiren, ndubaa do nhaban,
Dze kyerɛ dɛ N'awerɛhow etwa m' oedzi nyim.

name: MHB 212:3
title: Venantius Fortunatus, c. 530-609;
verse:
. Ɔwo a eyɛ nkwa Mafo faa owu mu,\
Efaa sum kwan n' do dze kyerɛɛ Wonkwagye tum;
Afei Nokwafo, dzi W'anohoba n' do,
Wo ndaansa da nye yi; Ewuradze, soeɛr.

name: MHB 212:4
title: Venantius Fortunatus, c. 530-609;

name: MHB 213:1
title: Edmond Louis Budry
verse:
. ENYIMNYAM nka Wo, Ɔba a asoɛr,
Edzi owu do konyim a onnyi ewiei,
Abɔfo a wɔhyɛ ntar hyɛnyɛn pireew ɔbo n'.
Bea a edae no na wɔdze Wo ntar no gui.
     Enyimnyam nka Wo, Ɔba a asoɛr,
     Edzi owu do konyim a onnyi ewiei.

name: MHB 213:2
title: Edmond Louis Budry

name: MHB 213:3
title: Edmond Louis Budry

name: MHB 214:1
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
. ƆKRA siarfo, nyan ɛ, nyan ɛ!
Ewuradze asoɛr dada; 
Fa ehurusi ndwom kɔ Ne nda n' do,
W'akoma bedzi dɛw.

name: MHB 214:2
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
. N-kwa rinyan nyimpa nyina yi,
Ɔdɔ ndwom gu do yi,
Wobenya nhyiren fɛɛfɛw bi 
Wɔ nkwa bura no do.

name: MHB 214:3
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
. Ɔbra mu sum kebii n' apa,
N-dɛ wusoɛ da yi;
Christ mu, ewufo nnyi hɔ bio,
Adakamaa nnyi tum.

name: MHB 214:4
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
. Yɛtse Christ mu, yɛda Christ mu,
Yenyan, yɛsoɛr Christ mu,
Na nyinsuwa yaayaw a owu ma n',
Christ bɛpepa ne nyina.

name: MHB 214:5
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
. Dɛm a ɔkra siarfo, nyan ɛ!
Par w' Ewuradze a ɔasoɛr n'; 
Nya enyigye wɔ No wusoɛr mu,
Awerɛhyɛm' wɔ N'asɛm m'.

name: MHB 214:6
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
.  Akwan nyina m' ma w'abrabɔ 
Nyɛ ndaase afebɔɔ;
W'enyigyesɛm, W'ayɛyi ndwom,
Christ wui na ɔsoɛɛr maa m'.

name: MHB 215:12
title: Anonymous, c. 12th cent;

name: MHB 215:34
title: Anonymous, c. 12th cent;

name: MHB 216:1
title: Christian Furchtegott Gellert, 1715-69.
verse:
. Christ tse ase! afei Owu, 
Wo hu nnkotum etu hɛn bo;
Christ tse ase! yi ma yehu
Dɛ samanadze nnkɛmen hɛn.
                        Alleluia!

name: MHB 216:2
title: Christian Furchtegott Gellert, 1715-69.
verse:
. Christ tse ase! sor nye asaase 
Tum nyina wɔdze ama No;
Hɛn so yɛbɔkɔ Ne nkyɛn,
Yɛnye N' ekedzi Hen sor hɔ.
                        Alleluia!

name: MHB 216:3
title: Christian Furchtegott Gellert, 1715-69.
verse:
. Christ tse ase! hɛn ntsi owui; 
Dɛm ntsi yɛbɛtsena ama No,
Yɛatsew nyɛe nye adwen ho,
Yɛdze hɛn bra eyi N' ayɛw.
                        Alleluia!

name: MHB 216:4
title: Christian Furchtegott Gellert, 1715-69.
verse:
. Christ tse ase! yenyim ampa 
Dɛ hwee nnkɛpaa hɛn No dɔ ho;
Wu o, n-kwa o, samanadze o,
Nnkɔtwe hɛn efi No ho da.
                        Alleluia!

name: MHB 216:5
title: Christian Furchtegott Gellert, 1715-69.
verse:
. Christ tse ase! afei owu 
Yɛ onnyiewiei nkwa abotsen;
Yi bɛka hɛn bo atɔm',
Ber a wu no sum bɔtɔ hɛn.
                        Alleluia!

name: MHB 217:1
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. HOM akra a hom hwehwɛ Ewuradze,
Hom ntow hom suro nyina ngu;
Na hom nkotow na hom mbɔhwɛ
Bea a wɔdze Jesus toe.

name: MHB 217:2
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Dɛm na wɔbrɛɛ N-kwa Wura ase,
Dɛm na ɔdɔ tum yɛ;
M-fe a okyii bɔgya maa wo n',
Daa owu mu ara komm.

name: MHB 217:3
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 217:4
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Ne tsir a woemmbu no bi no,
Ɔakrɔn n' wɔ abɔfo do;
Nyia ɔnye ewufo tsenae no 
Dzi Ne hen afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 217:5
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Ahotsewfo dze enyigye
Bɔhwɛ Ne nda pan n' mu;
Wɔnye hɔn Wura bɔsoɛr akɔ
Kan a ɔmmbɔ adze n' mu.

name: MHB 218:1
title: John Mason, 1645-94.
verse:
. EKYIR tamfo, enyim bun a,
Hɛn dɔm dze 'kokodur etwa po n';
Na Pharoah dɔm atotɔ mpoano,
Na Israel enya fahodzi.

name: MHB 218:10
title: John Mason, 1645-94.
verse:
. Ne nyimfa wɔ hɛn do,
Ɔbɛɛkyerɛ hɛn kwan;
Christ edzi hɛn enyim kan,
Christianfo nka N' do!

name: MHB 218:2
title: John Mason, 1645-94.
verse:
. Hom nyina mmema hom ndze do!
Wiadze nyina abɔ m' ridzi dɛw!
Ewuradze edzi konyim!
Ewuarde bedzi hen daa daa.

name: MHB 218:3
title: John Mason, 1645-94.
verse:
. Ɔkyena hɛn yaw\nBɛdan enyigye,
Asomdwee bɛba!
Nkowaasom bɔ adze,
Ɔdɔ bɛba
'Saase do !

name: MHB 218:4
title: John Mason, 1645-94.
verse:
. Wɔasɔw ano,
Aweɔmfo weɔn
N'efiadze nda no;
Wɔasɛɛ nsɔwano n',
'Weɔmfo apetse,
Christ asoɛr ndɛ!

name: MHB 218:5
title: John Mason, 1645-94.
verse:
. Onnyi dɛ abefo su bio,
Wɔfrɛ hɔn a woetwa m' ewufo;
Na owu adan hɛn n-da,
Na adakamaa biara adan mpa.

name: MHB 218:6
title: John Mason, 1645-94.
verse:
. Prɛko bio
Eden pon
Ebue ama nyimpa ehu;
Christ asoɛr, na nyimpa so bɔsoɛr!

name: MHB 218:7
title: John Mason, 1645-94.
verse:
. Afei koraa,
Dadaw twa m',
'Nyidar, dɛw, 'somdwee, hyɛ ase;
Christ edzi nyim, yebedzi nyim.

name: MHB 218:8
title: John Mason, 1645-94.

name: MHB 218:9
title: John Mason, 1645-94.
verse:
. Mbrɛ hɛn frankaa gya hɛn n',
Yɛbɔkɔ sɔkyee;
Mbrɛ hɛn Hen dzi hɛn kan n',
Yebehyia tamfo n'.

name: MHB 219:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. NYAME dze konyimdzi
Ndwom afow kɔ sorsor;
Ɔsor totorbɛnto
Da abɔfo dɛw edzi!
   Hom nye wiadze nyina mbɔ m' ndzi dɛw
   Hom mfa enyimnyam nhyɛ Enyimnyam Hen.

name: MHB 219:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyame a nna ɔyɛ nyimpa,
Odzi hen sor ma hɛn;
Hom mma aman nyinara nhu
Hɛn Jesus konyim dɔ n'.

name: MHB 219:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Egya n' dzi tum nyina 
Ama hɛn Ewuradze;
Abɔfo tonton No,
Odzi hen daa wɔ sor.

name: MHB 219:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. N'ahengua krɔnkrɔn n' do
Odzi tum tsenenee mu,
N'atmfo bɛmemem,
Ewuwu N'ananadze.

name: MHB 219:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛnye N' wɔ atamfo kor,
'Bɔnsam, wiadze, nye bɔn;
Na obetsia hɔn do
Na ɔdze N'ahendzi aba.

name: MHB 219:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Kɛpem dɛ afei wɔayɛ 
Wiadze bea a ɔtsen fofor n',
Yɛnye sordɔm aabɔ m'
Atow ayɛyi ndwom.

name: MHB 22:1
title: Howard Kinsbury, c. 1850.
verse:
. HOM mbra ma yɛmbɔ m'yɛntow ndwom:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
Sor na asaase mfa ayɛyi mbra:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
Ɔkra biara nnyan mfi bɔn mu,
Ntow ndwom dɛɛdɛw wɔ n'akoma m',
Na Jesus ntsi ɔntow ndwom dɛ:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!

name: MHB 22:2
title: Howard Kinsbury, c. 1850.
verse:
. Hom nka no wiadze beebiara:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
Yenya hɛn nkwagye wɔ Christ mu:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
No bɔgyaa hor hɛn bɔn nyina;
No Sunsum dan hɛn sum no kan,
Na ɔma hɛn kra dze dɛw ka:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!

name: MHB 22:3
title: Howard Kinsbury, c. 1850.
verse:
. Mbrɛ hɛn kyɛfa dua yɛ enyigye a!
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
N'anohoba ma hɛn enyigye:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
Adzekyee ɔyɛ Ewia na Kyɛm,
Anagò ɔbɛn hɛn ntamadan,
Ɔbɛka hɛn ho aber nyina:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!

name: MHB 22:4
title: Howard Kinsbury, c. 1850.
verse:
. Yɛbɔtow ndwom bi wɔ Zion:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
Nyew, yɛbɛtsea mu atow ndwom:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
Ber a mbersantsen rutwa m' akɔ,
Ɔnye ɔsor dɔm nyinara,
Yɛbɔkɔ do atow ndwom dɛɛdɛw
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!

name: MHB 220:1
title: Henry More, 1614-87.
verse:
. NYANKOPƆN afow kɔ sorsor, 
Alleluia!
Ɔdze totorbɛnto dɛw ndze, 
Alleluia
Na ɔtse N'ahengua m' wɔ sor, 
Alleluia!
Odzi wiadze nyinara do, 
Alleluia!

name: MHB 220:2
title: Henry More, 1614-87.
verse:
. Ɔdze Ne nyimpadua kɔree, 
Alleluia!
N'amandzehu 'piretua wɔ n' ho, 
Alleluia
Ɔdze kɛkyerɛɛ ɔsor mba no, 
Alleluia!
Ɔyɛ enyimnyam sen nworaba. 
Alleluia!

name: MHB 220:3
title: Henry More, 1614-87.
verse:
. Dɛm ntsi Ewuradze, bue hɛn adwen m',
Alleluia!
Kɔ hɛn man ankasa no ho,
Alleluia!
Na dwira hɛn ho afebɔɔ,
Alleluia!
Ma yaafata bea krɔnkrɔn no.
Alleluia!

name: MHB 221:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hwɛ da a Christ fowee kɔr sor; 
	Alleluia! 
Ma hɛn enyi egyina N' 
	Alleluia!
Ɔannkyɛr adasamba nkyɛn, 
	Alleluia!
Na ɔasan kɔ no sor fie.  
	Alleluia!

name: MHB 221:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wɔrotweɔn wɔabɔ No se:
M-botsen n' mma hɔn tsir do; 
Hom nyina mbuebue petee, 
Ma Enyimnyam Hen n' nkɔ mu.

name: MHB 221:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Kaansa ɔahɛn ɔsor mpo a,  
Ɔda ho dɔ nyimpamba; 
Ɔasan kɔ N' ahenguam' mpo a, 
Ɔda ho frɛ hɛn Nedze.

name: MHB 221:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hwɛ! ɔama Ne nsa do sor,  
Hwɛ! No dɔ epiratua n'; 
Tsie! N' anofamfa kasa 
N-hyira gu N' Asɔr do.

name: MHB 221:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, sɛ afow kɔ sor,  
Afa wim' ekyir noho a, 
Ma hɛn so hɛn akoma 
Nka Wo do nkɔ Nyame manm'.

name: MHB 222:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. HEN Ewuradze asoɛr efi wu m'!
Hɛn Jesus afow akɔ sor,
Ɔafa hɛll etumfo n' ndɔmmum
Dze hɔn kɔ sor abobowano.
Hallelujah!

name: MHB 222:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. No konyim tseaseanam tweɔn hɔ,
Na abɔfo tow ndwom kamfo N'
Ahenman m' mbobow hom mbuebue,
Hom tsetse apon, hom nyina mbuebue.
Hallelujah!

name: MHB 222:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Buebue Wo ndadzeban nyina,
Na hom mma sor hyerɛn nda edzi;
Adan akɛse 'i yɛ Nedze,
Hom mma Enyimnyam Hen n' mbra mu.
Hallelujah!

name: MHB 222:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Woana nye Enyimnyam Hen yi?
Nyia oedzi hɛn nyina atamfo do n',
Oedzi wiadze, bɔn, wu, hɛll do;
Konyimdzinyi n' dzin nye Jesus.
Hallelujah!

name: MHB 222:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hwɛ! No konyim tseaseanam tweɔn,
Na abɔfo tow awɔse ndwom';
Ahenman m' mbobow' hom mbuebue,
Hom tsetse apon, hom nyina mbuebue.
Hallelujah!

name: MHB 222:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 223:1
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.
verse:
. Hwɛ Konyimdzifo n' afow sor, 
Hwɛ Hen n' ahyɛ N' ahentar
Dze Ne tseaseanam fua do
Rokɔ No sor ahemfie;
Tsie! sor adwontow kuw ruhur
Hallelujah enyigyem',
Na sor mbotsen no ebuebue
Regye hɔn sor Hen akɔm'.

name: MHB 223:234
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.
verse:
. Woana na ɔreba 'nyimnyam mu 
Ma ehurusi mbɛn ka do 'i?
Ɔko Wura, dɔm Nyankopɔn.
Ɔno na oedzi konyim
Ɔno a ɔsɔɔw mbeamudua do fona
Ɔno a ofi ndam' soɛree,
Ɔaka bɔn na Satan egu,
Nam wu do asɛɛ N' atamfo.
 
. Ɔama hɛn nyimpasu no do 
Fi fuam' kɔ Nyame nyimfa;
Ɔsor hɔ na yɛbɛtsena,
Yɛnye N' egyina 'nyimnyam mu:
Jesus dzi hen, abɔfo sɔr N';
Nyame Nyimpa tse ahenguam'
Ewuradze Tumfo, Wo sorkɔm'
Yɛdze gyedzi hu hɛndze.
 
. Enyimnyam nka Egya Nyame; 
Enyimnyam nka Nyame Ba a,
Oewu, ɔasoɛr na ɔafow sor,
Ɔno a oenya sor ahenman n'
Enyimnyam nka Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn;
Nye Nyame Baasa Kor no
Enyimnyam a onnyi ewiei nka
Hɔn wɔ sor nye asaase.

name: MHB 224:12
title: Cecil  Frances Alexander, 1823-95.
verse:
. Sika mbotsen no ebuebue, 
Kwan ada mu petee;
Enyimnyam Hen no ahɛn mu,
Ɔkɔ N' Egya Ne nkyɛn.
 
. Ewuradze, edzi hɛn kan, 
'Rekɛpɛ hɛn tsenabew,
Ama yeekefir mbrɛ ewɔ,
Na yeehu Nyame enyim.

name: MHB 224:3
title: Cecil  Frances Alexander, 1823-95.
verse:
. Dɛm n-tsi enyimnyam hyerɛn 
Hɛn kwan do wɔ asaase;
Fua a osiiw W' hɛn enyi do n',
Kan fi sor hotse no.

name: MHB 224:4
title: Cecil  Frances Alexander, 1823-95.
verse:
. Ma hɛn 'koma nye adwen do, 
Fa W' adom pa n' dom hɛn,
Na yɛnenam asaase ha 'i,
Hɛn 'koradze ada sor.

name: MHB 224:5
title: Cecil  Frances Alexander, 1823-95.
verse:
. Na hɛn enyidar na dɔ eegyina 
Nyame nyimfa mbrɛ 'tse n'.
Tsena hɛn mu na ndaamba hɛn so
Yaatsena Wom' afebɔɔ.   Amen.

name: MHB 225:1
title: Anonymous, c. 5th cent.; tr. by James Russell Woodford, 1820-85.
verse:
. CHRIST, etsé enyimnyam nyina mu;
Hen katakyi a egye nkwa!
Wo wu edzi owu do konyim,
Wosiee Wo, n’ asɛɛ ‘Wumaa.

name: MHB 225:2
title: Anonymous, c. 5th cent.; tr. by James Russell Woodford, 1820-85.
verse:
. Sesei akͻ beebi ekenya
Dza adasa tum nnkenya;
Este bɛkyebo ahengua n’ do.
‘Dzi hen W‘Egya No tum mu.

name: MHB 225:3
title: Anonymous, c. 5th cent.; tr. by James Russell Woodford, 1820-85.
verse:
. Ha W'ahenman nyina nkotow Wo,
Heaven na asaase nyina,
Na hell bun dzé ahopopo twa
Hwe W’enyim wͻ nkogu mu.

name: MHB 225:4
title: Anonymous, c. 5th cent.; tr. by James Russell Woodford, 1820-85.
verse:
. Ewuradze, hɛn akoma mu tonton
Pem dzi W’ekyir kͻ sorsor;
Yeresérɛ W’adom yi tsie hɛn,
Twe hɛn akra kͻ W‘ nkyɛn sor hͻ.

name: MHB 225:5
title: Anonymous, c. 5th cent.; tr. by James Russell Woodford, 1820-85.
verse:
. Ntsi sɛ ehyérɛn W‘enyimnyam no mu
Bio sor mununkum no mu a.
Ma Wo nguan yengyina W'enyim
De yɛyɛ Wodze daapem.

name: MHB 225:6
title: Anonymous, c. 5th cent.; tr. by James Russell Woodford, 1820-85.
verse:
. Wonhua Jesus! Yegye Wo dzi,
Dɛ aman nyina bͻtonton Wo,
Ͻwo a enye Sunsum kor tse
W’Egya No tum mu daapem.

name: MHB 226:1
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.
verse:
. 'HOTSEWFO, hom nhwɛ enyimnyam dze n'!
Hom nhwɛ yaw Nyimpa n' sesei,
Oedzi nyim ɔko n' mu aba fie;
Nkotodwe nyina nkotow No,
Wɔnhyɛ N' ahenkyɛw! Ahenkyɛw 
Fata Konyimdzifo N' tsir.

name: MHB 226:2
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.

name: MHB 226:3
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.
verse:
. Abɔn nam atwetwesi m' hyɛɛ
Agyenkwa no ahenkyɛw;
'Hotsewfo na abɔfo hyia N' ho,
Bɔ No abɔdzin, yi N' ayɛw, 
Hom nhyɛ N' ahenkyɛw na hom nhua N',
'Hemfo Hen, ewuranom Wura!

name: MHB 226:4
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.

name: MHB 227:1
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769.
verse:
. KONYIMDZI Hen, 'nyimnyam Ewuradze,
Woesi Wo hen wɔ kan mu;
Ɔsor nyina twa hwe W'enyim,
Wo tum tserɛw kɔ ekyir;
Onnyi dɛ mohwe W'enyim,
Na m'akoma bɔ hwinhwim, 
Ber a W'enyimnyam a ofi tsetse n'
Afei woeyi akyerɛ yi.

name: MHB 227:2
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769.
verse:
. Sɛ mohwɛ Wo a 'rofow wɔ ekyir
Kɔ ahengua n' n'enyimfa,
Hu dɔm a wɔrokotow W'enyim
Dze ndze dɛw riyi Wo ayɛw a, 
Onnyi dɛ W'ananadze
Ha motow abɔfo ndwom n' bi,
Na midzi dɛw, sor wosow
Wɔ me hen No konyim mu?

name: MHB 227:3
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769.
verse:
. Tum na Sunsum a ebu do no,
Bi nhue ngu mo so mo do;
Mo Wura, sɛɛ akwambew nyina,
Yɛ W'atamfo ananadzegua!
Mpo, ma wiadze ano noho
Ntse Wo tum tsenenee no,
Ma W'enyim kwan nyɛ petee;
Dzi akoma nyina do hɛn.

name: MHB 227:4
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769.

name: MHB 228:1
title: John Bakewell, 1721-1819.
verse:
. JESUS 'Wo a wobuu W' nyimtsia, mbo!
Galilee Hen, yɛma W' mbo!
Ihun amandze dze poon hɛn;
Edze nkwagye brɛɛ hɛn kwa,
Agyenkwa mandzehufo, mbo!
Esoaa hɛn bɔn na hɛn fɛr!
Wo ndwuma pa m' yenya enyimpa;
Yenya nkwa wɔ Wo dzin mu.

name: MHB 228:2
title: John Bakewell, 1721-1819.

name: MHB 228:3
title: John Bakewell, 1721-1819.

name: MHB 228:4
title: John Bakewell, 1721-1819.
verse:
. Ɔsom nyimnyam, tum, na nhyira
Efata dɛ egye ne nyina;
Ayɛyi kɛse a ɔmmbɔ adze,
Ɔsɛ hɛn dɛ yɛdze ma,
Sor abɔfo hyɛnhyɛnn, hom mboa!
Hom mfa hom ndwom dɛɛdɛw mbra;
Hom nsuo m' yɛntow ndwom mma 
Gyefo n',
Hom nsuo m' yenyi Immanuel ayɛw!

name: MHB 229:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. HOM nokwafo a hom nyim Jesus,
Sɛ hom nye N' asoɛr ampa ara a,
Hom akyɛn asaase do dɛw,
Hom nda No wusoɛr tum n' edzi.

name: MHB 229:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hom mfa abotar nkyerɛ hom gyedzi,
Ndzeyɛɛ m' hom nkyerɛ fakyɛ a hom enya,
Hom nhwehwe sor enyimnyamdze,
Na hom nka tsir Christ do nkɔ sor.

name: MHB 229:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hom bohu Agyenkwa n' wɔ hɔ,
Dɛ ɔtse Nyame abanyimfa
Wɔ N'Egya n'ahentum nyina mu,
Na obedzi hen afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 229:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hom nhwɛ No na hom nsuasua No,
Ndzi aper hom sor fie no ho;
Na hom nsua sor adwontofo n',
Hom ntsena, hom ndɔ, hom nyi N' ayɛw.

name: MHB 229:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hom a hom dze gyedzi agye Ewuradze n',
Mma hom nnhwehwɛ biribiara bio;
Hom nwu mma wiadze na bɔn nyina,
Hom wiadze dɔ n' wɔabɔ n'
mbeamudua m'.

name: MHB 229:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wɔdze hom nkwa sumaa Christ mu,
Wɔ Egya No bo mu sɔkyee;
Dɛ mbrɛ Sahen nyimnyamfo n' kae n',
Hom behyia No wimu ntsɛntsɛmara.

name: MHB 23:1
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632
verse:
. NYIMNYAN HEN, Asomdwee Hen,
Mobɔdɔ Wo;
Na dɔ no rommbɔ adze da,
Meserɛ Wo.
Ɔwo ama m' m'ebisadze,
Ɔwo etsie me;
Ɔwo hun mbrɛ mo bɔn tse,
Dze mo ho akyɛ m'.

name: MHB 23:2
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632
verse:
. Medze me nyimdzee mapa
M'bɔtow Wo ndwom,
M'akoma m' ndzepa nyina
Medze bɛma W'.
Kaansa mo bɔn kaa m'tsiaa m' mpo a,
Esaan mo ho;
Wɔpraa ano guu mo do no,
Ɔwo 'tsiee me.

name: MHB 23:3
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632
verse:
. N-da esuon na nnyɛ da kor,
M'beyi W'ayɛw;
Mudu sor mpo a, m'akomam'
M'bohuhor Wo.
Osuar, na ɔmmfata de
Medze ma Wo;
Onnyiewiei mpo yɛ tsia dɛ
Wɔtonton Wo.

name: MHB 230:1
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 230:2
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Dzi dɛw mbordo ara! Wimutsewee n' asan aba;
Mununkum no apa, sunsuma no kɔ.

name: MHB 230:3
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Dzi dɛw mbordo ara! Wɔaka bɔgya n' egu, 
Woewie werdam no bɔ, kaw no so woetua.

name: MHB 230:4
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Dzi dɛw mbordo ara! Yeenya fakyɛ no kwa;
Tseneneenyi ewu ama abɔn wɔ dua no do.

name: MHB 230:5
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Dzi dɛw mbordo ara! Na Eguambaa a wokum No n',
Oedzi owu do konyim na ɔtse ase bio.

name: MHB 230:6
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Dzi dɛw mbordo ara! Hɛn Hen no wɔ sorsor;
Ofi No sor ahengua do dzi ma hɛn

name: MHB 230:7
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Dzi dɛw mbordo ara! Siandɛ ɔbɛba bio;
Eguambaa a wokum No n' bɛba enyimnyam m'.

name: MHB 231:1
title: Edward Shillito, 1872-1948.
verse:
. Egya, hyɛ Wo Ba enyimnyam, 
Yɛ dza Ne mpaabɔ bisa n':
Ma Kasamaafo no mbra,
Fa Werɛkyekyefo n' ma hɛn
Yɛnam gyedzi do regye N',
Jesus dzin ntsi, fa N' ma hɛn.

name: MHB 231:2
title: Edward Shillito, 1872-1948.
verse:
. Yɛnam gyedzi do bohu 
Na yɛatse Sunsum no nka;
Ɔdze N' adom nye No dɔ
Bɛtsena hɛn akoma mu:
Hɛn mboa nye papa nyina
Pem fi No nkotoo mu ba.

name: MHB 231:3
title: Edward Shillito, 1872-1948.
verse:
. Ennkɔsɔw asɛm n' ano, 
'Wo, nokwafo, yamuyiefo?
Ennkɛma Werɛkyekyefo n'
Abɛtsena hɛn 'komam' daa?
Ɔyɛ dɛn ara a 'dze N' bɛma:
Christ Kaa dɛ edze N' bɛma ampa.

name: MHB 232:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 232:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 232:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 233:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 233:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yεma hεn enyi do,
Dze hwε akatua no,
Hwε Wo bɔgyaa atɔ hεn n’,
Edze ama abɔn kwa;
Ɔwo akyérε nkwa kwan no.
Ebue ɔsor ama hεn.

name: MHB 233:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 233:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 234:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Mbowa a Jewfo dze bɔɔ afɔr, 
Hɔn bɔgyaa nyinara
Nn-kotum ama etsidaa,
Anaa ɔatsew hɛn ho.

name: MHB 234:23
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Christ, sor Eguambaa n' dze, 
Oyi hɛn bɔn nyina;
Afɔrbɔdze a ɔwɔ dzin,
Na ɔsom bo kyɛn hɔn nyina.
 
. Me gyedzi nsa bɛda 
W' etsifi pampam' hɔ,
Ber a medze nnuho gyina ha
Mereka mo bɔn yi.

name: MHB 234:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Me kra twa n' enyi hwɛ 
Dza obuu Wo kɔn a,
Ohu dɛ n' afɔdzi ka ho
Ma 'sɛn mbusu dua n' do.

name: MHB 234:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Yɛgye dzi a yɛtse dɛ 
Mbusu no efi hɔ;
Yɛdze dɛw hyira Eguambaa n',
Yɛtwer N' anwanwa dɔ n'.

name: MHB 235:1
title: Samuel Medley, 1738-99.
verse:
. MINYIM dɛ mo Pomfo tse ase,
Dɛw bi a siar awerɛhyɛmu yi ma a!
Nyia owui no, ɔtse ase,
Ɔtse ase dzi mo do hen daa.

name: MHB 235:2
title: Samuel Medley, 1738-99.

name: MHB 235:3
title: Samuel Medley, 1738-99.
verse:
. Ɔtse ase na ɔma m' ahom daa, 
Ɔtse ase, m' bedzi owu do;
Ɔtse ase risiesie fi ma m',
Ɔtse ase, 'dze m' bɔkɔ hɔ sɔnn.

name: MHB 235:4
title: Samuel Medley, 1738-99.
verse:
. Ɔtse ase, 'nyimnyam nka Ne dzin,
Ɔtse ase, m'Agyenkwa daapem;
Dɛw a siar awerɛhyɛmu yi ma a!
Minyim dɛ mo Pomfo tse ase.

name: MHB 236:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. YƐDZE dɛw dwen hɛn Sɔfopanyin
No mu adom no ho;
N'akoma yɛ mbɔbɔrhu nko,
Na ɔkyerɛ ɔdɔ daa.

name: MHB 236:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ehumbɔbɛr ahyɛ N' mu ma,
Ntsi onyim hɛn mberɛwyɛ nyina;
Onyim dɛ mbrɛ nsɔhwɛ so tse,
'Siandɛ ɔafa mu pɛn.

name: MHB 236:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ɔwɔ honam a ɔyɛ mberɛw mu n',
Osui na okyii nyinsu;
Ɔwɔ sor dze, naaso ɔtse
Ma No nkorɔfo adzesoa.

name: MHB 236:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Onnkodum ntɔn bi a ɔrehyew,
Mbom ɔbɛma adzɛw;
Onnkobu ndzembir a akonton,
Onnkobu obi 'nyimtsia.

name: MHB 236:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Afei dze ma hɛn gyedzi nka 
No mbɔbɔrhu, No tum;
Yebenya ɔgye adom no
Ahokyer ber no mu.

name: MHB 237:1
title: Jane Crewdson, 1809-63.
verse:
. OWURA, 'werɛhow bi nnyi hɔ a osuar
Dɛ yɛdze brɛ W' mpaabɔ m';
Na dadwen bi nnyi hɔ a osuar a
Onnkenyan W' mbɔbɔrhu.

name: MHB 237:2
title: Jane Crewdson, 1809-63.
verse:
. Ɔwo a afa ɔhaw yi mu,
Bɔhwɛ hɛn ahohia m' bi;
Ɔdɔ a ɔsoaa adzesoa kɛse n'
Bɔsoa dza osuar so.

name: MHB 237:3
title: Jane Crewdson, 1809-63.
verse:
. Ɔpen biara nnyi nsumaa mu a
N'aso krɔnkrɔn no nntse,
Na mbeamudua biara yɛ har
Wɔ Wo sunsum ase.

name: MHB 237:4
title: Jane Crewdson, 1809-63.
verse:
. Ɔbor bɔn, honam aperdzi,
Na akoma so do;
Dza ɔboa hɛn nye ɔdɔ a owui,
Ɔdɔ a ɔdze yaw sui.

name: MHB 238:1
title: Ray Palmer, 1808-87.
verse:
. Me gyedzi tsim Wo do, 
CalvaryEguambaa,
Gyefo Krɔnkrɔn:
Morosɔr yi, tsie me;
Yi mo bɔn nyinara;
Ma ofir ndɛ menyɛ
Wodze koraa.

name: MHB 238:2
title: Ray Palmer, 1808-87.
verse:
. Ma W' adom kɛse no 
N-hyɛ m' akoma dzen,
Ma menyɛ ndam;
Dɛ mbrɛ iwui maa me n',
Ao, ma mo so mo dɔ
Ɔmfram dzendzen mma Wo
Na mma ɔnndan da.

name: MHB 238:34
title: Ray Palmer, 1808-87.
verse:
. Menam bra sum mu yi, 
Na yaw etwa mo ho 'i,
Woara kyerɛ m' kwan;
Ma sum ndan adzekyee,
Pepa me nyinsuwaEso mma monntɔ gon
Mimmfi Wo nkyɛn.
 
. Ber a bra bɔbɔ adze, 
Na owu n' esutsen
Bɛpram mo do n',
Ao, m' Agyenkwa siarfo,
Pa m' suro na ekyingye,
Fa me kra a apon no n'
Kɔ sor fie sɔnn.   Amen.

name: MHB 239:1
title: Synesius, 375-430;
verse:
. EWURADZE, dwen mo ho,
Na hor mo bɔn nyina;
Yi me fi wiadze akɔndɔ ho,
Na ma mo mu so ntsew.

name: MHB 239:2
title: Synesius, 375-430;
verse:
. Ewuradze, dwen mo ho,
Dadwen ahyɛ mo do;
Ma menyɛ W'akowaa dɔfo,
Na minnya W'ahomgye.

name: MHB 239:3
title: Synesius, 375-430;
verse:
. Ewuradze, dwen mo ho,
Wɔ ɔko aperdzi mu;
Me yaw na m'awerɛhow nyina mu,
Yɛ m'ahoɔdzen, mo nkwa.

name: MHB 239:4
title: Synesius, 375-430;
verse:
. Ewuradze, dwen mo ho,
Na mma mommfom kwan;
Sɛ sum dwir me dɛn ara mpo a,
Kyerɛ me ɔsor kwan.

name: MHB 239:5
title: Synesius, 375-430;
verse:
. Ewuradze, dwen mo ho,
Sɛ ɔbra ehum tu me a,
Sɛ ɔtamfo n' tow hyɛ mo do a,
Agyenkwa, twe bɛn me.

name: MHB 239:6
title: Synesius, 375-430;
verse:
. Ewuradze, dwen mo ho,
Na esuyirii no twa mu a,
Meehu kan a ɔwɔ hɔ daa no,
Na menye Wo edzi dɛw. Amen.

name: MHB 24:1
title: Thomas Sternhold, c. 1500-49.
verse:
. AHOTSEWFO, hom mbra,
Hom nyi Otumfo n'ayɛw;
Hom mma yɛnyɛ adwen kor,
Akoma, ndze na akyen:
Abɔdze biara ntow bi,
Obiara nnka n'ano nnto m'.
Wɔmma ndzɛmba a wonnyi nkwa 
So mfa kommyɛ ntow ayɛyi.

name: MHB 24:2
title: Thomas Sternhold, c. 1500-49.
verse:
. Adasamba so hom mbra,
Hom mbra ma yɛntow ndwom pa;
Na beebi a nyimpa ehyia n',
Hom ndzi adwontow enyim.
Hom mma Nyame ayɛyi 
Ndwom a ɔmmbɔ adze da do:
Ama hɛn ayɛyi ndwom
Aayɛ bɛkyebo dɛ Ɔno.

name: MHB 24:3
title: Thomas Sternhold, c. 1500-49.
verse:
. Dɛm ntsi ofi sor dze nhyira
Bogu asaase nyina do;
Na wiadze tɛtɛr a yehu
Yɛ adwontofo asɔrdan kor;
Yɛbɛma hɛn ayɛyi ndwom
No atra mber na mbea nyina,
 Na afow edu sorsor
Otumfo kɛse n'asomu.

name: MHB 240:1
title: Ada Rundall Greenaway, 1861
verse:
. O MBƆBƆRHUSƐM a ɔserɛ ma hɛn,
Wɔka no ankonamyɛ na yaw ber mu;
O ndze a ofi tsetse, odzi ma hɛn
Frɛ hɛn dɛ yɛnye Nyame mbɔ mu bio.

name: MHB 240:2
title: Ada Rundall Greenaway, 1861
verse:
. O awerɛkyekyesɛm a wɔka n' bɔkɔɔ,
Ber a wɔhyɛɛ afɔrbɔ huuhu n'ase,
Ɔwo a eyɛ ehumbɔbɔr, eda ho kyerɛ 
Bɔnfakyɛ a edze dom nyimpa mba

name: MHB 240:3
title: Ada Rundall Greenaway, 1861
verse:
. Enyidado asɛm a edze hɛn bɛn sor,
Ber a akokodur na gyedzi apa hɛn n',
Akra a Christ sɔr ma hɔn no yɛ Christ Nedze,
Wobenya fakyɛ na dɛw wɔ No mu.

name: MHB 240:4
title: Ada Rundall Greenaway, 1861
verse:
. O Odzimafo a etse ase daa daa,
Eserɛ ma akra ewufo eenya nkwa;
Ma yenhu hɛn bɔn a ohia bɔnfakyɛ,
Ma yenhu ɔdɔ a otum dze bɔn kyɛ.   Amen.

name: MHB 241:1
title: Frank Fletcher, 1870-
verse:
. O NYIMPA Ba, Gyefo katakyi brɛfo a 
Wo nkowaa nye asaase do ebirfo!
Yɛdze hɛn afɔrbɔ enyikan brɛ Wo,
Ɔwo a inyim hɛn yaw na hɛn dɛw nyina.

name: MHB 241:2
title: Frank Fletcher, 1870-
verse:
. Anan a ɔyɛ dzen na otum dzi dwuma,
Anofamfa krɔnkrɔn a ɔkaa nokwar n',
Enyi a ɔhwɛɛ nsukookoo n'ahoofɛw,
Akoma a odzii dɛw mbabun ahoɔdzen ho!

name: MHB 241:3
title: Frank Fletcher, 1870-
verse:
. Mbofra hɔn Dɔfo, Ɔwo a ikenyan mbofra,
Adasa nyina mu Akowaa na Ɔhen,
Ɔwo dɛw, enyindar, akomatɔmu Wura!
Yɛdze hɛn suro, dɛw na enyidar brɛ Wo.

name: MHB 241:4
title: Frank Fletcher, 1870-
verse:
. Nnyɛ hɛn asehwe na awerɛhow nko mu
Na yɛhwehwɛ W', Ɔwo Boafo, Nyɛnko,
Adzefo hɔn Hɔhoe, hɛn enyigye m' bɛn hɛn
Ehiafo Adamfo, bra hɛn dwumadzi m'.

name: MHB 242:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. BRA, Jesus a yɛatweɔn Wo akyɛr,
Wɔwoo W' dɛ bɛgye W'nkorɔfo;
Yi hɛn fi hɛn suro na bɔn mu,
Ma yeenya ahomgye Wo mu.

name: MHB 242:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Israel 'hoɔdzen na awerɛkyekyer,
Wiadze nyina enyidar nye W';
Wiadze nyina ahwehwɛdze,
Akoma biara enyigye.

name: MHB 242:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wɔwoo W' dɛ bɛgye Wo nkorɔfo,
Wɔwoo Wo abofra Ɔhen,
Wɔwoo W' ma eedzi hen hɛn mu daa,
Fa W'ahendzi n' bra sesei.

name: MHB 242:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Fa Wankasa Wo Sunsum no
Bedzi hen hɛn akoma m';
Dua Wo dzibew abɔso n' do ma
Hɛn do kɔ W'ahengua n' do.  Amen.

name: MHB 243:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. KONYIMDZIFO n' dzi hen,
Wɔ ''nyimnyam ahoɔdzen m',
Odzi hen aman nyina do;
Ɔma wiadze enyigye,
Nyimpa mba,, hom nczi dɛw 
Jesus dɔ kɛse n' mu;
Hom mma hom akoma, na ndze do
Mma Nyia odzi hen wɔ sor n'.

name: MHB 243:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yi N'ahentum ayɛw,
Hua ɔba a wɔakrɔn No n',
Owui, ɔtse ase, onnkowu bio,
Ɔtse N' Egya egua do;
Nyame m' hɛn Dzimafo,
Odzi hɛn asɛm ma hɛn,
Na ɔdze Ne mbeamudua n' konyimdzi
No tahye mbea nyina.

name: MHB 243:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 244:1
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.
verse:
. TSIR a wɔdze nsoɛ hyɛɛ n'ahenkyɛw n',
Wɔahyɛ n' enyimnyam kyɛw;
Ahenkyɛw na afei wɔdze
Ahyɛ konyimdzifo n'.

name: MHB 244:2
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.
verse:
. Ɔsor dzibea a ɔkrɔn koraa
Yɛ Nedze, odzi wɔ N';
'Hemfo Hen, ewuranom Wura,
Ɔsor man mu kandzea.

name: MHB 244:3
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.
verse:
. Ɔsor atsefo nyina dɛw,
Asaase mba nyin dɛw,
Hɔn a oyi No dɔ kyerɛ hɔn
Na ɔma wohu Ne dzin.

name: MHB 244:4
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.
verse:
. Wɔdze mbeamudua nye n'enyiwu,
Nye n'adom nyina ama hɔn;
Hɔn dzin yɛ dzin a ɔwɔ hɔ daa,
Hɔn dɛw yɛ ɔsor dɛw.

name: MHB 244:5
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.
verse:
. Wɔnye hɔn Wura hu amandze ha,
Wɔnye N' dzi hen wɔ sor,
Hɔn enyigye nyina nye dɛ
Wɔbɛtse No dɔ ase.

name: MHB 244:6
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.
verse:
. Ne mbeamudua n' yɛ nkwa na ahoɔdzen,
Eso ɔyɛ wu na fɛr;
No nkorɔfo enyidar na ahonya,
Dza wɔdwen ho daa nyina.

name: MHB 245:1
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. HUA Nyia Ewuradze asera n;
David ne Ba kɛse n'!
Hua N'! Ber a wɔahyɛ n' Hen mu, na
Ɔhyɛɛ ase dzii hen ha, 
Ɔbae bɛsɛɛ n-hyɛdo,
Bɛgyee adaduafo,
Ɔbae beyii bɔn fii hɔ,
Dze pɛrpɛr hyɛɛ anan m'.

name: MHB 245:2
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 245:3
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 245:4
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 245:5
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Ɔdze N'ahengua besi 
N'atamfo nyina do;
Mfesantsen nyina ɔbɛyɛ
Onyimnyamfo, Siarfo,
Mbersatsen so runntum nnyi 
N'ahyɛmu mmfi hɔ da;
No dɔ dzin a ɔnnsesa da n'
Bɛtsena hɔ daapem.

name: MHB 246:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. HOM ndzi dɛw, hɛn Wura yɛ Hen!
Nyimpa mba, hom nyi N' ayɛw,
Hom ntow ndwom wɔ konyimdzi m',
Jesus Messiah dzi Hen!

name: MHB 246:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wɔdze tum nyina ama Jesus,
Hɛll, asaase na sor Wura,
Kotodwe biara bɔkotow N',
'Bɔnsam tse a, no ho wosow.

name: MHB 246:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Abɔfo nyina ka bɔ m';
Konyimdzi mu wɔyɛ kor,
Wɔtow Jesus N'ayɛyi,
Wɔtoa No konyimdzi n' do.

name: MHB 246:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Sɛ sum mba ma mbusu ba a,
Hɔn a wɔka hɛn ho sen hɔn;
Nyame ka hɛn ho, yennsuro,
Christ wɔ ha ntsi abɔn nsuro.

name: MHB 246:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hwɛ! Gyedi gya no redzɛw
Wɔ bepɔw no do nyina,
Nyankopɔn bɛn hɛn sen hɛll,
Ɔdze ogya etwa hɛn ho.

name: MHB 246:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Agyenkwa Christ aba famu,
Ɔkyerɛ hɛn konyim ahenkyɛw n;
Ɔma hɛn egua wɔ sor,
Yɛyɛ N' dɔ m' konyimdzifo.

name: MHB 247:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Dzi dɛw, Nyame yɛ Hen! 
Kotow w' Ewuradze;
Ɔdasanyi, tow ndwom,
Na dzi dɛw daa nyina:

name: MHB 247:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 247:34
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. N' ahendzi mmbɔ adze da, 
No tum wɔ sor na ase;
Wɔdze samandze;
Saafee ama Jesus:
 
. Ɔtse Nyame nyimfa 
Kɛpem dɛ N' atamfo
Bɔbɔ hɔn mu adze
Edzi N' ahyɛdze do:

name: MHB 247:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Obedzi nyim ewie, 
Oetu hɛn bɔn nyina,
Ma dasanyi biara
Eenya sor enyigye:

name: MHB 247:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Dzi dɛw enyidadom'; 
Hɛn Jesus bɛba bio
Abɛfa hɛn akɔ
Hɛn domankoma fie:

name: MHB 248:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. JESUS, ka asɛm no,
Nokwar aba a onnwu n;
W'asɛmpa no bɛtserɛw kɛse
Wɔ hɛn asaase do nyina.

name: MHB 248:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wiadze afanan nyina
Obedzi konyim yie,
Ɔbɛsɛɛ hɛn honam ndwuma,
Ɔawosow hɛll mbobow.

name: MHB 248:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma W'ahoɔdzen no nhɛn
'Kra gyedzinyi biara m';
Ma W'adom n; ngugu beebiara,
Na ɔntsew ne nyina ho.

name: MHB 248:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma Wo su pa nda edzi
Wɔ ɔdɔ krɔnkrɔn mu;
Fa Wo nkwa n' hyɛ hɛn ma wɔ ha,
Ma hɛn ahengua wɔ sor.  Amen.

name: MHB 249:1
title: Caroline Maria Noel, 1817-77.
verse:
. JESUS Ne dzin no mu
'Biara bobu ntwɛr,
Obiara bɛka dɛ
Ɔyɛ Enyimnyam Hen,
Ɔyɛ Egya Ne pɛ
Dɛ yɛfrɛ N' Owura,
Nyia ahyɛse n' ɔyɛ
Tum Asɛm pa no.

name: MHB 249:2
title: Caroline Maria Noel, 1817-77.
verse:
. Wɔbrɛɛ N' ase kakra
Ma oeenya abɔdzin
Efi abɔnfo ano,
Hɔn ntsi na ɔbae;
Ɔfaa mu nokwar mu
Dze kodur ewiei,
Na oduaa owu mu
Puee konyimdzi mu.

name: MHB 249:3
title: Caroline Maria Noel, 1817-77.
verse:
. Enuaam, ɔdɔ dzen mu,
Hom mma N' dzin kɛse,
Hom mfa suro na ahobow
Na ahopopo;
Ɔyɛ Nyame Agyenkwa,
Ɔyɛ Christ Owura;
Ɔsɛ dɛ yɛsɔr No,
Twer No daa nyina.

name: MHB 249:4
title: Caroline Maria Noel, 1817-77.
verse:
. Si No hen W'akoma m',
Ma ondzi dza ho
Nntsew na ɔnnyɛ nokwar,
No so nyina do;
Ma ɔnyɛ wo Sahen,
Wo nsɔhwɛ ber mu;
Ma Ne pɛ nka wo mfua,
Wɔ kan na tum mu.

name: MHB 249:5
title: Caroline Maria Noel, 1817-77.

name: MHB 25:1
title: Richard Mant, 1776-1848.
verse:
. CHERUBIM na seraphim nyina,
Etwa ehyia Ewuradze ho,
Wɔahyɛ N'asɔrdan no mu ma
Oyi ka a na oyi agye do:

name: MHB 25:2
title: Richard Mant, 1776-1848.
verse:
. W'enyimnyam ahyɛ ɔsor ma
Wiadze esi ne sibea:
Ɔwo na yɛdze enyimnyam ma W',
Kronkron, kronkron, Ewuradze!

name: MHB 25:3
title: Richard Mant, 1776-1848.
verse:
. Enyimnyam regyegye wɔ sor, 
Asaase gye ndwom no do,
Wɔtow no dɛ, krɔnkrɔn, 
krɔnkrɔn Dɔm Ewuradze a ewɔ sor:

name: MHB 25:4
title: Richard Mant, 1776-1848.
verse:
. Seraph etwa ehyia N'enyim,
N'asɔr krɔnkrɔn no wɔ ase,
Ɔka hɛn bɔ m' ma yɛtonton N',
'Yi gya hɛn ma yɛtow ndwom:   Amen.

name: MHB 250:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. N-KWAGYE ! O enyigye ndze!
Hɛn asomu ndwom dɛɛdɛw!
Seradze a wɔdze yɛ epirakur do 
Dza ɔdwedwe hɛn suro.

name: MHB 250:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Enyimnyam, ayɛyi nye tum
Ɔnka Eguambaa n' afebɔɔ!
Jesus Christ nye hɛn Pomfo no, 
Alleluia ! Yi N' ayɛw.

name: MHB 250:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. N-kwagye ! O Eguambaa pa!
Ayɛyi yɛ Wodze;
Nkwagye bekenyan hɛn akoma,
Na atsena hɛn gyirama do.

name: MHB 250:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. N-kwagye ! Hom mma ɔngyegye
Wiadze afanan nyina;
Sor abɔfo nyina nyɛ kor,
Na wɔmma ndwom no do.

name: MHB 251:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. OTUMFO Kɛse, Pomfo,
Hɛn akra a apon hɔn tonton Wo;
W'edwuma a ayɛ
Yɛgye to mu,
Yɛdze enyimnyam nyina ma W';
Yɛdze n-daase gye hɛn
Nserahwɛ ber no to mu
Yɛgye W' nsaano 
Edwuma to m',
Hyira hɛn, nkwagye Nyame.

name: MHB 251:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 251:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. W'anwanwadze a ayɛ ewie
Fata hɛn daa daa ayɛyi ;
Na kyerɛ Wo tum,
Fa sor adom
Hyɛ nyimpa dɔm ma mbordo;
Fa nyam hyɛ hɛn asaase ma,
Na ɔman biara nyim Wo yi,
Adom Nyame,
Gye ayɛyi a
W'abɔdze fofor dze ma W'.  Amen.

name: MHB 252:1
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74
verse:
. NYAME ka hɛn ho daa nyina,
Ndwom a hɛn egyanom towee nye n',
Ber a wɔwɔ akono ekyirekyir;
Hɔn ko ndwom krɔnkrɔn n' gyegyee;
Woennsuro na wɔanntɔ dɔnsuar,
Woenngyaa dɛ wɔtow ndwom dɛ.
    Nyame ka hɛn ho daa nyina,
   Christ hɛn Wura bedzi Hen!

name: MHB 252:2
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74
verse:
. Wogyaa hɛn egyapadze kɛse,
Ɔwɔ dɛ yedzi konyim,
Dɔm a ɔwɔ dɛ yɛbɔ petse,
Dwuma kɛse a ɔwɔ dɛ yedzi;
Yɛntow ndwom a wɔkyerɛɛ hɛn no
Mfa ntwa wiadze nyina ho.

name: MHB 252:3
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74
verse:
. Hom mfa mbeamudua n' nkyin mbea nyina,
Hom mma ɔdɔ ndzi konyim,
Hom nka ɔgye ho asɛmpa n'
Beebiara a nyimpa bɔkɔ;
Hom ntwe ɔkyena mbra enyim,
Hom mmia hom enyi ntow ndwom:

name: MHB 252:4
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74

name: MHB 253:1
title: Henry Burton, 1840-1930.
verse:
. NYAME adzekyee, bra!
Ɔsor kan fɛɛfɛw pa,
Migyaa ne nyina mu ma W',
Mosoɛr fi mo mu pirim;
Nyame Eguambaa a Wo dɔ yɛ kan,
Hyerɛn me kra do na ɔnyɛ kann.

name: MHB 253:2
title: Henry Burton, 1840-1930.

name: MHB 253:3
title: Henry Burton, 1840-1930.

name: MHB 253:4
title: Henry Burton, 1840-1930.
verse:
. Nyame adzekyee, bra
Dɛ sor adzekyee no!
Ma krɔnkrɔn no mbra,
Gyedzi, enyidar na ɔdɔ;
O hwɛ, yehu dɛ wimu rehyerɛn!
Ampa fɛɛfɛw no rebɛn.

name: MHB 254:1
title: Frederic William Henry Myers, 1848-1901.
verse:
. TSIE, ndze bi nye yi, ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn dodow,
Ɔwosow asaase na mframa mu!
Ewuradze aprandaa na orupue yi?
No nkorɔfo mpaabɔ ndwom nye yi anaa?

name: MHB 254:2
title: Frederic William Henry Myers, 1848-1901.
verse:
. Ampa, ɔreba na ndze mpempem tseatsea m'
Kyerɛ ahotsewfo ma mmum mpo tse;
Ampa, ɔreba na asaase dzi dɛw,
Hɔn enyigye wɔ ne mbae m' : Mereba.

name: MHB 254:3
title: Frederic William Henry Myers, 1848-1901.
verse:
. Iyi na ɔayɛ, na yɛnnkɔtonton No?
Ɔbɛyɛ yi, ana yɛbɛpa abaw?
Bra ma yɛnyɛ ntsɛntsɛm yentwa nhwe N'enyim,
Yɛmfa hɛn dadwen nto N'anan adze.

name: MHB 254:4
title: Frederic William Henry Myers, 1848-1901.
verse:
. N-kwa, owu, awerɛhow na bɔn mu no,
Ɔbɔdɔɔ me so 'siandɛ ɔdɔɔ so;
Christ nye ewiei osiandɛ nna ɔyɛ ahyɛse,
Christ nye ahyɛse, na ewiei nye Christ.

name: MHB 255:1
title: Philipp Nicolai, 1556-1608.
verse:
. NYAN, nyan, na anafua repa!
Aban do aweɔmfo no retsea m';
Jerusalem, afei dze nyan!
Esuom tse akɔaba ndze no,
Na ɔma hɔn enyi gye mbordo;
Mbaabun, hom mbra na adze akye!
Ayeforkun n' aba,
Hom mfa hom nkandzea no;
Halleluya!
Hom nyɛ krado mma Ayeforhyia n',
Na ɔwɔ dɛ hom kɔ hɔ kekyia N'.

name: MHB 255:2
title: Philipp Nicolai, 1556-1608.

name: MHB 255:3
title: Philipp Nicolai, 1556-1608.

name: MHB 256:1
title: Henry Burton, 1840-1930.
verse:
. EKAN bi wɔ koko no do na da no yɛ adzekyee,
Ber a hɛn enyi bohu ahoɔfɛw Hen no N'enyimnyam;
Yɛberɛe wɔ hɛn atweɔnee m', yɛweɔnee kɔr ekyir dodow,
Naaso No konyim da no reba na yɛdze ndwom behyia N'.

name: MHB 256:2
title: Henry Burton, 1840-1930.

name: MHB 256:3
title: Henry Burton, 1840-1930.
verse:
. Enyisun kommyɛ bi ɔnye dzinnyɛ bi so wɔ wimu
Na Nyankopɔn ahom bi keka no ho wɔ ndam mpaabɔ m',
'Siandɛ Jesus a oruwu n' nye Christ a ɔtse egua n' do
Na hɛn sunsum n'amandzehu yɛ No so N'amandzehu.

name: MHB 256:4
title: Henry Burton, 1840-1930.

name: MHB 256:5
title: Henry Burton, 1840-1930.
verse:
. Tsie! Yɛtse ndwom fi ekyirkyir, n'ano dzen ara na ɔyɛ,
Ɔyɛ Jesus hɛn Hen Immanuel no konyimdzi ho ndwom;
Zion, soɛr na kehyia No; na me kra, wo so yɛ ntsɛm fa w'
Ndwom a ɔyɛ dɛw mapa, na ɔsom wo bo, brɛ hɛn Hen!

name: MHB 257:1234
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. O bra, O bra Immanuel, 
Na bɔpɔn ndɔmmum Israel,
Ɔka mmɔn ananabea ha
Kodu dɛ Nyame Ba bɛba.
 
Dzi dɛw! Dzi dɛw! Immanuel 
Bɛba wo nkyɛn, O Israel.
 
. O bra, O bra, Wura Tumfo, 
Ɔwo a tsetse n' edze mbra
Maa mbusuakuw wɔ Sinai do
Wɔ fua, hu, nye ahentum mu.
 
. O bra jesse Poma, bɛgye 
Wo man fi Satan tum ase;
Gye Wo nkorɔfo fi hɛll bun mu,
Ma hɔn konyimdzi wɔ wu do.
 
. O bra, Adzekyee Woraba
Ma wo mbae nkyenyan hɛn sunsum;
Bɔbɔ anago sum hwetse,
Bɔ owu sunsuma petse.

name: MHB 257:5
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. O bra, David Saafee, O bra, 
Bue hɛn sor fie pataa ma hɛn,
Yɛ kwan a wɔdze kɔ sor n' sɔnn,
Na siw dza ɔdze mbusu ba n'.

name: MHB 258:1
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.
verse:
. Ɔwo reba, reba ampa;
Yebehyia Wo wɔ kwan do,
Yebohu Wo, yebohu W' yie,
Yebehyira W', yɛbɛma eehu,
Hɛn akoma nnkotum aka;
Ndwom dɛɛdɛw na yɛbɔtow,
Yɛdze hɛn dɔ bɛma Wo,
Yɛbɔtow ayɛyi ndwom
Wɔ Woara W'ananadze hɔ.

name: MHB 258:2
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.
verse:
. O hɛn Wura dɔfo, hɛn dɛw nye
Yehu W' dɛ eyɛ ɔhen!
Tɛkyerɛma nyina tonton Wo dzin,
Yɛbɔ anosɛɛ dze ɔsom,
Enyidzi, nyam na nhyira brɛ W';
Hɛn Ewuradze na Nyɛnko,
Ɔhen a wɔasam mu eyi,
Wiadze ekyirkyir nyina,
Wɔhyɛ W' enyimnyam, sɔr Wo!

name: MHB 259:1
title: Dora Greenwell, 1821-82.
verse:
. ANA aba rebɛnye hɛn atsena,
Hɛn Hen, hɛn Gyafo, hɛn Ewuradze?
Ana Wo dzin dze Emmanuel,
Nyame nye Ne wiadze abɔ m'?

name: MHB 259:2
title: Dora Greenwell, 1821-82.
verse:
. Wiadze enya Wo ho enyigye!
Hamu na kurow minstsiminti;
Amamio do na mbrɛ hɔ yɛ 
Kɔnn bɛyɛ tsenabea ama nyimpa.

name: MHB 259:3
title: Dora Greenwell, 1821-82.
verse:
. Edze hɔn nyina aba bio;
Wo mu wɔ kan, bea na ahom
Ma dza oye, yɛ dɔ, dzi n' ho do,
Ma wɔdze eenya nkwa prɔmprɔmyɛ.

name: MHB 259:4
title: Dora Greenwell, 1821-82.

name: MHB 259:5
title: Dora Greenwell, 1821-82.

name: MHB 259:6
title: Dora Greenwell, 1821-82.
verse:
. Afei beyi Wo nkorɔfo yaw,
Na fa Wo ndɔmmum ka Wo ho;
Wiadze na akoma Agyenkwa,
Bra, yaw do konyimdzifo, bra.   Amen.

name: MHB 26:1
title: Richard Baxter, 1615-91;
verse:
. ABƆFO a hom hyerɛn a
Hom gyina Nayme nyimfa,
Na sɛ hom Wura hyɛ hom a,
Hom tu fa kan mu no,
Hom ennsuo mu a,
Yerunntum nntow
Ɔsor ndwom a 
Ɔyɛ dzen no.

name: MHB 26:2
title: Richard Baxter, 1615-91;
verse:
. Hom akra a hom rohom,
Hom hu hom Agyenkwa enyim,
N'enyimnyam m' dza osuar mpo
Bor hɛn adom do koraa.
Hom ntow ayɛyi
Ndwom mma Nyame,
Dɛ mbrɛ hom yɛ
Wɔ N'enyim no.

name: MHB 26:3
title: Richard Baxter, 1615-91;
verse:
. Hom ahotsewfo pa a 
 Hom berɛ wɔ asaase do,
Hom ntonton hom sor Hen,
Ber a hom kɔ kan no;
Hom ntow dɛw ndwom,
Hom ngye dza ɔma.
Yie muo, bɔn mu o,
Hom nyi N'ayɛw.

name: MHB 26:4
title: Richard Baxter, 1615-91;
verse:
. Me kra yɛ w'afamudze,
Dzi konyim Nyame mu,
Na siesie w'akoma.
Wo nkwa nda nyina
Kesi ewiei,
Dza ɔma biara.
Yi No ayɛw.	Amen.

name: MHB 260:1
title: Julia Ward Howe, 1819-1910.

name: MHB 260:2
title: Julia Ward Howe, 1819-1910.

name: MHB 260:3
title: Julia Ward Howe, 1819-1910.
verse:
. Wɔwoo Christ sukooko fɛɛfɛw no mu wɔ po ekyir hɔ,
Ɔwɔ 'nyam wɔ No bo mu a ɔbɛsesa emi nye ɔwo;
Owui tseew nyimpa ho ntsi ma
yɛntsena ase mma hɔn ahotɔ,
Ber a Nyame rutu ntsen.

name: MHB 261:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. HƆN a wɔda wuso Kandzea,
Bra na fa Wo dɔ n' dɛpam
Owu nye no sum kebii no,
Ma mununkum no nhwetse;
Sor na asaase fofor Bɔfo,
Soɛr wɔ hɛn sum kebii mu,
Na hwetse abɔdze sum nyina,
Na ma hɛn enyi nhu adze.

name: MHB 261:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛrotweɔn Wo mbae no ara;
Wo kan mbrɛ hɛn nkwa na dɛw,
Ɔmpam nhɛn suro nyinara,
Ɔmfa dɛw nhɛn hɛn akoma m'
Bra na bɛda enyimpa no a
Nyame dze ma adasa edzi;
Bra, wiadze nyina Agyenkwa,
Fa asɛmpa adom no bra.

name: MHB 261:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Fa W'ehumbɔbɔr no gye hɛn,
Ɔhen a edwe koraa;
Ma hɛn n-kwagye ho nyimdzee
Fa hɛn bɔn nyina kyɛ hɛn,
Na W'amayɛ adom no ntsi
Soɛ akra a wɔaberɛ nyina;
Sunsum a wɔnenam nyina
Gye hɔn kɔ W'asomdwee mu.  Amen.

name: MHB 262:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. NDAASE nka Nyame,
Ɔno na ɔpetse
N'adom beberee no
Gu No nkowaa a wɔwɔ wiadze nyinara do 
Nyia ɔma konyim n',
Hom nyi No ayɛw,
Oewie dwuma n' dzi;
Enyidzi nye enyimnyam nka Jesus nko!

name: MHB 262:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn konyim Wura
N'asɛm edzi mu,
Ɔnoara edzi nyim
Na ɔawosow hɛll ahenman no dzendzen,
Oeyi N'abasa,
Oesiesie No dɔm;
Ɔakyerɛ N'enyimnyam
Dze edzi N'amandzehu tum ho dase.

name: MHB 262:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Oebue abobow n'
Ama ehiafo,
Ɔagye hɔn wɔ bɔn m',
Ɔama ndwaman na atowgyefo aba m';
Wɔastse enyigye ndze,
Woenya fahodzi,
Eguambaa n' bɔgyaa m';
Woenya fakyɛ pii wɔ Jesus Ne dzin mu.

name: MHB 262:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ana yɛnnkɔtow
Hɛn Agyenkwa Hen ndwom?
Yedzi Wo dase,
Yɛdze enyigye dze hɛn nkwage to Wo do,
'Wo Jesus, ehyira,
Agyedzifo adɔr,
Na yɛdze ndaase
Ka dɛ mbɔbɔrhu m' nko na wɔdze akyɛ hɛn.

name: MHB 262:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. No Sunsum kenyan
No ndwuma wɔ hɛn mu;
N'adom anwanwadze n',
Ɔyɛɛ no tsetseber mu ma ɔboor do,
Nkyɛ nyimpa eehu
Ne nsɛnkyerɛdze no,
Wɔaagye hɛn Agyenkwa n',
Na woeefua fakyɛ na asomdwee nsɛmpa n' mu.

name: MHB 262:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn nyina Agyenkwa,
Erefrɛ abɔn a
Wɔafom ɔkwan no;
O ma wontum nnya ɔman kor wɔ da kor!
Na afei ma Wo
Ho nyimdzee ntserɛw
Wiadze mbea nyina,
Na Nyame enyimnyam nhyɛ wiadze nyina ma.   Amen.

name: MHB 263:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. MBRƐ ogya kɛse n' si dzɛw a!
Adom nserama na ɔsɔe,
Jesus dɔ tɔ aman mu,
Ma ne nyina dzɛw framfram,
Ɔdze ogya baa wiadze;
Wɔsɔɔ no wɔ akoma m',
O nkyɛ nyimpa nyina eenya gya n'\n
Na woeenya enyimnyam dɛw n' bi.

name: MHB 263:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 263:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyame mba, hom nyi Agyenkwa ayɛw;
Oebue abow no petee,
Ɔaka adom asɛm no,
Wɔahyɛ asɛm n'enyimnyam
Jesus wɔ tum dɛ ɔgye hɛn,
Ɔno nko dzii dwuma no;
Nyia N'asɛm bɔɔ wiadze no,
N'edwuma nyina dzi mu.

name: MHB 263:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ennhu mununkum kumaa
Dɛ nsakum a ɔwɔ wimu no?
Sesei ɔatserɛw wɔ wimu,
Kata asaase nyina do
Hwɛ! Anohoba mpetsema
Fi sor rososɔ dada;
Ɔnnkɛkyɛr na Ewuradze ehue
No dɔ Sunsum no nyina!

name: MHB 264:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hwɛ! Ɔdze mununkum risian, 
Nyia da bi ɔtɔɔr hɛn ntsi n';
Ahotsewfo mpempem ka ho,
Dzi N' ekyir kumbɔɔ reba:
Alleluia!
Nyame reba ebedzi hen.

name: MHB 264:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Enyienyi nyina bohu No 
Dɛ oewuna ahentar wusuww;
Hɔn a woemmbu N' bi, wɔtɔɔn No n',
Wopirapiraa N', bɔɔ N' mbeamudua mu n'
Wobotwa ewuo,
Da a wobohu Messiah n'.

name: MHB 264:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 264:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 265:1
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. MBOBOW pa, hom mma hom tsir do,
Ndadzeban, hom mbuebue,
Mom mma Enyimnyan Hen no mbɛsen;
Mbeamudua n' wɔ akono.

name: MHB 265:2
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Tseasefo Nyame N'akofo,
No nsordaafo krɔnkrɔn,
Hom ngyinangyina hom gyinabea,
Mbrɛ anan nntsiaa hɔ da.

name: MHB 265:3
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Hom suar na hom ahoɔdzen suar dze,
Hom Sahen N'ahoɔdzen m',
Hom nkedzi nyim nsaase nyina do;
Ne nyina bɛyɛ Nedze.

name: MHB 265:4
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 265:5
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 266:1
title: George Thomas Coster, 1835-1912.
verse:
. FI kwaam' 'naafo, boka, na anee,
Dabɛn na hͻn a wͻahwer nhyira
Hͻn nyina benya daa ahomgye
Wͻ Christ Wo mu?

name: MHB 266:2
title: George Thomas Coster, 1835-1912.
verse:
. Dabɛn na 'sukwankyɛba man
Dze Asɛmpa kandzea bɛdzɛw
Na nyimpa eh nyina hͻn Pomfo
Wͻ Christ, Wo mu?

name: MHB 266:3
title: George Thomas Coster, 1835-1912.
verse:
. Dabɛn na anaafo mpoano nyina
Mu dͻm a wͻapon hͻn nyinara
Bͻsoɛr na wͻahoahoa hͻnho
Wͻ Christ Wo mu?

name: MHB 266:4
title: George Thomas Coster, 1835-1912.
verse:
. Dabɛn na boka nsaase n' do
Anhweahyew nkurow mu nyimpa
Bɛna hͻn nsa do wͻ som mu.
Ama Wo, Christ?

name: MHB 266:5
title: George Thomas Coster, 1835-1912.
verse:
. Dabɛn na wiadzefo befi
Sum no mu aba kan no mu,
Na ͻkra biara benya daa
Kan wͻ Wo mu?

name: MHB 266:6
title: George Thomas Coster, 1835-1912.
verse:
. Ewuradze, ma nkͻnhyɛ ber n’ mbra;
Tsetse ahenkyɛw na nhyiren n’.
Obiara benya guandͻbea.
Fie wͻ Wo mu.

name: MHB 267:1
title: Henry Downton, 1818-1905.
verse:
. EWURADZE, W'asɔr no roweɔn;
Dabɛn na wiadze betsie W'?
Dabɛn na anafua su botwa?
Bɔhyɛ da n' bɛba dabɛn?
Hwɛ dɛ ndɔbaa ber enya edu
Rotweɔn apaafo n' ara!
Wo Ba N'ahoguan no yɛɛ kwa?
Hoɔdzenfo mfa asadze.

name: MHB 267:2
title: Henry Downton, 1818-1905.

name: MHB 267:3
title: Henry Downton, 1818-1905.

name: MHB 268:12
title: Edward Denny, 1796-1889.
verse:
. Kwantunyi ankonam ne kan, 
Adzekyee Woraba,
Pue, na tow W' anapa nserɛmɛn n'
Fa pam hɛn yaw nyina.
 
. Ewuradze siarfo, ma mbeambea 
Na nsupruw nyina ntow
Ndwom nyi W' adehye Dzin ayɛw,
Wɔmfa Wo nyɛ hɔn Hen.

name: MHB 268:3
title: Edward Denny, 1796-1889.
verse:
. Ma wiadze nyinara a afei 
Wɔasɛ sor man hyɛnhyɛnn n',
Wɔmma ehurusi ndwom do
Wɔmfa nkaa Wo dɔ no.

name: MHB 268:4
title: Edward Denny, 1796-1889.
verse:
. Jesus, W' abɔdze risi nkrum- 
Asaase, Po, nye wim'-
Wɔnye hɛn akoma yɛ kor
Kekam' dzendzen frɛ Wo.

name: MHB 268:5
title: Edward Denny, 1796-1889.
verse:
. Mbeamudua n' n' adom, n' asomdwee 
Ne nyinara Wodze a,
Afei enyimnyam ahenkyɛw n'
Na konyim n' nyɛ Wodze.    Amen.

name: MHB 269:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. AGYENKWA, yenyim dɛ 
Ennsesa ara da;
Afei fa Wo dzin no
Mu ndzepa hyɛ hɛn mu,
Na dabiara dua W'asɛm do
Ma Wo bɔgyaa adasefo ndɔr.

name: MHB 269:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wo nkorɔfo a agye hɔn
Efi bɔn nkekaa mu n',
Sɛ ehyɛ dɛ ɔmbra mu a,
Wɔbɔdɔr na woenyin,
Na ankor bɛyɛ apem asoɛr
Eyi W' ayɛw wɔ ase nye wimu.

name: MHB 269:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ada Wo tum edzi
Wɔ emi na akra pii mu;
Na nyimpa mpemmpem so
Abɛka Wo nkorɔfo a
Agye hɔn bɔn afɔdzi mu n' ho,
Wɔ nkwa na akomamutsewee mu. Amen.

name: MHB 27:1
title: John Stuart Blackie, 1809-95
verse:
. ABƆFO krɔnn,
'Kɛse, nkumaa,
Hom ntow Ewuradze ayɛyi!
Sor na ase, na abodze nyina.
Nyimpa, abɔdze mu dansewa,
Hom ni Ewuradze Nyame ayɛw!

name: MHB 27:2
title: John Stuart Blackie, 1809-95
verse:
. Wi, bosom hyɛnn,
Sum, ewiaber,
Wimu a nworaba ayɛ ma;
Mununkum, n-su na ehum,
Nyame mba a wɔtsea m' enyigye 'm,
Hom nyi Ewuradze Nyame ayɛw.

name: MHB 27:3
title: John Stuart Blackie, 1809-95
verse:
. Po do fitaa,
Ka N'enyimnyam;
Abo a epo afa do,
N-su a ɔkɔ sor ba famu bio,
Asorɛkye ba enyim san ekyir,
Hom nyi Ewuradze Nyame ayɛw.

name: MHB 27:4
title: John Stuart Blackie, 1809-95
verse:
. Botan, kokwaa,
Kwaa na supruw,
Ɔkɔr n' srɔnsrɔmbea a ɔpɛ;
Mbepɔw atsentsen a wɔyɛ kumbɔɔ,
Mbepɔw a etsifi sukwankyɛ
Hom nyi Ewuradze Nyame ayɛw.

name: MHB 27:5
title: John Stuart Blackie, 1809-95
verse:
. Nyew, esutsen,
Yi N'ayɛw daa,
Ifi bepɔw tsirm' sianee;
Nsunyiwa hyɛnhyɛnn a rowora,
Ehum dzendzen a rutu huu huu,
Yi Ewuradze Nyame ayɛw.

name: MHB 27:6
title: John Stuart Blackie, 1809-95
verse:
. Yi N'ayɛw daa,
Odomfo pa a;
Yi Egya, Domfo Ewurade ayɛw!
Ɔkra biara a rofow kɔ sor,
Menba a dze dɛw tow ndwom biara,
Yi Ewuradze tumfo ayɛw.  Amen.

name: MHB 270:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. CHRIST wɔ m'akoma mu pɛ dɛ 
Ɔka N'enyimnyamsɛm no kyerɛ!
Motow No ho ayɛyi ndwom,
Munntum dɛ migya N'ayɛyi,
Me gyirama yɛ ntsɛm na ɔtow
Mo sor Hen N'enyimnyam ho ndwom.

name: MHB 270:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 270:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Fa sunsum afowa bɔ W' ntoa
Na fa Wo tum krɔnkrɔn n' kitsa;
Nu W'ahoɔdzen m', Owura Tumfo,
Gye som na abɔdzin no, Wodze a,
Da Wo som na Wo dzin edzi,
Dodow Pomfo Nyame, sian famu!

name: MHB 270:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 271:1
title: Matthew Bridges, 1800-94;
verse:
. HOM nhyɛ Eguambaa N' 'henkyɛw 
Wɔ N'ahengua no do;
Tsie! Sor ndwom n'ahyɛ ndwom nyina do,
No ndwom n' nko na wɔtse,
Me kra, nyan na tow ndwom
Ma Nyia owui maa wo n',
Na hua N' dɛ ɔyɛ wo Hen tsitsir
Wɔ mbersantsen nyina mu.

name: MHB 271:2
title: Matthew Bridges, 1800-94;
verse:
. Hom nhyɛ nkwa Wura 'henkyɛw, 
Nyia odzii owu do nyim,
Na odzii konyim wɔ aperdzi mu,
Maa hɔn a ɔbɛgyee hɔn n',
N'enyimnyam na yɛtow;
Owui na ɔfoow sor,
Ɔdze onnyiewiei nkwa brɛ hɛn;
Oedzi owu do, tse ase.

name: MHB 271:3
title: Matthew Bridges, 1800-94;
verse:
. Hom nhyɛ asomdwee Hen;
Ɔatserɛw N'ahendzi mu,
Wɔ mbea nyina ma ko abɔ adze;
Na asɔr na ayɛyi etsim,
N'ahendzi nnkɔbɔ adze,
Na N'epiranan no ho n',
Paradise nhyiren fɛɛfɛw gugu,
Na oyi hua daa nyina.

name: MHB 271:4
title: Matthew Bridges, 1800-94;
verse:
. Hom nhyɛ No ɔdɔ Hen;
Hom nhwɛ N' nsa nye Ne mfemu
N'ekur a wɔda ho hu n' sor no,
Wɔahyɛ no enyinmyam,
Hom nyina nhua Pomfo n'!
Ɔwo iwui maa me;
W'ayɛyi na Wo ''nyam nnkɛpa
Wɔ mbersantsen nyina mu.   Amen.

name: MHB 272:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. BEEBIARA mbrɛ ewia ɔhyerɛn, 
Jesus twa dɛ obedzi hen;
N' ahendzi tsen fi pomu' du pomu',
Gyedɛ ewia fir dɛ ɔnntɔ bio.

name: MHB 272:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Asɔr nyina wɔbɛyɛ ama N', 
Na wɔdze ayɛyi ebu N' kyɛw;
Ne dzin, tse dɛ eduhuam a,
Nye afɔr nyina botu akɔ sor.

name: MHB 272:34
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 272:56
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Beebiara mbrɛ ɔkyerɛ No tum, 
Wu na mbusu fi hɔ koraa:
No mu na nhyira a Adam yeew no n',
Ne mbanana nya ma ɔbor do.
 
. Wɔmma abɔdze nyina nsoɛr 
M-fa ayɛyɛdze mbrɛ hɔn Hen;
Sor abɔfo mfa ndwom nsian bio,
Na asaasemba so nsuo mu ntow.    Amen.

name: MHB 273:1
title: Bianco da Siena, d. 1434;
verse:
. O Nyame Dɔ, sian famu, 
Bra bɔhwehwɛ me kra,
Fa Woara Wo hyew dzendzen bi n' bɔsoɛ mu;
Kyigyinafo e, twe bɛn!
Bopue m' akoma mu,
Na ma Wo gya krɔnkrɔn no mbɛfram me kra.

name: MHB 273:234
title: Bianco da Siena, d. 1434;
verse:
. Ma ɔndzɛw ara yie, 
Nkodu dɛ ɔbɛhyew
Wiadze akɔndɔ nyina ma ɔaatɔ nso;
Na ma W' enyimnyam kan n'
Ɔnhyerɛn m' enyim daa,
Ɔnhyerɛn mo ho nye mo kwan mu nyina.
 
. Na ma ɔdɔ krɔnkrɔn 
Ɔnyɛ m' egudo atar,
Na ma menhyɛ ahobrɛadze wɔ ase;
Ahobrɛadze 'koma a,
Ɔdze noho to famu,
Na ɔdze nyinsuwa kyir noara n' esintɔ.
 
. Dɛm yi na ɔbɛma 
Akɔndɔ dzendzen a
Me kra benya no nnkenya kabea mpo;
Mbrɛ n' ahoɔfɛw bɛyɛ n'
Obi runntum nnkyerɛ
Gyedɛ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn ayɛ n' ne tsenabea.

name: MHB 274:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 274:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Obiara a Nyame bɛfrɛ no n',
Anohoba no yɛ nedze;
Ɔfrɛ hom a hom wɔ ekyirkyir,
Hom ngye dza Christ aka no ndzi.

name: MHB 274:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Sɛ minya kɔ a, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn
Ɔwerɛkyefo no bɛba,
Ɔdze nnuhofo akoma
Bɛyɛ Ne tsenabea daa nyina.

name: MHB 274:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 274:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Sɛ obiara a obisa benya,
Na eda ho si abɔnfo do a;
Bra dɛ ehum a ɔyɛ dzen,
Adom kɛse, bogu hɛn do.

name: MHB 274:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 275:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. JESUS, yɛdan W'asɛmpa no a
Ekae ber a ewɔ ha no dɛ;
Me dzin m' Egya no bɔsoma
Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, Werɛkyekyefo n'.

name: MHB 275:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Adam asefo anohoba n'
Owura, ma ɔmbra mu mma hɛn;
Na ma hɛn W'adom Sunsum no,
Ma ɔnkyerɛ hɛn wo pa no.

name: MHB 275:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Fa adasa sor Kyerɛkyerɛfo
Kwankyerɛfo pa no ma hɛn;
Ɔmbɛkaa hɛn Wo nsɛm nyina,
Na ɔnkyerɛw wɔ hɛn akoma do.

name: MHB 275:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔno nko na obotum dze
N-kwasɛm no edzi dwuma,
Na ɔama obiara asɛdze,
Nyankopɔn daa asomdwee no.

name: MHB 275:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔwo na Nyankopɔn asomdwee n',
O nkyɛ afei ɔdze aabrɛ hɛn,
Na ɔdze sor tum aahyɛ hɛn ma
Na oeetu suro na bɔn ase!

name: MHB 275:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma yenhu ɔdɔ ne trɛ, no war,
Na Nyame No krɔn na No bun,
Na hyɛ 'nyimnyam mba n' nyina nsew,
Na ma yɛnsakyer nyɛ dɛ Ɔwo.  Amen.

name: MHB 276:12
title: John Keble, 1792-1866
verse:
. TSETSEBER a Nyame siaan wiadze n', 
Ɔbaa n' tum nye ebufuwm';
Fua bɔɔ apetse N' ananadze,
Fa yɛɛ sum, fa daan gya.
 
. Na ne mprɛnu no a ɔbae no, 
Ɔbaa n' tum nye dɔ mu;
Bɔkɔɔ kyɛn anapa mframa
Nna Ebubur Krɔnkrɔn n' bae.

name: MHB 276:3
title: John Keble, 1792-1866
verse:
. Ogya a osiaan Sinai do no 
Ɔframee ma ɔyɛɛ hu,
Ɔdaan enyimnyam ahenkyɛw
Wɔ ahotseweefo tsir do.

name: MHB 276:45
title: John Keble, 1792-1866
verse:
. Na dε mbrε Israel dze hu
Tsee ndze kεse mbordo n’,
Abεn a abᴐfo mpo suro,
Gyigyee fua kebii mu.
 
. Dεm na hεn Nyame no Sunsum
Bodwiir no nguankuw do n’,
Wᴐtsee ndze fi sor wᴐ mbea nyina,
Dε mframa a ᴐyε dzen.

name: MHB 276:6
title: John Keble, 1792-1866
verse:
. Ͻhyε Nyankopᴐn N’Asᴐr ma,
Twa bᴐn wiadze yi ho hyia:
Gyedε ntsintsiman ‘koma nko
Nna onnya no mu kwan.

name: MHB 276:7
title: John Keble, 1792-1866
verse:
. Ewuradze, bra, Nyansa, Dᴐ, Tum,
Bue hέn aso ma yεntse;
Mma ᴐgyeber yi mmpa hεn ho,
Dᴐ mu o, suro mu o, gye hεn. 	Amen.

name: MHB 277:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. WOETSIE Gyefo Ne mpaabɔ,
Wɔasoma Werɛkyekyefo n';
Hɛn Wura N'anohoba,
Ber a ɔrokɔ sor no.

name: MHB 277:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Christ a afei ɔkɔ sor
Ndɔmmum mu na odzi kan;
N'atamfo nam No do nye
Adom nye Nyame tsena.

name: MHB 277:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 277:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyia ɔtse akoma brɛfo mu n'.
Onnkefi hɔ akɔ ara da,
Ɔreyɛ edwuma hɛn mu
Kɛpɛm dɛ obotu bɔn.

name: MHB 277:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɔ ɔboa hɛn apensi,
Hɛn nkrumsi n' so omia mu;
Odzi ma hɛn komm wɔ hɔ,
Ogu ahom gu mpaabɔ do.

name: MHB 277:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Bra, Sunsum Hɔho botoo,
Bɛtsena hɛn akoma mu;
Kenyan Wo nkwa wɔ hɛn mu,
Eyɛ Akyɛdze n' na Mafo.    Amen.

name: MHB 278:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. FA hɛn suro na haw,
Na hɛn nyinsuwa kɔ;
Sunsum no aba,
Jesus Ne dasefo n' asan kɔ Ne fie.

name: MHB 278:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn Wura No bɔhyɛ a
Ɔdze ama No sor n'
Fi wimu ebodu;
Ɔka kyerɛ hɛn dɛ wɔakrɔn hɛn Hen wɔ sor.

name: MHB 278:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn Dzimafo n' nam
N' bɔgyaa na mpaabɔ m'
Enya akyɛdze no,
Ɔaserɛ enya Werɛkyekyefo n' ama hɛn.

name: MHB 278:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn enyimanyan Hen n'
Ehue N' Sunsum ma
Ɔabɛnye N 'dɔm atsena,
Na onnkeyi No efi hɔn mu ara bio.

name: MHB 278:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn sor Kwankyerɛfo
Nye hɛn bɛtsena,
Akyekye hɛn werɛ,
Na ɔdze No dɔ ahenman aba hɛn akoma m'.

name: MHB 278:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Gyedzi akoma
Nya N'ahenman no,
No tum, N'asomdwee,
No nkwa, na N'enyigye mbordo afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 278:7
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hom mma yendzi dɛw
Akoma nye ndze m',
Yɛmfa hɛn Wura,
Na yɛmbɔ ose ber a yɛnam sar no do.

name: MHB 278:8
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hom nye Sunsum no
Ntu nkɔ sor Zion,
Hom nsoɛr konyimdzi mu,
Hom nye hɛn Nyame nnantsew nkɔ ɔsor fie.

name: MHB 279:1
title: Percy Dearmer, 1867-1938.
verse:
. SUNSUM Krɔnkrɔn, Nyame,
Ahoɔfɛw yɛ Wodze;
Dza ɔso na dza osuar nyina wɔ W' mu,
Wimu yɛ W'asɔr dan.

name: MHB 279:2
title: Percy Dearmer, 1867-1938.
verse:
. Ewia a ofir Nyame,
Nyimpa na nhyiren nkwa,
Nyansa na ahoɔdzen a ɔdze Wo
Tum hyɛ wiadze nyina ma.

name: MHB 279:3
title: Percy Dearmer, 1867-1938.
verse:
. Ɔwo nye ɔdɔ bura,
Koryɛ Nyame nye wo;
Apapafo yɛ kor Wo mu,
Na wɔhyerɛn Wo kan mu.

name: MHB 279:4
title: Percy Dearmer, 1867-1938.
verse:
. Ahotseweefo na
Wɔbɛyɛɛ W'asomafo;
Na kandzea a wɔkyerɛ wiadze kwan n',
Wɔsɔɔ no Wo gya n' mu.

name: MHB 279:5
title: Percy Dearmer, 1867-1938.
verse:
. Nkra a ɔba hɛn nkyɛn no
Nam Wo mframa mu ba;
Kan a ɔhyerɛn hɛn adaaso ekyir no
Yɛ biribi a adwen ho.

name: MHB 279:6
title: Percy Dearmer, 1867-1938.
verse:
. Yɛserɛ fɛkuwbɔ,
'Dɔ, dɛw na asomdwee mu
Ma yeenyin nyimdzee na ahoɔdzen m',
Na Wo ho nyansa mu.  Amen.

name: MHB 28:1
title: St. Francis of Asissi. 1182-1226;
verse:
. Hɛn Nyame N' abɔdze nyina, 
Hom mma hom ndze do nye hɛn ntow
Alleluia, Alleluia!
Ewia hyeehyew, 'hyerɛn dɛ sika,
Bosoom nwinwin, 'tse dɛ dwetε,
      Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
      Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!

name: MHB 28:234
title: St. Francis of Asissi. 1182-1226;
verse:
. M-frama a itu ehum dzendzen, 
Esuwusiw a esen wimu,
Yi N' ayɛw, Alleluia!
Bosoom, fa enyigye yi N' ayɛw,
N-woraba, hom mbɔ hom ndzem'
      Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
      Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!
 
. N-su krɔngyenn a erepem, 
Tow ndwom ma w' Ewuradze ntse,
Alleluia, Alleluia!
Ogya hurenhuren a eyɛ dzen,
'Wo a ema nyimpa hyew na kan,
     Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
     Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!
 
. Asaase pa a Nyame ama 
Daa daa iyi siar ma ne mba,
Yi N' ayɛw, Alleluia!
Wo mu nhyiren nye nduaba so,
Womfifir nkyerɛ N' enyimnyam, 
    Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
    Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!

name: MHB 28:567
title: St. Francis of Asissi. 1182-1226;
verse:
. N-korɔfo a hom 'koma dwe nyina, 
Na hom dze bɔn kyɛ, hom so mbra,
Hom so ntow Alleluia!
Amandzehufo, 'werɛhofo,
Hom nyi N' ayɛw, mfa ne nyina nsoa N',
    Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
    Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia! 
 
. Ao, Owu, yamuyiefo a edwe, 
'Wo a itwa hɛn owu ngyam do,
Yi N' ayɛw, Alleluia!
'Wo na 'dze Nyame mba kɔ fie,
Hɛn Wura Christ faa wo kwan n' mu:
   Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
   Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!
 
. Ndzɛmba nyina nhyira Bɔfo n', 
Wɔmfa mbrɛhoadze nkotow No,
Nyi N' ayɛw, Alleluia!
Wɔmfa ayɛyi mma Egya, nye Ba,
Nye Sunsum no, Ebiasa Kor, 
   Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
   Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!

name: MHB 280:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. MOHWEHWƐ Sunsum tum wɔ m' mu,
Ɔdɔ na adwen pa dze n' bi,
Tum a medze bedzi bɔn do;
Dɔ a medze bɔdɔ W' na adasa
Ahosan a yaw nntum nnka no,
Na owu mu mpo ɔyɛ dzen.

name: MHB 280:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Dabɛn na mebɛtse ndze no,
Dza anokwafo nko tse no?
Fakyɛ, asomdwee na enyigye
Nye Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no nam;
O bra, na tsenenenee krɔnkrɔn
Christ na N'adze nyina bɛyɛ m'dze.

name: MHB 280:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O nkyɛ Werɛkyekyefo no aaba
Na oeenntwa mu aannkɔ ara da,
Na mbom ɔaayɛ N' tsenabew wɔ m' mu
Ma ɔmfa m'akoma nyɛ Nedze,
Na ɔmfa No dɔ n' ntsena mo mu
Ma menyɛ Nyame W'asɔrfi.

name: MHB 280:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 280:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nsewhyɛdze a ɔkyerɛ dɛ 
Meenya ahenman no wɔ hen?
Mepɛ dɛ m'tse nsɔwano n' nka,
Onyame No dɔ nsewhyɛ no;
Hue ɔsor dɔ amayɛ no
Gu m'akoma mu nyinara.  Amen.

name: MHB 281:1
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.
verse:
. ME kra, mma nnkɔhwehwɛ No koraa,
Innkohu No wɔ hɔ;
Onnyi asaase ase sum mu,
Onnyi ɔsor mframa mu.

name: MHB 281:2
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.

name: MHB 281:3
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.
verse:
. Adwen nye adwen dzi ehyia
Na ɔkra nye ɔkra bɔ awɛ;
Nyia ɔnnhwehwɛ Nyame Noara n' mu n',
Onnkohu N' ara da.

name: MHB 281:4
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.
verse:
. Na sɛ enyidoadzehu no,
Fi wo mu ara ba a,
Nyame N' Sunsum bɛhyɛ wiadze ma,
Na N'enyimnyam bɛhyerɛn.

name: MHB 281:5
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.
verse:
. Ɔwo rinnhia mfɛfo ara da,
'Rennyɛ ankonam da,
Nyame a ɔtsena hɛn mu n' bɛka w' ho,
Na ɔakyerɛ wo dza ɔpɛ.

name: MHB 281:6
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.
verse:
. Akyɛdze mapa nye adom,
Dɛ Nyankopɔn bɛpen
Ayɛ w'akoma N'atsenae,
Na ɔayɛ wo Nyɛnko!

name: MHB 282:1
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. NYANSA Sunsum, yi hɛn enyi
Fi wiadze egyangyandze do
Kɔ ɔsor nokwar do;
Nokwar ntseasee Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn,
Fa W'sor kan no hyɛ hɛn akra ma
Wɔnhwehwɛ ɔsor ndzɛmba.

name: MHB 282:2
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 282:3
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Nyimdzee Sunsum, gya hɛn anan
Fa W'akwan a mbusu nnyi m' no do,
Mbrɛ abɔfo fa no;
Hɔ na ebɛyɛ hɛn hwɛfo sɔnn,
Ɔdwe Sunsum a eyɛ krɔnn,
Ama yaabɛn Nyame.

name: MHB 282:4
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Nyankopɔn suro ho Sunsum, 
Hɛn abrabɔ nyina mu, twe bɛn,
Wɔ hɛn akoma mu;
Fa obu krɔnkrɔn hyɛ hɛn akoma m',
Ma yɛnsom No, yendzi Ne pɛ
Tsenenee turodoo n' do.

name: MHB 282:5
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Gya hɛn asomdwee na ɔko m'
Kodu nkwa a onnyi ewiei no mu,
Na yeenya hɛn akatua;
Ama yaako hɛn bra mu ko,
Yaayɛ dzen wɔ Wo tum no mu,
Yɛnye Christ eedzi hen.

name: MHB 283:1
title: Harriet Auber, 1773-1862.
verse:
. Ansaana hɛn Gyefo siarfo 
Nye hɛn ridzi mpaamu n',
Ogyaa hɛn Ɔkwankyerɛfo dɛ
Ɔnye hɛn ntsena.

name: MHB 283:2
title: Harriet Auber, 1773-1862.
verse:
. Ɔbae wɔ ebubur suban mu, 
Dɛ ɔatrɛ n' atsabanm',
Ɔdze dɔ na asomdwee boguu
No nkorɔfo do.

name: MHB 283:34
title: Harriet Auber, 1773-1862.
verse:
. Ɔdze ogya ngyrama bae dɛ 
Ɔrebɛkyerɛkyerɛ hɛn;
Ɔtse dɛ mframa, ɔyɛ dzen,
Na wonnhu so.
 
. 'Koma biara a ɔbrɛ adze n', 
Ɔba bɛtsena mu hɔ,
Na ɔdae ahom dɛɛdɛw bi
Dze gye no do.

name: MHB 283:56
title: Harriet Auber, 1773-1862.
verse:
. Ne ndze na yɛtse no bi 
Dɛ ewimbir mframa n';
Osiw mfomso kwan,
Ka sor ho nsɛm.
 
. Papa biara a ɔwɔ hɛn ho, 
Konyim biara a yedzi,
Adwen krɔnkrɔn biara a yenya,
Ofir Noara.

name: MHB 283:7
title: Harriet Auber, 1773-1862.
verse:
. Ahotsew nye adom Sunsum, 
Hwɛ hɛn mberɛwyɛ tsemam';
O tsena hɛn 'komam', na yɛ ma
Ɔmfata Wo.    Amen.

name: MHB 284:1
title: Henry More, 1614-87.
verse:
. EGYA, sɛ ampa yeda ho
Gye anohoba n’ yɛ hɛndzé a,
Adom no so bɛyɛ hendze,
Na ogya n’ bɛyɛ hɛn ahenkyɛw.

name: MHB 284:2
title: Henry More, 1614-87.
verse:
. Gye hɛn adzesérɛ yi to mu,
Fa Wo krͻnkrͻnyɛ gu hɛn do,
Ma hɛn nhumu, ahobrɛadze, dͻ.
Nsiyɛ ͻnye koryɛ na tum.

name: MHB 284:3
title: Henry More, 1614-87.
verse:
. Ma hɛn sunsum a oyi atsɛn,
Ma hɛn tum a wͻdze kyerɛkyerɛ,
Na eedu tsibowa biara mu,
Na aaka akoma a ͻnngye nndzi.

name: MHB 284:4
title: Henry More, 1614-87.
verse:
. Sunsum a ͻtsew ogya ho,
Dza ahwehwɛ adwen mu no,
Dza oyi akͻndͻbͻn nyina
Na ͻma yɛbͻ bra krͻnkrͻn.

name: MHB 284:5
title: Henry More, 1614-87.
verse:
. Gyedzi sunsum, Wo ber yi mu
Bubu ͻbͻn no tum koraa;
Fa W‘ahoͻdzen n'tsiatsia no do,
Na dzi no do konyim koraa.

name: MHB 284:6
title: Henry More, 1614-87.
verse:
. Sunsum a ͻma hɛn ahom,
Dza ͻkyérɛw mbra wa hɛn akoma m',
Awerɛhow, yaw na aperdzi,
Na abͻdze nyina enyigye

name: MHB 285:1
title: Alfred Henry Vine, 1845-1917.
verse:
. NYAME ahom, hom gu hɛn do,
Sɛ yɛbɔ mpaa a, ka hɛn ho;
Ɔwo nye hɛn nkwa nsunyiwa,
Hɛn da fofor ne kan nye 'Wo.

name: MHB 285:2
title: Alfred Henry Vine, 1845-1917.
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, yehu dɛ 'ka hɛn ho,
Yɛnnhwehwɛ W' krɔn anaa Wo bun:
Yɛtse Wo ndze dɛ ebɛn hɛn;
Sunsum kasa kyerɛ sunsum.

name: MHB 285:3
title: Alfred Henry Vine, 1845-1917.
verse:
. Christ nye hɛn Dzimafo wɔ sor,
Ɔwo na idzi ma hɛn ha;
Yɛserɛ Wo, gyina ma nokwar,
Yi bɔn asɛmbisa nyina ano.

name: MHB 285:4
title: Alfred Henry Vine, 1845-1917.
verse:
. O m'akoma kyingyefo yi a!
Naaso minyim mo Kwankyerɛfo;
Me Nyɛnko krɔnkrɔn , fa kyɛ me,
Sɛ mpɛn pii medan fi Wo ho a.

name: MHB 285:5
title: Alfred Henry Vine, 1845-1917.
verse:
. Ka mo ho ber a nyɛnko biara
Nntum nnhu m'akoma m' esumasɛm,
Na sɛ suro mpo hyɛ hɛn do a,
Ma yenhu W', Ɔwerɛkyekyefo.

name: MHB 286:1
title: William Henry Parker, 1845-1929.
verse:
. SUNSUM krͻnkrͻn, tsie hɛn;
Boa hɛn adwontow m’,
Hom gu hɛn ndaase ndwom a
Yɛdze kamfo W’ mu.

name: MHB 286:2
title: William Henry Parker, 1845-1929.
verse:
. SUNSUM krͻnkrͻn, kaa hɛn
Wͻ hɛn mpaabͻ mu;
Bɛn hɛn na kyerɛ hɛn
Dzà ͻwͻ dɛ yɛkà.

name: MHB 286:3
title: William Henry Parker, 1845-1929.
verse:
.  SUNSUM krͻnkrͻn, hyerɛn 
Nwomà a yɛkenkan do;
Ma kan a yehia daa
Ͻnhyerɛn wͻ do.

name: MHB 286:4
title: William Henry Parker, 1845-1929.
verse:
. SUNSUM krͻnkrͻn, ma hɛn
Ahobrɛadze adwen;
Ma yenyɛ dɛ Jesus,
Yɛmbrɛ hɛnho adze.

name: MHB 286:5
title: William Henry Parker, 1845-1929.
verse:
. SUNSUM krͻnkrͻn, hyerɛn
Hɛn ndwuma nkumaa do;
Na hɛn agodzi mu,
Mmà ebufuw nnsɛɛ no.

name: MHB 286:6
title: William Henry Parker, 1845-1929.
verse:
. SUNSUM krͻnkrͻn, boa hɛn,
Fa Wo tum kɛse n’;
Ma yenyi bͻn akwa,
Na yenyi dzà oye.     Amen.

name: MHB 287:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. SUNSUM, mo Werɛkyekyefo! 
Fi sor noho dwir hɛn do,
Tow Wo kan hyerɛn hɛn do.

name: MHB 287:10
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma yɛntsena krɔnkrɔnyɛ mu, 
Na dom hɛn asomdwee wu,
Na fa hɛn kɔ Wo dɛw mu.        Amen.

name: MHB 287:23
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ehiafo hɔn Boafo, bra! 
'Wo a ema sor ahonya,
Akoma nyina kan, bra.
 
. Ɔwerɛkyekyefo kɛse, 
Bɔsoɛ hɛn akoma mu,
Na ma yennya W' asomdwee.

name: MHB 287:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔfona mu ahomgye,
Ahohyehyem' ahotɔ,
Bra beyi hɛn nyinsuwa mu.

name: MHB 287:56789
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Siar Ewia! yɛserɛ Wo, pue; 
Fa Wo kan nye Wo ntseasee
Hyɛ agyedzifo mu ma.
 
. Sɛ Ɔwo ammboa hɛn a, 
Yɛbɔ mbɔdzen dɛn ara a,
Ne nyinara bɛyɛ gyan.
 
. Hohor hɛn mu fi nyina, 
Fɔw hɛn akoma a woetwie,
Yɛ sunsum pirafo edur.
 
. Ma asoɔdzenfo nyɛ Wo pɛ,
Bɔ hɔn a wɔyɛ hyew,
Fa akobɔfo bra fie.
 
. Dom agyedzifo nyina, 
Ma wontsintsim Woara,
Ma hɔn Wo dɔ akyɛdze n'.

name: MHB 288:1
title: Samuel Longfellow, 1819-92.
verse:
. SUNSUM Krɔnkrɔn, Nokwafo,
Yi Woho kyerɛ me kra;
Nyame asɛm na hɛn mu kan,
Nyan mo sunsum, bue m'enyi.

name: MHB 288:2
title: Samuel Longfellow, 1819-92.
verse:
. Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, Nyame dɔ,
Hyerɛn m'akoma yi mu,
Kenyan apɛdze biara,
Hyew honam ndwuma nyina.

name: MHB 288:3
title: Samuel Longfellow, 1819-92.
verse:
. Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, Nyame tum,
Ma minnya akokodur,
Ma minnya ahoɔdzen ntsena ase,
Memfa ndamyɛ ndzi aper.

name: MHB 288:4
title: Samuel Longfellow, 1819-92.
verse:
. Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, Nyam' tsenenee,
Dzi hen wɔ me tsibowa do;
Yɛ mo Wura, na mebɛyɛ
Wodze koraa, m'bɛyɛ 'dehye.

name: MHB 288:5
title: Samuel Longfellow, 1819-92.
verse:
. Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, 'somdwee krɔnn,
M'akoma etsidaa pa,
Kasa ma po yi ntaa dzinn,
Ma ɔntsena W'asomdwee mu.

name: MHB 288:6
title: Samuel Longfellow, 1819-92.

name: MHB 289:1
title: Andrew Reed, 1787-1862.
verse:
. Nyame sunsum, tsie hɛn mpaabɔ, 
Fa dan yi yɛ wo fie,
Fa W' adom no tum nyina sian;
Bra, Sunsum kɛse, bra.

name: MHB 289:23
title: Andrew Reed, 1787-1862.
verse:
. Bra dɛ ekan: ma yenhu hɛn 
Mbɔbɔryɛ na mbusu
Na fa hɛn dua ɔbra kwan a,
Atseneneefo nyina duam'.
 
. Bra dɛ ogya, bɛtsew hɛn ho, 
Dɛ afɔrbɔ gyaframee;
Ma hɛn kra nyina nyɛ afɔr
Mma hɛn Pomfo Ne dzin.

name: MHB 289:4
title: Andrew Reed, 1787-1862.
verse:
. Bra dɛ ɔbɔw, na dɛw mu ara 
Hyira ber krɔnkrɔn yi,
Ma dza etwie ndzi dɛw dɛ onya,
Wo prɔmprɔmyɛ tum no.

name: MHB 289:5
title: Andrew Reed, 1787-1862.
verse:
. Bra dɛ ebubur, tserɛw  W' atsabanm' 
Asomdwee dɔ atsaban n';
Na ma W' asɔr a ɔwɔ asaase
Nyɛ siar dɛ sor Asɔr n'.

name: MHB 289:6
title: Andrew Reed, 1787-1862.
verse:
. Bra dɛmframa a ɔdze twitwi 
Na Pentecost adom,
Ma hɔn a Ɔbaa awo hɔn nyina
Eehu W' enyimnyam no.

name: MHB 289:7
title: Andrew Reed, 1787-1862.

name: MHB 29:1
title: George William Conder, 1821-74.

name: MHB 29:2
title: George William Conder, 1821-74.

name: MHB 29:3
title: George William Conder, 1821-74.
verse:
. Ndzɛmba nyina bɔ m' yi W'ayɛw,
Wiadze ne ndze ɔpedu
Ma ndwom a ɔnnsa da do;
Mframa na po a ɔrowor,
Nhaban na ndowa hɔn dede,
Yɛnye adze nyina yi W' ayɛw.

name: MHB 29:4
title: George William Conder, 1821-74.
verse:
. Ndzemba nyina nyi W' ayɛw,
N-su, ɔbɔsu, nyankopɔn,
Ewia a 'rokɔtɔ na fua,
N-su a ɔrepem na ehum;
Twaber na ɔpɛber so,
Yɛnye hɔn hyɛ W' enyimnyam.

name: MHB 29:5
title: George William Conder, 1821-74.
verse:
. Adom Wura yeyi W' ayɛw,
Bɔfo Kɛse, tum Asɛm,
Sunsum a ɔwɔ beebiara,
Yɛkotow W'ananadze,
Yɛma akoma do yi W' ayɛw. 
Yɛnye adze nyina yi W' ayɛw.  Amen.

name: MHB 290:1
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.
verse:
. O ADOM Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn,
Hɛn enyi ber Wo nkyerɛkyerɛ,
Wo Pentecost akyɛdze,
Ɔsor dɔ krɔnkrɔn.

name: MHB 290:2
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.
verse:
. Gyedzi a otutu nkokwaa,
Ɔsor na ase ngyirma,
Nyimdzee nyina yɛ adzegyan,
Sɛ ɔdɔ nnyi mu a.

name: MHB 290:3
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.
verse:
. Sɛ muwu atɔfowu,
Medze m'ndzɛmba ma ehiafo,
Na ɔdɔ nnyi mu a, ɔyɛ kea,
Ntsi ma me ɔdɔ.

name: MHB 290:4
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.
verse:
. Bra dɛ ɔbɔw, na dɛw mu ara
Hyira ber krɔnkrɔn yi,
Ma dza etwie ndzi dɛw dɛ onya,
Wo prɔmprɔmyɛ tum no.

name: MHB 290:5
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.
verse:
. Bra dɛ ebubur, tserɛw W'atsaban m',
Asomdwee dɔ atsaban n';
Na ma W'asɔr a ɔwɔ asaase
Nyɛ siar dɛ sor Asɔr n'.

name: MHB 290:6
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.
verse:
. Bra dɛ mframa a ɔdze twitwi
Na Pentecost adom,
Ma hɔn a ɔbaa awo hɔn nyina
Eehu W'enyimnyam no.

name: MHB 290:7
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 291:1
title: Thomas Toke Lynch, 1819-71.
verse:
. SUNSUM Domfo, nye me ntsena!
Emi so m'bɛyɛ adom ba,
Na medze nkuranhyɛ nsɛm 
Bɛda Wo bra edzi mo mu,
Na medze ɔbrɛfo ndzeyɛɛ
Bɛkasa ama m' Gyefo Christ.

name: MHB 291:2
title: Thomas Toke Lynch, 1819-71.
verse:
. Sunsum Nokwafo, nye m' ntsena!
Mo so m' bɛyɛ nokwafo.
Na medze nyansa mapa
Bɛda Wo bra edzi mo mu,
Na medze enuadɔ ndzeyɛɛ
Beyi m' Wura N' nokwardzi akyerɛ.

name: MHB 291:3
title: Thomas Toke Lynch, 1819-71.

name: MHB 291:4
title: Thomas Toke Lynch, 1819-71.
verse:
. Sunsum Tumfo, nye me ntsena!
Emi so m' bɛyɛ tumfo,
Medze tum bedzi konyim
Ber a nyimpa ahom dzi kogu;
Medze tum enyidado
Bɔkɔ enyim daa egyina.

name: MHB 291:5
title: Thomas Toke Lynch, 1819-71.
verse:
. Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, nye me ntsena!
Emi so m' bɛyɛ krɔnkrɔn;
M'bɛtsew moho efi bɔn ho,
M'bɔtɔ akɔ dza oye nko ho,
Medze dza m'benya biara
Bɛma nyia ɔdze W' maa me.

name: MHB 292:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. SUNSUM Krɔnkrɔn, sor Ebubur, bra,
Fa Wo nkenyan tum nyina,
Sɔ ɔdɔ krɔnkrɔn gya n' ano
Hɛn akoma nwinwin yi m'.

name: MHB 292:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Yɛtow hɛn daa daa ndwom no kwa,
Yɛper dɛ yɛsɔr kwa;
Hosanna nenam hɛn anomu,
Na hɛn ayɛyi ewu.

name: MHB 292:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Na yɛbɛtsena owu gyangyan
Tsebea yi m' afebɔɔ?
Hɛn dɔ yɛ mberɛw, ɔyɛ nwin ma W',
Wodze n' so ma hɛn dɛ!

name: MHB 292:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, sor Ebubur, bra,
Fa Wo nkenyan tum nyina;
Fa Agyenkwa N' dɔ n' petse hɛn do!
Na onkenyan hɛndze.  Amen.

name: MHB 293:1
title: Anonymous, c. 10th cent.,
verse:
. SUNSUM Bɔfo; Ɔwo a ahyɛse
Etoow wiadze fapem n' pintsinn,
Bra adwen a ɔrotweɔn biara mu,
Fa W'enyigye ma adasa,
Gye hɛn fi bɔn na awerɛhow mu,
Na ma W'asɔrfi mfata Wo.

name: MHB 293:2
title: Anonymous, c. 10th cent.,

name: MHB 293:3
title: Anonymous, c. 10th cent.,
verse:
. Ɔwo a adom ahyɛ W' ma, fi sor sian,
Fa Wo mpɛn esuon tum no bra,
Ɔwo nye No tum nsa ahoɔdzen a 
Odzi sor na asaase do tum;
Guar na tsew hɛn nyimpadua ho,
Na fa Wo su hyɛ hɛn akoma m'.

name: MHB 293:4
title: Anonymous, c. 10th cent.,

name: MHB 293:5
title: Anonymous, c. 10th cent.,
verse:
. Enyimnyam nye abɔdzin a ɔnnsa
Ɔnka Egya Tumfo Ne dzin;
Wɔnhyɛ Agyenkwa, Ba enyimnyam,
Nyia owui dze gyee nyimpa nkwa n',
Na Wo so n-tonton nka Wo,
Ɔwo daa Ɔwerɛkyekyefo.  Amen.

name: MHB 294:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. ƆSOR Ebubur krɔnkrɔn, bra,
Bɛsera akoma werɛhonyi,
Beyi m'afɔdzi adzesoa,
Na fa awerɛhyɛmu brɛ me !
Wo nko na ibotum asoɛ
Ɔbɔnfo a no bɔn ahyɛ n' do,
Ama wɔaagye no ato mu,
Dze bɔgya n' aapetse n'akoma m'.

name: MHB 294:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Sɛ tsetse n' enye me peree,
Dɛ ebɛgye me efi bɔn ho,
Ebɔɔ mbɔdzen dɛ edze Wo dɔ
Bɛdaadaa me na atwe me a,
Kenyan W'ehumbɔbɔr ndwuma;
Ma Wo mbɔbɔrhu no ndɔɔ so,
Meserɛ, kɔ do na dzi aper
Kodu dɛ m'begyaa mu ama W'.

name: MHB 294:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Sɛ matse Wo frɛ no pɛn a,
Na misii nkrum dze gyee moho a,
Mepeen ɔpen a onnyi kabea,
Na pepɛɛ Wo mu enyigye a,
Hyɛ me pɛ a onndzi mu no ma;
Ma me tsibowa nhu W'asomdwee,
Kenyan me ma munhu W'adom,
Na ma mentse bɔnfatsɛ nka.

name: MHB 294:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Sɛ mama Wo werɛ ahow a,
Na medzi nkwaseasɛm ekyir a,
W'ehumbɔbɔr no agye me,
M'awerɛhow mu epegya me a,
Adom ehumbɔbɔr Sunsum,
Ma me ahotɔ bio, na gye
Mo sunsum wɔ krɔnkrɔnyɛ mu,
Ma n' do mma onnhu amandze bio.  Amen.

name: MHB 295:1
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;
verse:
. SUNSUM siarfo a wͻsͻr Wo
Ka Egya na Asɛm no ho,
Nyame na Ewuradze kor:
Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, tsie hɛn.

name: MHB 295:10
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;

name: MHB 295:2
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;
verse:
. Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, sor Ebubur,
Ͻbͻsu a isian fi sor, ’
N-kwa ahom, ͻdͻ gya:
Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, tsie hɛn.

name: MHB 295:3
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;
verse:
. SunSum a ekyerɛ hɛn kwan,
Sunsum a ema sum yɛ kan,
Obi nntum nngyina Wo tum ano:
Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, tsie hɛn.

name: MHB 295:4
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;
verse:
. Wo a Jesus fi N’egua do
Dze Wo mae dɛ bͻboa hɛn,
Amma yaannyɛ ankonam;
Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, tsie hɛn.

name: MHB 295:5
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;

name: MHB 295:6
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;
verse:
. Yehwe ase a, ma hɛn do,
Na hɛn kra tͻ efir mu a,
Fre hɛn bérɛww bra Wo nkyɛn bio;
Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, tsie hɛn.

name: MHB 295:7
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;
verse:
. Bra bɛhyɛ mbérɛwyɛfo dzen;
Ma abrɛfo akokodur,
Kyérɛ hɛn ma yɛnkasa yie:
Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, tsie hɛn.

name: MHB 295:8
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;
verse:
. Bra bͻboa akra a wͻpɛ
Esua Wo nokwar mapa n’,
Na woenya ͻdͻ pa no;
Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, tsie hɛn.

name: MHB 295:9
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;
verse:
. Fa hɛn fa kwan tseabaa n’ mu.
Sɛ yɛfom a, bͻ hɛn kͻkͻ;
Yɛbͻ mpaa a, serɛ ma hɛn.
Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, tsie hɛn.

name: MHB 296:1
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.
verse:
. SUNSUM Krɔnkrɔn, hu m' mbɔbɔr,
Midzi yaw dɛ mafom Wo,
Murusu sesei yi dzi,
Tsie akoma a orusu n'.

name: MHB 296:10
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.
verse:
. O hu me mbɔbɔr ara,
Afei midzi mo mu yaw,
Dza mayɛ etsia Wo Sunsum n',
Egya, fa kyɛ m' wɔ Ba n' mu.  Amen.

name: MHB 296:2
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.
verse:
. Mo bɔn a ɔdɔɔ so pii n',
Meka ne nyina kyerɛ Wo;
Dza mayɛ etsia WO nko n',
Enyianyiakwa, Wo nko nyim.

name: MHB 296:3
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.
verse:
. M'aso esiw wɔ Wo frɛ ho,
Me per mu mohwe ase daa,
Fa W'aba puw me kakra,
Na mammfa Nyame enndzi agor.

name: MHB 296:4
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 296:5
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 296:6
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.
verse:
. 'Sɔryɛ nwinwin, apɛdze
Duum prɔwee gya tantan no;
'Mumuyɛ daadaa m'akoma,
 Ɔhyɛ Ɔwo a 'nyim n' awerɛhow.

name: MHB 296:7
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.
verse:
. O mannda papa biara,
Dɛ mennsu mo mfom pii n' ho,
Mannhwehwɛ W'enyimtwuw no,
Mebu enyi egu Sunsum n' do.

name: MHB 296:8
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.
verse:
. Minyan dwumadzi fofor do,
Yardɔm no wɔ mo wer mu;
Nyimpa enyi do sor bɔfo,
Kwatanyi wɔ Wo kan mu.
