. Medze nsa a ɔpopo suo Wo mu,
Na minnkegyaa W' ma aakɔ,
Gyedɛ migyina pintsinn gyedzi m',
Na muhu W'ayamuyie.

name: MHB 387:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Jesus, Wo konyimdzi no a
Ihuee guu mo mu ntsi
M'anan nnkehihim ara bio;
Migyina pintsinn Nyame m'.

name: MHB 387:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O nkyɛ gya krɔnkrɔn n' aahyɛ ase
Aadzɛw mo mu sesei,
Aahyew mo mu wiadze akɔndɔ
Na mbepɔw no efi hɔ.

name: MHB 387:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O nkyɛ eefi sor aatɔ sesei,
Aahyew mo bɔn nyina!
Bra, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, mefrɛ Wo;
Ogya Sunsum e! Bra!

name: MHB 387:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔhyew-fi gya a! Dzɛw m'akoma m',
Hyerɛn me kra do, mesrɛ W';
Fa Wo nkwa petse mo mu nyina
Na tsew mo ho korakora.   Amen.

name: MHB 388:12
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 389:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. NYAME Tumfo, tsie mo sufrɛ
Yɛ m’enyidar nye m’ahomgye;
Ma nyam a ͻyɛ Wo dzin no
Nsoɛr mfa enyigye nhyira me.

name: MHB 389:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Eyɛ kɛse no iye dodow, ‘
Ͻwo nye m’Egya nye m’ Nyame;
Nkyerɛkyérɛ krͻnkrͻn ayɛ m’ Wodze,
’Dze Wo bͻgyaa krͻnkrͻn tͻͻ me.

name: MHB 389:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Medzé akoma mbérɛw ma nsa do,
Motwer Wo nkotoo daa nyina;
Dɛ akwantufo hwehwɛ nsu n’,
Dɛmara na mohwehwɛ Wo.

name: MHB 389:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Mepɛ dɛ meba Wo nkyɛn ntsɛm,
Nye W’ahotsewfo ahwehwɛ W’;
Muhu W’enyimnyam wͻ hͻ daa,
Nye W’adom ahentum kɛse n’.

name: MHB 389:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Sɛ motwe moho fi Wo ho a,
Mo nkwa do atsew ara nye n’,
Me dɛw nye Wo bͻn fakyɛ no,
Ewuradze na ͻbͻ mo ho ban.

name: MHB 389:6
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Mebɛma me nsa nye ndze do,
Ber a ahoͻdzen wͻ hͻ yi;
M’akoma enyi gye edwuma yi ho,
Medze me nda nyina bɛyɛ.

name: MHB 39:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. EGYA a yɛtse Wo mu,
Na yɛkeka hɛnho,
Yenya enyimnyam, tum na ayɛyi
Fi Wo dɔ a 'dze ma n' ho.
Wɔmma abɔfo nyina
Nda Nyame ase wɔ sor;
Na asaase ntow enyigye ndwom,
Na ɔngyegye wɔ sor.

name: MHB 39:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyame a bɛyɛɛ nyimpa,
Ma hɔn a wɔagye hɔn nyina 
M-fa hɔn nkwa nda Wo ase,
Wɔ W' adom a ɔgye nkwa;
Adom a 'dze maa abɔn n',
Sor adwontofo nka;
Hom ntsea m'; Nkwagye nka hɛn Nyame, 
Nkwagye nka Eguambaa n'.

name: MHB 39:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Sunsum a eyɛ krɔnkrɔn,
Ma W'ahotsewfo nyina
Ntonton W'adom krɔnkrɔn n', nhyira
Wo tum a ɔsakyer akoma.
Abɔfo nnkotum aka
Wo dɔ no krɔn kɛse n',
Enyimnyam dɛw a onnyi kabea,
Dza wohu a woehyira do.

name: MHB 39:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Daapem 'Korsa Ewuradze,
Ma ɔsor dɔm nyina,
Ma nyimpa mba nyinara nkaa
Na wɔntsena Wo dɔ mu.
Sɛ ɔsor na asaase
Nya guan fi W'enyim a,
Ma ahotsewfo no nyinara 
Ntow Wo dɔ ho ndwom daa.  Amen.

name: MHB 390:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 390:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 390:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ewuradze, medze me talɛnt
Akyɛdze nye adom san brɛ W',
Na ma menyɛ Wo 'sɛnkafo,
Na mentsena mma W'enyimnyam,
Memfa me mber nyinara nka
Abɔnfo Adamfo ho nsɛm.

name: MHB 390:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Fa ayamuyie a ɔmmbɔ adze
Bɔ m'akoma hyew, hyɛ no ma,
Ama medze m'akoma nyina
Nye nkenyan dɛ edze bɔdɔ hɔn
Medze hɔn aaba abɔhwɛ W' mfem';
Nguan no ntsi hɔn Hwɛfo no wui.

name: MHB 391:1
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 391:23
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.
verse:
. Igyaa Wegya fie kan n', 
W'ahengua abɔso n',
Baa asaase sum yi mu,
Bɔbɔɔ akwankwan 'werɛhowm':
Nyew, wɔdze ne nyina gyaa m'
Megyaa biribi ama Wo a?
 
. Mo Wura, dzi asɔw me ntsi 
Gyirama bi nnkotum ka;
Awerɛhow yerɛyerɛw
Ama eeyi m' efi hɛll;
Esɔɔw m'amandzehu:
Masɔw 'bɛn mama Wo?

name: MHB 391:4
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 391:5
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.
verse:
. Ao, ma memfa mo nkwa 
Ne nyinara memma,
Mumbubu mo mpokyerɛ
Memfa dɛw mfora yaw;
Edze Woho maa me:
Mo so, medze moho ma W' Amen.

name: MHB 392:1
title: St. Patrick, c. 1823-95;
verse:
. NDƐ medze Ɔkorsa Nyame
Tum dzin no akyekyer moho,
Na medze noara mefrɛ No,
Ɔkorsa Nyame, Baasa Kor.

name: MHB 392:2
title: St. Patrick, c. 1823-95;

name: MHB 392:3
title: St. Patrick, c. 1823-95;
verse:
. Medze yi kyekyer moho ndɛ ;
Nworaba a wɔhyerɛn wɔ sor,
Enyimnyam ewia n' n'ahoɔdzen nserɛmɛn
Bosoom a ɔpaa fitaa anafua,
Enyinam hyerɛn mber pa mu,
Ekyinehyia mframa a ɔwosow,
'Saasè a ɔda hɔ, na po nkyen a
Ɔnenam tsetse botan ho.

name: MHB 392:4
title: St. Patrick, c. 1823-95;
verse:
. Medze yi kyekyer moho ndɛ,
Nyame tum a ɔkyerɛ m' kwan,
N'enyiwa nweɔn, No tum nkora me;
N'asowa ntsie m'ehiasɛm,
Me Nyame nyansa nkyerɛkyerɛ me,
Ne nsa nkyerɛ m' kwan, ne kyɛm ngya m',
Nyame asɛm nkyerɛ me kasa
No sor dɔm tutuw no nweɔn me.

name: MHB 392:5
title: St. Patrick, c. 1823-95;
verse:
. Christ mbra me nkyɛn, ɔntsena mo mu,
Christ ndzi m'ekyir, ondzi m'enyim,
Christ ndzi me nkyɛn, ondzi mo do;
Christ nkyekye mo werɛ, nhyɛ m' dzen,
Christ wɔ m'ase, wɔ m'etsifi
Christ wɔ asomdwee nye mbusu mu,
Christ wɔ akoma a wɔdɔ m' mu
Christ wɔ nyɛnko nye anana anomu.

name: MHB 392:6
title: St. Patrick, c. 1823-95;
verse:
. Medze Dzin no kyekyer moho,
Ɔkorsa Dzin a ɔyɛ dzen,
Na mobɔ dzin noara mefrɛ
Ɔkorsa Nyame, Baasa kor,
Bɔadze a ɔbɔɔ adze nyina,
Ɔdomankoma Egya, Sunsum, Asɛm,
Ayɛyi nka mo Wura Agyenkwa,
Nkwagye fir Ewuradze Christ.

name: MHB 393:1
title: Ray Palmer, 1808-87.
verse:
. MEDZE m'akoma ma Wo,
O Jesus a yɛpɛ W'!
Akoma nye akyɛdze no,
Ɔwo abɔ me kra hyew;
Ɔwo nko na puhim akoma,
Ɔwo nko na edɔ akoma
     M'bɔdɔ Wo dɛ mbrɛ edɔ me,
     O Jesus a yɛpɛ W'!

name: MHB 393:2
title: Ray Palmer, 1808-87.
verse:
. Afɔr bɛn na mo mbɔ
Mfa ndɔ W' dɛ mbrɛ etse?
Dɛ Ɔwo Asɛm n' brɛɛ adze faa
Nyimpadua dɛ emi medze;
'See m' dɛ fa w' akoma ma m',
Ewuradze, medze ma W'.

name: MHB 393:3
title: Ray Palmer, 1808-87.
verse:
. M'akoma enya ahomgye ha,
Ahomgye a ɔhaw nnyi m',
Ɔdɔ 'hoɔdzen a nhyira wɔ mu,
Wo, Botan a wɔapaa,
Na etwa moho ehyia,
Wo nye me kra sumabew.

name: MHB 394:1
title: Marianne Farningham, 1834-1909.
verse:
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, menyɛ Wodze, 
Mbofra adamfo a edɔ m',
Meretsew moho ama W', ntsi,
O Jesus Christ, maba.

name: MHB 394:23
title: Marianne Farningham, 1834-1909.
verse:
. Adzekyee pa akye m' yi, medze 
Mo nkwa ma, mufua me nsewdzim'
Mennkam hwee do, merenyɛ ekyim,
Medze m'akoma nyinaa aba.
 
. Mebɛtsena Wo kan mu daa, 
Mebɛyɛ dza ɔtsen dabaa;
Medze m'ahom nyina bɔsom Wo,
Ntsi na maba wo hɔ 'i.

name: MHB 394:4
title: Marianne Farningham, 1834-1909.
verse:
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, ahom wɔm' yi, 
Mepɛ maayɛ dansewa mapa
Wɔ nokwar na tsenenee ho ntsi
Mo nkwa Wura, maba.

name: MHB 395:1
title: John Burton, 1803-77.
verse:
. Ber a m'akoma yɛ mberɛw yi, 
M'Agyenkwa, migyaam' ma Wo;
M'ahoɔdzen nyina wɔ Wo nsam',
Ma ɔnyɛ Wo nko Wodze.

name: MHB 395:2
title: John Burton, 1803-77.
verse:
. Mo Wura Jesus, gye m' seseiara, 
Fa W'adom gya m'kwan nyinaram'
Ma menyɛ akowaa pa mma Wo
Na Nyame dɔ nhyɛ me ma.

name: MHB 395:3
title: John Burton, 1803-77.
verse:
. Ewuradze, mbrɛ epɛ n' soma m', 
Na mbom Woara kyerɛ me kwan;
Fa W'adom gya m' kwan nyinaram'
Na meetsie Wo enyigyem'.

name: MHB 395:4
title: John Burton, 1803-77.
verse:
. Dza m'bɛyɛ, dza ɔbɛba mo do, 
Ma omfir Wo nko Wo pɛm';
Iyi mo nkwa o, edze kyɛ m' o,
Mo nkwa no Woara Wodze a.

name: MHB 395:5
title: John Burton, 1803-77.

name: MHB 396:1
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.
verse:
. EWURADZE, medze m'ahoɔdzen
Begyina ama Wo;
Ber a mowɔ enyigye mu yi,
Mo ndwom bɔfow ama W'.

name: MHB 396:2
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.
verse:
. Meremmfa m'akoma mma wiadze,
Na m'ano akyerɛ Wo dɔ;
Moronnhwer m'ahoɔdzen ana 
Mayɛ W'edwuma no.

name: MHB 396:3
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.
verse:
. Meremmfa ahoɔdzen mmper koraa
Mmfa wiadze akwan do,
Na medze mberɛwyɛ maafow
Ɔsor kokwaa n' nyaanyaa.

name: MHB 396:4
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.
verse:
. O meremmfa me pɛ tantan n'!
Dza ɔwɔ mo mu a ɔmmfata
Nye me gya a orudum no,
M'akoma mu nso mma W'!

name: MHB 396:5
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.
verse:
. O fa me ber a mesi nsifor
Nya me dɛw mu kyɛfa!
Nkyɛ medze enyimnyam ber yi,
Na m'akoma aama Wo!

name: MHB 396:6
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.
verse:
. O Ewuradze ahyɛmu krɔnkrɔn n',
Munnkotum afa n' sesei;
Mma dɛw akoma a medze dɔɔ
Wo ahyɛse n' ho nnka!

name: MHB 397:1
title: Christian Burke, 1859-
verse:
. N-KWA Wura, enyimnyam Hen,
’Gyee too W’ do bɛyɛɛ abofra a
Wͻboabaa W’ ͻbaatan bo mu,
Edaa ͻbaatan serɛ do:
Mbofra a dze ama hɛn ntsi
Yɛwͻ anoyi bi ma W’.

name: MHB 397:2
title: Christian Burke, 1859-
verse:
. Ofi ber a Ͻbaatan Siarfo n’
Woo Wo wiadze Pomfo no,
Asoa hɛn enyidzi ahenkyɛw a
Abaatan  nnhun n’ saso pɛn;
Yɛannhwehwɛ Wo mboa dzendzen a,
Dɛm enyidzi ’i bɛyɛ kwa.

name: MHB 397:3
title: Christian Burke, 1859-
verse:
. Dom hɛn akoma pa nye abotar,
Ma dza yɛyɛ, yɛka nyina
Mbofra aahwɛ ho eesua yɛ,
Mma wͻanntͻ gon ara da;
Wͻaahwɛ hɛn nantsew na woeesua
Anantsew kwan tséaba n’ mu.

name: MHB 397:4
title: Christian Burke, 1859-
verse:
. Sɛ mbofra a woesi nsifor yi
’Bra yɛ fɛw hͻn enyi do a,
Dom hɛn awofo yi nyansa,
Nye afͻrbͻ fofor adwen:
Enyidar, gyedzi m’ akwankyérɛ,
Ͻdͻ a onnsiw ndzepa kwan.

name: MHB 397:5
title: Christian Burke, 1859-
verse:
. Dwuma a afrɛ hɛn wͻ ho yi,
Ma yendzi do pɛpɛɛpɛr,
Ama yeewie dwuma yi dzi n’,
Na hɛn berɛ nyina abͻ adze n’,
Mbofra a edze maa hɛn no.
Yeenya hͻn ho enyigye.

name: MHB 398:1
title: Frances Mary Owen, 1842-83.
verse:
. SƐ Wo nsordaafo bɔ ntoa,
Wɔka ntam na wosua a,
Sɛ wobu ntwɛr W'enyim ha,
Tse nka dɛ Egya bɛn hɔn a;
Ewuradze, bɔ W' mba ho ban,
Fa Wo Sunsum brɛ hɛn mboa.

name: MHB 398:2
title: Frances Mary Owen, 1842-83.
verse:
. Sɛ wiadze nkodzen bɛn a,
Wɔtse akodzi bi nka a,
Ma wɔkɔ ko ɔhar mu a,
Wobu nsɔhwɛ adzeba a,
Ewuradze, bɔ W' mba ho ban,
Dom hɔn nyansa wɔ nsiyɛ m'.

name: MHB 398:3
title: Frances Mary Owen, 1842-83.
verse:
. Sɛ hɔn akoma ridzi dɛw
Wɔ konyim anaa enyigye mu,
Ma wɔyɛ ahantan a,
Mma wɔannyɛ bɔnnyiafyɛfo n',
Ewuradze, bɔ W' mba ho ban,
Kyerɛ hɔn ma wɔmbɛn Wo daa.

name: MHB 398:4
title: Frances Mary Owen, 1842-83.
verse:
. Ber a hɔn nsew a woedzi,
Ber a hɔn mpaa a wɔabɔ
Bɛpa efi hɔn akoma mu n';
Ber a hɔn gyedzi bɛpa n',
Ewuradze, bɔ W' mba ho ban,
Wondzi nokwar nkɔ ewiei.

name: MHB 399:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. 'BƐN na memfa mma me Nyame
Wɔ N'ehumbɔbɔr ntsi?
M'bɛfa akyɛdze a ɔdze ama me n'
Na maserɛ N' fofor so.

name: MHB 399:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nkwagye adom kuraba krɔnkrɔn n',
Medze ndaase bɛgye,
Na m'bosuo N'anohoba m' dzen,
Na matsena N'enyimnyam m'.

name: MHB 399:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. M'botua m'anohobadze no
Wɔ No nkorɔfo enyim,
Na dza mowɔ, na mbrɛ metse n',
Medze bɔ afɔr ma No.

name: MHB 399:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 399:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 399:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyame a ɔyɛ Pomfo, Domfo n',
Me Nyame a, mepaa m' ka;
M'bɔbɔ No ayɛyi afɔr,
Na afei m'bɔbɔ Ne dzin.

name: MHB 399:7
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Adɔe Nyame a ɔdze m' ho akyɛ me n',
'Hotsewfo nyi N' ayɛw;
Kɛpem dɛ wɔaboa hɛn ano,
Na yɛatow sor ndwom no.

name: MHB 4:
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
Gyirama biara ntow Pomfo n'
Ne dzin ho ndwom wo beebiara:
	Halleluja !

name: MHB 4:
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
W‘ayɛyi bɛgyegye mbea nyina,
Kɛpem dɛ ewia nnkɔtɔ bio:
	Halleluia!

name: MHB 4:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. WI n‘ase a ɔno dze nyina
Mma Bɔfo n‘ N'ayɛyi mfow sor: 
	Hallejuia !

name: MHB 4:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 40:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. YƐDZE daa ayɛyi
Ma Nyame Egya n' dɔ,
Hɛn ahotɔ wɔ ha,
Na enyidar pa wɔ sor.
Ɔsomaa No domankoma Ba,
Dɛ ombowu mma nyimpa n' bɔn.

name: MHB 40:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Daa daa enyimnyam nka
Nyankopɔn Ne Ba no,
Nyia ofi daa yaw mu
 Ɔdze N' bɔgyaa tɔɔ hɛn;
Ɔtse ase afei, na odzi hen,
Na ohu Ne yaw nyina ho mfaso.

name: MHB 40:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Nyame Sunsum dzin no
Na yɛsɔr no daa daa,
Nyia No tum fofor no
Ma tsease-ewu nya nkwa.
N'eduma wie nhyehyɛɛ kɛse n',
Na ɔma ɔkra nya enyigye.

name: MHB 40:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. 'Tumfo Nyame, yɛdze 
'Nyidzi a ɔmmbɔ adze ma W',
Baasa a wɔnnkyɛ mu no,
Baako a ɔyɛ nwanwa n'.
Sɛ adwen nntse biribi ase a,
Hɔ na gyedzi na dɔ dzi nyim.

name: MHB 400:123456
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.
verse:
. Gye me bra, mo Wura, na ma  
Muntu nhyɛ Wo nsa koraa.
Gye me mber na ma me ndafua; 
Memfa nyi W' ayɛw daa daa.
 
. Gye me nsa na ma ɔnyɛ 
Dza Wo dɔ nko bɛkyerɛ.
Gye m'anan na ma no ho 
Ɔnyɛ har, fɛɛfɛw mma Wo.
 
. Gye me ndze na ma daa daa 
Montow ndwom mma Woara.
Gye m'anofamfa na ma 
Ɔnhyɛ Wo nsɛmpa ara ma.
 
. Gye mo dwɛɛtɛɛ na sika: 
No mu wen mpo mennkɛfa.
Gye m 'adwen fa m'ahoɔdzen 
Yɛ dza Woara ehwɛ a ɔtsen.
 
. Gye me pɛ, yɛ n' Wodze nwiom: 
Ɔnnyɛ medze  ara bio.
Gye m'akoma,-Wodze ampa: 
Medze bɛyɛ W'ahengua.
 
. Gye mo dɔ, m'Ewuradze; 
Muhue gu W'ananadze.
Gye m'adzeadze nyinara; 
M'bɛyɛ Wo nko Wodze daa.

name: MHB 401:1
title: Samuel Longfellow, 1819-92.
verse:
. NYAME abɛn nyan wiadze a ɔada;
'Biara ngyina n' dzibew ho!
Frankaa memen no rinyam o!
Woana dɔm 'nyimdzifo n'?

name: MHB 401:2
title: Samuel Longfellow, 1819-92.
verse:
. Nyia ɔgye nokwar no to mu,
Na obu ho nkontaa no,
Na ɔdze n' babun nyina ma no
Dɔm 'nyimnyam kuw no ampa.

name: MHB 401:3
title: Samuel Longfellow, 1819-92.
verse:
. Nyia ɔnnka ebufuwsɛm no,
Na orunntuw noho no,
Na ɔkō tsia bɔn enyiber do n'
Na ɔdɔm krɔnkrɔn kuw no.

name: MHB 401:4
title: Samuel Longfellow, 1819-92.
verse:
. Nyia ɔkõ kɔ n'enyim daa nyina n',
Nnyim ɔkogu n'adzeban;
Ɔhwe ase mpo a ɔsoɛr na
Ɔkā nokwar kuw n' ho.

name: MHB 401:5
title: Samuel Longfellow, 1819-92.
verse:
. Nyia ɔayɛ krado soa mbeamudua,
Dza ayɛ nkorɔfo ekyiwadze n',
Yaw, enyimguase nnyɛ n' asɛm n'
Ka atɔfo kuw no ho.

name: MHB 402:1
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. HԐN egyanom gyedzi tsé ase daa,
Woennsuro ‘fiadze, ‘gya nye nkrantsee
O hɛn akoma dzi ehurusi 
Ber biara a yɛbɛtsé asɛm no.
     Hɛn egyanom gyedzi yɛ krͻnkrͻn,
     Yebosuo m ' dzen dzé ekesi wu m’.

name: MHB 402:2
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Egyanom daa ‘fiadze sunkamm m‘,
Naaso hͻn tsibowa emmbu hͻn fͻ;
Na nhyira bɛka hͻn mba so,
Dɛ hͻn so bowu dɛm ama W'.

name: MHB 402:3
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Hɛn egyanom gyedzi! Nyame tum
Bɛgyé aman nyina ama Wo;
Nokwar a ofi Nyame hͻ m’ na
Aman nyina benya ahotͻ.

name: MHB 402:4
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Hɛn egyanom gyedzi! Yɛbͻdͻ
Adͻfo nyé atamfo nyina;
Yɛbɛka W' ho asɛm wͻ dͻ mu,
Yɛdzé ayamuyie na abrabͻ pa.

name: MHB 403:1
title: Richard Jukes, 1804-67.

name: MHB 403:2
title: Richard Jukes, 1804-67.

name: MHB 403:3
title: Richard Jukes, 1804-67.
verse:
. Yarba mu nye ahoɔdzen mu,
Christ yɛ m'dze,
Ohia na ahonya mu so
Christ yɛ m'dze,
Na dɛm dapɔn da nyina mu,
Ber a mibenya mo sor frɛ no,
M'befi sum wiadze yi mu no,
Christ yɛ m'dze.

name: MHB 404:1
title: Anonymous
verse:
. MO Wura, ɔbra a wɔbɔ 
Ma Wo no ɔyɛ nhyira pii;
Ɔkyɛn enyigye biara a
Wiadze yi botum dze ama.

name: MHB 404:2
title: Anonymous
verse:
. Ɔma muhu dɛ meyɛ W' ba a
Edze W' bɔgyaa soronko atɔ m',
Na Wo nsamu nko na medze
Ndaase gye akyɛdze pa biara.

name: MHB 404:3
title: Anonymous
verse:
. Menam W'enyimtsewee mu daa,
W'enyi n amedze hwɛ m'akwan m';
Anafua nda m' 'Wo na hwɛ m' do,
Na kora me fi mbusu mu.

name: MHB 404:4
title: Anonymous
verse:
. Akwan aboabo nyina mu,
Mobɔ mbɔdzen dze kɔ m'enyim;
Wo nhyira anamɔn dzi m'enyim,
Ɔma m' ahoɔdzen wɔ 'bra nda m'.

name: MHB 404:5
title: Anonymous
verse:
. Dɛm dɔ yi ma m'enyigye daa,
Nye ahoɔdzen a medze som Wo,
Kodua dɛ mubohu W'enyim,
Na W'enyim hyerɛn ehyira me.

name: MHB 405:1
title: Anonymous from a Sarum Primer, 1558.
verse:
. NYAME, tsena me tsir m'
Ɔnye me ntseasee so mu.

name: MHB 405:2
title: Anonymous from a Sarum Primer, 1558.
verse:
. Nyame, tsena m'enyiwa m'
Nye m'adzehwɛ mu.

name: MHB 405:3
title: Anonymous from a Sarum Primer, 1558.
verse:
. Nyame, tsena m'anomu 
Nye me kasaa mu.

name: MHB 405:4
title: Anonymous from a Sarum Primer, 1558.
verse:
. Nyame, tsena m'akoma m'
Nye m'adwen so mu.

name: MHB 405:5
title: Anonymous from a Sarum Primer, 1558.
verse:
. Nyame mbra m'ewiei mu,
Nye ber a m'befi wiadze.  Amen.

name: MHB 406:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. NYAME, meyɛ W'dze;
Akomatɔm' bɛn a!
Nhyira bi a menya dɛ Jesus yɛ medze a!
Sor Eguambaa N' mu
M'enyi gye mprɛnsa,
Metse Ne ndze a m'akoma dzi ehurusi.

name: MHB 406:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Enyigye pa wɔ
Ne ndze dɛɛdɛw n' mu;
Nyia oenya No n' oedu Paradise ampa,
Muhu Jesus a,
Metse bɔgya n' nka,
Ɔyɛ onnyiewie nkwa na sor dɛw wɔ ase ha.

name: MHB 406:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 407:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. HWƐ enyigye a woenya!
Hɔn a Agyenkwa tsie hɔn,
Na wɔapɛ egyapadze egu sor,
Tegyirama nntum nnka
Ahotɔ nye asomdwee;
Ɔkra a oenya dɔ fofor ahyɛse.

name: MHB 407:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 407:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Da mu nyina Jesus
Yɛɛ me dɛw nye mo ndwom;
Nkyɛ obiara eehu No nkwage! 
Metsea m' dɛ ɔadɔ me,
Oehu amandze ewu,
Dze apon emi etuatsewnyi.

name: MHB 407:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Enyigye mbordo,
Krɔnkrɔn mu enyigye a
Metsee no nkwagye - bɔgya no mu a!
M'Agyenkwa dwiir mo do n',
Minyaa nhyira mbordo,
Dɛ gyama Nyame emudzi ahyɛ m' ma.

name: MHB 408:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. NYAME, me dɛw no nsunyiwa,
N-kwa a m'enyi gye ho,
M'enyigye nda mu enyimnyam,
M'anago awerɛkyekyer.

name: MHB 408:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Sɛ ipue sum kadoo mu a,
Na m'adzekyee ahyɛ ase,
Me kra adzekyee woraba nye Wo,
M'anapawi nye Wo.

name: MHB 408:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Sor hyerɛn bɔ mo ho aprɔw,
Ɔdze nhyira nserɛmɛn;
Jesus kyerɛ N'ehumbɔbɔr ma m',
'Wasa dɛ Nedze nye m'.

name: MHB 408:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Me kra betsin owu asɛm do
Efi dɛtse yi mu,
Ɔdze enyigye na mbirika
Bokohu Ewuradze enyim.

name: MHB 408:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Munnsuro hɛll na munnsuro owu,
M'bɔbɔ atamfo egu;
Ɔdɔ nye gyedzi ntsaban no
Bɛma medzi konyim.

name: MHB 409:1
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.
verse:
. NSUNYIWA ne 'nyam dɛw a ɔyɛ a!
Nkwa fofor yɛ enyigye;
Asaase dze enyigye kyia
Mfunoma a oewuna fofor.

name: MHB 409:2
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.

name: MHB 409:3
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.
verse:
. W'adom mu enyigye nwanwa yi,
W'ebirɛmpɔn edwuma yi
Yɛ anwanwadze a yennhu mbrɛ ofi,
Awofofor krɔnkrɔn.

name: MHB 409:4
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.
verse:
. Gyedzi awofofor kan dzendzen,
Dɔ a ɔhyerɛn fɛɛfɛw yi,
Awofofor enyigye ndwom yi,
Yɛ mpaabɔ huanhuam nwionn.

name: MHB 409:5
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.
verse:
. Sunsum Bɔfo pa, yɛ mo mu
Wo dɛw anwanwadze 'i,
Foforyɛfo krɔnkrɔn, adom m'
Yɛ m'akoma 'i fofor.  Amen.

name: MHB 41:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. NYAME yɛ dzin a me kra tonton,
Etumfo Baasa, Bɛkyebo n',
Abɔdze na adom, hɔn tum nyina,
Ka onnyiewiei a wonnyim No.

name: MHB 41:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Wo ndze dze po na asaase bae,
Ma asorɛkye wor na nworaba hyerɛn,
Naaso Wo ndwuma nyina mu,
Biribiara nye Wo nnyɛ pɛr.

name: MHB 41:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Abɔdze da ho ara nyin, wu,
Abɔdze gu do sesa daa;
Santsen biara nnyim mbrɛ etse,
Wo nhyehyɛɛ akɛse yɛ kor.

name: MHB 41:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. W'enyiwa hwɛ wiadze nyina,
Idzi wiadze a ɔhyerɛn nyina do;
Edze kan yɛ efuradze,
W'asomfo nye ogyaframee.

name: MHB 41:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Adasa a hɛn ho egu fi yi
Besi dɛn atow W'ayɛyi?
Yɛda W'ananadze wɔ ekyir,
Yehu W'enyim wɔ sunsum mu.

name: MHB 41:6
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Woana botum ahwɛ kan no?
Woana bɛbɛn gyaframee no?
Wo nko na inyim W'ahoɔdzen,
W'asɛm ma otum bɔ Wo dzin.

name: MHB 410:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Nyame adɔfo, hom mbra 
Mbɛda hom dɛw edzi;
Hom nsuo m' ma yɛntow ndwom dɛɛdɛw 
Ngu N'ahengua ho aprɔw.
Nyia onnyim hɛn Nyame n'
Ɔanntow bi a ɔnnyɛ hwee;
Na Ɔsor Hen nkowaa dze otwar dɛ
Wɔda hɔn dɛw edzi.

name: MHB 410:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Nyame ɔsor Hen a  
N'enyi bɔ wiadze aprɔw,
Ɔnantsew ehum do wɔ wim',
Na ɔtseam' ma po taa dzinn n'-
Dɛm Nyame yi yɛ hɛndze 
Yɛ hɛn Egya dɔfo:
Ɔbɛma sor etumfo no
Abɔsoa hɛn akɔ.

name: MHB 410:34
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Hɔ yebohu N'enyim, 
Na yɛnnkɛyɛ bɔn da;
Hɔ yɛbɔnom daa enigye
Wɔ adom esutsen mu:
Nyew, ansaana yeetu
Yɛakɔ bɛkyebo mu n',
Dɛm eyiedzi ho adwendwen
Ma hɛn dɛw ntaataado.
 
. Adom-mba ehu dɛ 
'Nyimnyam hyɛ ase wɔ ha
Sor eyiedzi fi gyedzi nye 
Enyidado mu ba:
Hom mma ogya n' nsian sesei,
Na yengyaa nyinsuwa kyi;
Yɛnam Immanuel asaasem'
Rokɔ sor man pa n' mu.

name: MHB 411:1234
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Konyim Asɔr n 'Ewuradze, 
Yɛdze dɛw yi Wo ayɛw;
Yɛwɔ ha yi
Yɛbɔtow ndwom
Dɛ enyimnyammufo no, 
Yɛhyɛ ase ha ara 
Ma akoma na n-dze do
Kekam'  dzendzen
Yi Nyame ayɛw 
Wɔ hɛn n-kwahosan ntsi.
 
. Yɛda fona fononoo mu yi 
Na yɛnam ogya mu yi 
Yehyira Wo dɔ a
Onyim hɛn nda 
Na daa ɔdze hɛn bɛn Wo. 
Yɛbɔ hɛn nsam' dzi ehurusi 
Wɔ W' enyimtsewee no mu;
Wo dɔ a ɔmaa 
Yɛyɛɛ Wodze n'
Bɔkora hɛn wɔ Wo nkyɛn daa.
 
. Ɔwo nye Wo nkorɔfo nam 
Ngyigye n'esuyiriim';
Ebɛn hɛn yi 
Yennkosuro
Amandzehu gyatanaa. 
Wiadze nye bɔn nye abɔnsam 
Wonnkotum esi hɛn mpa;
Yɛnam Wo do
Bɛtsew hɔn mu
Na yɛatow konyim ndwom no.
 
. Hɛn gyedzi hu enyimnyam a 
Edze bɔdom hɛn bio no;ɔ
Mbeamudua n' nnyɛ hwee
Akatua pa a
Edze esi hɛn enyim ntsi. 
Sɛ ndaamba yɛbɛfata a 
Yebohu Wo dɛ Stephen
Ohun Wo wɔ
Nyame nyimfa,
Dɛ eregye hɛn akɔ sor.

name: MHB 412:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. ƆSOM, ndaase nye nhyira
Na, ahoɔdzen nyina fir Jesus!
Jesus nkotoo\nWowaw Nedze,
Wiadze nye hɛll fetsew hɛn a,
Otumfo bɛgye hɛn nkwa,
Yɛdze dɛw dzi Wo dase,
Yɛsɔw ano dɛ
Christ nokwafo,
Odzi Ne hen afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 412:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Otumfo na hɛn Pomfo,
Hɛn kra a apon hɔn sɔr Wo;
Agyenkwa nye W',
Afei yeehu,
Yɛdze enyimnyam ma Wo,
Yɛtow W'abasadzen a
Oyii hɛn nsɔhwɛ m' ho ndwom,
Dze enyigye ndze
Dzi W' mu ehurusi,
Hɛn nkwagye Nyame nye Wo.

name: MHB 412:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. W'abasa dze hɛn edu
Beebi a hɛn enyi nnda,
Yɛatra mbrɛ nguan n'
Twaa bun no a
Nsu fadum wowaaw hɔn no;
W'enyimnyam bɔɔ hɔn nkyidɔm,
Wo nsu na ɔkataa hɛn do,
Ma hɛn so dɛm
Eetwa po no,
Aanantsew mbanyin m' atra.

name: MHB 412:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wiadze nye abɔnsam enyitan n',
Jesus aka no ahyɛ,
Na N'adom ntsi
Daa yɛtow ndwom,
Ayɛyi ndwom dze ma Wo,
Yɛagye hɛn nkwagye ato m',
W'adom ntsi yedzi konyim,
Na Wo dɔ a
Hɛn nsa aka ntsi 
Yɛtonton Wo afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 413:1
title: Joseph Addison, 1672-1719.
verse:
. O me Nyame, sɛ me kra hwɛ 
W'ehumbɔbɔr nyina a,
Bobor nye dɔ nye ayɛyi
Ɔhyɛ mo do koraa.

name: MHB 413:2
title: Joseph Addison, 1672-1719.
verse:
. Eyiedzi pii a wɔnnkan na  
Wo dɔ dze nyɛɛn me kra.
Ansaana m'abofra koma
Hun nyia 'yiedzi n' fir no.

name: MHB 413:34
title: Joseph Addison, 1672-1719.
verse:
. Esian horow, fona na wu  
Ɔpae guu foo maa me,
Na dza ɔyɛ hu kyɛn yinom-
Akɔndɔbɔn n'efir.
 
. Akyɛdze mpempem, ɔsom bo 
Gye me ndaase daa daa,
Na W'enyi sɔ 'koma a ɔdze 
Dɛw gye dɛm akyɛdze n'.

name: MHB 413:56
title: Joseph Addison, 1672-1719.
verse:
. Mo nkwa ne mber nyinaa mu 
W'adɔe na m'bɛtaa do:
Na muwu so a, 'kyirkyir wiadzem'
M'bɔtow W'ayɛyi bio.
 
. Mebɛma ayɛyindwom do ama W' 
Mbersantsen mfesantsen,
Na onnyiewiei mpo yɛ tsia dɛ,
Wɔdze yi W' ayɛw wie!

name: MHB 414:1
title: George Edward Lynch Cotton, 1813-66.
verse:
. EWURADZE, yɛda Wo ase
Wɔ asaase, wimu nye po nyina ntsi;
Fɛw a wɔyɛ, bo a wɔsom,
Hɔn kan nye enyimnyam fir Wo.

name: MHB 414:2
title: George Edward Lynch Cotton, 1813-66.
verse:
. Yɛda Wo ase wɔ nhyiren
Nye asaase do ndua nyina ntsi;
Nkokwaa abɔ hɛn adan ho aprɔw,
Dɛ Wo dɔ etwa Wo dɔm ho ehyia.

name: MHB 414:3
title: George Edward Lynch Cotton, 1813-66.
verse:
. Egya, kyerɛ hɛn na yenhu
Dza ɔyɛ fɛw wɔ W'enyi do;
Edwuma kor, m-paabɔ kor,
Akoma kor a sunsum wɔ m'.

name: MHB 414:4
title: George Edward Lynch Cotton, 1813-66.
verse:
. Sɛ yɛdze adwen to ho hwɛ
Akyɛdze a edze ama hɛn a,
Ma yɛntsena, nwu wɔ Wo mu,
Wo mu yaasoɛr akɔ sor fie.  Amen.

name: MHB 415:1
title: Johann Jakob Schultz, 1640-90.
verse:
. TOW ayɛyi ndwom ma sor Hen,
Abͻdze nyina Nyame,
Tum Nyame na ͻdͻ Nyame,
Na Hɛn nkwagye Nyankopͻn;
Ͻdze ngo sa me kra yarba,
Ma ekyingye nyina taa dzinn:
’Yɛyi, ’nyimnyam nka Nyame.

name: MHB 415:2
title: Johann Jakob Schultz, 1640-90.
verse:
. Dza Otumfo Nyame ayɛ n’,
N’adom ehumbͻbͻr kora do;
Fi anapa kan kodu ewimbir,
N’enyiwa a ͻweͻn nnda da;
No tum ahenman no mu no,
Hwɛ, biribiara yɛ tͻͻtsenn:
’Yɛyi, ’nyimnyam nkza Nyame.

name: MHB 415:3
title: Johann Jakob Schultz, 1640-90.
verse:
. Ewuradze bɛn hɛn dabaa,
Ntsi amandzehu mu no,
Ͻnye hɛn wͻ hͻ, boa hɛn daa,
Ͻma hɛn asomdwee na nhyira;
Ͻdze ’baatan nsa kora Ne mba,
Ͻgyegye No nkorͻfo taataa:
’Yɛyi, ’nyimnyam nka Nyame.

name: MHB 415:4
title: Johann Jakob Schultz, 1640-90.
verse:
. Dem ntsi me bra akwantu nyina mu,
M’bɛtsea m’ atow W’ayɛyi,
Ma nkorofo aatse W’enyisͻ ndwom,
Me ndze rinnhihirn ara da;
M’akoma dzi Ewuradze m’ ehurusi;
Ͻkra, nyimpadua nye hͻndze:
’Yɛyi, ’nyimnyam nka Nyame.

name: MHB 416:1
title: Charles Edward Mudie, 1818-90.
verse:
. EWURADZE mu na nkwa,
Kan na enyigye fi ba;
Ɔbra nhyira ahyɛ ma,
Kan a ofi nsunyiwa pii m',
Nkwa na kan na dɛw krɔnkrɔn a
Obi nntum nnsɛɛ n' ara da.

name: MHB 416:2
title: Charles Edward Mudie, 1818-90.

name: MHB 416:3
title: Charles Edward Mudie, 1818-90.
verse:
. Wo nsɛmbisa akɛse nyina,
Mbabun adwendwen nyina,
Hom mfa mbrɛ N' na hom benya
No nokwar no ho ndɔbaa;
N'ahonyadze kɛse mu n',
Hom bohu dɔ na nyansa.

name: MHB 416:4
title: Charles Edward Mudie, 1818-90.
verse:
. Dɛm na ɔbra akwan nyina
Na ndwuma ahorow nyina mu,
Hom bohu No dɛ ɔbɛn hɛn;
Ɔdze enyisɔ enyi repen
Ndwuma pa nyinara so a
No nkowaa nsa ayɛ no do.

name: MHB 417:1
title: Robert Robinson, 1735-90.
verse:
. BRA, Ɔwo nhyira nsubura,
Ma m'akoma ntow W'adom ndwom;
Ehumbɔbɔr nsu a ennwew da,
Gye W'ayɛyi ndwom kɛse,
Kyerɛ me ndwom dɛɛdɛw bi no a
Sor abɔfo ndze tow no;
Ne trɛ, no war, dza ɔsom bo,
Ɔfa m'Ewuradze dɔ ho.

name: MHB 417:2
title: Robert Robinson, 1735-90.

name: MHB 417:3
title: Robert Robinson, 1735-90.
verse:
. Medze W'adom ho kaw kɛse,
Na m'bɛdze ho kaw afebɔɔ!
Ewuradze, ma dɛm adom no
Ndwer m'akoma mfam Wo ho;
M'akoma kyimafo n', metse nka dɛ
Ɔpɛ dɛ ofi Wo nkyɛn;
Gye m'akoma, O gye sɔw ano,
Fi sor abangua do sɔw ano.  Amen.

name: MHB 418:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. HƐN akra, hom nyan! Hɛn suro nhera!
Ma ahopopo adwen nkɔ!
Fa enyigye nye akokodur hyɛ
Na soɛr tu sor mbirika pa n'.

name: MHB 418:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ampa, ɔkwan n' kyea, nsoɛ so wɔ m';
'Dasamba totɔ bahaw wɔ m',
Naaso hɔn werɛ fir dɛ Nyame
Na ɔma ahotsewfo ahoɔdzen.

name: MHB 418:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. O Nyame kɛse! Wo tum no
Yɛ fofor, yɛ babun daa nyina,
Na otsim hɔ so afebɔɔ,
Mbersantsen, mfesantsen nyina.

name: MHB 418:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Nsu a ofi Wo hɔ pem daa no
Na hɛn akra bɔnom bi daa;
Hɔn a wɔtwer hɔn ahoɔdzen n'
Bɔtotɔ bahaw ewuwu.

name: MHB 418:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ntsɛntsɛm tse dɛ ɔkɔr twa wimu,
Na yɛdze bodu Wo fie hɔ;
Ɔdɔ ntsaban do na hɛn akra
Botu dɛ wɔmmberɛ afa sor kwan do.

name: MHB 419:1
title: Charles Coffin, 1676-1749;
verse:
. HϽN a wͻdͻ Nyame enyi gye,
Hͻn a wͻpaa m’ ka dɛ
Christ mbeamudua agye hͻn no,
Nya Ne bérɛ m' ahomgye.

name: MHB 419:2
title: Charles Coffin, 1676-1749;
verse:
. Ayɛyi ndwom no ͻyɛ dɛw,
Sɛ wͻbͻ mu tow dzé a;
Na mpaabͻ dzendzenndzen no ntsi,
Sor Hen n’ brɛ N’aso adze.

name: MHB 419:3
title: Charles Coffin, 1676-1749;
verse:
. Christ ma hon efiefi m’ ’somdwee,
Na ͻfa hͻn dͻ n’ yɛ N’dze,
Naaso hwɛ mbrɛ ͻtamfo n’ edua
Nworahaban wo n’ turo m’!

name: MHB 419:4
title: Charles Coffin, 1676-1749;
verse:
. Hɛn asɛm yɛ yaw; bͻn wiadze yi
Annda N’awérɛhow kwan a
N-gua no bɛfa do akͻ
Jesus nguankuw, mu edzi.

name: MHB 419:5
title: Charles Coffin, 1676-1749;
verse:
. Dɛm na hͻn a wͻdͻ N’ bohu
Mbrɛ hͻn yaw ho siar tse;
Na owu mpo nnkoturn atsetsew
Hͻn ahomka enuadͻ m’.

name: MHB 42:1
title: Ernst Lange, 1650-1727;
verse:
. NYAMЀ a eyɛ bùn a onnyi ase!
Woana botum ehu W’ewiei?
Nsɛm bɛn na ɔbɛkyerɛ Wo krɔn
Na akyérɛ Wo suban nyina?

name: MHB 42:2
title: Ernst Lange, 1650-1727;

name: MHB 42:3
title: Ernst Lange, 1650-1727;
verse:
. Wo bun no wɔ hɔ fi tsetse,
Ɔtse dέ Ɔwo, onnyi ahyɛse;
Ewɔ hɔ ansaana mber kὸraa
Na nworaba reba wiadze.

name: MHB 42:4
title: Ernst Lange, 1650-1727;
verse:
. Ewùradze pà a ennsesa da,
N-kwa po a onnyi ewiei,
W’asɛm ma biribiara nkwa;
Ɔtsé ase, na ofi Wo hɔ.

name: MHB 42:5
title: Ernst Lange, 1650-1727;
verse:
. Wo kɛseyɛ onnyi kabea,
Kɛseyɛ a sɛ adasa
Wiadze, sor nà asaase twa mù a,
Ɔbɛhyerɛn kɛse daa daa.

name: MHB 420:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O MINSI dɛn nyi m'Agyenkwa ayɛw?
Ɔyɛ nokwafo ampa; No som dɔɔ so,
Ɔyɛ Ɔgyefo na Pomfo kɛse ma
Ɔbɔbɔfo biara a ɔtwer N'adom no.

name: MHB 420:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Siarfo nye nyia n'akoma atɔ ne yamu!
Nkorɔfo a wobenyi enyigye wɔ Wo mu,
Hɔn enyigye nye dɛ wɔbɛnantsew W'enyim 
Na wɔbɛka Jesus N'adom no ho nsɛm.

name: MHB 420:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wobenya daa ahomka wɔ Wo dzin mu,
Wɔbefa Wo tsenenee dɛ hɔn kyɛfa,
Wɔbɛhyɛ W' tsenenee na W' bɔgyaa asan hɔnho,
Na wobopue Nyame enyim akokodur m'.

name: MHB 420:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 421:1
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.
verse:
. ƆYƐ me dɛw pii dɛ hɛn sor Egya n'
Ka No dɔ ho nsɛm wɔ Nwoma no mu;
Muhu anwanwadze wɔ Nwoma no mu,
Dza ɔsom bo koraa nye dɛ Jesus dɔ me.
    ƆYƐ me dɛw pii dɛ Jesus dɔ me,
    Jesus dɔ emi so.

name: MHB 421:2
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.

name: MHB 421:3
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.
verse:
. Sɛ ndwom kor pɛr mpo na m'botum atow a,
Ber a m'bohu Ɔhen kɛse wɔ N'ahoɔfɛw m';
Onnyiewiei mu na mobɔtow ndwom yi,
Anwanwasɛm ndowm dɛ Jesus dɔ me.

name: MHB 421:4
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.
verse:
.Sɛ obi bisa me a, minsi dɛm nka?
Minyim, m'bɛka dɛ enyimnyam nka Jesus;
Nyame Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn nye me yɛ adwen,
Dzi dase daa daa dɛ Jesus dɔ me.

name: MHB 422:12
title: Frances Jan van Alstyne, 1820-1915.
verse:
. Siar dasedzi- dɛ Jesus yɛ medze! 
Ao, Nyame enyimnyam nkahwɛ bɛn ny' i!
Nkwagye dzifo nye m', Nyame atɔdze;
No Sunsum awo m', bɔgyaa n' ahor m'.
 
  M'asɛm na mo ndwom ara nye yi, 
  Mekamfo m'Agyenkwa adzekyee nyina.
 
. Ahobrɛasdze koraa, enyigye koraa, 
Ahotsetɛ epue m'enyi do wora;
Abɔfo fi sor sian ba bɔbɔ
Mbɔbɔrhu na dɔ ho amandzɛɛ.

name: MHB 422:3
title: Frances Jan van Alstyne, 1820-1915.

name: MHB 423:1
title: James Grindlay Small, 1817-88.
verse:
. MENYA Nyɛnko; O Nyɛnko bi a!
Ɔdɔɔ me ana muruhu N';
Ɔdze ɔdɔ ahoma twee me,
Dze me kyekyeer No ho pi,
Na m'akoma ne nkyehoma a
Hweeara nnkotum atsew mu;
Meyɛ Nedze, na ɔyɛ medze,
Mbersantsen, mfesantsen nyina.

name: MHB 423:2
title: James Grindlay Small, 1817-88.

name: MHB 423:3
title: James Grindlay Small, 1817-88.
verse:
. Menya Nyɛnko; O Nyɛnko bi a!
Wɔdze tum nyina ama No,
Dɛ ɔnhwɛ mo do akwan nyina m',
Ɔmfa me nkodu sor sɔnn,
Bɛkyebo enyimnyam wɔ ekyirkyir,
'Ma m' aperdzi m' ahoɔdzen;
Ntsi m'bɔweɔn ayɛ edwuma
Edzi ako, ahom afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 423:4
title: James Grindlay Small, 1817-88.
verse:
. Menya Nyɛnko; O Nyɛnko bi a!
Yamuyiefo Nokwafo!
Pomfo nyansafo, Kwankyerɛfo;
Ɔyɛ Bambɔfo kɛse!
Tum bɛn na ɔbɛtsew me efi
Nyia ɔdɔ me dɛm yi ho?
Nkwa anaa owu, asaase na hɛll?
Dabi! Meyɛ Nedze daa.

name: MHB 424:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. ME kra, hyira Ewuradze!
Dza ɔwɔ m' mu nyina nka ho,
Hom mboa ma m' gyirama nhyira Ne dzin,
Ɔno a N'adom fi sor.

name: MHB 424:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Me kra, hyira Ewuradze!
Mma N'ehumbɔbɔr nntwa m'
Dɛ erennda No ase koraa,
Na nnwu dɛ otsiafo.

name: MHB 424:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ɔno na ɔdze w' bɔn kyɛ w',
Na ɔma wo ahotɔ;
Ɔno na ɔsa wo yarba,
Na ɔma eyɛ babun bio.

name: MHB 424:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ɔma ehiafo ndzepa,
Na ɔma afonafo ahomgye;
Hɛn Wura bobu abɔn atsɛn,
Na obedzi ama abrɛfo

name: MHB 424:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ɔnam Moses do yii
N'akwan ndwuma nwanwa kyerɛe;
Mbom ɔnam No Dɔba do dze
Nokwar na adom mae.

name: MHB 425:1
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847
verse:
. ME Nyame Hen,
M’beyi W’ ayɛw,
M’akoma yɛ Wodze,
Mo tum nyinara,
Mber pa nyinara
Medze ma Wo nkotoo.

name: MHB 425:2
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 425:3
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847
verse:
. Nyimpa nnyi ahom,
Dɛ ͻbͻtow W’ ndwom;
Sor abͻfo, horn ntow N’ ndwom
Hom hu hɛn Hen
N’ enyimnyam no
Kyɛn dɛ mbrɛ hɛn yehu.

name: MHB 425:4
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847
verse:
. No nokwar na
N’adom tsim hͻ;
De mbrɛ N’enyimnyam tse,
Kɛpem dɛ akra
Nyina botwa ama N’,
Nye me eyi N’ayɛw.

name: MHB 426:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. HOM Nyame nkowaa,
Hom nda hom Wura edzi,
Hom mbɔ N' dzin nwanwa n'
Wɔ mbea nyinara;
Jesus konyimdzi dzin n'
Hom mma do kɛse;
N'ahendzi yɛ enyimnyam,
'Dzi adze nyina do hen.

name: MHB 426:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyame dzi sor hen,
Otum dɛ ɔgye nkwa;
Ɔda ho bɛn hɛn,
Yɛtse Ne nka daa;
Dɔm kukuankoma no 
'Tow konyimdzi ndwom
Aka dɛ nkwagye dzi
Wɔ hɛn Hen Jesus.

name: MHB 426:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nkwagye nka Nyame a
Ɔtse ahengua n' do!
Hɔn nyina ntseatsea m',
Nhyɛ Ba n' enyimnyam;
Jesus N'ayɛyi no,
'Bɔfo bɔ n' dawur,
Dze hɔn enyim bom famu
Sɔr Eguambaa no.

name: MHB 426:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wɔmma yɛnsɔr No,
Mfa Nedze mma No;
Enyimnyam na tum,
Nyansa na ahoɔdzen,
Enyidzi na nhyira;
Yɛnye sor abɔfo
Nda N' ase a ɔnnsa da,
Na dɔ a onnyi ewiei.

name: MHB 427:1
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715.
verse:
. Ɔbra n' adandan nyina mu, 
Ahokyer nye ahotɔm',
M' akoma nye me gyirama
Beyi me Nyame ayɛw

name: MHB 427:23
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715.
verse:
. M'botuw No nkwagye ho 'kodu 
Dɛ ahokyerfo nyina
Bɔhwɛ m' enya awerɛkyekyer,
Na hɔn yaw ahera.
 
. O nye me nhuhor Ewuradze, 
Ma yɛntonton Ne dzin,
Mefrɛɛ No m'ahokyer mu no,
Ɔbae beyii m' fiir mu.

name: MHB 427:4
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715.
verse:
. Nyame no dɔmtutuw twa hyia 
Atseneneefo tsenabea;
Hɔn a wɔtwer No mboa nyina 
Ɔma hɔn No nkwagye.

name: MHB 427:5
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715.
verse:
. O, bra bɔsɔ No dɔ no hwɛ, 
Na woana bohu dɛ
Hɔn a wɔtwer No nokwar no,
Hɔn na wɔyɛ esiarfo.

name: MHB 427:6
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715.
verse:
. Ahotsewfo, hom nsuro No, 
Na hom nnkosuro hwee bio;
Hom nyɛ No som hom enyigye,
No so bɔhwɛ hom hia.

name: MHB 428:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. M' beyi mo Bɔfo ayɛw nkwaber m', 
Na ber a me ndze bɛyew wum no,
Medze tum kɛse bɛkamfo N':
M'ayɛyi nda nnkotwa mu da,
Nkwa na adwen na ahom wɔ hɔ 'i,
Anaa bɛkyebo wɔ do yi.

name: MHB 428:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Siarfo nye nyia n'enyidar twer 
Israel Nyame! Ɔno yɛɛ wim'
Asaase, Po, nye dza ɔwɔm' nyina:
No nokwar tsim hɔ pintsinn daa;
Ɔgye afonafo, ɔhwɛ ehiafo,
Na N'anohoba nnyɛ gyan da.

name: MHB 428:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 428:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Mibeyi No ayɛw nkwaberm' 
Na ber a me ndze bɛyew wum' no,
Medze tum kɛse bɛkamfo N':
M'ayɛyi nda nnkotwa mu da,
Nkwa na adwen na ahom wɔ hɔ 'i,
Anaa bɛkyebo wɔ do yi.

name: MHB 429:1
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Mo nkwa Nyame, me nda nyina m’
‘M’ahoͻdzen nyina beyi W’ ayɛw;
Mo ndwom nye anapa kan bosoɛr,
Edzi ehurusi anago sum so.

name: MHB 429:2
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Sɛ adwendwem sɛɛ m’ahomgye,
Na atseetsee ma m’akoma tu a,
Mebɛma W’ayɛyi ndwom do,
Na ͻbɛbrɛ mo nkrumsi adze.

name: MHB 429:3
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Sɛ owu dzi hɛn do konyim
Ma kasa na tum nyina bͻ adzé a,
Dɛw bohwira me nyinsuwa mu,
Akyérɛ me ndaase kɛse no.

name: MHB 429:4
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Bér a aperdzi kɛse n’ bͻbͻ adze
Ma mennda ho nnyi wiadze bio n’,
Medze enyigye ndwom no daa
Bɛka ͻsor ndwom no ho daa.

name: MHB 429:5
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Ͻrennkyɛr na mesua ndwom bi a
Wͻtow no wͻ sor man no mu,
Na medze dɛw a onnyi kabea esua
Seraph a wͻabͻ Wo ho aprͻw n’.

name: MHB 429:6
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Na mudu béa a murunnwu da hͻ a ,
Medze enyigye bɛkamfo ndwuma a
Ͻyɛ dɛw, ma nsɛm a ͻkrͻn so
Bɛgye mbersantsen ahenkyɛw n’.

name: MHB 43:1
title: John Keble, 1792-1866
verse:
. NWOMA wɔ hɔ a ɔsɛ akenkan,
Ɔkyerɛ ɔsor nokwar,
Nkyerɛkyerɛ a nyimdzefo hia,
Na akoma a no mu tsew.

name: MHB 43:2
title: John Keble, 1792-1866
verse:
. Nyame ndwuma, ɔsor na ase,
Etwa hɛn ho ehyia,
Dɛm nwoma no mu nsɛm kyerɛ 
Mbrɛ yɛhwehwɛ Nyame.

name: MHB 43:3
title: John Keble, 1792-1866
verse:
. Wimu fɛɛfɛw a etwa hɛn ho, 
Tse dɛ Bɔadze No dɔ,
Fua aksɛse na nkakraba
Sen komm na asomdwee m'.

name: MHB 43:4
title: John Keble, 1792-1866
verse:
. Dzin bi a ɔsen 'nyimnyam dzin nyina, 
Nye ngyirama ɔpedu,
Ɔdomankoma po tsea mu,
Ɔtow abɔfo ndwom.

name: MHB 43:5
title: John Keble, 1792-1866
verse:
. Hɛn wiadze ahorow ebien;
Bɔn na esiw hɛn enyi, 
Mma yennyim sor na ase esumasɛm 
Pefee dɛ po na wimu.

name: MHB 43:6
title: John Keble, 1792-1866
verse:
. Ama m' enyi a medze hu adze, 
Na ɔsom me bo pii;
Ma m'akoma a wɔdze hwehwɛ W',
Na munhu W' beebiara.

name: MHB 430:1
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 430:2
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 430:3
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 430:4
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 431:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 431:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Bra, Otumfo, bra bɛgye hɛn,
Ma hɛn nyina nya W'adom;
Bra awerɛfir m', mma nnsan bio,
Mma mmfi W'asɔrfi mu nnkɔ;
Ɔwo na yebehyira Wo daa,
Yɛasom Wo dɛ sor dɔm no,
Yɛabɔ mpaa, yɛakamfo Wo daa,
Enyimnyam ahyɛ W' dɔ ma.

name: MHB 431:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wie abɔdze fofor nyina yɛ,
Yɛnyɛ esiarfo a yenndzi dzɛm;
Ma yɛnhwɛ Wo nkwagye kɛse n',
Wɔakora n' sɔnn wɔ Wo mu;
Fi enyimnyam m' akɔ enyimnyam mu
Kodu dɛ yɛbɛba sor,
Dze hɛn ahenkyɛw abɛkyerɛ W'
'Hobow, dɔ nye ayɛyi m'.

name: MHB 432:1
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 432:2
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 432:3
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Na ɔbaatan n'abadaa 
Befi ne ba ho ara da?
Nyew, ɔyɛ a no werɛ befir n';
Emidze, m'bɛkaa wo daa.

name: MHB 432:4
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Emi Mo dɔ n' ɔnndan da, 
Ɔkrɔn kyɛn ɔsor m-po,
No mu dɔ kyɛn po no bun,
Ɔyɛ dzen, ɔkyɛn owu.

name: MHB 432:5
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 432:6
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. M' Ewuradze, midzi yaw dɛ 
Mo dɔ yɛ mberɛw, ɔyɛ nwin,
Naaso modɔ, W', mosɔr Wo;
O, ma mondɔ Wo mbordo. Amen.

name: MHB 433:1
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769

name: MHB 433:2
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769

name: MHB 433:3
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769

name: MHB 433:4
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769
verse:
. Ana biribi wɔ ase ha a
Ɔnye Wo per m'akoma ho?
Twa kyen na Wo nko dzi mu hen,
Yɛ dza ɔwɔ mo mu nyina Wura,
Dɛm na m'akoma nya ahotɔ,
Ber a ɔhom wɔ Wo mu sɔnn.

name: MHB 433:5
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769
verse:
. Yi iyi fi mo mu, ama
Maatsena ama Christ nko, na
Bɔ m'akɔndɔbɔn mbeamudua m',
Mma apɛdze bɔn kor mpo nnka;
Mma monnhwehwɛ adze biara,
Eso monndɔ hwee dɛ Ɔwo.

name: MHB 433:6
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769
verse:
. Aber nyinara twe m'akoma a
Ɔtweɔn Wo, frɛ no fi wiadze;
Kasa kyerɛ me kra na ka dɛ,
Wo Dɔfo, Wo Nyame nye Me!
M'bohu Wo tum, m'bɛtse Wo ndze,
M'bɔsɔ Wo dɔ ahwɛ nyɛ me pɛ.

name: MHB 434:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. ONYAME dɔ, eyɛ dɛw ae!
Dabɛn na m'bohu m'akoma
Dɛ ɔyɛ Wodze koraa?
Nsukɔm dze m', motɔ bahaw, m'wu
Dze kyerɛ Wo dɔ kɛse a ɔpon me,
Christ dɔ a ɔwɔ ma me.

name: MHB 434:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. No dɔ yɛ m' dzen kyɛn ''wu nye hɛll,
N'ahonya no wonnyim ano;
Asɔpɔn kan mba no
Per kwa dɛ wobohu no bun n',
Wonntum nndu esumasɛm no ho,
No war, ne trɛ, no krɔn.

name: MHB 434:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 434:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 435:1
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.
verse:
. ƆDƆ nye nkwa na owu saafee,
Ɔyɛ esumasɛm wɔ sor;
Mbrɛ Christ tse biara, dza ɔkae,
'Dɔ nye saafe.

name: MHB 435:2
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.
verse:
. Dza ɔkaa kyerɛɛ ahotsewfo n',
Ɔka kyerɛ emi na ɔwɔ so;
Ogu N'adom ahom bisa dɛ,
Ana dɔ M' a?

name: MHB 435:3
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.

name: MHB 436:1
title: Mary Sheckleton, 1827-83.
verse:
. Ɔtra n-hum', Wo dɔ a ho wɔ na n' a, 
M'Agyenkwa Jesus; naaso me kra yi
Ɔpɛ dɛ ohu Wo dɔ no mbordo,
Ne trɛ, no war, no krɔn, no bun, na ne dzen
A ɔyɛ nyinaa.

name: MHB 436:234
title: Mary Sheckleton, 1827-83.
verse:
. Ɔtra n-kaa, Wo dɔ a ho wɔ na n' a, 
M'Agyenkwa Jesus; naaso m'ano yi
Pɛ dɛ dɔ a otum yi afɔdzi suro,
Na ɔwo dɔ no, ɔka kyerɛ abɔn a
Wɔbɛn, wɔtwem'.
 
. Ɔtra ayɛyi, Wo dɔ a ho wɔ na n' a, 
M' Agyenkwa Jesus; naaso m'akoma yi
Ɔwɔ dɛ ɔkamafo dɔ a ɔhye, yɛ nwanwa a
Ɔdze mara mansotwenyi epin
Nyankopɔn nkyɛn n'.
 
. Jesus Agyenkwa, fa Wo dɔ n' hyɛ m' ma! 
Gya m' ara, gya m' kɔ nkwa nsunyiwa n' ho;
Ma montɔ nkɔ noara ho wɔ gyedzim'
Na mma da biara pɛn onnkwetsir Wo
Mmfa beebi bio.

name: MHB 436:5
title: Mary Sheckleton, 1827-83.
verse:
. Na m'enyi nya bɔ m' Jesus enyim ma  
Minya ahengua n' enyim kotow da bi a,
Ber n', No dɔ no mbrɛ otwa pa nyina,
Ne trɛ, no war, no krɔn, no bun, na ne dzen
Bɛyɛ mo ndwom.

name: MHB 437:1
title: J. H. Dufell: The London Hymn Book, 1864.
verse:
. Me Jesus, modɔ W', minyim dɛ medze nye nye W', 
Wo ntsi migyaa bɔn ho enyigye nyinara;
Mo Pomfo domfo, m'Agyenkwa nye Woara,
Me Jesus, sɛ madɔ w' da a, ɔno nye ndɛ.

name: MHB 437:23
title: J. H. Dufell: The London Hymn Book, 1864.
verse:
. Modɔ W', osiandɛ 'Wo edzi kan adɔ m' 
Na epaa kyɛw maa m' wɔ Calvary dua no do;
Modɔ Wo wɔ nsoɛ kyɛw a esoae no ntsi,
Me Jesus, sɛ madɔ W' da a, ɔno nye ndɛ.
 
. Mobɔdɔ W' wɔ nkwa mu, mobɔdɔ W' wɔ wum' 
Na meyi W' ayɛw ber a edom me nkwa,
Na ber a owu-bɔw egu mo do n', m'bɛse dɛ,
Me Jesus, sɛ madɔ W' da a, ɔno nye ndɛ.

name: MHB 437:4
title: J. H. Dufell: The London Hymn Book, 1864.
verse:
. Enyimnyam adampanm' na daa enyigyem', 
Mobɔtontom Wo na matsena W'enyim daa;
M'bɔsoa ahenkyɛw hyɛnhyɛnn no atow ndwom.
Me Jesus, sɛ madɔ W' da a, ɔno nye ndɛ.

name: MHB 438:1
title: Henry Collins, 1827-1919.

name: MHB 438:2
title: Henry Collins, 1827-1919.
verse:
. Jesu, mannhwehwɛ Wo ntsɛm koraa;
Minsi dɛn ndɔ Wo dɛ mbrɛ ɔse?
Minsi dɛn mma Wo nka ntahye,
W'enyimnyam dzin a ɔyɛ fɛw n'?

name: MHB 438:3
title: Henry Collins, 1827-1919.
verse:
. Jesu, 'bɛn na ihun mo ho
Ma akyerɛ dɔ dɛm wɔ mo do?
Dɛw kɛse a edze abrɛ m' yi,
Ɔtra enyidar na adwen koraa.

name: MHB 438:4
title: Henry Collins, 1827-1919.

name: MHB 439:1
title: Jane Crewdson, 1809-63.
verse:
. O AGYENKWA, minnyi hwee ka,
Asaase yi do anaa sor,
Ka me hia kɛse yi nko ho,
Nye Wo dͻ a onnyi kabea ’i.

name: MHB 439:2
title: Jane Crewdson, 1809-63.
verse:
. Me hia rennkyɛr na etwa mu,
Ͻso dze naaso ͻrennkyɛr,
Dͻ a wͻnntͻ yi yɛ Wo nko dze.
Ͻwͻ hͻ afebͻͻ ara.

name: MHB 44:1
title: Joseph Addison, 1672-1719
verse:
. WIMU tɛtɛr a ɔwɔ sor,
Ɔsor dubir fɛɛfɛw dɛm yi,
 Ɔsorsor a wɔahyehyɛ n' hyɛnhyɛnn, 
Kyerɛ hɔn abɔase kɛse no.
Ewia a osi do aber nyina,
Da no Bɔfo tum no edzi;
Na ɔma wiadze mbea nyina hu
Otumfo Ne nsaano edwuma.

name: MHB 44:2
title: Joseph Addison, 1672-1719
verse:
. Ɔnnkyɛr na ewimbir sum aba,
Bosoom suo anwanwasɛm n' mu,
Na anafua si n'awoo nsɛm do 
Ma asaase a oritsie,
Ber a nworaba nyina rehyerɛn;
Na odu okyinnworaba do a, 
Ber a wokyin n', wɔka asɛmpa no, 
Wɔdze nokwar n' kɔ wiadze nyina.

name: MHB 44:3
title: Joseph Addison, 1672-1719

name: MHB 440:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. ONNHIA dɛ yekyin pii
Hwehwɛ ɔdɔ Nyame;
Ne hwɛ pa a ɔhwɛ hɛn ntsi,
Nkitahodzi pa no ntsi,
No ndwuma pa nyina kyerɛ dɛ
Ɔdomfo Nyame bɛn hɛn.

name: MHB 440:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 440:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyame, nyia ɔtse Wo mu n',
Ɔnyɛ Wodze koraa;
Yɛyɛ Wodze na sor mba,
Yɛtɔ kɔ W'enyimnyam ho,
Yɛdze hɛn tum yi W' ayɛw,
Ɔwo nko na yɛbɔdɔ W'.

name: MHB 441:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. AHONYA mapa bi '
Wͻ Jesus No dͻ mu;
Na ndzepa fi nkwa bura n’ mu
Bobu hɛn akra do.

name: MHB 441:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Sunsum a yenya no ma
Adom, nyansa, na turn;
Na yɛtse awérɛhow mu a,
Yedzi dɛw afebͻͻ.

name: MHB 441:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn asomfo nye abͻfo;
Wͻsom hɛn akwan nyina mu,
Na wͻkora adorn mba krͻnn
Wͻ hͻn nsa a ͻweͻn mu.

name: MHB 441:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wͻweͻn hɛn anamͻn nyina
Kͻ sorsor nhyira no mu;
Nyame Noara yɛ hͻn Egya.
Na Jesus hɛn Nyɛnko.

name: MHB 442:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. AKOMA a adom wɔ m' enyi gye
Bea a ɔdɔ hyɛ koko ma;
Ɔdɔ na ɔhyerɛn kɛse,
Na ɔma nkaa dzi mu.

name: MHB 442:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Nyimdzee nyinara so yɛ gyan 
Na hɛn suro so yɛ gyan;
Hɛn bɔn adaaben per dzi hen,
Sɛ ɔdɔ nnyi hɔ bio a.

name: MHB 442:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 442:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Adom yi na ɔbɔtow ndwom,
Ber a gyedzi enyidar asa;
Iyi m' yɛbɔtow enyigye ndwom
Wɔ siar man dɛɛdɛw n' mu.

name: MHB 442:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ansaana yɛbɔpow dɛtse,
Efi sum m' akɔ sor n',
Ɔdɔ atsaban bɔsoa hɛn
Ekohu Nyame enyim.

name: MHB 443:1
title: George Wade Robinson, 1838-77.
verse:
. WƆADƆ me ɔmmbɔadze dɔ,
Adom akyerɛ hɛn kwan;
Sunsum a ɔhom fi sor no
Akyerɛ me dɛ dɛm na ɔtse,
Asomdwee a ho tsew, dzi mu 'i,
O atsenka krɔnkrɔn yi!
Wɔ dɔ a ɔnnsa da mu,
Meyɛ Nedze, ɔyɛ medze.

name: MHB 443:2
title: George Wade Robinson, 1838-77.
verse:
. Sor ahenman mu yɛ fɛw,
Asaase ahaabun yɛ fɛw;
Fua biara biribi wɔ m',
Nyia onnyim Christ enyi nnhu n' dɛm:
Nnoma enyigye ndwom bu do,
Nyiren fɛɛfɛw a ɔhyerɛn,
Dza minyim nye dɛ sesei
Meyɛ Nedze, ɔyɛ medze.

name: MHB 443:3
title: George Wade Robinson, 1838-77.
verse:
. Meyɛ Nedze afebɔɔ;
Woana bɛtsew m' na ɔno ntamu?
Ao, nhyira bi a Christ dze bɛma
Nyimpa a wɔwɔ dɔ mapa a!
Sor na ase botwa m' akɔ,
Asɔpɔn mba kan rudum;
Menye Nyame tse ase a,
Meyɛ Nedze, ɔyɛ medze.

name: MHB 444:1
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. 'Dɔfo, hom mma yɛndɔ: 
Dɔ fir Nyame;
Ɔdɔ Ne tsenabew pa 
Wɔ Nyame mu.

name: MHB 444:2
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. 'Dɔfo, hom mma yɛndɔ: 
Na hɔn a wɔdɔ n',
Hɔnara nko nye Ne mba a
Hɔn awoo fir sor.

name: MHB 444:3
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. 'Dɔfo, hon mma yɛndɔ: 
Na dɔ yɛ ahomgye,
Na obiara a onyi dɔ no',
Ɔnnyɛ siarfo.

name: MHB 444:4
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. 'Dɔfo, hom mma yɛndɔ; 
Dɔm' na kan wɔ,
Na nyia onnyi dɔ no,
Ɔtse sum mu.

name: MHB 444:5
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. 'Dɔfo, hom mma yɛndɔ: 
Na dɛm nkotoo
Na yebohu Nyame a
Ɔdɔ hɛn no.

name: MHB 445:1
title: Johan Scheffler, 1624-77;
verse:
. M'BƆDƆ W' m'ahoɔdzen, m'akoban,
M'bɔdɔ W' m'enyigye, m'ahenkyɛw,
Medze m'ahoɔdzen nyina bɔdɔ W'
Wo ndwuma nyina mu; Wo nko na
M'bɔdɔ Wo akɛpem dɛ gya
Krɔnkrɔn no bɛtsew me kra ho.

name: MHB 445:2
title: Johan Scheffler, 1624-77;
verse:
. Ao, dɛn ntsi na mennhu Wo ntsɛm?
'Santsen mu ahoɔfɛw mapa!
Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na mammba Wo
Hɔ ntsɛm? Ɔwo a ikum me yaw!
Medze enyito su me tsirmu
Dɛ mammba Wo hɔ ntsɛm koraa.

name: MHB 445:3
title: Johan Scheffler, 1624-77;

name: MHB 445:4
title: Johan Scheffler, 1624-77;

name: MHB 445:5
title: Johan Scheffler, 1624-77;

name: MHB 445:6
title: Johan Scheffler, 1624-77;

name: MHB 446:1
title: Francis Xavier, c. 1506-52. tr. by Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. ME Nyame, modɔ Wo, nnyɛ dɛ
M'enyi da heaven do bi,
Anaa nnyɛ dɛ hɔn a wɔnndɔ W'dze,
Wɔayew koraa ntsi bi a.

name: MHB 446:2
title: Francis Xavier, c. 1506-52. tr. by Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. Ɔwo me Jesus, Ɔwo tui
Baar m' mbeamudua no do;
'Mi ntsi na egyee mprɛgow na peaa
Nye enyimguase beberee n'.

name: MHB 446:3
title: Francis Xavier, c. 1506-52. tr. by Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. Yaw na atseetsee beberebe
Na amandzehu mfifir,
Na owu mpo nyina me ntsi a,
'Mi a meyɛ Wo tamfo.

name: MHB 446:4
title: Francis Xavier, c. 1506-52. tr. by Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. O siarfo Jesus Christ, 'bɛn ntsi
Na onnyi dɛ modɔ W' yie?
Nnyɛ dɛ m'enyi da heaven do,
Anaa m'boguan efi hɛll.

name: MHB 446:5
title: Francis Xavier, c. 1506-52. tr. by Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. Nnyɛ dɛ m'enyi da biribi kwan,
Anaa merepɛ akyɛdze,
Na mbom dɛ mbrɛ Ɔwo adɔ me
Ɔdɔ mbordo, Ewuradze.

name: MHB 446:6
title: Francis Xavier, c. 1506-52. tr. by Edward Caswall, 1814-78.
verse:
. Dɛmara na mo so m'bɔdɔ W',
Na matow W'ayɛyi,
'Siandɛ Ɔwo yɛ m' dɔ Nyame,
Na me Hen afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 447:1
title: Johan Scheffler, 1624-77;
verse:
. ƆDƆ a ɔmaa minyaa nyamesu
Mfonyin hyɛɛ wɔ ase ha no, 
Ɔwo a adze abaatan dɔ hwehwɛɛ m'
Wɔ m'ekyinkyin nyinara mu.
    Ɔdɔ medze moho ma Wo,
    Mebɛyɛ Wo nko Wodze daa.

name: MHB 447:2
title: Johan Scheffler, 1624-77;
verse:
. Ɔdɔ, Ɔwo yɛ nokwar na kan,
Asɛm na sunsum, nkwa na tum;
'Buee W'akoma too ewudzifo hɔ,
Dze agye hɔn wɔ hɔn nsɔhwɛ mu.

name: MHB 447:3
title: Johan Scheffler, 1624-77;
verse:
. Ɔdɔ, a akyekyer me pampee
Afam Wo kɔndua haahar ho,
Ɔdɔ a edzi mo do konyim
Na ehwim m'akoma efi hɔ.

name: MHB 447:4
title: Johan Scheffler, 1624-77;
verse:
. Ɔdɔ a da bi bɛma masoɛr
Efi dɛm wu asetsena yi mu,
Ɔdɔ a dakyee bi sor hɔ no,
'Bɛma menya asetsena pa.

name: MHB 448:1
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.
verse:
. ƆDƆ a onnketsie ma maakɔ,
Me kra a ɔaberɛ hom Wo mu;
Medze mo nkwa san ma Wo bio,
Ma ne mpemee wɔ Wo po bun mu n'
Eewie yie ampaara.

name: MHB 448:2
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.
verse:
. Kan a odzi m'ekyir wɔ beebiara,
Medze me kandzea sunkamm ma W';
Wo kan hyerɛn m'akoma m' bio,
Ama W'ewia n' hyerɛnee wɔ m' mu n'
Aayɛ kɛsenara.

name: MHB 448:3
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.

name: MHB 448:4
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.
verse:
. Mbeamudua a ɔma me tsir do,
Murunntum nnguan mmfi Wo nkyɛn da;
Meda dɛtse m' owu enyimnyam m',
Na dɛtse n' mu na ɔbra fɛɛfɛw a
Ɔmmbɔ adze da befir.

name: MHB 449:1
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60;
verse:
. EWURADZE, bue hɛn adwen mu
Ma yenhu W'anwanwa dwuma;
Sian hɛn dodow gyirama ma ɔnka
Wo dɔ kɛse a wɔnnhwehwɛ mu n'.

name: MHB 449:2
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60;
verse:
. Hɛn ndwuma yɛ bɔn na owu,
Kɛpem dɛ ebɔhom egu hɛn do;
Yɛanantsew Wo tum na adom mu,
Adom nwanwa! Dɔ a ɔnnsa da!

name: MHB 449:3
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60;
verse:
. Ɔyɛ dɛn yɛ dɛ ɔsor Hen,
Dɛ edze hɛn bɛma enyimnyam m'?
Yɛ nkowaa W'ahengua n' fafafo,
Yɛbɔsoa ahenkyɛw a ɔmmpa da?

name: MHB 449:4
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60;
verse:
. Hɛn akoma nan, yekyi nyinsu,
Yennyi hwee ka; yerunnhu so,
Yɛronndwen hwee so nnka ho koraa;
Mo Wura, mo Dɔ wɔabɔ N' mbeamudua m'.

name: MHB 449:5
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60;
verse:
. Enuanom pii nua Panyin nye W',
Ɔwo nkotsee na yɛkotow W',
Yɛma akoma na nsa do ma W';
Owu na nkwa m' yɛyɛ Wodze.

name: MHB 45:1
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.
verse:
. ME kra, hyira Ewuradze!
O Nyame, esō;
Ndwuma akɛse mu
Na esuma Woho.
Wo sum nyansa n' enyim
Na tum a ennyɛe,
Adwen a ɔpɛ W' ayɛyi
Sɛ dɛ ɔtsena suro mu.

name: MHB 45:2
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.
verse:
. Hɛn asaase yi a
Ɔkɔ aprɔw no
Na edze mframa 
Ayɛ n'efuradze:
Ɔwo akyekyer ho,
Ewia ma no mbo.
Na afei ɔdze hɔn
Kɔ sum mu kɛda.

name: MHB 45:3
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.
verse:
. Biribiara esi pi,
Naaso hwee nnkye bo:
Wɔsesa dabaa,
Wodzi Wo mbra do.
Epo no bun ase 
Yɛ asaase wewew,
Na ema mbepɔw so 
Kɛhyɛ po ase.

name: MHB 45:4
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.
verse:
. Mununkum tɔ nsu
Fɔw asaase do,
Ewia twe nsu no
San kɔ wimu bio:
Nyimpa ne berɛ do
Na eburow fifir,
Wenyin turo ma nsa pa,
Ma n'akoma enyigye.

name: MHB 45:5
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: MHB 45:6
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.
verse:
. Hwɛ, po na ɔda hɔ n',
No bun ase na
'Sunsum ebu do,
Bi wɔ abon na nsoɛ.
Hɔn sor na ahɛn pii
Dza eguadze kɔ;
Wonnsuro asorɛkye,
Anaa ehumtu.

name: MHB 45:7
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.
verse:
. Nyame yɛ kɛse!
Munnhu kɛse bi,
Gyedɛ Wodze nko,
M'bɛka W'ayɛyi.
Medze daa enyigye
Susu W'edwuma ho;
M'enyi gye dɛ m'bɔtow:
Me kra, yi N'ayɛw!

name: MHB 450:1
title: Benjamin Waugh, 1839-1908.
verse:
. MA yenhu Wo fɛw, Ewuradze,
Dɛ mbrɛ yeehu dada;
Ma W'ahoɔfɛw no nhyɛ hɛn dzen,
Ma yɛndɔ W', yɛnsɔr Wo.

name: MHB 450:2
title: Benjamin Waugh, 1839-1908.
verse:
. Sɛ yɛdze adwen brɛfo hwɛ a,
Yehu W'adɔyɛ no,
Ma yeetu hɛnho esi hɔ bio
Ama dwumadzi na Ɔwo.

name: MHB 450:3
title: Benjamin Waugh, 1839-1908.
verse:
. Sɛ hɛn haw biara bɔ adze a,
Hɛn adzesoa fi hɔ;
Sɛ yetum yew hɛn ahodɔ a,
Yehu Nyame dɔ no.

name: MHB 450:4
title: Benjamin Waugh, 1839-1908.
verse:
. Wo dɔ kɛse na ɔtwe hɛn
Ba fie na Wo nkyɛn bio,
Na ber a yɛyɛ Wo nokwar mba n',
Ampa, yɛyɛ Wo mba.

name: MHB 450:5
title: Benjamin Waugh, 1839-1908.
verse:
. Sɛ hɛn enyi ba hɛn ho do a,
Hɛn Wura, yɛba Wo hɔ;
Wo mpokyerɛ dɔ no yɛ hɛn
Fahodzi a odzi mu.

name: MHB 450:6
title: Benjamin Waugh, 1839-1908.
verse:
. Yɛsan ba bebisa Wo bio
Dza edze ma hɔn daa,
Wo dɔ kɛse ho nyikyerɛ no a
Ɔyɛ ɔsor bra no.

name: MHB 451:1
title: Charles Edward Mudie, 1818-90.
verse:
. Mema m'akoma do 
Ma W', me Gyefo;
'Wo nye m'adze nyina,
Na Wodze nye m'
Ana nkabɔm' dzendzen bi kyɛn iyi:
Dɛ mo Dɔfo dze nye m', na ɔyɛ medze.

name: MHB 451:234
title: Charles Edward Mudie, 1818-90.
verse:
. 'Kwan nyinam' Wodze nye m'; 
Na tsitsir dɛ,
Enam W'afɔrbɔ n' do
Eyɛ medze.
Wo dɔ nkyehoma n' adwer m' dɛɛdɛw bi,
Ɔdze me atakyer Wo ho dzendzen.
 
. M'afɔrbɔ Eguambaa, 
Medan Wo nwionn;
Dza mowɔm', meyɛm', na 
Minyim nyinam',
Dza mowɔ nyinara nnyɛ medze bio,
Mennda hɔ nndze moho; meyɛ Wodze.
 
. Mo Wura, meyɛ dɛn dze 
Biribi kam Wo?
Mber pa, anaa sika?
Anaa ahoɔdzen?
Medze dza ɔsom bo suma Wo dɛn,
Ber a 'Wo a esom bo 'dze Woho ama m'?

name: MHB 451:5
title: Charles Edward Mudie, 1818-90.
verse:
. Gyefo, meserɛ Wo dɛ 
Kora m' Wo dɔ mu,
Kɛpem dɛ owu nda
Beyi m' akɔ
Man pa nom' mbrɛ bɔn nye yaw bɔ adze a
'Wo na Wo nkorɔfo bɔm' kor afebɔɔ. Amen.

name: MHB 452:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. M'BESI dɛn madɔ me Nyame,
Meyi wiadze Gyefo n' ayɛw?
N'ayamuhyehye ba mo do,
Na odu adasamba nyina do,
Na yeenya N'ehumbɔbɔr kwa,
Menye asehwefo nyina.

name: MHB 452:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 452:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. M'besi dɛn mada Wo ase,
Adom a edze maa adasa nyina 'i?
Nkyɛ akra nyina eeyi W' ayɛw!
O nkyɛ Nyame aahyɛ m'akoma m'!
Nkyɛ dɔ bobu m'akoma do,
Na me bra akyerɛ W'enyimnyam.

name: MHB 453:1
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 453:2
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.
verse:
. O m'Agyenkwa, hyira me,
Morobɔ mpaa 'i hyira me
Ma W'adom no mboa me,
Na yi mo suro akwa;
Megye W'anohoba dzi,
M'bɔtwer W'asɛm krɔnkrɔn no;
Ɔwo me kra n' Gyefo,
Morobɔ mpaa 'i hyira me.

name: MHB 453:3
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 453:4
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 454:1
title: George Burden Bubier
verse:
. ME Nyame, menye W' bɛkasa
Meba W' ahengua enyim;
Migyaa m'enyigye nye m' bɔn mu
Na medze W' yɛ me fie.

name: MHB 454:2
title: George Burden Bubier
verse:
. Migyina Nyame bepɔw no do,
Ewia hyerɛn me kra mu;
Metse n' wɔ ase dɛ ehum rutu
Na sor repaapaa mu.

name: MHB 454:3
title: George Burden Bubier
verse:
. Mowɔ wiadze mu yi munnsuro
'Siandɛ menye W' wɔ hɔ;
Ɔsor beebi a migyina yi,
Ehum na fua nndu ha.

name: MHB 454:4
title: George Burden Bubier
verse:
. O n-kwa na enyigye nye
Dɛ mubohu Nyame!
M'bohu W'enyim, m'bɛtse Wo ndze,
M'bohu Wo dɔ nyina.

name: MHB 455:1
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715; Nicholas Brady, 1659-1726.
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ ɔtwe haahaw nsunwin ho 
Ber a oeguan afona n',
Dɛm na, me Nyame, me kra so
Haahaw hwehwɛ W'adom.

name: MHB 455:2
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715; Nicholas Brady, 1659-1726.
verse:
. Wo ho nsukɔm ɔdze me kra, 
O mo Nkwa Nyankopɔn,
Ao, dabɛn na m'bohu W'enyim
Me Nyame Hen Krɔnkrɔn!

name: MHB 455:3
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715; Nicholas Brady, 1659-1726.
verse:
. Na mindzi mbɔɔ nkodu dabɛn 
M'ahoɔdzen Nyankopɔn?
Mayɛ ankonam, makɛhyɛ
M'atwetwesifo nsa,

name: MHB 455:4
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715; Nicholas Brady, 1659-1726.
verse:
. Me kra, bɛn yɛ wo ma abotow? 
Hyɛ nsi, na ibeyi
Ɔno a ɔyɛ wo Nyame ayɛw,
Wo daa nkwa nsunyiwa.

name: MHB 456:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Mobɔhom ha ara afebɔɔ 
Mbrɛ wo mfem' bɔgya n' wɔ;
M'enyidar, m'asɛm nyina nye yi,
Agyenkwa wui maa me.

name: MHB 456:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. M'Agyenkwa a 'ruwu, me Nyame, 
Bura a ehor bɔn fi,
Fa Wo bɔgyaa n' petse mo do
Ma mo ho ɔntsew krɔnn.

name: MHB 456:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Guar me, na ma menyɛ Wodze, 
Guar me, na yɛ medze 
Nnyɛ me nan nko, na me nsa ho,
Me tsirm', na m'akomam'.

name: MHB 456:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Fa Wo nkabɔmu bɔgyaa n' ka me, 
Kodu dɛ m'bohu Wo,
Kodu dɛ m'enyidar bɛbam',
Dɔ bɛhyɛ me kra ma.

name: MHB 457:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Israel Guanhwɛfo, na medze 
Me kra ne dɛw, n'ahwehwɛdze,
Mo 'koma haahaw hwehwɛ Wo,
Mo Kɔn dɔ dɛ menye Wo tsena;
Meper mehu mfunoma pa no,k
Mbrɛ hɔn a wotsie Guanhwɛfo n'
Wɔtwer Wo bom' na wodzidzi n',
Na ewia ne hyew nn-ka hɔn.

name: MHB 457:23
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ao! kyerɛ me siar bea yi no do, 
Mbrɛ Wo nkorɔfo nyina tse,
Mbrɛ ahotsewfo dze dɛw hwɛ
Nyame a wɔabɔ N' mbeamudua mu n';
Da Wo dɔ nwanwa no edzi,
W'ahoguan, Wo wu wɔ dua n' do;
Fa me kra kɔ Calvary do,
Menye W' nhu amandze, ndzi konyim.
 
. Ha ara nko na m'enyi ber 
Dɛ menye Wo nguankuw bɔhom,
Dɛ m'bɛda botan no ase,
Anaa m'bosuma Wo bo mu;
Hɔ nko ara na m'bɛtsena daa,
Mirimmfi hɔ mmfir dabida,
M'bosuma Wo mfe mu hɔ Komm,
Mahyɛ W'akomam' afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 458:1
title: John Quarles 1624-65; Henry Francis Lyte, 1793-1847.

name: MHB 458:2
title: John Quarles 1624-65; Henry Francis Lyte, 1793-1847.

name: MHB 458:3
title: John Quarles 1624-65; Henry Francis Lyte, 1793-1847.

name: MHB 458:4
title: John Quarles 1624-65; Henry Francis Lyte, 1793-1847.

name: MHB 459:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 459:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Megye Wo dɛ nsunyiwa
Wɔ asaase wewewdo,
O sian mo do, na brɛ me
W'akomatɔm' adom n',
Dɛ mbrɛ ɔbotantsim gye
Nwin wɔ asaase a etwie yi do;
Agyenkwa, fa me suma,
Kata m'etsikwaa 'i do.

name: MHB 459:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔwo nye mo Boafo pa
Wɔ m'ahokyer ber mu,
Enyidado sa koraa mpo a,
Egye me fi bɔn mu;
O mbrɛ isi twe me ntsɛm
Fi bɔn mu wɔ nsɔhwɛ ber mu a!
Kɔ do fa W' dɔ bɔ m' ho ban,
Fa tum kata mo do.

name: MHB 459:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Dwuma a ahyɛ ase no,
Wie ne nyina wɔ mo mu;
Ehumtu ber m' kata m' do,
Gye mo sunsum fi ewia m';
Nsukɔm, berɛ na wu hyɛ m' do,
Kɛpem Sunsum bɔhom egu m' do,
Ewuradze, morohwehwɛ
Wo wu no ho mfaso.

name: MHB 46:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. MOTOW Nyame tum ho ndwom,
Dza epegya mbepɔw n',
Dza ɔtserɛɛw po m' kɔr ekyirkyir n',
Na ɔyɛɛ wimu a ɔkrɔn.

name: MHB 46:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Mohuhor nyansa no a ɔhyɛɛ
Ewia dɛ ondzi da do n';
Ɔhyɛ bosoom ma ɔhyerɛn,
Na nworaba nyina hyerɛn.

name: MHB 46:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. M'kamfo Ewuradze N'ayamuyie a
Ɔmaa asaase edziban n';
Ɔdze N'asɛm yɛɛ mbowadoma,
Na ɔkaa dɛ ne nyina ye.

name: MHB 46:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ewuradze, 'kyerɛ W'anwanwandze
Beebi a medan m'enyi,
Sɛ mohwɛ asaase a menam do,
Anaa mohwɛ sor a.

name: MHB 46:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. M-fuw na nhyiren nyinara
Da W'enyimnyam edzi,
Mununkum si na ehum tu a,
'Hyɛ mbra fi W'ahengua m'.

name: MHB 46:6
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Nyame nsa gye m' taataa dabaa, 
Ɔdze N'enyi kyerɛ m' kwan;
Ebɛn ntsi na mo werɛ befir,
Nyame a No dɔ bɛn me?

name: MHB 460:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ewuradze, yi Woho kyerɛ hɛn, 
Ber a yekyin wiadze;
Kasa kyerɛ hɛn akoma,
Ma Wo dɔ ndzɛw hɛn mu.

name: MHB 460:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. 'Nye hɛn kasa a, hɛn werɛ fir 
Aber, ɔberɛ dadwen;
Dwuma yɛ ahomgye, yaw yɛ dɛw,
Ber a, Nyame, ebɛn hɛn.

name: MHB 460:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Bra me nkyɛn mbɔ, m'adom Nyame, 
Ma m'akoma ndzi dɛw;
Makoma bɔbɔ no mu adze
Ama W', oetsie Wo ndze.

name: MHB 460:45
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ese m' dɛ monhwehwɛ W'enyim; 
Dza mohwehwɛ ara nye n';
Dɛ m'bohu W'enyimnyam no,
Matse Wo ndze mo mu.l
 
. 'Yi nyɛ mo dwuma nkodu dɛ  
M'bohu W'enyimnyam no,
M'bɛhɛn mo Wura
Na menya heaven Wo mu.    Amen.

name: MHB 461:1
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Ao, nkyɛ maatakyer Nyame ho, 
Meenya su a ɔdwe,
Kandzea ma ɔaakyerɛ kwan no a
Ɔdze m' kɔ Eguambaa n' nkyɛn.

name: MHB 461:2
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Nhyira a ber a muhun Ewuradze n' 
Minyae no wɔ henfa?
Jesus ho yikyerɛ na N'asɛm
A muhunii n' wɔ hen?

name: MHB 461:3
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Asomdwee mber a mehu pɛn a! 
Mbrɛ ho nkaa dua yɛ dɛ a!
Na ndɛ me kra atɔ pan a 
Wiadze nntum nnhyɛ no ma.

name: MHB 461:4
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Ao, Ebubur Krɔnkrɔn, san bra, 
Ahomgye ho Bɔfoe,
Mikyir bɔn a opiraa Wo n',
Na ɔpaam Wo m'akomam'.

name: MHB 461:5
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Dza modɔ no mbordo biara, 
Mbrɛ no su tse biara,
Boa ma minyi n' W'ahengua ho,
Na monsom Wo nkotoo.

name: MHB 461:6
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Nna mebɛbɛn Nyankopɔn yie, 
Nna menya su a ɔdwe,
Nna kan mapa bɛkyerɛ kwan a
Ɔdze m' kɔ Eguambaa n' nkyɛn.

name: MHB 462:1
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
. Ɔkɔm na nsukɔm dze m'; 
Jesus yɛ m'edziban:
Nkwa esutsen, pem fi
Ɔbotan no mu ma m'.

name: MHB 462:23
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
. Ɔwo a eyɛ Paanoo, 
Ma m' daadaa edziban;
Dɛ mbrɛ enyɛn akra n',
Nyɛn m', ɔno mubowu.
 
. Nokwar Wenyinaba, 
Ma monsɔ Wo dɛw nhwɛ;
Woara ma m' nkwa fofor,
Na fa dɔ nyɛn me kra.

name: MHB 462:4
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
. Ber a m'akwantu hyɛɛ ase 
Mbɔntankyim' na mekyin:
Sor Edziban, nyɛn me;
Nyimpa Ba, yɛ me boa.

name: MHB 462:5
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
. Sar da ho da m'enyim
Me kra haahaw nsu ho;
Nkwa esutsen, pem bra
Bɛtaa mo mu afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 463:1
title: Johann Caspar Lavater, 1741-1801;
verse:
. O JESUS Christ, nyin wɔ mo mu,
Dza aka nyina mpem adze;
Ma daa m'akoma ntwe mpin Wo,
Na omfi bɔn mu koraa.

name: MHB 463:2
title: Johann Caspar Lavater, 1741-1801;
verse:
. Dabiara ma dzenhyɛ ahoɔdzen
Nsuo me mberɛwyɛ mu;
Mo sum nguan nkɔ Wo kan no mu,
Wo nkwa nyi m' wu mfi hɔ.

name: MHB 463:3
title: Johann Caspar Lavater, 1741-1801;
verse:
. Wo kan hyɛnhyɛn a ɔtɔ mo do
Nhwetse adwembɔn biara;
Ɔwo na eyɛ adze nyina,
Wɔbɛkyerɛ m' dabiara.

name: MHB 463:4
title: Johann Caspar Lavater, 1741-1801;
verse:
. Ma munhu W'enyimnyam n' mbordo,
Krɔnkrɔnyi, Nyansafo!
Mebɛyɛ Wo saso wɔ ha,
Enyigye na awerɛhow m'.

name: MHB 463:5
title: Johann Caspar Lavater, 1741-1801;
verse:
. Fa sor enyigye hyɛ me ma,
Fa sor ahoɔdzen suo m' mu!
Ewuradze, ma Wo dɔ kɛse n'
Nhyerɛn me nyimpadua mu.

name: MHB 463:6
title: Johann Caspar Lavater, 1741-1801;
verse:
. Ma mara mo su nyew mo mu,
Eyɛ m' nkwa na botae;
O W'adom no mma me mfata
Dɛ m'bɛsɛ Wo dzin daa.  Amen.

name: MHB 464:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. JESUS, Asɛm a ema nkwa,
Me kra hianyi enyidar,
Mo Wura, dabɛn na mobɔsoɛr 
Na mafa W'enyimnyam n'?

name: MHB 464:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O Ɔwo me Nyame nkotoo,
Eyɛ Nkwa, Nokwar, Kwan;
Hyɛ me kra dzen, kyerɛ m'akoma
Ma muntum ngyina m' nan do.

name: MHB 464:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Biribiara a ewɔ n' wɔ ase ha,
Anaa sor a, 'dze bɛma n',
Ma munhu Wo dɔ nkotoo no,
Mennantsew, ntsena Wo mu.

name: MHB 464:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Fa ɔdɔ bra hyɛ m' ma na minnya
Ɔsor nkitahodzi;
Twe me fam Wo ho, ma minyi
Sor nkitahodzi n' nkyerɛ.

name: MHB 464:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma kwan mapa bi mbɛda hɔ
Mma me kra na Ɔwo;
Na mma hɛn ntamu nntsetsew bio,
Nkesi onnyiewie mu.  Amen.

name: MHB 465:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. EWURADZE, bue m'asowa m' yie,
Ma m'akoma ndzi dɛw;
Ma mo sunsum brɛfo ntse
W'awerɛkyekye ndze a
Wɔnntse n' mframa dzendzen mu,
Na asaasewosow bea do n',
Wo ndze no da ho yɛ berɛww,
Dza ɔwasa adom n'.

name: MHB 465:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 465:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wɔtɔɔn me maa owu no,
Ɔwo gyinae wui maa m',
Nyansa yɛ esumasɛm a
Oyi ɔdɔ nwanwa kyerɛ;
Kyerɛ m' Wo mbeamudua ho esuasɛm n',
Ma menye Wo nwu, ndzi hen;
Ma mumbu adze nyina ahwerdze,
Ma menye W' eedzi hen.

name: MHB 465:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Da mo bɔn nyina edzi,
Dɛ mbrɛ me kra botum;
Da ekyingye nye ahopɔw a
Ɔwɔ mo mu nyina edzi,
Fa emi a Ɔwoara atɔ m',
Na adwen biara ndɔmmum;
Dza ɔmmbrɛ noho adze mma W',
Ɔnngow noho nnkotow W'.

name: MHB 465:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 466:1
title: Henry Vaughan, 1621-95.
verse:
. ME kra, ɔman bi wɔ hɔ,
Ɔwɔ nworaba ekyir hɔ,
Hɔ na ɔweɔmfo bi wɔ;
Onyim akodzi mapa.

name: MHB 466:2
title: Henry Vaughan, 1621-95.
verse:
. Dede na mbusu nndu hɔ,
Sor hɔ asomdwee dzi hen;
Nyia wɔwoo No mbowadan m'
Na ɔkora adze nyina do.

name: MHB 466:3
title: Henry Vaughan, 1621-95.
verse:
. Ɔno nye w'adamfo pa,
Dɛm ntsi me kra, soɛr ɛ!
Ɔdze ɔdɔ mapa sianee
Bowuu wɔ ha maa me.

name: MHB 466:4
title: Henry Vaughan, 1621-95.
verse:
. Sɛ ibenya hɔ akɔ a,
Asomdwee nhyiren wɔ hɔ,
Nhyiren a ɔrommpo da,
Ɔyɛ w'aban 'homfi.

name: MHB 466:5
title: Henry Vaughan, 1621-95.
verse:
. Gyaa dza ɔbɔ wo ho ban no,
No mu biara nnkɛgye w';
Kor pɛr, Nyia ɔnnsakyer da,
Wo Nyame, Nkwa, Yarsa.

name: MHB 467:1
title: John Byrom, 1691-1763.
verse:
. ME kra, rohwehwɛ Wo,
Me haw akom yi mu;
Ɔwɔ m' dɛ memmfata
'Hɔho krɔnkrɔn yi dze.

name: MHB 467:2
title: John Byrom, 1691-1763.
verse:
. Ɔhɔho krɔnkrɔn yi,
Memmfata N' susuampa;
M'akoma nnya ahomgye,
Gyedɛ ofi Wo mu ba.

name: MHB 467:3
title: John Byrom, 1691-1763.
verse:
. Gyedɛ ofi Wo nkyɛn ba,
Moto m'enyi a onnhu hwee;
Dza muhu nyina mu,
Minnya ahomgye biara.

name: MHB 467:4
title: John Byrom, 1691-1763.
verse:
. Minnya ahomgye biara,
Gyedɛ Wo siar dɔ mu;
O ma womfi sor hɔ
Mbɛhyɛ me pɛ ahenkyɛw! Amen.

name: MHB 468:1
title: Sarah Flower Adams, 1805-48.
verse:
. Wo nkyɛn ara, Nyame, 
Wo nkyɛn ara!
Kaansa mbeamudua mpo
Na ɔma mo do a,
Mo ndwom dabaa nye dɛ
Wo nkyɛn ara, Nyame,
Wo nkyɛn ara.

name: MHB 468:2
title: Sarah Flower Adams, 1805-48.
verse:
. Kaansa mirikyin mpo 
Ma wi akɔtɔ,
Ma adze so asa me,
Ma mesum bo a,
M'adaaso mu m'bepin
Wo nkyɛn ara, Nyame,
Wo nkyɛn ara.

name: MHB 468:3
title: Sarah Flower Adams, 1805-48.
verse:
. Ma kwan m-bɛda hɔ a 
Wɔdze kɔ sor;
Dza edze ma m' nyina
Ehumbɔbɔr kwa;
Abɔfo refrɛfrɛ m'
Wo nkyɛn ara, Nyame,
Wo nkyɛn ara.

name: MHB 468:4
title: Sarah Flower Adams, 1805-48.
verse:
. Ber a m'enyi betsetsew n', 
M'beyi W' ayɛw;
M'bodua m'awerɛhow mu
M'esi Nyame fi;
Menam me yawm' m'bepin
Wo nkyɛn ara, Nyame,
Wo nkyɛn ara!

name: MHB 468:5
title: Sarah Flower Adams, 1805-48.
verse:
. Sɛ so medze ahomka 
Mutu ba sor,
Mo werɛ fir wi, bosoom,
Ɔnye nworaba a,
Mo ndwom mber nyina nye dɛ,
Wo nkyɛn ara, Nyame,
Wo nkyɛn ara!

name: MHB 469:1
title: Harriet Beecher Stowe, 1812-96.
verse:
. DƆM Hen Ewuradze, W'esumasɛm no,
No ho tsew koraa, ɔkrɔn, no mu dɔ ma m';
Medzi aperper araa ma maberɛ,
Afei mohom dze ma Wo bio mpaabɔ m'.

name: MHB 469:2
title: Harriet Beecher Stowe, 1812-96.
verse:
. Mosɔr dɛ tsena mo mu na mentsena Wo m';
Fi mber pa yi mu mma mmfi me nkyɛn da!
Dɛm n' dzi atoto begyaa, mo kur bɛsa,
Na me kra bɔgyakyi nyinaɛ begyaa.

name: MHB 469:3
title: Harriet Beecher Stowe, 1812-96.
verse:
. Tsena mo mu na Wo dɔ nhyɛ mo do,
Na adwen afaafa nye adwembɔn nyina,
Pɛsɛankonya na ɔbra bɔn nyina tutu;
Na sie me kra botoo, ma ɔnyɛ Wodze.

name: MHB 469:4
title: Harriet Beecher Stowe, 1812-96.
verse:
. Mbrɛ eduhuam aboɔdzen bi wɔ toaba mu a
Ɔdze no huam saa dɛm toaba n' ber no,
Dɛmara na ber a etse ɔkra mu n',
Edze sor ndzepa na dɛw hyɛ mu ma.

name: MHB 469:5
title: Harriet Beecher Stowe, 1812-96.
verse:
. Tsena mo mu: minya nhyira ber yi,
Ber a metsee Wo ndze na muhun Wo tum;
Bɔn tui kɔree na akɔndɔbɔn guanee,
Na Nyame N'ahoɔfɛw no baa mo do.

name: MHB 469:6
title: Harriet Beecher Stowe, 1812-96.

name: MHB 47:1
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. EGYA a edze ndze kɛse
Frɛɛ dɛm wiadze yi ma ɔbae,
Yedzi dɛw, Wo mbɔbɔrhu ho:
Ɔtse dɛm daa na ɔnnsesa.

name: MHB 47:2
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. W'asɛm na ɔma biribiara gyina;
Ekyerɛ Wo dɔ wɔ biara do,
Etse W'abɔdze biara su.
Ema obiara dza odzi.

name: MHB 47:3
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. N-kwa Wura nye ne Mafo,
Ɔwo na ebɔ hɛn nyina ho ban,
Nsɔhwɛ ber huuhu yi mu so,
Gye hɛn fi bɔn na Satan nsa.

name: MHB 47:4
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. Ewuradze, eyɛ hɛndze,
Kyerɛ W'ayamuyie nyina wɔ hɛn do;
Fa asomdwee na sor enyigye
Hyɛ hɛn akoma m' ma ɔnyɛ fofor.

name: MHB 47:5
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. Egya, Wodze nye dɛ ema
Wo mbofra daa daa edziban;
Fura haban mu sukooko tam,
Na tsie n-konkoran hɔn su.

name: MHB 47:6
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. Yɛdze hɛn dadwen to Wo do,
Ɔwo na inyim hɛn hia nyina;
O fa W'adom no nyɛn hɛn na 
Ma hɛn akra nkwa paanoo ndɛ. Amen.

name: MHB 470:1
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.
verse:
. MEPƐ dɛ menye Wo
Tsena O, Ewuradze;
Aber biara na bea biara,
Menye Wo bɛtsena.

name: MHB 470:2
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.
verse:
. Me Nyame, ma menye W'
Monsoɛr nyɛ edwuma;
Sɛ dabiara resan aba a,
Menye W' hyɛ ase mpaabɔ m'.

name: MHB 470:3
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.
verse:
. Menye W' wɔ hɔ; dɔm a
Wɔyɛ gyegyeegye mma
Menntse Wo ndze no koraa ntsi,
Ka n' berɛww kyerɛ m'akoma.

name: MHB 470:4
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.
verse:
. Menye W' wɔ hɔ; sɛ da
Sa na ewimbir dwedwe m',
Ma witɔree yɛ dɛ wi puei a,
M'akoma bɔhwehwɛ Wo.

name: MHB 470:5
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.
verse:
. Ɔwo na sɛ adzesaa dze
Ahomgye brɛ hɛn a,
M'bɛhyɛ W'atsaban ase komm na
Maka m'enyi egu do.

name: MHB 470:6
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.
verse:
. Gyedzi mu ara na
Menye Wo bɛtsena;
Adzekyee, adzesaa nye nkwa
Na wu m', menye Wo ntsena.  Amen.

name: MHB 471:1
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. O ME Nyame, Ͻwo yɛ m’dze:
Ansaana ewia rubopue no,
Wo tum ne kan hyérɛn m’akoma m’,
Na eda Wo tum nwanwa edzi.

name: MHB 471:2
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. Me kra a nsukͻm dze n’ hwehwɛ Wo,
Ber a metse sar yi do yi no;
Kaansa ’kͻm dze m’, motͻ bitsi a,
Wo dͻ nko bɛkyekye mo werɛ.

name: MHB 471:3
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. Hwɛ, asaase pawee yi do,
Ewuradze, medze m’ho to W’ do;
M’enyi gye W’adom ho koraa sen
Wiadze egyapadze nyina.

name: MHB 471:4
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. M’akoma nye me ndze bɛkamfo
Wo dͻ a ͻkyɛn nkwa mpo no,
Na m’asomdwee, ’nyimnyam na dɛw
Bͻbͻ W’ayɛyi no dawur.

name: MHB 471:5
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. M’behyira Wo wͻ adwontow mu,
Ber a mo nkwa nda resa no;
Ntonton a ͻfata Wo dzin no
Na dͻnhwer nyina mubotua.

name: MHB 471:6
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. O me Nyankopͻn, me mpa do
Wo dzin pue m’ano, hyɛ adwen ma;
Musuro, m’ ho popo anagosum m’,
Wo nsaano edwuma nwanwa ntsi.

name: MHB 471:7
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. Dza meyɛ nyina m’ muhu Wo mboa;
Nyankopͻn, ‘Wo a emaa m’akoma
Dzii ehurusi wͻ W’atsaban ase,
M’bͻtow Wo kɛseyɛ ho ndwom.

name: MHB 471:8
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. Me kra twe bɛn Wo, na ͻtar Wo,
Ntsi ma dza ͻbɛba biara mbra;
Wo tum nsa botwitwa agye me,
Nyia Ͻwo gye no nndzi ͻkogu.

name: MHB 472:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 472:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Memmper bio dɛ m'bɛsakyer hweeara 
Ansaana Dɔfo kɛse yi aba:
Misiesie n' yie dɛn ara a, ɔmmfata;
Misianka W' kakra so a, ɔnnsɛ koraa.

name: MHB 472:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Mbrɛ etse n' ara, fa W'ahotsew nye dɛw 
Bra dan mu bɔhwɛ mbrɛ no mu tse ara;
W'enyimnyam kɛse na m'ahohia ntsi
Munnsuro dɛ m'bɛgye W' asoɛ me fi.

name: MHB 472:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Bra, na nnyɛ dɛ ibohu m'akoma  
Dɛ mu tsew, na mbom bɛyɛ ma ɔmfata W';
Bɛpa mu bɔn nye sum nye suro nyina
Bɔsoɛ me, mo Wura Jesus, Woara bra! Amen.

name: MHB 473:1
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910
verse:
. M'AKOMA atɔ m' yamu, Nyame,
Mebɛda W' ase, matow ndwom;
Beebi a ndzepa nyina wɔ no,
Hɔ na m'akoma so wɔ,
Na kuraba a ɔwo awen yi,
Obiara nntum nnhyɛ n' ma;
'Siandɛ asaase do nsu
Nnyɛ hwee, nsukɔm dze me.

name: MHB 473:2
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910

name: MHB 473:3
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910
verse:
. Enyimnyam na tum nka Wo,
Minnyi ahoɔdzen dɛ Ɔwo;
Na suro a ɔdze me bɛn Wo bo m' no n',
Dza ɔyɛ medze koraa n',
Mowɔ dɛw egyapadze bi a
Onnyi dɛ muhu mpo;
N-sa a okyii bɔgya maa me
No risie ama me.

name: MHB 473:4
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910
verse:
. M'akoma atɔ me yamu, Nyame,
M'akoma wɔ Wo nsamu;
Metse enyigye na ahoɔdzen 
N-ka wɔ beebiara,
Me kra se, Ɔwo nye me kyɛfa!
Ɔpedu ndze ka dɛm,
Na hɔn enyigye Amen ndwom no
Ɔnnkɔbɔ adze da.

name: MHB 474:1
title: Harriet Beecher Stowe, 1812-96.
verse:
. MENYE Wo wɔ hɔ ber a wimu rebaabaa,
Ber a anoma rinyan na sunsuma reyew;
Ɔyɛ fɛw kyɛn anapa, ɔyɛ fɛw kyɛn wigyinae,
Hyɛ m'adwen dɛw ma dɛ menye W' wɔ hɔ.

name: MHB 474:2
title: Harriet Beecher Stowe, 1812-96.
verse:
. Menye Wo nko wɔ hɔ sunsuma no mu
Abɔdze fofor a ɔfata dzin n' mu;
Ɔwo nkotsee na minnkegyaa W' tonton da,
Wɔ anapa bɔsu nwinwin no mu.

name: MHB 474:3
title: Harriet Beecher Stowe, 1812-96.
verse:
. W'enyimnyam anapa woraba n' rohom
Wɔ anapa bɔw mu dɛ mbrɛ po ataa dzinn;
Na dɛm n-tsi kommyɛ yi mu na ihu
W'enyimdua wɔ m'akoma mu nsamu.

name: MHB 474:4
title: Harriet Beecher Stowe, 1812-96.
verse:
. Meda ho nye W' wɔ hɔ dɛ anapa fofor 
Ɔda ho ma hɛn dza ɔyɛ ahomka;
Dɛmara na siar enyidahɔ yi rinyan,
Na daa ɔgye ahom bɛn Wo wɔ sor.

name: MHB 474:5
title: Harriet Beecher Stowe, 1812-96.
verse:
. Sɛ ɔberɛ ma 'kra tɔ nkom na ɔmem a,
N'enyiwa a oemua hwɛ Wo wɔ mpaabɔ m',
W'atsaban no nwin ase ahomgye yɛ dɛw,
Ɔyɛ dɛw mbordo dɛ m'bohu Wo hɔ.

name: MHB 474:6
title: Harriet Beecher Stowe, 1812-96.
verse:
. Dɛm na ewiei anapa kan mu no bɛyɛ,
Ber a ɔkra nyan na nkwa sunsuma etu kɔ;
Dɛm dɔnhwer n' m' 'bɛyɛ fɛw akyɛn anapa kan,
Adwen n' bɛda edzi, menye W' wɔ hɔ.   Amen.

name: MHB 475:
title: Annie Sherwood Hawks, 1835-1918.
verse:
Mihia Wo, ao, mihia Wo, 
Mber nyina mihia Wo; 
M'Agyenkwa, Maba Wo hɔ, 
Hyira me sesei.

name: MHB 475:1
title: Annie Sherwood Hawks, 1835-1918.
verse:
. Mihia Wo Mber Nyina, 
Domfo Ewuradze;
Ndze bi nntse dɛ Wodze a,
Ɔma asomdwee.

name: MHB 475:2
title: Annie Sherwood Hawks, 1835-1918.
verse:
. Mihia Wo mber nyina, 
Pinkyɛn me daa;
Ber a Ɔwo bɛn me n'
Mennyɛ bɔn da.

name: MHB 475:34
title: Annie Sherwood Hawks, 1835-1918.
verse:
. Mihia Wo mber nyina, 
Dɛw mu o, yaw mu o;
Bra ntsɛm bɛnye me ntsena,
Mma ɔbra annyɛ gyan.
 
. Mihia Wo mber nyina, 
Kyerɛkyerɛ m' Wo pɛ;
W'anohoba a ɔsom bo n'
Pon ne nyina ma m'.

name: MHB 476:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. WO mba a edɔ hɔn kɛse n',
Hɔn so wohyia nkodzen;
Mma wɔnnsɔ hɛn nnhwɛ mma ɔmmbor
Dza yebotum asɔw;
Sɛ nsɔhwɛ a yetum gyina enyim,
Dza onndzi hɛn kra do nyim
Ba a, yɛ hɛn nkwagye dzendzen,
Wɔ ogya dɔnhwer mu.

name: MHB 476:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Aa! Mma nngyaa hɛn mma yɛnnkɔ
Bɔn no nkɔnkɔnoa da;
Na sɛ yɛtɔ efir mu a,
Dom hɛn Wo mboa ber pa m',
Sɛ Wo nyansaa sɔ hɛn hwɛ a,
Kɛpem dɛ yaw botwa m' n',
Ɔdɔ kɛse, bɛn hɛn yie
Na gye hɛn mu biara.

name: MHB 476:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛpɛ dɛ yegyaa bɔn yɛ,
Adwen, kasa na nyɛe m';
Yɛyɛ nyaa dɛ wɔgye hɛn 
Fi bɔn n'ahyɛse mu;
Akɔndɔbɔn biara mu,
Hɛn nyimpasu ne fɛr n',
Jesus, yɛserɛ dɛ gye hɛn
Fi mu wɔ Wo dzin mu.

name: MHB 476:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Abɔ werdam ama hɛn 
Wɔ ndzeyɛɛ bɔn biara ho,
Mpatadze a odzi mu no,
Adehye bɔgya etua;
Na fa biribiara ndɔmmum;
Nyame krɔnkrɔn, bra mu!
Botwa emumuyɛ do,
Na yi bɔn fi hɔ koraa.  Amen.

name: MHB 477:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. NYAME Ba, sɛ W'adom no
Ama mo do bio dze a,
Ɔfrɛ m' dɛ monhwehwɛ Wo,
Na ɔama m' enyidar a,
Kɔ do ara dom m' Wo mboa pa,
Na kyerɛ m' W'ayamuyie nyina;
Domfo Ewuradze, kora me,
Na mma nngyaa m' mma monnkɔ!

name: MHB 477:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 477:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ewuradze, ma m' suro krɔnkrɔn
Na tsim no m'akoma m',
Ama medze ahwɛyie pa
Meeguan efi mfom ho,
Meekyir bɔn akyɛn hɛll mpo;
Kɛpem dɛ esɛɛ tamfo bawee n'
Domfo Ewuradze, kora me,
Na mma nngyaa m' mma monnkɔ!

name: MHB 477:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 478:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Jesus, me Gyefo, Nua, Nyɛnko, 
M'adwendwen nyina da Wo do;
Adze nyina mu medan Wo:
Woara hyehɛ na gye m'asɔr.

name: MHB 478:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Sɛ W'adom a ɔma nkwagye n' 
Na menya masɔ bi mahwɛ,
Sɛ Woara Wo Sunsum nye m' tse
Na ɔdze N'atsaban kata m' do a:

name: MHB 478:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nna ma ɔnda ho ɔnhyɛ me dzen, 
Na mma onngyaa m' hɔ ara da,
Ma ɔmpa m' esian nye mbusu,
Onsie me kra ma ɔnyɛ fofor,

name: MHB 478:45
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Sɛ mofom fi kwan pa nom' a, 
Ma mentse Ne ndze wɔ m'ekyir
Dɛ, San, bodua wo kwan Christ mu,
Guan kɔ Christ hɔ, na bɔn abɛn.
 
. No ngo krɔnkrɔn a ofi sor 
Nda ho nkyekye mo werɛ, nkyerɛ m' kwan,
Nkɛpem dɛ m'akoma bɔgow
Na Noara dze dɔ bɛtsena mu.

name: MHB 478:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 478:7
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Gyefo, tsen Wo nsa suo mo mu, 
Annyɛ n' dɛm a, nna mobɔhwe ase!
Wo nkotoo na musu frɛ Wo,
Motwer Wo nko a, nna migyina, Amen.

name: MHB 479:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 479:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyia ɔhwehwɛ biara bohu,
Nyia obisa biara benya;
Christ, adasa Agyenkwa n',
