Wɔhwehwɛ Kyérɛwsɛm no mu
Kodu dɛ wɔtse Ne ndze.

name: MHB 571:3
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.
verse:
. Abɔdze m’ ɔyɛ hɔndze.
. Wohyia N’ wɔ N‘abangua do;
Tsitsir wɔ N‘ahomgye mu,
Adzekyee nye ewimbir.
Wɔtwer N’ abrabɔ nyina m’.
Yaw, dadwen nà akodzi mu;
’Yinom tse dέ ewiaber fua
Gyegye wo Ne hyerɛn mu.

name: MHB 571:4
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.
verse:
. Hɔn ahomgu nyina ho tsew:
Owu, worunnhu bi da,
Wɔnye Owùra wɔ paràdisé,
Kesi wunyan da no mu.
Na wɔbɛbɛn seraphfo,
Ahotsewfo bohu No,
Egya n’ wɔ Ne Ba no mu,
Nam Sunsum no mù ayɛ kor.

name: MHB 572:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. HWƐ, emi Ewuradze N'akowaa!
Motweɔn ehu W'akwankyerɛ,
Etsie, esie W'asɛm biara,
Asɔ Wo pɛ ahwɛ na mayɛ,
Dze dɛw egyaa mara mo ndwuma,
Dze enyigye ahyɛ tsenenee nyina ma.

name: MHB 572:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Emi a memmfata W'abɔdze m',
Sɛ W'adom pɛ dɛ ɔdze m' yɛ edwuma a,
Woara kyerɛ dwuma n', ber n', na yɛbea n',
Ma m'aba nyina mfir Wo mu;
Ma mindzi mo dwuma nyina Wo mu,
Na fa m' du emudzi mapa m'.

name: MHB 572:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Me mberɛwyɛ nhyehyɛɛ n', sɛ oye mpo a,
Bɔ gu, sesa n' dɛ mbrɛ ehwɛ a oye,
Jesus, ma mo ndwuma nyina nyɛ W'dze!
Ewuradze, Wo ndwuma nyina dzi mu,
Na ɔsɔ Ɔwo Egya W'enyi,
Wo nko na ayɛ adze nyina yie.

name: MHB 572:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Afei medan W'adze ma Wo,
Wen Wo dɛtse pɔtɔɔ 'i mbrɛ epɛ;
Mbom ma minya Wo nsewhyɛ no, 
Ma mindzi W'asɛm biara do,
Mfa akoma na enyi kor nsom,
Ntsena ase nwu nhyɛ W' enyimnyam.  Amen.

name: MHB 573:1
title: Joachim Lange, 1670-1744;

name: MHB 573:2
title: Joachim Lange, 1670-1744;

name: MHB 573:3
title: Joachim Lange, 1670-1744;

name: MHB 573:4
title: Joachim Lange, 1670-1744;
verse:
. Soma Wo su n' ma omfi sor mbra,
Na ma ɔnyɛ m'ahyehyɛdze;
Fa nyansa, abotar na ɔdɔ fura m',
Mbrɛhoadze na ahotsew a no bo
Kyɛn sika na mbota koraa,
Na ɔhyerɛn kyɛn anapa nworaba.

name: MHB 573:5
title: Joachim Lange, 1670-1744;

name: MHB 574:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. EGYA, Ba, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn,
Ɔkorsa, Ebiasa kor,
Wɔnyɛ Wo pɛ asaase do,
Dɛ mbrɛ sor dɔm yɛ n' ara;
Nkorɔfo nyina nyi W' ayɛw,
Sor nye asaase enyimnyam Wura.

name: MHB 574:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Emi m' yɛ dzebɔnyɛnyi,
Hwɛ! Megye Wo frɛ no do,
W'adom kuraba a ɔmmfata m',
Nyame adom so obiara do;
Hwɛ! Meba bɛyɛ Wo pɛ,
Midzi W'afotu nyina do.

name: MHB 574:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hianyi, sunsuma tse dɛ emi,
Metsena ma W'enyimnyam a,
Tsew me ndzeyɛɛ nyina ho,
Gye me nsɛm na m'adwen nyina;
Fa me, fa me yɛ W'edwuma,
Dza mowɔ, metse nyina.

name: MHB 574:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 574:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Afei, Nyame, meyɛ W'dze,
Medze W'adze san ma Wo,
Fahodzi, mfɛfo nye dzin,
Metsew ho ma Wo nkotoo,
Metse ase ma W', m'enyi gye;
Muwu ma Wo a, enyigye nko.

name: MHB 574:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Egya, Ba, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn,
Ɔkorsa, Ebiasa kor,
Wɔnyɛ Wo pɛ asaase do,
Dɛ mbrɛ sor dɔm yɛ n' ara;
Nkorɔfo nyina nyi W' ayɛw,
Sor nye asaase enyimnyam Wura.  Amen.

name: MHB 575:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. EWURADZE, ammpow dɛ ebɛyɛ
Nyimpa nyina akowaa na afona;
Ammfɛr dɛ edze W'ahentum n'
Bɛba abɔsom hɛn.

name: MHB 575:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Duadwimfo n' Ba, gye m'edwuma
Tootooba a ɔnnsɛ hwee 'i;
Twe mo ndwuma a ɔmmfata 'i bata
Wodze n' ho ma ɔnsom bo.

name: MHB 575:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔwo nye dza m'yɛ nyina n'ewiei,
Muhu W'nko wɔ adze nyina m';
Afei gye mo ndwuma krɔnn yi,
Midzi ma Woara nko.

name: MHB 575:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Meka W' fasusu papa n' do
Abɛn W' adze nyina m';
Dza modwen, meka, meyɛ nyina
Yɛ afɔr kɛse kor.

name: MHB 575:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Mudua haw na atseetsee mu sɔnn,
Biribiara nntwe m' ekyir;
Ha 'i me nsa dzi dwuma ma Wo,
M'akoma da ho wɔ W' nkyɛn.

name: MHB 576:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. MA m'adwen nyina wɔ ha nyɛ dɛ
Medze suro na ɔdɔ, ndaase
M'bɔsom Ewuradze dɛ ɔba;
Mobɔpow akwan bɔn nyina,
Akyerɛ dɛm adwen mu piw yi,
Maanantsew papa n' mu.

name: MHB 576:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ao! Ma mimfi bɔn ho mfi ara,
Jesus, nkyɛ ama me nyansa
Na ntseasee akoma;
Ma mundua Wo Sunsum mu nhu
Mbrɛ m'bɛhyɛ W' enyimnyam wɔ ha,
Na munhu ɔsor kwan. Amen.

name: MHB 577:1
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.
verse:
. DƆYƐFO Ewuradze, Ɔwo a dabaa rohwehwɛ
Wo nkorɔfo a wɔper ayɛ wopɛ,
Hɔn ahoɔdzen fir W', wɔka W' tum na adom kyerɛ;
Papa mu o, bɔn mu o, wonntwa W' abrɔdɔ.

name: MHB 577:2
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.
verse:
. Yɛba Wo hɔ, na mberɛw mu yɛka hɛn bɔn,
Hɛn gyedzi suar wɔ adwen, kasa na nyɛe m',
Yɛserɛ Wo, ma yenhu ampaara dɛ yenya
W'adom fakyɛ wɔ ahokyer ber mu.

name: MHB 577:3
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.
verse:
. Dwumadzi nkakraba m', Woara kenyan hɛn,
Dwumadzi akɛse m' so fa W' tum hyɛ hɛn;
Yɛsom nokwar mu a, na yenya nkwagye,
Yɛnsom W' dɛm, yendzi dɛw dɛ yɛyɛ W' pɛ.

name: MHB 577:4
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.
verse:
. Mma yɛnnyɛ akɔmpew wɔ sor nyikyerɛ no ho,
Yendzi nokwwar daa, yemmbisa akatua,
Yedzi W'ekyir 'i, ma yɛnhyɛ hɛn somdwuma ma,
Yendzi nokwar mma hɛnho na Ewuradze.  Amen.

name: MHB 578:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Asodzi da mo do
Dɛ miyi Nyame ayɛw,
Megye me kra a onnwu da nkwa,
Na mema ɔsɛ sor.

name: MHB 578:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Mosom mbersantsen yi, 
Midze dwuma a wɔahyɛ m',
Ao, nkyɛ medze m'ahom nyina 
Maayɛ mo Wura Ne pɛ!

name: MHB 578:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Fa nhwɛyie bɔ me ban 
Ma mentsena dɛ ihu m';
Na, mo Wura, siesie Wo somfo
Na meebu nkontaa pa.

name: MHB 578:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Boa m' ma monweɔn, monsɔr, 
Na montwer Wo nkotoo
Minyim dɛ mogor m'edwuma ho a,
M'bowu wu a onnyi ewiei.

name: MHB 579:1
title: Sylvanus Dryden Phelps, 1816-95.
verse:
. Gyefo, Ɔwo, dɔ ntsi 
Iwui maa me,
Ɔmmfata dɛ medze,
Hweeara kam Wo;
Dɔm', me kra bɔkotow W',
M'akoma edzi ne nsew do,
Na ɔabɔ afɔr bi,
Ama W' sesei.

name: MHB 579:2
title: Sylvanus Dryden Phelps, 1816-95.
verse:
. Mbɔbɔr egua n' enyim 
Idzi ma me,
Jesus, me gyedzi to
N'enyi hwɛ Wo:
Boa m' ma monsoa mbeamudua n',
Mombɔ Wo dɔ n' dawur,
Montow ndwom, mbɔ mpaa bi
Mma Wo sesei.

name: MHB 579:3
title: Sylvanus Dryden Phelps, 1816-95.
verse:
. Ma m' nokwar 'koma a, 
Ɔsɛ Wodze N',
Na dabiara  a otwam'
Eehu me dɛ
Mahyɛ dɔ dwuma bi ase,
Mayɛ ayamuyie bi,
Matwe kobɔnyi bi,
Medze ama W'.

name: MHB 579:4
title: Sylvanus Dryden Phelps, 1816-95.
verse:
. Dza mowɔ o, mbrɛ metse o, 
W' akyɛdze kwa,
Dɛw mu o, yaw mu o, mo Wura,
Wodze nye me.
Na muhu W'enyim a,
Me kra a wɔapɔn no yi,
Mbersantsen nyina mu,
Ɔnyɛ Wodze.

name: MHB 58:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. EWURADZE dzi hen;
N'ahengua si ɔsor,
Atar a ɔhyɛ no
Yɛ kan na ahentum:
N'enyimnyam hyerɛn dɛ ekan,
Dasanyi biara nntum nnhwɛ kan n'.

name: MHB 58:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 58:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 58:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Enyimnyam Hen kɛse
Yi bɛbrɛ No ho adze?
Na ɔakyerɛw Ne dzin dɛ
M'Egya na m' Adamfo?
Modɔ Ne dzin, modɔ N'asɛm.
M'ahoɛdzen nyina nkamfo
Ewuardze! Amen.

name: MHB 580:1
title: Thomas Toke Lynch, 1818-71.
verse:
. EWURADZE, mma mmpam m'
W'edwuma ho,
Mbom kyerɛ me W' apɛdze;
Mo so dɛm yi maayɛ biribi
Wɔ Wo kwaa tɛtɛr 'i mu;
Na mbɔsom Wo daa nyinara,
Minnkebisa akatua.

name: MHB 580:2
title: Thomas Toke Lynch, 1818-71.
verse:
. Pii wɔsom Wo, dodowara so
Na otwar dɛ wɔbɔsom W',
Ema binom tsɛw wenyindua,
Binom tsetsew aba n',
Wo mberantsɛ gyina akono,
Wo mbɔtoaba wɔ fie.

name: MHB 580:3
title: Thomas Toke Lynch, 1818-71.

name: MHB 580:4
title: Thomas Toke Lynch, 1818-71.

name: MHB 581:1
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. HOM Ewuradze nkowaa,
Obiara mfua n'edwuma m',
Hom a hom dzi No sor asɛm do
Nweɔn Nyame N'abow no.

name: MHB 581:2
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Hom mma hom nkandzea nhyerɛn
Hom nkeka n' framee n' yie,
Hom mbɔ hom ntoa ngyina N'enyim,
Ne dzin no yɛ nwanwa.

name: MHB 581:3
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Weɔn: dɛm na hɛn Wura se,
Yɛkasaa a, ɔbɛn hɛn;
Hom nhyɛ Ne nsa nsɛnkyerɛdze n' nsew,
Hom nyina nyɛ ntsɛm mpue.

name: MHB 581:4
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Ɔsomfo, homkanyi
Nye onyia ɔsom dɛm!
Ɔdze dɛw bohu n'Ewuradze,
Na ɔahyɛ N'enyimnyam.

name: MHB 581:5
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Christ Noara N'ahensa
Na ɔdze bɔto pon no,
Ɔama akowaa nokwafo n' tsir do,
Wɔ abɔfo dɔm no mu.

name: MHB 582:1
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.
verse:
. HƐN Egya N'adom fi Ne kan
Fadum no m' hyerɛn hyɛnhyɛnn daa;
Na hɛndze ɔdze mpoano ha
Nkandzea no ahyɛ hɛn nsa.

name: MHB 582:2
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.
verse:
. Wɔmma ase nkandzea no ndzɛw,
Mma ne hyerɛn ntra asorɛkye;
Ma aagye brɛfo bɔbɔfo bi a
Oridzi aper po do no nkwa.

name: MHB 582:3
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.
verse:
. Bɔn anago kadoo no etwa m',
Po asorɛkye bɔ dzendzen;
Pii roweɔn, rotweɔn, rohwehwɛ
Eehu mpoano nkandzea no.

name: MHB 582:4
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.
verse:
. Mo nua, ma wo kandzea no nhyerɛn,
Farnyi fonafo a ehum rutu n',
Reper hwehwɛ edu berano,
Rehara wɔ sum no mu.

name: MHB 583:1
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.
verse:
. IFI bɔn wiadze mpokyerɛ mu a,
Mbrɛ odua yɛ dɛw a!
M'besi akoma na adwen tadua,
Ayɛ Ewuradze akowaa;
Edze enyigye bɛyɛ edwumason
Biara a ɔbɛhyɛ wo,
'Dze ahobrɛadze bɛyɛ edwumaba
Biara a edze bɛma m'.

name: MHB 583:2
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.
verse:
. Medze ɔpɛ na enyigye
Bɔweɔn W'aponkɛse,
Mayɛ krado dɛ m'besi empire n',
Masoa dza ɔyɛ dur n';
'Nnkɛtse apranaa biara mbɔm',
'Bɛka N' do bɔkɔɔ ara;
Ɔdɔ nko na obotum akyerɛ
Ɔdɔfo N'apɛdze.

name: MHB 583:3
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.
verse:
. Ma monsom dɛm, Domfo Ewuradze,
Wo nko ara Wodze daa,
Medze me kra na honam ma W',
Ɔwoara W'atɔdze a;
Atsenka pa anaa bɔn mu a,
Menye W' bɛnantsew ara;
Nyimpadua yi m' nkwa mu o, wu mu o,
Menhyɛ Christ enyimnyam.

name: MHB 583:4
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.
verse:
. Mbrɛ dwumadzi ber wɔ som yi mu
Ɔnnkyɛr na oetwa m' kɔ a!
Ɔpon ber no ba ntsɛmara,
Ahomgye ber bɛn ntsɛm,
Na anokwafo dzi ehyia wɔ fie,
Ahomkafo ehyiadzi,
Owura Ne nkyɛn na No nkowaa
Esiarfo bɛtsena daa.

name: MHB 584:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O JESU, kenyan m'akoma,
Fa gya krɔnn ka m'anofamfa,
Siansian abɔtoaba gyirama;
Na siesie W'adom kuraba,
Fa ayɛyi egudo ntar n' hyehyɛ m',
Mo ndwom nyina bɛyɛ ehumbɔbɔr;
Obiara a onnyim Nyankopɔn,
Hɔn a Jesu bɔgyaa atɔ hɔn,
Ehumbɔbɔr a ɔtra sor na ase;
Dɔ a no war, trɛ, no bun, no krɔn,
Obunkam kan m' esiarfo do,
Nyame dɔ a ɔnnsa ara da.

name: MHB 584:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Fa m' hyɛ beebi a epɛ, menyɛ
W'adom n' ho nokwar dasefo,
Mindzi dza ahyehyɛ nyina do,
'Nantsew edwuma a Woara ahyehyɛ n' mu;
Ma akatua pa n' aayɛ medze,
Ɔsor tsenenee ahenkyɛw no,
Matsena ase ama Wo nko ara n',
Nkuranhyɛsɛm dɛ: Mbo-na-yɛ!
Na mentsena Wo nkyɛn wɔ sor,
Menhɛn mo Wura N'enyigye mu,
Onnyiewiei nyina minyi W' ayɛw,
Ndzi dɛw mbordo, na mondɔ Wo.

name: MHB 585:1
title: William Pierson Merrill, 1867-
verse:
. Nyame asomfo, hom nsoɛr! 
Hom n-tow nsɛmhun ngu!
Hom mfa 'koma, adwen, ndamyɛ
Mbɔsom ahemfo Hen!

name: MHB 585:2
title: William Pierson Merrill, 1867-
verse:
. Nyame asomfo, hom nsoɛr! 
N'ahendzi ekyim dodow;
Hom mma enuadɔ nda edzi,
Na sum nye manso nkɔ.

name: MHB 585:3
title: William Pierson Merrill, 1867-

name: MHB 585:4
title: William Pierson Merrill, 1867-
verse:
. Hom mma Christ mbeam'dua n'do! 
Hom ntsia N'ananɔm m;
Onyimpa Ba, hom Nua n', dzi kan:
Nyame asomfo, hom nsoɛr!

name: MHB 586:1
title: Samuel Greg, 1804-87.

name: MHB 586:2
title: Samuel Greg, 1804-87.

name: MHB 586:3
title: Samuel Greg, 1804-87.

name: MHB 586:4
title: Samuel Greg, 1804-87.

name: MHB 587:1
title: Robert Wilfred Collin, 1886-1951.
verse:
. O NDZEPA nyina Ewuradze!
Hɔn nyinara Bɔfo,
Ɔwo a ɔpɛber kɛsɛɛ ekyir n'
Etɔ nsu ma nduadzewa fifir,
Yɛbɔ Wo dzin kɛse n'.

name: MHB 587:2
title: Robert Wilfred Collin, 1886-1951.
verse:
. Idua mbɔnsa m' nhyiren do kyerɛ hɛn
Wo sor dɔ na nokwar;
Yɛnye nsu a ɔwor, nkokwaa na
Asorɛkye weɔɔ weɔɔ nyina bɔ m'
Kamfo dɛ yɛyɛ W'dze.

name: MHB 587:3
title: Robert Wilfred Collin, 1886-1951.
verse:
. Nnyɛ dɛ yɛyɛ W'dze nko 'siandɛ
Hɛn nkwa na ahom fir Wo;
Yɛyɛ W'dze 'siandɛ adom a ɔyɛ
Hɛn esunsum adehye n' wɔ Christ mu,
Hyɛ hɛn dzen ma nokwar n'.

name: MHB 587:4
title: Robert Wilfred Collin, 1886-1951.
verse:
. Kan hɛn for a esiarfo no a
Wɔbɔ W' dzin ho dawur n',
Fa sor nsanku kurakura hɛn nsamu,
Na fa ɔdɔ ndwom hyɛ akoma ma,
Nyame dɔ kɛse no a.

name: MHB 587:5
title: Robert Wilfred Collin, 1886-1951.
verse:
. Kodu dɛ yɛnye hɔn a wɔberɛe
Tsim W'ahendzi wɔ ha,
Hɔn a wɔyɛ wiadze ntɔmpamu,
Na dɔm a apon hɔn nyina,
Bɔbɔ m' epue W' fie hɔ.

name: MHB 588:1
title: Geoffrey Anketell Studdert-Kennedy, 1883-1929.
verse:
. Nyan, soɛr, yɛ dɔ na edwuma, 
Nnoma asoɛr rusu,
Bɔsu atɔ egu nhaban do,
Wiadze nyina asoɛr
Rihyira, Nkwa Wura Ne Mafo
Ɔhobrɛadzefo No.

name: MHB 588:2
title: Geoffrey Anketell Studdert-Kennedy, 1883-1929.
verse:
. Bra, ma wo ndze mfora hɔn dzem', 
Ka mu bi yi N' ayɛw;
Hwɛ mbrɛ ewia a ofir tsetse,
Asoɛr rehyerɛn dzendzen!
Dɛm na ma Jesus dɔ m'bɔsɔ
Gya wɔ w' akoma mu.

name: MHB 588:3
title: Geoffrey Anketell Studdert-Kennedy, 1883-1929.
verse:
. Fa ma, fa ma, fa ma ara, 
Dza Nyame dze ama wo n';
Hwer woho mma mmbu ho nkontaa,
Enyimnyamm' ara som
Onyame a ɔmaa wiadze yi
Na dza ɔbɛba nyina.

name: MHB 589:1
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 589:2
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Yɛ ara, ɔnnkɛyɛ gyam bi, 
Dza 'yew n' ha n', fa n' mfaso wɔ sor:
Nɛndze nnkamfo w', mmpɛ w', wommbu w' bi;
Owura pen wo; nyimpa nye bɛn?

name: MHB 589:3
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Yɛ ara, ber a kan wɔ do yi, 
Wiadze edwumayɛ ber resa:
Mma nnyɛ akwadwerɛ, yɛ w'edwuma ntsɛm;
Wonnsi n' dɛm twe sunsum ekyir.

name: MHB 589:4
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
.  Sum ruku nɛndze a wɔnye W' tse, 
Dɛ wonnyi enyidar wɔ wum';
Ma gya no do, na ka n' kɛse,
Gya a ɔma mbrɛ sum wɔ yɛ kan n'.

name: MHB 589:5
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Yɛ ara, mma mberɛ, weɔn na sɔr, 
Wɔdze nyansa twe kra ekyir;
Sir wiadze bra ne tsempɔn yim'
Pon akobɔfo ma wɔmbra.

name: MHB 589:6
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 59:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. IYE na eyɛ dza oye,
Ihu obiara mbɔbɔr,
Nkanka hɔn a wɔtwer Wo, Hwehwɛ Wo mbɔbɔrhu;
Anapa wɔyɛ fofor
Dɛ egyanom ber a hɔn mba su, 
Wo mbɔbɔrhu mu 'dze kyɛ, Hɛn ehiadze nyina 'dze ma.

name: MHB 59:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Mbɔbɔrhu hwɛ Wo ndwuma do; 
Dza 'dze ma hɔn da edzi,
'Da ho kora do na 'dze ma, 'Dza Wo nsa ayɛ nyina;
Edze ahwɛyie kora hɔn do,
Nyia ɔdze noho to Wo dɔ do n', 
 Eweɔn ne tsinhwi nyina,
Ehwɛ n'anamɔn nyina.

name: MHB 59:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Woana botum esusu
Wo nkwagye adom no? 
Adom a ɔmaa Wo Ba kor n' Bae dɛ ɔbɛgye abɔn.
M-bratofo m-pempem,
Jesus ntsi edze akyɛ hɔn,
Hɔn nsa aka W'adom ampa,
Agye hɔn efi hɛll.

name: MHB 59:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Epɛ dɛ egye mpempem bio, 
Na edze aakyɛ hɔn;
Ebɛgye ɔkra biara,
'Bɛgye nyimpa biara:
Egya, afei gye medze a
Menam Christ do dze ma Wo no; 
Afei ka n' ɔdɔ m' kyerɛ me 
Dɛ edze akyɛ me.

name: MHB 590:12
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ewuradze, Wo dzinm' na misim', 
Mikedzi me daa daa dwuma,
Wo nko na mesua dɛ m'bɔhwɛ W'
Wɔ dza modwen, meka, meyɛm'.
 
. Edwuma a Wo nyansaa akyerɛ n' 
Ao, ma mempra mo mu nyina nyɛ,
Munhu Wo mo ndwuma nyinam',
Na menyɛ Wo pɛ a ɔsɛ n'.

name: MHB 590:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma memfa Wo ngyina me nyimfa, 
'Wo a W'enyi tua mo mu nyina,
Na mindzi dwuma a ebɛkyerɛ m',
Muntu mo ndwuma nyina nhyɛ Wo nsa.

name: MHB 590:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma monsoa Wo kɔndua harhar n' 
Na ber biara mohweɔn, monsɔr,
Na monhwɛ bɛkyebo ndzɛmba,
Nyɛ ntsɛm ndu W'enyimnyam da n' mu.

name: MHB 590:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Biribiara a W'adom dze akyɛ m' 
Ma memfa nsom Wo enyigyem',
Na memfa dɛw nsi m'empire,
Memfam Wo ho nnantsew nkɔ sor.

name: MHB 591:1
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.
verse:
. MMA nngye hɔn a wɔse sor
Kwan no yɛ trontrom n' nndzi;
Annyɛ a efintsiw kwan no mu,
Na atɔ akɔtɔmborɔnsa.

name: MHB 591:2
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.
verse:
. Noara nye kwan kor a
Wɔdze kɔ ahomka bea n';
Nyia ɔpɛ siar bea n' akɔ no
Mfa n'ahom nyina mper.

name: MHB 591:3
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.
verse:
. Mia w'akodze hyia ko n',
Tow adzesoa gyangyan gu,
Weɔn adzesaa sum kadoo mu;
Na berɛ ewia ketee.

name: MHB 591:4
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.
verse:
. Yɛ edwuma na yɛ dɔ,
Fa kyɛ, sɔw adze nyina 
Ma w'akoma do ma sor Nyame,
Wo tsibowa so nyɛ krɔnn.

name: MHB 591:5
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.
verse:
. Ma 'yi nyɛ w' botae daa,
W'enyidar, wo dɛw kor;
Wɔwasa toa w', mmbu w' bi, hyɛ w' fɛr
Mpo a, ebɛnadze mbɔ a?

name: MHB 592:1
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.

name: MHB 592:2
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.
verse:
. Dɛm ɔfona ber yi nnkɛyew,
Awerɛhow nda 'i mmfi hɔ;
Anago sum, ehumtu ber m',
Wo nkyɛn na mebɛba.
Abotar mu mobɔsɔw 'bra
Mu ekuturku nyina;
M'benya akokodur wɔ yaw mu,
Na krɔnnyɛ wɔ mbusu m'.

name: MHB 592:3
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.
verse:
. Sɛ edze me san ba nkwa m' bio a,
Mebɛbrɛ moho adze;
Ɔko mu mibenya nyansa
Na ahoɔdzen atwer Wo,
Sɛ owu gyina abowano a,
M'bedzi mo bɔhyɛ do;
Dza ɔbɛba mo do biara,
Ma monsom Wo sesei.

name: MHB 593:1
title: John Huntley Skrine, 1848-1923.
verse:
. NDƆBAA n' yɛ bafuu o, mpɛpɛw o,
Adze sa, na edwuma bɔ adze;
Yedu botae n' ho o, yenndu o,
Obi nntum nsɛɛ, na obi nnyɛ n' yie.
Mbɔbɔrhufo tseneneenyi,
Yɛdze dza 'dze maa hɛn n' brɛ W';
Da mu aba kakraba n',
Yɛdze gu W'ananandze.

name: MHB 593:2
title: John Huntley Skrine, 1848-1923.
verse:
. Nyew, 'Wo Ewuradze Tsɛmbuafo,
Nyew, 'Wo krɔnkrɔnyi hoɔdzenfo,
Edze esie Wo bo mu no,
Fa Wo nsa krɔnkrɔn no sakyer
Ndzeyɛɛ na adwembɔn; ɔnyɛ
Dza omuo nyina ma ɔndan sika;
Yɛdze hɛn dɔ a ɔyɛ mberɛw 'i
Ma W', ma ɔaatsena ase Wo mu.

name: MHB 593:3
title: John Huntley Skrine, 1848-1923.
verse:
. Afei, yɛatse frɛ dɛɛdɛw 'i
Hɛn akoma bɛyɛ adom edwuma n';
Fie mframa pa na nda pa n'
Bɛkyekyer hɛn abɔ mu bio;
Mbukyia a yefii ho bae no,
Ɔdɔ gya bɛfram mu bio
Ekenyan hɛn mbofra dɔ n',
Ma yeenya kan fofor bi.

name: MHB 593:4
title: John Huntley Skrine, 1848-1923.
verse:
. Enuanom, hom a abrabɔ
Nkodzen twe hom dzi dwuma no,
Ɔma yenya no mu nhyira;
Yɛyɛ anyɛnkofo daa daa;
Ha na ekyirkyir mbew kor no,
Hɛn nkwagye woraba kor na
Ofi ahengua n' ho hyerɛn
Beebi a Ewuradze ka hɛn bɔ m'.

name: MHB 594:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. EWURADZE, W'adom tum n'
Na medze akoma pa
Mutu moho, me nda nkaa nyina,
Dze hyɛ Wo nsa koraa.

name: MHB 594:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. W'akowaa a apon me yi,
Medze Woara W'dze ma W',
'Fitsi ndɛ metse ase o, muwu o,
M'bɔsom me Nyame nko.

name: MHB 595:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. ƆDƆ kɛse Nyame,
W'adom mbordo no ntsi,
Mema akoma do ma sor ndzɛmba
Na mohwehwɛ W'enyim.

name: MHB 595:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Jesus Christ tseneneenyi,
Tsie m'ebisadze yi,
Na ma montwer W'ayamuyie no,
Ntsena ase nhyɛ W' enyimnyam

name: MHB 595:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Monhwehwɛ W'enyimnyam
Wɔ dza meka, meyɛ m';
Mundua dabaa siar dzin no do
Mombɔ m'afɔr nyina.

name: MHB 595:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma memfa m'enyi ntsim
Jesu, Wo nko Wo do;
Wonhyira Wo dzin wɔ sor na ase,
Wɔnyɛ W' apɛdze so.

name: MHB 595:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Gyedzi Sunsum, kenyan
M'akoma a medze ahyɛ W' nsa;
Sor gya, fa krɔnkrɔnyɛ na dza
Ewɔ nyina hyɛ me ma.  Amen.

name: MHB 596:1
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.
verse:
. NYAME, yɛ m' daduanyi,
Afei m'benya ahotɔ;
Hyɛ m' ma mingyaa me nkrantsee mu,
Ama meedzi konyim,
Sɛ mo nko migyina 
Ɔbra n'ehum men me,
Sɛ meda W'abaw mu dze a,
Mo ho bɛyɛ me dzen.

name: MHB 596:2
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.

name: MHB 596:3
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.
verse:
. Me pɛ nnyɛ medze bi,
Gyedɛ eyɛ n' Wodze;
Sɛ obohu W'adom ahengua enyim a,
Ɔsɛ dɛ ogyaa nedze m';
Ogyina hɔ pintsinn,
Wɔ ɔko dzendzen mu,
Ber a ɔatwer Wo koko mu sɔnn,
Na oenya Wo mu nkwa.

name: MHB 596:3
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.

name: MHB 597:1
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632
verse:
. ME Nyame Hen, kyerɛ m'
Munhu W' wɔ biribiara m',
Na biribiara a mebɛyɛ no,
Ɔwo na meyɛ ma W'.

name: MHB 597:2
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632
verse:
. Nyimpa a ɔhwɛ ahwehwɛ m' n',
No do na n'enyi tsim;
Anaa sɛ ɔpɛ mpo a, ohwira m',
Ma ntsi ohu heaven.

name: MHB 597:3
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632
verse:
. Obiara tum dze W' yɛ a,
Biribiara nnkɛyɛ gyan,
Dza ɔnye W' bɔ awɛ n', Wo ntsi
Ɔbɛhyerɛn na n' ho atsew.

name: MHB 597:4
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632
verse:
. Akowaa a ɔtse dɛm no
Bɛyɛ edwumadzen;
Nyia ɔpra dan m' wɔ Wo mbra ntsi n',
No dwumadzi n' dzi mu.

name: MHB 597:5
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632
verse:
. Iyi nye ɔbo a agye dzin a
Ɔdan adze nyina mfutuw n';
Dza Nyame suo m' yɛ Nedze no,
No ho wɔ mfaso pa.

name: MHB 598:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. 'GUAMBAA krɔnkrɔn, W'esuafo
Dzi Wo ho dase pa ara,
Daa hɔn enyi da Wo do,
Wobisa dɛ: Yɛnyɛ dɛn?
Wo pɛ kor a ɔhwɛ hɛn do ntsi
Yebedzi Wo nsɛm nyina do,
Na yɛbɛfa W'akwan do,
Yɛbɛnantsew dɛ mbrɛ eyɛe.

name: MHB 598:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ber a ipuei wɔ asaase do n',
Eyɛɛ Somfo maa Wo nkowaa;
Edween Wo sor ahenman ho,
Wo bra yɛɛ mpaabɔ nye dɔ,
Dɛm na hɛn dwumadzi nyina tse,
Gyedzi na adzeyɛ ndwuma;
Ekyerɛɛ nyimpa ɔdɔ ndwuma
Na Nyame m' nkitahodzi.

name: MHB 598:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hom mma yenkyia hɛn Agyenkwa
'Napatutu wɔ asɔrfi m';
Yɛnkɔ bepɔw n' do anafua,
Nkɛka hɛn Wura ho wɔ hɔ.
Yɛmper nnya gyedzi mfa nyɛ
Nyame N'edwuma wɔ hɔ,
Nye tum a yɛdze nya No su,
Na Wo tum a yɛdze tsena ase.

name: MHB 598:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛdze adom ho ndzɛmba
Twa hɛn enyigye mber mu,
Wɔ nkokwaa na dɔm tutuw m;
Yɛyɛ papa, yɛgye bi;
Yɛdze dɛw bɔ mpaa, yɛ edwuma
Kɛpem dɛ hɛn bra bɔ adze,
Kɛpem dɛ dua krɔnkrɔn n' ho
Yebowu dɛ mbrɛ Ɔwo wui n'.

name: MHB 599:1
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. DUA W'aba n' anapa,
Yɛ ntsɛm ewimbir no;
Mma mma suro na ekyingye kwan,
Bɔ n' dawur wɔ mbea nyina.

name: MHB 599:2
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Dua n' wɔ esu nkyɛnkyɛn,
Kwantsempɔn ho nsaase m';
Gu no wɔ nsoɛ na ndzɛmbir mu,
Petse no botan do.

name: MHB 599:3
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 599:4
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 599:5
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Ennkɛberɛ egu kwa da;
Awɔw, 'hyew, nsu na ewia
Bɔbɔ m' ma aba n' eedzi mu
Ama sor edwumayɛfo n'.

name: MHB 599:6
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Ber a Nyame N'enyimnyam
Da no bodu hɔ no,
Abɔfo edwumafo n' besian,
Sor bɛtsea m': Buber fie.

name: MHB 6:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. DOMANKOMA ! Wo sor tsebea
Yɛ fɛw dɛ mbrɛ osɛ Nyame:
Ɔtra wimuwimu n'ekyir noho.
Mbrɛ nworaba wɔkɔ aprɔw.

name: MHB 6:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Bɔfopanyin rotow W'Ndwom a.
N'enyim suma n'atsaban mu;
Ahotsewfo a woetwa ehyia.
Bom famu wɔ hɔ nyina som Wo.

name: MHB 6:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Nyame, dɛtse na nso nyɛ dɛn?
Hɛn so yɛbɔsom hen Bɔfo:
Yefi bɔn na huntuma m'frɛ Wo
Kɛse, Kronkronyi, Abɔso.

name: MHB 6:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Wɔatse Wo nka wɔ ekyirkyir,
Mbɔtoaba esua Wo dzin bɔ;
Na Wo nyansaa N'enyimnyam no
Ma hen adwen nyina tɔ sin.

name: MHB 6:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Nyame wo sɔr, nyimpa wɔ ase,
Hɛn ndwom nyɛ tsia, na hɛn nsɛm nsuar,
Wo ho enyidzi sianka hɛn ndwom,
Hɛn ayɛyi ka hɛn anomu.

name: MHB 60:1
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. ANSAANA Nyam' bɔɔ mbepɔw,
Nkoko na no do ndua;
Ɔhyɛɛ nsubura amaama,
Ɔpem kɔ nsutsen mu;
Ofi tsetse wɔ mo mu n',
Ɔnwanwanyi MARA
Nyaa enyigye a odzi mu,
Na Nyansa nye me dzin.

name: MHB 60:2
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Ber a ɔtserɛɛw ɔsor mu no,
Tse dɛ ntamadan no,
Na ɔbɔ po yantamm ho ban,
Siiw po esuyirii ano.
Na osusuu ndzɛmba no,
Nna menye No wɔ hɔ;
Emi nye Egya n' enyigye,
Nyimpa mba yɛ medze.

name: MHB 60:3
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Dɛm na Nyansa nsɛm hwehwɛ 
W'enyimnyam na W'adom; 
Hɛn a yɛmmfata yi mpo, 
W'adom enyi no hun hɛn
'Nsaana wohum nworaba;
Nyansa mu na ayɛ hɛn
Na dɔ m' na 'wui maa hɛn.

name: MHB 60:4
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Ana W'enyi gyè abɔdze a
Wɔtse dɛ hɛn so ho?
Hɛn a yehum Wo yemmbu W' bi n',
Yɛsɛɛn Wo wɔ dua do?
Nwanwa a wonnhu ano,
Ɔsor esumasɛm;
Aprandaa ndze bɔbɔ mu,
Dɛ ɔbɔn, meyɛ wodze.

name: MHB 600:1
title: Washington Gladden, 1836-1918.
verse:
. Ao, mo Wura, ma menye W' nnantsew 
Som dwumadzi mbrɛadze kwan mu;
Kyerɛ m' W'esumasɛm, boa m' ma monsɔw,
Dwumadzi ne yaw, dadwen no dur;
Boa me ma memfa dɔ kasa
Mpuhim akoma nyaanyaa bi:
Kyerɛ me ma mingya akobɔfo,
Memfa hɔn nsi sor kwan no mu.

name: MHB 600:2
title: Washington Gladden, 1836-1918.
verse:
. Kyerɛ m' W'abotar; ma menda ho 
Ntsena Wo fɛkuwbɔ dɛɛdɛwm',
Dwumadzi a ɔhyɛ gyedzi dzen,
Awerɛhyɛm' a odzi bɔn do,
Enyidar a ɔtow nserɛmɛn
Dze hyerɛn nda a ɔreba kwan mu,
Asomdwee a Wo nko ara dze ma,
Mo Wura, ma menye Wo nnantsew mu. 
                                               Amen.

name: MHB 601:1
title: Henry van Dyke, 1852-1933.

name: MHB 601:2
title: Henry van Dyke, 1852-1933.
verse:
. Bea a dɔm yɛ edwuma bɔ mu n'
Na mowɔ mo nkorɔfo mu;
Bea a odwumayɛfo aberɛ ada n',
Na menye no nko wɔ hɔ.
Emi Asomdwee a ɔtra nyimdzee n',
Meka hom ho wɔ nkodzen m',
Emi nye ɔsor Paanoo a
Wɔdze M' ma nkwa sakramɛnt.

name: MHB 601:3
title: Henry van Dyke, 1852-1933.

name: MHB 602:1
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910
verse:
. M'egya, minyim me bra nyina 
Akyekyɛm' ama me,
Na nsakyer a otwar dɛ ɔba n'
Munnsuro dɛ m'bohu;
Dza meserɛ nye adwendahɔ a
Ɔper sɔ W'enyi daa.

name: MHB 602:2
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910
verse:
. Meserɛ Wo adwendwen ɔdɔ a 
Ɔyɛ aweɔn ho nyansa,
Dze ma ahomkafo enyigye,
Pata nyinsuwakyifo;
Ɔnye 'koma a ɔpow noho
Na ɔtse ma binom so.

name: MHB 602:3
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910
verse:
. Monnhwehwɛ ɔpɛ ɔnnda hɔ komm, 
Odzi akɔnaaba,
Ɔhwehwɛ akɛsedze ɔayɛ
Na oehu esumasɛm;
Mepɛ dɛ meyɛ abɔtoaba a
Woara gye me taataa.

name: MHB 602:4
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910
verse:
. Wiadze mu mbrɛ m'bɛfa biara, 
No mu dzibew biara,
Menye nkorɔfo edzi nkitaho a
Meper ara ma oeenyin,
Na medze ahobrɛadze nye dɔ
Mayɛ Mo Wura edwuma.

name: MHB 602:5
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910

name: MHB 602:6
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910

name: MHB 603:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. JESUS, ma W'adɔfo nyina nhyerɛn 
Wɔnhyerɛn fɛɛfɛw dɛ ewia,
Wɔmfa Nyame ewia nserɛmɛn
Ntu hɔn enyimnyam kwan n'.

name: MHB 603:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Beebiara mbrɛ nyimpa wɔ no
Wɔmma hɔ nyina nhyerɛn;
Na ɔsor ahoɔdzen nyina
Nkata ase ha nyina.

name: MHB 603:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Dɛm tsenenee ewia hyɛnhyɛn no,
Ntserɛw hɔn 'yarsa ntsaban m'
Na hɔn enyim hyerɛn ntahye
Nkodu emudzi da n'.

name: MHB 604:1
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. O EWURADZE, me Nyankopɔn,
Fa ayɛyi hyɛ m' bra ma,
Ama me nyimpa-mu aakyerɛ
Wo subea nye W'akwan.

name: MHB 604:2
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Nnyɛ m'anofamfa ara nko bi,
Na nnyɛ m'akoma nko,
Na mbom, mibisa abrabɔ bi a
Ayɛyi ahyɛ mu ma.

name: MHB 604:3
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Ntonton wɔ adze biara mu,
No kɔsu, ne basu,
Dwumadzi na ndzeyɛɛ suar dɛn mpo a,
'Twar dɛ yeyi W'ayɛw.

name: MHB 604:4
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Fa ayɛyi hyɛ mo mu nyina,
Me nyimpadua nkasa
Mfa Wo dɔ na Wo ho, mo Wura,
Kaansa mennsɛ bi mpo a.

name: MHB 604:5
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Mo Wura, ama mo so dɛm yi
Maahyɛ Wo enyimnyam;
Na dɛm na m'bɛhyɛ ase wɔ ha
Matow W'ayɛyi ndwom n'.

name: MHB 604:6
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Dɛm ntsi adzekyee na adzesaa nyina
'Twar dɛ meyɛ krɔnkrɔn,
Ama manamɔntu biara m'
Menye W' abɔ fɛkuw.

name: MHB 605:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 605:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma monnom W’ mma nsukͻm nndze m’ bio,
Enyigyé a ͻkye ho nsu no a;
O nkwa nsu, pem bra wͻ sor ntum m’,
Wͻ esutsen a ͻyɛ daa asomdwee m,’
Wͻ dɛw a obiara nnkotum agye m’,
Wͻ ͻbra a obetsim afebͻͻ m’.

name: MHB 605:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Egya hue adorn gu mo do
No ma mindzi bem wͻ W‘enyim,
Bea a 'humbͻbͻr ’sutsen fi pem,
Ehumbͻbͻr, W'apɛdze pa n’,
Jesus dzin mu ntsi fa ma me
Na dua Wo su wͻ m‘akoma m’.

name: MHB 605:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Mo nkwa nda nyina m' munhu W’adwen.
Bér a metsé abͻbͻfo hͻn su,
Ekunafo, ngyanka, hͻn nkrumsi.
Mutu ehumbͻbͻfo ntsaban do
Kɛgye ehiafo na abͻbͻfo.
Dze mo nkwa, m’adze nyina ma hͻn.

name: MHB 605:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Dɛm na m‘bɛkyérɛ sunsum a ͻwͻ m’ mu.
Ͻtsew mo ho fi bͻn ho koraa.
Wonnhu no wͻ bͻn wiadze yi m’.
Otsim me gyedzi ne nyansaa;
Ͻma m' som no nokwar da edzi
Wͻ ahosan pa na ͻdͻ mu.

name: MHB 606:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hom a hom enyi tsim 
Zion kwan do, hom mbra,
Wɔmma yɛnyɛ kor nyi
Hɛn Wura No ayɛw;
Wɔmma yentu ntsen Jesus mu
Nkɛpem dɛ yebopue N'enyim.

name: MHB 606:23
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Mber nyina yɛda ho 
Tow kɔ hɛn man no ho,
Kɔ sor kokwaa no ho
Kwantunyi fonafo fie;
Sor Jerusalem fofor no
Ɔdomankoma dɔ fie no.
 
. Ma daa nyina yennya 
Gyedzi ho asomdwee,
Dɛ woeyi hɛn efi
Bɔn, wiadze, wu, na hɛllm';
Hɛn yɛbɔkɔ hɛn Egya fie,
Hɔ yeekehyia hɛn Nua panyin n'.

name: MHB 606:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 607:1
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Bethel Nyame, 'Wo a Wo nkorɔfo 
Dan Wo na wonya dzi;
Ɔwò a igyaa tsetse mpanyin
Hɔn akwantu nyinam'.

name: MHB 607:234
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Yɛdze nsewdzi na mpaabɔ ba 
W'adom ahengua enyim;
Hɛn egyaam Nyame, yɛserɛ Wo, yɛ
Hɔn mba so hɛn Nyame.
 
. Ɔbra n'akwan nyinara mu 
Gye hɛn anamɔn taataa;
Ma hɛn hɛn daadaa edziban
Na hɛn efuradze so.
 
. O trɛ W'atsaban wɔ hɛn do 
Kɔ hɛn akwantu ewiei,
Na hɛn akra eetum edu
Hɛn Egya fie asomdweem'.

name: MHB 607:5
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Dɛm n-hyira na yɛserɛ 
Fi W'adom n-samu;
Yɛdze Wo yɛ hɛn Nyankopɔn
Na kyɛpɛn afebɔɔ.  Amen.

name: MHB 608:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 608:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 609:1
title: Dorothy Ann Trupp : Hymns for the Young, 1836.

name: MHB 609:2
title: Dorothy Ann Trupp : Hymns for the Young, 1836.
verse:
. Yɛyɛ Wodze, fa hɛn nyɛnko,
Yɛ hɛn kwan mu Kwankyerɛfo;
Kora Wo nguankuw, gye hɛn fi bɔn m',
Sɛ yɛfom kwan a, hwehwɛ hɛn:
Jesus Siarfo,
Yɛkamfo W', sɔr Wo a, tsie hɛn.

name: MHB 609:3
title: Dorothy Ann Trupp : Hymns for the Young, 1836.
verse:
. Abɔ anohoba a 'bɛgye hɛn,
Yɛyɛ abɔn na abɔbɔfo a
'Wɔ ehumbɔbɔr a edze gye hɛn
Na adom a ɔtsew hɛn ho;
Jesus Siarfo,
Ma yɛnyɛ ntsɛm mbra Wo hɔ.

name: MHB 609:4
title: Dorothy Ann Trupp : Hymns for the Young, 1836.

name: MHB 61:1
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74
verse:
. ASAASE, fa wo ndze mpempem, 
Tow ndwom yi Bɛkyebo ayɛw; 
Yi N'ayɛw, Nyia aso tsie No,
Tɛkyerɛma dze dɛw tow N' ndwom; 
Asaase dze n'enyigye ndwom
Fi ekyirkyir, mbrɛ nyimpa tse,
Bɔkotow aka W'akɛseyɛ,
Atow W'ayɛyi, ehyira W' dzin.

name: MHB 61:2
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74
verse:
. Hom mbetsie anwanwasɛm no,
Mbrɛ tsetse Nyame tumfo a
Ɔdaa N'enyimnyam edzi no,
Ɔmaa asorɛkye saan ekyir,
Ɔmaa po nsu daan afasu,
Ɔmaa yɛfaa po bun mu;
Israel mbabaa dzii ehurusi,
Tontoon tum a ɔdze gye nkwa.

name: MHB 61:3
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74
verse:
. Nyia ɔtse ase, hyira Ewuradze; 
Hom nyi N'ayɛw wɔ mbea nyina, 
Ɔdze hɛn akra san ba nkwa mu,
Ne basa suo hɛn mu gyina. 
Yɛdze enyigye dze hɛn afɔr
Bogu W'afɔrmbukyia do,
Anohoba a yɛbɔɔ n' yaw mu n',
Yɛdze dɛw tua n' anapa.

name: MHB 61:4
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74
verse:
. Ɔkra biara a osuro Nyia ɔtse
Ahengua do no Ne mbra n',
Ɔmfa enyigye mbetsie dza
Nyame ayɛ ama hɛn ntotɔserɛ;
Ber a yɛdze hɛn ndze do wɔ mpaabɔ m', 
Yehun N'enyigye nkwagye no,
Yɛkamfo No mbɔbɔrhu.

name: MHB 610:12
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Agyedzifo hɔn Kwankyerɛfo a  
lgya sor akwantufo kwan,
Bra na enye hɛn so mbɛtsena,
Yɛpɛ yɛatwer Wo nkotonoo,
Dze hɛn sunsum adan Wo nko
Ber a yɛnam ɔbra kwan mu.
 
. Ahɔho nye amamforafo, 
Wiadze ha ɔnnyɛ hɛn tsenabew;
Na yetwa mbusu bɔnsa yim',
Yɛper dɛ yebohu W'enyim,
Yɛpɛ ntsɛm yeedu hɛn kurom',
Hɛn domakoma fie wɔ sor.

name: MHB 610:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yennyi mantsimadze wɔ ha,
Yɛhwɛ kurow a wonnhu no kwan;
Yɛhom do nantsew kɔ noho,
Yereper yeedu kan mbew no do,k
Jerusalem kurow krɔnkrɔn a ɔ
Tsease Nyame ɔkyekyeree n'.

name: MHB 610:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛdze abotar tu empire n', 
Yegya fona wiadze 'i ekyir:
Fi ahoɔdzenm' kɔ ahoɔdzenm',
Hwehwɛ Jerusalem fofor n';
Hɛn mbɔdzembɔ nyina nye dɛ,
Yenya Jerusalem fofor n'.

name: MHB 610:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. 'Wo a asoa hɛn bɔn nyina kɔ, 
Na adom hɛn bɔnfakyɛ kwa,
Yɛnam Wo do kɔ hɛn sor fie,
Yɛdze adwontow yɛsan Zion;
Hɛn 'nyimnyam Hen N'ahenkurow no,
Yɛrotow ndwom nna ɔrebɛn hɛn.

name: MHB 610:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyame dɔ ne mfar ma hɛn do
Nu hɛn ahoɔdzen mu kɔ kan
Yɛrokɔ Nyame bepɔw n' do
Yɛakɔdɔm mbakan Asɔr no,
Yɛdze dɛw bɛyɛ abɔtsir
Yeekehyia hɛn Sahen wɔ sor.

name: MHB 611:1
title: James Edmeston
verse:
. Gya hɛn, ɔsor Egya, gya hɛn 
Wɔ wiadze po pramee do,
Gya hɛn, weɔn hɛn, kora hɛn, nyɛn hɛn,
Yennyi boafo dɛ Wo nko,
Naaso yɛwɔ nhyira nyinak
Sɛ Nyame ne hɛn Egya a.

name: MHB 611:2
title: James Edmeston

name: MHB 611:3
title: James Edmeston
verse:
. Hɛn Nyame Sunsum a 'risian, 
Fa sor dɛw hyɛ 'koma ma,
Na yɛmfa ɔdɔ mbɔ dɔ mu,
Wɔ enyigye a ɔnnsɛɛ dam',
Edom, dze kyɛ, weɔn hɛn yi dze,
Hwere rennsɛɛ hɛn asomdwee.

name: MHB 612:12
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.
verse:
. Gya m', Kan dɔyɛfo wɔ sum a etwa ehyia yim' 
Gya m' ara kɔ!
'Nago n' yɛ sum, menye fie ntam' so war;
Gya m' ara kɔ!
Weɔn m'anamɔn, mimmbisa dɛ munhu
Mbrɛ kan hɔ tse, namɔn kor ara ma m'.
 
. Nkyɛ menntse dɛm, monnsɔɔr pɛn dɛ Woara 
Gya m' ara kɔ.
Nkyɛ mefa mo kwan, na muhum', afei
Woara gya m' ara kɔ!
Modɔɔ apɔmpɔmpɛ, na musuro mpo a,
Ntsɛn hyɛɛ me ma, mma nnkaa mfe a-etwam' kɔ.

name: MHB 612:3
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.
verse:
. Wo tum ehyira me dze, ɔbɛda ho 
Egya m' akɔ
Atra sar, abo na nsu, 'kɛpem dɛ
Sum yi bɛpa;
Na adze kye a, adɔfo a mayew hɔn n'
M'bohu hɔn bio dɛ wɔreserew kyerɛ m'.

name: MHB 613:1
title: William Henry Burleigh

name: MHB 613:2
title: William Henry Burleigh
verse:
. O Egya, gya hɛn wɔ nokwar akwan m';
Ammboa hɛn a, yɛtotɔ mfom abaw m',
Akɔndɔ na nsɛmfun sɛɛ hɛn mbabun,
Mpanyinyɛ a gyedzi na enyidar nnyi m' ba.

name: MHB 613:3
title: William Henry Burleigh

name: MHB 613:4
title: William Henry Burleigh
verse:
. O Egya, gya hɛn kɔ sor ahomgye m',
Mbrɛ kwan n' bun na ne tantan tse biara,
Dɛw anaa yaw mu, dɛ mbrɛ ehwɛ a oye;
Kɛpem dɛ hɛn bra bedzi mu Wo mu.   Amen.

name: MHB 614:1
title: Hester Periam Hawkins, 1885.
verse:
. SOR Egya, Ɔwo na edze hɛn
Aba ndɛ da yi mu sɔnn;
Ekyerɛ hɛn anamɔn kwan berɛww,
Ehwɛ hɛn do wɔ hɛn kwan m'.
Ɔbra m' Damfo na Kwankyerɛfo,
Yɛdze ndaase akoma brɛ W';
Sɛ nnyɛ Wo dɔ a ɔnnsakyer no a,
Nkyɛ yebesi dɛn akamfo W'?

name: MHB 614:2
title: Hester Periam Hawkins, 1885.
verse:
. Mbɔrbɔrhu bi a ɔnnkɛpa da
Hyerɛn yie wɔ dza etwa m' mu,
Nhwɛdo mapa na ayamuyie 'dɔ
Bɛn hɛn fi ahyɛse kɔ ewiei,
Ɔdɔ na ntwitwagye mapa 
Wɔ hɛn nkyɛn daa daa nyina;
Nhyira a ɔdɔɔ so a yenntum nnkan
Dze kan hyɛnn ba hɛn kwan mu.

name: MHB 614:3
title: Hester Periam Hawkins, 1885.
verse:
. Isum kebii aba hɛn kwan mu,
Hɛn ho apopo wɔ ehum n' mu;
Mununkum etwa hɛn ho ehyia sunkamm
Ma yennhu Wo su mbrɛ ɔtse:
Naaso Wo dɔ n' nngyaa hɛn hɔ dɛ 
Ankonam wɔ hɛn yaw m' da,
Na mboa a obiara dze maa n' nkyɛnko n'
Yɛ ahoɔdzen a ofir Egya W' nkyɛn

name: MHB 614:4
title: Hester Periam Hawkins, 1885.
verse:
. Nkorɔfo a yɛdɔɔ hɔn kɔ gya hɛn,
Edzi kan wɔ akwantu ewiei;
Wɔrotweɔn ama hɛn akɔaba,
'Nuanom, mba na ndamfo so.
Sɛ ewiei hɛn akwantu n' bɔ adze
Na yɛyew fi enyi do a,
Egya, fa hɛn dua sum kebii m'
Nye hɛn nkɔ onnyiewiei kan mu.  Amen.

name: MHB 615:12
title: William Williams, 1717-91.

name: MHB 615:3
title: William Williams, 1717-91.
verse:
. Na mudu Jordan nkɔnkɔnoa a, 
Bɔ mo suro ham ma ɔnhera;
Wu no kumfo, hɛll ne sɛɛfo,
Fa me kodu Canaan sɔnn.
Ayɛyindwom
Na medze m'bɛma Wo daa.

name: MHB 616:1
title: Bernhardt Severin Ingemann, 1789-1862.
verse:
. EKYINGYE na awerɛhow anafua m',
Kwantufo kuw no pem do,
Wɔtow enyidar ndwom ahorow
Dze kɔ bɔhyɛ asaase do.

name: MHB 616:2
title: Bernhardt Severin Ingemann, 1789-1862.
verse:
. Yehu kan a ɔkyerɛ hɛn kwan no
Wɔ hɛn enyim anafuasum m';
Onua suo no nua ne nsamu
'Kododur m' dua sum no mu.

name: MHB 616:3
title: Bernhardt Severin Ingemann, 1789-1862.
verse:
. Nyame N' kan wɔ hɛn ho yɛ kor,
Ɔhyerɛn wɔ No nkorɔfo do;
Ɔpam sum na suro kɔ ekyir,
Ɔhyerɛn wɔ hɛn kwan mu.

name: MHB 616:4
title: Bernhardt Severin Ingemann, 1789-1862.
verse:
. Hɛn akwantu botae yɛ kor,
Hɛn gyedzi a ɔmmbɔ adze yɛ kor,
Dza hɛn enyi da kwan yɛ kor,
'Nyidar kor a ofir Nyame.

name: MHB 616:5
title: Bernhardt Severin Ingemann, 1789-1862.
verse:
. M-pempem hɔn ntseamu n' yɛ kor
Dɛ mbrɛ ofi akoma kor mu;
Aperdzi kor na mbusu kor,
Nyame m' nserabɔ kor hyɛ ase.

name: MHB 616:6
title: Bernhardt Severin Ingemann, 1789-1862.
verse:
. Ekyirkyir onnyiewiei mpoano
No mu dɛw na osebɔ kor,
Hɔ na Egya tumfo kor no
Dzi hen wɔ dɔ m' afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 616:7
title: Bernhardt Severin Ingemann, 1789-1862.
verse:
. Hom nkɔ do, 'nuanom akwantufo,
Hom mfa mbeamudua no nduom!
Mma hom mmfɛr, hom nko ɔko no
Nkɛpem dɛ yɛbɔhom nwin m'.

name: MHB 616:8
title: Bernhardt Severin Ingemann, 1789-1862.
verse:
. Ɔnnkɛkyɛr, wɔsoɛr da n' bɛba
Na woebuebue ndakamaa;
Afei sunsum nyina bɔhwetse,
Ɔberɛ na sum bɔbɔ adze.

name: MHB 617:1
title: Thomas Joseph Potter, 1827-73.
verse:
. HƐN frankaa kan hyerɛn,
Na ɔkyerɛ sor,
'Nyam ma Christ nsordaafo
Dze kɔ hɔn sor fie.
Yɛdze enyigye bɔ mpaa
Bɔ nsera wɔ sar n' do.
Yɛdze akoma kor
Tow ndwom wɔ hɛn kwan m'.

name: MHB 617:2
title: Thomas Joseph Potter, 1827-73.
verse:
. HƐN frankaa kan hyerɛn,
Na ɔkyerɛ sor,
'Nyam ma Christ nsordaafo
Dze kɔ hɔn sor fie.

name: MHB 617:3
title: Thomas Joseph Potter, 1827-73.
verse:
. Jesus, Ewuradze,
W'ananadze ha
Wo mba a woridzi dɛw
Etwa ehyia ha.
Mpɛn pii na yeefi W' nkyɛn
Na yɛatɔ dɔnsuar;
Kora hɛn, Agyenkwa tumfo,
Wɔ kwan tseabaa n' mu.

name: MHB 617:4
title: Thomas Joseph Potter, 1827-73.

name: MHB 617:5
title: Thomas Joseph Potter, 1827-73.
verse:
. Yɛnye ahotsewfo na
Abɔfo mbɔ m' wɔ sor,
Mbɔ mpaa nyi Wo ayɛw
Wo dɔ ahengua n' ho;
Ber a nserabɔ n' abɔ adze,
'Homgye na asomdwee m',
Jesus wɔ N'ahoɔfɛw m';
Nyɛ ndwom a ɔmmbɔ adze

name: MHB 618:1
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. ENYIGYE akwantufo kuw,
Sɛ hom bɔkɔ hom enyim a,
Hom mfa Jesus ndzi hom kan,
Mma Jesus nyɛ hom Tsir.

name: MHB 618:2
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. Sɛ hom fona ma nkorɔfo dɛ
Jesus a, hom dzi dɛw;
Sɛ kɔm dze hom dɛ Jesu a,
Ɔno hom so dzi dɛw.

name: MHB 618:3
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. Mbeamudua a Jesus soae no,
Hom ara ntsi na ɔsoae;
Ahenkyɛw a Jesus soae no,
Hom ara ntsi na ɔsoae.

name: MHB 618:4
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. Gyedzi a hom dze hu No n',
Enyidar a hom dze per n',
Ɔdɔ a ɔhaw dan hwɛ No nko n'
Bɛsan akɔ No nko hɔ.

name: MHB 618:5
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. Nkodzen a ɔhaw hom adwen,
Awerɛhow a hom dzi no,
Nsɔhwɛ beberee a hom kɔ mu n',
'Wu nko na otum twa do.

name: MHB 618:6
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. Ebɛnadze na ɔsom bo dɛ
N'egudze a ɔwɔ sor hɔ n'?
Ebɛnadze na ɔkyɛn
Atwer a wɔfow kɔ sor?

name: MHB 618:7
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. Enyigye akwantufo kuw,
Hom mma hom enyi do sor,
Hɔ na hom haw kakra yi
Bɛma hom dza ɔsom bo.

name: MHB 619:1
title: Henry Alford, 1810-71

name: MHB 619:2
title: Henry Alford, 1810-71
verse:
. Enyimnyam mbordo koraa
Na Nyame esiesie,
Da kor ɔdze bɛma
Akra a wɔdɔɔ No n';
Enyi nnhun hɔn pɛn mpo,
Asowa nntsee da,
Wɔnnkaa hɔn ho asɛm,
Wɔnndween hɔn ho so,
Hom nduom, hom nkɔ hom enyim!
Hom nhyɛ akontar hyɛnn
Nkɛpem dɛ woyi enyim a
Yehu hɛn gyedzi.

name: MHB 619:3
title: Henry Alford, 1810-71
verse:
. Borɔ ekyirkyir noho
Kuropɔn abantsen pue
Mbrɛ hɛn Nyame tse no;
Fie fɛɛfɛw n' hɛndze a;
Nhwehwɛ mbobow ara nko,
Sika hyerɛn n'abrɔn m',
Ahomka esutsen pem
Dze dɛw a wɔnnka ba.
Hom nduom, hom nkɔ hom enyim!
Wɔ Sunsum No tum m';
Akwantufo, hom nkɔ
Hom kan man no mu.

name: MHB 62:1
title: Benjamin Webb, 1820-85
verse:
. ƆDƆ, mbrɛ osi dɔ, tserɛw ɔkrɔn!
Ɔdze dɛw hyɛ akoma ma,
Dɛ Nyame Ba, Nyame bɛfa
Hɛn nyimpadua wɔ nyimpa ntsi.

name: MHB 62:2
title: Benjamin Webb, 1820-85
verse:
. Ɔannsoma ɔbɔfo biara
Wɔ bea a ɔkrɔn anaa osuar,
Nankasa faa hɛn nyimpadua,
Ɔbaa wiadze a ayew yi mu.

name: MHB 62:3
title: Benjamin Webb, 1820-85
verse:
. Wɔbɔɔ no esu wɔ hɛn ntsi,
Odzii mbuada, ɔkɔm dzee No;
Hɛn ntsi ohyiaa nsɔhwɛ yaayaw,
Ɔkaa sɔhwɛfo n' gui maa hɛn.

name: MHB 62:4
title: Benjamin Webb, 1820-85
verse:
. Ɔbɔɔ mpaa maa hɛn, kyerɛkyerɛɛ hɛn, 
Ɔyɛɛ Ne daa edwuma maa hɛn:
No dwumadzi, Ne nsɛnkyerɛdze,
Ne nsɛm nyina mu, ɔhwehwɛɛ hɛn.

name: MHB 62:5
title: Benjamin Webb, 1820-85
verse:
. Woyii No hyɛɛ abɔnfo nsa,
Wɔkaa No mpire, dzii No ho fɛw,
Ɔsoaa 'nyimguase mbeamudua,
Hɛn ntsi oguu ohomtsen, wui.

name: MHB 62:6
title: Benjamin Webb, 1820-85

name: MHB 62:7
title: Benjamin Webb, 1820-85
verse:
. Nyia No dɔ nnyi mbanano agye
Nkwagye ama hɛn Ne Ba mu;
Enyimnyam nka Nyame Egya,
Sesei na nfesantsen nyina. 	  Amen.

name: MHB 620:1
title: John Bunyan, 1628-88.
verse:
. NYIA ɔpɛ akokodur n',
Ɔmbra enyim mbɔhwɛ;
Onyia no begyina daa,
Ehum na aahow mbra;
Abagura bi nnyi hɔ a
Ɔbɛma oeegyaa sua,
No suakan dɛ ɔbɛyɛ
Ɔkwantunyi no.

name: MHB 620:2
title: John Bunyan, 1628-88.
verse:
. Hɔn a wɔkeka nsɛmbɔn
Twa no ho aprɔw n',
Wogu hɔn enyim ase,
N'ahoɔdzen mu piw,;
Gyata bi nnkopuw no,
Ɔnye ɔkraban bɔko,
Na obenya ndzinoa dɛ
Ɔyɛ kwantunyi.

name: MHB 620:3
title: John Bunyan, 1628-88.
verse:
. Sunsum bɔn bi nnyi hɔ a
Obogura n'abaw;
Onyim dɛ ewiei no
Obenya daa nkwa.
Nsusuhum nyina boguan;
Onnkosuro dza wɔka
Ɔbɛyɛ edwuma ber nyina
Ayɛ kwantunyi.

name: MHB 621:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 621:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Jesus dɔ nà ɔweɔn Nedze,
Ɔnyεn m’ ’dzidzflaea pa do,
Ɔma me da famu dzinn,
Ogya m’ kɔ abodwee nsu ho:
Menye No kɔ beebiara a,
M’akoma mu dεw bu do.

name: MHB 621:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 621:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyame dɔ bεda ho efua m’,
Ɔda bohwε m’ do akɔ ewiei;
M’enyigye nda nyinara
Mibedzi no W’asɔrfi m’,
Kεpem dε m’botù aba W’ fie,
Wo sor fie a ɔwɔ hɔ daa!

name: MHB 622:1
title: Jane Euphemia Saxby, 1811-98.

name: MHB 622:2
title: Jane Euphemia Saxby, 1811-98.
verse:
. Ewuradze, munnhu adze,
Yɛ kan ma me;
Fua no tu m'akoma,
Munnhu adze:
Suo me nsamu na ma mindzi Wo nkyɛn,
Mma mo nko monnkɔ, yɛ me Kwangyafo.

name: MHB 622:3
title: Jane Euphemia Saxby, 1811-98.

name: MHB 623:1
title: Edwin Hatch, 1835-89.
verse:
. MENYE annda dɛ ebɛba abɛfa
M'akoma bɔbɔfo 'i ayɛ Wo fie,
Dɛ Ɔwo ahemfo Hen bɛba abɔsoɛ
Mo mu edzi bɛyɛ dɔnhwer kor mpo;
Naaso ewɔ ha daa dɛ ibehyira m',
Aboa m' na eyi mo bɛn adzesoa n'.

name: MHB 623:2
title: Edwin Hatch, 1835-89.
verse:
. M'enyi annda dɛ m'benya W' Kwankyerɛfo,
Ma aagye m' taataa, atsentsen m'anamɔn;
Sɛ mohwe ase a, suo mo mu, motɔ gon a,
Gya m' nkakrankakra kɔ kwan pa no mu.
Naaso ewɔ me nkyɛn aber biara,
Eyɛ me Pamfo na Werɛkyekyefo.

name: MHB 623:3
title: Edwin Hatch, 1835-89.

name: MHB 624:1
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60;
verse:
. JESUS, dzi hɛn kan,
Ma yennya ahomgye,
Na kwan no nnyɛ enyigye mpo a,
Yɛbɛka W' do berɛww a yennsuro;
Fa Wo nsa gya hɛn
Kɔ hɛn Egya fie.

name: MHB 624:2
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60;
verse:
.  Sɛ kwan yɛ hu dɛn,
Sɛ atamfo bɛn a,
Mma suro gyangyan bi mmen hɛn,
Mma ɔdɔ na enyidar mmbɔ hɛn;
Yɛnam atamfo m'
Kɔ hɛn efiefi.

name: MHB 624:3
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60;
verse:
. Ber a yɛper ahotɔ
Fi yaw dzendzen mu,
Ber a nsɔhwɛ fofor hyɛ hɛn do n',
Owura, ma hɛn abotar ndzi mu,
Kyerɛ hɛn bea hyɛnhyɛnn a
Yennsu wɔ hɔn bio n'.

name: MHB 624:4
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60;
verse:
. Ber a 'saase na wimu
Yew hɛn enyi do n',
Ber a yɛnam 'wu m' hwɛ heaven kwan
Na wɔdze hɛn bɔn nyina akyɛ hɛn, 
Fi Wo kan man n' mu
Frɛ hɛn Nyame fie.

name: MHB 624:5
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60;
verse:
. Jesus, dzi hɛn kan,
Ma yennya ahotɔ;
Sor Kandzifo, kɔ do gya hɛn,
Wowaw, weɔn hɛn, kyekye hɛn werɛ, 
Kɛpem dɛ hɛn nyina
Bodu hɛn Egya fie.  Amen.

name: MHB 625:1
title: Scottish Psalter, 1750.
verse:
. MEMA m'enyi do hwɛ mbepɔw n',
Hɔ na mo mboa fi ba;
Me bambɔ fi Ewuradze hɔ ba,
Ɔno a ɔbɔɔ sor na ase.

name: MHB 625:2
title: Scottish Psalter, 1750.
verse:
. Ɔremma w'anan mm-patser,
Na ɔronntɔ nkom so:
Hwɛ, Nyia ɔhwɛ Israel do no,
Ɔnntɔ nkom, na ɔnnda.

name: MHB 625:3
title: Scottish Psalter, 1750.
verse:
. Ewuradze nkora w' No nwin ase,
Ongyina w'abanyimfa;
Bosoom nnkɛsɛɛ wo anafua,
Ewia nnsɛɛ w' adzekyee.

name: MHB 625:4
title: Scottish Psalter, 1750.
verse:
. Ewuradze bɔkora wo kra do,
Ɔbɔhwɛ wo yar ber m';
Ɔdzekɔ 'i w'edzifir na mbae
Nyame bɔhwɛ afebɔɔ.  Amen.

name: MHB 626:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. MOROHWEHWƐ nyamesuro
Nhyehyɛɛ bi wɔ mo mu,
Ɔnye bɔn ho adwendahɔ a
Ɔma metse ne yaw.

name: MHB 626:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Mepɛ kwan a m'bɛfa do metu
N-tuw na akɔndɔbɔn,
Medze esiw 'kwankwambɔ pɛ kwan,
Medze bodum bɔn gya.

name: MHB 626:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Dɛ monnkɔtɔ dɔnsuar mmfi W' hɔ n',
Mennka W'ayamuyie fi n',
Ma m' etsidaa wansawansa
Na enyidahɔ akoma.

name: MHB 626:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyame, ma m'adwendahɔ nyɛ
Dza obiara enyi gye ho;
Na nyan me kra, ber a bɔn abɛn,
N'enyi do ntsetsew no.

name: MHB 626:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O nkyɛ me kra a wɔatsetse n' yie 'i
Eehu dza ofura adwen,
Ɔaatwe m' akɔ bɔgya no ho,
Bɔgya a ɔma ahosan.

name: MHB 627:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. MBRƐ adom ba a enyi si gye
Wɔ no bɔnfakyɛ ho a!
Osu dɛ: Me fie nnyi ase ha,
Meper me fier wɔ sor!
Ɔman a nyimpa enyi nnhu,
O menam gyedzi m' hu;
'Homgye man, 'hotsewfo enyigye,
Heaven a woesiesie ama m'.

name: MHB 627:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 627:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Jerusalem a ɔwɔ sor hɔ n',
Menam adwontow m' kɔ hɔ;
Metse ase yi, m'enyidar, dɔ,
M'akoma, kra, wɔ hɔ.
M'Agyenkwa a wɔakrɔn N' gyina hɔ,
Sɔfo mbɔbɔrhufo,
Ɔda ho tsen N'epir nsa n'
Twe me kɔ No bomu.

name: MHB 627:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O hɛn enyidar yɛ nhyira dɛ!
Ber a yɛwɔ asaase 'i do,
Ɔkyɛn dɛ yɛka sor tum hwɛ,
Na yɛtwe dɛm da n' bɛn;
Yɛtse dɛ wusoɛr na abɛn,
Hɛn bra hyɛ Christ No mu,
N'enyimnyam fɛɛfɛw a ɔwɔ ase ha n'
Hyɛ hɛn nyimpadua ma.

name: MHB 628:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 628:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 629:1
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. DZA Nyame nyansafo pɛ ayɛ,
Ɔbɛma, anaa ɔnnkɛma,
Na onyim m'ehiadze nyina yie
Sen dza me mpaabɔ ka.

name: MHB 629:2
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Dem nhyira a memmfata yi
Ahyɛ mo mfom kwan n' nsew;
Na beebiara a matɔ dɔnsuar n',
Ne ntsea san me ekyir.

name: MHB 629:3
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Dem ɔdɔ mu ndzepa piigyan n',
Ntseasee wɔ mu koraa;
Okenyan mber ɔnye adwen
Wɔ eyiedzi dɛɛdɛw m'.

name: MHB 629:4
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Owu yɛ dɛ kwan bi a oesiw,
Na obue kɔ kan mu,
Na ɔba onyifurafo biara
Nntɔ gon mmfi Egya enyim.

name: MHB 629:5
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Afei 'hwɛyie na nkodzen ba,
Nam witɔree m' nkaakaa
Dɛ mbrɛ wohu mbepɔw wɔ ekyir
Ber a wɔatra edu bea pa.

name: MHB 629:6
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Abrabɔ mu dede nyina
Bɔ mu yie wɔ ndwom mu,
Na abrabɔ aperdzi bea nyina
Yɛ berɛww taa dzin koraa.

name: MHB 629:7
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Afei sunsum hyɛ ase pa,
Ma anee mframa so bɔ;
Na mubue m'akoma nyina
Mu dze ma dɛm da no.

name: MHB 63:1
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60
verse:
. ONYAME dɔ a no bun nnyi ase, 
Jesus mu Nyame da edzi;
Hwɛ mbrɛ W'enyimnyam hyerɛn pa!
W'ayarsa nsu pem mbea nyina!

name: MHB 63:2
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60
verse:
. Epɛ nye woananom atsena?
Ndzebɔnyɛfo, bɔnnyiayɛfo: 
Onyankopɔn, tɛkyerɛma bɛn 
Botum akyerɛ Wo dɔ na adom?

name: MHB 63:3
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60
verse:
. Dɛw mu yɛdze akoma m' ndaase 
Gye dza Wo dɔ pɛ ka kyerɛ hɛn,
Fa W' enyigye nyina ma hɛn, 
Yɛdze hɛnho nyina ma Wo.

name: MHB 63:4
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60
verse:
. Yɛdze hɛn honam, 'kra, sunsum, 
Hyɛ Wo dɔ nye W'ayamuyie nsa:
O ma Wo krɔnkrɔnyɛ ntsena hɔ,
Na sɔw hɛn ano dɛ Wodze.

name: MHB 63:5
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60
verse:
. Enyimnyam Hen, W'adom kɛse n'
Bor hɛn adwen no do koraa;
Hɛn bɔn mpo dɔɔ so dɛn ara a,
W'ehumbɔbɔr bor ne nyina do.

name: MHB 63:6
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60
verse:
. Ewuradze, da Wo nkwagye edzi,
Ma hɛn akra Wo sor ahoɔdzen;
Na yennsuro dɛ yɛkɔ enyim,
Wɔ asaase na hɛll etumfo m'.

name: MHB 630:1
title: Lawrence Tuttiett, 1825-97.
verse:
. O MA hɛn kan, ama yeehu
Nyansa a Wo nko tum dze ma no;
Ama nokwar aakyerɛ hɛn kwan,
Na nhyira aaba beebi a yɛbɛtsena.

name: MHB 630:2
title: Lawrence Tuttiett, 1825-97.
verse:
. O ma hɛn kan, ama yeehu
Esintɔ a ɔwɔ nyimpa n' nyimdzee m',
Hɛn adwen a ohinhim n' yaadan ama W',
Yaadɔ W'asɛm pa no yie daa.

name: MHB 630:3
title: Lawrence Tuttiett, 1825-97.
verse:
. O ma hɛn kan, ama yeesua
Dɛ bra a 'Wo nnkaho n' yɛ owu;
Hɔn a wɔdze akoma a osi pi
Ba Wo hɔ n', yeehu hɔn dɛw pa.

name: MHB 630:4
title: Lawrence Tuttiett, 1825-97.
verse:
. O ma hɛn kan, 'werɛhow na yaw m',
Yɛmma hɛn akoma a ɔaberɛ n' do,
'Dze eehu dɛ mbeamudua n' yɛ mfaso,
Na yeehyira No dɔ a osuma n'.

name: MHB 630:5
title: Lawrence Tuttiett, 1825-97.
verse:
. O ma hɛn sesei; ndaamba
Wiadze abrabɔ nyina twa mu a,
Yeehu abow a woebue n' wɔ Wo mu
Dze kɔ fie a 'wu nnyi m' afebɔɔ.    Amen.

name: MHB 631:1
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.
verse:
. NANTSEW kan n' mu: na ibohu 
Ɔdɔ fɛkuwbɔ no a
No Sunsum nko tum dze ma no
Nyia odzi hen sor wɔ kan m'.

name: MHB 631:2
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.
verse:
. Nantsew kan n' mu: na ibohu 
Dɛ w'akoma ayɛ N'dze koraa,
Nyia ɔtse kan a fua biara nnyi m' mu
Sum biara nnyi No mu.

name: MHB 631:3
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.
verse:
. Nantsew kan n' mu: na ibohu 
Dɛ wo sum etwa m' kɔ,
'Siandɛ dɛm kan n' ahyerɛn wo ho,
No mu na da pa wɔ.

name: MHB 631:4
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.
verse:
. Nantsew kan n' mu: na 'wumaa mpo
Nnkenya sum bi ama w';
Enyimnyam bɛpepa no sum,
Christ edzi nyim wɔ do.

name: MHB 631:5
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.
verse:
. Nantsew kan n' mu: wodze bɛyɛ
Kwan a nsoɛ wɔ m' mpo a, ɔhyerɛn;
Adom ntsi Nyame bɛtsena w' mu,
Nyame Noara nye Kan.

name: MHB 632:1
title: Mary Byrne
verse:
. M'AKOMA Wura, yɛ dza osi m'enyi do;
Minnyi biribiara bio, gyedɛ Wo nko
'Dzekyee anaa adzesaa, Ɔwo, nye m'adwen pa,
Minyan anaa meda a, Ɔwo yɛ m' kan.

name: MHB 632:2
title: Mary Byrne

name: MHB 632:3
title: Mary Byrne
verse:
. .Ɔko no mu, yɛ m'akokyɛm na peaa,
Yɛ m'enyimpa, Ɔwo yɛ dza mepɛ;
Eyɛ m' kra n' tsenabew, yɛ m'abantsentsen,
O mo Tumfo, pegya me kɔ heaven.

name: MHB 632:4
title: Mary Byrne
verse:
. Mennka ahonya anaa ayɛyi hun do,
Eyɛ m'egyapadze, sesei na daa;
Wo nko na idzi kan wɔ m'akoma m',
Heaven Ɔhempɔn, eyɛ m'akoradze.

name: MHB 632:5
title: Mary Byrne
verse:
. Heaven Ɔhempɔn, nsa aka konyimdzi n',
Ma minnya sor, heaven Ewia hyɛnhyɛn n'
M'akoma Wura, dza ɔbɛma biara,
Yɛ dza osi m'enyi do nyinara Wura.

name: MHB 633:1
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.
verse:
. O adom Hen, fi sor ahengua n' do 
Fa dɔ hwɛ na tsie hɛn mbɔbɔr su.

name: MHB 633:2
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.
verse:
. Hwɛfo pà a edze bɔgya tɔɔ Wo nguan, 
Kora Wo nguankuw a wɔnnkyɛr kwan fom.

name: MHB 633:34
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.
verse:
. O Pomfo pa, Wo wu mu na agye hɛn: 
Ma abɔn awerɛhofo daa nkwa.
 
. Sor Edziban, yɛdze Wo nyɛn hɛnho: 
Pin bɔboa hɛn akra hɛn hia ber mu.

name: MHB 633:5
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.
verse:
. Apatasu, ndzebɔnyɛfo Dɔfo, 
Edɛw na siar nsunyiwa a ɔnnsa da.

name: MHB 633:6
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.
verse:
. Ao, fa sor adom kyekye hɛn werɛ; 
Yi W'enyim fɛɛfɛw n' enyimnyam kyerɛ.

name: MHB 633:789
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.
verse:
. Adzekyeem' mununkum, adzesaam' ogya, 
Bɛn hɛn na dan hɛn sum ma ɔnyɛ kan.
 
. Nye hɛn nnantsew, nye hɛn kwan daa daa, 
Hɛn nkwam' na wum' Werɛkyekyer, Tum, Gyafo.
 
. Fa Wo dɔ enyi n' gya hɛn kwan daa daa, 
Na fa hɛn du hɛn sor fi nom' sɔkyee. Amen.

name: MHB 634:1
title: Priscilla Jane Owens, 1820-99.
verse:
. WO kra sekyɛ botum ɔbra n'ehum,
Ber a nsuframa dzendzen robɔ yi?
Ma asorɛkye dzendzen retsetsew nhama m',
Wo sekyɛ betsim, anaa obegyina dzen?
   Sɛ ɔbra pram, ma asorɛkye bu a,
   Dɛm sekyɛ yi kora hɛn kra pintsinn;
   Ɔmontan ɔbotantsim a onnhim,
   Na otsim hɔ pintsinn wɔ Gyefo No dɔ m'.

name: MHB 634:2
title: Priscilla Jane Owens, 1820-99.
verse:
. Wo sekyɛ botum egyina suro ber mu
Ehumtu kɛse nye abotar enyim?
Ber a po nye mframa tu hɔn tsir gu do n',
Ana nsu bɛpram ebunkam wo hɛmba?

name: MHB 634:3
title: Priscilla Jane Owens, 1820-99.
verse:
. Wo sekyɛ botum wu n'esuyirii?
Ber a nsu nwinwin twa w'ahomtsia do?
Asorɛkye dzen mu mpo eronntɔ bahaw
'Siandɛ wo sekyɛ tsim enyidar man n' mu.

name: MHB 634:4
title: Priscilla Jane Owens, 1820-99.
verse:
. W'enyiwa bohu anapa kan fɛɛfɛw n'
Zion sika kurow na ahɛndwirii hyɛnhyɛn n'
Ber a ɔbra n'ehum bɔbɔ adze nwionwion n',
Ibodwir sɔkyee wɔ ɔsor mpoano hɔ?

name: MHB 635:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. JESU, mo N'okwar, Kwan,
Me kan a ennyew da,
Mo bͻn anamͻn tsim Wo do, .
’Wo begya m’ abamba.

name: MHB 635:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Me Nyansaa, Kwankyérɛfo
Ͻwo yɛ mo Pomfo,
O mma mimmfi Wo nkyɛn ara da
Anaa W’akwan so do!

name: MHB 635:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Kyérɛkyerɛ m’ enyigyadze
Na mendan W’ adze nyina m;
O m'Ewuradze, mma nngyaa me da,
Mbom, dͻ me kͻ ewiei!

name: MHB 635:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Fa me dua ogya na nsu m,’
Kodu ahonya bea hͻ;
Kyérɛ me ndowm fofor ma montow
Ber a mo ho astew adom m’.

name: MHB 635:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O yɛ m’ dɛ Ͻwo ara,
’Saana meetu efi ha!
Gye me to m’ na ma mentséna ha
Na siesie me wͻ dͻ m’.

name: MHB 635:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma mentséna ndzi W’ dase
Ber a bͻn nyina asé etu n;
Gye me kra a nkekaa nnyi ho no,
Na fa m’ kͻ Nyame fie.  Amen.

name: MHB 636:1
title: Laura Ormiston Dibdin Chant, 1848-1923.
verse:
. WIADZE kan, hɛn anan a agogow n' hinhim
Wɔ ekyinkyin pii m',
Naaso 'bekyiaa hɛn akoma bɔbɔfo n',
'Napa Woraba;
Emaa yɛmaa hɛn enyi do tsim sor
Dze hwɛɛ ewia hyɛhyɛnn no n'enyimnyam.

name: MHB 636:2
title: Laura Ormiston Dibdin Chant, 1848-1923.

name: MHB 636:3
title: Laura Ormiston Dibdin Chant, 1848-1923.

name: MHB 636:4
title: Laura Ormiston Dibdin Chant, 1848-1923.
verse:
. Owu hwirom na 'wumaa konyim wɔ hen?
Yaw nyina wɔ hen?
Ber a twamutam a ɔkata wo do n' wo Hen 
Atsew mu yi?
Wiadze kan, yɛtse dɛ Ɔwo refrɛ hɛn
Kɔ W'onnyiewie kan na dɔ fie no mu.

name: MHB 637:1
title: Anne Boss Cousin, 1824-1906.
verse:
. BER n'anhwea no remen ntsɛm
Heaven adzekyee n' yi enyim;
Wi puei ber a m'enyi daa kwan,
Da pa dɛɛdɛw n' aba,
Esuom yɛɛ sum dodoodow;
Adzekyee kan abɛn ,
Na enyimnyam mapa wɔ
Immanuel Ne man m'.

name: MHB 637:2
title: Anne Boss Cousin, 1824-1906.
verse:
. Hen n' wɔ N'ahoɔfɛw m' wɔ hɔ n',
Yehun N'enyim petee;
'Kwantu a odzi mu na yetui,
Sɛ 'wu esuom wɔ mu mpo a;
Eguambaa n' nye N' nsordaafo
Gyina kokwaa Zion do,
Na enyimnyam mapa wɔ
Immanuel Ne man m'.

name: MHB 637:3
title: Anne Boss Cousin, 1824-1906.
verse:
. O Christ, Ɔwo yɛ fapem
'Dɔ bura fɛɛfɛw a ɔdɔ;
Manom wiadze esu ahorow,
M'bɔnom papa wɔ Sor;
Na po yantamm bi w hɔ a
N'ehumbɔbɔr n' pem wɔ m',
Na enyimnyam mapa wɔ
Immanuel Ne man m'.

name: MHB 637:4
title: Anne Boss Cousin, 1824-1906.
verse:
. Ehumbɔbɔr nye atsɛmbu m'
Ɔwo awen me mber
Na ampa, awerɛhow bɔsu n',
Wo dɔ n' pepaa no koraa;
M'benyira nsa a ogyaa me no,
M'behyira akoma a ɔhyehyɛe,
Ber a wɔahyɛ N' enyimnyam wɔ
Immanuel Ne man m'.

name: MHB 638:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. NYAME Nyansabuakwa,
Hɔn Hen nye Agyenkwa,
Abɔfo a wɔwɔ ase ha
Mfa hɔn ayɛyi mbrɛ Wo.

name: MHB 638:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. No dɔ kokroko na 
N'apam nye N' nhwedo pa
Kora hɛn sɔnn fi bɔn na owu mu,
Na efirsua yaayaw mu.

name: MHB 638:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ɔbɔkora hɛn akra
Na ɔatsew ho nwionnwionn,
Wɔ N'enyim enyimnyam no mu,
Wɔ sor enyigye pa m'.

name: MHB 638:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Aba a wɔasan mu eyi n'
Behyia wɔ ahengua n' ho;
Wobehyira N'adom nwanwa n',
Wɔaka N'anwanwadze.

name: MHB 639:1
title: Richard Baxter, 1615-91.
verse:
. CHRIST a onyim No nguan nyina
Bɔhwɛ hɛn nyina do sɔnn;
No bɔgyaa no anaa
N'amandzehu no
Rennyɛ kwa ara da,
Dɛ ɔtɔɔ hɛn ntsi n'.

name: MHB 639:2
title: Richard Baxter, 1615-91.
verse:
. Minyim me Nyame tsen,
Ɔno na motwer No;
Dza mowɔ, meyɛ nyina
M'enyindado nyina
Dza mekeka hwɛ n' ha
Yɛ nokwar pefee.

name: MHB 639:3
title: Richard Baxter, 1615-91.

name: MHB 64:12345
title: Joachim Neander, 1650-80
verse:
. Ayɛyi nka Ewuradze, Tumfo, abɔdze nyina hen; 
O me kra, yi N' ayɛw, Ɔno nye w' ahom na nkwagye;
Hom a hom tse,
Enuaam na nkyerɛbaa, hom mbra,
Hom ntonton No enyigye mu.
 
. Ayɛyi nka Ewuradze a otu w' edwuma 
    mpon, weɔn wo,
Ampaara Ne yie nye N' adom ka wo do daa wɔ ha:
Dwen ho bio hwɛ
Dza Otumfo No tum yɛ,
Sɛ ɔdze No dɔ fa w' nyɛnko a.
 
. Ayɛyi nka Ewuradze, ɔno a ehumtuber no mu, 
Ɔno na ber a abɔdze nyina etwa ayer wo no,
Ɔma wogyaa,
Begyabegyayɛ taa dzinn,
Ɔma ehum na po yɛ komm n'.
 
. Ayɛyi nka Ewuradze, ɔno a ber a bɔn na sum agye, 
Ɔno na abosonsɔrfo dzi nyim mmbu papayɛ bi a
Ne kan hyerɛn,
Pam sum mu ewurkadze,
N' adom bɔ esiarfo ho ban.
 
. Ayɛyi nka Ewuradze! Ao, dza ɔwɔ mo mu 
     nyina ntonton N'!
Dza wɔwɔ nkwa nye ahom m-fa ayɛyi mbra N' enyim!
Wɔmma Amen
Ngyegye bio wɔ nkorɔfom'
Yɛtonton No enyigyem' daa.

name: MHB 640:1
title: Alfred Tennyson, 1809-92.
verse:
. WITƆREE, 'wimbir woraba,
Na frɛ kor a wɔdze afrɛ m'!
Na asorɛkye a orubu n' bɛda fɛmm,
Ber a migyina po enyim n;
Asorɛkye a orubu a ɔtse dɛ ɔada n',
Ɔnnkɛkyerɛ hwee koraa,
Ber a dza opuei fii bun yantamm no mu
San kɔ n'anan m'.

name: MHB 640:2
title: Alfred Tennyson, 1809-92.
verse:
. Serɛmen na ewimbir dɔn n',
Na afei n'ekyir sum no!
Na mma wɔmmfa awerɛhow nngya me kwan
Ber a mesi m' no,
Kaansa yefi bea na ber yi mu mpo a,
Nsuyirii n' dze m'bɔkɔ ekyir,
Ber a mefi wiadze yi mu n', minyim dɛ
M'bohu Sutwafo n' enyim.

name: MHB 641:1
title: James Smethan, 1821-89.
verse:
. BER a ’werɛhow ahyɛ mo do ’I,
Me Nyame yɛ m’ kyɛfa
Kodu dͻnhwér a ͻdze
Mo sunsum bɛma Wo n’.
Ber a honam na nkwa agow,
Tsen Wo nsa mu na gye
Me kra to W’abaw mu
Kodu dɛ minyan Wo m’.

name: MHB 641:2
title: James Smethan, 1821-89.
verse:
. Anapa wi bɛhyérɛn
Ewimbir kan bͻtͻ m’,
Dɛm na ase ha kan n’ tse,
Sor dze n’ ͻnnsesa da;
Nyɛnko nnhwɛ nyɛnko enyim,
Kor dzi yaw wͻ mpoano;
Wo mba dze wommpue mmfi
Wo bea krͻnkrͻn no do.

name: MHB 641:3
title: James Smethan, 1821-89.
verse:
. Mununkum kata hɛn do;
Yennsuro asehwe biara,
Yɛpɛ edu koko n’ do,
Hͻ na mboa pii fi ba:
Ͻhyérɛn wͻ anafua ber m’,
Ewufo twa m’, ba W’ hͻ,
Ͻwo a ayɛ anapa kan;
O ewiei n’ mma mmpa hɛn!

name: MHB 642:1
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. BER a adzesaa rotɔ mo nkwa da do,
Na ehum tu bea a ewia mmbɔ wɔ hɔ n'
Metse ndze ekyirekyir sum mu refrɛ
M'anan kɔ bea a minnyim.

name: MHB 642:2
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Sɛ biribiara rifi mo ho akɔ a, bɛn me,
Asaase, wi, fie ndzɛmba, sum na kan
Na enyimtsewee a ɔma me nkenyan,
Ɔdɔ a ɔgye mo do.

name: MHB 642:3
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Dza mowɔ nye Ɔwo Egya; ma Wo Sunsum
Nka mo ho nkyekye mo werɛ, nsuo mo mu;
Memmfata ahodze pa abow, memmfata berɛw,
Anaa sika abrɔn.

name: MHB 642:4
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Oye ma m', me papa na bɔn wɔnnkan;
Na ɔnam W'adom pii do ntsi edze kyɛ,
Na muhu Wo dɛ' roto nsa afrɛ me
Akɔ tsenabew a ɔsɛ m'.

name: MHB 642:5
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Ndwom dɛɛdɛw a asaasaa do wɔ hɔ a metse n',
Me bɛpɛ esua ndwom fofor krɔnkrɔn n' tow,
Na ewiei n' W'ayarsa ndua no ase no
M'benya nkwa a mo kɔn dɔ n'.   Amen.

name: MHB 643:1
title: Robert Murray McCheyne, 1813-43.
verse:
. SƐ wiadze yi twa mu wie a ,
Sɛ ewia a ɔhyerɛn yi tɔ mu a,
Yɛnye Christ gyina enyimnyam m',
Mohwɛ ɔbra n'ewiei mu nsɛm a,
Dɛm ber n' ankasa na m'bohu
Kaw a medze W', Ewuradze.

name: MHB 643:2
title: Robert Murray McCheyne, 1813-43.
verse:
. Sɛ mibegyina ahengua enyim
Hyɛ atar fɛɛfɛw a ɔnnyɛ m'dze,
Sɛ muhu W' dɛ mbrɛ Ɔwo tse a,
Medze akoma a bɔn nnyi m' bɔbɔ W',
Dɛm ber n' ankasa na m'bohu
Kaw a medze W', Ewuradze.

name: MHB 643:3
title: Robert Murray McCheyne, 1813-43.
verse:
. Sɛ metse heaven ayɛyi
Ngyegyee dzendzen wɔ m'asomu,
Tse dɛ esu dzendzen n' dede,
Ne dɛw tse dɛ sanku ndze a,
Dɛm ber n' ankasa na m'bohu
Kaw a medze W', Ewuradze.

name: MHB 643:4
title: Robert Murray McCheyne, 1813-43.
verse:
. Wɔammpaw m' wɔ me papa ntsi,
Wonyaan m', munguan mfi ebufuw m',
Dɛ munsuma me Gyefo nkyɛn,
Fa Sunsum no tsew mo ho,
Nyame, kyerɛ m' asaase 'i do,
Ma mo dɔ nkyerɛ kaw a medze W'.

name: MHB 644:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. NKWA na 'wu Tsɛmbuafo,
W'atsɛmbu bea enyim
Enyigye krɔnn anaa afɔdzi mu,
Yebehyia m' ntsɛmara;
Woesiesie hɛn akra ama
Da kɛse a ɔtse dɛm n',
Fa ahwɛyie a ɔsɛ hyɛ ma,
Kenyan hɛn ma yɛnsɔr.

name: MHB 644:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛbɔ mpaa dze tweɔn da n',
Dɔnhwer huuhu a wonnyim,
Ber a ehyɛ ahentar na tumdzi n',
Bɛsan efi sor aba ha,
Bɛkyebo, Egya Ne Ba n',
Bobu nyimpa nyina atsɛn,
Enye Egya n' No sor dɔm nyina
'Dze W'enyimnyam adom nyina.

name: MHB 644:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O ma wonhu hɛn dɛ
W'asɛm ho setsiefo,
Yɛnyɛ aso pɛnn mma abɛn no,
Na yɛrohwehwɛ hɛn Wura;
O ma yɛmper yennya
Dodow mfora esiarfo n',
Na yɛnweɔn ara dɛ yebenya
Ahomgye a onnyi ewiei.  Amen.

name: MHB 645:1
title: Walter Scott, 1771-1832.
verse:
. EBUFUW da no a ɔyɛ hu n',
Ber a sor na asaase botwa m' no,
Bɔn no tum benya egyinaanan a?
Yebesi dɛn ehyia da huuhu n'?

name: MHB 645:2
title: Walter Scott, 1771-1832.
verse:
. Ɔsor dze gyaramee wodow
Dɛ nwoma bi a wɔabobɔw,
Dede na nkekamu huuhu
Kenyan abɛn a onyan ewufo n'.

name: MHB 645:3
title: Walter Scott, 1771-1832.
verse:
. O dɛm da n', dɛm enyiber da n',
Ber a yefi dɛtse m' kɔ atsɛmbu m' n,
O Christ yɛ abɔn kyirtaafo
Kaansa sor na asaase twa m' mpo a.  Amen.

name: MHB 646:1
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;
verse:
. Ebufuw da! Ao, nyinsuwa da! 
Dza nkɔnhyɛfo kae n' abam',
Sor nye asaase rotɔ nso.

name: MHB 646:1112
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;
verse:
. Ɔtsɛmbuafo tseneenyi, 
Dom hɛn brafi ho bɔnfakyɛ,
Ansaana werdzi da n' aso.
 
. Midzii fᴐ; medze nyinsuwa gye
M'enyimguasebra nyina tom';
Nyame, meserɛ W', fa mo ho kyɛ m'.

name: MHB 646:131415161718
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;
verse:
. Egyee ɔbaa dzebɔnyɛnyi n', 
Edze wifo n' no bɔn kyɛɛ no,
Mo so ama menya enyidar.
 
. Me mpaabɔ na mo mbɔɔ nnsɛ  hwee,
Naaso, Nyame, kyerɛ W'adom
Na gye m' fi onnyiewiei gya n' mu.
 
. Ao, fa me ka Wo nguantsen n' ho, 
Mma mmpem m' adze nnka mberɛkyi n' ho,
Mbom ma m' do si W'abanyimfa.
 
. Mifi m'akoma mu bu ntwɛr, 
Hwɛ, mo nnuho ayɛ dɛ nso;
Sɛ m'ewiei to m' a, ɔno boa m'.
 
. Mewu o! Su na ewuotwa da n' a! 
Nyimpa fi huntumam' reba n' a,
Onsiesie noho mma atsɛmbu.
 
. Ao, Nyame, hu n' mbɔbɔr na gyaa n',
Tse ma hɔn a Jesus ehyira,
Dom hɛn W'ahomgye a onnyiewiei.
		Amen.

name: MHB 646:2
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;
verse:
. Akomatu a ogura nyimpa, 
Ber a Tsɛmbuafo n' fi sor besian,
Ɔno a ɔka a, obi nnka bi.

name: MHB 646:3
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;
verse:
. Totorobɛnto ndze huhu, 
Ɔgyegye ndakamaa nyinam'
Rotwe dɔm nyina kɔ asɛndzii.

name: MHB 646:4
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;
verse:
. Wɔatsea Wu, wiadze rowosow, 
Abɔdze nyina rinyanyan,
Eyi ano akyerɛ Tsɛmbuafo n'.

name: MHB 646:5
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;
verse:
. Hwɛ, bukuu no mu nsɛm si pi, 
Wɔ dza wɔakyerɛw n' mu nyina ho,
Ɔno na wɔdze bobu atsɛn.

name: MHB 646:67
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;
verse:
. Sɛ Tsɛmbuafo n' tsena N'eguam' 
Na esumasɛm biara da edzi a,
Obiara nnkɛfa noho gyan.
 
. Emidze m'beyi m'ano dɛn? 
Woana no obotwitwa agye m'
Ber a anokwafo mpo hia adom?

name: MHB 646:8910
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;
verse:
. Hen a W'ahentum krɔn mbordo, 
Ɔwo a ebɔ werdam ma hɛn, 
Tsema Wura, pinkyɛn hɛn ɛ.
 
. Hwɛ Jesus pa, mo nkwangye ntsi 
Na ebɛbraa adasa mu;
Mma nnto me seraha mma bɔn.
 
. Eku Woho ara ahwehwɛ m', 
Atɔ m' wɔ fona mbeamudua n' do;
Aso dɛm adom yi nyɛ gyan?

name: MHB 647:1
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.
verse:
. Ewuradze, ɔnnyɛ 'mi m'asɛm 
Muwu anaa metse ase o;
M'afamudze nye m'bɔdɔ W', masom W'
Yi gyedɛ W'adom ma.

name: MHB 647:2
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.
verse:
. Sɛ nkwa war a, m' enyi bɛgye 
Ama maasom Wo akyɛr,
Tsia so a, bɛn ntsi na m'bedzi mbɔɔ
Dɛ m'botu akɔ onnyiewieim'?

name: MHB 647:345
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.
verse:
. Christ ɔmmfa m' ndua mbrɛ hɔ yɛ sum 
Sen mbrɛ Noara koduae n';
Nyia ɔba Nyame ahenman mu n'
Gyedɛ ɔfa abow yim'.
 
. Bra, Mo Wura, sɛ adom ma mesɛ 
Dɛ muhu W'enyim a;
Na W'asaase edwuma yɛ dɛw a,
W'enyimnyam bɛyɛ dɛ dɛn?
 
. Na m'botwa mo suhuhun do, 
Na fona na bɔn ndafua,
Makɔdɔm esiarfo a wɔtow
Jehovah N'ayɛyi.

name: MHB 647:6
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.
verse:
. Me nyimdzee wɔ hɔ bra n' ho suar, 
Gyedzi enyi yɛ kusuww;
Na ɔdɔɔ so dɛ Christ nyim Ne nyina,
Na menya N' bɛkɛtsena.

name: MHB 648:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. YI hɛn awerɛhow na hu akwa!
Ɔnnkɛkyɛr na yeenya hɛn fie n',
Ahotsewfo man no bɛba,
Onnyiewiei da no so bɛba;
Yebefi asaase yi do ntsɛm,
Na yeetu akɔ hɛn ndamfo do,
Hɛn Egya fie a ɔwɔ sor hɔ;
Abɔfo na Nyame ahemfie.

name: MHB 648:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn suhuhun nyina ano botwa,
Sɛ n-kwasɛm no kenyan hɛn a,
Yehu kurow fofor n' no mpuei dɛ
Ayefor a wɔahyehyɛ ama n' Wura;
Kuropɔn krɔnkrɔn a no mu tsew yie,
Awerɛhow biara nnyi hɔ koraa 
Na atseetse anaa bɔn nnyi hɔ,
Sunsum fi biara so nnyi hɔ.

name: MHB 648:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛnam hɛn gyedzi do ehu
Jerusalem enyigyebea;
N'afasu yɛ jasper na sika,
N'adan ne hyerɛn ma noho tsew;
Adom n' mma ne fapem nnhinhim,
Osi hɔ dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse a ahyɛse n',
Ne dansifo no da no edzi n',
Nyame N'enyimnyam hyerɛn hɔ.

name: MHB 648:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ewia ho nnkehia dɛm da no,
Osiandɛ 'nafuasum nnyi hɔ,
Bea a Jesus N'ahoɔfɛw hyerɛn n',
Kan mapa wɔ hɔ dabaa no,
Eguambaa n' nye hɔn kan na ewia,
Na hwɛ, kan mu na ɔma wɔnye
Jesus hyerɛn krɔnkrɔn mu,
Na wɔhyerɛn wɔ sor 'nyimnyam mu.

name: MHB 649:123
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Man bi wɔ hɔ a dɛw mapa wɔm', 
Ahotsewfo dzim' hen;
Adzekyee nko, adze nnsa da,
Hɔ enyigye tu yaw.
 
. Hɔ na nhaban wuna dabaa. 
Na hɔ nhiren nnyam da;
Wu tse dɛ po tseabaa a, otwa
Sorman na hɛndze yi ntamu.
 
. Nhaban huanhuam wɔ esuegya hɔ 
Woewuna dukuduku;
Dɛm na Jewfo hun Canaan ma n'
Dɛ Jordan pem twa ntamu.

name: MHB 649:45
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Na adasa suro bɔ piriw dɛ 
Wobotwa po tseabaa n',
Wɔbɔ ngyangyan wɔ esukɔn do,
Wosuro dɛ wobepia.
 
. Ao, nkyɛ yeeyi ekyingye akwa, 
Na adwen kusukusu n',
Na yɛdze enyi a do tsew eehu
Canaan a yɛdɔ no.

name: MHB 649:6
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Nkyɛ yaafow mbrɛ Moses kegyinae n', 
Na yaankwɛ noho mbew n',
Jordan esu anaa owu nwin,
Runntu hɛn bo wɔ hɔ.

name: MHB 65:1
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. NYAME a ofir Nyame, ifua
Onyame dɔ no krɔn, no bun, 
Yɛdze ndaase akoma tow W' ndwom, 
Hɛn akoma haahaw hwehwɛ Wo,
Dɛ ogya a ɔredzɛw dzendzen;
Bra, fa Wo ngo krɔnkrɔn no bra.

name: MHB 65:2
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. Ɔdɔ Tumfo, yɛkotow Wo, 
Hɛn ahwehwɛdze nyina nye Wo, 
Hɛn akoma da W'enyim adagyaw, 
Igyaa Wo daa ahengua no hɔ; 
Too W'enyimnyam pan wɔ ase ha. 
Penee, kyii bɔgya, wui maa hɛn.

name: MHB 65:3
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. Yɛserɛ adom wɔ asorɛkye mu.
Adom nye ɔkra ne sekyɛ,
Adom na ɔsa yar nyina,
Adom brɛ apɛdze nyina adze,
Sɛ wiadze tsew etua mpo a,
Ɔma hɛn abotar yaw mu.

name: MHB 65:4
title: John Wesley, 1703-91
verse:
. Ma sor nyɛ hɛn kra tsenabea ndɛ,
Yɛnka Christ ho nsuma Nyame m',
Hɛn sunsum nye Nyame dze mbɔ m',
Yɛnyɛ hɛn edwuma nyina Wo mu,
Hɛn nsusui nyina ngyina Wo do,
Kesi dɛ Wo su hyerɛn hɛn mu.

name: MHB 650:1
title: Joseph Bromehead, 1748-1828.
verse:
. Jerusalem, m'ahomka fie, 
Dzin a ɔsom me bo,
M'edwuma bɔbɔ adze dabɛn
Wɔ wo siar asomdweem'?

name: MHB 650:2
title: Joseph Bromehead, 1748-1828.
verse:
. Dabɛn na m'enyiwa bohu 
W'afasu nye mbotsen?
N-kwagye ahyɛ w'aban dzen,
W'abrɔn mu hyerɛn sika.

name: MHB 650:3
title: Joseph Bromehead, 1748-1828.
verse:
. Ehɔ nhyiren n' kyɛn Eden turem'; 
Na bɔn nye yaw nnyi hɔ:
Menam abo nye ehum do
Per kɔ siar bea yi do.

name: MHB 650:45
title: Joseph Bromehead, 1748-1828.
verse:
. Ebɛn ntsi na m'bosuro mbusu, 
Anaa wu mbɔ me hu?
M'enyi da Canaan man pa n' do,
Mbew a adze nnsa do da.
 
. Asomafo, atɔfo, nkɔnhyɛfo, 
Abɔ Agyenkwa ho aprɔw;
Na ɔnnkɛkyɛr so na m'adɔfo
Akɔdɔm 'nyimnyam kuw n'.

name: MHB 650:6
title: Joseph Bromehead, 1748-1828.
verse:
. Jerusalem, mahomka fie, 
Me kra per hwehwɛ wo!
Da n' na m'dwuma bɔbɔ adze,
Da n' na m'bohu wo dɛw.

name: MHB 651:1
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. TSIE! Me kra, tsie! Sor abɔfo ndwom ruhur
Wɔ kwaamu ɔnye mpoano nyinara;
Nokwar bi a dɛm ndwom no rowasa a,
Wɔ nkwa fofor a bɔn biara nnyi mu bio!
   Jesus abɔfo, kan abɔfo,
   Rotow ndwom ama akwantufo akɔaba!

name: MHB 651:2
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Yɛkɔ hɛn enyim, yɛda ho tse hɔn ndwom no,
Akra a hom aberɛ, Jesus frɛ dɛ hom mbra!
Ndwom no gyegye dɛɛdɛw wɔ hɔ sum no mu,
Asɛmpa ndwom no dze hɛn rokɔ fie.

name: MHB 651:3
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Jesus Ne ndze gyegye asaase na po do,
Dɛ ewimbir dɔn a wɔrobɔ n' ekyirekyir,
Akra mpempen a wɔso adzesoa aberɛ;
Oguanhwɛfo pa, frɛ hɔn bra Wo nkyɛn.

name: MHB 651:4
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Ahomgye ba; sɛ ɔbra war, yɛ basaa mpo a,
Adzekyee n' twar dɛ ɔba ma sum pa;
Gyedzi akwantu bɔ adze wɔ akɔaba-ma mu,
Na ɔkra n' nsa ka heaven, ne fie mapa n'.

name: MHB 651:5
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Abɔfo, hom ntow ndwom, ber a hom roweɔn yi,
Hom ntow sor ndwom dɛɛdɛw no nkyerɛ hɛn,
Kɛpem dɛ anapa dɛw bɛpam anafua su,
Na ɔbra mu sum no pa ɔdɔ mu.

name: MHB 652:1
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. Hɛn nkwaber yɛ tsia wɔ ha 
Yaw tsia, adwendwen tsia
Nkwa a ɔmmbɔ adze da,
Nyinsu nnyim' wɔ noho,
Ao, ndzinoa a ɔyɛ dɛw
Fona tsia, ahomgye daa;
Adasa ndzebɔnyɛ
Nye esiarfo bɛtsena.

name: MHB 652:2
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. Akobɔfo abɔbɔfo a, 
Yebenya fi wɔ sor!
Nsaamaa a yɛrohwehwɛ kobew
Wɔ nworaba n'ekyir!
Ndɛ dze yɛwɔ akono,
'Kyena na yɛso ahenkyɛw
A, odzi mu afebɔɔ
Na ne fɛw mmpa ara da.

name: MHB 652:3
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. Sesei dze yɛroweɔn, yɛreper, 
Yɛtse enyidadom',
Zion wɔ dɛ n'ahoguam'
Ɔnye Babylon si;
Na nyia sesei yɛtwer No n'
Ndaamba yebohu N' kann,
Hɔn a wonyim N' na Wohu N'
Benya N' ayɛ hɔndze.

name: MHB 652:4
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. Ao, enyigye na siar man, 
Nyame Ne mpamufo fie!
Ao, enyigye na siar man,
Akoma kɔn dɔ W', hwɛ W' kwan!
Jesu, mbɔbɔrhum' ara
Fa hɛn kɔ ahomgye bea n',
Ɔwo a 'nye Nyame Egya
Na Sunsum n' woehyira hom.

name: MHB 652:5
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. Jerusalem sika kurow, 
Numfonsu na wo ma
Wo ho adwendwen no ma
Akoma na ndze bɔm
Minnyim ara, ao, minyim
Dɛw a ɔrotweɔn hɛn hɔ,
Enyimnyam a ɔhyerɛn
Nhyira a ɔnntɔ ka.

name: MHB 652:6
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. Zion asa n' nyina mu 
'Nyigye ndwom ahyɛ n' ma,
Abɔfo hyirenn na atɔfo
Ahyɛ mpemdo wɔ hɔ,
Ɔhenba n' tse hɔn finimfin
Adzekyee kan n' tsew wann;
Na esiarfo edzidzibea n'
Ayɛ nomanoma fɛɛfɛw.

name: MHB 652:7
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.
verse:
. David n'ahenguan n' si hɔ; 
Hɔ na konyimdzifo a
Woefi dadwen nsa bɔ se,
Na apontofo tow ndwom
Hɔn a wɔnye hɔn Sahen
Ako edzi konyim n'
Mbersantsen mfesantsen nyina
Woewuna hɔn ntar fitaa.

name: MHB 652:8
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 653:1
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.
verse:
. BEA a hɔ yɛ dɛw nko!
Nyame a ɔwɔ sor abangua,
Ɔsor mu sor ahengua,
W'ahentum no dzi mu.
    Enyigye bea! O dabɛn na
    M'bohu me Nyankopɔn enyim?

name: MHB 653:2
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.
verse:
. Mo Wura, me Hen tse hɔ,
Memmfata hɔ tsena,
Hɔ, abɔfo tow ndwom
Butuw famu, kotow No.

name: MHB 653:3
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.
verse:
. Tsetse mpanyimfo no
Kowiee hɔn akwantu n' hɔ;
Nkɔnhyɛfo no hun hɛn
Asomdwee Hen enyim.

name: MHB 653:4
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.
verse:
. Medze enyigye bohu
Eguambaa N'asomafo,
M'betsie nsankubɔfo n'
Wɔ sika nsanku do.

name: MHB 653:5
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.
verse:
. Atɔfo anokwafo n'
Wɔ abangua no do,
Wɔhyɛ n-tar fitaa
'Nyimnyam hyɛ hɔn etua ma.

name: MHB 653:6
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.
verse:
. Ɔsor Jerusalem
Nye mo ndwom na mo kurow;
Na mo wu ekyir no,
Mibenya me nhyira.

name: MHB 654:1
title: Hugh Reginald Haweis, 1838-1901.

name: MHB 654:2
title: Hugh Reginald Haweis, 1838-1901.

name: MHB 654:3
title: Hugh Reginald Haweis, 1838-1901.

name: MHB 655:1
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.
verse:
. JERUSALEM, m'ahomka fie!
M'bɛba wo hɔ dabɛn?
M'awerɛhow bɔbɔ adze dabɛn?
Dabɛn na m'bohu

name: MHB 655:10
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.
verse:
. Magdalene egyaa n'apensi
Na ɔtow ndwom dɛw, m' wɔ hɔ,
Ɔnye ahotsewfo a hɔn ndwom
Yɛ dukuu wɔ abrɔn mu n'.

name: MHB 655:11
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.
verse:
. Jerusalem, Jerusalem,
Nyame mboa ma munhu
Wo dɛw a ɔmmbɔ adze n', na menyɛ
Ne fafafo so daa.    Amen.

name: MHB 655:2
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.
verse:
. Ahotsewfo ahomka mpoano!
O dɛw na ahotɔ bea!
Wo mu dze awerɛhow nnyi hɔ,
Yaw, dadwen na berɛ nnyi m'.

name: MHB 655:3
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.
verse:
. W'afasu yɛ sika abotan,
W'aban yɛ ndɛnkyɛmbo;
Wo mbotsen yɛ man pa m' ndzepa,
Ahodze a ho yɛ na.

name: MHB 655:4
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.
verse:
. W'adan no srɔnsrɔmbea biara
Kandzea hyɛnhyɛnn hyerɛn do;
W'abɔntsen yɛ sika mfutuw,
Ɔyɛ fɛw, odzi mu.

name: MHB 655:5
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.
verse:
. Wo w'enyinaba na nduaba kwa
Yɛ ahomka dodow;
Ndua na nduaba pa ahyɛ mu ma,
Ɔyɛ nwanwa dodow.

name: MHB 655:6
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.
verse:
. Wo turo ahorow na mfuwa
Yɛ ebunebun daa;
Nhyiren huanhuam fɛɛfɛw wɔ hɔ,
Hɔn saso nnyi beebi.

name: MHB 655:7
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.
verse:
. W'abrɔn a dwetɛ gyegye mu n',
N-kwa esutsen pem m' weɔɔ;
Ne nkyɛnkyɛn, afa na afa nyina,
N-kwa dua wuna wusuww.

name: MHB 655:8
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.
verse:
. W'ahotsewfo hyɛ 'nyam 'henkyɛw,
'Hu Nyame enyim na enyim;
Wodzi nyim ara, wodzi dɛw ara,
Wɔwɔ ahomka m' daa.

name: MHB 655:9
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.
verse:
. David dze ne sanku m' wɔ hɔ
Dɛ adwontow kuw panyin;
Nyia ɔbɛtse hɔn ndwom no bi n'
Woehyira n' mbɔho piigyan.

name: MHB 656:1
title: Anne Shepherd, 1809-57.
verse:
. MBOFRA mpempem etwa ehyia
Nyame N'ahengua enyim,
Mbofra a wɔahor hɔn ho bɔn nyina,
Ahotsewfo fɛkuw.
     Wɔtow : 'Nyimnyam
     'nyimnyam, 'nyimnyam!

name: MHB 656:2
title: Anne Shepherd, 1809-57.
verse:
. Hwɛ wɔhyɛ ntar pa fitaa bi a
Nkekaa biara nnyi mu,
Wɔtse daa daa kan na dɛw a
Ɔmmpa ara da mu.

name: MHB 656:3
title: Anne Shepherd, 1809-57.
verse:
. Mframa bɛn bɔɔ hɔn kɔr sor hɔ?
Sor a pɛrpɛr tsim hɔ daa,
Bea a asomdwee, dɛw na dɔ nsu pem;
Mbofra 'i sii dɛn kɔr hɔ.

name: MHB 656:4
title: Anne Shepherd, 1809-57.
verse:
. Agyenkwa N' bɔgyaa a okyii no
Hohoor hɔn ho fi no:
Woguar adehye nsu krɔnn no mu;
Hwɛ, hɔn ho atsew fitaa!

name: MHB 656:5
title: Anne Shepherd, 1809-57.
verse:
. Wɔtse ase n', wɔhwehwɛɛ Agyenkwa
N'adom, wɔdɔɔ Ne dzin,
Ntsi na ndɛ wohu N' siar enyim n',
Na wogyina Eguambaa enyim n'.

name: MHB 657:1
title: William Charter Piggott, 1872-1943.
verse:
. Hɔn a wu ntwamutam suma hɔn n', 
Hɛn 'gyafo a nkyɛ wɔka hɛn ho n',
Woedu sor adzekyee mu ntsi
Yɛda W' ase.

name: MHB 657:234
title: William Charter Piggott, 1872-1943.
verse:
. Hɔn nkwa no yɛ n-kwa ampa, 
Woedu empiresi n'ewiei,
Afei wohu W'enyim petee:
Hwee nnsiw hɔn kwan.
 
. Dɛ mbrɛ yehun hɔn wɔ fonam' 
Na ahohia mu n', wɔnntse dɛm bio:
Hɔn enyi hu adze kann: Wo dzin
Wɔ hɔn pɔw do.
 
. Kɔdaann-da efi hɔn do koraa, 
Na woehu W'apɛdze nyina;
Wɔdze dɛw a yennyim wɔ ha 
Som Wo daa daa.

name: MHB 657:5
title: William Charter Piggott, 1872-1943.

name: MHB 657:6
title: William Charter Piggott, 1872-1943.
verse:
. Edwuma so a seesei wɔyɛ n', 
Dza ɔsɛ nyimdzee a oedzi mu a,
Na dza ema wɔyɛ ma hɛn
Yenntum yennhu.

name: MHB 657:7
title: William Charter Piggott, 1872-1943.
verse:
. Wonnkyi nyinsuwa hɔ ara bio, 
Dɔ nko na wɔdze edzi ehyia;
Sor hɔ dwuma, nkamfo, ahomgye
Nyina yɛ kor.

name: MHB 658:1
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. EWURADZE Wo nkyɛn ara!
Amen; ma ɔnyɛ hɔ;
'Wu mu nkwa wɔ dɛm asɛm no m'
Yɛ bɛkyebo nkwa pa;
Metse honam mu yi,
Mikyima fi Ne nkyɛn,
Anago biara misi me
Ntamadan bɛn Ne fie.

name: MHB 658:2
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. M'Egya fie a ɔwɔ sor,
Me kra fie a ɔbɛn,
Ma gyedzi enyiwa pa nhu
Wo sika mbobow no!
Afei me kra reper
Dɛ obodu man a modɔ n',
'Hotsewfo egyapadze a ɔhyerɛn,
