Ɔsor Jerusalem.

name: MHB 658:3
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Ewuradze, Wo nkyɛn ara!
Egya, ɔyɛ Wo pɛ a,
Ma me nsa nka anohoba n',
Asɛm no mu dze no.
Gyina me nsa nyimfa
Na monnkɔhwe ase;
Suo mo mu na mibegyina
Ko m' na m'bedzi konyim.

name: MHB 658:4
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Sɛ m'ahomgu bɔ adze a,
Tsew nkataenyim no mu a,
Menam owu mu benya nkwa,
N-kwa a onnyi ewiei.
Dɛ mbrɛ metse 'i ara,
M'bɛyɛ dɛn adɔ asɛm n'
Na daa maka n' ahengua enyim?
Ewuradze, Wo nkyɛn ara!

name: MHB 659:1
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.
verse:
. AHOMGYE na enyigye da,
O dɛw na ekan da,
Dadwen na awerɛhow edur,
Ɔyɛ fɛw na ɔhyerɛn;
Wo mu, akɛse na nkuma
Bɔ m' mfesantsen nyina
Tow: Krɔnkrɔn, Krɔnkrɔn, Krɔnkrɔn
Ma Ɔkorsa Nyame.

name: MHB 659:2
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.
verse:
. Wo mu na abɔdze mu no,
Wodzii kan yɛɛ ekan;
Wo mu na hɛn nkeagye ntsi
Christ soɛree fii nda mu;
Wo mu, hɛn konyimdzi Wura
Somaa Sunsum n' fii sor,
N-tsi nyimnyamfo, Wo mu
Na emaa kan mprɛnsa.

name: MHB 659:3
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.
verse:
. N-dɛ sor manna tɔ wɔ
Aman a wɔaberɛ do;
Dwetɛ totorobɛnto no
Frɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn n' wɔ 
Beebi a asɛmpa kan no 
Da kan ne nserɛmɛn edzi,
Na nkwa nsu pem wɔ hɔ dɛ
N-su a ɔdwedwe akra.

name: MHB 659:4
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.
verse:
. Yenya adom fofor daa
Fi ahomgye da yi mu,
Hɛn nsa ka ahomgye a ɔyɛ 
Akra a woehyira hɔn n' dze;
Ayɛyi nka Egya, Ɔba
Nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no;
Asɔr no ma ne ndze do
Ma Ɔwo, Baasa Kor.  Amen.

name: MHB 66:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. ADOM nyina Nyame,
Yɛkamfo W'adɔe,
Edze Wo Ba ama dɛ ombowu mma hɛn.
Ofi ɔsor bae,
Ribeyi hɛn ndom;
Ɔadɔ, ɔadɔ hɛn osiandɛ ɔpɛ ɔdɔ.

name: MHB 66:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔdɔ gyaa N' ma owui,
Hɛn enyi da 'yi do,
 Ɔadɔ, ɔadɔ hɛn, yennkotum atse ase,
Yebotum aka 'yi,
 Ɔadɔ hɛn kɛse,
Dɛ ɔdze No nkwa too hɔ gyee hɛn fii hɛll.

name: MHB 66:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔagye hɛn asefo;
Yensi dɛn nkamfo
Anaa yɛntow W'adom a onnyi kabea ho ndwom?
Yennkohu hweeara
Wɔ ha akwantu yi m',
Mbom yɛtow W'adom ho ndwom kɔ paradisè.

name: MHB 66:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Na sɛ yefi ha
Pue W'enyim wɔ sor,
Hɛn sor bɛyɛ Wo dɔ ho ndwom ara nko,
Hɛn nyina bɛkamfo,
Hɛn Nyɛnko No dɔ,
Dza wɔhyɛ ase no rommbɔ adze da.

name: MHB 660:1
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 660:2
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 660:34
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 660:5
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. N-dɛ yɛ mpaabɔ da: 
Bɔ mfar a ɔma nkwa;
Na nyan akra a woewuwu ma
Wɔndɔ Wo, wɔnsom Wo

name: MHB 661:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. HOM mbra ma yɛnye hɛn Wura nsoɛr,
Hɛn wura a ͻyɛɛ asaase na wimu;
Owui gyee wiadzé a ͻbͻe no
Na ͻsoɛɛr konyim mu fii wu m’,
N-kwa nyé asomdwee Hen scarce
Na ͻdze da no yɛɛ Nedze daa.

name: MHB 661:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Iyi nye da a Ewuradzé ayɛ
Ma obiara eehu No dͻ no,
Atse No wusoɛr tum no nka
Na ͻaasoɛr a ͻnnhwé ase bio;
Wͻayɛ N' fofor wͻ tsenenee mu,
Na Nyame nkwa ahyɛ no ma.

name: MHB 661:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hom mma yɛmfa Nedze mma No,
Yɛmfa mpaabͻ mbɛn ahengua n’
Mfa ahobrɛadze ntsie asɛmpa n’,
Mfa ndaase mma ͻdͻ a ͻdze wui n’;
Yɛma hɛn akoma na ndze do
Dzé ayɛyi ndwom kͻ abangua n' do.

name: MHB 661:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 662:1
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.
verse:
. EWIA ekyir nsutɔ yɛ dɛw,
Na yaw ekyir n-da yɛ dɛw;
Ahomgye da dze ahom dɛɛdɛw
Ba wiadze a ɔaberɛ do.

name: MHB 662:2
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.

name: MHB 662:3
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.
verse:
. Nkyenan fofor wɔ asɛmpa 'i mu
Na ne kan m-pɛn esuon mu,
Nyame nhyira da! Yehua ne kan,
Ɔdze ndaase na ɔsom ba.

name: MHB 662:4
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.
verse:
. Kusuww nye ahantan biara
Nnkotum nye ber krɔnkrɔn atsena;
Yɛyɛ Nyame edwuma ɔdɔ mu,
Yɛyew edwuma no dɛw mu.

name: MHB 662:5
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.
verse:
. Ewuradze, hom gu hɛn do
Ma yengyina pintsinn wɔ dɔ mu,
Na ma hɛn hɛn ehiadze daa
Ma yɛntsena gyedzi mu nwu.

name: MHB 663:1
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;

name: MHB 663:2
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;

name: MHB 663:3
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;
verse:
. Sɔ W'afɔr no a ɔda
M'anomu no mu ogya no;
Yi m'enyi do sum fi hɔ
Ma meegyaa mfomdo biara yɛ,
Mma ogya fofor bi nndzɛw
Mo mu a W'afɔrmbukyia nnyim.

name: MHB 663:4
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;
verse:
. Ma memfa m'akoma ntow
Krɔnkrɔn, Krɔnkrɔn, Krɔnkrɔn n-dɛ
Ntwe m'ho mfi wiadze kakra;
Na me kra ntow mbra Wo hɔ sor
M'bɔsɔ mbrɛ wosi som Wo
Wɔ sor tsenabea hɔ no nhwɛ

name: MHB 663:5
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;
verse:
. Hom mo mu, mowɔ Wo mu,
Hyehyɛ paradise wɔ mo mu;
O yi Woho kyerɛ me,
Ɔdɔ siarfo a iwui gyee me,
Wo toa mu ngo a ɔnnsa da n'
Bɛma me kandzea adzɛw daa.

name: MHB 663:6
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;

name: MHB 664:1
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;
verse:
. O EWURADZE Jesus, ber a
Yɛtwe bɛn Wo n' yɛ nhyira,
Yɛtse anohoba dɛɛdɛw pii a
Ɔsom bo fi W'anomu.

name: MHB 664:2
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;
verse:
. Ka hɛn ho ndɛ na hyira hɛn,
Amma yaannyɛ gyan wɔ mu;
Ma yenhu nkwagye nokwar no,
Abrabɔ mu n-sɛm no.

name: MHB 664:3
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;
verse:
. Bue hɛn adwen na mu na gya hɛn.
Sɔkyee kɔ hɛn sor kwan do;
Nokwar kandzea no ndzi hɛn kan
Na amma yaanntɔ dɔnsuar.

name: MHB 664:4
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;

name: MHB 664:5
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;

name: MHB 664:6
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;
verse:
. Ma hɛn adom ma yɛngye dase
Wɔ nokwar a yeesuo m' no ho;
Na ma binom so n-sɔ nhwɛ,
Ne dɛw nye ne kan pa no.

name: MHB 665:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. ME NYAME, me Hen, W'ayɛyi
Ndaase, adwontow ho edwuma yɛ dɛw;
Wɔkyerɛ Wo dɔ anapa kan,
Wɔka Wo nokwar anafua.

name: MHB 665:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ahomgye da krɔnkrɔn yɛ dɛw,
Adwendwen biara nnhaw mo bo;
O ma m'akoma ntow ndwom dɛ
David sankutsen dɛɛdɛw no.

name: MHB 665:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. M'akoma dzi nyim Ewuradze m'
Na oehyira No ndwuma nye N'asɛm;
Mbrɛ W'adom ndwuma si hyerɛn a!
W'afotu mu dɔ, no ho tsew.

name: MHB 665:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Na m'benya enyimnyam kyefa
Ber a adom atsew m'akoma ho,
Na menya enyigye fofor,
Dɛ ngo krɔnkrɔn asera me tsirmu.

name: MHB 665:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Afei mobohu na matse
Dza mohwehwɛ wɔ ha nyina,
Na abɔdze nyina benya enyigye
Wɔ dɛw bɛkyebo wiadze n' mu.

name: MHB 666:1
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.
verse:
. Yɛdze adwontow hyɛɛ ase ndɛ, 
Wɔ mbɔbɔr ahengua n' enyim;
Ansaana 'nafua sum bɛba n',
Yɛtow ewimbir ndaase ndwom.

name: MHB 666:23
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.
verse:
. Dza ofir nokwar akomam', 
Enyidzi suro a wɔdze hwɛ W',
Sua a yesua, n-tam a yɛka,
Hɛn Wura Jesus, pen do gye.
 
. Dza W'enyi ehwiram' ehu 
Dɛ ogu hɛn afɔr ho fi n',
Yɛakotow komm wɔ W'enyim yi,
Hɛn Wura Jesus, fa kyɛ hɛn.

name: MHB 666:4
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.
verse:
. Kyerɛ hɛn ma yɛngye akra nkwa, 
Na yɛnkata bɔn mpempem do,
Yensi Christ Ne penkyɛr kwan n' mu,
Na yensuasua N' yɛnye N' nsɛ daa. Amen.

name: MHB 667:1
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, da a 'dze kyɛɛ hɛn n' asa, 
Sum etsin W'asɛm do rehyɛ;
Yɛtoow hɛn anapa ndwom maa Wo
W'abɔdzin bɛtsew hen nda ho.

name: MHB 667:2
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Ndaase nka W' dɛ W' Asɔr risi pi, 
Ber a wiadze rokɔ kan mu;
W' Asɔr roweɔn wɔ wiadze nyina,
Ɔnngye n' ahom dabiara pɛn.

name: MHB 667:3
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Aber a 'napawi hyerɛn ka 
N-kurow a wɔda ham' na pom',
Asɔryɛ ndze ɔda ho ara,
Ayɛyindwom ɔmmbɔ adze da.

name: MHB 667:4
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Ewia rinyan hɛn enuanom a 
Wɔtse anee ber a yɛadeda;
Dɔnhwer nyina ano fofor ma
Wɔtse Wo nyɛe nwanwa n' wɔ sor.

name: MHB 667:5
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Ɔnyɛ dɛm daa, hɛn Wura; W'ahengua 
Nnkotwam' da dɛ amansuon tum;
W'ahenman betsim hɔ akɛpem dɛ
Ibedzi adze nyina do hen.

name: MHB 668:1
title: Francis Pott, 1832-1909.
verse:
. Sor abɔfo ndze nye nsanku 
Twa W'ahengua ho,
Wɔwosow n-dwom dɛɛdɛw a
Ɔmmbɔ adze ara da;
M-pempem na wohyira Wo
Dɛ tum nyina 
Ewuradze.

name: MHB 668:2
title: Francis Pott, 1832-1909.
verse:
. Ɔwo a ewɔ sorsor noho 
Mbrɛ nyimpa nntum nnhu n',
Aso abɔn yɛtow ndwom a,
Ɔwo 'bu no bi?
Na yetum hu dɛ ebɛn hɛn
Na itsie hɛn?
Nyew, yetum.

name: MHB 668:34
title: Francis Pott, 1832-1909.
verse:
. Nyew, yenyim dɛ idzi ehurusi 
Wɔ W'edwinsa ho;
Eyɛɛ asowa na nsa na kɔmɛr
Dze maa W'ayɛyi;
Dwimfo nyansa, sanku ne dɛw,
Ne nyina bɔm' ma W'
Enyigye.
 
. Tumfo Nyame, Woara Wodze 
Na yɛdze brɛ Wo,
Ɔmmfata dze, naaso yɛserɛ
Dɛ gye n' dɛmara:
'Koma, adwen, nsa, na kɔmɛr,
Yɛdze bɔm' wɔ
Hɛn ndwom pam'.

name: MHB 668:5
title: Francis Pott, 1832-1909.
verse:
. Tum nye enyidzi nye enyimnyam. 
Bɛyɛ Wodze daa,
Egya, Ba, na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn,
Ɔkorsa siarfo.
Dza edze ama no mu mapa n',
Na sor na ase
San dze ma W'.    Amen.

name: MHB 669:1
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. EWURADZE pa, adasa Egya,
Fa hɛn m-fom kyɛ hɛn;
Ma hɛn adwen a ɔfata
Wɔ abrabɔ krɔnkrɔn som mu,
Wɔ enyidzi ayɛyi mu.

name: MHB 669:2
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Yɛntwer Wo tse dɛ hɔn a wɔtsee
Wɔ Syrian epo ho n',
Ewuradze N'adom frɛ no;
Mma hɛn so yɛnnka asɛm biara,
Na yɛnsoɛr ndzi W'ekyir.

name: MHB 669:3
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. O Galilee ahomgye da
O mbepɔw do kommyɛ,
Mbrɛ Jesus buu n-kotodwe!
Na ɔkaa onnyiewiei ho nsɛm,
Ɔdze ɔdɔ kyerɛɛ ase!

name: MHB 669:4
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Dɛ kommyɛ a no mu dɔ no
Bor hɛn nsɛm nye ndwuma do;
Wo frɛ a ɔwasa bɔkɔɔ no,
Dɛm na ma Wo nhyira no ngu
Dɛ Wo manna tɔe no.

name: MHB 669:5
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Ma Wo bɔsu nkɔ do nsosɔ
Nkɛpem hɛn aperdzi ewiei!
Yi hɛn akra adzesoa no,
Na hɛn bra a ahyehyɛ ama hɛn nka
W'asomdwee ne fɛw no.

name: MHB 669:6
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Gu ahom gu hɛn apɛdze do,
Wo kommyɛ eduyɛ mu,
Adwen ntaa dzinn, honam nyɛ komm;
'Saasewosow, ehum nye gya m'
Yɛntse Wo ndze tseaa no.

name: MHB 67:1
title: Johann Scheffler, 1624-77
verse:
. EPO pa a no mu dɔ Nyame!
Woana nnkɛfa n'akoma ama W'?
Na ɔnnkɛfa n'ahoɔdzen adɔ W'?
O Jesus, adasa Dɔfo,
Woana nnkɛpɛ dɛ ɔdze ne kra,
N'adwen, n'ahoɔdzen bata W' ho?

name: MHB 67:2
title: Johann Scheffler, 1624-77
verse:
. Wo hyerɛn no mmbɔ adze da
Wɔ gya a ɔnnhyehye enyim;
'Bɔfo dze ntsaban bua hɔn enyim. 
Naaso W'adɔe tse dɛ mframa,
Ɔbɔ fa Wo ndwuma nyina do,
Ɔhwetse ber a W'ewia pue.

name: MHB 67:3
title: Johann Scheffler, 1624-77
verse:
. Imuna a, ahodwuruw ma
'Saase, hɛll na sor edum hinhim;
Tum a ɔyɛ hu yɛ Wodze,
Woana botum akyerɛ ɔdɔ a
Ɔtwe Wo bɛn emi dɛm yi,
Kesi dɛ ebɛyɛ medze?

name: MHB 67:4
title: Johann Scheffler, 1624-77
verse:
. Ɔwo a idzi hen wɔ sorsor
Wɔ ndzɛmba na adze nyina do;
Edze dɛw hyɛ hɔn nyinara m',
Naaso 'pɛ dɛ eba me nkyɛn. 
Na gya m' taataa dɛ menye Wo
Bedzi hen dɛw mu afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 67:5
title: Johann Scheffler, 1624-77
verse:
. Bura pa! Nhyira nyina pem
Fi Wo hɔ; W'amayɛ nnyim hia,
Ebɛnadze na Ɔwo hwehwɛ?
Naaso hweeara mpo nnhia Wo da;
M'akoma a ɔmmfata yi,
Iyi ara na ehwehwɛ.

name: MHB 67:6
title: Johann Scheffler, 1624-77
verse:
. Tsetsentsetredee Ɔhoɔfɛfo!
Kan mba a hɔn ho yɛ fɛw, mbakan
Hu Wo a, hɔn 'nyimnyam hyerɛn pa:
W'enyi bɛyɛ dɛn aba mo do,
Ɔbaa ba a wonyinseen n' bɔn mu, 
Sunsuma, ahataw nye nwin?

name: MHB 67:7
title: Johann Scheffler, 1624-77
verse:
. Sɛ ebɔ Wo tsir adze ara a,
Hɛll nsordaafo hɔn ho popo; 
Wonyim yie dɛ Nyame Tumfo
Nye asaase, hɛll na sor Hen:
Woana n'atar m'bɔgya nye yi?

name: MHB 67:8
title: Johann Scheffler, 1624-77
verse:
. Nyame pa, epo a no mu dɔ!
Woana nnkɛfa n'akoma ama W'? 
Woana nnkɛfa no tum adɔ W'?
O Jesus, adasa Dɔfo,
Woana nnkɛfa ne kra adɔ W'?
N'adwen, 'hoɔdzen bata Wo ho.

name: MHB 670:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. JESUS, hɛn enyigye nyina,
Ɔwo a yɛma hɛn ndze do ma W',
Yɛdze hɛn ahoɔdzen ma W',
Ma adom a yɛserɛ ahobrɛadze mu
N-dan nyɛ ndaase ara nko,
Na ɔnsesa Wo nkorɔfo.

name: MHB 670:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛbɔ m' yɛ ɔsor edwuma yi,
W'enyimnyam no nyɛ hɛn botae;
W'enyimnyam, nnyɛ hɛndze,
Yɛnkɔ do n-hwɛ hɛn ewiei.
Yɛnkɔ do ndzi dwuma a ɔsɔ enyi,
Na aasɔ Nyame nko enyi.

name: MHB 670:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Mma ahantan, enyitsew bɔn
Nnwiawia hɔnho mmba mu mmbɛsɛɛ,
Mmbɛhyɛ Wo ebufuw;
Onngu hɛn adwontow ho fi,
Na wɔmma hɛn som no nnyɛ gyan,
Na wɔnnsɛɛ, hɛn afɔrbɔ.

name: MHB 670:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O ma hɛn nkwa nda nyinara
Yɛmfa kommyɛ dɛw a fɛr wɔ m'
Nda Wo dɔ no edzi;
Yɛmma hɛn konyim do wɔ wu m'!
Yɛnye ɔsor dɔm nyina ntow ndwom,
Ɔsor ndwom a ɔmmbɔ adze n'.

name: MHB 671:1
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Hom ntow Alleluia nkyerɛ hom ndaase, 
Ao, ɔsor mba, hom mfa ndze dɛɛdɛw nhur
Alleluia a ɔmmbɔ adze.

name: MHB 671:2
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Kuro krɔnkrɔn no bɛgye hom ndwom no do, 
Na wɔdze ehurusi ndwom enyan
Alleluia a ɔmmbɔ adze.

name: MHB 671:3
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Hɔ na hom bɔbɔm' atow afebɔɔ, 
Ndwom a ɔkyerɛ hom Hen N'enyimnyam,
Alleluia a ɔmmbɔ adze.

name: MHB 671:4
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Iyi nye afonafo hɔn ahomgye, 
Edziban na nsu a obi nnkehia,
Alleluia a ɔmmbɔ adze.

name: MHB 671:56
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Bɔadze a eyɛ adze nyina Yɛfo, 
Yɛdze ndwom bɔ de yi W' ayɛ afebɔɔ
Alleluia a ɔmmbɔ adze.
 
. Ɔdomankoma Ba, yɛma hɛn ndze do ma W'; 
Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, hɛn nyina bɔm' tow Wo
Alleluia a ɔmmbɔ adze.

name: MHB 672:1
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. GYEFO, Agyenkwa siarfo;
Tsie hɛn adwontow;
Hɛn akoma na ndze da m'
Yi hɛn Hen ayɛw,
Dza yɛwɔ ma W' biara,
Yɛwɔ enyidar dɛ
Nyimpadua, kra, sunsum,
Yɛdze ne nyina ma W'.

name: MHB 672:2
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. Hɛn enyim ara na, Christ,
Yɛba dze bɛn Wo;
Yɛsɔr Wo enyidzi m',
Na yɛkotow Wo,
Osian hɛn nkwagye ntsi
Ɔwo 'bae bowui;
Edzi hɛn enyim kan
Wɔ sor dɛ yɛmfa W'.

name: MHB 672:3
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. Ɔsor kandzea no pue
Hɛn enyim hyɛnn ara,
Ɔdze fakyɛ ho nsɛm
Pam hɛn awerɛhow;
Abrabɔ sum ahera,
Kan hyerɛn hɛn mu;
Edze Wo kan ahyerɛn
Hɛn bɔ wiadze 'i do.

name: MHB 672:4
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. Yɛkɔ hɛn enyim ara
Wɔ hɛn akwantu n' mu,
Kwan a 'hotsewfo duaa m'
Dzii kan Nyame fie;
Yengyaa wiadze ekyir,
Yɛmpem nkɔ kan ara;
Yennkobu hɛn kɔn 'kyir,
Na yeenya ahenkyɛw n'.

name: MHB 672:5
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. Gyefo, gya akra a apon hɛn
Ma yɛnkɔ sor ara;
Hɛn werɛ mfir wiadze fona,
Yɛmbɛn hɛn ahenman n',
Bea a 'hotsewfo, abɔfo,
Bɔ m' tow ndwom dɛw mu;
Wɔmmberɛ, wɔmmfona ara wɔ
Hɛn Hen N'ayɛyi m'.

name: MHB 673:1
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.
verse:
. ESUSOW ewia robɔ 
Po nye asaase do;
Enyigye kan rehyerɛn
A wɔdze ma kwa.
Biribiara ridzi dɛw
Wɔ kan fɛɛfɛw mu;
Wiadze ndze mpempem nyina
Tow ayɛyi ndwom.

name: MHB 673:2
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.
verse:
. Nyame No mbɔbɔrhu
Wɔ wiadze nyina,
Na Ne frankaa rihim
Wɔ mbea nyinara,
Ɔtserɛw, ɔyɛ enyimnyam,
Ɔtse dɛ ɔsor
Ne bɛkyebo dɔ no,
Ɔhyerɛn konyimdzi m'.

name: MHB 673:3
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.
verse:
. Ewuradze, hue Wo kan
Gu hɛn enyifura do;
Osian W'ayamuyie ntsi
Ma yɛndɔ W' mbordo.
Na mununkum boa ano
Tumm wɔ sor mpo a,
Yi nkataenyim n' fi hɔ,
Egya, twe bɛn hɛn.

name: MHB 673:4
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 674:1
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. O NYAME Dɔ! Wo daa nserɛmɛn
Hyerɛn enyiwa a onnhu adze do,
Na ihyira hɛn wɔ adaaso m',
Yɛdan Wo gya a, Wo so gyaa hɛn.

name: MHB 674:2
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Akra a wɔper hwehwɛ W' nyina
Ikenyan akoma a ɔbɔ mpaa;
Sum mu o, kan mu o, Wo gyirama gya n'
Sisi ebusua nye aman do.

name: MHB 674:3
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Innyim ɔhe ɔnye gyedzi,
W'adom tsen du obiara do;
Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn n'atasaban no,
Gyina etsir nyinara do.

name: MHB 674:4
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Nokwar a nkɔnhyɛfo hunii no,
Wɔhwehwɛe, wohum wɔ hɔn mu;
Ɔdɔ mbra a ɔbor mbra nyina do,
Abrabɔ bunkam wu, bɔn do.

name: MHB 674:5
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92
verse:
. Hyerɛn, Nyame Kan! Yi Woho edzi
Kyerɛ hɔn a wohu amandze nyina;
Ma ɔnkyɛn dza hɛn enyi da do n',
Fa Wo dɔ sɛɛ hɛn apɛdze.

name: MHB 675:1
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. JESUS, bea a Wo nkorɔfo hyia nyina,
Wohu W'ehumbɔbɔr egua hɔ;
Bea a wɔhwehwɛ Wo, wohu Wo,
Na beebiara yɛ krɔnkrɔn bea.

name: MHB 675:2
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Ɔwo a wonntum nnsiw Wo kwan,
Etse ahobrɛadze akoma m';
Wɔdze Wo ba beebi a wɔba,
Wɔdze Wo kɔ hɔn efiefi.

name: MHB 675:3
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Hɔn a woeyi hɔn hɔn Hwɛfo pa,
Yɛ Wo kan mbɔrbɔrhu fofor,
Wo nkwagye dzin a ɔyɛ dɛw n',
Hɛn akoma paa mu ka wɔ ha.

name: MHB 675:4
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Yɛbɔsɔ mpaabɔ tum ahwɛ,
Ahyɛ gyedzi nye nhwɛdo dzen;
Akyerɛkyerɛ hɛn apɛdze a abotow
Ma yeehu dza ɔwɔ sor nyina.

name: MHB 675:5
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.
verse:
. Owura, yesuar naaso Ɔwo bɛn,
Wo nsa nnyɛ tsia, W'aso nnsiwii;
O fi ɔsor bra famu ntsɛm,
Bɛfa akoma mpem yɛ Wodze.

name: MHB 676:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Hɛn Nyame yɛ Kɛse, 
N'ayɛyi nyɛ kɛse;
Ɔyɛ N'asɔrasɔr Ne fie,
N' egua a N'enyi gye mu.

name: MHB 676:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. N'adom Asɔrfi horow, 
Mbrɛ wodua yɛ fɛw a!
Hɛn asaase do enyidzi,
Hɛn man twitwagyefo.

name: MHB 676:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Zion na wonyim dɛ 
Nyame yɛ guansumabew;
Mbrɛ No nkwagye esi ahyerɛn
Wɔ n'ahemfie nyina a.

name: MHB 676:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ɔhaw fofor biaram'! 
Yɛbɛkɛhyɛ Ne fie;
Yɛbɔdwen N'adom nwanwa n' ho,
Na hɔ yɛanhwehwɛ ɔgye.

name: MHB 677:1
title: William Bullock, 1798-1874
verse:
. Nyame, Yɛdɔ Wo Fie, 
Mbrɛ W'enyidzi wɔ no;
Wo tsenabea no mu dɛw
Kyɛn wiadze dɛw nyina.

name: MHB 677:2
title: William Bullock, 1798-1874
verse:
. Ɔyɛ m-paabɔ fie, 
Mbrɛ Wo nkowaa dzi ehyia;
Na 'Wo, Ewuradze,
Eba behyira Wo mba.

name: MHB 677:3
title: William Bullock, 1798-1874
verse:
. Yɛdɔ n-kwasɛm no; 
Ɔma hɛn asomdwee,
Nye dzenhyɛ wɔ ko mu,
Nye dɛw a ɔmmbɔ adze.

name: MHB 677:4
title: William Bullock, 1798-1874
verse:
. Yɛdɔ dɛ yɛtow ndwom 
Kamfo Wo mbɔbɔrhu;
Na mbom yɛpɛ yeesua
Ɔsor konyimdzi ndwom.

name: MHB 677:5
title: William Bullock, 1798-1874
verse:
. Hɛn Wura Jesus, dom hɛn 
Ma yɛndɔ Wo mbordo,
Na ndaamba yeebohu
Na yaasom Wo sor hɔ.    Amen.

name: MHB 678:1234
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Sor wiadze horow Nyame, 
Mbrɛ Wo dɔ tsenabea
Na ase ha asɔrfi
Dua yɛ fɛw yɛ ahomka a!
M'akoma per
Ba Wo tsebea
Ama oeehu
Me Nyankopɔn.
 
. Ao, akra esiarfo na  
Wɔsɔr bea a Nyame tsie,
Ao, esiarfo nye hɔn 
A wɔsom wɔ hɔ daa!
Wɔtonton Wo,
Wɔyɛ esiarfo
Hɔn a wɔfow
Zion kokwaa n'!
 
. Wofi ahomm' kɔ ahom mu, 
Wɔ nyinsu bɔnsa yim',
Kɛpem dɛ obiara dzi nyim,
Kɛpem dɛ obiara pue sor,
'Nyimnyam egua!
Hɛn Hen Nyame
Dze hɛn pɛ anan
Dze bodu hɔ.
 
. Nyame nye hɛn 'kokyɛm, 
Hɛn kan na akoban;
Ne nsamu akyɛdze ma,
Yenya hɛn nhyira fir mu
Ɔbɔdom hɛn
Nkorɔfo nyina
Nkwagye adom,
Nye enyimnyam so.

name: MHB 678:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Nyame dɔ No nkorɔfo, 
Hɔn a wɔsɔ N'enyi n'
Akra krɔnkrɔn botoo n',
Ɔnnkan hɔn Ne ndzepa:
Nyia ne kra twer
Dɔm Ewuradze 
Wo nkotoo n', yɛ 
Siarfo mprɛnsa.

name: MHB 679:123
title: Henry Frances Lyte, 1793-1847.
verse:
. Wo sor abangua yɛ fɛw, 
Wɔ kan na dɔ man no mu;
Ha so W'abangua yɛ fɛw,
Wɔ bɔn na mbusu man yim'
Ao, mo sunsum no kɔn dɔ
W'asɔrmba hɔn fɛkuwbɔ,
W'enyim ne hyerɛn fɛɛfɛw n',
W'amayɛ n', Adom Nyame!
 
. Abɔso Nyame, nnoma a 
Wosu kyin Wo fie, woewie!
Na akra a wɔhom sor Egya
No bom' no, woewie dodow!
Wɔtse dɛ ebubur n' a
Oennya 'saase do sibea n',
Wɔsan kɔ hɔn hɛn no mu,
Hɔ na hɔn enyi gye daa.
 
. Woewie ampa! hɔn ayɛyi 
Pem mbusu bɔnsa 'i mu mpo;
N-su pue sar do ma hɔn,
Edziban fi sor nyɛn hɔn.
Wofi ahom mu kɔ ahom mu,
Dze kodu W'ahengua n' ho;
W'anan ho na wobom som,
'Wo a agye hɔn ne nyinam'.

name: MHB 679:4
title: Henry Frances Lyte, 1793-1847.

name: MHB 68:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. OBI nnsɛ Jeshurun Nyame,
No ho yɛ dzen, ɔkrɔn;
Hwɛ! Ɔtserɛw Ne ntsaban mu,
Ɔnantsew wɔ wimu!
Israel ɔnye N'abakan;
'Tumfo Nyame yɛ wodze,
Ofi sor robɔbor wo,
Nyame a bor adze nyina do.

name: MHB 68:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Jehovah Kɛse pɛ dɛ
Ɔboa na ɔgye wo;
Daa Nyankopɔn wowaw wo,
Wo Bɔfo, wo Nyɛnko;
Israel ɔbɛn na isuro?
Mbusu biara rennhaw wo,
Abasa a ɔwɔ hɔ daa n',
Aka wo efua yie.

name: MHB 68:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 68:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Aperdzi nyina abɔ adze,
Akokoeko egyaa;
Israel nnkɛyɛ bɔn bio da,
Na ɔbɛtsena asomdwee mu;
N'atamfo nyinara kɔ,
Bɔn nnyi kyɛfa wɔ no mu,
Israel nko bɛtsena hɔ a
Jesus wɔ n'akoma m'.

name: MHB 68:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Israel woehyira wo!
Ɔman bɛn nye wo sɛ?
Jesus agye w' efi bɔn m',
Ennkɛtsena bɔn mu bio,
Jesus nye w' kyɛm mpɛm esuon;
W'afowa a gya wɔ ano,
Nyame Tumfo Asɛm bedzi
Wiadze, bɛn na hɛll do.

name: MHB 680:12
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. M'akoma dzii ehurusi 
Dɛ me mfɛfo see dɛ,
Bra ma yɛnkɔ Nyame Ne fie;
Afahyɛ da nye ndɛ.
 
. Hɛn anan bɛyɛ ntsɛm 
Ahɛn asɔrdan nom'
Ber a mobra na mpanyin pii
Rehyɛ som-bea no ma.

name: MHB 680:3
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Ebusua wɔtɔ dɛ 
Wɔbɔ punkum ba ha;
Ehumbɔbɔr egua n'enyim
Wɔdze dɛw kotow hɔ.

name: MHB 680:45
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Sɔr ma Jerusalem, 
Nyankopɔm ahenkurow n';
Nyame ntɔ Ne nhyira ngu hɔn a
Wɔdɔ Ne fie papa.
 
. Ha 'i dze wɔmma koryɛ 
Na asomdwee ntsintsim daa;
Zion, ahonya pii nhyehyɛ
W'ahemfi amaama.

name: MHB 680:6
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Hɛn afɛ nye enuanom 
Nnkɛpa hɛn mpaayim' da;
Wohyiam' asɔryɛm' ara pem a
Nyame mma N'asomdwee!  Amen.

name: MHB 681:1
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847
verse:
. MBƆBƆRHU nye adom Nyame,
Da W'enyim ne hyerɛn edzi;
Hyerɛn hɛn do, Gyefo, hyerɛn,
Ma Wo kan nhyerɛn W'asɔr mu,
Ma Wo nkwagye ahoɔdzen
Ondu wiadze beebiara.

name: MHB 681:2
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847
verse:
. Ma nkorɔfo no nyi W' ayɛw,
Hɔn a wɔtse ase ntonton Wo;
Ma aman no ntsea m' ntow ndwom,
Enyimnyam nka Hen Gyefo!
Mfa hɔn adwontow mbra W'enyim,
Wobetsie Wo pɛ krɔnkrɔn n'.

name: MHB 681:3
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 682:1
title: Eliza Fanny Goffe Morris, 1821-74.
verse:
. MBƆBƆRHU nye adom Nyame,
'Hobrɛadze m' yɛhwɛ W'enyim,
Fi ɔsor Wo tsenabea
    Tsie, fa kyɛ, gye nkwa.

name: MHB 682:2
title: Eliza Fanny Goffe Morris, 1821-74.
verse:
. Yehyia W'asɔrdan no mu
Dze dza yehia ba W'enyim,
Serɛ wɔ W' mbɔbɔr egua enyim;
   Fi ɔsor gye hɛn.

name: MHB 682:3
title: Eliza Fanny Goffe Morris, 1821-74.
verse:
. Wo dɔ hyɛ akoma ma,
Na yɛpɛ ayɛ Wo pɛ;
Wɔkɔ W' koko krɔnkrɔn n' do,
  Owura, suo m', gye nkwa.

name: MHB 682:4
title: Eliza Fanny Goffe Morris, 1821-74.
verse:
. Yɛman fi Wo nguankuw ho
Na hɛn dɔ ma Wo yɛ nwin a,
Fa mbɔbɔr enyi hwɛ hɛn;
  Fa kyɛ na gye nkwa.

name: MHB 682:5
title: Eliza Fanny Goffe Morris, 1821-74.

name: MHB 682:6
title: Eliza Fanny Goffe Morris, 1821-74.
verse:
. Mbrɛ hɛn sufrɛ tse biara,
Yɛma hɛn akoma do ma W' a,
Yi hɛn adzesoa fi hɔ!
Tsie, fa kyɛ, gye nkwa.  Amen.

name: MHB 683:1
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769
verse:
. HWƐ, Nyame wɔ ha! Yɛntonton N'
Na yenhu dɛ bea yi yɛ hu!
Dza ɔwɔ hɛn mu nyina ntse No tum,
Wɔmbɔ hɔn mu adze komm N'enyim;
Hɔn a wonyim No tum, N'adom
Dze suro som No, dze enyidzi dɔ N'.

name: MHB 683:2
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769
verse:
. Hwɛ, Nyame wɔ ha! Ɔno na
Abɔfo adwontofo tow N' ndwom,
Ɔno na wɔakrɔn N' ɔsorsor;
Ɔsor dɔm dze ayɛyi ma N',
Ewuradze, mma mmpow hɛn ndwom no,
Gyirama a ɔdodow yi W' ayɛw.

name: MHB 683:3
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769
verse:
. Atseasefo mu Ɔtseasenyi,
Hɛn ayɛyi mfow ndu Wo nkyɛn, 
Ma yɛnda ho ngyina W'enyim,
Yɛnda ho ntse, yɛnyɛ Wo pɛ;
Hɛn adwen nyina mbra Wo do,
Mma nngyaa dɛ egye hɛn afɔr.

name: MHB 683:4
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ nhyiren paa na ɔgye
Ewia ne hyew enyigye mu n',
Ma hɛn nsa nka Wo kan biara,
Na ma Wo tum no nkenyan hɛn;
Eyɛ bɛkyebo kan mu Kan,
Ogya a ɔhyew na okenyan

name: MHB 684:123
title: William Pennefather, 1816-73.
verse:
. Jesus, fa wusoɛr tum n' 
Gyina hɛn finimfin;
Ma hɛn asɔryɛ yi
Ɔnyɛ mber krɔnkrɔn.
 
. Hue Wo Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn 
Gu akoma nyina do;
Tu suro na yaw fi
Akra nyina mu.
 
. Na yebemia mu dzen 
Yeetu hɛn kwan yi,
Dɛ hɛn enyiwa da
Bɛkyebo da n' kwan.   Amen.

name: MHB 685:1
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. HOM nsoɛr nhyira Ewuradze,
Hom nyimpa a woeyi hom,
Hom nsoɛr mfa akoma, kra nye ndze
Nhyira Ewuradze, Nyakopͻn.

name: MHB 685:2
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Ͻsén ayɛyi nyina dze,
Ͻbor nhyira nyina do dze;
Woana na onnkosuro Ne dzin,
Nnyi N’ aysw, nnkamfo No?

name: MHB 685:3
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Nkyɛ ogya a onndum da
Fi N’afͻrmbukyia do
Aaka hɛn ano, ekenyan hɛn,
Dze hɛn adwen eetsim sor!

name: MHB 685:4
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Hͻ ͻbrɛ N’aso adze
Dze tsie ndwom a yɛtow;
Onnyi Noho nnkyérɛ nyimpa dze,
Hɛn sunsum tse Ne nka.

name: MHB 685:5
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Nyame nye hɛn ahoͻdzen,
No nkwagye yɛ hɛndze;
Yɛdze hɛn ahoͻdzen nyina
Bɛka No dͻ ho asɛm.

name: MHB 685:6
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Hom nsoͻɛ nhyira Ewuradze,
Hom ntonton Ewuradze;
Hom nsoɛr nhyira N’enyimnyam dzin n’,
Ofi ndɛ nye daa nyina.

name: MHB 686:1
title: Henry Montagu Butler, 1833-1918.

name: MHB 686:2
title: Henry Montagu Butler, 1833-1918.
verse:
. Yɛma do kɔ sor sen mfe a abɛsen n',
Bɔn a ogu hɛn ho fi, suro a ɔhyɛ hɛn do,
Ekyingye bɔw nye dɔ aprɔw mu,
Kan Wura, yɛma hɛn akoma do ndɛ.

name: MHB 686:3
title: Henry Montagu Butler, 1833-1918.
verse:
. Akɔhwi nye enyiwa atɛkyɛ,
Ndzeyɛɛ nye nsusui a ɔnnhyɛ enyimnyam,
Tɛkyerɛma a ɔdodow asɛnka ho,
Nokwar Wura, yi Christianfo fi mu.

name: MHB 686:4
title: Henry Montagu Butler, 1833-1918.
verse:
. Ma akyɛdze biara a edze ama no do;
Adze pa da famu a, gyedɛ wɔama do,
Akoma nye adwen a wɔakyekyer da famu,
Nyame dze mae, na ɔsan kɔ Ne nkyɛn.

name: MHB 686:5
title: Henry Montagu Butler, 1833-1918.

name: MHB 687:1
title: James Robert Batey, 1878-
verse:
. MOBϽ mo mu adze komm W’enyim,
Bra na besiesie me kra na
Ͻmfata dɛ odzi sor edziban,
Mo Wura, nkwa, m’adze nyina.

name: MHB 687:2
title: James Robert Batey, 1878-
verse:
. Ͻwo nyim mo mu adwembͻn,
Ͻmma munntum minndzi nyim koraa,
Wͻ nankasa ͻnye bͻn do;
Mo Wura, nkwa, m’adze nyina.

name: MHB 687:3
title: James Robert Batey, 1878-

name: MHB 687:4
title: James Robert Batey, 1878-
verse:
. Minnyi tum ka Wodze nko ho,
Boa ma memfa m’akoma mma Wo;
Dzi me bra do, fa yɛ ahengua,
Mo Wura, nkwa, m’adze nyina.

name: MHB 687:5
title: James Robert Batey, 1878-

name: MHB 688:1
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.
verse:
. NYAME hɛn Egya, Ɔwo ayɛ hɛn kor,
Akoma fam akoma ho, wɔ Wo Dɔba n' mu;
Yeridzi mpaa m' na obiara akɔ no kwan,
Ma ano na ndze biara nyi W' ayɛw.

name: MHB 688:2
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.
verse:
. Ayɛyi nka Wo hɛn fɛkuwbɔ ntsi,
Akoma, kra, nye adwen fɛkuwbɔ;
Ayɛyi nka Wo, ɔdɔ nuayɛ ntsi,
Koryɛ a ndzepa Wura edze ba n' ntsi.

name: MHB 688:3
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.
verse:
. Owura, hyɛ dzen na Wo nko na inyim,
Inyim mber a yeguan fi atamfo enyim;
Mpɛn dodow a yɛkɔ sum mu nsɔhwɛ mu n',
Yɛyew Wo tum nye W' nsa aɔda hɛn do.

name: MHB 688:4
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.
verse:
. Ewuradze, ofi ndɛ kɔ nye hɛn nkɔ,
Ka hɛn ho wɔ hɛn daa dwumadzi mu;
Ber a eka hɛn ho n' obira bohu
Dɛ ɔsor nhyira hyɛ ase wɔ ha.

name: MHB 689:1
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.
verse:
. 'EWimbir ansaana wi rotɔ n' 
Ewuradze, nna ayarfo gu W' nkyɛn;
Ao, yaw horow bɛn nna ɔannka hɔn!
Ao, dɛw bɛn nna wɔammfa annkɔ!

name: MHB 689:2
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.
verse:
. Bio, edu 'wimbir, na hɛn so 
Yɛdze yarba horow twe pin;
Sɛ Yennhu wo mpo a, ɔyɛ dɛn?
Yenyim na yɛtse dɛ 'wɔ ha.

name: MHB 689:3
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.
verse:
. Agyenkwa Christ, pam hɛn mbusu, 
Na binom abɔm,
Na binom nndɔɔ W' nokwar mu pɛn,
Binom so ayew dɔ a wonyae.

name: MHB 689:4
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.
verse:
. Binom hu dɛ wiadze yɛ gyan, 
Naaso wonntum mmfi wiadze nsa;
Binom hɔn mfɛfo how hɔn werɛ,
Naaso wɔmmfaa Ɔwo nnyɛɛ nyɛnko.

name: MHB 689:5
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.
verse:
. Ewuradze hɔn nyina serɛ ahomgye, 
Na wobefi bɔn mu koraa;
Hɔn a wɔper asom Wo yie n'
Nna wohu bɔn a ɔwɔ hɔn mu.

name: MHB 689:6
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: MHB 689:7
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.
verse:
. Wo nsaano wɔ tum dɛ tsetse n', 
W'anomusɛm biara nnkefir gyan;
Ewimbir bɔw nwinwin yim' tsie,
Na W'ehumbɔbɔbɔrm' sa hɛn yar.

name: MHB 69:12
title: Joseph Hart, 1712-68.
verse:
. Oyi nye Nyame a yɛsɔr No n', 
Hɛn Dɔfo pa a ɔnnsakyer da n',
No dɔ so dɛ No tum kɛse n',
Onnyi mbanano, nnyi ewiei.
 
. Jesus, Kandzifo, Kyirdzifo n', 
No Sunsum dze hɛn bodu fie;
Yeyi N' ayɛw wɔ dza etwam',
Yɛtwer No wɔ dza ɔreba.

name: MHB 690:1
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. HԐN ayɛyi da asa,
Ewimbir sum aba,
Na sɛ ewia tͻ a, mum mmfi hɛn nkyɛm;
Adze nyina m’ nokwar kan.

name: MHB 690:2
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Ͻsor ahengua no ho.
Mbrɛ adze nnsa da no,
Nsankubͻfo hyɛ ntar fitaa,
Tow Wo ndwom daa nyina.

name: MHB 690:3
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Hɛn adwontow ya mberɛw,
Yɛbérɛ ayɛyi mu ntsɛm;
Na sor adwontofo no dze
Hͻn ndwom dzi mu, yɛ dɛw.

name: MHB 690:4
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Naaso Ewuradze, Ͻwo pɛ
Dɛ edan hɛn Akoma a,
Hɛn so yɛbͻtow ndwom kakra
Aka abͻfo ndwom ho.

name: MHB 690:5
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Ͻwo na edwedwé akra,
Na etwé etuatsewfo nyina,
Na ema ayɛyi hyɛ hɛn bra ma,
Dze hyɛ Wo dzin enyimnyam.

name: MHB 690:6
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Aka kumaa bi ma
Enyimnyam ewiei no aba,
Ma abͻfo na nyimpa hͻn ndwom
Aabͻ m’ W’ayɛyi mu.

name: MHB 691:1
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. AGYENKWA, yɛma Wo dzin pa n’ do bio
Akoma kor m’ yɛtow hɛn mpaamudzi ayɛyi;
Yegyina hͻ hyira Wo ansaana yɛapon,
Na yɛkotow tweͻn W’asomdweesɛm no.

name: MHB 691:2
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Ma hɛn W’asomdwee bér a yɛrokͻ fie,
Yɛdze Wo hyɛɛ ase, na yɛdze W’ bowie;
Hɛn ano nnka bͻn, hɛn enyim nngu ase,
Na ofie yi mu na yeabͻ Wo dzin.

name: MHB 691:3
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Ma hɛn W’asomdwee, wͻ anafua yi mu,
Dan sum no ma ͻnye ekan mma hɛn,
Gye Wo mba fi ͻhaw nye mbusu mu,
Na sum nye kan nyina yɛ pɛr W’enyim.

name: MHB 691:4
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Ma hɛn W’asomdwee hɛn asetsena mu,
Hɛn awerɛhow mu na hɛn aperdzi mu,
Afei, ber a Wo ndze ma akodzi bͻ adze,
Ewuradze, frɛ hɛn kͻ W’asomdwee mu.

name: MHB 692:1
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 692:2
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Da no asa, ne mber etwa m',
Na Ɔwo nyim no mu nsɛm nyina;
Konyim kakra a adom dze bae n',
Oebu anohoba do, ahwe ase.

name: MHB 692:3
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Owura, gye hɛn fi akwan bɔn do,
Fakyɛ turodoo nye ɔgye;
Fa ahotsew nye asomdwee
Hyira hɛn ma ɔnsen nda no a etwa m'.

name: MHB 692:4
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Fa kyɛ mbordo, ma hɛn dɛw,
Suro mapa ɔnye fahodzi,
Na dɔ akoma a nkekae nnyi mu,
Dza ɔpɛ dɛ ɔnye Wo sɛ.

name: MHB 692:5
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Yɛfrɛ hɛn adɔfo nyina brɛ Wo
Ehiafo, 'werɛhofo, abɔn;
Ma W'ehumbɔbɔr n' mma hɛn dɛw,
'Wo nye hɛn Jesus, hɛn adze nyina.

name: MHB 693:1
title: John Fawcett, 1740-1817.

name: MHB 693:2
title: John Fawcett, 1740-1817.

name: MHB 694:1
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.
verse:
. EWURADZE, ayɛ hɛn tsenebea
Wɔ mbasantsen nyina mu;
Wo nkorɔfo da ho hu W'adom,
Woehyira W'awerɛkyekyer;
Etsie hɛn sufrɛ ber biara,
Yehu dɛ ebɛn ber biara,
Hɛn ahoɔdzen nye hɛn nkwagye.

name: MHB 694:2
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.
verse:
. Yɛtɔ dɛ yesu hɛn bɔn ho,
Yɛyɛ dze akyerɛ W'abotar,
Naaso yɛda ho kura W' gyedzi m'
Yɛda ho dɔ Wo dzin no;
Na akora hɛn na adɔ hɛn yie,
'Ma hɛn kwan dɛ yɛntsena Wo mu,
Na yennhinhim, yenntutu.

name: MHB 694:3
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.
verse:
. Ewuradze, biribiara nnkotum
Agye W' nkorɔfo efi Wo nsamu,
Hɛn Boafo nnkefi hɔ ara da;
Nyame nnkedzi hɛn huambɔ,
Wo nkorɔfo atsena Wo mu;
'Bɛda ho ayɛ hɛn tsenabea
Daa, afebɔɔ, afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 695:1
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847
verse:
. AYƐYI rotweɔn Wo Zion,
Mpaabɔ bɛhyɛ W'asɔrdan ma;
Nyimpa nyina bɛba W'egua ho,
Enya Christ mu nkwagye wɔ hɔ.

name: MHB 695:2
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847
verse:
. Hɛn sunsum fɔn, hɛn bɔn dzi nyim,
Mma hɛn ahopopo akoma nnsuro;
Ɔwo a itsie mpaabɔ, sian bra
Bɛyɛ ndzebɔnyɛfo nyɛnko.

name: MHB 695:3
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847
verse:
. W'ahotsewfo n' woehyira hɔn,
Wɔakora hɔn do, wɔnyɛn hɔn daa;
Asaase nye po nyina Agyenkwa,
Hɔn a wɔdan Wo nya enyigye.

name: MHB 695:4
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847
verse:
. Wo nsa na edze yɛɛ mbepɔw,
Wo ndze taa po asorɛkye dzinn;
'Napa, 'wimbir, woyi W'ayɛw,
Emaa asaase yii no ndɔbaa.

name: MHB 695:5
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847
verse:
. W'ayamuyie ahyɛ afe n' mu ma,
Wo mununkum tɔ asaase do nsu,
Wo mu sar pradada tow ndwom,
Abɔdze serew, ohu ne Hen.

name: MHB 695:6
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 696:1
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.
verse:
. HOM a hom yɛ ɔsor Hen mba,
Hom ntow ndwom hom akwantu mu;
Hom ntow hom Agyenkwa ayɛyi,
Enyimnyam wɔ No ndwuma m'.

name: MHB 696:2
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.
verse:
. Yerutu kwan akɔ Nyame nkyɛn,
Ɔkwan a egyanom faa do n'.
Hɔn enyi agye sesei,
Ɔnnkɛkyɛr na yeehu yi.

name: MHB 696:3
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.
verse:
. Okuw ketseaba, hom ntsea m',
Hom mbɔhom Jesus Ne nkyɛn,
Woesiesie hom ngua wɔ hɔ,
Hom ahenman nye akatua.

name: MHB 696:4
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.
verse:
. Hom mma hom enyi do, kan mba;
Zion kurow da hom enyim,
Hɔ, ɔbɛyɛ hɛn fie daa,
Yebohu hɛn Wura ntsɛm.

name: MHB 696:5
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.
verse:
. Enuanom, hom nyina mfa
Dɛw ngyina hom ahe do;
Jesus Christ, hom Egya Ne Ba n'
Hyɛ hom dɛ hom nkɔ kan ndam m'.

name: MHB 696:6
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.
verse:
. Ewuradze, yetsie kɔ kan,
Dze dɛw gya ne nyina wɔ ha,
Wo nko ara dzi hɛn bano
Na yebedzi W'ekyir daa.

name: MHB 697:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. NHYIRA nye akra abrɛfo a
Wohu hͻn hia dɛ wͻnnsɛ hwee;
Wͻama hͻn adom akyɛdze,
Nye dɛw ahenkyɛw a ͻwͻ sor.

name: MHB 697:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Nhyira nye hͻn a hͻn akoma ebubu,
Bͻn ntsi wodzi yaw wͻ hͻn mu;
Christ No bͻgyaa krͻnkrͻn pem dɛ
Ayarsa ma hͻn yaw nyinara.

name: MHB 697:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Nhyira nyé akra a wͻhwehwɛ adorn;
’Kͻm nye nsukͻm wo tsénenee ntsi,
Wͻdze nkwa nsu nye edziban
Bɛmema hͻn ama wͻaamee.

name: MHB 697:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Nhyira nye akomamutsewfo,
Woefi bͻn no tum no ase;
Wodze enyigyé a onnyi ewiei
Bohu Nyamé a ͻyɛ krͻnkrͻn.

name: MHB 697:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Nhyira nye amandzehufo,
Jesus ntsi wohu amandze;
Hͻn kra bedzi nyim Nyame mu.
'Nyimnyam, dɛw nye hͻn akatua.

name: MHB 698:1
title: Josua Stegmann, 1588-1632;
verse:
. OWURA Jesus, fa W‘adom no
Bɛtséna hɛn mu afebͻͻ,
Na mma yɛmma bͻn kwan koraa,
Na yɛnnhow Wo werɛ.

name: MHB 698:2
title: Josua Stegmann, 1588-1632;
verse:
. Fa W’asɛm bɛtsena hɛn mu.
Pomfo a yɛdͻ Wo;
Ma hɛn Wo mboa nye mbͻbͻrhu
Na tsenabew wͻ sor.

name: MHB 698:3
title: Josua Stegmann, 1588-1632;
verse:
. Fa Wo kan bɛtsena hɛn mu,
Kan a ͻhyérɛn hɛn do,
Na ma Wo nokwar nkyérɛ hɛn kwan,
Na amma yaannhwé ase.

name: MHB 698:4
title: Josua Stegmann, 1588-1632;
verse:
. ’Nye hɛn ntsena na hyira hɛn,
Asomdwee Ewuradze;
Adom na tum aahyɛ hɛn ma,
To hɛn gyedzi na dͻ m’.

name: MHB 698:5
title: Josua Stegmann, 1588-1632;
verse:
. Bɛtsena hɛn mu dɛ hɛn kyɛm,
Dzi Wo dͻm do Ͻsahen,
Na yeenngyaa hɛnho amma wiadze,
Na yemmfi hɛn gyinabew.

name: MHB 698:6
title: Josua Stegmann, 1588-1632;
verse:
. Bɛtséna hɛn mu wͻ dͻ mapa m’,
Yɛ hɛn Nyamé Agyenkwa;
Yɛnkyerɛ Wo mboa wͻ ahokyer mu,
Kora hɛn Wo mu nokwar m'.    Amen.

name: MHB 699:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. HƐN Pomfo, Wura yɛ kɛse,
Tum, nokwar nye adom mu;
Ɔsorsorfo tonton N' daa,
N'asɔrmba yi N' ayɛw.
Hɛn Nyankopɔn kurow no mu,
Bepɔw krɔnkrɔn a ɔwɔ ase n',
Hom mfa Ne dzin no ntahye,
Hom nda N' kɛseyɛ edzi.

name: MHB 699:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ewuradze, W'adɔyɛ ntsi
Yɛtsena W'asɔrdan mu,
Ha Wo nokwar dɔ no da
Wo nkwagye tum edzi;
Wo dzin ma yeyi W'ayɛw,
Na W'emudzi no hyerɛn,
Wiadze nyina bɛgye ato m',
Wo ndwuma yɛ krɔnkrɔn.

name: MHB 699:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hwɛ, Asɛmpa Asɔr n' tsim hɔ,
Na osi botan do;
N'anohoba yɛ nokwar,
Woana behim N'aban?
Kan no sombea a ɔsom bo;
Ka kyerɛ nkyirmba so bi.
Nyame tum abɔ ho ban,
Asɔr no ronnhwe ase.

name: MHB 699:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Zion Nyame yɛ hɛndze,
Hɛndze, yɛtwer No dɔ;
Yeehu Ne fakyɛ dɔ no,
Yɛtse ase, wu ma Christ:
Ɔbɛyɛ hɛn Kwankyerɛfo
'Kɔ Jerusalem fofor m';
Yɛgye N', na yɛhom No mu,
Wɔ mfesantsen nyin m'.

name: MHB 7:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O ƆSORSOR Hen, fi sor hwɛ famu ha,
Boa hen yɛntow W'ehumbɔbɔor nye dɔ,
Ɔrepem dɛ osunsuan ebunkam hɛn do,
Naaso gu do ara dze pii kã hɛn ho.

name: MHB 7:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hen nkwa Nyankopɔn, yɛtsew Wo dzin ho;
Hɛn edwuma nye dɛ yɛper tahye Wo dzin,
Gye hɛn ndaase wo adom a edze bɔɔ hɛn,
Atseasefo nyina bɛkyere W'ayɛyi.

name: MHB 7:34
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn Egya, hɛn Wura, eyɛ Otumfo,
W'asɛm a akora hɛn ntsi na yɛrosor yi;
Ndzepa a yenya nyina fi Wo nko hɔ ba,
Hɛn gyirama na hɛn nkwa yɛdze bɔsom Wo.
	
. Dza ɔkyen ne nyina, yetow W’ayamuyie.
Agye wiadze a ayew efi bɔn na yaw m'.
Edze Wo Ba abɔ werdam apon wiadze,
De omfa hen a yetwer No mbra hen sor fie.

name: MHB 7:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wo dɔ ntsi yɛtow ndwom dzi ehurusi.
Yɛnye sor abɔfo ma hɛn ndze do;
Agyedzifo nyina bɔtonton Wo dɔ
Mbersantsen mfesantsen a ɔmmbɔ adze da

name: MHB 70:1
title: Joachim Neander, 1650-80
verse:
. M'ENYIDAR wɔ Nyankopɔn mu;
Ɔyɛ me gyedzi fofor,
Ogya m' fa ɔbra adandan mu,
Oye na ɔyɛ nokwafo.
Wonnyim No,
No nkotoo,
Ɔfrɛ m'akoma Nedze.

name: MHB 70:2
title: Joachim Neander, 1650-80
verse:
. Nyimpa ahantan na n'enyimnyam, 
Afowa na ahenkyɛw sɛɛ no;
Ɔdze berɛ tow abantsentsen
Na ne nyina bubu gu famu,
Nyame tum,
Ber nyina nye
m'asɔrdan na abantsentsen.

name: MHB 70:3
title: Joachim Neander, 1650-80
verse:
. Nyame N'ayamuyie wɔ hɔ daa,
Ne nyansaa bor adwen do:
Enyimnyam, kan na nkwa fir no,
Ahoɔfɛw mapa fir no.
Afebɔɔ
Na No mu
Aman fofor soɛr som No.

name: MHB 70:4
title: Joachim Neander, 1650-80
verse:
. Otumfo Mafo no ma hɛn 
Ndzepa pii daa nyinara,
Hɛn akra enyi gye Ne pɛ ho,
'Nyigye gya hɛn bea a yɛkɔ.
No mu na
Ɔdɔ gyina;
Ɔma enyigye gyina.

name: MHB 70:5
title: Joachim Neander, 1650-80
verse:
. Adasa nkɔ do ara daa,
Mfa ayɛyi afɔrbɔ 
Mma ɔdomankoma Nyame,
 Wɔ Christ a ɔdze No mae,
Jesus frɛ
Obiara:
Nyia otsie No nnhwe ase.

name: MHB 700:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. NYIA no werɛ hyɛ Nyame m',
Na ɔtse bɔgya no tum n',
Gyina pintsinn wɔ ehumtu ber m'
Dɛ Nyame Ne bepɔw:
Onnhinhim, osi pi,
Ne Zion nnkodwuruw da;
N'agyedzifo gyina pintsinn
Wɔ Jesu No dɔ mu.

name: MHB 700:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ nkokwaa etwa
Jerusalem ho ehyia n',
Dɛm na Nyame bɔ hom ho ban
Fi atamfo nyina nsamu;
Ogyina akwan nyina m',
Twitwa gye N' Israel,
Na No tum nsamu na ɔdze
Hɔn akra sie afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 700:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ewuradze Domfo, ma
Wɔnda ho ntsena Wo mu,
Nkɛpem dɛ akra nyina ho bɛsan,
Na woedzi mu koraa;
Akomamutseweefo nyina
Kɔ do bɔ hɔn ho ban;
Yɛ hɔn yie, gye hɔn nkwa wɔ ha,
Na dɔ hɔn kɔ ewiei.

name: MHB 701:1
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.
verse:
. Asɔr ne fapem kortoo 
Nye Jesus Christ hɛn Wura;
Ɔnam nsu nye N'asɛm do
Yɛɛ n' N'abɔdze fofor.
Ofi sor bɔhwehɛɛ no.
Yɛɛ n' N'ayefor krɔnkrɔn.
Ɔdze No bɔgyaa tɔɔ no
No nkwa ntsi na owui.

name: MHB 701:2
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.
verse:
. Wɔpaam' yii n' aman nyinam', 
Naaso ɔyɛ Asɔr kor.
No nkwagye tum ɔnye yi-
Wura kor, gyedzi kor,
Dzin krɔnkrɔn kor na ohyira;
N'edziban krɔnkrɔn kor,
Enyidar kor na ɔper ho,
Adom nyina wɔ mu.

name: MHB 701:3
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.
verse:
. Sɛ mpo nyimpa si atwetwe 
Hwɛ N'ahokyer kɛse,
Dɛ mpaapaam' atsetsew mu
Nkyerɛkyerɛ bɔn tseetsee N' a,
Ahotsewfo n' weɔn, wosu
Dɛ, ondu da bɛn ara?
Anago su n' nnkyɛkyɛr na
Ɔadan anapa ndwom.

name: MHB 701:4
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.
verse:
. Berɛ nye amandzehu mu, 
N'akodzi dede n' mu,
Ɔtweɔn daadaa asomdwee a
Ɔmmbɔ adze n' n'emudzi n',
Kɛpem dɛ n'enyi bohu
'Nyimnyam enyidado n',
Na Asɔr konyimdzifo no
Bɛhɛn n' ahomgye mu.

name: MHB 701:5
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.
verse:
. Na ɔwɔ wiadze yi, ɔnye 
Ɔkorsa Nyame bɔm',
Na ɔnye hɔn a wɔrohom
Dzi nkitaho dɛɛdɛw.
O ahotsewfo esiarfo!
Ewuradze, dom hɛn,
Dɛ abrɛfo yinom, ma
Yɛnye W' mbɛtsena sor hɔ.  Amen.

name: MHB 702:1
title: John Chandler, 1806-76.

name: MHB 702:2
title: John Chandler, 1806-76.
verse:
. O dɛm ayɛyi ndwom 'i
Bɔwosow abangua 'i do;
Yɛbɛma hɛn ndze do
Atow Ɔkorsa ndwom,
Dɛm na yɛdze N'enyimnyam dzin n'.
Bɔtow ndwom a ohur daa nyina.

name: MHB 702:3
title: John Chandler, 1806-76.
verse:
. Ɔdomfo Nyankopɔn,
Twe penkyɛn hɛn mber nyina
Gye nokwar nsew biara,
Na hyɛ nkrumsi so nsew;
Hue Wo nhyira gu mpaabɔ do
Wɔ da krɔnkrɔn biara no mu.

name: MHB 702:4
title: John Chandler, 1806-76.
verse:
. Adom a yebisa n'
Wɔmfa mfi sor mbrɛ hɛn;
Sɛ hɛn nsa nya ka dze a,
Ɔnye hɛn ntsena afebɔɔ,
Nkodu da no a esiarfo nyina
Wɔbɛfrɛ hɔn akɔ ahomgye m'.  Amen.

name: MHB 703:1
title: Samuel Johnson, 1822-82.
verse:
. Nyame kurow mbrɛ odua so 
Na n' afasu war a!
'Nokwafo nye W' adehye dɔm,
Wɔ mbew na mber nyinam'.

name: MHB 703:23
title: Samuel Johnson, 1822-82.
verse:
. Asɔr krɔnkrɔn kor, nkodɔm kor, 
Botae a ɔkrɔn kor,
Dwumadzi kuw kor, ndɔbaa ndwom kor,
Ɔhen Otumfo kor.
 
. Ofitsi nyimpa n' ahyɛse 
Mbrɛ W' asɛm esi edwir n'!
Mbrɛ W' aman esi atserɛw
Wɔ ahotɔ na dɔm' a!

name: MHB 703:45
title: Samuel Johnson, 1822-82.
verse:
. Mbrɛ Wo gya si dzɛw anago 
Dze weɔn na ɔnnhwer a!
W' akoban hyerɛn sunm' ara
Dze kɛpem adzekyee.
 
. Asorɛkye bu akɛse kwa, 
Anhwea dwurudwuruw gyan;
Onntum mmpuhim botantsim a
Bɛkyebo kurow si do n'.

name: MHB 704:1
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;
verse:
. AKOKO a ho tsew etwa ehyia,
Ne fapem no tsim hɔ pintinn daa,
Ewuradze ahenkurow no tsim hɔ;
Wonnkotum edwuruw n'afasu;
Mbanyin dze asuro na nwanwa hwɛ no,
Na wɔhyɛ nyia ɔweɔn no nsew.
Nyia ɔhwɛ Israel no,
Ɔnntɔ nnkom na ɔnnda,
Halleluja!
Enyigye dɔm\nNye hɔn a adom n'
Bɛba hɔn tsenabea mu daa daa!

name: MHB 704:2
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;
verse:
. Jehova dɔ Zion n'apon!
Na ɔdze adom nwanwa gye to m';
Na ɔdze ndadze hin ekyir,
Ohyira hɔn a wɔtse no mu,
Ɔkyekye hɔn werɛ ber a wɔabɔm,
Na wɔdze yaw, dadwen gu N' do n',
Adom a ɔdze fua
No nkorɔfo nyinara n',
Ɔyɛ nwanwa!
Nyame ahenkurow,
Enyigye bea a,
Hɔ na dɛm nhyira nyina wɔ!

name: MHB 704:3
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;
verse:
. N-kwagye a aman pii nnyim no,
Zion no nko mu na wɔkyerɛ:
Hɔ, wɔtse dza ɔso, yɛ krɔnkrɔn;
Ber a Wo nkorɔfo tse wo mu no,
Etsentsen hɔn, kyekye hɔn werɛ,
Ewɔ Sunsum na Asɛm no;
Asomdwee bɔ hɔ aprɔw,
Na wɔtse ndwom dɛɛdɛw,
Nya adom tsema,
Ɔyɛ dɛw ma!
Ɔma asomdwee
Na enyigye kɛse tsim hɔ daa.

name: MHB 705:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. NYAME yɛ sumabew ma Ne mba,
Sɛ ehum a ɔyɛ dzen tu mpo a;
Ansaana yɛka hɛn ayawdzi n',
Hwɛ ɔwɔ hɛn nkyɛn roboa hɛn!

name: MHB 705:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ma mbepɔw ntutu mfi hɔn mbea
Mbra bun mu na wonsie hɔn hɔ;
Asaase dzendzen no nwosow,
Hɛn gyedzi nnkosuro hwee koraa.

name: MHB 705:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Po woree no bɛyɛ dede,
Hɛn akra tsena asomdwee krɔnn mu;
Ber a aman na mpoano nyimpa
Ho popo, suro asorɛkye kɛse n'.

name: MHB 705:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Esu bi wɔ hɔ a ne mpemee
Ma hɛn Nyame man enyigye;
Nkwa, dɔ na enyigye gu do pem,
Fow kɔ hɛn man krɔnkrɔn no mu.

name: MHB 705:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Dɛm esu krɔnkrɔn n', W'asɛnhia n',
Ɔhyɛ hɛn suro dzendzen do;
Asomdwee a Wo bɔyhɛ n' dze ma n'
Ma ɔkra a ɔagow ahoɔdzen bio.

name: MHB 705:6
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Zion dzi ne Hen N' dɔ ho dɛw,
Ɔgye n' fi dɔnhwer huuhu n' mu;
Ne fapem dzendzen n' nnokobubu,
Woetsim n' wɔ No nokwardzi do.

name: MHB 706:1
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807
verse:
. Wɔka wo ho enyimnyam nsɛm, 
Zion, hɛn Nyame Ne man;
Nyia ɔnnsan N' asɛm no kyekyeer
Wo dɛ No kurow a ɔtsenam'.
Tsetse Bo no nye wo fapem,
Ebɛn botum awosow w'?
N-kwagye yɛ wo ho afasu;
Ebɛserew w' atamfo.

name: MHB 706:2
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807
verse:
. Hwɛ, n-kwa nsu a ofi Nyame 
Ne daadaa dɔ mu pem no
Ma wo mba wɔmee, na oyi
Hia ho suro fi hɔn do.
Woana na ɔbɔtɔ bitsi
Wɔ dɛm esutsen yi ho?
Adom a ɔpem daa nyina
Wo Nyame dze dom wo daa.

name: MHB 706:3
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807
verse:
. M' Agyenkwa, menam W' adom do 
Mofora Zion mamfom' a,
Ma wiadze nsi me atwetwe,
Ɔno mpo bɛyɛ mo ntuw,
Wiadze nye no mu enyigye
Nye ahokyerɛ resen.
Enyigye nye ahonya a otsim
Zion mba nko na wonya

name: MHB 707:1
title: Francis Turner Palgrave, 1824-97.
verse:
. ϽWO wͻammfa nsa annyɛ W’,
Eso wͻannkrͻn wo sor,
Wͻanntow w’aban hyɛnhyɛnn,
Wͻnndzé aboͻdzen bo yɛ w';
Ehyerɛn sen sika,
Nyame N’ Jerusalem.

name: MHB 707:2
title: Francis Turner Palgrave, 1824-97.
verse:
. Ber a akoma brɛfo,
Benya sor ’kokodur n’,
Mbrɛ akoma apa n’,
Onya nkenyan fi ͻdͻ m’
Ber a gyedzi apam suro n’;
Eyɛ Nyame N’ kuropͻn.

name: MHB 707:3
title: Francis Turner Palgrave, 1824-97.
verse:
. Ewͻ beea a ahopͻw
Dan yɛ ahobrɛadze,
Bea a suban yɛ botoo n’;
Bea a atͻfo nya ahenkyɛw,
Bea a agyedzifo nyina
Nya asomdwee mapa.

name: MHB 707:4
title: Francis Turner Palgrave, 1824-97.

name: MHB 707:5
title: Francis Turner Palgrave, 1824-97.
verse:
. ϽWo a wͻannkrͻn w’ wͻ sor.
Wͻanntow w’aban ekyirkyir,
Na bér a beenu, baasa
Ehyia mu wͻ Christ mu n’,
Tsena hͻn finimfim,
Nyame N’ Jerusalem.   Amen.

name: MHB 708:1
title: Timothy Dwight, 1752-1817.
verse:
. OWURA, yɛdͻ Wo man,
Ofie a etse mu no.
Asͻr a hɛn Pomfo n’ dze N’ bͻgyaa a
Ͻsom bo gyee sii hͻ n'.

name: MHB 708:2
title: Timothy Dwight, 1752-1817.
verse:
.  Owura, yɛdͻ W’asͻr
’Hotsewfo wͻ W’enyim;
Wͻsom W’ bo dɛ W’enyiwa kyirefuwa,
Woekrukye wͻ Wo nsamu.

name: MHB 708:3
title: Timothy Dwight, 1752-1817.
verse:
. Ͻno ntsi yebosu
Na hɛn mpaabͻ edu sor;
Yɛdze hɛn haw, hɛn bérɛ bɛma n’
’Kodu dɛ ͻbͻbͻ adze.

name: MHB 708:4
title: Timothy Dwight, 1752-1817.
verse:
. Hɛn dɛw mbordo ekyir n’,
Yebu no sor akwan,
Ne nkitahodzi anohoba,
No dͻ, ayɛyi ho ndwom n’.

name: MHB 708:5
title: Timothy Dwight, 1752-1817.
verse:
. Jesus, Nyɛnko krͻnkrͻn,
Hɛn Gyefo na hɛn Hen,
Wo nsa bɛgye hɛn yie efi
Atamfo nyé efir mu.

name: MHB 708:6
title: Timothy Dwight, 1752-1817.
verse:
. Dɛ Wo nokwar tsim hͻ n’,
Asaasé enyimnyam pa n’,
Wͻdze ne nyina bɛma Zion,
Na dɛw kɛse wͻ sor.

name: MHB 709:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛda ho yɛtse nkwam'? 
Yeehu hɛn enyim bio?
Christ N' adom a ɔapon hɛn ntsi
Hom mma yenyi N' ayɛw.

name: MHB 709:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyame tum akora hɛn 
Wɔ nkwagye a odzi mum';
Yɛbɔm' bio wɔ Christ N' ayɛyim',
Yedzi N' enyim ehyia.

name: MHB 709:34
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Mbusu pii a yeehu a! 
Akodzi a yeeduam' a!
Guado ɔko', na hɛn mu hu' a!,
Fitsi dɛ yehyiaa nkan n'.
 
. Ewuradze No dɔ 
Agye hɛn ne nyinam',
Na ɔda ho dze No mboa ma hɛn
Na osie hɛn nkwa wɔ sor.

name: MHB 709:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Dɛm a hom mma yentuw 
No nkwagye tum no mu,
Tum a ɔgye hɛn nkwa koraa
Kɛpem dɛ yeetua bɔn.

name: MHB 709:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hom mma yɛmfa mbeamudua n' 
Na yeenya ahenkyɛw n';
Sɛ yebenya Jesus Noara a
Dza aka n'- yemmbu no hwee

name: MHB 71:1
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.
verse:
. YƐBA hɛn egyanom Nyame nkyɛn; 
Hɔn Botan nye hɛn nkwagye; 
Daa abasa nye hɔn tsenabea, 
Yɛdze yɛ hɛn tsenabea,
Yedze hɛn ayɛyi brɛ Wo,
Yɛhwehwɛ W' dɛ ahotsewfo n'. 
Wɔ mbasantsen nyina mu.

name: MHB 71:2
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.
verse:
. Onyame gya a odzii hɔn kan n'
Da ho hyerɛn dzi hɛn kan;
Ɔsor kyɛm a ɔnweɔɔn hɔn no 
Da ho so kata hɛn do;
Adom a ɔbrɛɛ abɔnfo adze,
Ahoɔdzen a ɔhyɛɛ mberɛwyɛ dzen, 
Da ho dzi nyim, hyɛ hen dzen.

name: MHB 71:3
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.
verse:
. Bɔn a ɔbrɛɛ hɔn adze no
Da ho hyɛ hɛn kra do ndɛ; 
Nyinsuwa a wokyii n' nyinara, 
Yɛdze enyito ka hɛn bɔn; 
Dɛ mbrɛ itsiee hɔn sufrɛ no, 
Dɛm na hɛn mpaabɔ fow kɔ sor, 
Na ɔdze Wo nhyira ba.

name: MHB 71:4
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.

name: MHB 71:5
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.

name: MHB 710:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. NUANOM na adɔfo wɔ Christ mu,
Hom ho hia Jesus na No dɔm;
Hom mbra mbɛda hom ho edzi,
M'bohu dɔ Ewuradze wɔ ha.

name: MHB 710:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 710:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Jesus, yi Woho kyerɛ wɔ dɔ m';
Ana yennhyiaa W' dzin nwanwa n' mu?
Yɛtweɔn hɛn Wura wɔ hɛn finimfin,
Ogyaframee no na yɛtweɔn.

name: MHB 710:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyame a edze ogya kasa,
Ma ogya a ɔdzɛw Sunsum mfir edzi,
Ma ɔpɛ krɔnkrɔn gyaframee
Mfi hɛn akoma afɔrmbukyia n' do.

name: MHB 710:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ampa, koryɛ a ofir Egya n'
Nam Wo do baa asaase do;
Onnyiewiei nkwa wɔ W' mu, na ma 
Hɛn sor ahotɔ a onnyi kasu.

name: MHB 711:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. O EWURADZE, Wo sor tsenabea
Ne fɛw, ne dɛw na no nwanwa a!
Me kra dzi aper tɔ bitsi
Dze hyia W'ahotsewfo kuw no.

name: MHB 711:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. N-hyira nye ahotsewfo a 
Wotwa ahengua ho wɔ sorsor;
W'enyimnyam kɛse m' hyerɛn sor hɔ
Dze dɔ yi Wo ndwuma ayɛw.

name: MHB 711:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. N-hyira nye akra a wohu bea 'i
Wɔ W'adom asɔrfi yi mu;
Hɔ wohu Wo hyerɛn fɛɛfɛw no,
Hwehwɛ W'enyim, sua W'ayɛyi.

name: MHB 711:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. N-hyira nye hɔn a hɔn akoma
Hwehwɛ Zion abowano kwan;
Nyame nye hɔn ahoɔdzen pa,
No kwan do na wɔtwer No mboa.

name: MHB 711:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Wɔnam enyigye na ahoɔdzen m'
Kodu dɛ yebehyia ahenman m',
Kɛpem dɛ yebɛba W'enyim
Abɔsom ɔsom pa m' wɔ hɔ

name: MHB 712:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. NHYIRA nyé ͻdͻ a ͻka hɛn bͻ m’,
Dza ͻmma yɛmmpaa mu n’,
Hɛn honandua fi hɛn ho mpo a,
Yɛyɛ kor wͻ akoma m’.

name: MHB 712:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛnye Egya n’ yɛ sunsum kor
Yɛkͻ beebi a ͻkyérɛ,
Yetsiatsia Jesu N’anamͻn m’,
Kyerɛ N’enyimnyam wͻ ha.

name: MHB 712:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O ma yenye N’ nnantséw afebͻͻ
Dɛ yennyim hweeàra bio,
Yɛnndwendwen hwee, mmbu hwee, gyedɛ
Jesus Ne mbeamudua n’ nko.

name: MHB 712:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hom mma yɛntwe mboa ano yie
Wͻ N’abasa n’ ase;
Hɛn enyi nda N'emudzi kwan,
Adom ngu adom do.

name: MHB 712:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Agyenkwa n’ N’adom m‘ kyɛfafo,
Adwen. akoma m’ koryɛ.
Edɛw na yaw, aber anaa bea.
Nkwa anaa ’wu nntum mmpaa m’.

name: MHB 713:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. NYAMƐ hyɛ hɛn dɛ yɛmbͻ m’
Yɛnkà akoma na nsa mbͻ m’;
Yennya hɛn frɛ ho enyidar,
Yɛmboaboa hɛnho nkorkor;
Hɛn werɛ mfir dza etwa mu,
Mfa akomà, adwen ndzi Christ ekyir
Mper nko botae no ho pɛɛ
Nkɛfa nokwàr ahenkyɛw no.

name: MHB 713:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛnye Nyame nam kan mu a,
Nyame ka hɛn akoma bͻ mu a;
Yɛyɛ anyɛnkofo pa,
Jesus dͻ mu anyɛnkofa:
Dɛw mu na yɛkà bͻ mu,
Na yɛdze dzi hɛn dwuma,
Yɛtse bͻgyà à ͻtsew hɛn ho m’,
Daa yɛtse dɛ Christ ewu.

name: MHB 713:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyame, hyɛ hɛn gyedzi dzen,
Hor hɛn ho dza ͻnntsen nyina m’;
Ͻwo nntum nnhwɛ dza ͻnntsen;
O ma yɛmfata mma Wo!
Ku akͻndͻbͻn biara,
Tu aba bͻn biarà ase,
Gu bͻn nyinà ase koraa,
Kyérɛw Wo dͻ mbra wͻ hɛn mu.

name: MHB 713:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. ’Fi ndɛ ma hɛn ndzeyɛɛ nyina
Nkyerɛ dͻ dɛ yenyim Christ;
Ma dͻ no nyɛ asɛnkyérɛdze.
Dɛ yɛyɛ Wodzé, Ewuradze:
Fa Wo dͻ suban n’ ma hɛn.
Tsim n‘wͻ hɛn enyim nà akoma m’!
Ma hɛn Wo dͻ no nkotoo!
Nyame, yemmbisa hwee bio.

name: MHB 714:1
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.
verse:
. NYIA ɔwɔ Wo dɔ no nnhia ndamfo,
Ɔnye Wo nantsew dzi nkɔmbɔ;
Menye W'ahotsewfo nyina
Bɔbɔ awɛ sesei na daa.

name: MHB 714:2
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.
verse:
. Ahotsewfo nkitahodzi m'
Wɔ nyansa, 'tsidaa na enyigye;
M'akoma yɛ mberɛw, motɔ bahaw a,
Hɔn hyew na kan wɔma mo do.

name: MHB 714:3
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.
verse:
. M'ayɛnkofo dze, wɔnnyewee;
W'ahɛn a ɔdɔɔ so pii no,
Sɛ ehum bɔ hɔn petse mpo a,
Wobehyia m' sɔkyee berano.

name: MHB 714:4
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.
verse:
. Hɛn nyina da ho ara tse Wo mu,
Yɛapetse mpo a, yɛyɛ Wodze,
Yɛwɔ ebusua noara mu,
Gyedzi, Sunsum kor kyerɛ hɛn kwan.

name: MHB 714:5
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.
verse:
. W'ahengua enyim na daa yehia,
Na yɛbɔ m' totɔ serɛ Wo;
Yekyiakyia hɛnho sunsum mu,
Yebohu hɛnho nkorkor bio.

name: MHB 714:6
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.
verse:
. Ɔsor dɔm no nyina bɛyɛ 
M'aanyɛnkofo daa daa nyina,
Na Ɔwo me Nyɛnko mapa;
Woana bɛtsew me efi W' dɔ ho?

name: MHB 715:1
title: Charles Silvester Horne, 1865-1914.

name: MHB 715:2
title: Charles Silvester Horne, 1865-1914.
verse:
. Christ No dɔ a osiw kwan, ka akoma bɔ mu no ntsi,
Nokwar gyedzi na fahodzi a wɔdze yɛɛ hɔn edwuma ntsi,
Nyankopɔn Nsɛmpa n'asomdwee a wɔdze nantsewee ntsi,
W'abasa dzen ntsi yehyira Wo, hɛn egyanom Nyame.

name: MHB 715:3
title: Charles Silvester Horne, 1865-1914.

name: MHB 715:4
title: Charles Silvester Horne, 1865-1914.

name: MHB 716:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. NOKWAR na dͻ Nyame,
Yɛhwehwɛ W’akwan pa;
Yɛgye Wo pɛ to mu,
Yɛyɛ setsie ma Wo:
Bɛhɛn Wo nyansaa kwan no mu,
Yengyaa hɛn pɛ mma Wo dɛw mu.

name: MHB 716:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. ’Bɛn ntsi na edze hɛn
Aba ha ber yi mu?
’Bɛn ntsi na ’dze hɛn aba
Dɛ yenhu hɛn enyim?
Yɛdze dͻ na tsema ka bͻ m’
Ma yaabͻ mu kor wͻ Wo mu?

name: MHB 716:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ana annyɛ hɛn kor,
Dɛ yɛmbͻ mu kor daa,
Yaabͻ mu anantsew,
Yaatsé obiara ne yaw;
Ama yeehu Wo papayɛ,
Na yaasoɛr ͻdͻ emudzi mu?

name: MHB 716:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Dɛm a horn mma hɛn enyi ‘
Ntsim siar ewiei no do,
Na yɛmbͻ mu yɛmper,
Yɛnko nkͻ hɛn enyim;
Yɛmfa ayamuyie mboa hɛnho,
Dɛ yebenyà ahenkyɛw hyɛnhyɛnn n’.

name: MHB 716:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O ma Wo Sunsum nsͻw
Hɛn akra ano da no,
Fa W’amayɛ dom hɛn,
Na fa hɛn fi ha kͻ
Hɛn onnyiewie ahomgye mu,
Fa hɛn kͻ hɛn Pomfo No bo m’.

name: MHB 717:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O EWURADZE, boa hɛn ma
Yɛmboa hɛnho nkorkor;
Ma obiara mboa ne nyɛnko,
Yennya tsema mma hɛnho.

name: MHB 717:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Boa hɛn ma yɛmboa hɛn mfɛfo,
Kakra a yɛwɔ nyɛ yie;
Gyedzi na enyidar nsi pi,
Yendzi mu wɔ dɔ mu.

name: MHB 717:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn Wura tseasefo, ma yɛmbɛn W',
Adze nyina m' yennyin,
Nkɛpem dɛ asan hɛn ho koraa,
Ma nkekaa nnyi hɛn ho.

name: MHB 717:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Na edwumason bɔ adze a,
Fa W'ayefor kɔ fie;
Ma yɛnye ahotsewfo nyina
Eedzi dɛw wɔ heaven.

name: MHB 718:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. JESUS, yehwɛ Woara,
Yɛgye W’anohoba n’;
Ͻwo bɛba hɛn finimfin,
Sɛ yehyia Wo dzin mu a.

name: MHB 718:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛrébɛgyé ato m’ wͻ ha
Dɛ Wo dzin yɛ nkwagye;
Wo dzin yɛ nkwa na asomdwee,
Ͻyɛ onnyiewiei dͻ.

name: MHB 718:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yehyia gye adom a 
Ͻwo dzé ama hɛn kwa n’;
Wo ntsi na yehyia mu ase ha,
Ama yeehyia heaven.

name: MHB 718:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yenyim dɛ ewͻ ha,
O yi Woho edzi kyérɛ!
Afei, Ewuradze, ma akoma
Biara nnya awérɛkyekyer.

name: MHB 718:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma Wo ndzé a okenyan n’
Nyi owu n’ bͻn mfi hͻ nkͻ;
Na ma hɛn akra enyi ngye
Enyidar dͻ mapa m’. Amen.

name: MHB 719:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. HWԐ Jesu, hwɛ W’esuafo no,
Pon W’anohoba no;
Yeehyia Wo dzin m’ rohwɛ Wo kwan,
Ma Wo nhyira no mbra.

name: MHB 719:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛtweͻn W’, Ewuradze nokwafo,
Yɛbͻ m’ kor wͻ Wo dzin m';
Yɛtweͻ, dɛ mbrɛ W’asɛm no tse n’,
Dɛ yebohu W’ hɛn ntamu.

name: MHB 719:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Enye hɛn ehyia mu wͻ ha;
Ewuradze, yi W’ho kyérɛ!
Tseasefo Nyame Ba, pue ha!
Ma yɛntse W’ nka wͻ ha.

name: MHB 719:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma yenhu Nyia yehwehwɛ no!
Jesus a wokum Wo,
Fa Wo nsa, W’anan m’ bͻgya n’ kyérɛ,
Ͻwo a hɛn ntsi iwui.

name: MHB 719:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma hɛn nsa nka kyerɛwsɛm no,
Kasa na kyérɛ biribi;
Mma nnye okyingyefo, gye Me dzi,
Emi a muwui maa wo!

name: MHB 72:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. ME kra, hyɛ ɔsor ndwom bi ase;
Me ndze, nyan na tow ndwom,
Hɛn domankoma Hen n' ndwuma akɛse, 
Ne dzin kɛse ho ndwom.

name: MHB 72:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ka No nokwar nwanwa n' ho asɛm, 
Na ma No tum ntahye;
Tow N'adom anohoba ho ndwom,
Nyame nkenyan asɛm n'.

name: MHB 72:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Bɔ Ewuradze nkwagye n' dawur
Ma akɔhweaban a woruwu:
Ɔdze akyerɛw dze dua a ɔnnsɛɛ da, 
Akyerɛw asɛm krɔnkrɔn n'.

name: MHB 72:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. N'anohoba kɛse n' hyerɛn 
Dɛ ɔwɔ ayewa do;
na sum m' 'tumfo nnkotum apepa
Akyerɛw a ɔwɔ hɔ daa n'.

name: MHB 72:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. N'adom asɛm biara yɛ dzen
Tse dɛ dza ɔdze bɔɔ sor;
N-dze a ɔdandan nworaba no,
Ka anohaba nsɛm nyina.

name: MHB 72:6
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. M'akoma a atɔ bahaw dze dɛw
Hu dɛ W'adom tsim hɔ;
Motwer ndze a ɔbɔɔ adze nyina,
Na onnhia gyedzi bio.

name: MHB 720:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Christ a nhyira nyina fir Wo, 
Ema ahosewfo dzi mu,
Tsie hɛn a Wo su sɛ hɛn,
Yɛyɛ Wo honam nwanwa n'.

name: MHB 720:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ka hɛn ho wɔ sunsum korm', 
Ma yɛnda ho nya Wodze n';
Yɛba bebisa mbordo,
Ɔwo a ehyɛ adze nyina ma.

name: MHB 720:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Kenyan, nunu na gya hɛn  
Kyɛn ankorankor akyɛdze,
Wɔahyehyɛ n' dɛ mbrɛ epɛ,
Ma hɛn ndwuma nyina nhyɛ ma.

name: MHB 720:45
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Dɛw mu ara yɛnyɛ kor 
Yennya tsema mma hɛnto:
Na yɛmboa hɛnho nkorkor;
Obiara nyɛ n'afamudze.
 
. Ɔdɔ tse dɛ wu, ɔasɛɛ 
Mpaapaamu na adehyesɛm nyina
Edzin, ekuw nyina gu
Christ yɛ adze nyinam' adze nyina.

name: MHB 721:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. JESUS, W'adom no ka hɛn bɔ m'
Na yɛdodɔ hɛnho a,
Yɛdze awerɛhyɛm' hwehwɛ W'enyim,
Yenyim dɛ itsie hɛn asɔr.

name: MHB 721:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma yɛnda ho nnya hɛn Nyame,
Yɛnsoa W' kɔndua haahar n',
Ɔdɔ ahoma mbɔho ebisa a 
Wonnkotum atsew mu.

name: MHB 721:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 721:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wo dɔ a ɔtwetwe hɛn bɛn Wo n'
Ma yenya akoma kor;
Ma daa yɛntwetwe mbɛn hɛnho,
Na yɛntwe mbɛn Wo daa.

name: MHB 721:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ka hɛn sunsum nyina fam Wo ho,
Mma mpaapaamu mmba da;
O ma hɛn nyina nnya Wo mu
Ɔdɔ ho adwen no daa.

name: MHB 721:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Iyi nye nkabɔm' pa a ho tsew,
W'adɔyɛ a fi nnyi ho;
Ma yennya adwen a ɔwɔ Wo mu n',
O ma yɛnsɔr dɛm daa.   Amen.

name: MHB 722:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. HOM mfa akoma ngyina sor ndzɛmba do,
’Guambaa N’akadofo,
Hom nsuo m’ ma yɛntonton No dͻ,
Yɛnhyɛ Ne dzin enyimnyam.

name: MHB 722:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hom ntow ndwom, ndaase m’ mma Ne dzin,
Ͻno a N’adom mmbͻ adze:
Dzi dɛw! Dzi dɛw! ‘Wuradze yɛ ͻhen;
Ͻhen n’ yɛ hɛn Nyɛnko!

name: MHB 722:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. ’No ntsi biribiara yɛ ahwerdze;
Yemmbu wiadze ’i mu hwee.
Yɛsoa mbeamudua no wͻ enyigye m’ ,
Gyedɛ yeenya ahenkyɛw n’.

name: MHB 722:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma yenkenyan hɛnho nkorkor,
Hɛn ndwuma nkyérɛ hɛn gyedzi,
Yendua krͻnkrͻn enyidado m’,
Nà ͻdͻ dɛɛdɛw ndwuma do.

name: MHB 722:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛkͻ do dwen wo ho daa daa,
Ͻwo a ekotow Jesus;
Tsérɛw wo gyedzi na mpaabͻ abaw m’,
Na hwɛ, yɛabɛn w’ sesei.

name: MHB 722:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wodze nyɛ ehumbͻbͻr, asomdwee,
Ondu adwen nyina mu,
Mannà a wͻdzé esuma na nkwa dua n’,
Ͻnyé ͻbo fitaa no.

name: MHB 722:7
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wͻmfa nhyira nyina mma wo,
Dza Nyame na Christ ma;
Yɛsérɛ dɛ hen Hen No Sunsum
Mbra akoma nokwafo m’.

name: MHB 722:8
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Tweͻn dɛ Ewuradze bɛbà enyimnyam m’.
Tweͻn nya heaven m’ kyɛfa;
Hɛn Pomfo n’ risiesie hɛn fie:
Kͻ do; yebehyia m’ hͻ.

name: MHB 723:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. HƐN tsetse egyanom Nyame, tsie,
Ma yenhu W' nokwar ehumbɔbɔr n',
Yɛnam Jesus No mu bɛn Wo,
Wo Dɔba a oruhu amandze n',
No m' na yehu W'enyim fɛɛfɛw n',
No mu na menam sɔ W'enyi.

name: MHB 723:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛdze awɔse gyedzi bɔ afɔr,
Yɛma do kyerɛ W'enyimnyam n',
Hɛn enyidar nyina n' kutuwdo - bo n',
Bɔgyahue afɔrbɔ a ɔsom bo n',
Ɔdze W'adom brɛ abɔn wɔ ase,
Ɔma hɛn akra nyina bɔ m' dzi mu.

name: MHB 723:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wɔnam Ne dzin m' nko gye hɛn to m',
No bɔgyaa m' yenya bɔnfakyɛ,
Yɛnam No do bisa nkwa pa,
Ɔno a owui dze gyee hɛn akra,
Ɔdze No bɔgyaa tseew hɛn ho,
Na ɔdze Nyame bra hyɛ hɛn ma.

name: MHB 723:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 724:1
title: John James Cummins, 1795-1867.
verse:
. JESUS, nkwa nà enyimnyam Wura,
Brɛ W’adom aso n’ edze daa,
Bér a hɛn akra rotweͻn asͻr Wo ’i,
Abͻnfo adamfo, tsie hɛn:
      Ewuradze pa,
      Fa W’ehumbͻbor gye hɛn!

name: MHB 724:2
title: John James Cummins, 1795-1867.
verse:
. Fi wiadze enyifura bͻn n’ mu,
Fi bͻn a epirim no tum mu,
Fi ewurkadze na etsiͻdzen mu,
Fi akoma m’ ahokyérɛ mu:

name: MHB 724:3
title: John James Cummins, 1795-1867.
verse:
. Bér a nsͻhwɛ mu ayɛ dzen no,
Ma Abͻnsam kyérɛ no tum no,
Wͻ hɛn ahohia ber no mu,
Dͻnhwér a ͻyɛ sum, yɛ dzen mu:

name: MHB 724:4
title: John James Cummins, 1795-1867.
verse:
. Bér a wiadze nyina resérew no,
Ahonya na asetséna pa m’,
Hɛn akoma twe bɛn wiadze dɛw n’,
Wͻ ahoͻdzen na asomdwee da m’:

name: MHB 724:5
title: John James Cummins, 1795-1867.
verse:
. Yarba dͻnhwér a ͻyɛ bérɛ mu,
Ͻhaw na ͻyaw ber mu,
Ber a yɛtse honam mberɛwyɛ,
Ber a abͻdze mboa yɛ kwa n’:

name: MHB 724:6
title: John James Cummins, 1795-1867.
verse:
. Owu dͻnhwer mu kommyɛ mu n’,
Atsɛmbu da huuhu mu n’.
Ma hɛn akra, bér a wͻtwer Wo no,
Mfa W’ nyɛ enyidar na tsénabea.

name: MHB 725:1
title: Isaac Williams, 1802-65.
verse:
. HԐN Wura, W'ehumbͻbͻr da  ‘i,
Ansaanà obotwa m’ akͻ n’,
Yɛhwe W’anànadze sͻr Wo.

name: MHB 725:2
title: Isaac Williams, 1802-65.
verse:
. Jesus krͻnn, pa hɛn nyinsu,
Fa akoma m' suro hyɛ hɛn mà:
Ansaana da huuhu n’ aba.

name: MHB 725:3
title: Isaac Williams, 1802-65.
verse:
. Yɛkotow W'abow ekyir yi,
Hue Wo Sunsum gu hɛn do,
Ansaana atow m’ afehͻͻ.

name: MHB 725:4
title: Isaac Williams, 1802-65.
verse:
. W’ahoyera anago n'.
Wo nkotͻserɛ su no ntsi.
Dɛ epɛ dɛ ’bowu n’ ntsi.

name: MHB 725:5
title: Isaac Williams, 1802-65.
verse:
. Wo nyinsu wenwen a ikyii
Maa Jerusalem ha n’ ntsi,
Mma mma Wo dͻ no mmbͻ hɛn.

name: MHB 725:6
title: Isaac Williams, 1802-65.
verse:
. Hɛn Tsɛmbuafo na Gyefo,
Yehu W' enyim na enyim a,
Dom hɛn W'atsaban ase tséna.

name: MHB 726:1
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.
verse:
. GYEFO, wɔ huntuma mu na
Yɛdze nkotoserɛ sɔr Wo;
Ber a nnuhofo yenntum mma
Hɛn nyinsuwa enyi nnhwɛ sor;
O yaw na mbusu a edze
Hun amandze maa nyimpa ntsi,
Bɔ W' mu adze fi ahengua enyim,
Tsie hɛn mbɔbɔr nkotɔserɛ.

name: MHB 726:2
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.
verse:
. Wo mbofraber m' botooyɛ,
Wo hia na nyinsu bra ntsi,
W'ahokyer yaayaw nda no,
Wo mbusu sar no do ntsi,
Osian dɔnhwer huuhu no a
Satan sɔɔ W' hwɛ wɔ mu n' ntsi,
Dan, O dan W'adɔe enyi n',
Tsie hɛn mbɔbɔr nkotɔserɛ.

name: MHB 726:3
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.
verse:
. Yaw krɔnkrɔn a 'dze kyii nyinsu
Wɔ Lazarus ne nda do ntsi,
Nkuranhyɛ nyinsu a ɔpemee
Guu Salem do tsenabea n',
Adwembɔn a osii W' nkorɔfo ntamu
Ma hɔn enyim towee ntsi,
Fi Wo sor tsenabea hɔ 
Tsie hɛn mbɔbɔr nkotɔserɛ.

name: MHB 726:4
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.
verse:
. W'abawpa dɔnhwer no ntsi,
Na W'ahoguan mpaabɔ ntsi,
Mbeamudua, mprɛgow na nsoɛ n' ntsi,
Peaa ne yaw na enyimtsiabu,
Sum kebii a ɔhyɛɛ no ntsi,
W'afɔrbɔ huuhu no ntsi
Tsie hɛn mbrɛhoadze sufrɛ,
Tsie hɛn mbɔbɔr nkotserɛ.

name: MHB 726:5
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.
verse:
. Pen dzendzen a ɔdze W' kɔr wu m',
Ɔbo adakamaa no ntsi,
Samanadze sunkamm a oenntum
Enndzi Nyame a ɔsoɛree do n';
O Nyame Tumfo a wɔdze W'
Fi asaase do asan kɔ sor,
Ewuradze, tsie, tsie hɛn su
Wɔ hɛn mbɔbɔr nkotɔserɛ m'

name: MHB 727:12
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.
verse:
. Jesus, 'nye W' Asɔr ntsena, 
Yɛ n' Agyenkwa, Wura, Gyafo;
Wɔrosɔ ne gyedzi ahwɛ n',
Yɛserɛ Wo, tsie hɛn.
 
. Tsew ne bra na nkyerɛkyerɛ ho; 
Dom n' abotar ma ɔnsɔw
Na ɔntwer W' anohoba n',
Yɛserɛ Wo, tsie hɛn.

name: MHB 727:3
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: MHB 727:4
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: MHB 727:5
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.
verse:
. Ongya ehiafo na efurafo, 
Nda ho nhwehwɛ dza ayew n',
Ɔnkyekyer 'koma bobɔe,
Yɛserɛ Wo, tsie hɛn.

name: MHB 727:6
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.
verse:
. No nokwar kanea n' nhyerɛn; 
Ɔmma ne kan n' do wɔ sor
Wɔ abosom-man sum mu.
Yɛserɛ Wo, tsie hɛn.

name: MHB 727:7
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: MHB 728:1
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. MBƆBƆRHUFO, Nyame Tumfo!
Wo dɔ na tsema nnyi ewiei!
Kyerɛkyerɛ hɛn wɔ W'enyim daa ma
Yɛmbɔ hɛn bra mma Wo.

name: MHB 728:2
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. Ɔwo a 'bowuu wɔ asaase 'i do
Ma nyimpa aafa do enya nkwa,
O tsie hɛn, 'Wo na yesu frɛ W'
Enyidado m', Nyame.

name: MHB 728:3
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. Kyerɛkyerɛ hɛn Wo nkyerɛkyerɛsɛm no,
Yɛntse mma hɔn a W' bɔgyaa atɔ hɔn,
Ma asɛm, ndzeyɛɛ, adwen biara
Aayɛ edwuma ama Wo.

name: MHB 728:4
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. Hɛn nyina yɛ enuanom wɔ wiadze,
Dɛ Ɔwo iwuu maa hɛn ntsi;
Kyerɛ hɛn, mbrɛ ɔtse biara,
Ma yɛndɔ hɔn Wo mu.

name: MHB 728:5
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. Yarba m', yaw mu, ohia m', dadwen m',
Mbrɛ ɔtse biara, ɔyɛ hɛndze;
Ma yɛmboa bea a wohia mboa no,
Dɛ yɛdze rema Wo.

name: MHB 728:6
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.
verse:
. Na ma Wo Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no
Nka hɔn a wɔtsena dɔ mu nyina,
Kodu dɛ hɔn a wɔtse Wo mu
Behyia m' wɔ sor ahenman m'.  Amen

name: MHB 729:1
title: Matthaus Apelles von Lowenstern, 1594-1648;
verse:
. HƐN Wura, nye hɛn nkwagyefo Nyankopɔn,
Hɛn anago woraba nye aman enyidar,
Tsie na gye W'asɔr hɔn mbɔbɔr nkotɔserɛ,
Ewuradze Tumfo.

name: MHB 729:2
title: Matthaus Apelles von Lowenstern, 1594-1648;
verse:
. Hwɛ ehum dzendzen a otwa
W'Ahyɛm'-daka n' ho,
Hwɛ mbrɛ W'atamfo si tserɛw hɔn frankaa mu;
Ewuradze, ber a wɔtow hɔn bɔwema n',
'Botum akora hɛn.

name: MHB 729:3
title: Matthaus Apelles von Lowenstern, 1594-1648;

name: MHB 729:4
title: Matthaus Apelles von Lowenstern, 1594-1648;
verse:
. Dom hɛn Wo mboa ma atamfo nsan hɔn ekyir,
Dom hɔn Wo nokwar ama wɔdze aakyɛ hɔn;
Ma asaase asomdwee, na hɛn aperdzi ekyir no,
Wo heaven asomdee. Amen.

name: MHB 73:12
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Me Nyame, mbrɛ 'dua yɛ nwanwa a 
W' ahentum ne hyerɛn a!
Wo mbɔbɔrhu egua n' ne fɛw a
Wɔ kan a ɔhyerɛn mu!
 
. Wo mfe a ɔmmbɔ adze n' no hu a, 
Domankoma Ewuradze,
Esunsum wotwa hwe W' enyim
Tonton Wo daa nyina.

name: MHB 73:34567
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.
verse:
. Mbrɛ odua yɛ fɛw, yɛ fɛw a, 
Dɛ yebohu W' enyim
Wo nyansaa bun n', Wo tum kɛse n'
Nyame W' ahotsew nwanwa.
 
. Ao Nyame, mbrɛ misi suro Wo a, 
Suro a no mu dɔ,
Na medze ahopopo enyidar,
Nnuhu nyinsu som Wo!
 
. Ma mo so maadɔ W', Ewuradze, 
Ɔwo a 'yɛ Tumfo yi,
Abɔ Wo mu adze ebisa
M' akoma brɛfo no dɔ.
 
. Egya bi nnyɛ dɔ dɛ Ɔwo; 
Na bi nndwe dɛ Ɔwo,
Wonnyi abotar dɛ mbrɛ ewɔ n'
Emi babɔn yi ho.
 
. Jesus N' egya, dɔ n' akatua, 
Na enyigye bɛn a
Dɛ m' botwa ahwe W' ahengua enyim,
Mahwɛ Wo, na mahwɛ W' !

name: MHB 730:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. ADOM a onnsa da Egya,
Yɛkamfo W‘adͻe na nokwar.
Yɛkyérɛ: W’adͻyɛ nye nokwar,
Wo Ba n' N'enyidzi ntsi ama
Akyɛdzé a onnyi kabeà esian.
N-kwa Sunsum, tum nye ͻdͻ.

name: MHB 730:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Fa Wo Ba n' No Sunsum brɛ hɛn
Ma woeehu Nyametsir n' no bun.
Na yeenya Wo nkwa n‘ mu kyefa;
Soma N' ma ͻmbɛpɛtse bͻgya n',
Soma N' mà ͻmbɛtsew hɛn akra ho,
Ma ͻnkyérɛ, nsͻw hɛn ano dɛ W‘dze daa.

name: MHB 730:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Dɛm na yɛbͻ mpaa, yenngyaa da.
Na yɛdze ndaase kà hɛn bͻn.
Wo nymsaa, nokwar, tum na dͻ n';
Yɛdze dɛw a onnyi kabeà aasͻr,
Na yeehyira W', yoeyi W' ayɛ daa,
Yaasom W’ dɛ mbrɛ Wo sor dͻm som W'.

name: MHB 730:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛbͻfora sor adwontofo kuw n’,
Yɛama bɛn konyimdzi ndwom n' do
Kɛse na yeeyi Wo ayɛw,
Yeetu akͻ sor akyɛn nkan seraph,
Na yenye kan m’ 'nyɛnkofo nyina
Aatow Wo dͻ à onnyi ewiei ho ndwom.
		Amen.

name: MHB 731:1
title: George Hugh Bourne, 1840-1928.
verse:
. O CHRIST, hɛn Nyamé a nye Wo nkobrͻfo tse,
Hɛn sunsum twe bɛn Wo, Dͻfo a wonnhu W’.

name: MHB 731:2
title: George Hugh Bourne, 1840-1928.
verse:
. Dom ma hͻn a wonya dzi fi Wo dͻ m’
Ntsie Wo dͻ na wombu W’akyɛdze bi.

name: MHB 731:3
title: George Hugh Bourne, 1840-1928.
verse:
. Yɛ akoma biara a ͻyɛ Wo tsénabea n’
Turo a adom nduadzewa ayɛ mu ma.

name: MHB 731:4
title: George Hugh Bourne, 1840-1928.
verse:
. Boa hɛn ma yɛnyɛ hɛn botae krͻnkrͻn,
To hɛn gyedzi mu na bɛnyɛn hɛn daa.

name: MHB 731:5
title: George Hugh Bourne, 1840-1928.
verse:
. Hyérɛn hɛn adwen m’ ma yenhu W’ nsɛnkyérɛdze
Krͻnkrͻn a wͻabͻ hɛn ho aprͻw nyina.

name: MHB 731:6
title: George Hugh Bourne, 1840-1928.
verse:
. Na ma dem dasedzi yi mpue hɛn bra m’,
Ma obiara eehu dɛ Ͻwo nye hɛn atséna.

name: MHB 731:7
title: George Hugh Bourne, 1840-1928.
verse:
.  Dɛm na Dͻfo Nyame bɛyɛ hɛn kyɛm
Na akatua a onnyi mbanano afebͻͻ.

name: MHB 732:1
title: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, 1834-87.
verse:
. YƐTSE ndwom krɔnkrɔn no
Wɔ anapa bɔw yi mu;
Ansaana bɔn hyɛ wiadze sum n',
Yehyira na yɛbɔ mpaa.

name: MHB 732:2
title: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, 1834-87.
verse:
. Ber a 'bɔw wɔ nhyirɛn do yi,
Hɛn akra no bɔw, sian famu;
Ansaana ewia befir bio no
Hɛn Wura, ma W' Sunsum mbra!

name: MHB 732:3
title: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, 1834-87.
verse:
. Sɛ yɛwɔ akono a,
Ansaana ko n' hyɛ ase n',
Hɛn Wura, yebisa W'akokyɛm n',
Dɛ ɔnkora hɛn mfi hɛn bɔn m'.

name: MHB 732:4
title: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, 1834-87.
verse:
. Ber a hɛn hɛmba nnyaa mmfow
Da yi ne baka yi,
Ewuradze, yɛserɛ W' sor aahow
Ma ɔdze hɛn aakɔ ntsɛm.

name: MHB 732:5
title: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, 1834-87.
verse:
. Bepɔw n' nkyɛn-famu komm,
Ansaana wi bopue n',
Yaw Nyimpa sui na ɔkaa mmɔn,
Dze tum soɛɛr ahoɔdzen mu.

name: MHB 732:6
title: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, 1834-87.
verse:
. Sɛ dɛm a, na tsie hɛn a
Yɛyɛ mberɛw, nnyi ahoɔdzen;
Hɛn ebisadze nye Gyefo N' dzin,
Na obedzi dwuma ampaara.

name: MHB 733:1
title: Christian Knorr von Rosenroth, 1636-89;
verse:
. JESUS, Ewia Tsenenee,
Ͻdɔ nsérɛmɛn a ehyérɛn sor,
Enyé anapawi hyerɛn,
Hyerɛn hɛn sum kebii do,
Na ma hɛn kan a mu tsew
’Nafua nyina.

name: MHB 733:23
title: Christian Knorr von Rosenroth, 1636-89;
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ daa bͻsu tͻ gu
’Hataw na nhyirén a oeguan do n’,
Ma W’ Sunsum N’adom na tum n’
Nkenyan hɛn akrà a wͻabotow n’;
Nhyira mpetséma ntͻ hɛn mu
Biara do.
. Ma Wo do bɛtɛɛ no nyɛ,
Dɛ ewia ne kan nkenyan,
Nyi hɛn awͻw nyinara nkͻ,
Mbͻ hɛn hyew, nkyekye hɛn werɛ,
Yɛmfa enyigye nsom W’, ntsie Wo
Daa nyina.

name: MHB 733:4
title: Christian Knorr von Rosenroth, 1636-89;
verse:
. Hɛn Enyidar na Kwankyérɛfo,
Mma mmpa hɛn na nngyaa hɛn da
Kora hɛn wͻ Wo nkyɛn daa daa
Kodu adzekyeé a onnyi ewiei.
Yɛako Zion koko n’ do.
Fié afebͻͻ. 	Amen.

name: MHB 734:1
title: George Rundle Prynne, 1818-1903.
verse:
. JESUS, botooyɛnyi,
Ɔsor Nyame Ba,
Ehumbɔbɔr Agyenkwa,
Tsie Wo mba hɔn su.

name: MHB 734:2
title: George Rundle Prynne, 1818-1903.
verse:
. Fa hɛn mfom 'horow kyɛ hɛn,
Yi hɛn fi mpokyerɛ m',
Bubu ehonyi biara a 
Hɛn akra da ho dze m'.

name: MHB 734:3
title: George Rundle Prynne, 1818-1903.
verse:
. Ma hɛn fahodzi krɔnn,
Hyɛ hɛn akoma dɔ ma
Jesus krɔnkrɔn, twe hɛn
Bɛn sor ahenman mu.

name: MHB 734:4
title: George Rundle Prynne, 1818-1903.
verse:
. Dzi hɛn kan hɛn akwantu m',
Yɛ Woho ɔkwan n'
Wɔ wiadze sum kapee m'
Kodu sor afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 734:5
title: George Rundle Prynne, 1818-1903.
verse:
. JESUS, botooyɛnyi,
Ɔsor Nyame Ba,
Ehumbɔbɔr Agyenkwa,
Tsie Wo mba hɛn su.  Amen.

name: MHB 735:1
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. BER a bérɛfo hwehwɛ ahomgye n’,
Oguan kͻ W’ yiedzi m’,
Bér a ’dzesoafo tow adzesoa
Nyina gu W’enyim;
Bér a hͻn a wͻahaw pɛ asomdwee n’
Wͻbͻbͻ Wo dzin;
Bér a abͻnfo hwehwɛ nkwa,
Twa hwe W’anànadze n’:
    O Ewuradze, ͻdͻ m ’ ara,
    Fi Wo sor tsénabea do tsie hͻn.

name: MHB 735:2
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 735:3
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 736:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Guanhwɛfo pa, dom hɛn Wo mboa 
Wɔ hɛn mbusu nda yim',
Tum a wɔdze weɔn, wɔdze sɔr,
Fa ma Wo mba nyina.

name: MHB 736:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ber a yɛda ho da nsɔhwɛm', 
Ber a yɛso mbeamudua 'i,
Ma yɛmfa hɛn kra nto Wo do
Wɔ mpaabɔ a ɔmmbɔ adzem'.

name: MHB 736:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma yendua gyedzim' hɛn nsa nka 
M-paabɔ sunsum no;
Yemmia ndzi ako gyedɛ yehu
W' enyim nye Wo dzin pa n'.

name: MHB 736:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma 'koma biara nsu nka dɛ: 
Minnkegyaa Wo ma akɔ,
Gyedɛ ama m' dɔ a odzi mu,
Na edze Woho akyɛ m'.

name: MHB 736:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Minnkegyaa Wo ma akɔ gyedɛ 
Ebɔ Wo dzin kyerɛ m',
Na egye me kra nkwa nwionn nwionn,
Ma meyɛ dɛ Ɔwo.

name: MHB 736:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ekyir no ma munhu W' enyim 
Wɔ kokwaa n' etsifi,
Mbrɛ wɔmen gyedzi nye mpaabɔ
Wɔ adzehu nye ayɛyim'.  Amen.

name: MHB 737:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. JESU, yɛma hɛn akoma do ma W';
Ma ɔdɔ mbu hɛn akoma nyina do,
Yɛda W' ase, daa akyɛdze n' ntsi 
Yɛda ho nyim W' dzin a ɔsom bo n',
Yenyim dɛ edze hɛn bɔn kyɛ hɛn 
Na yɛtweɔn heaven a ɔwɔ hɛn mu n'.

name: MHB 737:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔhaw kɛse bi a edze akyerɛ
W'ekyirdzifo a wɔasɔ hɛn ahwɛ a!
Yeedua ogya na nsu nyina mu,
Yehun dɛ epue nsuyirii mu,
Yɛtsee nka dɛ 'gyina gyaframee m',
Na yɛkaa m' bɔɔ hɛn Pomfo N' dzin.

name: MHB 737:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn nyina nnyewee, yɛnnsaan hɛn ekyir,
Yɛnndan W'asɔr na Ɔwo nngyae;
Binom wohu 'nyimguase n' bi,
Hɔn enyi gye W'enyimnyam ho,
Wobu mbeamudua 'nyimguase n' bi,
Wɔhwehwɛ nkamfo a ofir Egya n'.

name: MHB 737:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔwo a ahwɛ hɛn do ebodu ndɛ,
Ma yɛnyɛ 'nokwafo nkɔ ewiei;
Wɔdze ahentum ntar hyɛ hɛn a,
Hɛn Jesus besian abɛfa
N'anyɛnkofo na adasefo,
Akɛtsena 'nyimnyam ahengua n' do.  Amen.

name: MHB 738:12
title: Albert Midlane, 1825-1909.
verse:
. Kenyan W' edwuma yi, 
Ewuradze, kyerɛ Wo tum;
Bɔ Wo ndze a onyan ewufom',
Na ma Wo nkorɔfo ntse.
    Kenyan W' edwuma yi, 
    Ber a yɛkotow Wo yi, 
    Sian, ao Ewuradze domfo, sian! 
    Bra behyira hɛn sesei. 
 
. Kenyan W' edwuma yi, 
Ma akra nhwehwɛ nkwa-su n':
O ma hɛn esunsum kɔn ndɔ
N-kwa edziban no!

name: MHB 738:3
title: Albert Midlane, 1825-1909.
verse:
. Kenyan W' edwuma yi, 
Krɔn W' enyimnyam dzin no;
Wo sunsum mma hɛn dɔ m-fram
Mma W' nye Wo mba nyina.

name: MHB 738:4
title: Albert Midlane, 1825-1909.
verse:
. Kenyan W' edwuma yi, 
Ma W' asɛm no nnya tum;
Ma wɔmfa enyikan gyedzi ntsie
W' asɛmpa a nhyira wɔm' n'.

name: MHB 738:5
title: Albert Midlane, 1825-1909.
verse:
. Kenyan W' edwuma yi, 
Tɔ Pentecost bɔw no;
Na enyimnyam no bɛyɛ Wodze,
Na nhyira n' aka hɛn.

name: MHB 739:1
title: George MacDonald, 1824-1905.
verse:
. HƐN Egya, tsie hɛn mpaabɔ yi,
Boa ma mpaabɔ yi mpem,
Na ma adwen brɛfo a ofir Wo n',
Mbɛtsena hɛn mu na onyin.

name: MHB 739:2
title: George MacDonald, 1824-1905.
verse:
. Akoma brɛfo no bɛtse
'Somdwee na dɛw n' ase,
Dza ɔwɔ Wo sor asetsena mu
'Homka wɔ W'enyi do.

name: MHB 739:3
title: George MacDonald, 1824-1905.
verse:
. Ma hɛn ahobrɛadze ama
W'ahendzi aaba hɛn mu,
Na sɛ Wo mba no rokɔ fie a,
Hɛn so yaakɔ hɔ bi.

name: MHB 739:4
title: George MacDonald, 1824-1905.
verse:
. Gyefo tsie hɛn! Yɛyɛ Wodze,
Sɛ yɛnntse dɛ Ɔwo mpo a;
Fa Wo Sunsum n' hyɛ akoma
Brɛfo a ɔtwer Wo mu.  Amen.

name: MHB 74:1
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.
verse:
. AYƐYI nka sor Krɔnkrɔnyi,
Wonyi N'ayɛw wɔ ase:
Ne nsɛm a ɔyɛ nwanwa nyina m',
N'akwan nyina tsim hɔ.

name: MHB 74:2
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.
verse:
. O hɛn Nyame Ne nyansa dɔ,
Bɔn na enyimguase mu,
Adam a ɔtɔ do ebien bae
Bɛgyee hɛn nyina fii mu.

name: MHB 74:3
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.
verse:
. Nyansa dɔ! Honam, bɔgya a
'Hwee famu wɔ Adam mu n',
Bɛsan nye tamfo no aper,
Bɛper edzi konyim.

name: MHB 74:4
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.
verse:
. Akyɛdze kɛse a ɔkyen adom
Ntsew honam, bɔgya ho;
Nyame ankasa nye No su
Na odzi dɛm dwuma n'.

name: MHB 74:5
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.
verse:
. Ɔdɔ ayamuyie nye yi,
Dɛ Nyia ɔsɛɛ tamfo n'
Nyimpa n'amandzehu mprɛnu n',
Noara so duaa mu bi.

name: MHB 74:6
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.
verse:
. Nsumaa mu, wɔ turo no mu,
Na mbeamudua no do so,
Ɔkyerɛɛ No nuamom, hyɛɛ hɔn dzen, 
Wɔ amandzehu na wu m'.

name: MHB 74:7
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.
verse:
. Ayɛyi nka sor Krɔnkrɔnyi,
Wonyi N'ayɛw wɔ ase:
Ne nsɛm a ɔyɛ nwanwa nyina m',
N'akwan nyina tsim hɔ.

name: MHB 740:1
title: John Julian, 1839-1913.
verse:
. NYIMPA nyinà Egya, yɛdze
Dͻ akoma bͻ Wo mpaa,
’Nam Nyià ama N’ mbͻbͻrhu,
Nkwa, nokwar ͻkwan do;
