Fi sor ahengua do hue W’adom
Na Wo nhyira N’ gu hɛn etsir do.

name: MHB 740:2
title: John Julian, 1839-1913.
verse:
. Nyimpa nyinà Egya, yɛdze
Akomà a yaw ahyɛ n’ mà,
Bͻn na yaw biara nnyi m’,
Tow Wo ayɛyi ndwom;
Hom Wo mfar no gu hɛn mu daa,
Ma yɛmfa ntow ndwom pa mma Wo.

name: MHB 740:3
title: John Julian, 1839-1913.
verse:
. Nyimpa nyinà Egya, yɛdze
Suro a ommpue gu ahom
Fi hɛn akoma bun mu,
Ͻnnkasa, nyinsu nko;
Suo hɛn nsamu twa mbusu bea mu,
Egya, gyà ͻba biara a ͻtwer Wo.

name: MHB 740:4
title: John Julian, 1839-1913.
verse:
. Nyimpa nyinà Egya, yɛdze
Hɛn ngyirama yi W’ ayɛw,
Bér a dɛw hyɛ hɛn akra mà
Nà enyigyé a no mu dͻ;
Ehum nà aahow mu ma yenhu
Asomdwee kwàn a ͻdze ba W' nkyɛn.
		Amen.

name: MHB 741:1
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: MHB 741:2
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.
verse:
. Yensuroo Wo dɛ mbrɛ ɔfata,
Yɛmmbɔɔ hɛn mu adze wɔ W'enyim,
Yɛnnkoraa ndzeyɛɛ, kasa na adwen,
Ber a yɛkaa dɛ Nyame bɛn hɛn;
Ewuradze, ma yenhu dɛ ebɛn,
Na ma hɛn suro mapa ho adom.

name: MHB 741:3
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: MHB 741:4
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.
verse:
. Yɛnnsoom Wo dɛ mbrɛ ɔfata,
Ebei! Yɛannyɛ hɛn asɛdze no,
Edwuma n' so yɛayɛ n' bi-na-bi,
Yeedzi 'kogu; hɛn konyim nnye!
Ewuradze, ma hɛn mbanyinndam,
Yɛmfona mma W', yɛnko mma Wo.

name: MHB 741:5
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.
verse:
. Ber bɛn na yebohu Wo yie,
Yeesuro Wo, yɛasom Wo yie?
Wobeyi hɛn nsɔhwɛ m' ber bɛn
Ma yeedzi mu kan asaase n' do?
Hɛn Wura, ma daa yɛnyɛ ahoboa,
Nhu W'enyim na yɛnsom W' wɔ hɔ.  Amen

name: MHB 742:1
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.
verse:
. YԐBϽϽ mpaa dɛ W’ahendzi mbra,
Mfe a etwa m’ yebuu ntwɛr;
Akrà anokwafo pɛ ehu
Ahendzi n’ saase do.

name: MHB 742:2
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.
verse:
. Naaso anafua weͻn nyaa no,
Onnye mma Nyame koraa,
Na komm nworaba no yɛ dzen
Ma kyɛfa afebͻͻ.

name: MHB 742:3
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.
verse:
. Hwɛ, wͻwͻ akoko n’ do dada,
Adzekyee mfrankaa pue,
Nkͻnhyɛfo, hom mbͻ hom asen do,
Hom nkà dɛ da n’ abɛn:

name: MHB 742:4
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.
verse:
. Da no a ne kan bɛhyerɛn petee n’,
Bͻn nyina bɛdà edzi,
Ber a pɛrpɛr betsim hͻ pintsinn,
Na yaw biarà efi hͻ.

name: MHB 742:5
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.
verse:
. Nyimdzee nye asomdwee bͻ mu a,
Nà okyin wiadze do hyia;
Tsenenee a odzi mu da no,
Nyame anohoba da n’.

name: MHB 743:1
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.
verse:
. ƆNNYƐ hɛn bɔn nko ntsi
Na yɛserɛ W' mbɔbɔrhu;
Fa W' mbɔbɔrhu enyi
Hwɛ hɛn adzeserɛ yi
Wɔ dza yɛayɛ ama Wo
Na dza yɛdwen ho yɛ.

name: MHB 743:2
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.
verse:
. Yɛdze mber krɔnkrɔn no
Bu nkotodwe bɔ mpaa,
Mber a yesusu dɛ
Hɛn ndwom bɔsɔ W'enyi
Ɔwo a 'hwehwɛ akoma m',
Dom hɔn W'ehumbɔbɔr.

name: MHB 743:3
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.
verse:
. Na akyɛdze a yɛdze brɛ W',
Anohoba a yɛbɔ
Ɔdɔ ndwuma nyina a
Ɔwo ntsi yɛhyehyɛ n',
Ehumbɔbɔr Nyame,
Fa kɔ adwendwen mu.

name: MHB 743:4
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.
verse:
. Nkanka hɛn Wo nguan kuw
Ba W'afɔrmbukyia enyim a,
Na adwenbɔn a ɔyɛ hu 
Nye mber dɛɛdɛw dzi afora a,
Nyia a owui ntsi yɛserɛ W',
Dɛ Owura pa, boa hɛn.

name: MHB 743:5
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: MHB 744:1
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Ahomka da ɔnye da n' a 
Medze moho maa m' Agyenkwa!
Ɔsɛ dɛ mo 'koma dzi dɛw
Na ɔka ne dɛw kyerɛ aman.

name: MHB 744:234
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
Ahomka da! ahomka da! 
  Da a Jesus hoor mo ho bɔn nyina 
  Ɔkyerɛɛ m' dɛ monweɔn na monsɔr 
  Na mindzi dɛw aber nyina 
  Ahomka da! ahomka da! 
  Da a Jesus hoor mo ho bɔn nyina! 
 
. Siar n-hyehyɛɛ! ɔsɔw nsew a 
Midzii kyerɛɛ mo Dɔfo n' ano!
Ber a meba N' asɔrfim' yi,
Wɔmma ayɛyindwom nhyɛ hɔ ma.
 
. Ahyɛmu kɛse no yeewie dzi! 
Mo Wura dze nye m', No so yɛ medze;
Ɔtwetwee m' ma mekaa No do,
Ne Nyame ndze n' ɔyɛ me dɛw.
 
. M' akoma a ekyima akyɛr 
Bɔhom wɔ ahomka bea ha:
Mma mmfi w' Ewuradze nkyɛn da
Afa N' a, afa siar nyina.

name: MHB 744:5
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
.  Sor man nyina a hom tsee me nsew n, 
M' besi do daa ma hom aatse,
Akɛpem da a owu bɛba a
M' behyira me kra wɔ nsew yi ho.

name: MHB 745:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. WϽNKAMFO hɛn pomfo Ewuradze,
N’adom kà hɛn bͻ mu,
Ͻhyɛ hɛn nyina dɛ yɛnyɛ kor;
Yɛbͻ m’ hwehwɛ N’enyim.

name: MHB 745:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ͻhyɛ hɛn dɛ yɛmboa hɛnho;
Na yɛbͻ mu yɛ kor,
Hɛn enyidar frɛ a ͻkrͻn,
Yetu anamͻn kͻ enyim.

name: MHB 745:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Akyɛdzé a ͻdze ma nkorkor n’,
Yɛdze dͻ bͻsͻ ahwɛ;
Adom pem fa kuraba biara m’,
Wͻ dͻ esu a odzi mu m’.

name: MHB 745:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. M-po yɛdwen, ka asɛm kor,
Na nokwar mu yɛpen;
Nam Jesus dzin mu ba fakor.
Wͻ koryɛ a odzi mu m’.

name: MHB 745:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛbͻ m’ yenya enyigye kor,
Tse asomdwee kor nkà,
Asomdweé a wͻnntse n’ adwen mu.
Dɛw a onnyi kabea.

name: MHB 745:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Sɛ hɛn anyɛnkoyɛ wͻ famu ha
Wͻ Jesus mu yɛ dɛw a,
Yehyia mu ahengua no ho a,
Enyi bɛgye mbordo.

name: MHB 746:1
title: Frances Jan van Alstyne, 1820-1915.

name: MHB 746:2
title: Frances Jan van Alstyne, 1820-1915.
verse:
. Owura, tsew mo ho ma Wo som sesei.
Fa W’adom tum krͻnkrͻn no:
Ma me kra mfà enyidado a otsim hͻ.
Na me pɛ bɛhyɛ Wodze m’.

name: MHB 746:3
title: Frances Jan van Alstyne, 1820-1915.
verse:
. O mber kakraabi no mu enyigyé a
Midzi wͻ W’ahengua enyim,
Menye W’ me Nyame, bu ntwɛr we mpaabͻ m’,
Dɛ nyɛnko nye nyɛnko hyia.

name: MHB 746:4
title: Frances Jan van Alstyne, 1820-1915.
verse:
. Ͻdͻ ebun wͻ hͻ a munnkontum ehu,
Gyedɛ mutwa po tseàa no;
Dɛw nkokwaa wͻ hͻ a munnkotum edu
Kɛpem dɛ m’bͻhom Wo mu.

name: MHB 747:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. NDAASE nkà Eguambaà a
Ͻma yehyia mu:
Yɛka N’ dͻ ho asɛm,
Yɛtow N’ayɛyi;
Jesus yɛ hɛndze daa,
Ͻbɛn hɛn dabaa,
Dze mfom kyɛ na ohyira hɛn,
Na ͻma yedzi mu.

name: MHB 747:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. No mu wͻ asomdwee,
No mu yɛwͻ tum,
N’adom no kora hɛn
Wͻ anago sum no m’;
Hɛn nsͻhwɛ nyina mu no,
Ͻkora hɛn ma
Yehu No nkwagye na
No dͻ a odzi mu.

name: MHB 747:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 747:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O yɛbɛyɛ dɛn
Yeedua hɛn Agyenkwa n’?
Nyame, fi sor bra
Bɛyɛ hɛn fofor:
Ma hɛn W’ayamuhyehye
Na krͻnkrͻnyɛ aba,
Ma hɛn nkwagye no a
Obiara gye dzi n’.

name: MHB 747:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ka enyigyesɛm n’ kyerɛ,
Na yɛ hɛn adehye;
Sɛ nnyɛ Ͻwo Ewuradze a,
Me nhyira fi hen?
Asomdweé a edzé ama n’,
Ma me bi sesei,
Na bue Wo dͻ ahenman n’
Wͻ m’akoma mu.

name: MHB 747:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Christ, bra na besian
Dodopo gyirama,
Na kyerɛ hɛn so
Sunsum mu ndwom no;
Mma yenngyaa ara da dɛ
Yɛda W’adom ase,
Nye enyimnyam, na nhyira,
’Nyidzi na ayɛyi.

name: MHB 748:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. HOM mbra na yɛmbͻ m’ yenyi
Christ ayɛw wͻ adwontow mu;
Hɛn nyina mbͻ mu nyɛ kor,
Mfà enyimnyam mma Ewuradze.

name: MHB 748:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛmma nsa, akoma nye ndze do
Yɛntow ndwom dɛ tsetseber n’,
Yɛmfà adwen ntsim sor dɛw do,
Ndzi ͻdͻ afahyɛ no.

name: MHB 748:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yedzi aper wͻ dͻ mu;
Ma ogyaframee no nkenyan
Dɛ mbrɛ ͻyɛɛ wͻ atͻfo n’ mu,
Wowui maa hͻn Nyankopͻn.

name: MHB 748:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛbɛtséna, adͻ dɛ hͻn,
Dɛ yɛnda hͻn dɛw edzi;
Wͻagye hɛn nyina wͻ ebufuw m’,
Yɛnye hͻn bͻ m’, gyedzi kor m'.

name: MHB 748:56
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛntow ndwom Jesus dzin mu,
Dɛ mbrɛ ͻtse wͻ ndeda;
Yɛyɛ kor wͻ beebiara,
Nokwar nyé adom ahyɛ hɛn mà.
. Yegyina ma Christ, hɛn wura,
Kan ma wiadze a ntseasee nnyi m':
Yedzi hɛn Wura ho dase;
Yedzi dase ma Jesus.

name: MHB 748:7
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yedzi dase, Christ ewu,
Wͻabͻ hɛn nye N’ mbeamudua m’;
Christ atsew wu hu no mu,
Yɛhom Ne nkenyan Sunsum m’.

name: MHB 748:8
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Afei Christ afow kͻ sor,
Hɛn apɛdze nyina kͻ hͻ;
Ͻtse Nyankopͻn nyimfa,
Yɛnye N’ dzi hen wͻ dͻ mu.

name: MHB 749:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. HOM mbra ma yɛmfa Nyamé adom,
Hɛn nyina nyɛ ano kor,
Yɛmbͻ m’ yɛnye hɛn Christ nyɛ kor
Yendzi ahyɛmu afebͻͻ:

name: MHB 749:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Jesu tum m’ , yɛdze hɛnho ma W’,
Hyɛ Ne dzin enyimnyam;
Yɛhyɛ bͻ dͻnhwer krͻnkrͻn yi m’,
Yɛatséna, yeewu Nyame m'.

name: MHB 749:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ahyɛmu a yeridzi dem ber yi,
Yemfa nsie hɛn adwen m’ daa:
Yɛnnkapa hɛn Nyamé ara bio,
Yennkegya N'asɛm ekyir.

name: MHB 749:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yennkegyaa Nyià a otsie hɛn nsewdzi n’
No ho suro n’ ekyir,
Na sɛ epɛ dɛ itsie hɛn a,
Sian, behyia hɛn sesei.

name: MHB 749:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Fa ahyɛm' bͻgya n’ ka obiara ho,
Ma onyi hɛn bͻn nyina nkͻ;
Na kyerɛw hɛn edzin Wͻ sor,
Kora hɛn kodu da no.              Amen.

name: MHB 75:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. EGYA a Wo dɔ a onnyi ewiei
Dze Wo Ba kortsee n' maa abɔn,
W'adom a edze ma kwa no,
'Somaa No bɛgyee wiadze nkwa.

name: MHB 75:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Boa ma yɛnkamfo W'mbɔbɔrhu,
Ɔso, dɔ, ɔwɔ mbea nyina;
Yɛnkamfo Eguambaa a owui maa hɛn,
Adasa nyina Agyenkwa.

name: MHB 75:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyiyimu a ennyɛ no da n',
Edze sii Adam asehwefo do,
Na esiesie nkwagye adom a, odzi mu,
Ama obiara wɔ Christ mu.

name: MHB 75:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ohun amandze dze gyee wiadze, 
Na ɔpataa maa obiara;
Ɔdze No nkwa so bɔɔ afɔr
Maa hɔn a wɔmmpɛ aba Ne nkyɛn

name: MHB 75:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nyame, soɛr ma W'asɛm do,
Na frɛ amanaman nyina;
Ma Wo mbeamudua frankaa no do,
Na Wo wu n' bɛyɛ adasa dze.

name: MHB 750:1
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.
verse:
. O NYAME, mpɛn pii na atse m’ su,
Na enam ehumbͻbͻr m’ etsie m’!
Bér a morosͻr W’afͻrmbukyia ho n’,
Musuu bͻkͻͻ, mehyɛɛ bͻ bi,
Na aa! Onyimpa ne mbérɛwyɛ a!
Mennhyɛɛ bͻ na munnsuu gyan bi?

name: MHB 750:2
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 750:3
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 750:4
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.
verse:
. Ndɛ da ’i, megyé ahyɛmudzi n’ moto m’.
Bͻhyɛ nà asomdwee nkyekyeree n’;
M’adwen nnkɛyɛ m’ nàà, No tum ho,
Wͻdze Jesu bͻgyaa asͻw ano ’i.
Bͻgyà a motwer, dɛm bͻgya n’ nko,
Me nsa nkà ahyɛmudzi n’asomdwee n '

name: MHB 750:5
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.
verse:
. Dɛ me gyedzi nnkohu nsakyer,
Mber ntamu, anaa ewiei bio n’,
Boa m’ ma mennantsew W’akwan mu,
Na tsie me ndze sesei, dɛ daa n’,
Na fa mbuae pa hyɛ m’akoma m' dɛw,
Nà Egya, ’nye W’ Ba ndzi nkitaho.
		Amen.

name: MHB 751:1
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Hwɛ mbrɛ Israel Guanhwɛfo 
Esi dze dɔ gyina hɔ;
Tsie! ɔrefrɛ m- bɔtoaba,
Ɔreyɛ hɔn etuu.

name: MHB 751:2
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Ɔse, Hom ngyaa hɔn ma wɔmbra, 
Mma hom mmbu hɔn 'nyimtsia!
Osian akra yinom n-tsi
Na Ewuradze bae.

name: MHB 751:3
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. O, Ewuradze, ndaasem' ara 
Na yɛdze hɔn brɛ Wo,
Yedzi dɛw dɛ yɛyɛ Wodze,
Hɛn mba so nyɛ Wodze.   Amen.

name: MHB 752:1
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;
verse:
. SIARFO Jesus, yegyina ha, 
Yeehyia m’ dɛ mbrɛ Ͻwo kae no;
Yɛdze dɛm abofra yi brɛ W’,
Dɛ mbrɛ ahyɛ hɛn dɛ yɛnyɛ n’,
Christ, yɛdze no ma W’ wͻ ha dɛm,
Yinom dɛm na wͻsɛ W’ heaven.

name: MHB 752:2
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;
verse:
. Ntsi yɛyɛ ntsɛm ba Wo hͻ:
O gye bͻhyɛ a yɛdze ba yi; 
Yenhu W’enyimnyam wͻ ha,
Na mbeberhu mapa mu ya n'
Wo ba sesei na mma nngyaa n’ da,
Yɛ n’ Wodze wͻ ha, na afebͻͻ.

name: MHB 752:3
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;

name: MHB 753:1
title: Howell Elvet Lewis, 1860-
verse:
. FIE Nyɛnko, dɛ mbrɛ osii Galilee ma
Abaatan dze hɔn mbɔtoaba brɛɛ Wo n',
Dɔ Ewuradze, hɛn so yɛdze mbofra 'i ba,
Na yɛpɛ dze hɔn ahyɛ W'astaban ase.

name: MHB 753:2
title: Howell Elvet Lewis, 1860-
verse:
. Wɔyɛ Wodze wɔ Wo dɔ a onnyi ewiei m',
Yenuma hɔn wɔ Nyame Ɔkorsa dzin mu:
Yɛnntwer nsɛmkyerɛdze, mbom Nyame N'adom n',
Ama eesiesie bea ama Wo nguambaa.

name: MHB 753:3
title: Howell Elvet Lewis, 1860-
verse:
. Ewuradze, W'asɔr nyɛ dɛ ɔbaatan n' dɔ,
Ontur nguambaa yi wɔ no bom' mma Wo;
Na dom hɔn sɛ anapa twa m' ma ewia pue a,
Wɔnkɔ do ntsena dɔ na som krɔnkrɔn mu.

name: MHB 753:4
title: Howell Elvet Lewis, 1860-
verse:
. Fa abofra yi do twe awofo n' bɛn Wo,
Ma hɔn fie nkɔ do wɔ ahotsew mu;
Aka wiadze efi abɔ m 'i, boa hɔn ano
Wɔ sor, o Christ, ber a wiadze nda asa n'.  Amen.

name: MHB 754:1
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.
verse:
. Ɔkofo, soɛr gyina, 
Suo Christ mbeamudua n' mu;
Fa wo Pomfo dzin ka ntam dɛ
Apow wiadze ndzɛmba

name: MHB 754:2
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.
verse:
. Soɛr ma wonnuma wo- 
Wɔnhor wo ho bɔn nyina;
'Nye wo Nyankopɔn ndzi ahyɛmu,
Ndɛ to wo gyedzi dzin.

name: MHB 754:3
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.
verse:
. Ndɛ Christ akowaa nye wo 
Wɔkan wo fora esiarfo n',
Ndɛ edɔm tsetse nkɔnhyɛfo n',
Na asomafo n' na atɔfo n'.

name: MHB 754:4
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.
verse:
. Ma Nyame akodze nyina 
Nhyɛ w' dzen; 'nye abɔnsam nko:
Ɔsa n' bɛyɛ dzen, ɔbɛkyɛr,
Na otwar dɛ yedzi nyim.

name: MHB 754:5
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.
verse:
. Konyim abɔtsir n' a! 
Sor ndwom dɛɛdɛw bi n' a!
Yi na Sahen n' dze ma hɔn a
Hɔn gyedzi bedzi nyim!

name: MHB 755:1
title: Heinrich von Laufenburg, 15th cent.;
verse:
. HƐN Ewuradze pa Jesus Christ,
Ɔwo yɛɛ obofra pɛn wɔ ha,
Yɛserɛ Wo, ma W'abofra yi
Wo nhyira na W'adom dabiara.
       O Jesus krɔnkrɔn, Sor Ewuradze,
       Yɛserɛ Wo, weɔn W'abofra yi.

name: MHB 755:2
title: Heinrich von Laufenburg, 15th cent.;
verse:
. Ewuradze, Wo sor Ahenman mu n',
Ndzɛmba nyina tsie W'asɛm krɔnkrɔn n',
Osian dɛm ntsi ma hɛn Wo mboa,
Na kora abofra yi mber nyina.

name: MHB 755:3
title: Heinrich von Laufenburg, 15th cent.;
verse:
. Ma abɔfo nweɔn n' ntwa no ho nhyia
Beebiara, oenyan o, ɔada o;
Ma ɔnsoa Wo mbeamudua krɔnkrɔn n',
Ɔnye ahotsewfo aasoa ahenkyɛw n'. Amen.

name: MHB 756:
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.
verse:
WIADZE paanoo a wobubuu n' adom m',
Ɔkra wenyin a wokyii n' mbɔbɔrm';
Ɔwo na ekaa nkwa asɛm no,
Ɔwo ewu ma hɛn bɔn ewu;
Hwɛ akoma a yaw epira no,
Hwɛ nyinsu a ndzenbɔnyɛfo kyi,
Ma, W'edziban nyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze
Dɛ W'adom nyɛn hɛn akra ampa.

name: MHB 757:1
title: George Osborn Gregory, 1881-
verse:
. WƆNTSERƐW Ewuradze pon no m',
Bubu paanoo na hue nsa n',
Yeehyia pon krɔnkrɔn no ho,
Yebedzi sor edziban no.

name: MHB 757:2
title: George Osborn Gregory, 1881-
verse:
. Gyedzi m', 'hotsewfo atɔfo,
Adan hɔn enyi ahwɛ mbeamudua n',
Wɔwɔ afɔrbɔ yi m' kyɛfa,
Hɔn nkwa na hɔn wu mu nyina.

name: MHB 757:3
title: George Osborn Gregory, 1881-
verse:
. 'Hobrɛadze m' yɛper kyɛfa
Wɔ enyimnyam kuw no mu,
Dze dzin no hoahoa hɛnho;
O Christ, yɛnye W' bu paanoo n'.

name: MHB 757:4
title: George Osborn Gregory, 1881-
verse:
. Wo dɔ ho nkaakaa no ntsi,
Yɛma mbeamudua n' do wɔ sor,
Dze hyɛ Ɔwo Nyame enyimnyam;
Fa W' Sunsum afowa twa hɛn ho.

name: MHB 757:5
title: George Osborn Gregory, 1881-
verse:
. Wo tum nsa n' gya hɛn abamba ''i,
Yɛbɛhyɛ W'adwen nyin ama;
Yebedzi W' mbra biara do,
Yɛdze ɔpɛ pa bɔsom Wo.

name: MHB 758:1234
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
. Ewuradze Krɔnkrɔn, memmfata 
Dɛ 'Wo 'bɛba mo hɔ,
Kasa ara: ka adomsɛm kor, 
Na me kra ho bɛsan.
 
. Memmfata: me kra mu tsenabew 
Yɛ nwinwin, yɛ nkɔnkɔw;
Ebɛyɛ dɛn ahɛn mu hɔ?
Kasa, na m'bɛtse apɔw.
 
. Memmfata dze; na m'bɛyɛ dɛn 
Mesiw me Nyame kwan?
Ɔwo a Wo honam nye bɔgyaa
Edze tɔɔ nkwa maa me.
 
. Obra! Anapa *bɔw yi mu 
Fa Woho bɛnyɛn me;
Fa Wo dɔ nye Wo tum nyina
Bɛyhɛ m'akoma ma. Amen.

name: MHB 759:1
title: William Bright, 1824-1901.
verse:
. Afei hɛn Egya yɛrekaa Wo dɔ n', 
Dɔ a ɔtɔɔ hɛn prɛko wɔ mbeamudua n' do n';
Na hɛn sor Dzimafo n' so wɔ ha yi,
Yɛtrɛ hɛn afɔrbɔdze mu ma Wo,
Afɔrbɔdze a no nko fata W'enyim,
Jesus, nokwar afɔrbɔdze a otsim.

name: MHB 759:2
title: William Bright, 1824-1901.

name: MHB 759:3
title: William Bright, 1824-1901.

name: MHB 759:4
title: William Bright, 1824-1901.
verse:
. N-tsi yɛaba; twe hɛn pin W'anan ho, 
Agyenkwa pa a yɛafom mpo a edɔ hɛn;
Edziban dɛɛdɛw mu yɛ hu yi,
Dua do yi hɛn fi mbusu nyina ho:
Ma hɛn dɛw na fahodzi Wo som mu,
Na mma nngya hɛn mma yemmfi Wo 
nkyɛn da.   Amen.

name: MHB 76:12345
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
. Ɔdɔ Hen nye mo Guanhwɛfo, 
N' ayamuyie mmpa ara da;
Meyɛ Nedze ma ɔyɛ medze aba,
Mirinnhia hweeara da.
 
. Mbrɛ nkwa esutsen fi pem no, 
Hɔ na ogya me kra kɔ,
Ɔdze sor edziban nyɛn me
Wɔ mbrɛ m-funoma wɔ no.
 
. M-ber pii na mikyiin bɔn mu, 
Na ɔdze dɔ hwehwɛɛ me;
Ɔdze me too Ne batsir do
Dze me baa fie edɛw mu.
 
. Owu bɔnsam' munnsuro mbusu, 
Ber a, mo Wura, ebɛn me;
W' abaw na Wo poma hyɛ m' dzen,
Na Woara idzi m' enyim.
 
. 'Wo na eto pon wɔ m' enyim; 
Ihue adom gu mo do;
Ao, enyigye bɛn na ofi
Wo kuraba mu bu do!

name: MHB 76:6
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.
verse:
. Dɛm na W' ayamuyie mmpa ara da, 
Mo nkwa nda nyinara mu;
Mo Guanhwɛfo pa, ma montow
W' ayɛyi wɔ Wo fie daa!   Amen.

name: MHB 760:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. GYEFO, na ɔbɛyɛ dɛ
Ebɛtsena emi mo mu?
Ifi W'ahengua pa do,
'Hengua a nhyira wɔ ho afebɔɔ 'i,
Obirɛpɔn ''bɔto W'ho famu
Abɛhɛn dɛm fie yi mu?

name: MHB 760:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ewuradze, memmfata,
Mo ho yɛ nkɔw yie!
Dɛ me Nyame, megye Wo
Wɔ akoma a aprɔw yi mu:
'Mi bɔnyɛnyi kohwinyi;
M'abrabɔ ka mu dɛ: Gya m' hɔ.

name: MHB 760:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Na bra, Ɔwo a fi sor,
Na bɛtsew mo bo ho;
Bra, Ɔwo ''nyimnyam Hen pa,
Ber a mokotow Wo mbeamudua ''i,
Woara fa Wo nkwagye n' bra,
Bɛhɛn fie yi mu tsew ho.  Amen.

name: MHB 761:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. JESUS, yetsie W'asɛm,
W'ewiei na adɔyɛ asɛm;
Wɔ Wo mber pa mu wɔ ha no,
Hɛn Wura, yɛba bheyia W'.

name: MHB 761:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yebua hɛn akoma m',
Ma Agyenkwa n' aaba m',
Na hwɛ! Eguambaa a wokum No n',
Abɔn adamfo n' aba.

name: MHB 761:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wo mbae ma hɛn enyigye:
Ndɛ ma hɛn sunsum ntse
Enyimnyam a onnyi kabea,
Enyigye a wɔnnka mpo:

name: MHB 761:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Edze ahenman mu dɛw
Kyekye hɛn akra werɛ.
Fie yi yɛ W'apontu fie pa,
Na edze hɛn aba ha.

name: MHB 761:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O fa sor edziban
Nyɛn hɛn akra dabaa,
Na tserɛw Wo dɔ a onnyi ewiei
Frankaa no wɔ hɛn do.  Amen.

name: MHB 762:1
title: Thomas Cotterill, 1779-1823.
verse:
. Agyenkwa no dɔ ho nkaa ntsi 
Na yɛaba pon yi ho:
Ha na Jesus to nsa dze frɛ
Hɔn a woenu hɔnho.

name: MHB 762:2
title: Thomas Cotterill, 1779-1823.
verse:
. Yɛnam gyedzim' fa nkwa paano 
Yɛdze nyɛn hɛn akra;
Yɛnom wenyin dze kaa bɔgya a
Ogui maa abɔn no.

name: MHB 762:3
title: Thomas Cotterill, 1779-1823.
verse:
. Ha na yɛtow ndwom yɛkamfo 
Jesus N'anwanwa dɔ;
Da bi sor aponto edziban
Na yɛsɔ hwɛ wɔ ha.

name: MHB 763:1
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ W'adom Asɛm no tse, 
Ahobrɛadzem' ara
Yi na m'bɛyɛ, m'Ewuradze a
'Ruwu, mebɛkaa Wo.

name: MHB 763:2
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Wo honam a 'mi ntsi wobui n' 
Bɛyɛ mo sor paanoo;
W'ahyɛmudze kuraba n' na megye,
Ma medze makaa Wo.

name: MHB 763:3
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Sɛ medan m'enyi hwɛ mbeamudua n' 
Na mohom Calvary hɔ a
Nyame Egumba e, m'afɔrdze e,
Otwar dɛ mekaa Wo.

name: MHB 763:4
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. M'bɛkaa W' ɔnnye Wo fona nyina, 
Nye Wo dɔ a adɔ m' nyina 
Nyew ber a ahom kakra wɔ hɔ 'i
M'bɛda ho ara makaa W'.

name: MHB 763:5
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Na aber a mobɔtɔ mmum 
Na adwen na nkaa bɛhera n'
Ber a 'nam W'ahendzim' bɛba n'
Jesus, ɔyɛ a kaa me.

name: MHB 764:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. ƆSOR n-kwa Mafo,
Ɔwo a ''dze sunsum m' nsa
Na onnyiewiei paanoo,
Ato hɛn pon nwanwa,
Kora nkwa a edze ama hɛn no,
Nyɛn hɛn, tsetse hɛn ma heaven.

name: MHB 764:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hyɛ hɛn akra ehiafo dzen
Wɔ ɔdɔ fofor koraa mu;
Ber a yenya Wo nkwa no,
Na yehu W'emudzi n',
Na W'adom mapa ahyɛ hɛn dzen n',
Dɛm na yehu W'enyim petee. Amen.

name: MHB 765:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. BRA, Ɔwo Sunsum bɛkyebo,
Ma Agyenkwa N' wu ho siar
Na N'adasa ho amandzehu n',
Mbra adwen a ɔwɔ nkaa biara m'.

name: MHB 765:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. No dɔ ho Kyerɛwfo nokwafo,
Petse gyedzi a otsim hɔ daa n';
Da No nkwagye kɛse n' edzi,
Bɔ N' nsɛmpa n' dawur kyerɛ hɛn.

name: MHB 765:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Bra, o No wu ho Dasefo;
Bra, Ɔwo sor Kaakaafo,
Ma yɛntse Wo tum ne nka, na
Ma emi na ɔkra bia 'a nya Christ.   Amen.

name: MHB 766:12
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.
verse:
. Ma yenhu W' ber a yeridzidzi, 
Na mma nn-dan hɛn nngya;
Agyenkwa, nye hɛn ntsena, na to
Wo pon hɛn 'koma mu.
 
. Enye hɛn ndzidzi Nyame dɔm'; 
Wo honam na bɔgyaa,
N-kwa paanoo, sor wenyin no,
Nyɛ hɛn edziban daa.   Amen.

name: MHB 767:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. SUNSUM Krɔnkrɔn, bɛhyɛ hɛn do,
Na yenhu nsɛnkyerɛdze;
Ma Wo nkwa mbra paanoo no mu,
Wo tum nhyɛ nsa no mu.

name: MHB 767:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma nsɛnkyerɛdze 'i nda edzi petee,
Na ma ɔmfa sor kwan do;
Siesie akwan ma wɔmfa W' dɔ n'
Nhɛn nokwar akoma biara m'. Amen.

name: MHB 768:1
title: Thomas Aquinas, c. 1227-74; Ray Palmer, 1808-87.
verse:
. O AKWANTUFO paanoo,
Edziban a abɔfo dzi,
O Manna a ofi sor ba
Ma hɔn a hɔn awoo fo sor, 
Fa ma hɛn, hɛn enyi da kwan
Dɛ yebedzi amee,
'Kodu wiadze enyigye ewiei,
Hɛn pɛ nyina bɔbɔ adze.

name: MHB 768:2
title: Thomas Aquinas, c. 1227-74; Ray Palmer, 1808-87.
verse:
. O Nsu, ɔwo a ema nkwa,
Fi Agyenkwa n' N'akoma m',
N-subura krɔnn a ɔpem,
Eyɛ ɔdɔ nsubura,
O ma hɛn so nsɔ Wo nhwɛ,
Na dwedwe hɛn nsukɔm;
Wo dɛw no nnsa ara da,
Ɔwɔ hɔ afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 768:3
title: Thomas Aquinas, c. 1227-74; Ray Palmer, 1808-87.
verse:
. Jesus, yɛgye edziban yi,
'Wo a yennhu W; yehuhor W';
Yɛgye Wo nokwasɛm dzi,
Yɛgye, yɛnngye kyim bio:
Nokwafo dɔyɛfo, dom hɛn,
Yɛntsena Wo mu wiadze;
Sɛ owu twamu tam rifi hɔ a,
Yeehu W'enyim ne hyerɛn n'. Amen.

name: MHB 769:1
title: Josiah Conder, 1789-1855.
verse:
. Sor paano a enyɛn me, 
'Wo 'yɛ edziban ampa:
Ma nokwar nkwa paano yi
Nyɛn me kra daa daa nyina;
Ɔwo a iwui na etse ase,
Minnya Wo mu ahoɔdzen daa.

name: MHB 769:2
title: Josiah Conder, 1789-1855.
verse:
. Sor Wenyin, fa Wo bɔgyaa 
Hyɛ afɔr kuraba yi ma:
W'epirakur ma n-kwa ,
Mohwɛ W'asɛndua n' nya nkwa;
Ɔwo a eyɛ mo nkwa,
Ma mintsim wo mu pintsinn. Amen.

name: MHB 77:12
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Minsi dɛn mondɔ me Nyame, 
Minsi dɛn nyi N' ayɛw?
Minsi dɛn nhu N' adom no war,
Ne trɛ, no krɔn, no bun?
 
. W' adom tsen du obiara do, 
Na onnyi mbanano;
Ɔto adasamba nyina;
Ɔwɔ hɔ afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 77:3456
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Odu wiadze tɛtɛr nyina, 
Ne trɛ nnyi mbanano;
Ɔtrɛ ma onngya baako mpo,
N-kyɛ ɔpaa mo ho.
 
. Mo mfom nyinii dur sorsor no; 
W' ehumbɔbɔr traa hɔ;
Christ no mu edoom me fakyɛ,
Fakyɛ a wɔnnto n' abaw.
 
. Sor abɔfo bɛn botum akyerɛ 
Wo nkwagye dɔ n' no bun?
W' akyɛdze a onnyi kabea yi,
Ao, ma monsɔ monhwɛ.
 
. Bra ntsɛm, adom Ewuradze, 
Bɛfa Woara Wodze;
W' adaworom, bɛyɛ m' akoma
W' ahengua afebɔɔ.     Amen.

name: MHB 770:1
title: Robert Hall Baynes, 1831-95.
verse:
. JESUS, yɛaba Wo pon ho,
Fa nkwa paanoo mapa no
Nyɛn akoma biara sesei.

name: MHB 770:2
title: Robert Hall Baynes, 1831-95.
verse:
. Yɛdze nnuho kotow ha 'i,
Ma yenhu W'enyim fɛɛfɛw n',
Yi Wo dɔ nwanwa n' kyerɛ hɛn.

name: MHB 770:3
title: Robert Hall Baynes, 1831-95.
verse:
. Ber a yɛhwɛ W'asɛndua yi,
'Ridzi mbɔɔ wɔ hɛn bɔn ho 'i,
Ma hɛn awerɛhow ndan ayɛyi.

name: MHB 770:4
title: Robert Hall Baynes, 1831-95.
verse:
. Sɛ yɛnom wenyin nwanwa a
Ɔkyerɛ Wo bɔgyaa a ihuee a,
Fa sor dɔ n' hyɛ hɛn akoma m'.

name: MHB 770:5
title: Robert Hall Baynes, 1831-95.
verse:
. Ma Wo pira nsa n' nkyerɛ hɛn kwan
Nkodu W'ahengua no ho,
Wɔ kan na man pa no mu.    Amen.

name: MHB 770:5
title: Robert Hall Baynes, 1831-95.
verse:
. Twe hɛn bɛn W'epirakur ho,
Mbrɛ 'yarsa nsu fi pem no,
Hɔ hɛn bɔn na yaw suma.

name: MHB 770:6
title: Robert Hall Baynes, 1831-95.
verse:
. Gye hɛn fi bɔn no mpokyerɛ m',
Hɛn gyedzi nwinwin ndzi mu,
'Guambaa, ma hɛn W'asomdwee.

name: MHB 771:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. 'MANDZEHUNYI, yɛgye W'adom,
Ber a yɛkyerɛ Wo wu a ɔsom bo n',
'Guambaa krɔnn a wɔdze W' mae prɛko,
Eyɛɛ mpata maa adasa nyina
Wɔ W'asɔrfi m' wɔ asaase ha,
Na igyina ahengua n' enyim.

name: MHB 771:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 771:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Onnhia dɛ yɛbɔkɔ heaven
Akɛfa Agyekwan n' aba ha;
'Dze Woho ama obiara dada,
W'aponto ase na wɔakrɔn Wo:
Yi Woho kyerɛ akra nokwafo,
Na yenhu W'ankasa wɔ ha.  Amen.

name: MHB 772:1
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. O Ewuradze, ha na muhu W'enyim, 
Ha na mepɛ mesuo dza wonnhu mu;
Morohwehwɛ menya Nyame N'adom,
Na medze me berɛ mato Wo do.

name: MHB 772:2
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Ha na m'bedzi Onyame edziban, 
Na menye Wo anom ɔsor wenyin;
Na medze m'adzesoa mato n-kyɛn
Na makaa Wo fakyɛ ne dɛw no bio.

name: MHB 772:3
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Edzidzi na adwontow aber nye yi, 
Ɔsor pon na wɔato ama me yi.
Ma menye Wo mbɔ mu yendzidzi ha,
Na enye me ndzi nkitaho dɛɛdɛw.

name: MHB 772:4
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Ɔnnkyɛr na wɔakata nsɛnkyerɛdze n' do: 
Aponto n' etwam'; dɔ no dze nntwam' da.
Woyi paano na wenyin no kɔ mpo a
'Wo, hɛn Kyɛm na Ewia, ebɛn hɛn daa.

name: MHB 772:56
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Minnyi mboa bi dɛ Wo nko Wodze no, 
Na onnhia mpo dɛ motwer obi so.
M'Ewuradze, Woara dɔɔ so ma me,
Wo tum n-ko ara nye m'ahoɔdzen.
 
. Mber pii na yɛaba W'edzidziase: 
Ne nyina kyerɛ hɛn sor dze kɛse no,
Sor edziban a da bi yebedzi 
Na yɛsɔ ne dɛw hwɛ ase ha yi.

name: MHB 773:1
title: George Rawson, 1807-89
verse:
. Christ abɔ werdam apon hɛn, 
No ho nkaabɔdze na yɛyɛ yi;
Yɛkyerɛ hɛn Wura No wu kɛpem
Da a ɔbɛba.

name: MHB 773:2
title: George Rawson, 1807-89
verse:
. No honam a wobui maa hɛn 
Wɔ nkaabɔ paano yi mu ha,
Ɔno na ɔnyɛn hɛn dɔ kɛpem
Da a ɔbɛba.

name: MHB 773:3
title: George Rawson, 1807-89
verse:
. Bɔgya a oruwu a okyii no 
Wenyin yi yɛ ho sɛnkyerɛdze.
Yɛbɔnom ara akɛpem
Da a ɔbɛba.

name: MHB 773:4
title: George Rawson, 1807-89
verse:
. Anago bɔn a wonyii N' mae n' 
Na Ne mbae a odzi ekyir no
Yɛdze dɔ nyɛbea bɔm' kɛpem
Da a ɔbɛba.

name: MHB 773:5
title: George Rawson, 1807-89
verse:
. O, asɛm pa a ɔhyɛ hɛn dzeen!  
Ɔma hɛn akomatɔmu.
Hom mma yengyina dzen nkɛpem
Da a ɔbɛba.

name: MHB 774:1
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.
verse:
. O ƆDƆ Nyame, yɛkotow W',
Na bɔ mpaa ma hɔn a wɔaba ha 'i,
Wɔaka abɔ m' wɔ nsewdzi krɔnkrɔn m',
Ma wɔnye Wo nyɛ kor.

name: MHB 774:2
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.
verse:
. Ber a enyigye pa ahyɛ nda mu n',
Ber a akwan m' da hɔ na wimu yɛ kann,
Wɔnam gyedzi m', nnyɛ dza wonnhu m',
Ma wɔnye Wo nyɛ kor.

name: MHB 774:3
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.
verse:
. Sɛ ehum hyɛ hɔn pɛ ma a,
Na hɔn ndzepa nyinara sɛɛ a,
Na wɔgye Wo dzi koraa ntsi,
Ma wɔnye Wo nyɛ kor.

name: MHB 774:4
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.
verse:
. Dza ɔwɔ ɔbra m' bɛyɛ hɔndze,
Enyigye anaa dadwen mu o,
Tum a wɔdze yɛ, adom a wɔdze sɔw o.
Ma wɔnye Wo nyɛ kor.

name: MHB 774:5
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.
verse:
. Onnyiewiei Dɔ, enye hɔn ntsena;
Fa hɔn sie Wo mu afebɔɔ,
Na owu mpo nnkotum atsew hɔn mu,
Hɔn a Ɔwo yɛ hɔn kor n'.

name: MHB 775:1
title: John Keble, 1792-1866
verse:
. N-dze a wɔtsee wɔ Eden 
Ayerhyia kan n-dze n',
Asɔpɔn awar nhyira n'
Ɔda ho ara wɔ hɔ.

name: MHB 775:2
title: John Keble, 1792-1866
verse:
. Christian ɔbaa na barimba 
So rokɔ awar a,
Nyame Ɔkorsa wɔm' bi,
Na yɛserɛ Ne nhyira:

name: MHB 775:34
title: John Keble, 1792-1866
verse:
. Dɛ ɔndom hɔn m-ba pa, 
Nye dɔ na nokwardzi,
Na ɔndom hɔn koryɛ bi a
Biribiara nntum mmpa mu.
 
. Sor Egya, Woara bɛfa, 
Ayefor yi ma awar,
Dɛ mbrɛ 'dze Eve maa Adam,
Fii noara ne mfem' no.

name: MHB 775:5
title: John Keble, 1792-1866
verse:
. Agyenkwa domfo, bra na 
Bɛka hɔn bɔm' ɔdɔm',
Dɛ mbrɛ edze su ebien
Bɔɔm' wɔ Woara Wo mu n'

name: MHB 775:678
title: John Keble, 1792-1866
verse:
. Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, behyira hɔn, 
Ber a wɔrobɔ mpaa yi,
Dɛ mbrɛ ehyira Christ N'Asɔr
Ma ɔyɛ N'Ayefor n'.
 
. Tserɛw W'atsaban wɔ hɔn do, 
Pa hɔn mbusu nyina,-
Ber a worutu anamɔn
Ba W'afɔrmbukyia ho,
 
. Dze hɔn 'nyimnyam abɔtsir 
Abɔbɔ Wo afɔr,-
Kɛpem dɛ wɔnye Agyenkwa
N' Ayefor no bɔsoɛr.

name: MHB 776:1
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Egya, adze nyina Yɛfo, 
Wo nyansaa, tum na dɔ
Dzii kan dze akra ebien bɔɔm'
Wɔ Eden ture mu;
N-dɛ fa nkan n' akyɛdze n'
Ma Wo mbofra yi so,
Ofi a W'asomdwee wɔ mu,
Ɔdɔ a nokwardzi wɔm'.

name: MHB 776:2
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Gyefo a ekɔr Galilee 
Ayeforase hɔ,
N-dɛ so fa enyimpa ma
Hɔn a wɔfrɛ Wo yi:
Ma hɔn wiadze enyigye
Ɔndan sor enyingye
Na wɔsɔ hwɛ a, ma wonhu
Dɛ Woara W'akyɛdze a.

name: MHB 776:3
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. O Nyame Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, 
Ɔwo a Wo dɔ yɛ dzen,
W'ahotsewee so dzi mu,
Fi sor gu hɔn do ahom,
Ama Woara wowaw hɔn
Fi ntokwaa ho n-tsi,
Hɔn bra aakyerɛ dɛ 'Wo na 
Ehyɛ hɔn 'koma do.

name: MHB 776:4
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 777:1
title: Dorothy Frances Gurney, 1858-1932.
verse:
. O ƆDƆ mapa, ebor nyimpa adwen do,
Yɛkotow W'ahengua enyim na yɛserɛ
Dɛ hɔn a eka hɔn bɔ m' afebɔɔ yi
Nnya ɔdɔ a no do nntwa da biara da.

name: MHB 777:2
title: Dorothy Frances Gurney, 1858-1932.
verse:
. O N-kwa mapa, yɛ hɔn awerɛhyɛm' koraa,
Ayamuyie mapa na gyedzi a otsim,
Abotar enyidar, 'kokodur a ɔsɔw berɛ,
Awerɛhyɛmu a onnsuro yaw na owu.

name: MHB 777:3
title: Dorothy Frances Gurney, 1858-1932.
verse:
. Dom hɔn dɛw a ɔsesa wiadze awerɛhow,
Dom hɔn asomdwee a ɔdwedwe 
wiadze haw;
Ma hɔn nkwa nda mu enyimnyam adzekyee,
Dza ɔdze onnyiewiei dɔ na nkwa ba.  Amen.

name: MHB 778:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. HƆN a wogyina Zion ho n',
Mbrɛ hɔn anan ho yɛ fɛw a!
Wɔka nkwagye nsɛmpa no daa,
Na wɔda asomdwee edzi.

name: MHB 778:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Hɔn ndze ma awerɛkyekyer,
Hɔn nsɛm so ne dɛw a!
Zion, hwɛ W'Agyenkwa Ɔhen no;
Odzi Hen, dzi nyim ha.

name: MHB 778:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Mbrɛ woesi ehyira hɛn aso a!
Ɔtse dɛ ndze dɛɛdɛw a
Nkɔnhyɛfo na ahemfo tweɔnee,
Na wɔhwehwɛe a woennhu n'.

name: MHB 778:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Mbrɛ woehyira hɛn enyiwa a
Ohu dɛm sor kan yi a!
Nkɔnhyɛfo na ahemfo peer ho,
Na wowui a woennhu.

name: MHB 778:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Aweɔmfo n' dze ndze kor,
Maa ndwom dɛdɛɛdɛw do;
Jerusalem so ma ndwom do,
Sardofo tse ne dɛw n'.

name: MHB 778:6
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ewuradze tserɛw N'abaw m'
Wɔ wiadze nyina do;
Wɔmma wiadze nyinara nhu
Hɛn Gyefo na Nyame

name: MHB 779:1
title: Anonymous, 9th or 10th cent;
verse:
. SUNSUM Krɔnkrɔn, tsena hɛn kra mu,
Na ma Wo gya mfi sor nhyerɛn;
Edze sunsum ngo sera hɛn,
Na ema akyɛdze horow.

name: MHB 779:2
title: Anonymous, 9th or 10th cent;
verse:
. W'adom ngohuam a ofi sor
Yɛ awerɛkyekyer, nkwa na dɔ;
Na Wo kan a onndum da no
Nhyerɛn hɛn do, ɔmpa hɛn sum.

name: MHB 779:3
title: Anonymous, 9th or 10th cent;

name: MHB 779:4
title: Anonymous, 9th or 10th cent;

name: MHB 78:1
title: John Mason, 1645-94.
verse:
. M'BƐYƐ dɛn atow ahentum a
Abɔfo pɛ ho n' ndwom?
Huntuma m' huntuma nyɛ komm;
Ma sor adwontofo ntow,
Mpempem gyina W'ahengua ho,
O ɔsorsor Nyame;
Ɔpedu tow W'ayɛyi ndwom,
Na mo so nye woana?

name: MHB 78:2
title: John Mason, 1645-94.
verse:
. Wo hyerɛn da edzi ma hɔn;
Mitsin W'anamɔn do a,
Metse Nyame ndze wɔ m'asomu, 
Hɔn dze, wohu W'enyim,
'Yɛ hɔn Ewia ntsi wɔtow ndwom;
Tow nserɛmɛn to mo do,
Na beebi a heaven hyɛ ase n',
Alleluia wɔ hɔ.

name: MHB 78:3
title: John Mason, 1645-94.
verse:
. Ma gyedzi kan nhyerɛn m'akoma m',
Ma 'gya dɔ nsɔ wɔ mu;
Ma menye sor adwontofo
Aabɔ m' aatow Wo ndwom,
Musuro, mowɔ kan na gya nyina,
Dɛ m'bɛyɛ sum, na nwin;
Sɛ 'regye hɔn sika mfutuw a,
Gye mo so me dwɛɛtɛɛ.

name: MHB 78:4
title: John Mason, 1645-94.
verse:
. Ewuradze, mbrɛ idua so a,
Ekora abɔdze nyina!
Wo nyimdzee nkotoo na otum
Susu po n' trɛ na bun,
Ɔwo nye po a onnyi mpoano,
Ewia a onnyi ɔhe;
Ewɔ hɔ sesei nye daa nyina,
Na ewɔ beebiara.

name: MHB 780:1
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.
verse:
. MO Wura Kasa! W'akowaa ritsie,
Morotweɔn W'adom asɛm no,
Mo kɔn dɔ W'akomatɔm' ndze,
Mo Wura, Ma mentse n' sesei,
Mo Wura, mayɛ aso ritsie W',
Ewɔ bɛn ka kyerɛ me?

name: MHB 780:2
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.
verse:
. Mo Wura, bɔ me dzin na kasa,
Ama meehu dɛ enye m';
Frɛ m' na medze anan haahar
Bɛka W' do ahotɔ m' akɔ
Bea a 'Guanhwɛfo n' dzi nguan enyim,
Wɔ Botan no nwin ase.

name: MHB 780:3
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 780:4
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 781:1
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.
verse:
. Ewuradze, kasa kyerɛ me, 
Ma munsusu Wo do nkasa;
Ahwehwɛ me yi ma mo so
Monhwehwɛ Wo mba a wɔayew no.

name: MHB 781:2
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.
verse:
. Mo Wura, gya me kwan ma mo so 
Mingya W'akobɔfo taataa;
O nyɛn me ma mo so memfa
Manna mma hɔn a kɔm dze hɔn.

name: MHB 781:3
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.
verse:
. O hyɛ me dzen ama ber a 
Migyina pintsinn wɔ Wo mu n',
Maatsen me nsa ama hɔn a
Woridzi aper wɔ bra po do.

name: MHB 781:4
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.
verse:
. Kyerɛkyerɛ m' na meetum makyerɛ 
N-dzɛmba pa a ada n' edzi;
Ma m'anosɛm n-hwira ndu
Akoma pii ase noho.

name: MHB 781:56
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.
verse:
. Fa W'asomdwee dɛɛdɛw n' ma me, 
Ma minnya nyansa memfa nka
Asomdwee nsɛm nkyerɛ Wo mba
Asonafo wɔ mbusu mber mu.
 
. Mo Wura, fa Wo mayɛ no ma m', 
Kodu dɛ m'akoma bu do,
Ma memfa ndam mombɔ dawur,
Menka Wo dɔ, minyi W' ayɛw.

name: MHB 781:7
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.
verse:
. Fa me yɛ dɛ Woara 'pɛ, 
Aber nyina na bea biara,
Kodu dɛ mubohu W'enyim
Wɔ ahomgye, dɛw, na enyimnyam ma.
                                   Amen.

name: MHB 782:1
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. EWURADZE, hyerɛn hɛn do,
Ɔwo, adasamba Kan;
Dua Wo kyerɛwsɛm do
Yi Woho kyerɛ hɛn ndɛ;
Na yɛhwɛ W'enyim a
Hɛn akoma dzɛw ntsi
Nkɔkowaba nam hɛn do
Eesua W'adom nwanwa n'.

name: MHB 782:2
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Ewuradze, hue Sunsum
Gyaframee n' gu hɛn do,
Ma yɛdze ano kor
Yaabɔ Wo dzin dawur.
Ma Wo mba aso pa,
Ma hɔn adwen ontsim,
Na hɔn nyina eehu
Ndzɛmba akɛse a ayɛ.

name: MHB 782:3
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, kasa ma hɛn,
Dza yɛka nyina mu,
Ma dza yɛkyerɛ nyɛ dɛ
Mbrɛ W'asɛm tse ara;
Ama nguambaa aatse
Hɔn Guanhwɛfo n' Ne ndze,
Na wɔaaka No do daa,
Na woeedzi No mu dɛw.

name: MHB 782:4
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 783:1
title: Johann Joseph Winckler, 1670-1722;
verse:
. NA nyimpa a ɔyɛ mberɛw ho suro
Besiw sunsum a ɔwɔ mo mu n' kwan?
Ana me ndzeyɛɛ na kasa
Kyerɛ dɛ meyɛ m' Wura dasefo?

name: MHB 783:2
title: Johann Joseph Winckler, 1670-1722;
verse:
. Adasa Agyenkwa, Enyiasombea,
Ihu mo mu adwen nyinara;
'Bɛn na mohwehwɛ wɔ wiadze,
No mu enyigye anaa ayɛyi a?

name: MHB 783:3
title: Johann Joseph Winckler, 1670-1722;
verse:
. Christ dɔ n' hyɛ me ma mohwehwɛ
Nyimpa akra a wɔatɔ dɔnsuar;
Metsea m', dze su na ntotɔserɛ
Hwim hɔn fi adakamaa mu.

name: MHB 783:4
title: Johann Joseph Winckler, 1670-1722;
verse:
. Sɛ W' nokwar ntsi mo bɔgyaa na
Nkwa ho wɔ mfaso a, medze ma W';
Ewuradze, ma Wo tsirmpɔw mbra m',
Wo pɛ nyɛ hɔ, ayɛyi nka W' dzin.

name: MHB 783:5
title: Johann Joseph Winckler, 1670-1722;

name: MHB 784:1
title: Augustus Gottlieb Spangenberg, 1704-92.
verse:
. AFƆR bɛn na hɛn atɔbɔ
Dze ma hɛn Wura, wɔ N'adom ntsi?
Yɛbɔbɔ Ne dzin kɛse no,
Na yeeyi N'ayɛw dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ.

name: MHB 784:2
title: Augustus Gottlieb Spangenberg, 1704-92.
verse:
. Ɔwo a yɛdɔ W' mbordo daa daa,
Ɔwo a esen hɛn adze nyina,
Bue sor nsunyiwa gu hɛn do,
Ma ɔnhyɛ hɛn akra amaama, mbu do.

name: MHB 784:3
title: Augustus Gottlieb Spangenberg, 1704-92.
verse:
. Dɛm na hɛn bra bɔbɔ W' tum na
W'adom a 'dze kyɛ abɔn kwa n' dawur,
Kodu dɛ adasa bohu W'dzin,
Na wɔatsen hɔn nsa nyina ama W'.

name: MHB 784:4
title: Augustus Gottlieb Spangenberg, 1704-92.

name: MHB 784:5
title: Augustus Gottlieb Spangenberg, 1704-92.
verse:
. O ma ogufo n'aba n' ndɔr!
Na yɛbɔsow aba mber nyina;
Ma W'asɛmpa n' mpetse wiadze,
Yɛmbɔ Wo daa nokwar n' dawur.

name: MHB 784:6
title: Augustus Gottlieb Spangenberg, 1704-92.
verse:
. Wo dɔ mapa ayɛ hɛn fofor n',
Yebohu W' kɛseyɛ no tum n'
Yegyina hɛn Nyame N'asɔrfi m'
Dɛ edum, na yennkefi hɔ bio.

name: MHB 785:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. JESUS, sɛ yɛka hɛn akoma m'
Ehiasɛm kyerɛ Wo a,
Yehu dɛ yehia adom a
Ɔyɛ akyɛdze a ofir Wo;
Hɛn a yenyim hɛn mberɛwyɛ no,
Yebenya akyɛdze pii,
Yebenya adom nye nhyira mbordo,
Ne nyina Nyame dze ma.

name: MHB 785:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 786:1
title: Thomas Bowman Stephenson, 1839-1912.
verse:
. OWURA, ma yɛnweɔn dɛ beenum n',
Yɛntweɔn Wo mbaa, na obiara
Mper nkeka ne kandzea;
Na osiandɛ ngo a ofi Wo hɔ no
Wora adom daa gu akoma biara m' ntsi,
Kandzea biara mmonsom.

name: MHB 786:2
title: Thomas Bowman Stephenson, 1839-1912.
verse:
. Mma yɛnntsena pɛsɛankonya m',
Mbom yɛmfa asɔryɛ mfora edwumayɛ,
Ama kandzea n' aadzɛw;
Na pii efi hɔn bɔn sum kadoo m' n',
Wɔnye hɛn aabɔ mu epue
W'enyim aponto ase.

name: MHB 786:3
title: Thomas Bowman Stephenson, 1839-1912.
verse:
. Ewuradze, nnyɛ hɛn nko bɛba
W'aponto kɛse no ase,
Abɛtsena dɛw m' ahwɛ W',
Yɛdze akobɛɔfo, ayarfo,
Ankonam na mbofra brɛ Wo,
Ama yaahwɛ W'enyim.

name: MHB 787:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. N-dɔbaa Ewuradze, tsie 
Wo nkowaa ehiafo hɛn su;
Tsie hɛn gyedzi mu mpaabɔ yi
Na dom hɛn dza yehia.

name: MHB 787:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yɛtweɔn Wo mbɔbɔr mu; 
Inyim hɛn hia nyina:
Ampa dɛ n-dɔbaa no so,
Na edwumafo no suar.

name: MHB 787:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Sakyer wobinom so 
Na soma hɔm W'asɔr mu
Ma wɔnka Wo tum kasa no
Dɛ 'Wo nye hɔn wɔ hɔ

name: MHB 787:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma wɔnka W'asɛmpa a 
Adom ahyɛ no ma n',
Wɔnkyerɛ dɛ 'Wo nye Ewuradze,
Adasamba Gyefo.

name: MHB 787:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma wɔntrɛ Wo dzin mu, 
Ma wɔmfata hɔn frɛ,
Wɔmbɔ W'adom kɛse no mu,
Wo dɔ a onnyi ewiei n'!

name: MHB 788:1
title: Jean Baptiste de Santeuil, 1630-97.
verse:
. DOMFO Abɔso, wiadze Tsɛmbuafo,
Ɔwo a efa mberɛwyɛ nye ehiafo yɛ W'dze;
Efa dɛtse nkuraba hun na ebubudze
Na ehyehyɛ hɔn Wo ndzepa a ɔmmpa ara da.

name: MHB 788:2
title: Jean Baptiste de Santeuil, 1630-97.
verse:
. Kaansa Wo kan hyɛ m' mpo a, nkuraba n' nnkyɛr pa,
Wotsin Wo mom do bubu, na woetwa m';
Afei Wo nokwar kan no pue n'ahoɔdzen m'
Dɛ mbrɛ enyinam nyinam mununkum mu no.

name: MHB 788:3
title: Jean Baptiste de Santeuil, 1630-97.
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ mununkum kyin yɛ Wo pɛ kɛse n'
Na mframa dzendzen bɔ wiadze ho aprɔw n',
Asɛm n' dze Ne nyansaa hyɛ hɔn sunsum ma,
Wɔbobɔ mu, wɔhyerɛn, na wobu do.

name: MHB 788:4
title: Jean Baptiste de Santeuil, 1630-97.
verse:
. Wɔbɔ hɔn ndze m' Jesus Christ nye Ewuradze!
Ntsi Satan bɔ hwea, n'aban dwuruw gu famu,
Dɛ mbrɛ ekasae ma totorobɛnto hɛnee
Ara a Canaan afasu dwuruwii no.

name: MHB 788:5
title: Jean Baptiste de Santeuil, 1630-97.
verse:
. Afei ma totorobɛnto n' nhɛn dzendzen,
Ewuradze, ma onnyan hɛn mfi bɔn nda m';
Nkandzea a Ɔwo asosɔ wɔ hɛn sum mu n',
O ma ɔnhyerɛn wɔ hɛn esunsum mu!

name: MHB 788:6
title: Jean Baptiste de Santeuil, 1630-97.
verse:
. 'Nyimnyam, ayɛyi, tumdzi na ahoɔdzen nyina
Nka Nyame Ebiasa kor afebɔɔ;
Ɔama Ne kan nwanwa n' ahyerɛn hɛn ho,
Ɔafrɛ hɛn sum mu ma yeehu N'enyimnyam!

name: MHB 789:1
title: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster, 1838-1912.
verse:
. CHRIST, mma W' werɛ mmfir
W'adɔntsen dɔm a
Woridzi ako wɔ amanadze.

name: MHB 789:2
title: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster, 1838-1912.
verse:
. Yɛserɛ W', kora na ma hɔn tsir do,
Wɔ nsuyirii, gya, sum na suro m'.

name: MHB 789:3
title: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster, 1838-1912.
verse:
. Hyɛ hɔn dzen wɔ suro biara m',
Na Woara bɛn hɔn wɔ mbusu m'.

name: MHB 789:4
title: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster, 1838-1912.
verse:
. W'edwuma na wɔper ayɛ,
Wosuar, na atamfo no dɔɔ so.

name: MHB 789:5
title: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster, 1838-1912.
verse:
. Christ, 'nye W'akofo adɔfo a
Wɔwɔ ehum asaase do ntsena.

name: MHB 79:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. HOM nyi Ewuradze ayɛw, oye dɛ 
Hom ma akoma na ndze do kamfo N';
No su na No ndwuma gya hɛn ma 
Yɛdze enyigye yi N' ayɛw.

name: MHB 79:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ɔyɛɛ nworaba a wɔhyerɛn wɔ sor,
'Kan hɔn dodow, bɔ hɔn edzin;
Ne nyansaa so, onnyi ewiei,
Bun kɛse a hɛn nsusui yew mu.

name: MHB 79:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Hom ntow ndwom mfa nkrɔn Ewuradze!
Ɔtserɛw No mununkum mu wɔ sor; 
Hɔ na ɔhyehyɛ nyankonsu,
Anaa ɔmma nsu nngu famu kwa.

name: MHB 79:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ɔdze sar kata akoko do,
Na eburow hyɛ hɛn kwa amaama; 
Ne nsa ma mbowadoma edziban,
Na ɔnyɛn nnoma nyina so.

name: MHB 79:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ebɛn na abɔdze tum yɛ?
Nyimpa ahoɔdzen anaa mpɔnkɔ? 
Nyansa anaa ahoɔdzen so ɛ?
Yinom nyina nnka hwee wɔ N'enyim.

name: MHB 79:6
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. 'Hotsewfo dze, wɔsɔ N'enyi,
Ne mba ho yɛ no enyigye;
Onyim hɔn 'nyidar, hɔn suro,
Ɔhwɛ, na ɔdɔ Ne saso hɔ.

name: MHB 790:1
title: William Cullen Bryant, 1794-1878.
verse:
. NYAME mbɔbɔrhufo tumfo,
Fi Wo sor bea a adze nnsa hɔ n'
Na fa tsimberɛw frɛ hɔn a wɔayew,
Wɔnam sum mu no, bra kan mu.

name: MHB 790:2
title: William Cullen Bryant, 1794-1878.
verse:
. Beebi a dɔm wo anaa ho atɔ pan,
Dɔmtutuw a wɔwɔ nsuano, nkurow m',
Nyimpa dodow pii na wɔnntsee
Asɛmpa no a edze ma hɛn n'.

name: MHB 790:3
title: William Cullen Bryant, 1794-1878.
verse:
. Ewuradze, ma W'asomfo mfrɛ
Mberantsɛ atam, nkɔdaa akomapirimfo,
Nguankuw a wɔapetse, ma hɔn nyina 
Mbɛka W'asomdwee nguankuw n' ho.

name: MHB 790:4
title: William Cullen Bryant, 1794-1878.
verse:
. Soma ma wɔnkɛka W'asɛm n'
Ma gyedzi aaba ma ekyingye aakɔ,
Bɔn eetu ma mberɛwyɛnyi eetsim,
Na akoma bobɔe aahyɛ dzen.

name: MHB 790:5
title: William Cullen Bryant, 1794-1878.
verse:
. Afei nsaase a woetwie nyina
Dza yɛhwɛ a ɔgye hɛn awerɛhow n',
Nkwa nsu bɛma efuw ahaebun,
Ma ndze aafow sor aakyerɛ W'ayɛyi

name: MHB 791:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wɔabɔ akwankwan kɔ ekyirkyir,
Wɔdze yaw, ɔberɛ nye ɔkɔm kɔ;
Wonnyi guanhwɛfo pa a ɔkyerɛ
Ayarfo a wɔayɛ mberɛw no kwan.

name: MHB 791:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔwo na ayɛ Guanhwɛfo no,
Guanhwɛfo pa a apon Wo nguan;
Boa hɔn ano na ma hɔn edziban,
Na asɔfo a asan mu eyi hɔn.

name: MHB 791:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma W'asɛnkafo n' adom nsɛm,
Ma woeenya etsiefo piinara;
Asɛnkafo a wɔkyerɛ abɔnfo
Kwan ba nkwagye bɔgya no ho.

name: MHB 791:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Bue hɔn ano, ma hɔn anotsewee
Ma hɔn totorobɛnto ndze,
Wɔmfa mfrɛ adasa mbra nkwagye m',
Wɔ Nyia owui maa hɔn n' ho gyedzi m'.

name: MHB 791:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. W'enyimnyam nko na wɔnhwehwɛ;
O ma ɔdɔ mbu do hɔn akoma m',
Ma wɔngye ndzi na wɔmpaa m' nka,
Na wonyi W'ehumbɔbɔr ayɛw.

name: MHB 792:12
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, sɛ W'asɛm ntsi 
Yedua n-kwasɛm n' a,
Wo tum nsa no gugu do yi
Aba no befifir.
 
. W'adom ne ndam ara 
Na ɔbɛma ndɔbaa pii,
Na ɔadɔr agyedzifo a 
Wɔtse ma W'enyimnyam.

name: MHB 792:34
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Nsɛmpa n' ne nhyira nsu n', 
Ma ɔntɔ mma hɛn daa,
Ma tum a ɔsakyer akra n'
Ɔmbra W'asɔfoe do.
 
. Ma ɔdodowara 
Nnya dɔ a ɔdan 'koma n',
Ma W'adom ne dɛw nsiesie hɔn
Mma ɔsor dɛw kɛse n'.

name: MHB 793:1
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
. OWURA a Wo ndɔbaa 'nyikan
Kata asaase do,
Bea a abɔfo boaboa hɔn 
Ndɔbaa a wɔaber ano,
Gye nsa yi yɛ W'edwuma,
Ma hɛn akoma ntwer W', ndɔ W',
Dua hɔn do ma W'ahendzi
Mfi sor noho mbra ntsɛm.

name: MHB 793:2
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
. Soma hɔn Wo wenyin turo m',
Dɛ wɔyɛ W'apaafo n',
Wɔpɛ dɛ wɔsoa ndzesoa
Wɔ ɔberɛ nda mu ma Wo,
Owura, sɛ frɛ hɔn ba fie a,
Wɔnnkɛgye akatua koraa,
Ma wɔaakyɛ 'fona no a
Ɔma W'ahendzi ba n'.

name: MHB 793:3
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.
verse:
. Nyame Egya, nye hɔn ntsena,
Nyame Ɔba, nye hɔn ntsena,
Nyame Sunsum, nye hɔn ntsena;
Onnyiewiei Ɔkorsa!
Yɛ hɔn asɔfo adehye,
Ma wɔmfa nsom Wo yie,
Fa W'amayɛ hyɛ hɔn ma,
Sesei nye daa nyina.   Amen.

name: MHB 794:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. ƆDOMANKOMA Ɔba, Ɔdɔ a ɔkye,
Woara fa Wo tum kɛse no;
Ma adasa nhu W'ehumbɔbɔr,
Ma wonhu Wo nkwagye adom.

name: MHB 794:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Kyerɛ Wo dɔ no konyimdzi no,
Wo nko dzi hen akoma biara m'.
Kodu dɛ atamfo bɛtse W' tum,
Ma enyimnyam eewie adom edwuma n'.

name: MHB 794:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Adom Sunsum na ahoɔdzen tum,
Kan nsunyiwa nye dɔ wɔ asaase,
Fa W'ayarsa tum no petse
Ma ɔmpem aman nyina do.

name: MHB 794:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Sɔ ɔdɔ mapa gya wɔ hɛn akoma m',
Gyedzi ndwuma nda edzi hɛn mu;
Amma sor dɔm aannyɛ W'edwuma
Ntsɛntsɛm annsen hɛndze wɔ ha.

name: MHB 794:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Tease, Ɔkorsa 'Tsipɛmfo
Sor na asaase, wo ndwuma nyina
Mfa nhyira nyidzi, ntonton na ɔdɔ
Nsom Wo aber nyinara daa.

name: MHB 794:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. W'ahendzi yɛ Krɔnn mprɛnsa,
Tum nyinara so yɛ Wodze;
Sɛ abɔdze nyina twa m' kɔ a,
W'enyimnyam a ɔmmpa da bɛhyerɛn.

name: MHB 795:1
title: Annie Matheson, 1853-1924.
verse:
. O NYAME N'asɔr, soɛr;
Fa Wo dɔ kandzea no,
Kandzea a onndum ara da
Wɔ asaase do nye sor.

name: MHB 795:2
title: Annie Matheson, 1853-1924.
verse:
. Fa nyansa na nokwar
Huw gya n' ma ɔndzɛw hoo,
Ɔdɔ na mbabun kan
Mpam wiadze m' fɛr mfi hɔ.

name: MHB 795:3
title: Annie Matheson, 1853-1924.
verse:
. Twuw abɔnsam enyim,
Yi akra fi efiadze,
Kyekyer akoma bobɔe
Ma dɛw na asomdwee.

name: MHB 795:4
title: Annie Matheson, 1853-1924.
verse:
. Adze biarà à ɔyɛ fɛw,
Adze biara a ɔtsen,
Ma ɔnyɛ fow dɛ mframa,
Ɔndɔɔso dɛ huntuma!

name: MHB 795:5
title: Annie Matheson, 1853-1924.
verse:
. Beebiara a sum wɔ no,
Tow kan nserɛmɛn gu hɔ,
Kɛpem dɛ enyim a esuam
Bohu Nyame enyigye.

name: MHB 795:6
title: Annie Matheson, 1853-1924.
verse:
. Se dasanyi biara,
'Birɛmpɔn nye kɔhweaban,
Dɛ ɔdɔ frɛɛ no awoo m'
Dɛ ɔhen na sɔfo.

name: MHB 796:1
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.
verse:
. EWURADZE, W'asɔr a apon no
Rinyan fi nda m' mbea nyina a 
Wonyim dɛ adzekyee reba a
Okumfor n' beyi N'enyim;
Worinyan agye akoradze a
'Dze W' bɔgyaa a ɔsom bo tɔe n',
Na wɔatwer wo dwumason a
W'anwanwa wu no edzi.

name: MHB 796:2
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.
verse:
. Gye W'ayɛyi nka wɔ Wo nsu ntsi,
Ekyir nsutɔ a ɔsom bo;
Yeyi Wo ayɛw dɛ Wo Sunsum
Tum no ekenyan hɛn bio;
Dɛ W'asɛmpa akoradze mapa n'
Wɔso dze rokɔ mbeambea,
Dɛ Egya n' N'apɛdze dzi mu.
Wɔ Wo nsamu epiratwa no mu.

name: MHB 796:3
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.
verse:
. Ayɛyi nka Wo wɔ esiarfo a
Wɔper hwehwɛ hɔn a wɔayew,
Yɛtonton Wo dɛ ndze bi sua
W'ayɛyi ndwom no fofor;
Ntonton nka W'ayarfo a wɔper
Suo W'atar ano ndwow m' ntsi,
Yɛtonton Wo, hɔn a wɔagye edzi,
Ehu Wo dɔ enyadze n' ntsi.

name: MHB 796:4
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.

name: MHB 797:1
title: Mary Willcox
verse:
. EWURADZE, yɛbɔ mpaa bio
Ma mbofra a wɔwɔ ekyirkyir,
Hɔn a wɔnntsee Wo dzin mpo da,
Jesus dzin dɛɛdɛw n' pɛn koraa.

name: MHB 797:2
title: Mary Willcox
verse:
. Nkɔkoaba a ama hɔn ano
Gyina ekyirkyir asɔrdan mu,
Nwin ase, dze W'ayɛyi n'
Ma ndua, abosom nye abotan.

name: MHB 797:3
title: Mary Willcox
verse:
. Nsa nkakraba a edze ama
Hɔn dɛ wɔmfa nyɛ Wo pɛ n',
Wɔdze suro som, bɔ afɔr
Ma abosom a wonnhu, wɔnntse.

name: MHB 797:4
title: Mary Willcox
verse:
. O sor Hen, kyerɛkyerɛ hɔn ma
Wɔmfa akyɛdze nye ayɛyi
Mbrɛ Wo Ba a obowui dze
Kyerɛɛ Wo fakyɛ nkwagye dɔ n'.

name: MHB 798:1
title: Basil Joseph Mathews, 1879.
verse:
. WO mba tow hɔn ndwom wɔ wiadze nyina:
Hɔn ndze bɔ m' dɛɛdɛw fi anee na boka;
Wohuhor Ewuradze a ɔma mbofra ahoɔdzen,
Jesus, hɛn Kwankyerɛfo, Sahen, Nyɛnko.

name: MHB 798:2
title: Basil Joseph Mathews, 1879.
verse:
. Beebiara a Wo po asorɛkye bu
Gu nsupɔw mpoano mfesantsen nyina n';
Wohuhor hɔn Wura a nkwagye wɔ N' nko asɛm m',
Ɔno a No dɔ po etwa hɔn ho ehyia.

name: MHB 798:3
title: Basil Joseph Mathews, 1879.
verse:
. Wo mba a ewia hyerɛn hɔn do wiadze mu,
Mbrɛ Asia esutsen fɔw asaase nyina do,
Wohuw ndwom ber a hɔn haban eyi ndɔbaa;
Ayɛyi nka Ewuradze a ɔnyɛn hɔn.

name: MHB 798:4
title: Basil Joseph Mathews, 1879.
verse:
. Aman pii wɔ hɔ a bi nnhun W'enyim pɛn,
Mbofra akoma nnsɔɔ Wo dɛw nnhwɛɛ pɛn,
Naaso bohue W'adom egu hɔn nyina do;
Ma nkataasia na mberantsɛ W'ahoɔdzen.

name: MHB 798:5
title: Basil Joseph Mathews, 1879.
verse:
. Ma mbofra ntow Wo ndwom wɔ wiadze nyina,
Hɔn ndze bɔ m' dɛɛdɛw, fi anee na boka;
Wohuhor Ewuradze a ɔma mbofra ahoɔdzen,
Jesus, hɛn Kwankyerɛfo, Sahen, Nyɛnko.

name: MHB 799:1
title: The Book Of Praise For Children, 1881.
verse:
. BUBER no edu
Na edwumayɛfo no suar;
Hɛn mbofra dze yɛpɛ, 
Na yebesi dɛn\nAyɛ hɛn Wura No twadwuma yi bi?

name: MHB 799:2
title: The Book Of Praise For Children, 1881.
verse:
. Hɛn nsa susuar koraa,
Hɛn asɛnka yɛ mberɛw,
Yenntum nnkyerɛ binom;
Yɛyɛ dɛn hwehwɛ,
Yɛyɛ hɛn Wura No twadwuma yi bi.

name: MHB 799:3
title: The Book Of Praise For Children, 1881.

name: MHB 799:4
title: The Book Of Praise For Children, 1881.
verse:
. Ɔbɛyɛ bɛyɛ n'
Na mfe rutwa m' kɔ no,
Hɛn so bɛyɛ etwafo,
Yɛakɔ enyim ahoɔdzen m'
Yɛayɛ hɛn Wura No twadwuma yi bi.

name: MHB 8:1
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: MHB 8:2
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.
verse:
. Hom ntow No tum nye N'adom so ho ndwom:
N'atar nye ekan, No buw pretetee;
N'ebufuw tseaseanam hye senaman fua tum,
No kwan yɛ sum wɔ ehum atsaban do.

name: MHB 8:3
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.
verse:
. Asaase nye N'anwanwadze a wɔnnka:
Otumfo! Wo tum bɔɔ adze fi tsetse;
Nam 'mom a wɔnndan n' da etsim no pintsinn,
Na edze epo abᴐ no ho abᴐmprᴐw.

name: MHB 8:4
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.
verse:
. W'ayamúyie no gyirama hɛn botúm aká?
Ogú ahom wɛ wimú, ɔhyerɛn kan mu;
Ofi akoko do pem siansian sar mu,
Na ɔsɔw fénemfénem wɔ bɔw nye
nyankom mu.

name: MHB 8:5
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.
verse:
. Huntuma m' mbá a yɛnnkye so yɛyɛ mbérɛw,
Hɛn wérɛ hyɛ Wo mu, W'ayamúyie
mmpada;
Mbrɛ W'adom dua gow a otsim hɔ dú ewiei,
Hɛn Bɔfo, hɛn Gyefo, Pomfo na Dɔfo!

name: MHB 8:6
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.
verse:
. Tum a wonnsusu! Dɔ a onnyi kabea!
Mbér a abɔfo dzé enyigye tow ndwom no,
Abɔdzé adedafamú so nam hɛn mbérɛwyɛ m'
Bɔtonton Wo atow ndwom eyi W' ayaw!
				   Amen.

name: MHB 80:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. MEDZE m'akoma bɛkamfo Wo, 
Maka W'ayamuyie akyerɛ adasa; 
Mbrɛ W'adom ndwuma yɛ nwanwa a! 
Medze ndwom bɛkamfo Wo dzin,
M'bedzi dɛw wɔ m'Ewuradze mu,
M'bɛda W'ase, makamfo Wo.

name: MHB 80:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ewuradze bɛgye No nkorɔfo,
Ɔboa hɔn wɔ ahokyer ber m',
Hɔn a bɔn nye hɛll ahyɛ hɔn do,
Hɔn a wonyim Wo n'bɔtwer Wo, 
Ɔwo a idzi W'anohoba do
Nnkɛma ɔkra biara ho akyer n'.

name: MHB 80:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 80:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ɔkra bɔbɔfo a ɔhwɛ Wo
Otwar dɛ ohu W'enyim ara,
Na ne nsa ka W'adɔe nyina;
Dzebɔnyɛnyi a osu hwehwɛ W',
Nyia ɔhwehwɛ dɛ ɔgye dzi n',
Innkegyaa no dabiara da.

name: MHB 800:1
title: Arthur Cleveland Coxe, 1818-96.
verse:
. AGYENKWA, kenyan amanaman,
Ma W'awerԑhow nsow aba,
Ma Wo yaw nye awerԑkyekyer
Ntwe amanamamfo mbrԑ Wo,
Wɔnka Wo mbeamudua ho nsԑm 
Nwanwa n' nkyerԑ aman nyina;
Na wonhu Wo W'enyimnyam mu 
Nye Wo mbɔbɔrhu beberee n'.

name: MHB 800:2
title: Arthur Cleveland Coxe, 1818-96.
verse:
. Nkorɔfo a wonnyim Wo wɔ
Ekyirkyir nyina kɔn dɔ Wo;
Adasa kyi nyinsuwa wɔ W' ho,
Adasa pԑ W' mu ahomgye;
Wo ho nsukɔm dze hɔn mbordo
Dԑ sar a woetwa n' 'mon hia nsu n',
Wɔhwehwԑ Wo dԑ sor Nyame
Dԑ Nyia wokum N' maa abɔn.

name: MHB 800:3
title: Arthur Cleveland Coxe, 1818-96.
verse:
. Agyenkwa, hwԑ! Nsupruw rotweɔn,
Atsen hɔn nsa, agyen hɔn enyi,
Rohwԑ Wo Sunsum ndwumafor n';
Rema ɔdɔ gya dzԑw, nyansa hyerԑn;
Ka asԑm n', ma ɔsԑnkafo n',
Ahoɔhar, ka ne gyirama
Kodu dԑ abɔdze nyina bɔtow
Eguambaa, W'enyimnyam ndwom.  Amen.

name: MHB 801:1
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.
verse:
. GREENLAND nkokwaa nwinwim n' do,
India adantse abo ho,
Ebibiman, mbea a nsu pem
Fefa anhwea pii do so;
Fi tsetse esutsen pii mu,
Fi mbԑ asaase do,
Wɔfrԑ hԑn dԑ yenkeyi
Hɔn aman mfi mfom mpokyerԑ m'.

name: MHB 801:2
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.
verse:
. Ana hԑn a sor nyansa
Eguar hԑn akra yi
Botum dze nkwa kan n' akam
Nyimpa a wɔtse sum mu?
N-kwagye o, nkwagye nye yi;
Hom mpaa m' nka enyigyesԑm n'
Nkodu dԑ aman nyina
Bohu Messiah N' dzin.

name: MHB 801:3
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.
verse:
. Mframa, hom mbɔ N'asԑm n' nkɔ,
Na hom nsu, hom mpem daa,
Nkɔ nkodu wiadze n'ano
Dԑ enyimnyam po bun;
Kԑpem dԑ Eguambaa a wokum
No maa abɔn nyina n'
Pomfo, Ɔhen Bɔfo no,
Bԑsan ebedzi hen, dԑw m'.  Amen.

name: MHB 802:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. EWURADZE, sor kyerԑ W'enyimnyam,
Wo nyansa hyerԑn woraba biara m';
Sԑ hԑn enyi bɔ W'asԑm n' do a
Yԑkenkan Wo dzin n'enyigye m'.

name: MHB 802:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ewia a ɔhyerԑn, kan a odzi ndan,
'Nago na adzekyee ka W' tum kyerԑ,
Mbom Wo nhyira Nwoma a akyerԑw no
Kyerԑ Wo tsenenee na W'adom.

name: MHB 802:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Ewia, bosoom, na nworaba nngyaa
W'ayԑyi wɔ wiadze mu da;
Ntsi Wo nokwar hyԑԑ ase kyinii n'
Okodur aman nyina mu.

name: MHB 802:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. W'asԑmpa no bԑtserԑw araa
Ma wiadze nyina eehu Wo nokwar n',
Kԑpem dԑ Christ behyira aman nyina a 
Kan anaa wi pue wɔ hɔ no.

name: MHB 802:5
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Tsenenee Ewia kԑse, pue,
Fa sor kan hyira sum wiadze yi,
W'asԑmpa n' bue ntsetsekwaa enyi,
Wo mbra yԑ krɔnn W'atsembu tsen!

name: MHB 802:6
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
verse:
. Eyԑ akra afofor dze bɔn kyԑ
Ma yehu Wo tum kԑse no,
Mo Wura, pepa m' bɔn, yԑ m' fofor,
Ma W'asԑm ngye m' taataa nkɔ sor.  Amen.

name: MHB 803:1
title: John Marriott, 1780-1825.
verse:
. BEGYABEGYA na sum
Tsee Wo tum asԑm no,
Na woguanee;
Yԑserԑ Wo, tsie hԑn,
Na beebiara a asԑmpa
Ne nserԑmԑn nnhyerԑn hɔ n',
Ma hɔ nyԑ kann.

name: MHB 803:2
title: John Marriott, 1780-1825.
verse:
. Ɔwo a edze ayarsa
Na adzehu gyee hԑn
W'atsaban do,
'Maa adamfo adwen m' tseew hɔn,
Efurafo hun adze,
Afei ma Wo kan nhyerԑn Adasa do.

name: MHB 803:3
title: John Marriott, 1780-1825.
verse:
. Nokwar na dɔ Sunsum,
Nkwa Mafo, Ebubur Krɔnn,
Tu faa bra ntsԑm;
Butuw nsu no enyi
Tow adom nserԑmԑn no,
Wiadze sum kebii n' mu
Ma hɔ nyԑ kann.

name: MHB 803:4
title: John Marriott, 1780-1825.
verse:
. Siarfo, Ɔkorsa Krɔnkrɔn,
Enyimnyam Ɔkorsa!
W'adom, dɔ tum n',
Tse dԑ popramee a 
Obubu n'asorԑkye,
Wɔ wiadze afanan nyina
Ma hɔ nyԑ kann.

name: MHB 804:1
title: Jonathan Friedrich Bahnmaier, 1774-1841;
verse:
. TSERƐW O asԑm tumfo tserԑw,
Tserԑw Ewuradze ahenman n' mu;
Beebiara a N'adom esiesie
N-kwa ama ɔsorfo.

name: MHB 804:2
title: Jonathan Friedrich Bahnmaier, 1774-1841;
verse:
. Nkwasԑm krɔnn a ɔyԑ dzen
Aman nyina kɔn dɔ Wo;
Tserԑw, ma sum kebii no mpa,
Na ma kan nhyerԑn wiadze.

name: MHB 804:3
title: Jonathan Friedrich Bahnmaier, 1774-1841;
verse:
. Soԑr hwԑ! Haban no reber
Ndɔbaa no bԑyԑ kԑse,
Etwafo no suar dodow,
Edwuma a wɔbԑyԑ no so.

name: MHB 804:4
title: Jonathan Friedrich Bahnmaier, 1774-1841;
verse:
. Otwa edwuma no Wura, ma hԑn
Dԑw na ahoɔdzen nyԑ W'edwuma,
Kԑpem dԑ aman nyina bohu
Wo kan n' hyerԑn na woesuro Wo.  Amen.

name: MHB 805:1
title: Samuel Wolcott, 1813-86.
verse:
. YƐDZE Christ kyerԑ wiadze;
Yԑdze wiadze brԑ Christ,
Wɔ dɔ nsiyԑ m';
'Hiafo na mbɔɔdzifo
Mberԑwyԑfo, nkrumsifo,
Ayarfo, 'werԑhofo a,
Christ sa hɔn yar.

name: MHB 805:2
title: Samuel Wolcott, 1813-86.
verse:
. Yɛdze Christ kyerԑ wiadze;
Yԑdze wiadze brԑ Christ
Wɔ mpaabɔ mu;
Akobɔfo a wɔyewee,
Hɔn a nna wonnyi etsidaa n',
Wɔpoon hɔn aboɔdzen
Fii enyidɔ mu.

name: MHB 805:3
title: Samuel Wolcott, 1813-86.
verse:
. Yɛdze Christ kyerԑ wiadze;
Yԑdze wiadze brԑ Christ
Wɔ ɔnosԑԑ kor m';
Wɔnye hԑn yԑ edwuma n',
Wɔnye hԑn ka asԑm no,
Nye hԑn soa mbeamudua n'
Ma hԑn Wura Christ.

name: MHB 805:4
title: Samuel Wolcott, 1813-86.
verse:
. Yԑdze Christ kyerԑ wiadze,
Yԑdze wiadze brԑ Christ,
Wɔ enyigye ndwom m';
Hɔn a wɔawo hɔn fofor n,
Wɔtwee hɔn fii bɔn mu,
Enyidar na ayԑyi m'
Dze hɔn maa Christ.

name: MHB 806:1
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.

name: MHB 806:2
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.

name: MHB 806:3
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.

name: MHB 806:4
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.

name: MHB 806:5
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.
verse:
. Ma ndwom no ndu wiadze nyina,
Jesus Christ yԑ Hen,
Wiadze nyina mfa no ho nsԑm 
Mbɔ Ne dzin dawur;
Abɔdze nyina nsɔr No,
Mbersantsen na mfesantsen.   Amen.

name: MHB 807:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma hɛn honam ndzi mpaa 
Nkɔ mbew horow do mpo;
Jesus N'adɔfo dze, dabaa
Hɔn akoma yɛ kor.

name: MHB 807:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Jesus na odzii kan 
Dze hɛn akoma bɔɔm';
Hɛn a yɛnye N' nantsew fufuwn'
Ɔma yɛka koryɛm'.

name: MHB 807:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O wɔmma yɛnkɔ do 
Wɔ Jesus N'edwumam';
Asɔr ne Tsir konyimdzifo n',
Yɛnka No do ndzi nyim.

name: MHB 807:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Christ no wenyin ture n' 
Saw n'edwumafo enyim;
Na hwɛ! akatua kɛse no 
Da sor hɔ rotweɔn hɛn.

name: MHB 807:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O hɛn 'koma nye adwen 
N-da ho ara mfow sor,
Nkɔhwɛ hɛn ahomgye bea no,
Mbrɛ hɛn fona bɔ adze.

name: MHB 807:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɔ dwumadzen nyina, 
Nye amandzehu nye yaw
Wotwa do wɔ siar mpoano hɔ;
Hɔ yehyia a yɛmmpaam' bio.

name: MHB 807:78
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ahomka bea dɛɛdɛw, 
Hɔ na abɔfo hyia hɛn,
Hɔ yebohu hɛn enyim bio,
Na yeekyiakyia hɛnho.
 
. Abakamfo Asɔr, 
Hɔn nhyira n' yebenya,
Na yɛdze dɛw ayɛ abɔtsir
Yɛakɔ sor ahomgyem'.

name: MHB 808:1
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.
verse:
. AGYENKWA pa, bɔ Wo nkowaa hyew
'Wo nye ehum na asorԑkye Wura:
Wɔdaa mpokyerԑ m', Ɔwo siaan hɔn,
Wɔrokɔpon nkowaa binom so;
Ka hɔn ho daa,
W'abasa nko na ɔgye nkwa.

name: MHB 808:2
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.

name: MHB 808:3
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.
verse:
. Wodu anana asaase do,
Ma enyidar yԑ bisiww,
Wonnhu hwee dԑ berԑ na mbusu,
Wɔnntse hwee dԑ ekyingye suro a,
Ka hɔn ho daa,
Tsie hɔn nkrumsi, kaa hɔn su.

name: MHB 808:4
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.
verse:
. Sԑ wɔnnsow aba biara,
Na hɔn fona reyԑ ayԑ gyan a,
Ewuradze, twe bԑn hɔn mbɔbɔr m',
Na ma hɔn enyidar ngyina;
Na ahyԑ hɔn dzen n',
Kenyan hɔn nsiyԑ no bio.

name: MHB 808:5
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.
verse:
. Sԑ wɔwɔ atamfo finimfin a,
Ewuradze, ma wɔntwer Wo,
Sԑ konyim ba hɔn dwumadzi mu a,
Ma Wo nkowaa mbrԑ hɔnho adze,
Mma nngya hɔn ekyir,
Kԑpem dԑ wohu W', wɔ sor.

name: MHB 808:6
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.
verse:
. Hɔ na wobohu dza woduaa n'
Wɔ asaase do n' afebɔɔ,
Hɔ na wɔnye Wo bԑtsena daa,
Ɔwo a ekora Wo nkowaa sɔnn;
Na wɔdze dԑw
Beyi Wo nkotoo ayԑw.   Amen.

name: MHB 809:1
title: William Young Fullerton, 1857-1932.
verse:
. MURUNNTUM nnkyerԑ siantsir a Nyia abɔfo sɔr N',
Dze No dɔ bɔto hɔ ama nyimpa mba,
Anaa ɔyԑ 'Guanhwԑfo n' ɔhwehwԑ hɔn a wɔayew,
Mber na mbrԑ wɔdze hɔn bԑsan wonnyim,
Minyim 'yi mbom dԑ Ɔbaabun Mary woo No,
Bethlehem nguambuw mu ara nye Ne fie,
Na dԑ ɔtsenaa Nazareth yԑԑ edwuma,
Dԑm ntsi na Agyenkwa n', wiadze
Agyenkwa no aba.

name: MHB 809:2
title: William Young Fullerton, 1857-1932.
verse:
. Murunntum nnkyerԑ mbrԑ osii hun amandze komm,
Dze n'asomdwee bԑhyԑԑ nyinsuwa bea 'i 'nyam,
Anaa mbrԑ wobubuu n'akoma mbeamudua n' do
Ɔsoaa yaw ahenkyԑw n' mfe eduasa ebiasa.
Minyim 'yi mbom dԑ ɔsa akoma pirafo yar,
Ɔpepa hԑn bɔn na otu hԑn suro;
Oyi afonafo hɔn adzesoa durdur kyen;
'Yi ntsi na Agyenkwa n', wiadze Agyenkwa no wɔ ha.

name: MHB 809:3
title: William Young Fullerton, 1857-1932.
verse:
. Murunntum nnkyerԑ mbrԑ obesi atwe wiadze,
Mbrԑ obesi enya wiadze egyapadze,
Mbrԑ ɔbԑyԑ apapa na abɔn hɔn ehiadze,
Boka na anee hɔn ahwehwԑdze,
Minyim 'yi mbom dԑ akra nyina bohu N'enyimnyam,
Na obohu dza Ɔnoara oduae no,
Na da bi N'ewia bԑhyerԑn 'nyimnyam mu,
Ber a ɔno Agyenkwa n', wiadze Agyenkwa no wobohu N'.

name: MHB 809:4
title: William Young Fullerton, 1857-1932.
verse:
. Murunntum nnkyerԑ mbrԑ wiadze nyina bɔsom N',
Ber a ɔkasa a, ehum biara taa dzinn,
Anaa nyia obotum akyerԑ dԑw kԑse no,
Ber a dɔ ahyԑ nyimpa nyina akoma mu ma.
Minyim 'yi mbom dԑ dԑw bԑhyԑ wimu nyina ma
Na nyimpa ahorow ndze a atow ndwom bi;
Asaase na sor beyi hɔn ano nkorkor;
Afei dze Agyenkwa, wiadze Agyenkwa no yԑ Hen!

name: MHB 81:1
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. DZA me nsa ayɛ biara
Nnkotum agye me kra;
Fona a nyimpadua afa m' biara n', 
Ɔnnkɛma meedzi mu.

name: MHB 81:2
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Dza metse nka, meyɛ
Nnkɛma m' Nyame asomdwee;
Me mpaa, apensi na nyinsu,
Nnkotum asoa m'adzesoa.

name: MHB 81:3
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Christ, W'edwuma nko,
Botum eyi bɔn yi;
Nyame Eguambaa, Wo bɔgyaa nko
Bɛma meenya asomdwee.

name: MHB 81:4
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Wo dɔ a edze dɔ me,
Nnyɛ dza medze dɔ Wo,
Na ɔbɛma meenya ahotɔ,
Na me kra eenya ahomgye.

name: MHB 81:5
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. O Nyame Ba, Wo tum nko 
Botum dze m' bɔn akyɛ m';
O Nyame Ba, Wo tum nko ara
Botum ebubu mpokyerɛ 'i.

name: MHB 81:6
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.
verse:
. Mihyira Nyame Ne Christ,
Motwer Onyame dɔ,
Medze nokwar akoma nye ano
Mefrɛ No M'Agyenkwa.

name: MHB 810:1
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.
verse:
. EGYA, ma W'ahendzi mbra,
Ma ɔmfa n-kwa tum mbra;
Kasa, ka ewiei asԑm n',
Na ma konyim ber no mbra.

name: MHB 810:2
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.
verse:
. Mbrԑ tsetseber do ɔbae n'
Wɔ nyimpa akoma mu pԑԑ n',
Ber a ahotsewfo wui maa Wo,
O Ewuradze, ma ɔmbra bio.

name: MHB 810:3
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.
verse:
. Abosomfie ahengua do
Na ma wɔntow hɔn mfi daa;
Bra mu wɔ W'ahendzi pa m'
Soa Wo wiadze ahenkyԑw n'.

name: MHB 810:4
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.
verse:
. O awerԑhow mber bԑn 'i!
Wɔkyerԑ W' asɔr dԑm mpaabɔ 'i,
Enyi a aweɔn ''bԑn a!
Dԑ obodwir beebiara.

name: MHB 810:5
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.
verse:
. Pue, Nyame N' konyimdzi da,
Pue ma hԑn akoma ndzi dԑw;
Ndwom krɔnkrɔn na aberԑfo dze
Rotweɔn Wo mbae wɔ ha nyina.

name: MHB 810:6
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.

name: MHB 811:1
title: Lewis Hensley, 1824-1905.
verse:
. O Twearammpon Nyame, 
Ma W'ahendzi no mbra,
O Christ, ma W'abaw do
Bubu ɔbɔn no tum.

name: MHB 811:2
title: Lewis Hensley, 1824-1905.
verse:
. W'ahendzi a asomdwee 
Nye dɔ wɔ mu n' wɔ hen?
Dabɛn na enyitan
Bɔbɔ adze wɔ ha?

name: MHB 811:3
title: Lewis Hensley, 1824-1905.
verse:
. W'anohoba n' wɔ hen 
Dɛ mber bi rebɛba a
Akodzi nye brafun
Boguan efi W'enyim?

name: MHB 811:4
title: Lewis Hensley, 1824-1905.
verse:
. Ewuradze yɛserɛ Wo, 
Ma Woho do na bra
Wo tum kɛse no mu,
Na ma hɛn enyi ngye.

name: MHB 811:56
title: Lewis Hensley, 1824-1905.
verse:
. Nyimpa mmbu Wo dzin bi, 
Mbataku kyer Wo nguan;
Pii wɔyew Wo ho dɔ,
Wɔbɔ 'nyimguasebra.
 
. Abosonsɔr dze sum 
Agye aman pii do;
O Anapa Nworaba,
Pue, na mma nntɔ ara da. 	Amen.

name: MHB 812:1
title: Arthur Campbell Ainger, 1841-1919.
verse:
. NYAME reda Ne tsirmpɔw edzi,
fi mber to mber nyina,
Nyame reda tsirmpɔw edzi
na mber bi rebԑn daa;
Nkakra nkakra mber no rebԑn 
Ɔkyԑr dԑn ara a ɔbԑba,
Aber a Nyame N'enyimnyam bԑhyԑ
asaase ma, dԑ mbrԑ nsu ahyԑ po ma no.

name: MHB 812:2
title: Arthur Campbell Ainger, 1841-1919.
verse:
. Ofi boka kɔ anee noho beebi a
nyimpa etsia n',
Asomafo pii hɔn ano na wɔtse Nyame Ne ndze:
Asaasetam na nsupruw, hom nyina nyԑ aso mma me,
Ama Nyame N'enyimnyam aahyԑ asaase ma, 
dԑ mbrԑ nsu hyԑ po ma no.

name: MHB 812:3
title: Arthur Campbell Ainger, 1841-1919.
verse:
. Yԑbԑyԑ dԑn ayԑ Nyame N'edwuma ma
aayԑ yie eetu mpon,
Nyimpa nyina bԑyԑ kor-Asomdwee Hen
bedzi Hen?
Ebԑn na yԑbԑyԑ ma mber n' epua?
kwan biara m' ɔbԑba mu,
Aber a Nyame N'enyimnyam bԑhyԑ
asaase ma, dԑ mbrԑ nsu hyԑ po ma no.

name: MHB 812:4
title: Arthur Campbell Ainger, 1841-1919.
verse:
. Yԑbɔbɔ nsera akɔ kan atserԑw Christ Ne
frankaa m' wɔ N'ahoɔdzen m',
Ama asԑmpa n'enyimnyam kan no
aahyerԑn wɔ wiadze nyina:
Yԑnye bɔn na awerԑhow bɔko
dze agye adaduafo,
Ama Nyame N'enyimnyam aahyԑ asaase 
ma, dԑ mbrԑ nsu hyԑ po ma no.

name: MHB 812:5
title: Arthur Campbell Ainger, 1841-1919.
verse:
. Dza yebotum ayԑ nnsԑ hwee, gyedԑ
Nyame hyira do.
Kwa ara na yԑtweɔn buber, kԑpem
dԑ Nyame ma aba n' nkwa;
Naaso mber no rupua ho-mber a
Ɔkyԑr dԑn ara a ɔbԑba mu n',
Aber a Nyame N'enyimnyam ahyԑ asaase 
ma, dԑ mbrԑ nsu hyԑ po ma no.

name: MHB 813:1
title: John Milton, 1605-74.
verse:
. EWURADZE bԑba, ɔnnkԑkyԑr,
N'anamɔn nnkɔfom da;
Tsenenee bedzi N'enyim ara
Dԑ adehye kwambɔfo.

name: MHB 813:2
title: John Milton, 1605-74.
verse:
. Asaase nokwar tse dԑ nhyiren,
Ɔbɔbɔ na ɔapaa;
Na pԑrpԑr fi ahenman n' nwin mu,
Ahwԑ nyimpa wɔ ase.

name: MHB 813:3
title: John Milton, 1605-74.
verse:
. Ewuradze, soԑr wɔ Wo tum mu
Bu wiadze atsԑn pa,
Ɔwo na ewɔ ho kwan dԑ
Efa wiadze aman nyina.

name: MHB 813:4
title: John Milton, 1605-74.
verse:
. Aman a Ɔwo yԑe nyina bԑba
Abɔbɔ hɔn mu adze
Ama Ɔwo Ewuradze,
A ahyԑ Wo dzin enyimnyam.

name: MHB 813:5
title: John Milton, 1605-74.
verse:
. Kԑse nye Wo, wɔ anwanwadze m',
Wo nsa dzendzen no yԑ;
'Wo etse W'ahengua m' afebɔɔ,
Na Wo nko yԑ Nyame.

name: MHB 814:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. W'ASƆR ne tsir a Sunsum n' hyԑ n' ma,
Na ɔpem agyedzifo akra mu,
Ɔka hɔn bɔ m' wɔ anwanwa dɔ;
Nsɔwano kor mu, tsew hɔn ho.

name: MHB 814:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ewuradze, Wo Sunsum frԑ Wo,
Na akra a wogu afɔr pon ase pen;
W'ayefor n' so se Ewuradze bra,
Na hԑn akra eedzi mu, ayԑ kor.

name: MHB 814:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hue bɔhyԑ akyԑdze n' ma obiara,
Yi amanaman frԑ n' ano. Bra!
Amanamanfo hɔn frԑ n' gye do;
Na fa Wo tsetse dɔm kɔ fie.

name: MHB 814:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ma aman nyina mpem mbra Wo hɔ,
Ma obiara ndzi asԑmpa n' do;
Agyenkwa hu hɔn berԑ nyina,
Nyame N'enyimnyam ahyԑ W' ma.

name: MHB 814:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wo nokwar na ehumbɔbɔr ntsi
Gye hɔn a iwui maa hɔn no!
Fa aman nyina yԑ W'egyapadze;
Na ma wiadze nyina nhu Wo dzin.  Amen.

name: MHB 815:1
title: Charles Edward Oakley, 1832-65.

name: MHB 815:2
title: Charles Edward Oakley, 1832-65.
verse:
. Pomu afamu esupruw,
Hom abotu nyina mu,
Mframadzen nyina ntaa dzinn;
Hom asorԑkye dzen n' ntaa dzinn:
Ɔdze tum kԑse bedzi hen,
Na asaase hun ayԑ N'atsempɔn.

name: MHB 815:3
title: Charles Edward Oakley, 1832-65.

name: MHB 815:4
title: Charles Edward Oakley, 1832-65.
verse:
. Anee mpoano ahorow,
Hom a hom atweɔn akyԑr,
Nsera na nhyira abɔ hom,
Hom mbɔ m' ntow ndwom kԑse;
Hom mpaa mu ntow dԑ Jesus wui,
Nyia wokum No n' tse ase dzi hen.

name: MHB 815:5
title: Charles Edward Oakley, 1832-65.

name: MHB 816:1
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.
verse:
. NYAME Ba no kɔ akono,
Dԑ obenya ahenkyԑw;
No bɔgyaa frankaa nyam fi ekyir.
Woana fa No kwan do?
Nyia ɔnom mbusu kɔɔpow no,
Dzi konyim wɔ yaw do,
Ɔdze abotar soa ne mbeamudua n'
Bԑfa No kwan no do.

name: MHB 816:2
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.
verse:
. Sԑmpa tɔfo a odzi kan no 
Hunii traa adakamaa n',
Ohun no Wura wɔ sorsor,
Na ɔfrԑԑ N' dԑ ɔngye n' nkwa;
Ɔno na akyԑpa wɔ n'ano
Wɔ n'amandzehu mu n',
Ɔsɔree maa abɔnfo no;
Woana bԑfa N' kwan n' do?

name: MHB 816:3
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.
verse:
. Enyimnyam kuw a wɔasan mu eyi a
Sunsum no dwiir hɔn do n'
Hun 'hotsewfo duebien n' 'nyidar,
Wɔtwee esԑndua na gya n';
Wohyiaa etsiɔdzenfo afowa,
Gyinaa ngyata enyim,
Wɔbrԑԑ hɔn kɔn adze maa owu;
Woana fa hɔn kwan do?

name: MHB 816:4
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.
verse:
. 'Kofo kuw, mpanyin, na mbofra,
Mbaapɔn na mbaawa so,
Wodzi Gyefo ahengua n' ho dԑw,
Wɔhyehyԑ ntar fitaa;
Wɔfoow ahenman bepɔw srɔnsrɔm n',
Wɔ mbusu, fona na yaw mu,
O Nyame, ma hԑn adom ma
Yԑmfa mfa hɔn kwan do.  Amen.

name: MHB 817:1
title: George Washington Doane, 1799-1859.
verse:
. WONYAM frankaa no! Wͻntsérɛw mu,
Wimu na pomu na tɛtɛr m;,
Ewia bɛhyérɛn n’ mbobͻwee do.
Mbeamuduà a Agyenkwa tͻr do n’.

name: MHB 817:2
title: George Washington Doane, 1799-1859.
verse:
. Wonyam frankaa no ! Abͻfo
Kotow ahyɛnsew n’ kommyɛ mu:
Wͻper kwa atse Nyame Dͻ
No nwanwa kɛse no ase.

name: MHB 817:3
title: George Washington Doane, 1799-1859.
verse:
. Wonyam frankaa no! Wiadzefo
Bohu N’enyimnyam no wͻ ekyir;
Aman pii a wͻper hͻn awoe ho n‘,
Bonuma hͻn akra wͻ n’ kan mu.

name: MHB 817:4
title: George Washington Doane, 1799-1859.
verse:
. Wonyam frankaa no! Wͻntsérɛw mu.
Wimu na pomu ne tɛtɛr m’:
Hɛn enyimnyam nye mbeamudua n’ nko;
Hɛn enyidar nko nye Nyia wͻsɛɛn N’.

name: MHB 817:5
title: George Washington Doane, 1799-1859.
verse:
. Wonyam frankaa no! Ma ͻnkrͻn ntsérɛw,
Wͻmma ͻnhyérɛn, nkͻ sor na pomu:
Yennyi nyimdzee, ahom na tum;
Yedzi nyim wͻ nsewhyɛ no nko mu.

name: MHB 818:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. AKRA a adom dze hɔn aba
Jesus mu n' wɔ enyigye!
Wɔnam N'akwan mu a, wonya hɔn
Heaven wɔ asaase.

name: MHB 818:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Yenyim konyim asɔr n' hɔn dԑw
Wɔ Wo dɔ kԑse n' mu;
Wɔtow Eguambaa N' ndwom wɔ sor,
Yԑyԑ dԑm wɔ ase ha.

name: MHB 818:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Wɔntonton Wo enyimnyam mu,
Twa hwe W'ehengua enyim;
Yԑkamfo W' wɔ W'adom ahenman m',
Ahenman no yԑ kor.

name: MHB 818:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Igya hԑn kɔ krɔnkrɔn bea n' do,
Hɔ na hԑn sunsum fi;
Nyia otsiatsia W'anamɔn mu n'
Behyia Wo wɔ wimu hɔ

name: MHB 819:1
title: Vera Evaline Walker, 1887-
verse:
. AKOFO n' dze akodze
Hyԑnhyԑnn kɔr akono,
Wo akokodur na ndzeyԑԑ pa m',
Kɔkoe maa Nyankopɔn.
Wɔbrԑԑ otsiɔdzennyi adze,
Dze poon adaduafo,
Dze tutuu mbɔnsandɔm guu koraa,
Wɔ ahotsew tum mu.

name: MHB 819:2
title: Vera Evaline Walker, 1887-
verse:
. 'Nyido adzehu hyerԑnee,
Ndze bi kasae hɔn mu,
Christ No dɔ kԑse n'ahyԑnsew n'
Hyerԑԑn fԑԑfԑw wɔ hɔn enyim.
Afei pԑpa dzendzen,
Ndamyԑ na dɔ kitsaa,
Tsetse akofo dɔm yi ma
Wɔhoom do kɔr kan.

name: MHB 819:3
title: Vera Evaline Walker, 1887-
verse:
. Ɔtse dԑm ber biara,
Fi pata na ahemfie,
'Kwantufo a Ne dzin da hɔn do n'
Edzi Ne frԑ ekyir.
Enyimnyam aka hɔn,
Na wɔrotweɔn Ne pԑ m';
Woetwa N'ahengua ho ehyia,
Wɔda ho ara som yie.

name: MHB 819:4
title: Vera Evaline Walker, 1887-
verse:
. 'Nyido adzehu n' hyerԑn daa,
Nyame ndze n' da ho frԑ,
'Tamfo n'da ho hyԑ abɔbɔfo,
'Daduafo da ho pen;
Wɔdze nsi na abotar,
Gyina ma hɔn Wura,
Nyame akofo dze gyedzi kyԑm
Na afowa tu hɔn sa.

name: MHB 82:1
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. TSIE enyigye ndze! Agyenkwa aba, 
Nyia wɔbɔɔ N' ho dawur n';
Ma akoma biara ngye No ntsena m'
Na ndze biara ntow ndwom.

name: MHB 82:23
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Ɔba bɛgye adaduafo
Fi abɔnsam ndɔmmum mu;
Ayewa mbobow bue N'enyim,
Ndadze mpokyerɛ bubu.
.
. Ɔbɛkyekye akoma a ebubu,
Ɔbesa ɔkra yar;
 Ɔdze N'adom akoradze no
Bɛma hianyi brɛfo.

name: MHB 82:4
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.
verse:
. Asomdwee Hen, hɛn hosanna,
Yɛdze ma W' akɔaba,
Na ɔsor abangua wosow,
Dze Wo dzin a ɔyɛ dɔ n'.

name: MHB 820:1
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.
verse:
. WOANA wɔ Ewuradze afa?
Woana bɔsom Ɔhen n'?
Woana bԑyԑ No mboa,
Atwetwe akra ama N'?
Woana bɔpow wiadze,
Ako etsia tamfo n'?
Woana wɔ Ewuradze afa?
Woana bɔkɔ ama N'?
W'ehumbɔbɔr frԑ n' ntsi,
W'adom nwanwa n' ntsi,
Yewɔ W'afa, Gyefo,
Yԑyԑ Wodze daa.

name: MHB 820:2
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.
verse:
. Jesus enndze sika
Na dwetԑ tɔɔ hԑn;
Mbom W'adehye bɔgya n'
Ayԑ hԑn ahenkyԑw,
Ewora nhyira nsu gu
Nyia ɔba Wo hɔ n' do,
Ama yeenya pԑ bi,
Ayԑ hԑn adehye.
Wo dɔ a ɔapon hԑn ntsi,
W'adom nwanwa n' ntsi,
Yewɔ W'afa Gyefo,
Yԑyԑ Wodze daa.

name: MHB 820:3
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.
verse:
. Sԑ ɔko n' y hu mpo a,
'Tamfo n' yԑ dzen mpo a,
Ɔhen N'akofo n' dze,
'Biara runntum hԑn.
Yedzi N'ekyir yi dze,
Konyimdzi wɔ hԑn;
No nokwar a ɔnnsakyer n'
Ma hen awerԑhyԑm'.
Yԑdɔm W'akafo no,
W'adom nwanwa n' ntsi,
Yewɔ W'afa Gyefo,
Yԑyԑ Wodze daa.

name: MHB 820:4
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.
verse:
. Wɔayԑ hԑn nsordaafo
Wɔ ananabea ha;
Yԑyԑ agyedzifo ma
Hԑn Sahen No kuw.
Adehyesom no mu,
Mma yԑnnyԑ nwin da;
Hom mma yengyina pintsinn,
Nokwar m', 'kokodur m'.
Hԑn Wura, ebɔkora, hԑn,
W'adom nwanwa n' ntsi,
Yԑwɔ W'afa, Gyefo;
Yԑyԑ Wodze daa.

name: MHB 821:1
title: George Duffield, 1818-88.
verse:
. Hom ngyina, hom ngyina mma Jesus! 
Mbeamudua ho nsordaafo;
Hom mma N'ahen-frankaa n' do;
Onnyi dɛ ofi nsa
Obedzi No dɔm kan fi
Konyimm' akɔ konyimm'
Kyerɛ wɔka atamfo nyina hyɛ
Ma Christ dzi hen ampa.

name: MHB 821:2
title: George Duffield, 1818-88.
verse:
. Hom ngyina, hom ngyina mma Jesus! 
Hom ntsie abɛn ne frɛ;
Hom nduom ɔko kɛse n' mu
Wɔ N'enyimnyam da yim'!
Mbarimba, afei hom nsom no
Mfa ntsia atamfo dɔm n'
Hom mfa ndam ngyina mbusu ano,
Hom ntutu dɔm nka dɔm.

name: MHB 821:3
title: George Duffield, 1818-88.
verse:
. Hom ngyina, hom ngyina mma Jesus! 
Hom ngyina N'ahoɔdzen nkom'
Honam abaw bɛpa hom;
Mma hom nntwer hombo da.
Hom nhyɛ Christian akontar,
Na hom nweɔn asɔryɛm',
Edwumayɛ mu o, mbusu mu o
Mma hom nntwa abrɔdɔ.

name: MHB 821:4
title: George Duffield, 1818-88.
verse:
. Hom ngyina, hom ngyina mma Jesus! 
Aperdzi no rennkyɛr 
Ndɛ dze ɔko mu dede
'Kyena konyimdzifo ndwom a 
Nyia obedzi konyim no
Wɔbɛma n' nkwa ahenkyɛw
Ɔnye enyimnyam Hen no
Bedzi hen afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 822:12
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.
verse:
. Christian n-sordaafo, 
Hom nduom akono!
Jesus Ne mbeamudua n'
Dzi hɛn enyim kan.
Hɛn Hen Christ etu sa 
Roko tsia tamfo n',
Hom nduom n-seraban do,
Hom nhwɛ ne mfrankaa n'.
  
    Christian n-sordaafo, 
    Hom nduom akono! 
    Jesus Ne mbeamudua n' 
    Dzi hɛn envim kan. 
 
. Yɛma Ne frankaa n' do a, 
Abɔnsam dɔm gu;
Dɛm a Christ akofo,
Hom nkedzi konyim!
Yɛbɔ se yi ayɛw a,
Hɛll fapem wosow;
Enuanom, hom ntow ndwom,
Hom mma hom ndze do.

name: MHB 822:34
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.
verse:
. Nyame N'asɔr tse dɛ 
Dɔm a wɔyɛ dzen:
Yɛnam ahotsewfo
Hɔn anamɔn mu.
Hɛn mu nnyi mpaapaamu,
Yɛyɛ adze kor.
Hɛn botae, hɛn nkyerɛkyerɛ
Hɛn dɔ nyina kor. 
 
. Ahengua botutu, 
Ahenman etwam',
Na Jesus N'asɔr dze
Betsim afebɔɔ;
Samanadze akoban
Runntum ahyɛ do:
Christ Noara na ɔkae,
N'asɛm so yɛ hɔ.

name: MHB 822:5
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.
verse:
. Mo nkorɔfo e, hom mbɔdɔm 
Egyigye kuw yi;
Hom mfa hom ndze mbɔto
Hɛn konyim ndwom yim':
Enyimnyam na nkamfo
N-ka hɛn Hen Christ!
Yi nyimpa na abɔfo
Bɔtow afebɔɔ.

name: MHB 823:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. HƐN nkwa suma Christ mu wɔ Nyame m',
Hԑn nkwa bopue ntsԑntsԑm,
Eeyi N'enyimnyam akyerԑ mbeambea,
Wɔ no nkorɔfo nyina m'.

name: MHB 823:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hԑn akra kitsa No tum nsamu,
Ɔbɔkora hɔn daa;
Emi na ɔwo begyina Ne nkyԑn
Wɔ Zion bepɔw do.

name: MHB 823:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. O enyigye nhyiamu bԑn a!
Yebowuna ntar fitaa,
Ekitsa mberԑnkɔnson daa,
Na yԑasoa ahenkyԑw.

name: MHB 823:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Afei yԑmfa no dԑm wɔ mbra m'
Na yԑnko nkɔ hԑn enyim;
Yԑnkaa ewiei no hԑn adwen nu
Ndwen mpirenyimadze no ho.

name: MHB 824:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. HOM mma yɛnye sor adͻfo a
Woenya akyɛdze n’ mbͻ m',
Yɛmfa ͻkͻr dͻ atsaban do
Yentu nkͻ sor dɛw mu:
Wͻmma ahotsewfo nye hͻn a,
Wͻkͻ ’nyimnyam m' ntow ndwom,
Na hɛn Hen N’asomfo a wͻwͻ
Sor na ase nyina yɛ kor.

name: MHB 824:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Ebusua kor a yɛtse No mu.
Sor nyé ase Asͻr kor,
Mbom sesei, esutsen twa hɛn ntamu,
Owu esutsen tséabea n’;
Nyame tseasefo nsordaafo a
Yɛhyɛ No tum ase;
No dͻm no bi etwa esupramee,
Bi so gu do rutwa.

name: MHB 824:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Mpem du rokͻ onnyiewie fie’,
Dɛm awͻse ber yi;
Na hɛn so yɛaba berano,
Na hɛn enyi da owu kwan;
Sesei mpo yɛnyé edzikamfo n'
To nsa wͻ gyedzi mu,
Kyià ekuw a bͻgye atsew hͻn ho
Wͻ onnyiewiei mpoano.

name: MHB 824:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.
verse:
. Hɛn so hɛn akra bͻkͻ ekɛka
'Nyimnyamfo akra no ho,
Yɛatsea mu Sahen N’ahyɛnsew n’ ho,
Ber a yɛatse N’abɛn ndze n’;
O nkyɛ yeesuo Kwangyafo n’ mu!
Nkyɛ wͻama hɛn asɛm no!
Dͻm Ewuradze, paa asorɛkye n' mu bra,
Bɛfa hɛn kͻ heaven.    Amen.

name: MHB 825:1
title: William MacLagan

name: MHB 825:2
title: William MacLagan
verse:
. Nyame ahotsewfo ewie kyin,
Wonntu fona mbirika bio,
Wɔnntɔ bitsi, wɔnnhwe ase bio,
'Tamfo nnhyɛ hɔn do, suro nnyi hɔ;
O 'hotsewfo a woehyira hɔn,
Wɔhom yie wɔ dɛm fie pa n' mu.

name: MHB 825:3
title: William MacLagan
verse:
. Nyame ahotsewfo bra abɔ adze,
Wodwir berɛww wɔ 'nyigye mpoano,
Wonnsuro ehum dzendzen no bio,
'Sorɛkye dzendzen biara nnyi hɔ;
O 'hotsewfo a woehyira hɔn,
Wɔhom yie wɔ asomdwee bea n' do.

name: MHB 825:4
title: William MacLagan

name: MHB 826:1
title: Josiah Conder, 1789-1855.
verse:
. NYAME, agyedzifo a woewu
Da ho ara nye hɔn Tsir tse ase,
Yɛnye hɔn wɔ Wura kor;
Yehyira Wo dzin krɔnkrɔn no
Wɔ W'ahotsewfo a woefi mu,
Wɔ Wo gyedzi na suro m' ntsi.

name: MHB 826:2
title: Josiah Conder, 1789-1855.
verse:
. Adom kor a okura hɛn no mu
Yentsiw hɔn a wodzii W'ekyir no,
Na yɛnye hɔn aakyɛ
Ɔsor dɛw akatua kɛse n';
Mbɔbɔrhu Egya, dom hɛn yi
Wɔ hɛn Pomfo no ntsi.   Amen.

name: MHB 827:1
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.
verse:
. HƆN edzin yɛ ahemfo edzin,
'Sor adehye a;
Wiadze ndzepa mu dɛw n',
Wɔpoow ne nyina.

name: MHB 827:2
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.
verse:
. 'Hemfo a wɔdze nkrantsee
Na akokyɛm koe;
Nyame N' nkonyimdzifo
Wɔ akono.

name: MHB 827:3
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.
verse:
. Hɔn wiadze nda yɛɛ yaw
Wɔ ɔtan yerɛyerɛw m',
Ɔbra a enyigye nnyi m',
Na owu ara nko.

name: MHB 827:4
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 827:5
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.
verse:
. Wɔakyekyer kuropɔn bi
Dze ama hɔn;
Ɔwɔ enyimnaymm kɛse,
Jerusalem!

name: MHB 827:6
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.
verse:
. Adehye bɔgya gyee n'
Fii 'wu na bɔn m',
Ɔkorsa Nyame mba,
Hɛn mu kɔ fie.

name: MHB 827:7
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.
verse:
